arrange the sushi in a row .
cut sushi into thin slices . arrange on plate on the leaf . add a dollop of wasabi .

arrange the sushi in a row .
take your slices of sushi and stack them into rows . now take the rows and align a long section on your plate on top of the leaf . now take the other smaller rows and arrange them around the longer row .

arrange the sushi in a row .
arrange the salmon strips in a row so that all of the pieces are all closely touching each other .

cut the meat at a slant .
take a large piece of meat . take a cutting board and a sharp knife . position the knife in a slant angle . cut the meat along in to thin slices slantingly . arrange the slices of meat .

cut the meat at a slant .
place the fish on your cutting board . use a very sharp knife cutting it at a 45 degree angle . cut it very thinly . use your other hand to support the fish while you 're cutting with the knife to make sure you cut it thinly .

cut the meat at a slant .
place left fingers over belly part of salmon . hold knife at angle . make thin slices at an angle .

slice the fish horizontally .
take a piece of the fish and set it on its side . carefully using the knife , cut the fish across into small slices .

slice the fish horizontally .
take the salmon and cut it gently the hot dog way . make sure all of the pieces are equal .

slice the fish horizontally .
now we are going to take our pieces of fish and cut them horizontally . this is essentially cutting them in half but going from the side . make sure you are careful when using your knife !

cut the fish vertically into slices .
put fish on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the fish into thin slices .

cut the fish vertically into slices .
now we want to take our knife and cut the fish some more . we will slice it vertically by pulling the knife towards us , but keeping our fingers clear . cut into thin slices , but not to thin .

cut the fish vertically into slices .
cut the salmon into thin , rectangular pieces . while cutting pull your knife to allow the cutting edge to easily cut the salmon .

slice a loin of salmon into thin pieces .
cut salmon into thin pieces . put it on a plate .

slice a loin of salmon into thin pieces .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take a loin of salmon on the cutting board . cut the salmon in to the thin slices . place the slice on the plate . repeat the same with the entire piece of salmon .

slice a loin of salmon into thin pieces .
" take a very sharp knife and slice the salmon into thin , 1/4 strips . " " . " be sure to cut off any fat or bones . try to cut the salmon pieces all the same size and shape . lay the pieces flat on the plate .

roll the pieces of salmon together to create a circle .
cut the salmon in to very thin pieces . take a salmon piece and roll it in to a circle . now take another piece of salmon and roll it on the side of first piece . repeat with other pieces of salmon . arrange them in shape of circle .

roll the pieces of salmon together to create a circle .
take a piece of salmon and roll it up into a circle . take another piece of salmon and roll it around the first piece you just rolled .

roll the pieces of salmon together to create a circle .
use your chopsticks and your fingers to add each layer of the fish . gently add the finely slice fish one layer at time to form a flower . use your fingers and chopsticks to shape it more into a flower or petal shape as you go .

garnish the salmon with shiso leaves .
add some shiso leaves to the salmon . place on the plate in a way to make it look nice .

garnish the salmon with shiso leaves .
place the salmon on the plate overlapping with one in a circle in the middle . next garnish the salmon with shiso leaves .

garnish the salmon with shiso leaves .
arrange the salmon nicely on a plate . place 5 - 7 shiso leaves on the salmon , spread out evenly .

grate fresh wasabi into a paste and add to the salmon .
grate the fresh wasabi into a paste using a grater . put the grated wasabi on the salmon .

grate fresh wasabi into a paste and add to the salmon .
use a grater and grate the wasabi . make the wasabi into a creamy paste . add the wasabi to the side of the salmon .

grate fresh wasabi into a paste and add to the salmon .
use a grater and hold the wasabi against it . rub the wasabi up and down on the grater to mash it up . take a tiny bit and put it on the fish .

slice a piece of cucumber and add with the salmon .
take your knife and carefully cut a piece of cucumber . fold the cucumber to make it look nice . set the cucumber on top of the salmon .

slice a piece of cucumber and add with the salmon .
carefully take your knife and slice your cucumber to add to the top of the salmon . you can use your knife to cut thin slices into your cucumber and then unfold it to make a more appealing shape , similar to a flower . just be careful no matter which approach you take . the knife can easily cut you as well .

slice a piece of cucumber and add with the salmon .
slice a piece of cucumber very carefully and thin . put it in with the fish .

mix vegetable oil salt and curry masala .
pour some cider vinegar , vegetable oil , salt , tamarind , and curry masala into a bowl and mix everything together .

mix vegetable oil salt and curry masala .
you need a big bowl and a whisk to stir ingredients . stir the ingredients until the lumps are out . the marinade should be smooth .

mix vegetable oil salt and curry masala .
put a large bowl on the table . pour in cider vinegar . add garam masala powder . add vegetable oil and salt . add tamarind and mix it all together .

marinate the lamb in a ziplock bag .
add marinate into ziplock . squeeze out all the air that you can . then add it into the fridge overnight . flip it a couple times through the night .

marinate the lamb in a ziplock bag .
pour the marinade into a ziplock bag with the lamb . put the lamb in the refrigerator overnight . turn over the ziplock bag in the refrigerator .

marinate the lamb in a ziplock bag .
get a ziplock bag and a bowl . put your lamb and the wet sauce in the ziplock bag . squeeze the air from the bag and seal it tight . put the bag in the bowl and set it in the refrigerator . turn it over one or two times so all parts get wet overnight .

season the lamb meat with salt .
arrange the lamb meat on a cookie sheet that has been covered with tin foil . sprinkle salt on the lamb meat . turn each piece of meat over , and sprinkle salt on the other sides . make sure the oven has reached the proper temperature - the lamb meat must go into a very hot oven to cook correctly . using an oven mitt , put the pan into the oven and set your timer .

season the lamb meat with salt .
take the lamb meat on a baking tray . take some salt with hand . sprinkle some salt on one of lamb meats . repeat the same with other meat pieces . place it in the oven .

season the lamb meat with salt .
add salt to the lamb . turn the lamb over and add salt to the other side as well .

bake the lamb meat in an oven .
preheat the oven to 450 degrees . place the lamb meat on a baking sheet . bake in oven for 15 to 20 minutes .

bake the lamb meat in an oven .
turn on the oven to 450 degrees . cover a baking sheet with a piece of aluminum foil . put the lamb onto the baking sheet . stick the baking sheet in the oven for 15 - 20 minutes . if the lamb is brown , it is done !

bake the lamb meat in an oven .
put the lamb meat in the over . leave in the oven for 15 to 20 minutes at 450 degrees . wait until the lamb is brown . remove from the oven .

blend garlic ginger cherry and onion and water .
slowly add the vegetables into the blender . carefully pour the water in after the vegetables . cover the blender with the lid and press the blend button .

blend garlic ginger cherry and onion and water .
add garlic to the blend . add ginger . add some cherries . add a little bit of water . and then blend until it 's a strawberry color .

blend garlic ginger cherry and onion and water .
get a blender . put the garlic , the ginger , the cherry tomatoes , the onion and the water in the blender . turn the blender on and let it mix up the ingredients until it looks like a smoothie .

heat some clarified butter in a pan .
make sure the fire is turned on under your pan . in a heavy pan , add some clarified butter or ghee . ghee and clarified butter are melted butter with the solids removed .

heat some clarified butter in a pan .
turn the over on medium high heat . take a spoon and scoop some clarified butter in a pan .

heat some clarified butter in a pan .
set the oven knob to medium - high or halfway above the medium mark . use a spoon and scoop some clarified butter into the pan .

add chopped onion and salt and saute .
cut an onion into large chunks . heat up the pot on medium heat and add a slice of butter . add the onions to the pan . add a pinch of salt with your hand . cook the onions , stirring every minute until dark brown .

add chopped onion and salt and saute .
throw in the cut up onions . add the salt . mix everything up with a spoon and let it cook a little .

add chopped onion and salt and saute .
clarified butter goes into the pan . a roughly chopped onion and keep cooking it , add salt . keep cooking until it 's deep caramel .

mix some cumin cinnamon black pepper and paprika .
take your measuring spoon and put one scoop of cumin in the bowl . next , put one scoop of cinnamon in the bowl . put one scoop of black pepper in the bowl . finally , put one scoop of paprika in the bowl .

mix some cumin cinnamon black pepper and paprika .
while your onions are browning , put some cumin , cinnamon , black pepper , a lot of cayenne , dry mustard , and paprika into a bowl .

mix some cumin cinnamon black pepper and paprika .
first , find a small metal bowl for your spice blend . in the bowl , put in the cumin , cinnamon , black pepper , lots of cayenne pepper , dry mustard , and paprika .

add the mixed spices the mixture and the lamb in .
reduce heat to medium , add the spices . toast spices in the butter for 2 minutes . stir spices to evenly toast . pour in leftover cider , tamarind , and oil marinade . add onion , tomato , ginger and garlic from the blender . stir . raise heat to high . bring to a simmer . add a little brown sugar . place lamb in pot . let cook for 3 hours . turn lamb occasionally . add a splash of water if necessary .

add the mixed spices the mixture and the lamb in .
throw in the mixed spices . put the lamb in . mix it with a wooden spoon .

add the mixed spices the mixture and the lamb in .
reduce the heat to medium . put the spices in the mix . use the spatula to mix the spice in . cook for 2 minutes . add the marinade and brown sugar and mix together .

dice a red onion mince few cloves of garlic and chop some cilantro .
cut the onion in to small pieces . take some cloves of garlic on a cutting board . cut the garlic cloves in to small pieces . take some cilantro on the cutting board . cut the cilantro in to very small pieces .

dice a red onion mince few cloves of garlic and chop some cilantro .
cut up the red onion into small cubes . smash the garlic with the knife . then cut the garlic into very tiny pieces . then cut the cilantro , green veggies , into pieces the size of your thumbnail .

dice a red onion mince few cloves of garlic and chop some cilantro .
cut up your red onions . cut up your garlic very tiny . cup up your cilantro .

add butter in a pan and saute the onion and garlic .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . add some butter in to the pan . cut the onions in to very small pieces and add it in to the pan . cut the garlic in to very small pieces . add the garlic in to the pan and fry everything .

add butter in a pan and saute the onion and garlic .
place the pan on the stove . add butter to the pan . add the onions to the pan . turn the gas on and leave the onion on the stove for five minutes .

add butter in a pan and saute the onion and garlic .
turn on the stove and place your skillet on the burner . carefully add a little butter to the skillet . add the onions and garlic to the skillet . cook them for about 5 minutes or until the onions become soft see - through .

add some sausage ground beef bread crumbs chopped cilantro in a bowl .
add some sausage to the bowl . put in the ground beef to the bowl . mix the eggs with a fork and then pour the eggs to the bowl . pour bread crumbs into the mixture . add the cut up cilantro into the bowl .

add some sausage ground beef bread crumbs chopped cilantro in a bowl .
take some hot italian sausage , ground beef . take two eggs and mix them , add them in the bowl of sausage and ground beef . add some japanese bread crumbs and chopped cilantro to the bowl .

add some sausage ground beef bread crumbs chopped cilantro in a bowl .
add sausage in a bowl . add ground beef into bowl . add breadcrumb into the bowl . add mixed egg and chopped cilantro into the bowl .

add the onion garlic mixture salt and pepper to the bowl .
add onion and garlic . add salt and pepper to your bowl . mix the ingredients .

add the onion garlic mixture salt and pepper to the bowl .
add the cooled onion and garlic mixture to the bowl . add a little salt and pepper on top . mix well .

add the onion garlic mixture salt and pepper to the bowl .
wait 5 minutes after you have cooked the garlic in the pan . use a wooden spoon to scrape the garlic our of the pan and onto the meat . then shake some salt on the meat for a few seconds using a salt shaker . shake some pepper on the meat for a few seconds using a pepper shaker .

mix the ingredients by hand until the bread crumbs are not visible distinctly .
add all the ingredients to the meat in a large bowl . mix the ingredients well with your hands . squeeze the ingredients into the meat , and mix it all around until you ca n't see the bread crumbs anymore .

mix the ingredients by hand until the bread crumbs are not visible distinctly .
mix everything with your hands , until everything is mixed together very well and you ca n't see the breadcrumbs anymore .

mix the ingredients by hand until the bread crumbs are not visible distinctly .
place all ingredients and meat together in a bowl . using your hands , mix together until the bread crumbs are completely mixed in the meat .

place the mixture in a meatloaf pan .
use your hand to take the meat out of the bowl . put the meat into a loaf pan and press the meat down to shape it .

place the mixture in a meatloaf pan .
take the meat loaf mixture and put it into the meat loaf pan using your hands . spread the meat mixture evenly using your hands into the pan .

place the mixture in a meatloaf pan .
get a baking pan . take the big hamburger mixture and put it in that baking pan . make the hamburger mixture look like a thick tree log . hamburger should cover the whole bottom of the pan . put it in the heated oven at 325 degrees for 1 hour .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
turn on the oven and set the dial to 375 . wait for the oven to beep that it 's ready . place your meatloaf into a small pan with high walls . put it in the oven for 40 minutes .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
place the meatloaf in the oven . set the over at 375 degrees . cook for 40 minutes .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
place the meatloaf into a loaf pan , and spread it evenly in the pan . put the pan in the oven at 375 for 40 minutes . remove it from the over ( using oven mitts ) .

add some chopped white onions in a pan under medium heat .
cut the white onions into small cubes . add the cut onions into the pan . switch on the stove with a medium heat . saute it for about 2 minutes .

add some chopped white onions in a pan under medium heat .
make sure the dial on the stove is set to medium heat . once the pan is hot , add in the onions and cook them for about 2 minutes , just until they are soft .

add some chopped white onions in a pan under medium heat .
add the onions for about two minutes . make sure the oven is set to medium heat .

add in red pepper and sweet potatoes .
take the cut red pepper and slowly and carefully drop them into the pan using your hands . repeat with the sweet potatoes .

add in red pepper and sweet potatoes .
you will need to dice up a red bell pepper into small 1 inch pieces . next , peel a couple of sweet potatoes and dice them into 1 inch cubes . once both the red pepper and sweet potatoes are diced check on the onions and make sure they are are golden and translucent . then , add the red pepper and sweet potatoes to the pan with onions .

add in red pepper and sweet potatoes .
put the red pepper and sweet potatoes into the hot pan . use your hand to carefully place in the pan .

add a spoon of water .
place sweet potatoes in pot / pan . use an actual tablespoon measuring spoon . cover pot with the lid for the pot . recheck the temperature on the stove . simmer in the pot .

add a spoon of water .
get a spoon and scoop 1 spoonful of water . dump the spoon of water in the pan .

add a spoon of water .
add water with a spoon . put the lid on the pot .

cook with lid on .
cover the pan . cook for around fifteen minutes , until the potatoes are softened . be sure to watch the potatoes , stirring them from time to time .

cook with lid on .
add a couple of tablespoons of water to the hot pan of sweet potatoes . cover the pan of sweet potatoes with a lid . cook for 15 minutes . flip the sweet potatoes several times during the 15 minutes so they do not burn .

cook with lid on .
once our dish start to cook , we want to cover it . take a lid and set it over the pan of sweet potatoes . we want to let them cook for about 15 minutes . make sure to flip the potatoes from time to time so they do not burn .

season it with salt and black pepper .
the last thing you need to do is season your potatoes with pepper . use your pepper grinder to add as much or as little pepper you like on top of your potatoes . do n't use too much !

season it with salt and black pepper .
cook for 8 or 9 minutes . using a pepper grinder , grind peppercorn onto your sweet potatoes . add salt onto potatoes . season to taste .

season it with salt and black pepper .
remove the sweet potatoes from the oven . set them on a plate to cool . while they are cooling add a pinch of salt and a pinch of black pepper to the sweet potatoes .

cut the tuna to thin slices .
take your knife to the white line of the fish . cut above the white line and cut off the top of the fish . start at the top of the fish and cut into 3 even slices . take your slice of fish and cut them length wise into 6 pieces .

cut the tuna to thin slices .
take the big piece of tuna . take a knife and cut the tuna horizontally in to a thick piece . cut the remaining tuna in to thick pieces . cut each thick piece in to thin slices . repeat with entire slices of tuna .

cut the tuna to thin slices .
carefully slice the tuna into thin slices . be careful using a knife when slicing the tuna . do this on a cutting board .

cut the salmon to thin slices .
cut the salmon fish into very thin slices , kind of like paper . lay the slices on the table .

cut the salmon to thin slices .
use a knife . cut the fish into slices .

cut the salmon to thin slices .
place salmon skin side down . get out a cutting board . get out a filet knife , ( long thin one ) . slice the salmon horizontally , making thin slices like lunch meat ,

roll the salmon .
roll the top piece of the salmon fish around the other slices . you just made a salmon rose !

roll the salmon .
lay salmon on a flat surface . slice the salmon so that it is about 1/4 inch think . " starting from the top , roll down into itself so it forms a rose " " " " . "

roll the salmon .
roll the same slices into the other slices of salmon . keep rolling until it forms a rose shape .

to add favor pour two different sauces around meat . make a circle around the plate . make the sauce even amounts .

when there not too much sauce left , add the chopped tomatoes to the pan . the more tomatoes you use the better .

put in the chopped onion .

put in the chopped onion .

while the dish is still cooking on the stove , add the salt . continue stirring as the salt is mixed in and continues to cook .

season with salt and stir .
grab some salt . add salt to the pan , making sure to spread it equally over the ingredients . grab a spatula . use the spatula to stir the ingredients thoroughly by pushing them around , side - to - side , and flipping them . once well - stirred , use your spatula to flatten the ingredients .

chopped onions and garlic and place in the pot .

chopped onions and garlic and place in the pot .
cut the ends off of your onion , then cut it in half using your knife on a nice wooden cutting board . now chop the onion finely by cutting the onions first into small pieces . add a little bit of oil to your hot medium sized pot then add your butter . now you can add your onions to the oil and butter by scooping it with your hands and placing it in your pot . now finely chop your cloves of garlic by first slicing it then keep chopping it with your knife on your cutting board until the garlic is chopped finely , now add it to your pot .

place the vegetable mixture into the pot .
put a medium sized saucepan on the stove and turn on the stove . with your mixture in a bowl , carefully spoon it into the warmed up saucepan . mix it up with a large wooden spoon .

hold the vegetable mixture bowl over the pot . use a spatula to scoop the mixture out into the pan carefully and slowly .

place the vegetable mixture into the pot .
use a spoon to scoop the vegetable mixture into the pot . stir the vegetables into the bowl as it cooks .

mix the potatoes and onions in .
take the salad into a large glass bowl . cut the potatoes into big cubes . add the cut potatoes into the bowl . add the fried onions into the bowl . mix all the ingredients together .

add some fried onions into the bowl . use a spoon to mix together the fried onions with the rice .

add the vegetables yogurt cream and cheese to the bowl .
pour the vegetables into a large bowl . use a spoon to scoop in some yogurt . add some fresh cream . pour in the cheese .

add the vegetables yogurt cream and cheese to the bowl .
put the vegetables in a large bowl . add the yogurt to the bowl . add the fresh cream to the bowl . add the cheese to the bowl .

add the vegetables yogurt cream and cheese to the bowl .
use a spoon and scoop the vegetables into the bowl . add the yogurt cream and cheese to the bowl with the spoon .

add flour corn meal sugar salt and baking soda to bowl and mix .
in one bowl pour in flour , corn meal , sugar , salt and baking soda . mix everything in the bowl together .

add flour corn meal sugar salt and baking soda to bowl and mix .
add flour , corn meal , salt , sugar and baking soda to a large mixing bowl . mix the ingredients together well .

add flour corn meal sugar salt and baking soda to bowl and mix .
take a large bowl and add a cup of flour . add a cup of corn meal in to the bowl . add little salt and sugar in to the bowl . add little baking soda in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl with a spoon .

add milk and one egg whisk together .
put milk into bowl and crack one egg into bowl . use w whisk to mix the milk and egg into the flour . once mixed and smooth set the bowl off to the side .

add milk and one egg whisk together .
pour milk into the bowl . crack an egg on the side of the bowl and carefully crack it into the mixture . use a whisk to stir that all together into an even batter .

add milk and one egg whisk together .
add milk and one egg . stir together until it is smooth .

cut hotdogs into thirds and place in the flour .
cut hot dogs into thirds . place hot dogs into bowl of flour .

cut hotdogs into thirds and place in the flour .
using a sharp knife , cut each hotdog into three even pieces . put the hotdog pieces into the flour bowl . use the flour to coat the hotdog pieces by moving them around in the flour .

cut hotdogs into thirds and place in the flour .
put some flour into a large bowl . use a knife to make 2 cuts on each hotdog , making 3 pieces . put the cut hot dog pieces into the bowl of flour .

put hotdog pieces in batter and coat them .
place hot dogs in batter 2 to 3 at a time . cover them with batter using a spoon to make sure they get completely covered . fish them out and place them in heated fry pan . repeat steps for the rest of the hot dogs .

put hotdog pieces in batter and coat them .
roll hotdog pieces in some flour until the hotdog looks white . put the hotdog pieces into the bowl with the batter . use a spoon and cover the hotdog all of the way up with the batter . make sure that you ca n't see any of the hotdog , only the batter .

put hotdog pieces in batter and coat them .
take the batter in a bowl . cut the hot dogs in to small pieces . add the hot dogs in to the batter bowl . take a spoon . coat the hot dogs with the batter .

fry the corn dogs .
use a fork to scoop under the hot dog one at a time . slowly lower into the oil . they turn themselves . keep oil at set temperature . only leave in a about 3 minutes .

fry the corn dogs .
take the pot on a stove . heat the oil in the pot . take the corn dogs dipped in batter in a bowl . add the corn dogs in to the hot oil . fry the corn dogs .

fry the corn dogs .
using a fork , take the corn dogs out of the mixture , and place inside pan with the oil . corn dogs will turn themselves once they are done , or until they are golden brown . use a thermometer to measure the heat of the oil , so it is not too hot . adjust burner to a higher or lower temperature if needed .

remove the corn dogs and put them onto a paper towel .
cook the corn dogs in the pan . take the corn dogs from the pan . take the paper towel on a plate . place the corn dogs on to the paper plate . repeat the same with all of the corn dogs .

remove the corn dogs and put them onto a paper towel .
lay a piece paper towel on a plate . carefully take out the corn dogs from the pan using tongs . put the corn dogs on the napkin .

remove the corn dogs and put them onto a paper towel .
place 2 - 3 sheets of paper towel on top of a plate . get a metal cooking tong . with the tong , take out one corn dog out of the oil and move it up and down on top of the pan so that the extra oil fall back into pan . do the same with the rest of the corn dogs .

lightly mash the kidney beans and dal and cook .
in order to make it creamy you need to mash the kidney beans and dal a little bit . using a masher , press down the mixture in your pot , but do n't over do it . cook for around five more minutes .

lightly mash the kidney beans and dal and cook .
using a potato masher , smash up the kidney beans and dal . after 1 - 2 minutes of smashing , put the burner on to a low - medium setting . let this cook for about 5 minutes .

lightly mash the kidney beans and dal and cook .
use a potato masher to mash the dal until creamy . use a spoon to stir the dal . let it cook on low to medium heat for five minutes .

pour the spiced ghee over the dal .
move the pan of spiced ghee over the dal bowl . use the spatula to scoop the ghee into the dal bowl .

pour the spiced ghee over the dal .
remove the pan from the stove . carefully pour it into the bowl with the dal . use a spoon to get it all in there if you need to . place pan back on stove or into the sink .

pour the spiced ghee over the dal .
take a pan and heat the pan . add little butter and melt the butter in the pan . add the spices to the butter . off the stove and take the pan away . add the spiced ghee in to the bowl of dal .

place the dal in a pressure cooker with four cups of water .
cook them on medium high . add water .

place the dal in a pressure cooker with four cups of water .
put the dal in the pressure cooker with a spoon . add 4 cups of water to the pressure cooker .

place the dal in a pressure cooker with four cups of water .
put the dal into the pressure cooker . pour 4 cups of water in the pressure cooker so that it cooks with the dal .

heat the ghee in a small saucepan .
put a small saucepan on the stove and turn the heat up halfway . put the ghee in the pan and let it melt .

heat the ghee in a small saucepan .
put a small saucepan onto the stove . turn on the burner to medium high heat . slowly pour the ghee into the pan , using a spoon to scrape all of it out into the pan .

heat the ghee in a small saucepan .
turn the dial on the stove to medium high . place the saucepan on the burner . once the pan is hot , pour the ghee onto the pan using a spoon to get it out of the bowl .

uncover the pot and stir .
carefully open the pot when it unlocks . do n't try to force the pot open before it unlocks . stir the sauce with a large spoon .

uncover the pot and stir .
take the lid off the pot . use a stirring spoon to mix the ingredients in the pot .

uncover the pot and stir .
remove the top and place aside . slowly stir and scrape the sides of the pot until everything is soft and tender .

garnish with shredded ginger .
cook the dal in a pot . transfer the dal in to a bowl . take an inch piece of ginger . grate the ginger in to small pieces . add the shredded ginger on top of dal .

garnish with shredded ginger .
use a knife to remove the skin off some ginger . grate the ginger using a grate . add a pinch of the grated ginger to the top of the dal .

garnish with shredded ginger .
add soup to bowl . shred ginger . garnish soup with ginger .

add cumin seeds .
pour cumin seeds into the frying pan . mix the seeds around the pan .

add cumin seeds .
in the bowl of your mixture put in some cumin seeds . then mix all together with a spoon .

add cumin seeds .
pour cumin seeds into the pan with the oil . be careful of oil splattering .

add cream garam masala and amchoor powder .
next , add the cream that we measured out in the beginning . use your spoon to scrape all of the cream from the measuring container . then , add the mango powder that we measured out at the beginning . after that , add the garam masala powder that we measured out at the beginning . double check that you have completely emptied the containers for these three ingredients into the pot before we start to stir . we have to make sure we are using the right amounts , so do n't leave any behind .

add cream garam masala and amchoor powder .
pour in the cream . add the amchoor powder and garam masala into the pot .

add cream garam masala and amchoor powder .
prepare a bowl . put in eggs . add cream . put in mango powder . throw in garam masala .

cover the pot and cook .
cover the pot with a lid that fits snugly . turn the knob of the stove to medium and let it cook .

cover the pot and cook .
put a lid onto the cooker . wait for the cooker to start to steam . turn the heat down to medium . cook for 25 minutes .

cover the pot and cook .
add the lid to the pressure cooker . make sure the pressure cooker is locked .

add the asafetida and red chilies .
hold the spices over the pan . drop the spices in carefully .

add the asafetida and red chilies .
put the amount of oil we measured into the pan . turn the stove on to medium high heat ( that 's the middle notch on the dial ) and allow the oil to heat for about 3 minutes . drop a few very small pieces of asafetida into the oil . if the oil makes a hissing sound , it is hot enough . add the asafetida to the pan slowly , so that you do n't cause oil to splash and burn you . next , carefully drop the red chilies into the oil .

add the asafetida and red chilies .
add asafetida into the pan . put a few red chilies to the pot . use a spoon to stir the mixture around the pan .

add the salt turmeric ginger and green chili .
as your pot simmers get ready to add the spices . one at a time add the green chili , ginger , turmeric and salt to the pot .

add the salt turmeric ginger and green chili .
hold the ingredients over the pot . carefully shake the salt turmeric ginger and green chili into the pot .

add the salt turmeric ginger and green chili .
pour in some green chili in the pot . add ginger . add turmeric . pour in some salt .

mix milk and vinegar together .
put milk in a liquid measuring cup . add vinegar to measuring cup . then stir milk and vinegar together .

mix milk and vinegar together .
add one tablespoon of vinegar to the one cup of milk . stir the vinegar into the milk . pour the vinegar and milk mixture into the pan .

mix milk and vinegar together .
measure out one tables spoon of vinegar . add vinegar to one cup of milk . mix the vinegar into the milk .

add flour paprika garlic powder black pepper and salt to a bag and mix together .
put a plastic bag in a pot so that the plastic bag is open at the top . pour flour from your measuring cup into the plastic bag . use a small spoon to put paprika into the plastic bag . use a small spoon to put garlic powder into the plastic bag . sprinkle pepper and a small spoonful of salt into the plastic bag , and then use a large spoon to mix all of the ingredients in the bag together .

add flour paprika garlic powder black pepper and salt to a bag and mix together .
put a plastic bag in a large mixing bowl . put flour , paprika , garlic powder , salt and black pepper into the flour . use a large spoon to mix the spices into the flour .

add flour paprika garlic powder black pepper and salt to a bag and mix together .
open a plastic bag and put it in an empty bowl . add flour to bag . add 1 tsp . paprika , garlic powder , salt to bag . shake in black pepper according to your taste . mix the ingredients in the bag with a spoon until they are well combined .

dip the chicken in the milk and the flour mixture .
take your togs and slowly dip the chicken into the milk mixture . do n't splash the chicken around to much , or the raw chicken could contaminate your area . just slowly dip it in the milk and flour mixture and then set it in your other mixing bowl with the bag . now grab the next piece of chicken and do the same thing .

dip the chicken in the milk and the flour mixture .
use tongs to pick up the chicken . hold the chicken with the tongs and dip it into the milk . turn the chicken over in the milk getting milk all over . pick the chicken back up with the tongs and put it in the bag with flour mix .

dip the chicken in the milk and the flour mixture .
using tongs place one piece of chicken into the milk . cover the chicken in the milk , moving it around until it is fully coated . using the tongs place the chicken into the flour mixture .

cover the chicken with paper towel and let sit .
take a paper towel and place it over the chicken . let the chicken sit for 30 to 45 minutes . take off the paper towel and see how the paste looks .

cover the chicken with paper towel and let sit .
cover chicken with paper towel . set aside for 30 - 45 minutes . check the chicken to see if the flour coating has fully formed .

cover the chicken with paper towel and let sit .
lay a paper towel flat over the container of chicken to cover it . let the chicken sit there .

fry the chicken in oil .
coat chicken in eggs and breading mix . heat oil in a pan on stove until bubbles start to rise . carefully add chicken to oil with tongs . flip chicken periodically , cook for - minutes .

fry the chicken in oil .
once the oil in the pan is hot , slowly place each piece of chicken in . wait a few minutes then turn over once it 's brown . do the same for the other side . once both sides are cooked , remove from the oil .

fry the chicken in oil .
using your tongs , put the chicken into the very hot cooking oil . cook the chicken for 20 to 25 minutes . use your fork to flip the chicken sometimes . poke the chicken the check if it is ready . move the chicken onto a plate when finished .

mash a bowl of chickpeas using a fork .
hold the bowl of chickpeas firmly in the palm of one hand . hold your fork in the other hand . place a finger or two on the foot of the fork , just below the slots . use this finger to control the fork as you firmly press it into the chickpeas . repeat this until the chickpeas are mashed into a rough paste .

mash a bowl of chickpeas using a fork .
take 15 to 20 chana into a bowl . mash the chanas or chickpeas with the help of a fork . we can use a smasher to smash the chana peas . we will bet a nice aroma if we mash some chanas to our gravy .

mash a bowl of chickpeas using a fork .
take a fork and smash the chickpeas . squish it down together with the fork .

pour oil onto a hot pan .
take your oil . pour the oil into a hot pan on the stove .

pour oil onto a hot pan .
pour some oil into a hot pan . move the pan around to make sure the pan is coated .

pour oil onto a hot pan .
heat pan on stove top . carefully pour oil into pan . move pan around so oil covers pan .

add garam masala cloves cinnamon sticks bay leaf and cardamom to the pan .
once the pan is hot , add garam masala to pan . then add cloves , cinnamon sticks and cardamom to pan . after they cook a little bit , add the bay leaf to the pan .

add garam masala cloves cinnamon sticks bay leaf and cardamom to the pan .
add garam and masala to the pan . add cloves and cinnamon sticks to the pan . add bay leaves to the pan . add cardamom to the pan .

add garam masala cloves cinnamon sticks bay leaf and cardamom to the pan .
once the pan is hot go ahead and grab your ingredients . you can slowly add your ingredients , but wait to add the bay leaf . make sure to be careful it is very hot ! wait until you can smell your cinnamon cooking and add your bay leaf carefully .

add garlic ginger paste to the pan and stir .
mix in the garlic paste . you can also add whole peppercorns now . keep mixing everything .

add garlic ginger paste to the pan and stir .
add the ginger paste into the pan . add the garlic paste into the pan . stir both the paste until it is cooked . stir its raw smell vanishes .

add garlic ginger paste to the pan and stir .
use your wooden spoon to scrape the garlic ginger paste off the plate . carefully scrape it into the hot pan . stir with wooden spoon until mixed in well .

add grated onion to the pan and stir .
put the grated onions into the pan . stir the onions until they change to a golden brown color , which should be about 2 minutes .

add grated onion to the pan and stir .
using your hands , add the grated onion onto the garlic and ginger . using your spoon , mix all of the ingredients together .

add grated onion to the pan and stir .
put the small pieces of grated onion into the pan . stir with a spoon or spatula and spread it out evenly in the pan . cook it for about two minutes and the onions should start turning a little bit brown .

add turmeric to the pan and stir .
add onions to the hot pan on the stove . next add turmeric to the pan . stir the ingredients together for a few minutes .

add turmeric to the pan and stir .
add the turmeric you measured out to the pan . use a wooden spoon to stir the pan . cook for two minutes .

add turmeric to the pan and stir .
put turmeric into the pan . stir the turmeric in .

add the mashed chick peas and the whole chick peas to the pan and stir .
slowly add your mashed chick peas into the mixture . once added in , you will also add whole chick peas to the pan . you 'll then want to stir all the chick peas into the pan . then you can let the gravy cook for at least 15 minutes .

add the mashed chick peas and the whole chick peas to the pan and stir .
add the mashed chick peas into the pan . add the whole chana in to the pan . mix together using a spatula . wait until they are nicely cooked .

add the mashed chick peas and the whole chick peas to the pan and stir .
add mashed up chick peas to pan and stir with wooden spoon . add whole , unmashed chick peas to pan and stir with wooden spoon . keep stirring with spoon for 15 minutes . you can also use the microwave to cook this .

garnish with cilantro leaves and stir .
gather a knife and cilantro . slice the cilantro into small pieces . add the cilantro into the pot . stir the pot for a few minutes . after 5 minutes of stirring , you are done .

garnish with cilantro leaves and stir .
sprinkle cilantro on top . stir .

garnish with cilantro leaves and stir .
pour in the cilantro . stir in and mix the cilantro with the rest .

mix occasionally and cover and allow the chanas to cook .
take a plastic tipped spatula and use it to stir the food every ten minutes . use the spatula to press down lightly on the chanas .

mix occasionally and cover and allow the chanas to cook .
mix the chana in the bowl . stir it occasionally . press some of the chana so that the masala can be blended easily . cove with the lid to cook properly .

mix occasionally and cover and allow the chanas to cook .
mix the chanas with a spatula . press the chanas down to the pan with the spatula . mix the chanas again with the spatula .

add in the water that had been set aside little at a time .
add a little bit of the water you had boiled earlier to the pot that you have on the stove . you want to add the water slowly , so that it will be slowly cooked into the chana on the stove . after you add the water , put the lid back on the pot on the stove and let it continue to cook .

add in the water that had been set aside little at a time .
add some water into the pan . stir the water into the pan . continue adding small amounts of water and stirring waiting until the water has been cooked in before adding more .

add in the water that had been set aside little at a time .
take a pot and place it on stove . cook the ingredients in the pot . take the water in a bowl that is set aside . add the water in to the cooking pot little at a time . mix the water with the other contents in the pot .

separate the water and the chanas do not discard the water .
place the chanas in a bowl . save the water for later .

separate the water and the chanas do not discard the water .
use a strainer to remove the chana ( chickpeas ) from the liquid . do not throw away the liquid .

separate the water and the chanas do not discard the water .
use a strainer spoon to scoop out the chana . lightly shake the spoon so that any remaining liquid drains out . pour the chana into an empty bowl . save the liquid that the chana cooked in for later .

add in the chana masala chaat masala red chili powder dry mango powder and anardana powder .
gather together all the dry spices . sprinkle the chana masala powder , the red chili powder , the chaat masala powder , dry mango powder , and anardana powder into the cooking pot . stir everything together with a heatproof spatula . anardana powder is made out of pomegranates .

add in the chana masala chaat masala red chili powder dry mango powder and anardana powder .
now we want to add in our dry spices . first pour in some chana masala powder and a little bit if chaat masala . then we will put in some red chili powder and some dry mango powder . last we will put in anardana powder and being mixing them all with our spatula .

add in the chana masala chaat masala red chili powder dry mango powder and anardana powder .
add the chana masala into the pan . add the chaat masala into the pan . add the red chili powder into it . add dry mango powder and the anardana powder into it . add all the masalas and mix together .

add in the chanas / chole and mix again .
stir the pan with a spatula . add chanas / chole mix into the pan . with the spatula mix the ingredients together .

add in the chanas / chole and mix again .
add the chole to the pot that has sauce in it . get a large cooking spoon . mix in slowly and thoroughly the chole into the pot with the sauce . then pour in the boiled water to the mix of sauce and chole together .. .

add in the chanas / chole and mix again .
add the chanas / chole to the contents of the hot pan . using a spatula stir and mix all ingredients together .

close pressure cooker and allow it to whistle twice and then lower heat to cook for another 20 min .
close the lid of the pressure cooker . wait for the cooker to whistle at you twice . turn the heat down lower and let it cook for 20 minutes .

close pressure cooker and allow it to whistle twice and then lower heat to cook for another 20 min .
close the pressure cooker and make sure it is sealed and not venting . allow it to cook on low heat for 20 minutes .

close pressure cooker and allow it to whistle twice and then lower heat to cook for another 20 min .
close the lid of the pressure cooker . cook it for about 2 whistles . now lower the heat of the stove . cook for another 20 minutes . now open the lid of the pressure cooker .

cook till the tomatoes separate from the oil .
the object is to cook the tomatoes until they separate from the oil . the tomatoes should be cooked on medium high heat . they must be watched carefully and stirred frequently so they do n't burn or splatter .

cook till the tomatoes separate from the oil .
add tomatoes to pan . use medium high heat . stir often . use caution as tomatoes may splatter . cook until oil separates from tomatoes .

cook till the tomatoes separate from the oil .
continue to stir the mixture . keep cooking until the tomatoes and the oil move apart .

soak the chanas in water and then transfer it into the pressure cooker .
you will have been soaking the chanas in water . now , make sure the pressure cooker is on high heat on the stove with the top off . carefully add the chanas to the pressure cooker . be sure to also add the water the chanas has been soaking in . do this carefully and use a spatula if needed .

soak the chanas in water and then transfer it into the pressure cooker .
add the chanas to the water in the pot . pour everything in the pressure cooker .

soak the chanas in water and then transfer it into the pressure cooker .
turn your pressure cooker to high heat . add the water that the chanas soaked in to the pressure cooker . add the chanas to the pressure cooker .

add in cinnamon stick bay leaf black cardamom teabags and salt .
take a pot with water and chick peas in a pot . add a bay leaf and black cardamom in to the pot . add 2 teabags in to the pot . add some salt in to the pot . mix everything in the pot .

add in cinnamon stick bay leaf black cardamom teabags and salt .
this step is simple because you do n't need a knife . put a stick of cinnamon , one bay leaf , one cardamom pod , two teabags directly into the pot . add the amount of salt that the recipe needs .

add in cinnamon stick bay leaf black cardamom teabags and salt .
get a pot with water . add a cinnamon stick . add a bay leaf . add black cardamon . add salt .

once hot add in the asafoetida and right after that add in the crushed tomatoes .
heat up a pan on high . add in crushed tomatoes . mix well .

once hot add in the asafoetida and right after that add in the crushed tomatoes .
take your tomatoes and carefully poor them into the pan . now mix it around with your spatula or spoon . careful the pan is hot .

once hot add in the asafoetida and right after that add in the crushed tomatoes .
add the asafoetida to your oil in a large pot . now quickly add in the tomatoes to your pot . mix it all together using a large spatula .

once done allow the pressure to go down and then open .
now , once the dish is finished cooking , the pot will still be hot . the pressure of the pressure cooker needs to go all the way down before you can open it . wait until all the pressure has gone down . get a pot holder and carefully twist the top loose . once the top is loose , gently lift the lid of the pressure cooker .

once done allow the pressure to go down and then open .
one you see the pressure go down , you can open up the pan . now that the pressure is gone , we will remove the tea bags . just use a spoon and set them to the side .

once done allow the pressure to go down and then open .
take a spoon and press them against the pan . take them out of the pan and into a bowl .

in a pan heat oil on medium heat .
put a deep pan onto the stove . add your oil to the pan . turn the burner on to a medium setting . allow 2 - 3 minutes for the oil to warm up .

in a pan heat oil on medium heat .
take a pan on the stove . take about two tablespoons of oil . add some oil in to the pan . turn on the stove to medium heat . heat the oil in the pan .

in a pan heat oil on medium heat .
put a pan on the stove on medium . then take a small cup of oil . pour the small cup of oil into the pan wait until the oil is hot .

cut the pork into slices .
place pork on the cutting board . grip the pork with one hand to steady it . cut thick slices with the other hand until the entire piece is done .

cut the pork into slices .
get out a cutting board and place the pork on top . hold the pork still with one hand before you begin to cut . using a sharp knife , cut into slices as wide as your thumb , cutting from the top , down into the meat . be very careful to watch your other hand so you do n't cut your fingers .

cut the pork into slices .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the pork on the cutting board . cut the pork in to thick slices . repeat the same till the entire pork was cut . take all the slices on the board .

cover the pork in plastic wrap and pound .
take your slab of pork and cover it in plastic wrap . this will decrease the mess when you pound the meat with your meat mallet . carefully , but strongly pound the meat with the mallet until the meat is flat . now remove the plastic wrap and dispose of it .

cover the pork in plastic wrap and pound .
cover the pork with plastic to protect the area . pound the pork with the hammer . remove the plastic .

cover the pork in plastic wrap and pound .
the port needs to be flattened . to avoid making a mess place the pork on a cutting board . then place a piece of plastic over the pork . now hit the fork with a meat tenderizer ( which is a hammer for food ) . use a medium amount of force when hitting the meat .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top of the meat .
use the herb grinder to grind pepper onto the meat . use a separate salt grinder to grind sea salt onto the meat . mash the pepper and salt in to the meat with your clean , gloved hand .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top of the meat .
sprinkle pepper on the meat . sprinkle salt on the meat . pat down the meat .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top of the meat .
grind pepper onto the meat , do this by twisting the pepper shaker for about 5 seconds . sprinkle some salt onto the meat as well either by shaking the salt shaker or twisting it if its the larger type of salt grains . wear a plastic cooking glove and push the salt and pepper into the meat with a flat hand for a few seconds . this helps the meat absorb these ingredients while it cooks .

melt butter in the pan .
scoop butter into the pan with a knife . the butter will melt as it gets hot .

melt butter in the pan .
put pan on stove and turn on the heat . add butter to the hot pan and melt the butter .

melt butter in the pan .
find a pan . turn on the heat to low . find the butter . put a small amount of butter in the pan . watch the butter melt .

mix eggs milk salt and pepper together .
slowly pour in the milk salt and pepper . use a fork to mix it around moving it back and forth fast but carefully not to spill it and splash .

mix eggs milk salt and pepper together .
take a medium sized bowl . break open some eggs and add it in to the bowl . beat the eggs properly with the spoon . add some salt it in to the bowl . add little pepper powder in to the bowl .

mix eggs milk salt and pepper together .
pour 2 tablespoons of milk to the bowl . stir the milk in with a fork . add a little salt . add a little pepper .

dip the pork in the egg mixture and the bread crumbs .
use tongs to pick up the meat . place the meat in the egg mix and move it around with the tongs . pick the meat up and let it drip all the liquid off . put the meat in the breadcrumb mix and cover it with breadcrumbs .

dip the pork in the egg mixture and the bread crumbs .
take your pork chops with your tongs . dip them into the egg mixture . with your tongs turn them over to make sure they are covered . with your tongs take them out and dip them into the bread mixture . take your tongs and flip your pork chops .

dip the pork in the egg mixture and the bread crumbs .
dip the pork into the liquid using tongs until covered . lift the pork up with the tongs and let the excess liquid drain off . move pork to the bread crumbs and coat both sides of pork .

fry the pork in the pan .
carefully put the pork in the pan with tongs . the meat will bubble and sizzle as it is cooking be careful for splatter .

fry the pork in the pan .
melt plenty of butter in a frying pan on top of the stove . once the butter is hot , add the pork to the pan . fry until the bread crumbs on the top start to look a little wet , then turn the meat to the other side . fry both sides until they are golden brown .

fry the pork in the pan .
pour some oil into a pan and let it heat up . drop in the pork slowly into the pan . top it off with some butter and let it get hot . when the bread crumbs look see through turn over the pork .

heat butter in a pan and cook bacon in it .
take your butter , and add it into your hot pan . this will make the butter start to melt instantly , just mix it around in the pan with your spatula . now gently place your bacon strips into the pan and let them begin to cook . continue cooking them until they have that perfect sizzling golden color .

heat butter in a pan and cook bacon in it .
heat up the butter in the pan it will bubble up . slowly pour the bacon into the pan . use a spatula to mix it around .

heat butter in a pan and cook bacon in it .
switch on the stove . heat the butter till it melts . put some butter into it . add bacon into the pan . cook until the bacon is done .

add chili flakes .
add a sprinkle of chili flake to the pan . stir to incorporate .

add chili flakes .
find the chili flakes . the chili flakes are dry . pinch your fingers together and pick up a small amount in between your fingers . without touching the pan , sprinkle the flakes over the dish . stir the dry chili flakes into the dish .

add chili flakes .
if you enjoy a little bit of spice and heat in your food , we can now add some chili flakes . take the dried chili flakes and slowly sprinkle a pinch of them into the pan and mix them in . remember , the chili flakes are optional and up to what you like .

pour in vodka .
pour vodka into the pan . make sure the pan is nice and hot so that the alcohol will cook out .

pour in vodka .
open the bottle of vodka ( kids , have a parent do this part ) . carefully pour enough vodka so that it is bubbling ans sizzling in the pan .

pour in vodka .
take the cap off the bottle of vodka . pour in a little of the vodka . careful : steam will come up from the pan .

add tomato puree to the pan .
add 3 - 4 tablespoons of tomato puree in the pan . stir .

add tomato puree to the pan .
add 3 or 4 tablespoons of tomato puree to the pan . stir the tomato puree and mix it in with the rest of the pan .

add tomato puree to the pan .
find the can of tomato puree . use a can opener to open the can of tomato puree . use a spatula to get the tomato puree out of the can . stir in the tomato puree . continue stirring until even .

pour in heavy cream .
cook the ingredients in a pan . then add the heavy cream to the ingredients in the pan . mix the cream with the ingredients .

pour in heavy cream .
take your measure amount of heavy cream and pour it into the pan . mix the cream in with the rest of the sauce using a wooden spoon or spatula . then you want to heat the pan until tiny bubbles form in the sauce . this is called a simmer .

pour in heavy cream .
hold the cup with the cream over the pan . slowly pour the heavy cream into the pan being careful not to splash it .

grate some parmesan cheese and chop some parsley .
find a cheese grater . by rubbing the cheese against the grater , grind up about 1 cup of parmesan cheese . take a full handful of parsley and rip off the leafy tops to separate it from the stems . roll the parsley up into a ball and cut it up with a knife .

grate some parmesan cheese and chop some parsley .
hold the grater against the board . rub the parmesan cheese over the openings of the grater to shave it into pieces . cut some parsley into small pieces .

grate some parmesan cheese and chop some parsley .
take your cheese grater and make your cheese block into small pieces of cheese . take a handful of parsley . rip the top off . carefully cut the parsley up .

add boiled pasta cheese and parsley to the pan .
add the boiled pasta to the pan . mix in the pasta into the pan . add the cheese to the pan . put the parsley on top of the cheese .

add boiled pasta cheese and parsley to the pan .
add the noodles into the pan . add the cheese and parsley into the pan . stir the pan .

add boiled pasta cheese and parsley to the pan .
take the strained pasta and put it into the sauce in the skillet and mix it around with a spoon so that the pasta is covered in sauce . sprinkle some parmesan cheese and some parsley into the skillet .

boil a large pot of water and cook macaroni in the water .
fill a large pot with water . place the pot on the stove on high heat . when water bubbles , add the macaroni . turn off the stove and remove the pot when the macaroni is soft .

boil a large pot of water and cook macaroni in the water .
fill large pot almost to the top with water . turn on the burner on the stove to high heat .. . when water is boiling , add some sprinkles of salt . add the macaroni and cook for 10 mins . stir with a spoon every 2 minutes . remove the pot of macaroni and drain it into a bowl that has a lot of holes in it . this is called a colander . cut off the stove .

boil a large pot of water and cook macaroni in the water .
put water in a large pot and put it on the stove . turn it on ( have an adult help if you need them to ) and let the water boil - when it starts bubbling it 's perfect ! put a little salt in the water and add the macaroni noodles . it 's cooked when it 's turning soft . take the pot ( have an adult help if it 's too heavy ) and pour it into a colander ( a big bowl with holes in ) to get rid of the water .

pour macaroni on the baking dish and add butter and salt to macaroni .
use a spoon to help take the macaroni out of strainer and into a baking pan . add 1 to 2 tablespoons of butter and a little bit of salt .

pour macaroni on the baking dish and add butter and salt to macaroni .
pour the macaroni from the strainer to the backing dish . while the pasta is still warm add one to two tablespoons of butter and a little salt to season . mix well .

pour macaroni on the baking dish and add butter and salt to macaroni .
drain the macaroni noodles . pour macaroni into baking dish next . then add 1 to 2 tablespoons of butter to the pan . then add some salt to pan . mix ingredients together .

add evaporated milk water and cheese .
open the can of evaporated milk and pour into the pot . fill the can with water and add the water to the pot . add 10 oz . of velveeta type cheese to the pot . turn the heat on medium . use a spoon to break up the cheese and stir every now and then as cheese melts .

add evaporated milk water and cheese .
put the pot on the stove . do n't turn on the heat yet . slowly pour the can of evaporated milk in the pot . fill the empty evaporated milk can with water and slowly pour the water in the pot . add 10 ounces of velveeta type of cheese . turn the heat on the stove to medium and stir the mixture in the pot . break the cheese into pieces with your spoon so the cheese will melt faster . be careful not to touch the hot pot , stove , or mixture in the pot . use a long spoon to stir the cheese mixture .

add evaporated milk water and cheese .
take a large pot on a stove . take a small can of evaporated milk . add the evaporated milk in to the pot . take a big block of cheese and add it to the evaporated milk . mix the cheese till it melts away .

add shredded cheese .
after the cheese is melted and blended , pour in two cups of shredded colby jack cheese . use your wooden spoon to carefully stir .

add shredded cheese .
take the bowl of colby jack shredded cheese . use a spoon to slowly pour 2 cups of the cheese into the pot .

add shredded cheese .
add the cheese to pot . then add 2 cups of colby jack cheese . mix until melted .

mix in an egg sauce and beer .
carefully crack one egg over top of the macaroni . be sure not to get any of the eggshell in your macaroni . discard egg shell . with a spoon , mix egg and all of macaroni together . pour cheese sauce over top macaroni , and mix in evenly . water can be added if you would like a creamier sauce .

mix in an egg sauce and beer .
cool the macaroni . add one egg , making sure you do n't get any broken egg shell in the macaroni , that can be a crunchy and weird surprise . mix the egg gently in the macaroni until it is fully mixed . the next step is to carefully pour in the cheese sauce . make sure to use oven mitts or pot holders when handling the pot of cheese sauce . it may still be hot . mix the cheese sauce all the way through the macaroni . add water if you want a creamier sauce . just add little amounts at a time , maybe a tablespoon or so until you get the creaminess you want .

mix in an egg sauce and beer .
let the noodles cool . blend in an egg and add the cheese sauce . mix well . if you need to add in a little more water .

cover the top of macaroni with cheese .
stir the macaroni with a big spoon . put 2 cups of shredded cheese on top of the macaroni .

cover the top of macaroni with cheese .
pick up the measuring cup containing the cheese . using the fork to help , pour the cheese over the macaroni , moving the cup back and forth so the cheese does n't fall in just one place but covers the whole casserole . use the fork to take out any cheese sticking to the sides of the cup .

cover the top of macaroni with cheese .
once you are done mixing the macaroni sprinkle the rest of your shredded cheese over the top of the entire dish . try and sprinkle it evenly so it 's equally cheesy all over .

bake the dish in the oven .
turn on the oven , so the dial is set to 350 . wait for the oven to beep that it 's ready . place your tray in the oven and wait for 15- 20 minutes . 3 . place your pan in the oven and wait 30 minutes . now you can turn off the oven and remove the pan .

bake the dish in the oven .
set the oven 's bake dial to 350 . smooth the macaroni and cheese topping so that it 's level . cover the pan completely with a sheet of foil . when the oven beeps , put the pan into the oven . after at least 15 mins , remove the pan if the cheese topping is bubbling .

bake the dish in the oven .
cover the pan with foil . preheat the oven to 350 degrees and make sure the oven dings before putting the pan in . once the oven is preheated and reaches temperature place the pan inside the oven . cook the pan for 15 to 20 minutes . after 15 minutes check the pan . if the sauce is bubbling then it is ready . the sauce should be thick and creamy . the cheese should be just melted . turn off the oven afterward .

cut tofu into square pieces .
use a knife to carefully cut the tofu into square pieces . try to keep all of the pieces the same size .

cut tofu into square pieces .
take a big block of tofu . take a cutting board and a knife . cut the big block of tofu in to two halves . cut the each half in to long rectangle blocks . cut each rectangle block in to an inch shaped blocks .

cut tofu into square pieces .
place tofu on a cutting board so that one of the two largest sides is facing up . using a knife , cut the tofu in half . flip the tofu over , so that one of the two second largest sides is facing up . using a knife , cut the tofu in half again . flip the tofu over , so that one of the two largest sides is facing up , and make three cuts , equally spaced apart .

put cornstarch in a small bowl and mix with water .
get a small bowel . get corn starch . put one tablespoon corn starch in small bowl . add 3 tablespoon water to small bowl with corn starch in it . gently stir mixture together .

put cornstarch in a small bowl and mix with water .
add a tablespoon of corn starch in a bowl . add three tablespoons of water .

put cornstarch in a small bowl and mix with water .
get a small bowl . get a table spoon . get a cup of water . put one table spoon of cornstarch in small bowl . add three table spoons of water to cornstarch and stir .

empty a sachet of mapo tofu paste into a bowl .
take a small bowl with paste . take a packet of mapo tofu . open the packet of mapo tofu . add the mapo tofu in to the bowl . empty the full packet of mapo tofu in to the bowl .

empty a sachet of mapo tofu paste into a bowl .
get a packet of mapo tofu paste , usually available at asian supermarkets . use a pair of scissors to cut open the packet on one side . squeeze the contents of the packet into a small bowl .

empty a sachet of mapo tofu paste into a bowl .
take your paste package . from top to bottom squeeze the package into a bowl .

stir fry ground pork and the paste .
heat up the wok and put some oil . wait a few seconds for the oil to heat up . put the ground pork in the wok . move the pork around the work with a wooden spoon for two minutes . add the paste from a bowl into the wok by pushing the paste out of the bowl with the wooden spoon . stir the paste into the cooked pork with the wooden spoon .

stir fry ground pork and the paste .
heat up the wok and fry up the ground pork in the cooking oil till it is no longer pink . ( medium heat ) . add the mapo tofu paste and stir fry for about two minutes .

stir fry ground pork and the paste .
place wok on the stove and heat . add oil inside of the wok . add ground pork in heated oil , stir and cook until no longer pink . add the mapo tofu paste to the wok and cook for about 2 minutes .

add water tofu cubes sprinkle and salt and cover .
add 1 cup of water to the pan . next add tofu pieces . stir tofu into sauce . next sprinkle with salt . cover and cook for 5 minutes .

add water tofu cubes sprinkle and salt and cover .
add one cup of water into a pan , then ad the cubes of tofu to the pan as well . sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt over the tofu . cover the pan with a large lid and let it all cook about 5 to 6 minutes .

add water tofu cubes sprinkle and salt and cover .
pour one cup of water into a pan on medium heat on burner . gently pour tofu cubes into the water . sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt into the hot water . cover the pan with a lid . cook in the pan for 5 minutes .

add cornstarch and stir gently .
get the cornstarch and place it in a small bowl . slowly pour the cornstarch into the pan . use a wooden spoon or a spatula and gently stir the mixture .

add cornstarch and stir gently .
pour cornstarch mixture evenly in pan . stir gently .

add cornstarch and stir gently .
remove the lid from the pan . add cornstarch into the pan . gently stir with a wooden spoon . the dish is now ready to serve .

soak and rinse the short ribs .
take a medium sized bowl . add some water in to the bowl . place the ribs in the water . soak the ribs in the water . place them in water for one hour to remove the blood .

soak and rinse the short ribs .
soak the short ribs in water for one hour . soaking the ribs in water with drain out the blood . after and hour , the water will appear red . take the ribs out of the water . rinse the ribs in a clean bowl of water and separate any bones with your hands .

soak and rinse the short ribs .
use tongs and place the short ribs into water . soak the ribs for 1 hour . after 1 hour remove the ribs from the water . rinse the ribs in fresh water .

peel and grind an onion and add mix with the marinade .
peel an onion . grind the onion with a food chopper . add the onions in with the marinade . mix it well .

peel and grind an onion and add mix with the marinade .
use a knife to cut the ends of the onion . peel the skin off the outside of the onion . put the onion into a mixer and grind it up . add the onion to the ingredient and use a whisk to mix them together .

peel and grind an onion and add mix with the marinade .
peel the skin off the onion . grind up the onion in the machine . put the blended mix in the marinade .

cut the ribs into pieces .
remove the ribs from the pan . using a knife , cut the ribs into small pieces .

cut the ribs into pieces .
use tongs to take out the ribs and put them one a plate . hold the ribs with the tongs and take scissors to cut them up into pieces .

cut the ribs into pieces .
use the tongs to remove the ribs from the pan . use a knife to carefully cut the ribs into smaller pieces .

mix soy sauce sugar ground pepper sesame oil .
hold the soy sauce sugar ground pepper and sesame oil bowls over the big bowl . carefully pour them into the big bowl . use a whisk to stir everything together .

mix soy sauce sugar ground pepper sesame oil .
add 1/3 cup of soy sauce . pour in 1/3 cup of sugar . add 1 teaspoon of ground pepper . add 3 tablespoons of sesame oil . use a whisk to mix everything together .

mix soy sauce sugar ground pepper sesame oil .
put soy sauce in a bowl . put sugar in a bowl . put ground pepper in a bowl . put sesame oil in a bowl . mix ingredients together with a whisk .

cook the short ribs .
set the rib on the frying pan . cook on low heat for 5 minutes . use a spatula to turn over the ribs . cook the other side for 4 minutes .

cook the short ribs .
on a heated pan put your ribs in it and cook on low heat for 5 minutes . then flip over the ribs in the pan and cook on low heat still for 5 minutes . take out the cooked ribs and put in the remaining ribs and cook them same .

cook the short ribs .
heat up a large frying pan on low heat . with a pair of tongs , take the marinated short ribs and lay about three to four in the pan side by side . they should not overlap . cook the ribs for about 5 minutes and then flip them over and cook for about 4 more minutes . when the ribs are fully cooked , use tongs and take each piece out and place on a plate to rest . repeat the cooking process for the ribs for any that are left .

marinate the ribs .
put gloves on your hands . put the short ribs in the bowl to marinate . use your hands to rub the marinade into the ribs .

marinate the ribs .
grab the ribs with your hands with gloves on . put the meat in the sauce . squish everything together to marinate or cover with sauce .

marinate the ribs .
mix your marinade using a spoon in a large enough bowl to fit all the ribs . place the short ribs inside the marinade bowl . you can wear gloves so you can massage the ribs with the marinade making sure each piece is thoroughly covered in the marinade .

cover the bowl with saran wrap .
cover the bowl of ribs with saran wrap . let the bowl sit for 3 hours to marinate .

cover the bowl with saran wrap .
tear off a piece of plastic wrap . cover the bowl with the wrap to cover the top .

cover the bowl with saran wrap .
place the meat in the liquid inside the glass bowl . pull a strip of clear plastic wrap a couple of feet long . cut the plastic wrap , using the serrated edge of the box . place the plastic over the bowl opening . smooth the extra wrap onto the outside of the bowl .

put the dish in the oven .
make sure the oven is set to the right temperature . put on oven mitts . open the oven door . carefully place the baking sheet in the oven without touching the inside of the oven . close the oven door .

put the dish in the oven .
put the dish on a cookie sheet . place the cookie sheet in the oven . leave in the oven for 15 - 18 minutes at 350 degrees . remove sheet from oven .

put the dish in the oven .
put the dishes on a baking sheet or cookie sheet . carefully place the sheet in the oven without touching the edges of the oven which are very hot .

mix butter pressed garlic chives salt pepper and cooking sherry .
make sure to wash your hands first as you will be using your fingers and you do n't want to spread any germs . you will be using softened butter , garlic , chives , salt , white pepper , and a garlic press . white pepper is stronger than black pepper , so measure this out carefully . white pepper will not show up as much either . use a fork to mesh up the butter in the medium size bowl before adding any additional ingredients , until it is mushy . place the softened butter in the bowl , and mash the three garlic cloves in your garlic press , one clove at a time . you will place a clove of garlic that has been peeled in the press , squeeze , and then using your fork , scrap off the garlic paste that oozes out of the device . you are really getting the juice out of the clove , which is different than if you chopped it . mix in the chives , about one to one and a half tablespoons of chopped chives . add a small amount of salt . using your fork , continue to mix and press all the ingredients until smooth and well mixed . next , you will need to slowly add cooking sherry , an inexpensive sherry from the grocery store is sufficient to give a good flavor . start with a small amount , about 1 tablespoon , and only add if more sherry s need . this will be used for the twelve mussels , but could be used on top of chicken , fish , and steak to make a tasty dish and marry the flavors .

mix butter pressed garlic chives salt pepper and cooking sherry .
now we want to take our fork and mix up the dish . now take your garlic press and smash 2 - 3 cloves of garlic so that the juice goes into the bowl . throw all of the skins to the sides as we do not need them . now put a tablespoon or so of chives into the bowl and add a little salt . white pepper also goes well . now take your cooking sherry and slowly add it in .

mix butter pressed garlic chives salt pepper and cooking sherry .
take a mixing bowl add some butter in to the bowl . add pressed garlic in to the bowl . add cut pieces of chives in to the bowl . add little salt and pepper in to the bowl . add cooking sherry in to the bowl and mix everything .

spread butter on top of escargot .
scoop the butter out of the pan with a fork . spread the butter out on top of the escargot . pre - heat the over to 350 degrees .

spread butter on top of escargot .
take the rest of the butter and place on top of each escargot . the oven should already be preheated to 350 degrees .

spread butter on top of escargot .
use a fork and scoop up some butter . use the fork to spread butter over the escargot .

pat escargot dry and place on mat .
clean the escargot with water . pat the escargot . dry the escargot and place on mat .

pat escargot dry and place on mat .
use a strainer in the sink and rinse the escargot . after rinsing six of them place them on a dry paper towel and pat them dry .

pat escargot dry and place on mat .
now we want to take the escargot and place them onto the mat . you will want about 6 per person at the dinner . just gently place them onto your mat so they can dry from washing .

put butter mix into baking dish .
use your fork to put a little dollop the size of a quarter . carefully add the mixture using your fork and finger to the bottom of each one of the container . make sure it goes all the way to the bottom .

put butter mix into baking dish .
use a fork and your fingers to put some of the butter into the pan . make sure you put butter into each hole in the pan .

put butter mix into baking dish .
spoon small amounts of butter mixture into each cavity of a stoneware dish . sooth to form a bed for the escargot .

rinse off escargot under cool water .
use a can opener to open the can of escargot . place a strainer the sink and pour the can of escargot into the strainer . rinse the escargot under cool water .

rinse off escargot under cool water .
get a colander or a bowl . dump the escargot into the colander or bowl . run water over the escargot . swish around the escargot and make sure they are clean . check for any bits that you might want to pull off .

rinse off escargot under cool water .
put the escargot in a strainer in the sink . rinse everything in the sink .

put escargot onto each drop of butter .
you will be using two escargot dishes . these have a handle on each side , with a rim so that the butter will stay inside the pan . there is a center hole , and five other holes . you will have a scoop of butter ( mix ) in each of the holes in the pan , and the escargot ready in a dish . using your fingers , put an escargot in each of the holes on top of the butter . the nice thing about these dishes is that there is room when the butter melts , to cover the escargot . you should have twelve holes with butter , and twelve escargots , or snails for those of you wondering exactly what type of animal is an escargot .

put escargot onto each drop of butter .
we ' ve put the drops of butter into little tiny individual molds . set one escargot onto each single butter mold spot .

put escargot onto each drop of butter .
using a spoon put escargot onto each drop of butter . making sure they are on right use your hand and press them into the butter .

add water juniper berries and the bay leaf to the pot .
add half a cup of water to the pot . add the juniper berries and the bay leaf with a spoon . mix with a spoon .

add water juniper berries and the bay leaf to the pot .
add 1/4 to 1/2 cup more water to the pan . add a small handful of juniper berries to the pan . sprinkle a pinch of salt into the pan . set a bay leaf on top of the ingredients and then use a wooden spoon to mix it all up gently . turn the stove down on low and put the lid on the pan .

add water juniper berries and the bay leaf to the pot .
add a half cup of water to the pot . add the juniper berries to the pot . take a pinch of salt and put it in the pot . take one bay leave and put it in the pot . take a wooden spoon and stir the ingredients in the pot .

add olive oil and onions to the pot .
put a pan on the stove over medium to high heat . coat the bottom of the pan with a thin layer of olive oil . once the pan is hot carefully put the onions in . stir the onions with wooden cooking spoon so they will not stick to the pan and will cook evenly .

add olive oil and onions to the pot .
turn the heat of the stove to medium . pour some olive oil in the pot . add onions to the pot .

add olive oil and onions to the pot .
with a pot on the stove , turn on the stove to medium to high heat . add olive oil to the pot and let it heat up . add the onion to the pot and mix with a spoon to coat in the oil .

add the apple and garlic to the pot .
take a pan on the stove . cut the apple in to small pieces . cut the garlic i to small pieces . add the garlic in to the pan . add the apple in to the pan .

add the apple and garlic to the pot .
hold the apple over the pot . scoop the apple in with a spatula . scoop the garlic in the pot with a spatula .

add the apple and garlic to the pot .
add the chopped apple into the frying pan . pour in the minced garlic . use a spoon to stir everything together as it cooks .

cook the bratwursts on the skillet .
take a skillet on the stove . add some butter on the skillet . place the bratwursts on the skillets . cook on one side and flip to the other side . cook on the other side of the bratwursts .

cook the bratwursts on the skillet .
add butter to a skillet until it is melted . using tongs , add the bratwurst to the skillet . leave them on one side until it is brown . flip the bratwurst with the tongs , and brown the other side . make sure the bratwurst is not pink on the inside .

cook the bratwursts on the skillet .
