fill a large pot with water , add brats to water , turn on stove and allow water to boil . allow the bratwurst to boil for 3 minutes . carefully remove the pot , discard the water and set the bratwursts aside on a paper towel . carefully place a skillet on the stove and turn the stove to a medium - high heat . allow the pan to heat up for a minute , then carefully add the bratwursts to the pan . allow the bratwursts to begin to sizzle in the pan for 2 minutes . you will notice some liquid escaping from the bratwursts . carefully use tongs and flip the bratwursts so the opposite side can cook . you will notice brown marks as you flip them . allow the bratwursts to sizzle for another 3 minutes .

add the sauerkraut to the pot .
put a pot on the stove . turn the stove on . pour a jar of sauerkraut into the pot . turn the stove up . stir sauerkraut with a wooden spoon .

add the sauerkraut to the pot .
add sauerkraut to the pot . use a spoon to stir the sauerkraut in with the onions .

add the sauerkraut to the pot .
cook the onions until they are starting to soften up a little . add the jar of sauerkraut to the pot and mix it until it 's all thoroughly combined !

add butter and olive oil to a skillet .
place butter on the skillet . spread the butter around the skillet evenly . add some olive oil to the skillet .

add butter and olive oil to a skillet .
use a spoon and scoop butter onto the skillet . pour oil on the butter .

add butter and olive oil to a skillet .
put the skillet on medium to high heat . put butter and a little bit of oil into the skillet . tilt the skillet back and forth to coat the bottom .

peel the apple and chop it into pieces .
peel the apple with a knife cutting the skin off . cut up the apple into pieces that are small .

peel the apple and chop it into pieces .
use a knife to cut an apple into two sections . take one half and peel the apple peel off with a knife . chop the rest of the apple into small pieces .

peel the apple and chop it into pieces .
with a knife cut the apple in half . with a knife take off the skin of the apple . with a knife cut the apple into small dice size pieces .

boil the bratwursts in water .
put some cold water into a pot and place of a heated stove top . put the bratwursts into the pot of water . bring the water to a boil .

boil the bratwursts in water .
fill a medium saucepan halfway with cold water . put the pan on the stove . turn the stove on to high heat . the dial for the burner should be at the notch farthest to the right for high heat . do n't wait for the water to boil . as soon as you have turned the stove on , carefully drop your bratwursts into the pot . by boiling them first , we can be sure that the middle is cooked all the way , so we wo n't have to cut them open or guess when we cook them in a frying pan later . once the bratwursts have boiled long enough , use tongs to carefully take them out of the pan . place the bratwursts in a colander so that the excess water drains away .

boil the bratwursts in water .
place the sauce pan on the stove . add water into the sauce pan . add the bratwursts into the water . put it inside until it boils .

cut the pita bread into cubes .
put a piece of pita bread onto a cutting board . with a sharp knife , cut the pita into 4 strips . turn the pita one quarter turn and cut it into 4 strips again . you should wind up with cubes of pita bread .

cut the pita bread into cubes .
cut the pita bread into 4 equal slices . next cut the slices into 4 equal size pieces making them into cubes .

cut the pita bread into cubes .
now we want to take our knife and cut the pita bread into small square . take the knife and cut along in one direction of the bread . now turn the bread and cut the opposite direction across the bread .

toss the salad .
add all vegetables to large bowl . add flatbread to bowl . use two large spoons . mix salad . make sure the bottom cucumbers and tomatoes are mixed from the bottom .

toss the salad .
use to forks to toss the salad . be sure to mix all parts of the salad so everything gets tossed all over .

toss the salad .
with two spoons mix the salad together . make sure everything is mixed together .

add olive oil lemon juice garlic salt and pepper to a small bowl and mix .
measure out 2 teaspoons of olive garden and 2 teaspoons of lemon juice and pour them into small bowl . get some garlic salt seasoning and peeper and add to the small bowl of olive oil and lemon juice . mix the ingredients in the small bowl well .

add olive oil lemon juice garlic salt and pepper to a small bowl and mix .
slowly pour in olive oil lemon juice garlic . use a small spoon to add in salt and pepper . with everything with the spoon .

add olive oil lemon juice garlic salt and pepper to a small bowl and mix .
take a small bowl and add 2 tablespoons of olive oil in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of lemon juice in to the bowl . add some garlic salt in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything properly with a spoon .

add cucumbers tomatoes iceberg lettuce green bell pepper parsley spring onions mint leaves and spring onion whites to a bowl .
using a spoon put 3/4 cup cucumber cubes and 3/4 cup of tomato cubes into bowl once the seeds are removed . next tear 3/4 cup of lettuce with your hands and add to bowl . then add 1/2 cup capsicum cubes and 1/4 chopped parsley to the bowl . also add 1/4 of finely chopped spring onion greens , 1/4 cup mint leaves . also add a 1/4 cup of spring onion whites to the bowl .

add cucumbers tomatoes iceberg lettuce green bell pepper parsley spring onions mint leaves and spring onion whites to a bowl .
get all of the vegetables that you prepared and make sure they are handy . everything is ready except the lettuce which you will just tear into pieces when you add the ingredients . in a large bowl , add each of the vegetables in this order : . add the cucumbers , then the tomatoes , the iceberg lettuce , the bell peppers , the parsley , the lettuce , the bell peppers , the parsley , the spring onion greens , chopped mint leaves and sliced spring onion greens .

add cucumbers tomatoes iceberg lettuce green bell pepper parsley spring onions mint leaves and spring onion whites to a bowl .
cut the cucumber and tomato in to cube size pieces . add the cucumber and tomato in to the bowl . add pieces of iceberg lettuce and cut pieces of bell peppers in to the bowl . add cut pieces of parsley and spring onions in to the bowl . finally add cut pieces of mint leaves in to the bowl and mix them .

add the dressing and bread pieces the salad .
pour the dressing into the salad bowl . then put the pieces of bread to the top of the salad .

add the dressing and bread pieces the salad .
have mixed salad in a glass bowl . put in sliced onions ( small amount . pour in small amt of dressing . add bread pieces . stir with spoon .

add the dressing and bread pieces the salad .
if you have made dressing or have your favorite dressing in a bottle whichever had it to the top of your salad mix in a bowl . then break up pieces of bread , or you can use croutons , or pita bread to the top of you salad mix in bowl . stir your salad mix - lightly .

brush olive oil on both sides of a piece of pita bread and place onto a hot pan .
take a brush and brush olive oil on both sides of a slice of pita bread . place the bread on the pan with your hands .

brush olive oil on both sides of a piece of pita bread and place onto a hot pan .
put the pita bread on a cutting board . brush olive oil on both sides of the pita bread . next place pita on a hot pan and cook until crisp .

brush olive oil on both sides of a piece of pita bread and place onto a hot pan .
get a pastry brush and dip it in some olive oil . lightly brush olive oil on both sides of a piece of pita bread . put the bread on a heated frying pan and fry until a little crisp and golden brown in color .

add some steamed rice and stir everything together .
use a spoon to scoop some rice . put the rice into the pan . use a wooden spoon to stir everything together .

add some steamed rice and stir everything together .
add 1 1/2 cups of steamed rice . use the stirring spoon to mix the rice together with the rest of the pan .

add some steamed rice and stir everything together .
put the cooked rice into the pan . use a wooden spoon to stir the rice into the meat mixture .

melt some meat loaf in a pan and stir to cook them well .
cook the meat in the pan while stirring with a wooden spoon . stir while the meat cooks and wait until the meat is now brown .

melt some meat loaf in a pan and stir to cook them well .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan . place the meat loaf on the pan . melt the meat loaf . mix the melted meat loaf with the spatula .

melt some meat loaf in a pan and stir to cook them well .
put some meat into a pan . cook the ground beef stirring with a wooden spoon . continue cooking until it turns brown .

add 1 chopped onion and green bell pepper .
hold the vegetable plate over the pan . drop in the cut up pieces of onion and green bell pepper .

add 1 chopped onion and green bell pepper .
chop one medium onion and one medium bell pepper into bite - sized pieces . put them into the pan with the meat , while it is still cooking .

add 1 chopped onion and green bell pepper .
add 1 chopped onion into the pan with the meat . put in 1 chopped green bell pepper . use a stirring spoon to mix the pan together evenly .

add a cup of salsa and one can of black beans .
add a cup of salsa to the pan . add black beans to the pan .

add a cup of salsa and one can of black beans .
add 1 cup of salsa to the pan . add 1 can of black beans . use the stirring spoon to mix into the pan .

add a cup of salsa and one can of black beans .
take ground beef and add it to a skillet . then add salsa . apply heat . stir with a wooden spoon . mix until all is cooked and serve .

add the moreno to a piece of taco and spread some cheese and roll it up .
take a taco on a plate . add some moreno on to the taco . spread some cheese on the moreno . roll the taco from one side . fold the sides and roll it to the other side .

add the moreno to a piece of taco and spread some cheese and roll it up .
use a spoon to add the mixture to the middle of the tortilla . add cheese to the top of the mixture . fold the end of the burrito over the meat and cheese . fold up the sides . finish rolling the burrito .

add the moreno to a piece of taco and spread some cheese and roll it up .
use a spoon to scoop up the meat . put the meat on the middle of the burrito . sprinkle cheese on the meat . fold the shell over and roll it up .

add mixed seasoning of black pepper garlic powder salt oregano cumin and chili powder .
add a mix of seasoning the bowl . the mixture should include black pepper and garlic powder . also include salt , oregano and cumin . finally put in 2 tablespoons of chili powder . mix together in the pan .

add mixed seasoning of black pepper garlic powder salt oregano cumin and chili powder .
add mixed seasoning to the pan . using a wooden spoon mix the mixture together .

add mixed seasoning of black pepper garlic powder salt oregano cumin and chili powder .
make sure your mixture is cooking in a frying pan on the stove . with all your spices on one plate , including 3 tablespoons of chili powder , dump it into the frying pan .

tie a lobster tail with string and place in a pot of boiling water .
tie the lobster tail together at each end with two pieces of string . cut the loose ends of the string off using a knife . place the tail into a pot of boiling water .

tie a lobster tail with string and place in a pot of boiling water .
take a large pot on a stove . add water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . take the lobster and tie a thread to the tail . place the lobster in the boiling water .

tie a lobster tail with string and place in a pot of boiling water .
use a string to tie the lobster tail . trim the extra string with your knife . gently place the lobster inside the boiling water . use your tongs to gently move the lobster pieces to make sure they 're covered by the water .

place the lobster into a bowl of ice water .
put water and ice cubes in a large bowl . take cook lobster out of pot . put cook lobster into the bowl of ice and water . doing this will stop the lobster from over cooking .

place the lobster into a bowl of ice water .
put lobster in a pot and boil it . grab a bowl and put some ice cubes in it with some water . place lobster in that ice water . the ice and water combination will cool the lobster meat down so it does n't overcook . then you are done .

place the lobster into a bowl of ice water .
take a big glass bowl . add the required amount of cold water into the bowl . place all the lobster into the cold water .

remove the lobsters from the water and remove the shells .
take the lobster out of the bowl of water and place on a clean kitchen towel . use a knife to cut the string from the lobster . use your hands to remove the shells from the lobster .

remove the lobsters from the water and remove the shells .
remove the lobster from the water , one at a time . crack the cover the lobster with a cloth and press down to crack the shell . gently break the shell open and remove it from the lobster meat . do this for all of the lobster tails .

remove the lobsters from the water and remove the shells .
take the lobster tail out of the water . take the shell off the lobster tail .

place the lobster onto skewers .
push the skewer into the lobster . push it up from the smaller point and into the larger portion of the lobster . hold onto the lobster firmly .

place the lobster onto skewers .
gather as many skewers as you have lobster . gently poke the skewer into lobster about half way through .

place the lobster onto skewers .
get your lobster meat and put it on a cutting board . get the skewers , they are long looking thin sticks , they can be metal or wood . bring the skewers back to where you have the lobster . being very careful , pick up a piece of lobster in one hand and get a skewer in the other . being careful stick the skewer in the middle of the lobster meat set down and continue till all the lobster meat is on skewers .

add milk and egg and corn muffin mix to a bowl and mix .
put milk , egg , and corn muffin mix in a bowl . stir until mixed well .

add milk and egg and corn muffin mix to a bowl and mix .
pour your milk into a bowl and crack an egg into the bowl with the milk . pour the corn muffin mix into the bowl and use a whisk to stir it all together until the batter is mostly smooth .

add milk and egg and corn muffin mix to a bowl and mix .
put the egg and the milk in a bowl together . stir them really well until they 're completely mixed . add the corn muffin mixture and stir that too . keep mixing it until it 's really thick !

coat the lobster in the batter .
dip the lobster in the mix you made . make sure the entire thing is coated as evenly as possible ! do this for each skewer you have .

coat the lobster in the batter .
evenly coat lobster in batter . use spoon if needed to coat lobster .

coat the lobster in the batter .
put the lobster sticks in the bowl of batter . use a spoon to pour batter over each lobster stick until each is covered in batter .

place the lobster skewers in a pot of hot oil .
pick up the lobster by the wooden stick . hold the wooden stick and place lobster in pot of hot oil . turn the lobster until brown on all sides - be careful of hot oil .

place the lobster skewers in a pot of hot oil .
place the lobster skewer into the pot of hot oil . be sure to wear oven mitts to prevent oil from burning your hands . once the batter is golden brown , remove the lobster skewer from the pot .

place the lobster skewers in a pot of hot oil .
after dipping lobster in batter carefully put the lobster sticks in the oil . carefully spin the stick around so it cooks evenly . cook them until they turn brown . carefully take them out of the oil and give it a little shake . place them on a paper towel to cool off .

place the lobster on a towel to dry off .
place the lobster on to a paper town layered on a plate . the paper towel will help get off any extra oil .

place the lobster on a towel to dry off .
put down a towel on the counter top . put the lobster onto the towel . wait about ten minutes so the lobster cools down . open fridge and pull out your honey mustard dressing . serve with honey mustard dressing !

place the lobster on a towel to dry off .
place on paper towel so excess oil will soak onto towel . place on plate with honey mustard for dipping .

plate the lobster corndogs with honey mustard .
get a plate for your lobster corndogs . put a tablespoon of honey mustard sauce on one side of the plate . put 3 lobster corndogs on the plate beside the sauce .

plate the lobster corndogs with honey mustard .
with a spoon , spread a tablespoon of honey mustard on a plate . place the lobster corn dogs on the honey mustard with the sticks facing away from the honey mustard and the dogs laying in the mustard together as a group .

plate the lobster corndogs with honey mustard .
on a place . smear some honey mustard . then place the lobster corn dogs on top of the honey mustard .

season with parmesan cheese and pepper to serve .
grate some parmesan cheese on top of the salad . grind some freshly cracked black pepper on the salad .

season with parmesan cheese and pepper to serve .
add some grated parmesan cheese to the top of the salad . put some pepper on the top . prepare to serve .

season with parmesan cheese and pepper to serve .
use a fine cheese grater to grate some parmesan cheese . make sure the cheese is sprinkled evenly and lightly . now use a pepper mill to crack some black pepper .

chop bread to cubes add olive oil minced garlic salt and pepper and bake for 15 minutes .
take the bread in to thin slices . cut the bread in to cube shaped pieces . add the bread pieces in to the bowl . add some olive oil in to the bowl . add some garlic salt and pepper in to the pan and bake .

chop bread to cubes add olive oil minced garlic salt and pepper and bake for 15 minutes .
chop up bread into cubes with a knife . add olive oil . add minced garlic . add salt and pepper . put in the oven for 15 minutes to bake .

chop bread to cubes add olive oil minced garlic salt and pepper and bake for 15 minutes .
use a knife and carefully cut straight rows out of the bread . now turn the knife and cut the other way to make cubes . add olive oil minced garlic salt and pepper . turn the oven to 375 and bake for 15 minutes .

chop some lettuce put with the crouton chopped chicken breast and pine nuts .
cut off and rinse some romaine lettuce leaves , and put them right on the plate without chopping them . sprinkle some croutons on top of the lettuce and then spoon some dressing over the top . use two wooden spoons to mix it all up and make sure every part is evenly coated with the dressing . put a portion of the salad onto each plate and then top with the sliced , cooked chicken . sprinkle some pine nuts over the top .

chop some lettuce put with the crouton chopped chicken breast and pine nuts .
put the lettuce leaves on a plate . sprinkle the croutons over the lettuce leaves . pour dressing over leaves . stir with a spoon . put chicken breasts and pine nuts on lettuce leaves .

chop some lettuce put with the crouton chopped chicken breast and pine nuts .
set the lettuce leaves on a plate . add croutons onto the leaves . add the chopped chicken breasts to the salad . put pine nuts on top of everything .

add lemon zest and lemon juice in mayonnaise and whisk .
rub the lemon skin on the silver bumpy zester tool . cut the lemon in half . hold a strainer over the bowl . squeeze the lemon into the strainer . mix the items in the bowl with a fork .

add lemon zest and lemon juice in mayonnaise and whisk .
take a lemon . take a small bowl . grate the lemon along with the peel in to the bowl . squeeze half lemon juice in to the bowl . mix the lemon juice and lemon zest in the bowl .

add lemon zest and lemon juice in mayonnaise and whisk .
put the lemon the lemon zester . squeeze the lemon into a strainer . whisk the lemon zest with a fork . add the anchovies .

add boneless chicken breast marinate and put it in the fridge .
place your marinade in a glass casserole dish . using metal tongs add your boneless chicken breast to the dish . make sure to turn the chicken around in the dish until all sides are covered in the marinade . rip off a piece of aluminum foil large enough to cover your casserole dish . rip off a piece of aluminum foil large enough to cover your casserole dish . rip off a piece of aluminum foil large enough to cover your casserole dish . rip off a piece of aluminum foil large enough to cover your casserole dish . cover the dish making sure to secure around the sides and place the covered dish in the refrigerator .

add boneless chicken breast marinate and put it in the fridge .
put the boneless chicken breast into the pan . cover the chicken in the marinate . cover the pan with foil . put into the refrigerator .

add boneless chicken breast marinate and put it in the fridge .
use tongs to grab the chicken . place the chicken in the pan . move the chicken around to get marinade on it .

add anchovy paste worcestershire sauce olive oil and parmesan cheese and whisk it .
place the small mixing bowl , a small grater and a whisk on the counter . squeeze some anchovy paste into the bowl . pour some worcestershire sauce and olive oil into the bowl . whisk the ingredients in the bowl until they are mixed together . with the grater , grate about 1/2 a cup of parmesan cheese over the bowl .

add anchovy paste worcestershire sauce olive oil and parmesan cheese and whisk it .
pour in anchovy paste into the bowl . add worcestershire sauce . add olive oil to the bowl . whisk together the ingredients . add parmesan cheese to the bowl and whisk .

add anchovy paste worcestershire sauce olive oil and parmesan cheese and whisk it .
add anchovy paste into the mixture . add some amount of worcestershire sauce into it . add olive oil also into the bowl . grate some parmesan cheese and add into the mix . mix all the elements or components and mix together .

grill the chicken on both sides and let it rest on a plate .
take chicken and add seasonings to them . allow to marinate . then place on a grill . heat and cook on both sides . repeat until all chicken is cooked .

grill the chicken on both sides and let it rest on a plate .
use prongs to move the chicken to the grill . flip to all sides and make sure it is cooked on all sides . move aside and let it rest for about five minutes to allow it to keep its juices .

grill the chicken on both sides and let it rest on a plate .
use tongs to put the chicken on the grill . turn over the chicken after the first side is grilled . grill the second side . when complete , take off the grill and let it cool for 5 minutes .

mix olive garlic lemon zest italian seasoning and salt and pepper .
pour the olive oil into the bottom of small glass baking dish . add garlic , lemon zest , italian seasoning , salt and pepper to the baking dish . stir these ingredients very well with a table fork .

mix olive garlic lemon zest italian seasoning and salt and pepper .
cover the bottom of a glass pan with olive oil . add a little crushed garlic . take a lemon and grate a little of the lemon skin to create lemon zest and add to glass pan . add a few sprinkles of italian seasoning and salt and pepper .

mix olive garlic lemon zest italian seasoning and salt and pepper .
pour olive oil into the bottom of the pan . add minced garlic . add some lemon zest . put in italian seasoning , salt and pepper . mix the ingredients together with a stirring spoon .

add soy sauce sesame oil and brown sugar to the mushrooms and stir .
while the mushrooms are still cooking in the pan , add the other ingredients . you will need low sodium soy sauce , a small amount of sesame oil and a pinch or dark brown sugar . cook and stir until all the ingredients have become soft . place the mixture on paper towels to drain and keep them in a warm place .

add soy sauce sesame oil and brown sugar to the mushrooms and stir .
use a knife to chop up mushrooms . add the mushrooms to a pan . turn the stove top on . add a tablespoon of soy sauce to the mushroom mixture . stir the mixture until done and enjoy .

add soy sauce sesame oil and brown sugar to the mushrooms and stir .
find a one tablespoon measuring spoon . measure out one tablespoon of low - sodium soy sauce and pour into mushrooms . put a few drops of sesame oil into the mushrooms . put your thumb and finger into a brown sugar and take a pinch of brown sugar . put that brown sugar with with mushrooms . using a spatula stir the mushrooms around the pan until the mushrooms are a little brown and are soft .

add an egg the vegetables red pepper paste and beef to a bowl of rice .
place an egg on top of a bowl filled with rice . set vegetables around the egg . place red pepper paste and beef onto the top of the bowl .

add an egg the vegetables red pepper paste and beef to a bowl of rice .
add the egg on top of the rice . add the vegetables around the egg so the egg yoke shows . put red pepper paste on top .

add an egg the vegetables red pepper paste and beef to a bowl of rice .
take an egg . crack the egg to remove from the shell . place the egg in a skillet . add heat and cook until the clear becomes white . add to a bowl and add veggies .

add the zucchini to the pan and stir .
put a pan on the stove and turn the burner on to a medium - high setting . put olive oil into the pan and let the pan and oil heat up for 2 - 3 minutes . carefully put the cut zucchini into the pan and add a half teaspoon of salt . stir the zucchini with a spatula and let it cook until it 's soft . turn off the burner and carefully put the cooked zucchini on a paper towel to dry .

add the zucchini to the pan and stir .
place the cut up zucchini in the pan . use a spatula to stir it all together .

add the zucchini to the pan and stir .
take a pan and place it on a stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut zucchini in to long thin pieces . add the zucchini in to the pan . stir the zucchini in the pan .

add garlic soy sauce sesame oil and dark brown sugar to a bowl of beef .
add two cloves of finely chopped garlic to the bowl of meat . then add soy sauce , sesame oil and a medium pinch of dark brown sugar . use your hand to mix together . put the meat in the fridge while you prepare the vegetables .

add garlic soy sauce sesame oil and dark brown sugar to a bowl of beef .
use your hands and add the garlic to the bowl . use a tablespoon to measure 2 spoons of soy sauce and add that to the bowl . add the sesame oil and dark brown sugar to bowl .

add garlic soy sauce sesame oil and dark brown sugar to a bowl of beef .
add 2 cloves of chopped garlic . put in two tablespoons of soy sauce . add some sesame oil . a pinch of dark brown sugar . mix everything in the bowl together and put in the refrigerator .

slice shiitake mushrooms into thin slices .
using a knife go up and down with the knife on top of the mushrooms . make sure all of the pieces separated using your fingers .

slice shiitake mushrooms into thin slices .
take 6 oz of shiitake mushrooms and wash them off . then make sure there are no stems on the mushroom . if there are then remove them . gently slice the shiitake mushrooms into very thin slices .

slice shiitake mushrooms into thin slices .
find a long bladed sharp knife . slice shiitake mushrooms into strips .

add the meat and marinade into a pan of hot oil and stir .
heat a pan and pour in a bit of oil . when the oil is heated , gently add the meat to the pan . there will be extra sauce in the meat bowl , this is called marinade , make sure to add this to the meat . using a spatula , gently stir the meant in the pan . cook until meat browns .

add the meat and marinade into a pan of hot oil and stir .
place the meat into the frying pan . add the marinade into the pan . use a spoon to stir the pan until the meat is cooked through and brown . cover the pan with foil and set aside .

add the meat and marinade into a pan of hot oil and stir .
use a wooden spoon to push the meat into the pan . pour the marinade in the pan and mix it with the spoon .

fry an egg on the pan with salt .
pour an egg into the frying pan . as it fries add some salt to the top .

fry an egg on the pan with salt .
take a pan on the stove and heat it . . break open an egg and take the egg in the bowl . add the egg in to the hot pan . add some salt on to the egg . fry the egg in the pan .

fry an egg on the pan with salt .
put your skillet on the burner on medium heat . crack one large egg into a bowl . put the egg in your skillet . add a pinch of salt on top of the egg . fry an egg for each person serving .

slice baby carrots into thin slices .
hold the edge of the baby carrot . cut it down the middle long ways . take the knife and cut straight lines carefully .

slice baby carrots into thin slices .
measure out 3 ounces of baby carrots . use a large kitchen knife to slice the carrots long ways . slice them thinly .

slice baby carrots into thin slices .
using a knife carefully slice carrots . cut them in thin slices across the carrot . slice 3 ounces total .

add baby spinach soy sauce and garlic to the pan and stir .
add 6 ounces of baby spinach to the pan . add 1 tablespoon of low sodium soy sauce . add 1 clove of garlic chopped into tiny pieces . cook until spinach is wilted but still green . place spinach on paper towels to drain .

add baby spinach soy sauce and garlic to the pan and stir .
put baby spinach , low sodium soy sauce and chopped garlic in the pan . use a spatula to stir spinach . cook until the spinach is wilted , but still green . take the spinach out of the pan and put on paper towels to drain .

add baby spinach soy sauce and garlic to the pan and stir .
add 6 ounces baby spinach , 1 tbsp soy sauce and one clove chopped garlic . cook over medium heat . stir constantly . cook until spinach is wilted but still green . drain on paper towels .

cut a large zucchini into three parts and slice into thin pieces .
with a knife cut the carrots into slices . with a knife cut your zucchini ends off . with your knife cut your zucchini into 3 pieces . place your zucchini so it is standing up . with your knife cut your zucchini into slices .

cut a large zucchini into three parts and slice into thin pieces .
now we want to use our knife to cut up the zucchini . cut off the end , and then the remaining zucchini . and slice it into 3 parts . now slice each of those 3 parts length wise . and then cut the length pieces into matchstick sizes , by stacking them up and slicing them thin .

cut a large zucchini into three parts and slice into thin pieces .
use a knife to cut the end of the zucchini . cut the zucchini into three parts . then slice the zucchini long ways . do this for all three parts of the zucchini .

add the carrots to the pan and add salt sesame oil and honey and stir .
cook the carrots in the pan . add 1/2 teaspoon of salt . a bit of sesame oil , about 1/2 teaspoon . add 1/2 tablespoon of honey . stir together until carrots can be cut easily with a butter knife .

add the carrots to the pan and add salt sesame oil and honey and stir .
put the cut up carrots into the pan . find a 1/2 teaspoon measuring spoon , and 1/2 tablespoon measuring spoon . measure out 1/2 teaspoon salt . measure 1/2 tablespoon of honey . pour salt and honey on top of carrots . sprinkle a few drops of sesame oil on carrots . cook carrots until a little soft . scoop out carrots onto paper towels . keep carrots covered .

add the carrots to the pan and add salt sesame oil and honey and stir .
put carrots into a pan and begin to cook . add 1/2 teaspoon of salt . pour in some sesame oil . add 1/2 tablespoon of honey . stir the ingredients together in the pan .

cut the long roll into small rolls .
hold the other end of the roll . carefully cut the roll into circles 1 inch wide . cut all the way down the roll .

cut the long roll into small rolls .
use a sharp knife with adult supervision . cut the log starting in the center . hold the log as you cut through and divide up into bit size squares .

cut the long roll into small rolls .
use your knife to carefully cut the long roll . cut the roll into 8 to 10 pieces .

put mayonnaise fish roe crab meat red lettuce cucumber salmon and avocado on top .
first you put the mayonnaise on top of the rice . then you spread the fish roe on top of the mayonnaise . then lay two pieces of crab meat on top of the fish roe . the you layer the red lettuce and cucumbers on top of the crab meat , get an adult to cut the salmon in slices and layer that on top of everything , then you put the avocado slices on top of everything .

put mayonnaise fish roe crab meat red lettuce cucumber salmon and avocado on top .
you will need to spread the mayonnaise , about a spoonful of the ingredient , spread across the surface of the sushi roll . you can use the back of the spoon to spread the mayonnaise . spread a heaping spoonful of the fish roe also on the surface , spreading evenly across the surface . place two strips of crab meat across the top , lining them up so there will be a bite of crab in each bite . break up the lettuce and spread it across the surface so there is some across the surface , and then follow this with the cucumber strips that have been sliced in fine long strips . cut long thin diagonal strips of salmon and place on top of the lettuce and cucumber . use at least two to make sure you will get a taste in each bite , but you can use more if you like . place avocado strips along the side of the salmon .

put mayonnaise fish roe crab meat red lettuce cucumber salmon and avocado on top .
flat the rice on the board . spread the mayonnaise on the rice . add some cut pieces of crab meat and red lettuce on top . add some salmon pieces on top . add avocado pieces on top .

hold the ingredients and roll them up with the mat .
hold the center of the sushi holding the ingredients . roll the seaweed and fold the roll . press firmly on the sushi , but not too firmly that it breaks .

hold the ingredients and roll them up with the mat .
hold the end of the mat and start to roll it . push the center of the roll inward with your fingers . fold the roll over the roll . turn the roll over inside of the mat and give it a slight squeeze .

hold the ingredients and roll them up with the mat .
hold the roll up to the bamboo mat . carefully roll the mat with the sushi over . fold it over again and press down with your hands making sure it 's straight .

garnish with ginger and wasabi to serve .
use your hands to pick up some of the pickled ginger and wasabi . put some pickled ginger and wasabi on the plate with the sushi .

garnish with ginger and wasabi to serve .
put the white rice on a dish . top it with ginger and wasabi . keep it heated on the range . heat vegetables . serve with vegetables .

garnish with ginger and wasabi to serve .
arrange the sushi rolls on a plate . add about 2 tablespoons of pickled ginger at the edge of the plate . put 1 tsp wasabi next to it . wipe your hands to remove the wasabi juice . the plate is garnished and ready to serve .

place a sushi seaweed on the bamboo mat .
lay down a bamboo mat . take a sushi seaweed rectangle and place it on the mat in the middle .

place a sushi seaweed on the bamboo mat .
get a bamboo mat used for making sushi and set it on a flat surface . take one piece of seaweed on top of the bamboo mat .

place a sushi seaweed on the bamboo mat .
get your bamboo mat and seaweed wrap . place the seaweed wrap in the center of the mat .

spread some sushi rice on top of the seaweed .
grab rice with your hands . spread the rice on top of the square of seaweed in the middle . squish the rice all over the seaweed so it covers the seaweed .

spread some sushi rice on top of the seaweed .
take the sushi rice in a bowl . take the seaweed on the board . roll the sushi rice in to a ball . place the ball on the seaweed and flatten it with the hands . now take another ball of sushi rice and do the same .

spread some sushi rice on top of the seaweed .
get a handful of rice . spread it thinly into the middle of the seaweed . repeat , filling out the bottom part of the seaweed . leave some empty space on the top of the seaweed .

combine seasoning flour eggs and soda in a bowl .
take a big glass bowl . add some pepper powder and salt in to the bowl . add 1 cup of all purpose flour in to bowl and mix . add 2 beaten eggs in to the bowl . add half cup of soda in to the bowl and mix .

combine seasoning flour eggs and soda in a bowl .
put small amount of pepper , salt and 1 cup of all purpose flour in large bowl . use a fork to beat two eggs in a small bowl , add the eggs to the flour bowl . add a half cup of soda and mix with a spoon to form a batter .

combine seasoning flour eggs and soda in a bowl .
put the dry ingredients into the glass bowl . mix until the are blended together . add egg to the top of the bowl . add one cup of soda on top of the egg . mix until everything is combined .

whisk everything together in the bowl .
use a whisk to mix the batter . stir until a thick batter forms .

whisk everything together in the bowl .
with whisk , mix slowly till combined and smooth . once slightly thick stop mixing .

whisk everything together in the bowl .
put all the ingredients into one bowl . mix the ingredients with a whisk until it makes a thick batter .

dip the chicken into the batter .
have two bowls , a frying pan a spoon and a tray . you will need two eggs , a teaspoonful of salt , vinegar 1/2 a , liter of oil 4 cups for deep frying all purpose flour , black pepper and butter . 1 cup of water . put eggs in a large bowl and mix . add vinegar salt , black pepper , water , butter and mix all the ingredients together . now peel off the skin from the chicken and deep into the mixture in the large bowl . preheat the oil to 375 degrees . then deep the chicken and cook till brown . remove and serve with french fries and vegetables .

dip the chicken into the batter .
place chicken in batter . roll chicken around in batter .

dip the chicken into the batter .
pick up the raw chicken pieces . put them in the thick batter . turn them over until they have batter on all sides .

fry the chicken in a deep fryer .
after the chicken has been in the fridge for one hour , pull it out of the fridge . drop the pieces of chicken into the fryer .

fry the chicken in a deep fryer .
hold the plate with the battered chicken close to the fryer . take a piece of chicken and gently place it into the fryer . be careful , the oil is hot and may splatter . turn it carefully , with tongs until it turns golden brown .

fry the chicken in a deep fryer .
have your mom or dad help you heat oil in a deep fat fryer . when your battered chicken pieces have been in the refrigerator for one hour , take it out . use metal tongs to lower the chicken slowly into the boiling oil so you do n't splash to oil onto yourself and get burned .

remove the chicken from the fryer .
lift the fryer basket out of the fryer . take chicken out of basket and put on serving plate .

remove the chicken from the fryer .
make sure the chicken is done cooking and is crispy on the outside . take the handle of the basket and take it out of the oil .

remove the chicken from the fryer .
have oven mitten on . grasp the pan the chicken is on . make sure utensil is n't hot . do n't lift it too close to you . use a thermometer to know temperature .

slice the bread .
place the bread on a cutting board . start at the end slice the bread with a bread knife .

slice the bread .
pick up your bread knife carefully . take your loaf of bread and place it on a cutting board . " cut the bread into 1 slices ( about the width of your thumb ) " " . " you will need 3 slices .

slice the bread .
carefully take your cutting knife and cut a small piece of bread from the corner of the bread . do the same thing two more times , so you have three pieces of bread .

mix melted butter and flour in a pan .
first melt butter in a pan . then add flour to the butter in the pan . stir the butter and flour together .

mix melted butter and flour in a pan .
take a pan on a stove . take some butter and add it to the stove . melt the butter on the pan . add the flour in to the melted butter . mix the flour and butter .

mix melted butter and flour in a pan .
melt the butter in a pan . add flour to the melted butter . use a whisk to mix the flour into the butter .

add milk to the pan and stir .
take the plastic container of milk in one hand . grab the handle of the warm , silver pan with your other hand . carefully pour the milk into the warm , silver pan . make sure to keep holding the handle of the silver pan to keep it steady while you pour the milk into the pan with your other hand . take the utensil called an egg beater , which is shaped like a light - bulb , in your favorite hand . hold the silver pan with your other hand and use your favorite hand to stir .

add milk to the pan and stir .
take your bowl of milk and pour some of it into your hot pan . then take your stirring spoon and stir the milk until it gets thick . put the rest of the milk into the pan and keep moving it around until it is all thick .

add milk to the pan and stir .
add milk to the pan . stir quickly .

add seasoning .
put nutmeg , salt and pepper in pan . use wire whisk for mixing .

add seasoning .
add seasoning / nutmeg to mixture . stir the mixture .

add seasoning .
after you finish stirring add salt and pepper . then add about one tsp and no more than that of nutmeg . then stir it in .

spread the sauce on the bread .
take a bread slice on a plate . take some sauce in a bowl . take some sauce with a spreading knife . spread the sauce on to the bread . apply the sauce in to all the sides of the bread .

spread the sauce on the bread .
get a butter knife and scoop the sauce . spread the sauce using the butter knife onto the bread . continue spreading until the bread is evenly covered in the sauce .

spread the sauce on the bread .
grab a butter knife and a slice of bread . slice off a small square of butter . about the width of a quarter . spread the butter over one side of the bread until the slice is evenly and fully covered .

place a layer of ham and cheese on the bread .
take a piece of ham and put it on top of the bread . take some mozzarella cheese and put it on top of the ham .

place a layer of ham and cheese on the bread .
spread cheese on bread . put a few slices on chicken ham on top of cheese . places some shredded mozzarella on top of chicken ham .

place a layer of ham and cheese on the bread .
place a piece of lunch meat on a slice of bread . add a little shredded cheese on top of the lunch meat .

bake the sandwich in the oven .
place sandwich in oven safe baking tray . bake 10 minutes or until browned or toasty .

bake the sandwich in the oven .
place sandwich in a broil - safe pan . using an oven mitt , carefully place into oven . set oven to broil . allow sandwich to broil for a couple of minutes , until cheese is melted . sandwich should be golden brown . carefully take out of oven using oven mitt .

bake the sandwich in the oven .
place the sandwich in a baking tray . then take the tray with the sandwich into the preheated oven and bake it for 10 minutes , or until it turns golden brown .

cut the sandwich into pieces and serve .
cut the bread into long thin pieces , like fries . if you ca n't ask a parent or adult for help . share with your friends or family to eat !

cut the sandwich into pieces and serve .
take a cutting board and a ridged knife . take the sandwich on the cutting board . cut the sandwich in to two halves . now cut each half in to two halves . repeat the same with the other sandwich .

cut the sandwich into pieces and serve .
cut the sandwich in half with a knife . cut the half of the sandwich in half again .

fry the beef in a pot .
turn on the stove top ( front right portion ) to medium - high heat . put pot on the portion of the stove that you turned on and add 2 tablespoons of oil to the pot . add the meat you cut up earlier into the pan . stir meat around using a spoon , so that it does n't burn on one side . cook meat , stirring often , until all sides of the meat has turned brown .

fry the beef in a pot .
cut meat into small cubes . place meat into pan . cook meat until it turns brown .

fry the beef in a pot .
turn up the heat on the stove . place a pot on the heat . place the beef in the pot and let it cook .

add vinegar to the pot and stir .
put a small amount of red wine vinegar into the goulash . use a wooden spoon to mix the vinegar into the goulash .

add vinegar to the pot and stir .
brown meat . saute onions . add beef stock . add vegetables and simmer . add 2tsp red wine vinegar .

add vinegar to the pot and stir .
grab the vinegar and pour it into the pot . once the vinegar is added , stir it .

add onions garlic and spices to the pot and fry .
put in two slices onions to the pot . add five or six cloves of chopped garlic . then add salt and pepper . put in some caraway seeds and paprika . mix together with a stirring spoon and continue to cook on medium heat .

add onions garlic and spices to the pot and fry .
add two regular sliced onions to a heated cast iron stew - pot with beef and oil browning in the bottom . add five or six whole cloves of garlic . add crushed caraway seeds , marjoram and sweet hungarian paprika . stir contents together . add a little bit of water then cook over medium heat for about half an hour .

add onions garlic and spices to the pot and fry .
hold the container of onions over the pot . slowly pour in the onions in the pot . add the garlic to the pot . cook them like this to fry .

add pepper and sauerkraut to the pot .
put some hot pepper into the pot . add some sauerkraut and sauerkraut juice to the pot . let it keep cooking .

add pepper and sauerkraut to the pot .
we are not going to add a little bit of hot pepper to our pot . not to much or it will be to spicy . now take your sauerkraut and juice and put them in as well . careful the pan is very hot .

add pepper and sauerkraut to the pot .
put a little bit of hot pepper into the pot . then put the sauerkraut into the pot to cook it .

place the goulash on a plate with potatoes parsley and sour cream .
scoop the goulash onto a plate . place potatoes on the plate with the goulash . sprinkle the goulash and potatoes with parsley . put a spoonful of sour cream on top of the goulash . sprinkle more parsley on top of the plate .

place the goulash on a plate with potatoes parsley and sour cream .
use a spoon and scoop the goulash onto a plate . add potatoes to the side . sprinkle parsley over the whole plate . finally add a scoop of sour cream to the center of the plate .

place the goulash on a plate with potatoes parsley and sour cream .
take a spoonful of goulash and spread it on the bottom of the plate . take a second spoonful of goulash and place it in the center of the plate . place two pieces of potato on the edge of the plate . tear up fresh parsley . sprinkle fresh parsley on top of the goulash and potatoes on the plate .

spread chutney on top .
while the base is frying , place the chutney on top with a spoon . spread the chutney evenly on top with the spoon . remove any lumps . be sure to cover the base completely with the chutney .

spread chutney on top .
warm up your cooking surface . next , spread your egg whites into a circle . next , add your chutney and spread across the top of the egg whites .

spread chutney on top .
take the a spoon and put some chutney on top . spread it all over so that there is not much white space left .

spread masala on top .
using a spoon , scoop some masala out and place it on top . spread the masala out thinly on top of the other ingredients . scoop out more masala and spread it until there is a thin covering over the top .

spread masala on top .
take a spoonful of masala and dump it on top of the food . using the back of the spoon , spread the masala around so it coats the food evenly . continue taking more spoonfuls of masala and spreading it around until all of the food has a thin layer of masala on it .

spread masala on top .
use a spoon and scoop up some masala . spread the spoon of masala around on the circle .

fold in half and serve hot .
use the spatula to slide under the egg circle . flip over the half of egg onto itself to make a half circle shape .

fold in half and serve hot .
use a spatula to fold in half . use the spatula to remove from pan and put on a plate . serve hot with sauce .

fold in half and serve hot .
grab a spatula . slide the spatula underneath the very right side of the crepe . using the spatula , carefully fold the crepe in half . slide the spatula underneath the folded crepe . carefully and slowly remove the crepe from the pan and serve while it is still hot .

drizzle oil on top and around the sides and let cook .
while it is cooking take a spoon and lightly pour oil over the top of the dish . make sure to add oil around the sides as well . you are not covering it in oil , just using a small drizzle of oil .

drizzle oil on top and around the sides and let cook .
take some oil and drizzle it on the top of your meal . then , drizzle some oil around the sides so that your food will properly cook .

drizzle oil on top and around the sides and let cook .
pour the oil around the top . spread the oil around to all sides . allow to continue cooking .

spread batter on pan .
you now will take a spoonful of batter and put it on the pan . using the spoon you will pour the batter out and take the rounded edge of the spoon to move it around . move it in a circular motion , and spread the batter out across the pan .

spread batter on pan .
pour the batter onto the pan . flatten out the batter in a circle with the stirring spoon .

spread batter on pan .
find a ladle . scoop some batter with the ladle . poor batter in the pan . be careful for hot stove . spread batter in circle on pan .

dip the shrimp in the batter .
pick up the shrimp by the tail . now dip it into the tempura batter . make sure to bring the bowl of batter close to your pot . let the extra batter slide off , you can also wipe it on the side of the batter bowl .

dip the shrimp in the batter .
make batter and get it ready . pickup shrimp by the tail and dip into the batter . lower shrimp into frying pan heated up to 180 degrees . fry till shrimp is golden brown . drain and then serve .

dip the shrimp in the batter .
now we want to take the shrimp by its tail and get a good grip . now we will carefully lower the shrimp into the batter . just keep dipping it up in down , carefully lowering it into the batter .

cut the fish to straighten it .
take a shrimp and lay it so that it curls up towards you . take a small knife and make a couple small cuts along the shrimp short ways . then flip the shrimp over and gently rub the length of it to flatten it out .

cut the fish to straighten it .
take the fish pieces in a bowl . take each piece of fish on a cutting board . cut it with knife and straighten it with hand . place it on the board . repeat the same with the other pieces .

cut the fish to straighten it .
take a piece of shrimp and place it stomach side up . using a sharp knife , make a few shallow , horizontal cuts on the top side of the shrimp . gently press and massage the shrimp so it remains straight . repeat with other pieces of shrimp .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
in a large bowl pour 160 g of flour . pour 1 tsp of baking powder into the flour . using a whisk , stir the flour . pour in 1/2 tsp of alt . using a whisk , stir all together in the large flour bowl .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
mix 160 grams of flour into the bowl . then add 1 teaspoon of baking powder and mix . lastly add 1/2 teaspoon of salt and mix .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
throw in the flour , baking powder , and salt . use a whisk to mix all of that together .

mix in water to form a batter .
measure out 300 ml of ice cold water . pour the water into the bowl with the flour . mix the flour and water together until most of it is smooth . there will still be some small lumps - that is good .

mix in water to form a batter .
put 300 milliliters of ice water into the bowl . use the whisk to stir it into mix . be careful not to over mix .

mix in water to form a batter .
in a large bowl will be your flour mixture . have a wire whisk in your bowl ready for mixing . pour 300 milliliters of ice water into the flour , pouring the water carefully into the flour , so it will be added slowly . using the wire whisk , lightly mix the water and the flour mix , and be careful to not over mix the batter as the small lumps will result in a light and fresh coating . go around the edges of the bowl with your wire whisk , going all the way around as you do this light mix of water and flour . move the whisk in a circular pattern .

add sesame oil to the batter .
put in two 2 teaspoons of sesame oil to the bowl . use a whisk and stir the oil into the batter .

add sesame oil to the batter .
measure 2 teaspoons of sesame oil into a cup . next pour the sesame oil into the tempura batter that you have mixed in the bowl . before you begin to fry lay out paper towels to absorb the oil from the cooked shrimp . check the temperature of the oil before you begin cooking . you will batter and cook one shrimp at a time .

add sesame oil to the batter .
measure the sesame oil . add sesame oil to bowl of batter . use a whisk to mix the oil and batter together .

drop the shrimp into the oil .
hold the shrimp by the tail . carefully and slowly lower the shrimp in the oil .

drop the shrimp into the oil .
put shrimp into the oil . hold the tail of shrimp for 2 seconds .

drop the shrimp into the oil .
carefully lower the shrimp into the hot oil . hold the tail for two seconds while holding it in the oil .

add some fresh basil leaves and blend everything in the soup .
rip up basil leaves with your hands and throw them in the soup . mix everything together with a spoon .

add some fresh basil leaves and blend everything in the soup .
add some basil leaves into the pot . let the basil leaves soak into the soup for 5 minutes . use a blender to blend around the pot .

add some fresh basil leaves and blend everything in the soup .
heat the tomato soup on medium until it is lightly bubbling . tear some basil leaves off the stem with your hands . add about 7 - 10 basil leaves into the soup . turn off the heat . use a hand blender , put the head gently all the way into the soup , and blend the basil until it is mixed into the soup .

add some peeled and chopped potatoes to the soup .
take a pot on the stove . cook the soup in the pot . take a potato and remove the peel of the potato . cut the potato in to small pieces . add the potato pieces in to the soup pot .

add some peeled and chopped potatoes to the soup .
use your hand to put the peeled potato chunks in the soup , one at a time . continue until all the potatoes are in the soup .

add some peeled and chopped potatoes to the soup .
take 2 potatoes and wash them properly . peel the potatoes and cut them into thin pieces . add the potatoes into the soup .

cover the pot and cook until potatoes are soft .
take a pot on the stove . add the cooking ingredients in the pot . close the lid of the pot . cook the contents in the pot . the ingredients in the pot should become soft .

cover the pot and cook until potatoes are soft .
place a lid on the pot . boil on middle to high heat . continue cooking until the potatoes are soft .

cover the pot and cook until potatoes are soft .
put the lid on the pot . turn the stove on medium - high .. . let the potatoes cook until they get soft and this should take about 15 to 20 minutes .

add salt and pepper and stir .
use your hands to grab a heavy pinch of pepper and salt to the tomatoes . use your spatula to mix it all together for a few moments .

add salt and pepper and stir .
add salt and pepper to the pan . stir .

add salt and pepper and stir .
add a pinch of salt into the pan . grind some pepper with a grinder . add the ground pepper into the pan . mix all the ingredients together .

add fresh chopped tomatoes and stir .
take some chopped fresh tomatoes and add them to the rest of the ingredients in the pan . stir everything together with a spoon . turn the stove down to medium . continue stirring the tomatoes , onion , and garlic together .

add fresh chopped tomatoes and stir .
now we can put in the fresh tomato . if you only have canned tomato , that will work as well . now lets take our spoon and stir the tomatoes around . also lower the heat just a little to the medium range .

add fresh chopped tomatoes and stir .
add some chopped tomatoes that are fresh into the pot . use a spoon to stir in the tomatoes with the rest of the ingredients .

take out the soup and garnish with more basil leaves to serve .
set the bowl of soup on a plate . pick some fresh basil leaves . place the leaves on top of the soup .

take out the soup and garnish with more basil leaves to serve .
put the soup in a bowl . put basil leaves on top of the soup .

take out the soup and garnish with more basil leaves to serve .
put the soup in a bowl . put a few fresh basil leaves in the center of the soup .

add some chicken stock and stir .
pour 3 cups of chicken or vegetable stock into pot . using a wooden spatula mix the ingredients together .

add some chicken stock and stir .
add some chicken stock into the frying pan . use a stirring spoon and mix in the stock with the other ingredients .

add some chicken stock and stir .
add chicken stock to the pan . stir the ingredients with a wooden spoon .

cook until the tomatoes to collapse and add tomato paste .
watch your tomatoes cooking in the pan . when they begin to collapse and get soft . add two tablespoons of tomato paste to the pan .

cook until the tomatoes to collapse and add tomato paste .
take the pan on the stove . cut the tomatoes in to small pieces . add the tomatoes in to the pan . cook the tomatoes till they become soft . add 1 tablespoon of tomato paste in to the pan .

cook until the tomatoes to collapse and add tomato paste .
use a big spoon to scoop out the tomato paste . add the paste to the pan . mix everything together .

heat some olive oil in a pot and cook some chopped onion in it .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . cut the onion in to small pieces . add the onion in to the pan and cook it .

heat some olive oil in a pot and cook some chopped onion in it .
pour some olive oil into the pan carefully . hold the onions over the pan . carefully push them into the pan . mix with a spatula .

heat some olive oil in a pot and cook some chopped onion in it .
add olive oil to the pan . spread the oil to the pan as it heats . add some chopped onions to the pan . add some garlic . stir together with a spoon cooking it over high heat for about 1 minute .

now add 400gm of baby potato and mix it let it cook for 30 more min .
take a pan on the stove . cook the curry in the pan . take about 400 grams of potato and remove the peel . add the potatoes in to the curry . mix them and cook the curry for 30 minutes .

now add 400gm of baby potato and mix it let it cook for 30 more min .
now we are going to add in 400 mg of baby potatoes to our dish . we want to stir them around and mix them for about 30 minutes before they are ready to go .

now add 400gm of baby potato and mix it let it cook for 30 more min .
stir the sauce in the hot pan . add the baby potatoes to the sauce . stir . cook the sauce for another 30 minutes , until the potatoes are done .

brown 400gm of sliced beef on a hot pan .
hold the beef over the pan . pour the beef in the pan and stir with a spatula . let the beef get brown on the pan .

brown 400gm of sliced beef on a hot pan .
heat a pan to very hot . place the beef chunks in the pan . allow them to fry , stirring regularly , until they are brown on all sides .

brown 400gm of sliced beef on a hot pan .
pour the sliced beef into a hot pan . stir the beef around the pan . continue to cook until it becomes brown on all sides .

now add the beef 2 tbsp of flour 1 tsp of paprika 1 tbsp of tomato puree 2 bay leaves and 300ml beef stock .
add 2 tablespoons of flour . add 1 teaspoon of paprika . put in 1 tablespoon of tomato puree , bay leaves and beef stock . use a stirring spoon and mix everything together well .

now add the beef 2 tbsp of flour 1 tsp of paprika 1 tbsp of tomato puree 2 bay leaves and 300ml beef stock .
add garlic , carrots and peppers to the hot pan and fry for five minutes . then add the meat , flour and spices to the pan and mix well .

now add the beef 2 tbsp of flour 1 tsp of paprika 1 tbsp of tomato puree 2 bay leaves and 300ml beef stock .
add garlic , carrots , and peppers . fry in pan for 5 mins . add the beef , 2 tbsp of flour , 1 tsp of paprika , 1 tbsp of tomato puree . add 2 bay leaves and 300ml beef stock . mix well .

add 200 gram canned tomato 100ml red wine sour cream and mix well let it simmer for 1 5 hour .
add canned tomato , red wine . sour cream to a hot pan . mix well with a wooden spoon until combine . let mixture simmer for 1.5 hours .

add 200 gram canned tomato 100ml red wine sour cream and mix well let it simmer for 1 5 hour .
add 200 grams of canned tomatoes to the pan . pour in 100 milliliters of red wine . add some sour cream . use a stirring spoon to mix everything together well . let the mixture simmer for 1 1/2 hours .

add 200 gram canned tomato 100ml red wine sour cream and mix well let it simmer for 1 5 hour .
check the main ingredients in the wok on the stove . add 200 grams of canned tomato to the wok . add 100 ml of red wine to the wok . add the sour cream to the wok . thoroughly mix all of the ingredients in the wok and let them simmer for 1.5 hours .

fry onions until golden then add garlic carrots and red pepper fry for 5 mins .
fry the onions and garlic for five min until they are clear . add carrots and red pepper and fry until tender .

fry onions until golden then add garlic carrots and red pepper fry for 5 mins .
in a wok or large frying pan that previously contained meat cubes , fry sliced onions until they are a golden brown color . use a wooden spoon to stir the onions in the pan as they cook . add garlic , carrots cut in coin - shaped slices and peppers chopped into small pieces to the cooked onions in the pan . continue to stir the mixture with a wooden spoon in the frying pan as it cooks .

fry onions until golden then add garlic carrots and red pepper fry for 5 mins .
take a pan and heat the pan . cut the garlic and onion in to small pieces . add the garlic and onions in to the pan . cut the carrot in to rounds and peppers in to small pieces . add the carrot and pepper in to the pan .

add soy sauce chopped green onion minced ginger and garlic to a pan .
add the soy sauce slowly into the pan . add the cut up pieces of green onion minced ginger and garlic .

add soy sauce chopped green onion minced ginger and garlic to a pan .
add a 1/2 cup of soy sauce and 1/4 cup of water to pan . now add 3 tablespoons of brown sugar and some green onion . next add 1 tablespoon of sesame seeds . then add 2 slices of peeled ginger . finally add 4 cloves of crushed garlic .

add soy sauce chopped green onion minced ginger and garlic to a pan .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . add a cup of soy sauce in to the pan . add cut pieces of green onion to the pan . add small pieces of ginger and garlic in to the pan . mix everything in the pan .

add apple sauce black pepper and sesame oil and whisk everything together .
add three tablespoons of applesauce . add a pinch of black pepper . tablespoon of sesame oil . when the soy sauce is starting to boil mix it all up . smell how yummy it is .

add apple sauce black pepper and sesame oil and whisk everything together .
add 3 tablespoons of apple sauce . add a pinch of black pepper . add 1 tablespoon of sesame oil . whisk all of the soy sauce ingredients together .

add apple sauce black pepper and sesame oil and whisk everything together .
use a measuring spoon to put three tablespoons of apple sauce into a small container . pour the apple sauce into the pot . sprinkle a little black pepper into the pot . use a measuring spoon to add 1 tablespoon of sesame oil to the pot . use a whisk to mix the ingredients in the pot together .

pour the mixture on chopped onions .
carefully pour the mixture from the pan over the sliced onions . the pan will be very hot , so be careful not to burn yourself or splash the hot mixture onto yourself as you pour !

pour the mixture on chopped onions .
have your bowl of onion mix ready . pour the pan into the bowl .

pour the mixture on chopped onions .
pick up the pan carefully hold it over the bowl of onions . pour the liquid onto the onions and be careful not to spill it . use your whisk to scrape anything left in the pan onto the onions .

slice some beef and add to the mixture .
carefully hold the meat and cut thin pieces out of it . add the pieces to the mix .

slice some beef and add to the mixture .
take the beef and clean it . cut the beef into thin pieces . the pieces should be thin . add the cut pieces of beef into the mixture .

slice some beef and add to the mixture .
cut some of the beef into small pieces , ask an adult for help . add the beef to the liquid mixture .

cook the seasoned beef on a pan .
use a spoon to scoop the meat onto a pan . cook the beef in the pan . stir the beef as it cooks .

cook the seasoned beef on a pan .
put the meat into the pan on the stove . use a spatula to stir the meat around and turn it over . cook until the meat is brown and done .

cook the seasoned beef on a pan .
take a big spoon and put the meat in the pot . keeping adding spoons of meat until the pot is full .

add one egg to the bowl and mix .
when you have all the ingredients in the bowl , it is time to add the egg . crack the egg into a small cup to prevent any shell from breaking into the egg and making its way into the bowl . if there is some shell in the cup , just get a spoon and scoop it out . pour the cup of egg into the bowl . use the chopsticks or a fork and mix the ingredients all the way through .

add one egg to the bowl and mix .
gently hit the egg on a hard surface like the edge of bowl . open the egg carefully over the bowl and let the egg fall in . mix everything together .

add one egg to the bowl and mix .
gently tap egg on side of the bowl to crack . use your fingers to slowly open the shell and add the egg inside to the ground pork . use chopsticks or fork to mix the ingredients together until completely blended .

fold the wrappers into a cone and fill .
first wet the edges of the wrapper . fold the edges with a crinkle fold . then using a knife , put one tablespoon of the mixture into the wrapper .

fold the wrappers into a cone and fill .
use your fingers to put water on the edges of the wrap . roll it into a cone shape and use a spoon to scoop in the filling .

fold the wrappers into a cone and fill .
fold the edges of the wrapper . close the edges of the wrapper is it goes all the way around . put 1 tablespoon of the mix into the wrapper .

seal the edges .
carefully fold the edge connecting each part . make sure to keep the ingredients closed inside .

seal the edges .
seal the edges . this will keep the ingredients from leaking out .

seal the edges .
take the dumpling in your hands . press the edges together with your fingers .

pour cooking oil into the pan .
place frying pan on burner . turn the burner on , and let the pan get hot . add 3 tablespoons of oil to the pan .

pour cooking oil into the pan .
get the pan hot first . pour the oil into the pan slowly .

pour cooking oil into the pan .
put pan on the stove to preheat . pour 3 to 5 tablespoons of cooking oil into the pan .

add dumplings to pan and flip .
add cooking oil to the pan . put the dumplings on the pan . cook on medium heat . turn the dumplings over onto the other side after a couple of minutes .

add dumplings to pan and flip .
put dumplings in the hot pan . turn the dumplings after one side is brown .

add dumplings to pan and flip .
pour a little bit of oil into a saucepan . turn on the stove , set the dial to medium , and put the pan on the stove . add the dumplings onto the pan . after cooking for a few minutes , turn the dumpling over with a pair of chopsticks ( if chopsticks are too difficult you can use something else , like a spatula ) .

add water to the pan .
measure 3/4 to 1 cup of water in a measuring cup . pour the water into the hot pan .

add water to the pan .
get a measuring cup . find the one that has 3/4 . fill it up with water and pour it into the skillet .

add water to the pan .
add water to the pan . put 3/4 to 1 cup of water in .

add oil and onions to a pan .
place a pan on top of the stove and turn the dial to medium heat to get the pan hot . measure out two tablespoons of oil and add to the pan . cut two medium sized onions into small pieces and add the pieces to the pan with oil .

add oil and onions to a pan .
place a pan on the stove top and turn on the heat . wait a few seconds for the pan to get hot . add 2 tablespoons of oil to the pan . use a knife to chop up 2 medium onions into small cubes . pour these onions into the pan . stir the chopped onions in the oil with a spoon so that the onions are coated by the oil and can cook evenly .

add oil and onions to a pan .
grab oil out of the pantry . when the pan is a little bit warm , pour the oil into the pan . make sure it 's not too hot . be careful as you pour not to spill it . pour onions into the oil and stir .

add carrots celery butter and salt to the pan .
add carrots to the pan . add celery to the pan . add butter to the pan . add salt to the pan .

add carrots celery butter and salt to the pan .
add 2 medium carrots that are cut into small pieces . add 1 cup and a 1/2 cut up celery that are cut into small pieces . add 1/4 cup of butter . add 1 teaspoon of salt .

add carrots celery butter and salt to the pan .
chop up two carrots into cubes and add them to the pan . take a stalk and a half of celery and slice them . add them to the pan . use a measuring cup to measure and add a quarter cup of butter to the pan . use a measuring spoon to add a teaspoon of salt to the pan . stir the pan with a wooden spatula .

melt fat in a pan .
get a medium size skillet from the cupboard . put the skillet on the stove . turn the heat on to medium . measure a tablespoon of fat . put the fat in the pan and let it melt .

melt fat in a pan .
prepare the pan . get the fat to be melted . put the fat to the pan slowly . stir the fat slowly so it melts . you can also use 2 tablespoon of oil for substitute .

melt fat in a pan .
place a large pan on the stove top and turn the burner on the medium setting . after a few seconds , the pan will start to get hot . add 1 tablespoon of pig fat to the pan and stir it with a table knife to melt . if you do not wish to use pig fat , you may use 2 tablespoons of cooking oil instead .

cook the beef in the pan until brown .
put a skillet pan on the stove burner . turn the heat on the burner to halfway . put the hamburger in the pan . keep stirring the hamburger . when everything is brown , you are done !

cook the beef in the pan until brown .
heat skillet on stove . add beef to pan and cook . stir until golden brown .

cook the beef in the pan until brown .
put the beef onto the pan on the stove . cook it and move it around on the pan until it is all brown .

stir in beef stock and vegetables .
put in some beef stock . put in the vegetables .

stir in beef stock and vegetables .
get a bowl . get beef stock . get vegetables . open container of beef stock . pour beef stock into bowl while stirring put vegetables into bowl while stirring .

stir in beef stock and vegetables .
put the beef stock into the pan . stir the beef stock and the meat together . add the vegetables to the food in the pan . stir those ingredients together as well .

add worcestershire sauce to the pot .
add worcestershire sauce to the pan . stir it in with the vegetables and meat .

add worcestershire sauce to the pot .
add worcestershire sauce to the pot . stir the sauce into the mix .

add worcestershire sauce to the pot .
open the bottle of worcestershire sauce . measure 1 tablespoon of worcestershire sauce . add to the pot . mix it up .

add pepper salt thyme flour and stock to the pot .
make sure to slowly add 1 teaspoon of ground pepper to the pan . once the pepper is done being added , go ahead and add 1 teaspoon of thyme . now grab your stock and add about 1 tablespoon of white flower into the bowl . now take your whisk and carefully mix the stock and flour together . once it is whisked very well , slowly pour it into the man with your other ingredients .

add pepper salt thyme flour and stock to the pot .
add pepper powder and salt in to the pot . add teaspoon of thyme in to the pot . take the broth in a bowl and add flour to the broth . mix the broth and flour properly . add this mixture to the pot .

add pepper salt thyme flour and stock to the pot .
add a teaspoon of pepper to the mix . add a teaspoon of thyme . mix your flour portion into the stock . mix it up well . add it to the pot !

add parsley to the pot .
get parsley from the cabinet . get a pot from the cabinet . open the parsley . shake some parsley out of the container into the pot .

add parsley to the pot .
take some of the parsley from the bowl and put it into the pot . stir everything up a little bit .

add parsley to the pot .
cook the meat and vegetables in the skillet . then add the parsley to the skillet . mix the ingredients in the skillet .

mash the boiled potatoes with butter salt and pepper .
boil potatoes until they are soft , then take your masher and smash the potatoes . add ¼ cup ( or a big table spoon ) of butter . add a teaspoon of salt . add ¾ teaspoon of pepper . smash the mixture again until it is mixed .

mash the boiled potatoes with butter salt and pepper .
using a masher , push down the potatoes until they are mashed . put butter , salt , and pepper in the potatoes . mash the ingredients into the potatoes to mix them .

mash the boiled potatoes with butter salt and pepper .
once the potatoes are cooked and drained , mash the potatoes with masher until all potatoes are mashed . add a quarter cup of butter . then add a teaspoon of salt . after the salt , add 3/4 to 1 teaspoon of pepper . finally smash the mixture to mix it all together .

transfer the meat mixture to a dish .
place an empty , clean dish on the counter . hold the pan in one hand above the clean dish and hold a spoon in the other hand . use the spoon to slowly transfer the meat mixture into the clean dish . use the spoon to spread out meat mixture evenly in the dish .

transfer the meat mixture to a dish .
grab the pan by the handle . pour the mixture into a glass dish . scrape it out with a wooden spoon .

transfer the meat mixture to a dish .
bring the pan over to the dish you are serving it in . spoon the meat mixture out of the pan and evenly onto the dish .

layer the potatoes in the dish .
use a wooden spoon to put potatoes on into the dish . use the same wooden spoon to spread the potatoes over the top , making sure to cover all the way to the edged of the dish .

layer the potatoes in the dish .
put the potatoes on top . spread the potatoes so they are flat on top .

layer the potatoes in the dish .
put the potatoes on the dish . smooth the potatoes over the top evenly .

bake the dish in the oven .
turn on the oven . let the oven heat up until it beeps that it is ready . put the dish into the oven . leave the dish in the oven for 40 minutes . take the dish out of the oven and let is cool for a few minutes .

bake the dish in the oven .
turn the oven on to the desired temperature . wait for the oven to reach the temperature . put the dish in the oven for the desired time .

bake the dish in the oven .
i ' m using a gas stove . leave it in for 40 min . use pot holders to take out of oven . turn off the oven and let it cool down .

sprinkle parsley on the top .
get parsley . sprinkle the parsley on top of the dish .

sprinkle parsley on the top .
prepare the food to be served . place it in the table when ready . get some parsley . put some parsley on top of food . make sure it 's nice for presentation .

sprinkle parsley on the top .
take your container of parsley . shake it over the top making sure it is even .

crack a egg into a pot and whisk .
crack a fresh egg on the side of the bowl and let it fall out of the shell into the bowl . set the egg shell aside or throw it away . use a whisk to stir the egg up for about 6 seconds .

crack a egg into a pot and whisk .
now we want to add one fresh egg into the mixing bowl . grab your whisk and begin whisking the egg . it is helpful to hold the bowl with one hand and slightly angel it while you whisk it .

crack a egg into a pot and whisk .
tap the egg to crack it . break the egg into a pot . mix it with a whisk .

remove the shrimp from the pot and place on a paper towel .
get out a plate and put a paper towel on the top of it . use a pair of tongs to pick up a shrimp out of the oil . let the oil drip off the shrimp into the pot for a second , then put the shrimp on the paper towel covered plate . do this until all of the shrimp are out and onto the plate .

remove the shrimp from the pot and place on a paper towel .
cover a plate with 1 or 2 sheets of paper towel . let the shrimp cook for 3 - 4 minutes or until they are golden brown . using tongs carefully remove the shrimp from the pot one at a time . place the shrimp onto the plate with the paper towel to absorb any excess oil .

remove the shrimp from the pot and place on a paper towel .
take out the shrimp from the pot with tongs . put the shrimp on a paper towel .

add the shrimp to the pot .
hold the bowl of shrimp near the pot . use tongs to grab the shrimp and put them in the pot .

add the shrimp to the pot .
rinse shrimp and dry them with a paper towel . add shrimp with tongs carefully to the oil .

add the shrimp to the pot .
use tongs to pick up the shrimp . put the shrimp into the pot .

add ice cold water to the pot and stir .
pour 1 cup of ice cold water into the batter . use a stirring spoon to mix up the batter .

add ice cold water to the pot and stir .
add one cup of cold water into the pot with the batter . use a whisk or fork to mix the cold water with the batter . continue stirring until the batter looks smooth and completely mixed .

add ice cold water to the pot and stir .
add 1cup of cold water to the bowl with the batter . using a whisk mix the cold water into the batter until it becomes smooth .

add flour to the pot and stir .
carefully pour the flour into the pot . stir everything with a whisk .

add flour to the pot and stir .
measure 1 cup of flour in a measuring cup . pour the cup of flour in the bowl with the other ingredients . get a whisk . mix the flour with the whisk .

add flour to the pot and stir .
add flour to the pot . stir it in with a spoon .

place the shrimp into a pot of hot oil .
use a tongs and pick up the shrimp . set the shrimp into the pot of hot oil .
