place the shrimp into a pot of hot oil .
use tongs to put the shrimp in the frying basket . it is important to not to overfill the basket , so the shrimp does n't stick together .

place the shrimp into a pot of hot oil .
carefully place the shrimp into the pot of hot oil using a pair of tongs . lower the shrimp gently into the oil so that you do n't burn yourself . it is important not to put too many shrimp in the basket at one time as they may stick to each other .

add the remainder of the stir fry sauce and pepper to the noodles and mix .
locate the remainder of the stir fry sauce . add the stir fry sauce to the pan . using a pepper grinder , twist the grinder 2 - 3 times over the pan . stir and mix the pan 's contents for about 2 minutes . stir fry is ready to serve !

add the remainder of the stir fry sauce and pepper to the noodles and mix .
take the rest of your stir fry sauce and slowly pour it over the noodle mixture in your skillet . add more black pepper . ( three or four twists of your pepper grinder is just right . ) . continue to cook while lifting the noodles with two wooden spoons . do this for two minutes . turn off the heat and you are finished !

add the remainder of the stir fry sauce and pepper to the noodles and mix .
add the rest of the stir fry sauce into the pan . add some black pepper . use the stirring spoons to mix together for 2 more minutes .

transfer the vegetables to a bowl .
using a pepper grinder , sprinkle pepper onto the vegetables . find a large clean bowl . using a large spatula or spoon , scoop out the vegetable into the clean bowl .

transfer the vegetables to a bowl .
put some salt and pepper on the vegetables in the pan . use a pan to scoop out the vegetables and place in a clean bowl . the vegetables will be cooked again , so no need to cook completely this time .

transfer the vegetables to a bowl .
get a spatula and a chopstick . use the chopstick to help scoop up the vegetables on the spatula . place the vegetables in a bowl .

cut the pork into thin strips .
put the pork on a wooden cutting board . place pork at an angle . slice the pork thinly .

cut the pork into thin strips .
place the meat of your choice onto the cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the meat into thin strips . be very careful , watch your fingers while cutting .

cut the pork into thin strips .
hold the pork pieces carefully . take a knife and cut the pork long ways into thin strips .

add the stir fry sauce to the pan .
move the noodles around . pour the stir fry sauce in the pan in circles over the noodles . mix the noodles more .

add the stir fry sauce to the pan .
use a spoon and chop sticks to break up the noodles . if the noodles start to stick together , then add a little vegetable oil .

add the stir fry sauce to the pan .
cook noodles on large curved skillet . add stir fry sauce to the noodles . if the noodles start to stick together , add a little bit of vegetable oil . mix the noodles using two wooden spatulas and gently pulling apart the noodles .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar into bowl and mix .
put 2 tablespoons of soy and oyster sauce and 1 teaspoon of sugar in a bowl . use a spoon to stir and mix everything together .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar into bowl and mix .
measure two tablespoons of soy sauce and add it to a bowl . measure two tablespoons of oyster sauce and add it to the bowl with the soy sauce . next measure a teaspoon of sugar and add it to your sauce bowl . use a spoon to stir this mixture a few times .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar into bowl and mix .
take a small mixing bowl . add 2 table spoons of soy sauce in to the bowl . add 2 table spoons of oyster sauce in to the bowl . add one teaspoon of sugar in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

drain the noodles in a colander and place on a paper towel .
pour the noodles into a large strainer to drain the water off . rinse the noodles with cold water to stop them from cooking . spread the noodles on a pan lined with paper towels . let the noodles dry for two hours before stir frying .

drain the noodles in a colander and place on a paper towel .
pour the noodles into a colander in the sink . let the liquid drain out . take the noodles out and put them on paper towels .

drain the noodles in a colander and place on a paper towel .
drain the noodles in a large colander to remove all the water . run cool water over the noodles so they will stop cooking . toss the noodles in the colander to get rid of the excess water . spread the noodles on paper towels to dry for at least 2 hours . if the noodles are not dry enough , they will turn mushy when stir fried .

add oil to a hot pan and add the vegetables and mix with pepper .
make sure the pan is hot . pour in some oil on the pan . pour in the cut up vegetables and mix with a wooden spoon .

add oil to a hot pan and add the vegetables and mix with pepper .
take a pan and heat the pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut the vegetables in to thin long strips . add the vegetables in to the pan . add some pepper powder in to the pan and mix .

add oil to a hot pan and add the vegetables and mix with pepper .
add oil to a hot pan . turn the heat to medium high . spread the oil around the pan . add the carrots , celery , onions and bok choy to the pan . mix together with stirring spoons . add pepper to the top .

add the vegetables and pork to the noodles and mix .
spread the noodles out evenly in the pot . add the vegetables and pork ( or your choice of meat ) to the center of the pot of noodles . using two utensils , one in each hand , toss the food by moving the ingredients together and mixing them up .

add the vegetables and pork to the noodles and mix .
use a spoon to add the vegetables to the frying pan . put the pork into the pan . use the stirring spoons to mix all of the ingredients together .

add the vegetables and pork to the noodles and mix .
take a large pan on the stove . add the noodles in to the pan . add cut pieces of vegetables in to the pan . add the cut pieces of pork in to the pan . mix everything in the pan .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
take a large pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . add the noodles in to the pot . boil the noodles in the pot .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
pour the noddles into a pot of boiling water . as the noodles boil , stir them around in the pot . cook for 40 seconds .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
move that blue bowl closer to the pot of boiling water . pull noodles from the blue bowl with your hands . place noodles carefully in the boiling water so you do n't get splashed . hold long wooden spoon and keep stirring until i say stop . i will pick up the hot noodles and pour the heavy noodle pot into a strainer to drain water out .

place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
take the fresh egg noodles out of the packaging . put the egg noodles in a strainer . use your fingers to gently take the noodles apart to loosen each bundle . use kitchen scissors cut the noodles into shorter pieces .

place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
take three bunches of egg noodles out of their package and place the noodles into a big bowl . pick up one bunch of noodles at a time and pull the noodles apart , then do the same with the other two bundles . after you have unraveled all three bunches use a pair of kitchen scissors to cut the noodles shorter . pick up a bunch of noodles at a time with your hand and cut them shorter with the scissors . ask a parent for help using the scissors . cutting the noodles shorter makes them easier to cook and easier to eat .

place the egg noodles into a bowl and separate .
take a large bowl . add three packets of egg noodles in to the bowl . separate the egg noodles in the bowl . now repeat the same with other two egg noodles . mix them properly .

add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
make sure the wok is heated over medium heat . use a measuring spoon and put 2 tablespoons of oil in the wok . place the noodles on the hot wok . do n't put too many noodles in the wok or they will stick . if your wok is small you have to make it in batches . stir fry noodles for 6 to 7 minutes making sure you are stirring them .

add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
pour oil into a pan in circles . use your hands and spread noodles all over the pan evenly . stir with a wooden spoon .

add oil and noodles to a pan and stir .
put the wok onto the stove over medium - high heat . using a measuring spoon add two tablespoons of oil to the wok . add the noodles to the wok and spread them out as much as possible . if you have a smaller wok you may want to stir fry the noodles in more than one batch so they do not clump together . using two wooden spatulas toss and spread out the noodles as you cook them so that they do not clump together , stir fry noodles for about 6 - 7 minutes .

cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
cut garlic in to small pieces . cut the carrots in to long thin slices . cut celery in to long thin slices . cut the onion in to long thin slices . cut the bok choy in to small pieces .

cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
put the garlic on a cutting board and use the side of the knife to smash . remove the skin from the garlic and chop into very small piece . cut the carrots into thin slices at a slight angle , and then into thin strips . cut the celery into 2 inch sections , then into thin strips and onions into thin slices . cut the boy choy stems into thin strips and the leaves into a rough chop .

cut garlic carrots celery onion and bok choy into thin slices .
get a cutting board . get a knife from the cutting block . smash the garlic and remove the skin and mince into small pieces . cut the carrot into 2 inch sections and cut then into thin slices and then into thin strips cut the celery into 2 inch sections and then cut each section into thin strips . cut the onions in half from the root end , remove the skin and cut it into thin slices . for the bok choy , cut the leafy parts and cut the stems in 2 inch sections and cut into thin strips . cut the leafy parts into half an roughly chop the leaves .

put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
add the chickpeas to the mixer . add a little bit of parsley . carefully cut up an onion and add it to the mix . add one teaspoon of chili powder . then put in one teaspoon of ground cumin .

put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
tear apart the parsley some while putting it in the food processor . crush the garlic with the flat part of the knife . peel the onion before and cut in half before chopping it . chop the onion by cutting it into small pieces .

put chickpeas parsley chopped onion chili powder ground cumin in food processor .
add a can of chickpeas to the processor bowl . next add coriander and parsley to the bowl . next add some garlic and cut up some onion and add to the bowl .. . then add chili powder to bowl . lastly , add some ground cumin to the bowl .

squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
cut the lime in half . squeeze as much of the liquid out of your lime into the bowl . add a few tablespoons of the sesame oil to your bowl . now you are going to need some flower because you added the liquid to the chickpeas .

squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
hold and squeeze the limes in your hand to get the juice out over the bowl . pour in some olive oil .

squeeze some lime juice to it and add some olive oil .
squeeze two halves lime juice to the processor bowl . and then add sesame oil to the processor .

add some flour and blend everything .
add two tablespoons of plain flour . then blend it up . this makes it easier to mold .

add some flour and blend everything .
we want to take 2 tablespoons of plain flower and add it to our mixing bowl . just slowly pour it in there . now take the lid and place it over your dish . you then want to blind the mixture slowly with small bursts from the blender .

add some flour and blend everything .
put in 2 tablespoons of flour . put the lid on the blender . blend the mixture .

add ground pepper salt and blend again .
place the mixture into a blender . add a little bit of salt and pepper ; about half a teaspoon of each . turn the blender on and blend it up .

add ground pepper salt and blend again .
open the food processor and add a little bit of salt and pepper . add a little bit of both and taste to see if it needs more salt or pepper . once you are done put the lid back on and turn on the food processor to mix everything together .

add ground pepper salt and blend again .
add ground salt and pepper to the container . turn on the food processor .

shape the mixture into balls .
take a handful of the mixture and gently squeeze it in your hand to form a ball . place balls of mixture onto your cutting board .

shape the mixture into balls .
reach into the bowl and grab some of the mixture . squeeze them into your fist . roll in your palm and make into a ball .

shape the mixture into balls .
wet your hands . take out some mix and roll with your hands into balls .

place the falafel in a pan .
after you have heated the oil in the frying pan , slowly place the falafel in the pan . use tongs to do this so you do n't burn your hands . if the falafel is packed tightly they should stay in the same shape as they cook . you should have the heat high enough on the oven so you hear a little sizzle while they cook .

place the falafel in a pan .
be sure the balls are tight enough that they will keep their shape . place the balls on the hot oiled pan .

place the falafel in a pan .
when the pan and oil are hot add the falafel to the pan carefully . let them cook . they should stay round .

add oil and spices to a pan .
put 1 tablespoon of oil into the pan . add spices to the pan . cook the spices in the pan for about 30 seconds , while using a wooden spatula to stir .

add oil and spices to a pan .
step one preheat a pan on the stove . step two add a tablespoon of oil to the pan . step three add all your spices to the pan . step four fry for 30 seconds .

add oil and spices to a pan .
gather the oil and spices that you will need . open the oil and pour into the pan . open the spices and use teaspoon or tablespoon ( whichever is mentioned ) to pour into the pan . carefully , with a long handled spoon , stir the oil and spices .

add the chopped onions the pan .
pour the chopped onion into the pan . using a spatula , stir the onions until they turn light brown .

add the chopped onions the pan .
add the bowl of chopped onion into the pan . cook the onion for about 3 - 4 minutes until the onion turns brown .

add the chopped onions the pan .
pour in chopped onions . stir occasionally while cooking .

add sliced onions to a pan .
turn on the stove and place a pan to be heated . into heated pan , add 2 tablespoons of oil . add sliced onions to the pan . cook on medium heat . cook gently until they turn brown .

add sliced onions to a pan .
heat 2 tablespoons of oil in the pan on medium - low heat . put in the sliced onions into the pan . stir the onions carefully with a spoon until they are a light brown color .

add sliced onions to a pan .
use a pan and heat 2 tablespoons of oil on the stove . use a spoon to add the sliced onions to the heated pan with oil . use the spoon to move the onions around in the pan as they cook slowly at a medium - low heat until they are caramelized . caramelized onions will be slightly brown and soft .

add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
put some chilies and tomatoes in with the diced onions in the hot pan . stir , cook for about 10 minutes .

add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
add green chili and tomatoes to the pan . cook for about ten minutes to reduce the tomatoes . ( reduce means to cook down an item to make it soft or smaller in size . ) .

add the chilies and tomatoes to the pan of diced onions .
first cook the cut up onions until they start to brown . next add green chilies to the pan . then add cut up tomatoes to the pan . cook for 10 minutes to reduce the tomatoes .

add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
take the yogurt in to a bowl . add the yogurt in to the pan . cut the vegetables in to small pieces . add the vegetables in to the pan . mix everything with the spoon .

add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
add yogurt and vegetables to the pan . stir .

add yogurt and vegetables to the pan .
slowly pour yogurt into pan , stirring after every 1/4 of cup added . add pre cut vegetables to pan .

place the rice in the pot .
with a plastic or wooden spoon , place 1/3 of the total rice inside of the bottom of the pan . make sure the rice covers all the surface at the bottom .

place the rice in the pot .
use a large spoon or ladle . scoop 1/3 of mixture into bottom of pot .

place the rice in the pot .
use a spoon . spoon rice into a pot .

layer the vegetables and rice on top .
get a large pot and place it on an even surface . pour in about half of the rice , ( enough to evenly cover the bottom of the pot . pour half of the vegetables over the rice and even them out with a large spoon . evenly cover the vegetables with half of the remaining rice , and then pour in the rest of the vegetables evenly . finally , cover the vegetables with the remaining rice .

layer the vegetables and rice on top .
put some cooked rice into bottom of pan and use a spoon to spread with a spoon . put the cooked vegetables on top or rice and spread using a spoon . keep doing this until all rice and vegetables are used .

layer the vegetables and rice on top .
first line the pot with rice . then add vegetables to the top of the rice and spread around . next add half of the remaining rice . then again add vegetables and spread around . add the rest of the rice on top .

sprinkle saffron water on top .
using two fingers , hold container of saffron water over rice . using a light shaking motion , sprinkle the water over top of the rice . once you sprinkle the saffron water , cover pot with lid .

sprinkle saffron water on top .
take a pot on the stove . take rice in the pot . take a small bowl with water . add some saffron in to the water . add saffron water in to the rice in pot .

sprinkle saffron water on top .
pour a few drops of the saffron water over the top of the rice . do n't pour too much .

add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
take a medium sized bowl . cut shallots , garlic and walnut in to very small pieces . add cut pieces of shallots and garlic in to the bowl . add cut parsley and walnuts in to the bowl . squeeze half a lemon in to the bowl and mix with a spoon .

add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
add chopped shallots to the bowl . then add chopped parsley to the same bowl . add chopped parsley to the bowl as well . add chopped walnuts . add a little salt and pepper , and then the juice of one lemon . mix all with a fork .

add chopped shallots garlic parsley walnut salt pepper and the juice of one lemon to a bowl .
first add chopped shallots to bowl . then add garlic to the mixture along . next add some parsley , walnuts , and salt and pepper to the mixture . add the last ingredient of lemon juice to the bowl . mix all the ingredients together .

flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
put the batter on baking paper . cover the batter with another layer of baking paper . using a rolling pin , push it over the baking paper to make the batter flat . put the flattered batter into ice water to harden it .

flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
place the batter between two layers of baking paper . roll over the paper the surrounds the batter with a rolling pin . spread it out until it looks pretty flat . while it 's still in the paper , place it over ice so it starts to harden .

flatten the batter between two layers of baking paper and place on ice to harden .
get 2 sheets of baking paper . put your mixture on one piece of the baking paper . lay the other piece of baking paper on top of the mixture . get your rolling pin and roll the mixture out in a thin rectangle shape . leave the mixture between the paper and lay it on ice to harden .

pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
cook 1 cup of cooked spinach in skillet . next mix a little cream into the spinach .

pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
get your cup of cream . pour the cream into the pan of cooked spinach . stir the ingredients in the pan together .

pour cream into a pan of cooked spinach .
pour some of the cream into the pan that has the cooked spinach in it . using a spoon , stir it up well .

place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
spoon the spinach onto the plate . add 12 snails to the top of the spinach .

place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
add a little bit of spinach to 4 dishes . add some cooked snails on top of each one .

place the spinach onto a plate and add the snails .
use a spoon to place two or three spoon fulls of the spinach mixture into the center of four dishes . use a spoon to place 12 snails on top of the spinach on all four plates .

cover the snails with the butter and breadcrumbs and place in the oven .
put butter and breadcrumbs on the snail . put the snails in the oven .

cover the snails with the butter and breadcrumbs and place in the oven .
first spread butter over the snails . next place breadcrumbs over the dish . then bake in a hot oven for 5 minutes .

cover the snails with the butter and breadcrumbs and place in the oven .
put a slice of the hardened butter mixture on top of the snails . sprinkle enough bread crumbs to cover the butter mixture . put the individual dishes on a baking sheet . put on oven mitts and put them in a hot oven . bake for 5 minutes .

add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
pour lemon juice into the bowl . smash the garlic with your garlic press and add the garlic to the bowl . add grated parmesan to the bowl . sprinkle salt and pepper into the bowl . stir the stuff in the bowl with your whisk .

add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
squeeze one lemon in to juice in to the bowl . crush the garlic in to pieces and add in to the bowl . add parmesan cheese in to the bowl . add salt and pepper in to the bowl with butter milk . stir everything properly .

add lemon juice crushed garlic grated parmesan salt and pepper to a bowl with butter milk and stir .
add 1 1/2 cups of buttermilk to bowl . then add 2 tablespoons of lemon juice . then add 1 diced clove of garlic . then add 1/4 cup of grated parmesan cheese and salt and pepper . mix all ingredients together .

pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
pour a 1/2 of cup of the mixture into a measuring cup for later . next pour the rest of the mixture over three chicken breasts in a ziplock bag . put into refrigerator .

pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
use a measuring cup to measure out 1/2 cup of the mixture for your dressing . get a bag that can be sealed and put three boneless skinless chicken breasts in it . in the same bag as your chicken , add the rest of your mixture and seal it up tight .

pour some of it into a cup and put the rest into a bag with chicken .
save half of the marinade into a cup to use later . then take the bag with the chicken in it and you 're going to pour the rest of the marinade you did n't use in there .

brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
take two slices of bread . brush them with oil . sprinkle with salt . " place in oven on broil " " setting " " . "

brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
take two slices of bread on a baking tray . add oil on the bread with brush . take some salt in a small bowl . sprinkle some salt on top of bread slices . broil them till they are golden brown .

brush two slices of bread with oil top with salt and broil .
use a kitchen brush to spread olive oil on one side of 2 slices of bread . preheat the oven on the broil setting . place the bread on an oven sheet and place in the oven when it is finished preheating . watch the bread carefully ( this will happen quickly ) and pull out when the bread has toasted to a golden - brown color . when the bread cools , cut the pieces of bread into small squares .

take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
take your chicken out of the bag . be careful to let as much of the sauce drip back into the bag . place the chicken onto your baking sheet that has foil on it . make sure your oven is already set to broil . leave it in the oven for 13 to 15 minutes .

take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
open bag and take out chicken with tongs . hold chicken with tongs and let drain into bag . place on foil covered baking sheet . preheat the broiler setting by pressing the broil button until hot enough . cook for 13 - 15 minutes .

take chicken out of the bag place onto the pan and cook in the oven .
use tongs take chicken out of the bag . put your chicken onto your pan .

in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
get a bowl and put the mayonnaise in . then take the rest of the marinade that you have made . pour the marinade into the bowl with the mayonnaise . then use the whisk to mix the mayonnaise and the marinade together .

in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
in a medium bowl put 1/4 cup mayonnaise . pour reserved buttermilk marinade with cheese into bowl with mayonnaise . stir with a whisk to mix .

in a bowl mix together mayonnaise and the rest of the marinade .
get a large bowl . put one quarter cup of light mayonnaise . add your buttermilk . mix your ingredients with a whip . this is a wonderful dressing for your caesar salad .

cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
use one hand to hold the lettuce . use your other hand to hold the knife . use your knife to cut the lettuce into pieces . put your lettuce pieces in the bowl .

cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
chop the lettuce on its side till it is in several pieces . pick up lettuce and place inside bowl .

cut the lettuce into pieces and place in a bowl .
cut the lettuce up with a sharp knife . put the lettuce in the bowl .

add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
take a large bowl for mixing the salad . cut the lettuce in to small pieces . add the lettuce in to the salad bowl . cut radicchio in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
add chopped lettuce and radicchio to your dressing . mix together well so that the dressing coats all of the vegetables .

add the lettuce and radicchio to bowl with the dressing and mix together .
put the romaine lettuce into the bowl with the dressing . next add the radicchio to the bowl . mix the lettuce and radicchio into the dressing until covered .

cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
cut the cooked chicken into small pieces using a knife .. . place the cut up chicken into the bowl with the salad . cut the bread into small pieces like a crouton using a knife . add it to the bowl with the chicken and salad . mix the salad , chicken and croutons together using tongs .

cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
use a sharp knife to cut the chicken into pieces . put the cut chicken into the salad bowl . cut the bread into small squares and add to salad bowl . toss everything together with dressing .

cut the cooked chicken and toasted bread and toss into the salad .
take the cooked chicken on a cutting board . cut the cooked chicken in to thin slices . cut the toasted bread in to small pieces . add the toasted bread and chicken pieces in to the salad bowl . mix everything in the bowl with a spatula .

pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
open the cans of beans and chickpeas and pour the liquid into a bowl . you can use the lid to hold the beans and peas in the can while pouring the liquid out .

pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
open the can part of the way . pour the juice out of the can into a bowl .

pour drained liquid from tinned beans and chickpeas to a bowl .
open the can by flipping the tab on top and pulling back the lid a little bit . do n't pull the lid off all the way . pour the liquid out of opening at the top of the can , but keep the chickpeas in the can .

put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
drain the chick peas and beans by pouring off the liquid from the can . put chick peas and beans in the food processor . take out a few chick peas to save for decorating later .

put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
plug up food processor with take top off . pull back top of beans and chickpeas cans halfway . hold can upside down over a bowl to drain . take out a small amount by hand for use later .

put the beans and chickpeas in a food processor .
put a can of chickpeas into a food processor . drain all the water out of a can of beans . pour the beans into the food processor . put a few of the chickpeas aside to be used for decorating the bowl later on .

add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
put in 4 cloves in the food processor . add juice of one squeezed lemon . put in two teaspoons of tahini . add one teaspoon of cumin seed which is a seasoning in your moms cupboard . add a teaspoon of pepper and sea salt .

add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
get 2 little parts of the big garlic head . get some lemon juice from the squeezy yellow lemon in the refrigerator . put the garlic and the lemon in the food processor . add 2 tablespoons of ground sesame seeds to the food processor . put in 1 teaspoon of cumin , and add pepper and flaky salt too .

add 2 cloves of garlic lemon juice tahini salt and pepper to the food processor .
add 2 large cloves or 4 medium sized cloves . add the juice of 1 lemon . add 2 tablespoons of tahini . add 1 teaspoon of ground cumin seeds . add salt and pepper to taste .

add the liquid to the food processor .
put about a half of a cup of liquid into the food processor . use a measuring cup to measure the liquid .

add the liquid to the food processor .
grab your bowl of the liquid . use a measuring spoon to measure half a cup of the liquid . add the half cup of the liquid into the food processor .

add the liquid to the food processor .
take a food processor with beans in it . take the liquid in a medium sized bowl . take a measuring spoon . add about 2 spoons of liquid in to the food processor . mix the liquid with the contents in the food processor .

blend everything in the food processor .
get a grown up to help you . plug in the food processor . open the lid and put in your ingredients . do not remove the lid while you are pushing the start button . process until the mixture looks smooth or your grown up says to stop .

blend everything in the food processor .
plug in food processor . gather all ingredients . chop up ingredients if they need to be smaller . place ingredients in food processor . turn and blend .

blend everything in the food processor .
put all the food together . place it inside the food processor careful to not touch the blade . once the food is in the food processor place lid on top and turn to the right to make sure it is closed . push the button to turn the food processor on . watch as the food blends together . once it looks like liquid milk it is finished turn off the food processor .

peel the potatoes and cut them .
start by using a potato peeler and peeling all the skin off of 5 pounds of potatoes . cut them in half and then cut the halves into half .

peel the potatoes and cut them .
peel the potatoes . cut them into small pieces .

peel the potatoes and cut them .
use a vegetable peeler to carefully remove the skin from the potatoes . start with the vegetable peeler at the top of the potato , then , using slight pressure , drag the vegetable peeler towards yourself . cut each potato in half , then cut each half in half again - turning each potato into four sections .

put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
cut the potatoes in to inch sized pieces . add the potatoes in to the pot . add cold water in to the pot . add some salt in to the water . bring the water to boil .

put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water . add a couple of tablespoons of salt to the pot with the potatoes .

put the potatoes in a pot and cover them with cold water add some salt and bring the water to boil .
with a knife peel several potatoes and cut into bite size chunks . place the potatoes in a large pan and pour cold water into the pan until the potatoes are covered . add salt to the pan . place the pan on the eye of the stove and turn the eye to high . wait for the water to start bubbling up .

boil the potatoes .
make the water get hot and begin to bubble a little . then turn temperature on the stove top to medium . let the potatoes stay in the pot for 10 to 12 minutes until they are hard and firm .

boil the potatoes .
take a big pot on a stove . add water in to the pot and boil . cut the potatoes in to inch shaped pieces . add the potatoes to the boiling water . boil the potatoes .

boil the potatoes .
place the potatoes into the pot and heat the water in the pot until it begins to bubble . lower the heat on the stove by turning the dial on the stove down . place a top onto the pot to trap the heat inside and cook the potatoes between 10 and 15 minutes . the potatoes should be tender but firm at the end .

chop the garlic .
while potatoes cook . cut the garlic into small pieces .

chop the garlic .
while the potatoes are cooking chop three or four cloves of garlic . be sure to peel the skins from the garlic before chopping . roughly chop the cloves of garlic with a knife .

chop the garlic .
while the potatoes are cooking start to prepare the garlic . use a sharp knife to chop up 3 to 4 cloves of garlic .

drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
when the potatoes have cooked until you can poke a fork through , place a strainer in the sink . use a pot holder to pick up the hot pan . pour the hot water and potatoes into the strainer . when all water is gone from the pot and potatoes , put them back into the pot .

drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
remove all water from the potatoes by pouring into a strainer . pour the drained potatoes back into the pot .

drain the potatoes and return them to the pot .
boil water in a pot . once the water is boiling put the potatoes in the pot and let cook until soft . drain the water out of the pot into a steel strainer . when the water is all drained out return the potatoes to the pot .

add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
put a half a cup of softened butter into the potatoes . add two cups of grated parmesan cheese , 1 cup of chives . then 1 and a half cups of cream cheese and minced ( cut into small pieces ) garlic . use a potato masher to mash .

add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
first add some room temperature butter in the amount of 1/2 cup . just drop it onto the potatoes . we will mix it in later . now add these ingredients into the bowl in the exact same way . 2 cups of graded parmesan cheese . 1 cup of chives and 1 and a half cup of creamed cheese . now pour your and the minced garlic .

add butter grated parmesan cheese chopped chives cream cheese and minced garlic .
take a pot and add potatoes pieces . add one block of butter in to the bowl . add one cup of parmesan cheese in to the bowl . add the cut pieces of chives and cut pieces of garlic in to the bowl . add about one and half blocks of cream cheese in to the bowl .

mash the potatoes .
take your potato masher , and start pressing it down into your pot full of potatoes . do this quickly , that way your able to make sure the potatoes stay warm and do n't go cold . just keep mashing until the mixture becomes smooth .

mash the potatoes .
once the potatoes are cooked . open the lid . take a potato masher . mash the potatoes properly .

mash the potatoes .
get potato masher . push down until you hit the bottom of the pot . lift masher . repeat until smooth .

season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
take a large bowl . add boiled potatoes in to the bowl . mash the potatoes with a masher . add some salt in to the bowl . add pepper powder and mix them in the bowl .

season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
take a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper and add it to your potatoes . with a potato masher , smush the potatoes .

season with salt and pepper to taste and mash .
add salt to the mashed potatoes . add as much pepper as you think it needs . mix in the salt and pepper by mashing some more .

garnish with pepper and chives .
sprinkle with pepper and chives . serve in a bowl . put up to keep cool overnight . add more pepper and chives .

garnish with pepper and chives .
grab a pinch of pepper and sprinkle over potatoes . grab a pinch of chives and sprinkle over potatoes .

garnish with pepper and chives .
sprinkle some pepper on top . sprinkle a little bit of green chives on top .

stretch out the dough .
make the dough with the help of flour . stretch the dough . make it big with our hands into large shape .

stretch out the dough .
have a clean surface that has been floured . use about a quarter of a cup of flour to start . take the dough and using your hands , start to flatten the dough from the middle of the sphere , working your way out to the outer edges . as you stretch the dough , turn it over so the other side is also floured . work the sphere along the edge to spread out the dough and continue to stretch it until the dough is about twelve inches . the stretching motion will be done across the surface of the sphere , continue to rotate the sphere to thin out the thick areas . you will use the base of your palms as you stretch and flatten the dough , not just your fingertips .

stretch out the dough .
take a medium sized ball of dough . stretch the dough with the hands . press the dough with the finger tips . roll the dough with the hands in a circle . stretch the dough in to uniform thickness .

season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
take a pinch of sea salt in fingers . sprinkle in a circular motion around the pizza . pick some of the fresh basil leaves . place leaves around the pizza .

season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
use your fingers to grab a pinch of sea salt . sprinkle the sea salt on your pizza in a circle . grab some basil leaves and place them evenly around the pizza . you want to make sure every slice will have some on it .

season the pizza with sea salt and basil .
sprinkle sea salt all around the pizza . tear some basil leaves and make pattern on pizza .

pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
pour some olive oil on top of the pizza . use the pizza peel to place the pizza in the oven . the pizza will bake for about 90 seconds .

pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
take the prepared ingredients on a plate . take olive oil in a jar . add some olive oil on top of ingredients . transfer the pizza in to the oven . bake the pizza in the oven .

pour some olive oil on top and bake the pizza in an oven .
pour enough olive oil to lightly cover the pizza onto the pizza , in a circular motion . take the peel , a large and flat metal spatula , and slide it under the pizza . move the pizza with the peel over to the oven . slide the pizza onto the ovens shelf .

put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
pinch the ball of mozzarella cheese and pull tiny pieces of it off . add the pinched pieces of cheese on the pizza covering it evenly .

put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
flatten dough . roll dough out to large circle . spoon sauce onto dough . spread sauce over to near edge of dough . add small pieces of mozzarella cheese to dough .

put some mozzarella cheese on the pizza .
ladle some sauce onto the pizza crust . spread the sauce out evenly , leaving only the edges bare . pinch off pieces of fresh mozzarella cheese . place the cheese all over the pizza crust . it does n't have to cover the entire pizza , because it will melt and spread when you bake it . use up the entire amount of cheese we measured out at the beginning before moving on to the next step .

pour some tomato paste on the dough .
take a spoon and scoop some tomato paste and pour it onto the dough . use the spoon to spread the paste around evenly on the dough .

pour some tomato paste on the dough .
roll the dough flat and shape into a large circle . open a can of tomato paste and empty it into a large bowl . use a spoon to ladle out several portions of tomato paste into the center of the dough circle . use the back of the spoon to spread the tomato paste from the center of the dough out toward the edge using swirling motions . be sure to leave enough of the edge clear to create a crust .

pour some tomato paste on the dough .
using a large spoon , put 2 spoonfuls of tomato paste in the middle of the dough . place the spoon on the tomato paste , and make sure the spoon is laying flat . when the spoon is laying flat , use it to spread the tomato paste . make large circles with the flat part of the spoon until the paste is almost to the edge of the dough . make sure the paste is spread in even amounts , leaving just a little room around the edge .

put potatoes back in fryer .
turn on frying machine , make sure it has oil in it . get french fries . gently place the fries into the basket . lower basket into oil . cook in oil for one minute .

put potatoes back in fryer .
return the potatoes to the fryer . fry them until they are crispy .

put potatoes back in fryer .
put the potatoes back into the fryer basket . lower the basket down carefully . fry the potatoes for about one minute more .

put the fish in a cone .
with your hands take the fish . with your hands put the fish in the cone .

put the fish in a cone .
take fish and add batter to it . then put it in a deep fryer . add oil . allow to turn light brown . then put in a paper cone .

put the fish in a cone .
remove the fish from the plate . place the fish into the serving cone .

remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
open the fryer . grab the handle of the basket and slowly lift it up . hold it above the oil and let the excess drain off . put it on a plate that has paper towels on it to soak up the grease .

remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
when the fries are crispy , take the basket out of the fryer and tap it a little bit so that the oil can drain . put some paper towels on a plate and dump the potatoes out on the plate .

remove and drain potatoes from fryer .
now we want to take our fries out of the fryer . just remove the basket and place them onto a plate with several paper towels to catch the grease .

fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
with your fingers put your fries into the deep fryer . place the fryer down to the oil .

fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
put cut potatoes into fryer basket . slowly lower fryer basket with potatoes into the oil . keep and eye on the fryer and cook potatoes for 5 minutes .

fry the potatoes in a deep fryer .
put the potatoes into the fryer basket . put the basket into the hot oil . cook the potatoes for 5 minutes .

season potatoes with salt .
carefully pour the french fries out of the fryer basket onto a plate lined with paper towels . sprinkle a small amount of salt onto the fries as soon as you finish getting them onto the plate so that the salt will stick to the fries .

season potatoes with salt .
pinch some salt with you fingers . sprinkle the salt all over the potatoes .

season potatoes with salt .
pour the fries onto paper towels . add some salt over the top .

remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
remove the fish from the fryer with a strainer . shake the basket to drain the excess grease .

remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
hold on to the handle of the basket that 's in the fryer with the fish in it . very carefully so you do n't splatter hot oil , lift the basket up and gently move it around and shake it to help drain the grease off of the fish . gently dump the fish out of the basket onto a plate with a paper towel on it .

remove and drain the fish from the fryer .
take the fish out of the fryer . drain the extra grease . put the fish onto a plate with a paper towel on it .

place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
use tongs to grab the potatoes . put the potatoes in the holder .

place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
use a pair of tongs to carefully pick up some of the fries . then , place the fries inside the cone with the fish .

place potatoes in the cone with the fish .
using tongs pick up the cooked fries . put the fries into the paper cone with the fish .

add vinegar to the batter .
put the batter into a large mixing bowl . mix the batter with a whisk . measure two capfuls of vinegar and add to batter .

add vinegar to the batter .
pour vinegar into the batter . use the whisk to mix it in with the batter .

add vinegar to the batter .
hold vinegar over the batter bowl . pour a little vinegar into the batter carefully .

whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
put flour , salt and ale into a large bowl . use a wire whisk to mix together , until the lumps are gone .

whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
add flour to the bowl . add salt to the bowl . add ale to the bowl . using a whisk mix the mixture together .

whisk flour salt and ale together in a bowl .
add flour to the bowl . mix in some salt . pour in some ale into the bowl . use a whisk to mix everything together .

peel the potatoes .
use a knife or potato peeler to peel the potato . cut all of the skin off of the outside of the potato .

peel the potatoes .
take some potatoes . take a peeler . remove the peel of the potatoes . repeat the same for other two potatoes . keep the peeled potatoes aside .

peel the potatoes .
take the potatoes and clean it properly . peel off the skin using a peeler .

coat the fish with flour and batter .
put the fish into the batter , covering both sides . dip the fish into the flour and get flour on both sides .

coat the fish with flour and batter .
pick up the fish piece with you hand . lay the fish onto the flour . take the fish and dip it in the batter mix to cover the whole thing .

coat the fish with flour and batter .
put the fish in the bowl of flour . flip over the fish to make sure both sides are covered . shake off the excess flour . put the chicken coated in flour in the batter . allow the batter to fully coat the chicken .

place the fish in the deep fryer .
slowly dip the fish into the batter . while your oil is heating , slowly remove the fish from the batter , careful to let it drip the extra batter into the bowl . slowly add the battered fish into the oil about halfway , slowly dropping the fish as you 're careful to not allow your fingers touch the oil .

place the fish in the deep fryer .
when the fish is fully coated , remove from batter bowl . slowly lower the fish into the deep fryer . this will set the batter before you let it go .

place the fish in the deep fryer .
put the fish into the batter until it is completely covered . slowly lower the fish into the dryer .

serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
spoon out some sauce on the board . put a slice of lemon beside the sauce .

serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
serve the finished product with sides . put some tartar sauce on the side . add a slice of lemon on the side .

serve with sauce and garnish with lemon .
serve the fried fish in an individual paper wrapper . add a spoonful of the mayonnaise , capers , and gherkin sauce on the side , either on the cutting board or on an individual serving dish . using a knife , cut a lemon into 8 wedges . serve a lemon wedge alongside the fish . serve each person a dish containing the fish , chips , sauce , and lemon wedge .

cut the potatoes .
use a knife to carefully cut the potatoes . cut them across the side of the potato . then cut again into lines .

cut the potatoes .
we now want to cut our potatoes into nice thin strips . think of them as if they are going to be french fry size . keep your fingers safe and out of the way of the knife .

cut the potatoes .
cut the potatoes into long slices that are thin . then carefully cut the potatoes into a french fry shape .

remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
remove the pot of potatoes . place the potatoes onto a plate .

remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
slowly life the fryer basket out of the fryer . shake any extra oil off the potatoes into the fryer by tapping the basket on the sides of the fryer . being careful of hot oil and potatoes , dump the potatoes onto a plate covered in 4 - 5 paper towels so any extra oil can be absorbed .

remove and drain the potatoes from the fryer .
use the strainer to pull out the potatoes . put the potatoes on a paper towel .

mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
add the baking powder , salt , paprika , and pepper into the bowl with the flour . mix all ingredients together with a whisk .

mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
in a bowl add the flour . next add the baking powder to the bowl . now add the salt . add the paprika . add the pepper and using a wire whisk , stir the dry ingredients together .

mix flour baking powder salt paprika and pepper together .
add salt to a bowl with flour in it . add baking powder to it . add paprika to it . add pepper to it . mix the ingredients together using a whisk to even everything out .

add beer to the mixture .
with your whisk go into circles . while you have your whisk into circles pour the beer into the bowl .

add beer to the mixture .
pour cold beer into bowl with flour . use a whisk to stir beer into flour .

add beer to the mixture .
have a whisker and your cold beer next to you . slowly pour the cold beer in 2 second segments . use the whisker to blend the beer with the mixture . you may see some bubbles forming as you are pouring the beer and mixing .

coat some onion rings in the mixture .
cut the onion into small rings . put the cut onion rings into the mixture for coating . with the help of a stick , take out the onion rings coated with the mixture to fry .

coat some onion rings in the mixture .
divide the onions into three piles . drop one pile into the coating mixture . stir with a skewer to coat the onions . remove the coated onions to a plate with the skewer . do the same with each pile of onion .

coat some onion rings in the mixture .
drop 5 or 6 pieces of onion into the batter . use a skewer to make sure the batter completely covers each onion slice .

melt some butter in some preheated oil .
take a piece of butter and drop it into your pan of hot oil . if the piece of butter starts to get hot and make a sizzling noise , then it means the oil is ready . take a fork and get the butter out of the oil . now you are ready to put the onion rings in .

melt some butter in some preheated oil .
take a large pan on the stove . pour oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add cube of butter in to the oil . melt the butter and take it off with the spoon .

melt some butter in some preheated oil .
pour oil into the pan . put the piece of bread carefully into the pan . very carefully with a fork or spatula grab take the bread out of the pan .

fry the onion in the oil .
shake off extra batter from onion . put the onion ring in the oil . do n't crowd the pan with too many onion rings . you have to turn the onion rings after a minute and a half . when cooked on both sides take out of oil and put on paper towel .

fry the onion in the oil .
have adult help you fry the onion rings . you want to dip the onion rings into the batter . den you want to have adult help you drop the onion ring into the oil . try not to put to many fry for only 3 mins den take them out an lay them on . on 3 dry paper towel .

fry the onion in the oil .
take the onion rings out of batter using a fork . shake the onion ring a bit so that it does not drip . place the onion ring into the pan with the frying oil . make sure the pan is not full of rings . place 3 sheets of paper towels on a plate . place the onion rings on top of the paper towel .

add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
take the baking powder and add it into the bowl with the flour . now add the salt and the sugar into the bowl as well . take the bowl and mix all of the ingredients that are in it .

add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
put flour , 1 teaspoon baking powder , half a teaspoon salt , and 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar in a bowl . stir . make hole in middle of bowl . add wet ingredients .

add baking powder salt and sugar to a bowl of flour and mix .
take a large bowl and a spoon . take flour in the bowl . add one teaspoon of baking powder in to the bowl . add i teaspoon of salt in to the bowl . add 1 1/2 teaspoon of sugar in to the bowl and mix them with a spoon .

add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
pour milk and a little bit off oil into the bowl with the flour . use your hand to mix the dough slowly .

add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
pour milk into cup . pour oil into same cup . add them both to the bowl . mix together with your hands .

add milk and oil to the bowl and mix .
take a measuring cup of oil . pour oil into the center of the bowl . swirl the mix with your hand slowly in the bowl around slowly . if you add too much oil do n't worry pour a bit of flower into the bowl . once done swirling tip the bowl onto the counter .

knead the dough with flour .
knead the bread . add flour and knead for 10 more minutes .

knead the dough with flour .
lightly flour the counter surface . kneed the dough on the counter and add a sprinkle of flour . kneed the dough for 10 minutes .

knead the dough with flour .
sprinkle flour onto a large , flat and clean surface . place dough on surface . roll the dough back and forth across your surface while squeezing it . ( like you do for play clay ! ) . add in little sprinkles of flour while you roll it , until its no longer really sticky .

roll the dough with a rolling pin .
put the dough on the counter . push the rolling pin to and from the dough to roll it flat .

roll the dough with a rolling pin .
take a rolling pan . roll it over the dough to make it flat .

roll the dough with a rolling pin .
place the dough on the table . get your rolling pin . put the rolling pin on top of the dough . put both hands on the side of rolling pin . gently start to roll it on the dough .

add coriander leaves to the dough .
sprinkle the pieces of coriander leaves on the dough . press down on them with your hands to get them to stick and stay put .

add coriander leaves to the dough .
put the herbs on the dough . pat the herbs on the dough to make them stick .

add coriander leaves to the dough .
pick up the coriander leaves . add them to the dough . press them into the dough .

place the dough into an oven .
put the dough in the oven . you can do it at home with the oven in your kitchen .

place the dough into an oven .
turn on the oven t the required temperature . wait until the oven is hot and to beep until it is ready . place the dough into the oven . wait until the required time . the naan is ready to eat .

place the dough into an oven .
put the flattened dough on the palm of your hand . quickly slap the dough onto a tray in the oven , so it does n't fold over on itself . close the oven door .

serve it with bun and potato chips .
remove the hot dogs with tongs . place the hot dogs on a plate inside the hot dog buns . put chips on the plate next to the hot dog . serve the plate .

serve it with bun and potato chips .
put a few hot dog buns on a plate . add potato chips to the side . use tongs to put the bratwurst to the bun . add a little bit of onions .

serve it with bun and potato chips .
using tongs , carefully take the meat off of the grill . place the meat on top of buns . add your condiments on top of the meat . serve alongside potato chips .

place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
place the bratwurst onto the heated grill , being careful to not burn your hands . as the bratwurst cook you will notice they are browning on the sides . you need to cook them for about 10 minutes .

place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
put the bratwurst onto the hot grill . close the grill lid and cook until brown for about 10 minutes .

place the bratwurst on the grill and cook them until brown for about 10 - 15 minutes .
use tongs to put the brats onto the grill . close the grill . cook the brats for 10 to 15 minutes .

remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
after they have cooked for 20 minutes , you need to remove the foil . let them cook another 15 to 20 minutes with the foil off . be careful and use tongs to move around the container of food when hot .

remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
now carefully pull off the foil . put the pan back in and let it cook without the foil covering it . cook for another 15 minutes .

remove the foil and cook for about 15 minutes .
cook on the grill for about 20 minutes with the foil covering the pan . open the grill and remove the foil . cook for another 15 minutes without the foil .

take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
take a grill pan on the grill . add some butter in the grill pan . cut the onions in to thin slices and add them in to the pan . add cut pieces of garlic in to the pan . grill for about 15 minutes .

take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
put some butter into a grill pan and heat on the grill . add chopped onions and garlic to the grill pan . let the onions cook for about 15 minutes , stir a couple times during cooking .

take butter in a grill pan and add chopped onions garlic and grill it for about 15 minutes .
put butter into a pan and put it on the grill . add chopped onions and garlic into the pan . stir it and cook for around 15 minutes because they 'll take more time than the brats to cook .

transfer the bratwurst into the pan and cover it with aluminum foil and let it cook for 20 minutes .
be careful on the hot grill . use metal tongs to move sausages from the grill to the metal pan with onions as they turn brown . as the sausages turn golden brown , move them into the metal pan filled with onions . once all the sausages are golden brown and moved into the metal pan , cover the metal pan with foil , being careful because the grill and the metal is still very hot . crimp the foil around the edges of the metal pan , and then shut the lid to the grill .

transfer the bratwurst into the pan and cover it with aluminum foil and let it cook for 20 minutes .
use tongs to take the bratwurst from the grill to the pan with the onions and the beer . you can put them in as they 're ready . push them all in the liquid . now cover the pan with foil making sure to seal the edges . now cover the grill and let it cook for about 20 minutes .

transfer the bratwurst into the pan and cover it with aluminum foil and let it cook for 20 minutes .
put the bratwurst in the pan . cover with foil . let cook for 20 minutes .

pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
once the vegetables on the grill are hot , open the beer . pour the entire contents of the beer bottle into the pan . stir the beer and the vegetables together on the grill .

pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
hold the beer over the pan . carefully pour the beer in the pan . use the tongs to stir everything up .

pour the beer into the pan and stir it .
take a baking tray on the grill . cook the contents in the pan . take a can of beer . add the beer in to the pan . mix the beer with the contents of the pan .

dice the apples .
cut the apples into small pieces . be careful with the knife ( ask an adult to help ) .

dice the apples .
take the fresh apple . clean the apple with cold and hot water properly . cut the apples into 2 cm cubes .

dice the apples .
using a knife , cut the apple into tiny pieces . put in lemon juice . then stir everything together using a spoon .

add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
you will need adult assistance , lemon juice , apples , bowl and spoon for the next step . have a parent or guardian with helping you to prepare the apples . wash apples under cool water and drain the water from the bowl . pour the apples into the mix . pour lemon juice into the mix and apples . mix well with spoon .

add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
cut your apples in half then quarters and cut the core and seeds out . cut the apple slices in to small pieces and put into a serving bowl . add one or two tablespoons of lemon juice to the apples and mix until apple pieces are coated with lemon juice .

add lemon juice to the apples and mix .
dice the apples into cubes ( cut the apples into small cubes ) . add lemon juice to the apples . mix the lemon juice and apples well .

chop the celery .
cut celery into small pieces . measure your raisins .

chop the celery .
cut the celery up into small pieces . " they should look like little green c " " shapes " " . " have an adult help you if you 're afraid of cutting yourself !

chop the celery .
chop the celery into uniform slices with a knife . set aside in a bowl for later .

add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
measure out all of the needed ingredients : raisins , cranberries , and nuts . once you have your ingredients measured out , add them to the apples and mix well .

add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
measure your raisins , cranberries and nuts and put them in their own small bowl . place your cut up apples in a nice serving bowl . pour the raisins , cranberries and nuts in with the apples . stir until the mixture looks pretty .

add raisins cranberries and nuts to the apples .
put the apples in a bowl . add the raisins to the same bowl . add the cranberries as well . finally , add the nuts and mix them together !

add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
combine all the fruit , add mayo . mix everything . chill in fridge .

add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
take the mixing contents in a bowl . take some mayonnaise . add mayonnaise in to the bowl . mix everything well . place it in fridge .

add mayonnaise and mix everything together .
put the mayonnaise in the bowl with the fruit . using a big spoon , mix the ingredients together . put the bowl in the refrigerator to chill before eating .

chill the dish .
place your bowl into the refrigerator and allow it to get cold all the way through . once it is cold it is ready to eat .

chill the dish .
get all the ingredients mixed up well in the bowl . put the dish into the refrigerator and chill .

chill the dish .
after mixing fruit cover the bowl . place in fridge until cold .

mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
spoon in a tablespoon of tamarind paste into a bowl . 1 1/2 tablespoons of plumb sugar . 1 tablespoon of sugar . add a pinch of salt . 1/2 tablespoon of vinegar mix well with spoon .

mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
put one tablespoon of tamarind into the bowl . then add 1 and a half tablespoons of palm sugar to the bowl . next , add 1 tablespoon of white sugar and a pinch of salt to the bowl . add half tablespoon of vinegar and one tablespoon of fish sauce to the bowl . use spoon to stir well .

mix tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together .
get a separate container to use . add the tamarind sauce plum sugar sugar fish sauce and a pinch of salt together slowly using a spoon .

heat olive oil in a pan add the radish and fried tofu .
take a large metal spoon and add to it a tablespoon of oil . poor the oil into a wok . heat up the wok , while adding in radish and tofu .

heat olive oil in a pan add the radish and fried tofu .
put oil in the pan . let oil heat up and be careful . put the radish and fried tofu in the oil . let the mixture simmer . stir the mixture .

heat olive oil in a pan add the radish and fried tofu .
spread olive oil around the bottom of the pan . add radish to the pan . then put the pieces of tofu into the pan and let it cook .

add the shrimps to the pan .
now if you have chicken or shrimp add it in to the pan . stir the mixture .

add the shrimps to the pan .
add 5 - 6 shrimp to your pan . stir around and allow to cook . you can also use chicken instead of shrimp or along with the shrimp if desired .

add the shrimps to the pan .
pick up the shrimp with your fingers and put into the hot pan . use a large spoon to move the shrimp around in the pan .

add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
stir the contents of the pan with a metal ladle . next add the rice noodles to the pan . stir again with metal ladle . add a little bit of water to the ladle and add to pan .

add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
cook egg and shrimp in wok . add 2 cups of pre - soaked rice noodles . stir noodles , egg and shrimp . saute . add 1/2 cup water .

add the rice noodles and a little water to the pan .
put the rice noodles carefully into the hot pan . stir the noodles in the pan . get a half cup measuring cup . fill the half cup measuring cup with water . pour the measuring cup of water into the hot pan with the noodles .

stir to mix the ingredients .
put all ingredients in pan . stir them together until they are mixed . stir them together until they are mixed .

stir to mix the ingredients .
pour a half a spoon full of the mixture into the pan with the other ingredients . continue to stir the mixture into the rest of the ingredients .

stir to mix the ingredients .
get a big spoon or ladle . use the ladle to mix everything together carefully .

add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
add the sauce and mix into the noodles , and turn up the heat . add some paprika , leeks , bean sprouts and the nuts . use a spoon to mix everything while cooking .

add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
use your hand and grab the leeks sprouts and nuts and throw it in the pan . take a spoon and scoop the mixed sauce red chili powder in and drop it in the pan carefully .

add the mixed sauce red chili powder leeks sprouts and nuts .
ladle in sauce . add in red chili powder , add leeks and sprouts . toss to combine .

crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .
bring an oiled pan to a medium high heat . take two eggs and crack them into the pan , trowing away the shells . take a spatula or large spoon and stir the eggs .

crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .
take out two eggs from the egg carton . one egg at a time , gently crack it on the side of the pan . open the egg and pour out the inside of the egg into the pan , one at a time . make sure not to drop any egg shells into the pan . using a large spoon , gently stir the eggs , breaking the yolk .

crack eggs into the pan and stir fry .
one at a time , tap the egg on the side of the pan and crack them into the pan . using a large spoon , stir the eggs around , making sure you break open the yellow part .

add onion ketchup and mustard .
cut onions into rings and add on top . place 1 chopped jalapeno on to . put on 4 tablespoons of ketchup . add 4 tablespoons of mustard .

add onion ketchup and mustard .
add the onion slices to the hotdog . add peppers to the hotdog . add ketchup onto the hotdog . add mustard onto the hot dog .

add onion ketchup and mustard .
put cut onions on sandwich . then add ketchup and mustard .

heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .
first , you need to add 2 tablespoons of oil to a pan . heat the pan on a medium setting . slowly and carefully add 4 chicken sausages to the oil .

heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .
pour 2 tablespoons of oil onto the pan . let the pan heat up . now add the slices of chicken sausages onto the pan . make sure the oil is under each piece and they are cooking evenly .

heat some oil in a pan and fry some chicken sausages in it .
place the grill pan into the stove and switch it on . pour some oil into the pan . arrange the chicken sausages into the pan and cook it .

heat some hot dog buns in a pan .
all you need to do now is take your hot dog bun and open it up . take the opened bun and set it on top of the pan .

heat some hot dog buns in a pan .
heat a large flat pan on the stove . open a hot dog bun completely . place the bun , open side down in the pan . allow the bun to cook until lightly brown . remove the bun carefully and set aside .

heat some hot dog buns in a pan .
place a skillet on the stove burner , with the handle to one side . take a hot - dog bun and gently force it open in the middle , opening it fully . place this opened hot dog bun upside down in the skillet , with the inside of both buns touching the pan surface . you will let the inside of the buns heat slightly , watching them carefully so that they do not burn . remove and set aside until ready to use .

close the bun .
squeeze a little bit of mustard on the inside of the sandwich . close the sandwich .

close the bun .
put the bun on top of the hotdog . firmly make sure it is even with the other side .

close the bun .
after putting the hotdog in the but and adding your condiments , it is time for the final step . just grab your bun and close it up . be careful not to tear it .

put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .
take some lettuce and tear it up . lay the lettuce pieces on the buns . put the hot dogs on the buns .

put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .
open your sub buns up and lay them out on a plate . break off a some iceberg lettuce and tear it into smaller pieces . lay the lettuce on the bun . do the same thing with the red lettuce . use your spatula to lift the hot dogs off the plate and set them on the buns .

put the lettuce and hot dogs in the buns .
open up the hot dog buns . take 1 bunch of iceberg lettuce and shred it . put the lettuce on the buns . add some shredded red lettuce . use the tongs to pick up the hot dog and place them on top of the lettuce on the bun .

layer the bun patty sauce tomato rocket and top bun .
arrange ingredient plates on work counter : serving platter , patty , tomato , rocket , rolls . prepare an injector with bbq sauce . cut all of the mini rolls in half . place bottom half of a roll on the platter ; top it with the patty , tomato and rocket . repeat for all patties ; fasten top half of roll on each sandwich with a toothpick .

layer the bun patty sauce tomato rocket and top bun .
put the bun on the plate . place the patty on the bun . squirt sauce on the patty using a injector . put a bun on top .

layer the bun patty sauce tomato rocket and top bun .
add the sauce on top of the buns . put a piece of tomato with your hand . cover it with the top bun piece .

roll the dough out .
use a rolling pin to roll the dough . roll it into a thin oval shape .

roll the dough out .
now we will take your rolling pin and start rolling the dough . keep rolling it until it is about 3/4 of a cm thick .

roll the dough out .
place flour on a wooden cutting board . place the bread dough on the floured board . use the rolling pin to roll over the dough . roll the dough evenly . roll it until it is about as thick as a quarter .

grill the burgers .
place the burgers and bacon on the grill . cook on medium heat . use the tongs to flip over the meat to cook both sides .

grill the burgers .
take a grill . heat the grill . add the burgers on to the grill . flip the burgers to the other side . fry the other side of burgers .

grill the burgers .
put the mini burgers on a hot grill pan . let the burgers brown on one side and use tongs to flip each burger over . put a slice of cheese on top of each burger .

place the cheese and bacon on top of the patties .
put the small pieces of cheese onto the burger patty . use tongs to place bacon on top of the cheese . cook until the cheese melts .

place the cheese and bacon on top of the patties .
put the cheese and bacon on top of the burgers that are cooking . cook until the cheese has melted .

place the cheese and bacon on top of the patties .
turn over the patties with tongs . place cheese on top of the patties using your hands . place bacon on the patties using tongs .

cut out circles from the meat .
use a small glass to press down on the meat . turn the glass to cut circle pieces out from the meat .

cut out circles from the meat .
using a shot glass , press it into the meat . pull the circle cut outs of meat .

cut out circles from the meat .
use a small circular glass to cut circles out of the meat . repeat this all around the flattened meat . line up the circles of beef .

brush the circles with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds .
use a brush and coat the tops with egg wash . sprinkle sesame seeds over the top .

brush the circles with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds .
brush the circle with egg wash using the brush . then sprinkle on sesame seeds onto each circle .

brush the circles with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds .
take a plate . pour the circles on the plate . take the egg wash in a bowl . take a brush and apply egg wash on to the circles . sprinkle some sesame seeds on the circles .

cut the dough in half .
place the dough flat on a cutting board . carefully hold the dough and cut it in half with a knife .

cut the dough in half .
use a knife to carefully cut the dough in half . set one half of the dough aside .

cut the dough in half .
take a cutting board and a knife . place the dough ball on the board . cut the dough in to two halves . separate the half dough ball . place it in a container .

mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
put flour , salt , eggs , melted butter and the yeast mix into a bowl . mix well and form into a ball . knew the dough on a cutting board for about ten minutes until the dough is smooth .

mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
okay , now add the salt into our flour . then add the egg in and follow that by the melted butter . the last thing to add in is the yeast and water mixture . now take your dough and knead it for about 10 minutes .

mix the flour salt egg melted butter and yeast mixture into a dough and knead .
add flour into a bowl . add salt . then pour an egg into the bowl . put in melted butter and the mix of yeast , sugar and water . mix the bowl together and then remove the dough and knead it for about 10 minutes .

mix the yeast sugar and water .
put yeast in a bowl . add sugar to the bowl . add water to the bowl . mix up with a spoon .

mix the yeast sugar and water .
put the yeast and sugar in the water . stir it together with a spoon .

mix the yeast sugar and water .
add yeast and sugar to a small bowl of warm water . stir the mixture with a spoon . put it in a warm place , like on top of the refrigerator for 30 minutes .

cut out circles from the cough .
lay out a cutting board and place dough on top . roll out the dough until it 's about a centimeter thick . using a melon baller cut out small little circles from the dough and place on a cookie sheet .

cut out circles from the cough .
put flat dough on a cutting board . press the melon cutter into the dough . use the melon cutter to put circles on a plate . spread circles with butter using a cooking brush .

cut out circles from the cough .
roll out the dough until it is about 1 centimeter thick all over . use a melon baller to cut small circles out of the dough , and drop them onto the pan . the circles should be about 1-inch across .

roll the beef out .
put the meat between two sheets of rolling paper on the table . use a rolling pin and roll the meat . flatten the meat until it is about 1/2 cm thick . put in the freezer for about 20 minutes .

roll the beef out .
take a small bowl . roll the beef in to a bowl . take the ball on a rolling board . take a rolling pin . roll the beef out .

roll the beef out .
roll the meat between your hands to mix it well . get two pieces of baking paper and place the meat between the two pieces of paper . get a rolling pin and slowly roll the pin back and forth over top of the meat which is sandwiched between the baking paper sheets . flatten the meat as you roll back and forth , until the meat patty is about 1/2 cm thick . place the flattened patty into the freezer .

sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .
have ground beef in a bowl . hold the salt grinder over the beef . turn the cap about 5 times , releasing salt onto the meat . use your hands to mix the salt into the meat .

sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .
sprinkle salt and pepper lightly on the ground beef . mix the seasonings in with your hand . you may use other seasonings if you wish .

sprinkle salt on the beef and mix .
put salt into the bowl . with your hands mix the beef and salt together .

cook the buns on a grill .
place the buns middle side on the grill . let them cook on the grill for a bit .

cook the buns on a grill .
place buns on the grill with the inside of the buns face down . grill the buns .

cook the buns on a grill .
cook the buns with the lid down in the over . cook for 8 to 10 minutes .

add oil to a heated pan .
put pan on the stove on medium to high heat . add oil to the hot pan .

add oil to a heated pan .
heat pan on stove . add 2 tablespoons of oil into hot pan .

add oil to a heated pan .
measure two tablespoons of oil . pour that into your pan on the stove .

add bean paste beans and garlic to the pan and stir .
make sure your pan that is already hot , and has some oil . put bean paste , lentil beans , and garlic into the pan . stir everything for about a minute . you should see the color of the oil changing and becoming a little darker .

add bean paste beans and garlic to the pan and stir .
put bean paste into the pan . drop your garlic in next . then mix it together in the pan for 1 minute .

add bean paste beans and garlic to the pan and stir .
with a big spoon add the bean paste and garlic to the pan . mix together everything in the pan with the spoon .

pour stock into the pan and stir .
pour chicken stock or water into the pan , about 1/2 cup . mix everything together with a spoon .

pour stock into the pan and stir .
pour some stock into the pan . stir the mixture in the pan .

pour stock into the pan and stir .
pour your chicken broth / stock in the hot pan and be careful not to splatter it everywhere . now take your spoon and gently mix the broth around in the pan .

add the tofu to the pan and stir .
