add the tofu to the hot pan . stir everything with your spoon . keep stirring and cooking . be gentle .

add the tofu to the pan and stir .
hold the container of tofu over the pan . use your hands and carefully scoop the tofu out into the pan . be careful that it does n't splash on you .

add the tofu to the pan and stir .
add the tofu to the pan . take your stirring spoon and mix the tofu around . make sure to cook all sides of the tofu .

add the scallions to the pan and stir .
add 1/2 of the scallions to the contents of the hot pan . next stir the ingredients in the pan .

add the scallions to the pan and stir .
use your hand and grab some scallions . sprinkle them around on top . use a spatula to mix everything up .

add the scallions to the pan and stir .
chop scallions with a knife into small pieces . add the scallions into the pan . take a big spoon and stir the mixture in the pan coating everything with oil . mix everything really well .

transfer the tofu to a bowl .
take a pan on the stove . add the tofu in to the pan . cook the tofu with gravy . take a bowl . transfer the tofu in to the bowl .

transfer the tofu to a bowl .
use your large plastic spoon to scoop the tofu from the pan . place the tofu in the bowl . continue to scoop all the food and sauce into the bowl until the pan is empty .

transfer the tofu to a bowl .
with a spoon take the tofu out of the pan . place the tofu onto a bowl .

garnish with scallions and pepper .
sprinkle the remaining scallions on top of the dish to make it look pretty . add some pepper on top according to how you want it to taste .

garnish with scallions and pepper .
scatter chopped scallions over your dish . sprinkle pepper over the dish .

garnish with scallions and pepper .
use a spoon to remove from pan and put in a bowl . put scallions on top for garnish . put a little bit of citron pepper powder on top .

microwave the tortillas .
put the tortillas into the microwave for about 10 seconds , until they are warm .

microwave the tortillas .
put the bowl in the microwave . switch on the oven . once the beeps is done for 10 sec . you can take the bowl .

microwave the tortillas .
place your tortillas in a tortilla warmer . place the tortilla warmer in the microwave . set the timer for 10 seconds to heat up your tortillas .

add cooked beans curry rice tomato paste and sour cream on top .
add cooked beans , curry , rice , tomato paste , and sour cream . place them on top of your tortilla .

add cooked beans curry rice tomato paste and sour cream on top .
place one tortilla on a plate . use a spoon to put cooked beans , curry rice , tomato paste , and sour cream on top of the tortilla .

add cooked beans curry rice tomato paste and sour cream on top .
take a tortilla on a plate . add 2 tablespoons of cooked beans on the tortilla . add rice on top of beans layer . add tomato paste on top of rice layer . add a tablespoon of sour cream on top of tomato paste .

add guacamole cheese lettuce and olive on top .
lay a spoonful of guacamole . then put on some cheese . then a little bit of lettuce . and last a little bit of spring onions on top .

add guacamole cheese lettuce and olive on top .
use a spoon to put on the guacamole . then use your fingers to put on the shredded cheese , lettuce , olives and onions .

add guacamole cheese lettuce and olive on top .
add a table spoon of guacamole on the top of sour cream . add cheese on top of guacamole . cut the lettuce in to small pieces and add on top . cut the olives in to small pieces . add the olives on top of lettuce .

roll up the burrito .
pinch the edge of the burrito wrap . fold it over the vegetables and keep going until it 's rolled up .

roll up the burrito .
take a burrito sheet . add all the ingredients to be stuffed . place it on side of the burrito . roll the burrito sheet from one side . roll till the other side and covering from both sides .

roll up the burrito .
take the end of the burrito with the food and roll . take the sides of the burrito and fold them over the front side . then take the burrito and finish folding over so it is facing up .

fry the burrito .
as your butter is melting you can add the burrito to your pan . make sure the tucked end parts are on the bottom so it holds its shape once it cooks . once the first side is golden brown use your spatula to flip it to the other side . now cook it until its golden brown on the other side . use your spatula to take your burrito from the pan to your plate carefully .

fry the burrito .
put the burrito in the hot pan with the end side down . when it is brown on one side , use a spatula to turn over and brown other side . use spatula to remove burrito from pan and put on a plate .

fry the burrito .
take the burrito and set it on the hot pan . after the first side has a brown color , use your spatula and turn it over . be sure to fry both sides .

add oil onions garlic and chili flakes to a pot .
spread a fourth of a cup in a pan . add the garlic then chili around the pan and spread them out .

add oil onions garlic and chili flakes to a pot .
put 1/4 cup of olive oil to the hot pan . carefully pour the bowls of onions garlic and chili flakes into the pan .

add oil onions garlic and chili flakes to a pot .
add 4 tablespoons of oil olive to the pan . add 1 chopped onions into the pan . add 2 chopped slices of garlic into the pot . add 1 teaspoon of red chili pepper flakes . use a spoon to stir the ingredients in the pan .

add salt tomatoes and beans to the soup .
sprinkle salt into the soup . pour in the bowls of tomatoes and beans into the soup .

add salt tomatoes and beans to the soup .
add a pinch of salt into the soup . add 3/4 cup of tomatoes . add 1 can of kidney beans . use a stirring spoon to mix everything together in the pan .

add salt tomatoes and beans to the soup .
now we want to add in a pinch of salt for seasoning . next step is to put in the tomatoes and the beans to our pot of soup .

add chicken broth and thyme to the pot .
pour in 4 quarts of chicken broth to the pot . add 1 tablespoon of thyme .

add chicken broth and thyme to the pot .
measure out four quarts of chicken broth . pour four quarts of chicken broth into pan . chop up fresh thyme . measure out 1 tbsp of freshly chopped thyme . sprinkle the thyme into the pan with the chicken broth .

add chicken broth and thyme to the pot .
add the bowl of chicken broth to the pot . add thyme to the pot .

add the collard greens to the soup .
shake in the collard greens in the soap . let them cook for about ten minutes .

add the collard greens to the soup .
add 1 bunch of collard greens into the soup . stir greens into the soup . let cook for 10 minutes .

add the collard greens to the soup .
hold the bowl of greens over the soup . carefully pour the bowl of greens into the soup .

top the soup with parsley and oil .
add 1/4 cup of parsley . add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to the top of the soup .

top the soup with parsley and oil .
grab some parsley with you hands . sprinkle the parsley on the soup . pour a tiny bit of oil on top .

top the soup with parsley and oil .
put a quarter cup of chopped fresh parsley on top of the soup . put 1 tablespoon of extra virgin olive oil on top of the soup .

add the pasta to the soup .
add one box of barilla pasta shells to the pot of soup . use a spoon to give it a stir .

add the pasta to the soup .
put the 1 box of medium shell pasta into the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the shells into the pan .

add the pasta to the soup .
open the box of pasta and hold it over the pot . carefully pour the pasta in the pot .

heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .
pour chicken broth into a cooking pot and place on top of stove . turn stove to high and leave pot until the broth starts to boil .

heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .
get the chicken broth ready , it is time to start boiling . put a medium to large pot on the stove and carefully pour in the chicken broth . turn up the heat dial on the stove and wait for the chicken broth to start boiling . be careful not to touch the hot chicken broth or pot while on the stove .

heat a pot of chicken broth to a boil .
put a pot on the stove . add chicken broth to pot . heat chicken broth to a boil .

add soy sauce and sesame oil .
pour in soy sauce . add sesame oil .

add soy sauce and sesame oil .
add one spoon of soy sauce in to the pan . add one spoon of sesame oil in to the pan . then mix all the ingredients together to blend well .

add soy sauce and sesame oil .
when the chicken broth starts to boil , slowly add 2 tablespoons of soy sauce and 1/4 teaspoon of sesame oil . it would be easier if you put the soy sauce and sesame oil together in a bowl so you can put both in the broth at the same time . remember , do not touch the hot chicken broth or pot . go slow and add the soy sauce and sesame oil . slowly mix together the broth , soy sauce , and sesame oil .

add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
get a cutting board and a large knife . take white onions and but off the long , green part these will be the scallions . put in a bowl . chop the scallions into small pieces and put in a separate small bowl . chop the white onions into small pieces . put in a bowl . chop the bok choy into small pieces . add the white onions an bok choy to the broth . save the scallions for a garnish .

add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
cut green onion into small pieces . cut the baby bok choy into small pieces . cut the white onion into small pieces . put everything into the pan .

add the chopped green onions chopped baby bok choy and white onion .
add the green onion . add the baby bok choy in to it . add the white onion also into it . mix all the ingredients together .

add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
chicken must already be cooked ; ask an adult to help . dicing means to cut up in very small pieces . use a sharp knife and carefully cut the cooked chicken first in thin slices . turn the cutting board sideways and now cut the chicken slices the other direction . when all chicken is cut up , use the knife to chop into even smaller pieces with a chopping motion . keep your hand out of the way !

add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
initially cook the chicken . take a pot for the chicken . add the cooked chicken to the pot .

add diced cooked chicken to the pot .
take your chicken and make sure it is cut up into little pieces and it is cooked all the way through . you can also tear apart the cooked chicken with your fingers if the chicken is cool enough to touch . if you touched any raw chicken , wash your hands before moving on to the next step . after adding all the ingredients the recipe asked you to put together before the chicken , check and make sure you have not missed a step . if all the steps are followed , you are ready to add the chicken . be careful not to touch the hot pot or liquid . you can add the chicken with tongs or a big spoon if you are more comfortable .

add cooked wonton noodles .
boil wonton noodles in a pot of boiling water . boil chicken broth in a separate pan to cook on stove . pour in soy sauce , scallions ( green onions ) and bok choy in with broth . then add in your chicken , and noodles that were cooked and put into chicken broth . put in a bowl and add in some green onions on top .

add cooked wonton noodles .
set a timer for 3 minutes . cook soup until timer alarms . add chicken and cooked wonton noodles to soup . set timer for another 3 minutes . let soup cook until timer alarms .

add cooked wonton noodles .
first you will mix the chicken with all the herbs and vegetables in the pot . next you will add the cooked wonton noodles to the pot . mix all ingredients together .

heat some oil in a pan .
place a pan on the stove burner , turn the burner on to medium high , or about three - quarters of the way around . pour your oil into the pan and let it sit . when the surface of the oil looks a little wavy , it 's ready .

heat some oil in a pan .
turn on the stove top to medium heat . place the pan onto the eye ( the heated circle ) or over the flame if you have a gas stove . watch the oil as it warms up and be sure to not let it smoke or burn .

heat some oil in a pan .
put a pan on the stove top burner . turn the stove top on halfway . pour a little oil in the pan , just enough to cover the bottom of the pan . in 1 minute the oil should be heated enough to start cooking .

add in green onion baby bok choy and minced garlic .
you can gently add your green onions that are chopped to small bite size pieces . add your cut up baby bok choy , this should be about the size of your finger tips . now add minced , or very finely chopped garlic .

add in green onion baby bok choy and minced garlic .
add the green onion into the pan . add the baby bok choy also on the pan . along with it add minced garlic in to it . mix altogether in a pan .

add in green onion baby bok choy and minced garlic .
add green onion . add baby bok choy . add minced garlic .

add in the cooked wonton noodles and mixed sauce .
after the veggies are cooked , carefully add the cooked wonton noodles and bean sprouts . give the noodles a good stir , making sure you mix everything together . slowly add your sauce to the noodles and stir together . cook for another two to three minutes while stirring the whole time . keep the noodles moving in the pan .

add in the cooked wonton noodles and mixed sauce .
now add the cooked wonton noodles . now add the mixed sauce .

add in the cooked wonton noodles and mixed sauce .
put the cooked wonton noodles in the bowl . mix in the sauce .

add some salt to the boiling water and add 13 oz spaghetti to cook .
once the water starts to boil add a pinch of salt to the water . take 13 oz of spaghetti noodles and place into the boiling water .

add some salt to the boiling water and add 13 oz spaghetti to cook .
boil the water . add salt to the boiling water . next add 13 oz of spaghetti to the water .

add some salt to the boiling water and add 13 oz spaghetti to cook .
take a large bowl and add some water and boil . place a small bowl inside the large bowl . add some salt in to the boiling water . take 13 oz spaghetti . add spaghetti in to the boiling water .

slice the guanciale .
clean the guanciale properly . with the help of a knife cut the guanciale in to thin large pieces . we need to cut it evenly to cook properly .

slice the guanciale .
get a knife . make sure someone around . get guanciale ready . cut it till thin . cook till brown .

slice the guanciale .
make sure to put a cutting board down . find a sharp knife , be careful ! slice the guanciale into thin slices .

fry the guanciale in the frying pan .
heat the frying pan . place guanciale into frying pan . cook until browned .

fry the guanciale in the frying pan .
take the meat and put it in the pan . mix it up while it cooks .

fry the guanciale in the frying pan .
add the guanciale in the frying pan . fry it until it is nicely browned .

mix egg yolks pecorino cheese and boiling water .
take a medium sized bowl and a spoon . take egg yolks in to the bowl . add some pecorino cheese in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of boiling water . mix everything in the bowl with the spoon .

mix egg yolks pecorino cheese and boiling water .
add the cheese to the egg yolks . use a ladle to add some boiling water . mix it using a fork .

mix egg yolks pecorino cheese and boiling water .
add some pecorino cheese into a clean dish . using a spoon , add some boiling water to the dish with the cheese . add egg yolks . mix well with a fork .

sprinkle some black pepper on the yolk mixture and mix well .
add some pepper to the yolk mixture . mix the pepper into the yolk well .

sprinkle some black pepper on the yolk mixture and mix well .
take a medium sized bowl . take an egg and add only yolk in to the bowl . add the pepper powder in to the yolk . take a clean spoon . mix the yolk and pepper with a spoon .

sprinkle some black pepper on the yolk mixture and mix well .
add some pepper in the yolk . mix the pepper and the yolk together .

drain the spaghetti and mix it with guanciale .
put the spaghetti in a strainer to drain the water from it . mix the spaghetti with guanciale .

drain the spaghetti and mix it with guanciale .
use a strainer to take all of the water out of the spaghetti . add the drained spaghetti to the guanciale in the pan .

drain the spaghetti and mix it with guanciale .
turn off the stove top burner with the spaghetti . place a colander in the sink . using hot mitts to pick up the pot , pour the spaghetti into the colander , place the pan onto a safe surface like a hot mat . pick up the colander from the sink and shake off any excess water . pour the spaghetti into the pan with the guanciale and mix the two together using a utensil .

mix egg yolk mixture with the spaghetti in the pan .
stir egg yolks in a bowl with a spoonful of water . pour the yolks in the pan .

mix egg yolk mixture with the spaghetti in the pan .
add egg mixture into the pan with spaghetti . mix the mixture into the spaghetti . add a little water if you want it to be creamy .

mix egg yolk mixture with the spaghetti in the pan .
take your mix of egg yolk and pour it into the spaghetti pan . take your stirring fork and stir the yolk in with the noodles . to make the mixture more creamy , if you like , add a bit of water .

add some pecorino cheese .
after the pasta is on the plate , sprinkle some pecorino cheese with your hand lightly on top . add some salt from shaker .

add some pecorino cheese .
using your hand , sprinkle a bit of pecorino cheese over the pasta . sprinkle a little bit of black pepper over the pasta as well .

add some pecorino cheese .
sprinkle cheese on top . grind black pepper on top .

add dry italian herbs .
add the dry italian herbs with your hands . make sure they cover the onions .

add dry italian herbs .
first , grab a frying pan and heat it up on the stove with a little bit of olive oil in it . next , place some sausages and onions into the pan . using your fingers , sprinkle a pinch of dry italian seasoning over the sausages .

add dry italian herbs .
sprinkle some dry italian herbs into the pan . spread evenly over the onions and hot dogs .

shake the pan .
shake the hot pan to move the onion to the bottom of the pan . lift the sausages up with your tongs .

shake the pan .
lift the sausage an rotate them around in the pan . shake the pan to get the onions to the bottom of the pan . place the sausages on top of the onions .

shake the pan .
now as they are frying , you want to lift up each sausage one at a time and shake the pan . do this for each sausage . this will make the onion fall to the bottom of the pan . careful the pan is hot !

add milk and mash potatoes .
pour in milk into the pan with the mashed potatoes . use the mashing tool to smash down the mashed potatoes . continue mashing until they are mixed well .

add milk and mash potatoes .
add milk to the pan . using a potato masher , push down the potatoes to mash them up .

add milk and mash potatoes .
hold the milk over the pot of potatoes . carefully pour the milk into the pot slowly .

add a little black pepper .
hold the black pepper grinder over the meat . turn the top to grind the pepper into the sausages .

add a little black pepper .
add some cracked pepper . spread even over the sausages as they cook . shake the sausage pan .

add a little black pepper .
continue frying the sausages . grind some black pepper onto the sausages while they are cooking . there is no need to add salt because sausages have salt already in them . shake the frying pan from time to time to get the sausages to roll and get brown all the way around .

fill second pot with peas mint salt sugar and water and boil .
put some water in another pot . add some peas , salt , some mint and sugar to the pot of water . bring the water to a boil .

fill second pot with peas mint salt sugar and water and boil .
pour the peas into a pot of water . add mint to the pot . add some salt to the mixture . put in 1 1/2 teaspoons of sugar . bring the water to boil and cook until the peas are soft .

fill second pot with peas mint salt sugar and water and boil .
take a pot and place it on the stove . add some water in to the pot . add some green peas in to the pot . add some mint leaves and add some salt in the water . boil the water in the pot .

add chopped tomato to onions and mix .
put in 3 spoonfuls of chopped tomato . mix all of the ingredients together with a spoon on low heat . add a bit of worcestershire sauce .

add chopped tomato to onions and mix .
use a spoon to add chopped tomatoes to the hot pan . turn the heat down to low and use a spoon to stir the tomato into the pan . add a splash of worcestershire sauce to the pan .

add chopped tomato to onions and mix .
add tomatoes with a spoon . using a spoon mix the mixture together .

add splash of worcestershire sauce and beef stock .
add 2 teaspoons of worcestershire sauce . put in 1/2 cup of beef stock into the frying pan . mix together the ingredients while it cooks .

add splash of worcestershire sauce and beef stock .
hold the worcestershire sauce over the pan . carefully pour a small bit of the sauce in the pan . pour the beef stock in carefully not to splash .

add splash of worcestershire sauce and beef stock .
measure about two tablespoons of worcestershire sauce into a small cup and pour it into the pan . measure about a cup of beef stock into a cup or pitcher and slowly pour it into the pan , being careful not to splash yourself .

remove sausages from pan .
use tongs to take the sausage out of the pan . put the sausage onto a plate .

remove sausages from pan .
grab and extra plate . grab tongs . use the tongs to remove the sausages . place the sausages on the plate . place the plate aside .

remove sausages from pan .
have a dish ready to place the sausages on . using a set of tongs , remove the sausages from the pan and place them in the dish .

add salt butter and nutmeg to the potatoes .
cut off some slices of a butter stick with a knife and put them in the pot . shake nutmeg in the pot on the potatoes .

add salt butter and nutmeg to the potatoes .
take a stick of butter and cut where it says on the butter wrapper 2 tbs . take the butter you just cut from the stick and cut that into smaller pieces . place the pieces of butter you just cut into the potatoes . take the salt shaker and shake 3 shakes of salt onto the potatoes . now take a cheese grater and a nutmeg nut and grate the nutmeg nut over the potatoes .

add salt butter and nutmeg to the potatoes .
cut about two tablespoons of butter into thin slices and add the slices of butter to the potatoes . add a small amount of salt and pepper to the potatoes . gently grate the nutmeg over the potatoes , using just enough to see the nutmeg coat some of the potatoes .

add a sliced onion to the sausage pan .
slice 1/2 of a brown onion . add the onion into the frying pan .

add a sliced onion to the sausage pan .
fry the sausage in a pan . take an onion and cut it in to thin slices . add the onions in to the sausage pan . fry the onions in the pan . mix sausage and onions in the pan .

add a sliced onion to the sausage pan .
cook sausage in pan . add sliced onion to the sausage pan .

take out mint from peas and add butter and salt then mash .
grab the mint out with some tongs . add some pieces of butter to the pot . add the salt to the pot . masher everything with a masher .

take out mint from peas and add butter and salt then mash .
using tongs , remove the mint leaves from the pan . get a colander and drain the water from the peas . put the peas back into the pan . add about a tablespoon of butter to the peas . add a little salt to the peas . get a masher and mash up the peas .

take out mint from peas and add butter and salt then mash .
take the mint leaves out of the pan containing the peas . drain out all the liquid from the pan containing the peas . add butter , salt and pepper to the peas . mash the peas using a masher .

add smoked bbq sauce and add sausages .
add a squirt ( about 3 tb ) of the smoked bbq sauce to the simmering liquid . using tongs , set the sausages back into the sauce to keep them hot . turn the fire off .

add smoked bbq sauce and add sausages .
add 3 tablespoons of smoked bbq sauce to your sauce . place sausage links into sauce to heat up .

add smoked bbq sauce and add sausages .
add smoking flavored barbecue sauce to food in pan . then add your sausages and stir around the sausages so the sauce is covering them . let cook so that the sauce mixture cooks into the sausages .

put potatoes and salt into a pot of water and boil .
use your hands and throw in the potatoes into the pot . pour salt in the pot . wait until the water begins to bubble up .

put potatoes and salt into a pot of water and boil .
put the potatoes using your hand into the pot . pour water over the potatoes .

put potatoes and salt into a pot of water and boil .
take four large peeled potatoes and cut them into quarters . place potatoes in a medium sized pot . fill pot with water until potatoes are covered . add about one tablespoon of salt . bring water to a boil .

add potatoes sausage onions and peas to plate .
make the boiled potatoes in to mashed potatoes . take a plate and add the mashed potatoes on the plate . add 2 roles of sausages on to the potatoes . boil the green peas and mash them in to a paste . add the green peas paste on the sausage .

add potatoes sausage onions and peas to plate .
add potatoes to the plate with a spoon . add sausages to the plate with a fork . add onions on top of the potatoes using a spoon . add the peas to the top of the onions using a spoon .

add potatoes sausage onions and peas to plate .
use a spoon and scoop potatoes onto the center of a plate . add sausage on top of the potatoes . then add onions . set peas on top of the onions .

add a little oil to a pan and add sausages on low heat .
pour a small bit of oil in the pan . turn the stove knob up to low . put some sausages in the pan .

add a little oil to a pan and add sausages on low heat .
set a frying pan on the stove and turn the heat to the ' low ' setting . add a small amount of oil to the pan . lift and tilt the pan to spread the oil out . when the pan is hot , carefully add the sausages to the pan one - by - one . they will sizzle loudly . wait a minute or two , then use tongs to roll the sausages over . wait another minute and continue to turn them over . you want to make each side is the same shade of brown .

add a little oil to a pan and add sausages on low heat .
pour a half of a teaspoon of oil into a hot pan . tilt the pan to spread the oil on the bottom of the pan . use your hands to add the sausages to the pan . cook the sausages over low heat and use tongs to turn them , once browned .

when the edges are brown and bubbles form flip the pancake .
take a pan on the stove and heat the pan . pour the pan cake batter in to the pan . when the bubbles form on the batter , take a spatula . flip the pancake to the other side . cook the pancake on the other side .

when the edges are brown and bubbles form flip the pancake .
when the edges of the pancake start to get a little brown the pancake is ready to be turned over to cook the other side . small bubbles on the top of the pancake also mean it is time to turn it over . use a spatula to turn the pancake over . push the spatula under the pancake , lift up and then turn the pancake over .

when the edges are brown and bubbles form flip the pancake .
watch the edges of the pancake . when you see the edges get brown use a spatula to scoop under the pancake . flip the pancake .

pour milk egg and oil in to the center and mix until smooth .
pour one cup of milk into the bowl . add one egg to the bowl . mix everything with a whisk .

pour milk egg and oil in to the center and mix until smooth .
put flour into the mixing bowl . measure one cup of milk with a measuring cup and add to bowl . beat an egg with a fork and add into bowl . measure two tablespoons of oil with a measuring spoon and add to bowl . mix the batter in the bowl until it is smooth .

pour milk egg and oil in to the center and mix until smooth .
pour the required amount of milk into the large bowl . crack the egg in a clean bowl and mix with a fork to blend it together . then add it to the large bowl . pour in the required amount of oil . slowly stir the batter to blend it together .

pour the batter onto a greased pan .
head a frying pan over medium heat , and lightly oil it . now pour a quarter cup of batter into the pan for each pancake . if using a frying pan , do one pancake at a time to keep them neat .

pour the batter onto a greased pan .
heat a frying pan over medium high heat . spread oil out over the pan . scoop 1/4 cup of batter onto the frying pan .

pour the batter onto a greased pan .
scoop the batter with a ladle . pour 1 ladle in the pan .

mix flour sugar baking powder and salt together in a bowl .
add a cup of all purpose flour to a large mixing bowl . add 2 table spoons of sugar , 2 table spoons of baking powder , and a tea spoon of salt to the flour . blend all together with a whisk , gently mixing everything together . form a well in the middle , an indention in the middle .

mix flour sugar baking powder and salt together in a bowl .
put flour in a bowl . put sugar in a bowl . put baking powder in a bowl . put salt in a bowl . mix it all together with a spoon .

mix flour sugar baking powder and salt together in a bowl .
add flour into a large bowl . add 2 tablespoons of sugar . pour in 2 tablespoons of baking powder . add 1 teaspoon of salt . use a whisk to mix everything together .

heat some oil in a pan .
put pan on the stove . add oil to wok . let the oil heat up .

heat some oil in a pan .
warm the wok up on the stove top . pour some oil into the wok .

heat some oil in a pan .
you 're going to turn on the stove and grab a medium size pot . now you 're going to grab the oil form your container and carefully pour it in the pot . leave it for a minute or two to heat up .

add onions ginger and garlic .
take a pan and add some oil in to the pan . cut ginger , onion , garlic in to thin strips . add cut onion in to the pan . now add cut ginger and garlic in to the pan . take a spatula and stir everything .

add onions ginger and garlic .
add sliced up onions and sliced up ginger and sliced up garlic .

add onions ginger and garlic .
add onions to hot pan . add ginger to hot pan . add garlic to hot pan .

stir and then add red bell pepper carrot bean sprouts and cabbage .
stir the ingredients in the pan . next add red bell peppers to pan . next add carrots and bean sprouts . last add the cabbage to the pan . gently stir the vegetables together as they cook .

stir and then add red bell pepper carrot bean sprouts and cabbage .
put red bell peppers , carrots , bean sprouts to pan . then add cabbage to the pan . use a large spoon to stir well .

stir and then add red bell pepper carrot bean sprouts and cabbage .
add red bell pepper , carrots , bean sprouts , and cabbage to the skillet . stir .

cover and cook .
put the lid on the pot to cover it . continue to cook .

cover and cook .
cook for about two minutes . this will allow the vegetables to soften a little and the flavors will mix together .

cover and cook .
cover the vegetables in the hot pot . cook them until they are soft .

add sugar salt pepper soy sauce and oyster sauce and then add noodles .
first add some sugar , salt and pepper to the hot wok . next add some soy sauce to the wok . then add in some oyster sauce . stir the ingredients . now add the noodles to the wok and stir .

add sugar salt pepper soy sauce and oyster sauce and then add noodles .
take a pan on a stove and add vegetables . add a teaspoon of salt and sugar in to the pan . add the pepper powder in to the pan . add a teaspoon of soy sauce and oyster sauce in to the pan . add noodles in to the pan and mix with the spatula .

add sugar salt pepper soy sauce and oyster sauce and then add noodles .
take the measuring cup and place it over the pan . drop the sugar into the pan . using a spoon , drop the salt and pepper into the pan . take the bowl containing the soy sauce and drop the sauce into the pan . take the bowl containing the noodles and drop the noodles into the pan . use a large spoon to move the noodles and sauce around in the pan .

heat oil in a pan .
wait until vegetables are cool . put about 2 inches of oil in a pan . place the pan on a burner . turn the burner on . wait until the oil is hot .

heat oil in a pan .
put oil in a pan and heat it until it 's hot . have an adult help - oil gets really hot , much hotter than water , and can burn !

heat oil in a pan .
place the pan on the stove with oil in it . then turn the stove on to get the oil hot .

mix corn flour and water to make paste .
put corn flour into a small bowl . add water to the bowl . stir the mixture to make the paste .

mix corn flour and water to make paste .
put corn flour in small bowl . add a little water . mix into a paste using spoon .

mix corn flour and water to make paste .
use a a small bowl and put some corn flour in it . add water to the bowl and stir till it becomes a paste .

take a spring roll wrapper and put the some vegetable mixture on it .
spread out a spring roll wrapper on flat surface . take a large spoonful of vegetable mixture from pan . carefully place mixture on top of spring roll close to one of the corners of the wrapper . you will begin rolling from the side with the mixture .

take a spring roll wrapper and put the some vegetable mixture on it .
add the vegetables to the spring roll wrapper . pull up the corner of the wrapper and fold it over the top of the vegetables .

take a spring roll wrapper and put the some vegetable mixture on it .
take the thin dough and lay it flat . get a spoonful of veggie mix . put it onto the thin layer of dough . spread it around a bit towards the top corner . roll the top corner over it and keep rolling the mixture .

roll it up brush some paste on edge and close it to a roll .
fold each side of the rolled food toward the middle . use the brush to spread a bit of _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ on the pointed end of the roll . finish rolling up the dough to close .

roll it up brush some paste on edge and close it to a roll .
roll the flour with the stuffed ingredients . take it in two sides . apply some corn flour paste using a brush . and cover or close it so that edges stick together . this forms a cylinder shape .

roll it up brush some paste on edge and close it to a roll .
after you roll the wrap into a log shape , make sure to leave a triangle shape with the rest of the unrolled wrap . take each side of your rolled log shape and fold inward . it will look like a smaller log with the open flap still showing . now the wrapper looks like an open envelope . take your brush and dip it in the paste . gently paint the paste on the open part of your envelope shape . take your small log shape and roll it toward the open , unwrapped part of your envelope . ( like you 're rolling the envelope from the bottom up . all done !

deep fry the rolls in oil .
once you have carefully have rolled and folded , slowly lower them into the oil . make sure you keep your fingers out of the oil , as it is very hot . put up to two rolls into the oil and once and let them deep fry . slowly turn them over a few time using a slotted spoon or spatula . let them fry until they are golden brown in color .

deep fry the rolls in oil .
when the oil is really hot , gently put the rolls into the pan . " be really careful - oil can sometimes spit " " drops out which can be painful . have an adult help if you need it ! " " . " when they 're a golden brown color , take them out of the pan .

deep fry the rolls in oil .
take a pan on a stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . now add the spring rolls in to the oil . deep fry the rolls in the oil .

add onions tomatoes and water to a pressure cooker and cook .
place a pressure cooker on a stove top burner . add 3 onions and 3 tomatoes to the pressure cooker . add a half cup of water to the pressure cooker . seal the pressure cooker with its lid and whistle attachment . maintain heat under the pressure cooker until the cookers whistle sounds two times .

add onions tomatoes and water to a pressure cooker and cook .
too a pressure cooker add the tomatoes and the onions . add half a cup of water . cook for two minutes .

add onions tomatoes and water to a pressure cooker and cook .
with an adult 's help , add onions , tomatoes and 1/2 cup of water to a pressure cooker . with an adult 's help , put on the pressure cooker lid on the pressure cooker and pressure cook the onions , tomatoes , and water for two minutes . after the tomatoes , onion , and water have pressure cooked for two minutes , with the help of an adult you can remove the lid . add the cooked onion and tomato ... .

add the onion and tomato to a blender and blend .
cut the onion in to pieces . cut the tomatoes in to pieces . take a blender and add onions and tomatoes in to the blender jar . close the lid of the blender jar . blend them in to fine paste .

add the onion and tomato to a blender and blend .
place the onion and the tomato in the blender . place the lid on the blender and make sure it is tight . turn the blender on to the highest setting . blend until the mix looks like a liquid .

add the onion and tomato to a blender and blend .
put the tomato in the blender . add the onion to the blender as well . make sure the lid is on extra tight - you do n't want to accidentally paint the ceilings ! turn the blender on and let it mix everything until it 's super smooth . you might have to blend it a few times to make sure !

add oil cumin seeds ginger garlic paste garam masala coriander powder chili powder and turmeric powder to a pan .
add oil and cumin seeds to pot and heat till sizzling . add pinch of cumin seeds , ginger garlic paste and let cook for a few seconds . add in rest of dry spices , garam masala powder , coriander powder , chili powder , and turmeric .

add oil cumin seeds ginger garlic paste garam masala coriander powder chili powder and turmeric powder to a pan .
pour a little bit of oil into a pan . take out all of your spices and start to add them one by one . spices you should have are cumin seeds , ginger , garlic pace , garam masala powder , coriander powder , chili powder , and turmeric powder . put all of these spices into the oil and then turn on the heat . mix it all together and let it get hot !

add oil cumin seeds ginger garlic paste garam masala coriander powder chili powder and turmeric powder to a pan .
get a large pan and put 2 tablespoons of oil and 2 tablespoons of ghee . ghee . place the pan on the stove and turn the heat to medium high and let the oil and heat until hot . add the cumin seeds , and ginger garlic paste . stir with a large mixing spoon . add the garam masala powder , coriander powder , chili powder , and turmeric powder . stir the ingredients together well .

add the tomato and onion paste to the pan .
add the tomato and onion which you already made to the pan . pour the paste that you made already into the pan that we put the spices in .

add the tomato and onion paste to the pan .
take some onions and tomatoes . add them to the blender and grind them in to a paste . take the paste in a bowl . take the pan on the stove . add the paste in to the pan .

add the tomato and onion paste to the pan .
add the tomato and onion paste to the pan . stir .

add the cooked chickpeas to the pan .
pour the chickpeas into the pan . you may use canned chickpeas .

add the cooked chickpeas to the pan .
add the cooked chick peas to the pan . you can also buy canned chick peas to help save on cooking time .

add the cooked chickpeas to the pan .
cook the oil off the top of the pan . next add the cooked chickpeas to the pan .

add dried fenugreek leaves to the pan .
take the bowl of dried fenugreek leaves . slowly add the fenugreek leaves to the mixture . add salt to your personal taste .

add dried fenugreek leaves to the pan .
dried fenugreek leaves can be sprinkled on the top of the items in the pot . add some salt till it tastes flavorful . place a cover on the pot . boil the contents of the pot . boiling is when the contents are hot enough to bubble .

add dried fenugreek leaves to the pan .
put two dried fenugreek leaves in pot . add salt to taste .

add sweetened condensed milk to the pan .
pour the sweetened condensed milk into the pan while it is boiling . no need to stir .

add sweetened condensed milk to the pan .
open can of sweetened condensed milk . add one and a half tablespoons of sweetened condensed milk to pot .

add sweetened condensed milk to the pan .
cook your soup in the pot . add 1 and 1/2 tablespoons of sweetened condensed milk . stir into soup .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice .
when the curry is done , sprinkle chopped coriander over the top . squeeze half a lime over the top of the curry so the juice falls into it .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice .
when the dish is done cooking add in fresh chopped coriander leaves . then squeeze a lime over the pot to add the juice from the lime into the dish .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice .
cut up your leafy herb so it is in small pieces . add the herb to the curry . cut a lemon in half . squeeze the lemon half into the soup .

heat some oil in a pan and cook diced onion and garlic in it .
take a large pot and place with medium heat . add some oil in to the pan . take one onion and cut onion in to small pieces . add the onion in to the hot oil . mix the onions with the oil and cook .

heat some oil in a pan and cook diced onion and garlic in it .
grab a deep pan . turn the burner on at about halfway ( for medium heat ) . put about a tablespoon of oil in the pan . when the oil is hot put 1 medium onion that you cut into small squares in the pan . put 3 pieces of garlic that you cut into small pieces in the pan .

heat some oil in a pan and cook diced onion and garlic in it .
turn on the stove . add a little bit of oil in the pan and place it on the burner . you 're going to cut an onion into small cubes . add the onions to the pan . add three cloves of garlic .

add chopped carrot and celery .
put chopped carrots in the pan . put chopped celery in the pan .

add chopped carrot and celery .
chop up 1 carrot and add to the pan . chop up a stalk of celery and add it to the pan .

add chopped carrot and celery .
cut the carrot and celery in to small pieces . add the carrots and celery in to a pan . mix them with the onions in the pan . close the lid of the pan . cook it for 10 - 15 min till they become soft .

add chicken stock tomato paste and diced tomatoes .
add 2 cups of chicken stock in to the cooking bowl . add 400 g of tomato paste in to the bowl . take one big tomato and cut it in to cube size pieces . add the cut tomato in to the cooking pan . mix everything .

add chicken stock tomato paste and diced tomatoes .
add chicken stock . add tomato paste . add diced tomatoes .

add chicken stock tomato paste and diced tomatoes .
mix it into 1 liter of water , add it to the pot . add a can of tomatoes . add a can of tomato paste or sauce . cut up 4 big tomatoes .

season with fresh basil salt pepper and balsamic vinegar .
wait until the soup boil . grind some pepper and put into the soup . cut a handful of fresh basil into small pieces and add into the soup . add some balsamic vinegar into the soup . mix altogether and have it tasty .

season with fresh basil salt pepper and balsamic vinegar .
put fresh basil in the pan . put salt and pepper in the pan . put balsamic vinegar in the pan .

season with fresh basil salt pepper and balsamic vinegar .
add in a little bit of salt . add in a little pepper . add in a handful of fresh leafy basil . pour in a little balsamic vinegar .

blend everything in a food processor .
pour the soup into the blender . put the lid on tightly so that no liquid can come out . place the pitcher of the blender securely on its base . with the blender sealed on top and sitting on its base , turn the blender on and run it on high for 60 seconds . check the soup to see that it is the thickness you desire . it if it too thick , add a little water and run it for 10 seconds at a time until it has right thickness . serve the soup hot by pouring into individual bowls .

blend everything in a food processor .
blend on high , for about a minute . you want it to be nice and smooth . if it gets too thick , add a little water , and blend again to help thin everything out .

blend everything in a food processor .
take everything and put it into the food processor . turn the food processor on the high setting for a minute until it turns liquidy . if the liquid is too thick , add a little bit of water and mix it in the blender on the high setting again .

cook the boxty with the bacon .
grab a plan . place bacon into the pan . turn on heat . cook bacon . add bacon to the boxty .

cook the boxty with the bacon .
put the boxty in the pan with the bacon using a spatula . let the boxty cook in the bacon grease .

cook the boxty with the bacon .
tear bacon into semi small strips . add the bacon to the boxty to give it the bacon taste .

roll a ball of potato mixture put it on the greased pan press it and fry .
using your hands roll the potato mix into a ball . put the potato mix on the hot pan . use your spatula to press the potato down . let your potato fry on the pan .

roll a ball of potato mixture put it on the greased pan press it and fry .
make a ball out of shredded potato mixture . put the ball carefully on the greased hot surface of a frying pan . press each ball into a flat patty using the spatula . use the spatula to make sure they do n't stick and later to turn them over . be careful , only brown them . oil is very hot and must be used with caution .

roll a ball of potato mixture put it on the greased pan press it and fry .
take the potato mixture in a bowl . roll the mixture in to a ball . place it in pan with oil . press it gently with a spatula . fry the potato ball .

heat oil and butter in a pan and cook bacon in another pan .
take your butter and add it into a pan along with some oil . let the oil heat up and the butter melt . careful , the pan is hot . now take your bacon , and get ready to add it in the pan as well .

heat oil and butter in a pan and cook bacon in another pan .
take two different frying pans and place them on the stove . heat both of the pans . in one pan , put the oil and heat it . once the oil is heated , add the butter . put the bacon slices in the other pan .

heat oil and butter in a pan and cook bacon in another pan .
before you start to cook , you will want to slightly preheat your pans , so that when you do put in the oil and butter , it starts to sizzle and heat up immediately . the oil will go in first , and when it is sizzling , you are ready to start . take you ingredients to the counter , including the butter and the mix . using a knife or spatula , take your butter to the stove and slice off about an ounce of butter . open your package of bacon and pull out the desired amount to cook .

crack and fry the eggs .
carefully crack the eggs and place them on the frying pan . be carefully not to break the yolk . fry the eggs with the yolk side facing up .

crack and fry the eggs .
take an egg and tap it on a surface to crack . pull open the egg dropping the egg in the pan . cook the egg like this to fry .

crack and fry the eggs .
crack the eggs into the pan . fry the eggs in the pan .

add flour salt pepper and oil .
add flour into the bowl . add salt into the bowl . grind some pepper into the bowl . add some oil into the mixture . mix all the ingredients together .

add flour salt pepper and oil .
take a spoon and scoop in some flour . add salt pepper and oil . use the big scoop to mix it around .

add flour salt pepper and oil .
add 2 spoonfuls of flour to bowl . use a pepper grinder and turn it about 5 times over the bowl . using a fresh salt grinder , do the same about 5 times over bowl . drizzle a little bit of oil into the bowl and finish mixing .

add the potatoes to the bowl and grate cooked potatoes into it and mix together .
peel the potato . wash the potato . put the potato on fire and add water . add ingredients . allow potato to cook .

add the potatoes to the bowl and grate cooked potatoes into it and mix together .
pour the potatoes into a new bowl . take a grater and a potato . rub the potato on the grater into the bowl to shave it .

add the potatoes to the bowl and grate cooked potatoes into it and mix together .
add the potatoes into a bowl . grate the other potatoes to the bowl . mix both together and combine it well .

plate boxty cooked bacon and fried egg .
take a spatula and slide it under the cooked bacon . lift and bring it over the plate , sliding it off onto the plate . repeat with the rest of the bacon and eggs .

plate boxty cooked bacon and fried egg .
remove the boxty from the pan with a slatted metal spatula . place to boxty on to the plate . next using the same spatula remove the fried egg from the pan . place the egg on the plate next to the boxty .

plate boxty cooked bacon and fried egg .
use your spatula to remove the cooked bacon from the pan . set the bacon gently on the plate . do the same thing with the boxty setting it next to the bacon . finally , with the last part of the plate , set your fried egg , so it makes a good presentation .

squeeze the potatoes .
take a big bowl . take a strainer . add the grated potatoes in to the strainer . press the potatoes with the hand . squeeze the juice out of potatoes in to the bowl .

squeeze the potatoes .
rest the potatoes on top of the pan . using your hand , mash the potatoes so they are tight .

squeeze the potatoes .
put the shredded potatoes into a strainer . use your hands to squeeze as much water out of the potatoes as you can . you will want to squeeze the water out over a bowl or over the sink .

peel and grate potatoes into a bowl .
take two potatoes and clean it properly . peel the potatoes properly . with the help of a grater . grate the potatoes into the bowl .

peel and grate potatoes into a bowl .
first peel your potatoes . use a course cheese grater , the one with the bigger holes . place the grater into a bowl and grate the potatoes going in an up and down motion quickly . be careful not to grate your fingers once the potato gets smaller . tap the cheese grater on your bowl to make sure all the potato ends up in your bowl .

peel and grate potatoes into a bowl .
peel the potatoes carefully with a peeler . hold a grater into a bowl . hold a potato in your other hand . rub the potato on the grater to shave pieces off in the bowl .

mix in butter .
use a spoon and scoop in the butter . mix everything together with the spoon .

mix in butter .
using a spoon put some unsalted butter into the pan . using the spoon mix the butter together in with the rest of the mix .

mix in butter .
put a little bit of unsalted butter in the pasta pan . use a large spoon to mix the butter in the pan .

blend the tomatoes .
take some tomatoes . add the tomatoes in to the blender . close the lid of the blender . turn on the blender . blend the tomatoes in to the fine paste .

blend the tomatoes .
use a spoon to put some of the tomatoes into a blender . place the lid on the blender and slowly blend the tomatoes . be sure not to over blend the tomatoes . add about one tablespoon of tomato paste to the blender .

blend the tomatoes .
use a spoon and scoop the tomatoes into the blender cup . cover the lid on the blender and hold the lid down . press the blend button .

crush the garlic then cook it in a pan with oil .
take 8 to 10 cloves of garlic and crush them . you can use the pan to crush them if you want . add olive oil to the pan . put the garlic in the pan . let the garlic cook .

crush the garlic then cook it in a pan with oil .
put the garlic on the counter . using a pan smack the garlic with the pan . put the garlic in the pan . put the oil into the pan . with a spoon stir the oil and garlic .

crush the garlic then cook it in a pan with oil .
take about 8 to 10 individual cloves of garlic . hit with pan to break them open . peel of skin of garlic . add to pot to saute in extra virgin olive oil .

add vodka to the sauce .
hold the bottle of vodka over the pot . carefully pour some vodka in the pot .

add vodka to the sauce .
pour vodka into sauce simmer . stir with a long handled spoon over medium heat .

add vodka to the sauce .
open the bottle of vodka . carefully pour the alcohol into the sauce . get a spoon . stir the vodka and sauce together . let the sauce simmer .

add tomato paste to the blender and blend .
put a spoonful of tomato paste into the blender . blend until smooth .

add tomato paste to the blender and blend .
add tomato paste to the blender for a more concentrated tomato flavor . blend the tomato paste with the other ingredients . we will water down the tomato paste later , so we want to have lots of flavor available .

add tomato paste to the blender and blend .
take a spoon and spoon in some tomato paste into the blender cup . close the blender and press the blend button .

transfer the pasta to a bowl and top with cheese and parsley .
hold the pan of pasta and get a spoon . hold the pan over a plate and scoop the pasta out slowly with a spoon . shake some cheese and parsley on top of the pasta .

transfer the pasta to a bowl and top with cheese and parsley .
bring the pan with your cooked pasta carefully over the bowl you are going to serve it in . pour your cooked pasta into the large bowl . sprinkle a large amount of grated parmesan cheese over the pasta . add a pinch of fresh parsley to the top and sprinkle that right on top to finish your dish !

transfer the pasta to a bowl and top with cheese and parsley .
with a spoon take out the pasta from the pan . add cheese on top of the pasta . add parsley on top of the dish .

add the tomato salt black pepper and red pepper flakes .
add your tomatoes to the hot pan , but be careful to get close to the pan so it does n't splatter you . the garlic will flavor the tomato puree , but you must still add seasonings . add salt , black pepper and red pepper flakes until it tastes the way you want . if you like , you may use kosher salt , which is chunkier and a little easier to handle .

add the tomato salt black pepper and red pepper flakes .
ad tomatoes to the pan . add salt with your fingers to the pan . add pepper with your fingers into the pan . add red pepper flakes into the pan with your fingers .

add the tomato salt black pepper and red pepper flakes .
hold the blender cup of blended tomatoes closely over the pan and pour tomatoes into hot pan . sprinkle kosher salt and black pepper into pan . sprinkle red pepper flakes into pan . make sure you cook your penne pasta that has salt in it .

mix in cheese .
pour some parmesan cheese into the sauce . use the spoon to stir the cheese into the sauce . allow the cheese to thicken the sauce .

mix in cheese .
add grated cheese to pasta and sauce in a pan on the stove . keep some cheese to sprinkle on top when you eat it . mix the cheese in by stirring with a spoon . this helps the sauce get thicker . ready to eat !

mix in cheese .
take a pot on the stove . cook the ingredients in the pot . take some cheese in a bowl . add the cheese to the pot . mix the cheese with the contents of the pot .

stir in cream .
hold the cream over the pan . pour the cream in the pan slowly so you do n't splash .

stir in cream .
measure the right amount of cream . add cream to pan of sauce . stir the cream and sauce together . check the time remaining on pasta .

stir in cream .
take a pot on the stove . cook the ingredients in the pot . take a jar of cream . add some cream in to the cooking pot . mix the cream in the pot .

drain the pasta and add to the sauce .
using a towel , grasp the handle of the strainer and lift the pasta out of the water . allow the pasta to remain in strainer until all water is drained off , shake it a few times to ensure it is well drained . gently pour the pasta into the pan containing your sauce , if you are not careful the hot sauce can splash back onto you . stir the pasta in the pan and make sure that the pasta is all nicely coated with sauce . keep over low heat to prevent the sauce from burning and the pasta from overcooking .

drain the pasta and add to the sauce .
using a colander , which is a bowl with holes in it , drain the extra water out of the pasta that you just boiled . do this by lifting the colander up by the handle , which is hot , so use a potholder or towel to touch the handle . once you get all of the extra water out of the noodles , carefully pour the noodles into the pan that you have your sauce cooking in . allow the noodles to cook the rest of the way in the sauce , because you want to take them out of the boiling water while they are still a little hard ( also known as al dente ) .

drain the pasta and add to the sauce .
take a large pot and place it on the stove . cook the pasta in the water . drain the water from the pasta . cook the sauce in another pan . add the pasta in to the sauce .

remove the garlic .
grab a large spoon with holes in it . in the pan , look for the large pieces of garlic . scoop out the garlic pieces with the large spoon . leave behind as much of the sauce as you can . place the garlic to the side on a plate .

remove the garlic .
use your spoon and fish the garlic out of the pan . set the garlic on a plate .

remove the garlic .
take your slotted spoon and a bowl . go to your pot on the stove . use your slotted spoon to get the garlic cloves from the sauce . try to find most of the garlic cloves and place them in your bowl .

pour the eggs into the pan .
hold the egg bowl over the pan . slowly tilt the bowl and pour the eggs into the pan .

pour the eggs into the pan .
get either a fork or a whisk . most chefs use a whisk , but if all you have is a fork , that will work just fine . whip the eggs until the yolks and whites are well mixed , then stop to examine them . you should see some air bubbles in your egg mixture . the air bubbles will change the way the egg cooks , so it 's very important to have bubbles for this recipe . if you do n't see any bubbles , whip the eggs for another twenty seconds , and then examine them again . when your egg mixture has bubbles , gently pour it into the buttered pan .

pour the eggs into the pan .
finish whisking the eggs . pour the eggs into the pan .

crack two eggs into a bowl .
grab two eggs . hold one egg in one hand and knock on side of bowl until a small horizontal crack appears . place thumbs between crack and force egg open over bowl . dump yolk and whites into the bowl . repeat again for second egg .

crack two eggs into a bowl .
take two eggs out of the fridge . crack two eggs into a small bowl .

crack two eggs into a bowl .
take one plate and one bowl . take 2 eggs and keeps them neatly in a plate . crack 1 egg by hitting it on the edge of the bowl . open the cracked egg in the bowl . do the same with egg 2 .

add salt and pepper to the eggs .
pinch some salt and pepper into your hands . sprinkle the salt and pepper on the eggs .

add salt and pepper to the eggs .
take a pinch of salt and sprinkle on top . then take a pinch of pepper and sprinkle on top .

add salt and pepper to the eggs .
sprinkle a little salt onto the top of the eggs . then grind a little black pepper over the top .

push the egg into the center of the pan .
use a paddle or spatula to push the egg . push the edges of the egg to the middle of the pan .

push the egg into the center of the pan .
using a spatula , push the egg in the pan from on side of the pan to the other side . as you push , the egg will start to cook , beginning to look like a scrambled egg . keep using the spatula to push the egg around the pan . push slowly with the spatula so the egg stays in the pan as it cooks .

push the egg into the center of the pan .
use your large spoon to carefully pull the sides of the egg to the middle of the pan . do this slowly , gently , and just keep pulling different sides into the middle of the egg . continue to move the egg around in the pan until it is done cooking .

place the butter in a hot pan .
heat the pan up on the stove . place the butter on the pan when the pan is hot .

place the butter in a hot pan .
first we will place our butter in the pan . use your finger , or shake the pan and let the butter move around . this will help it spread as it melts . just be careful , the pan is very hot .

place the butter in a hot pan .
choose a small pan and place it on the stove burner . turn on the stove burner to medium - high heat . while pan heats up , cut a tbsp of butter from the stick using a knife . using caution , place the butter in the hot pan . watch for the butter to create small bubbles in the hot pan .

whisk the eggs with a fork .
now we can go ahead and whip up the eggs . take a fork and whip the eggs until you see lots of bubbles in the egg . this will make them extra fluffy .

whisk the eggs with a fork .
take a small bowl . break open 2 eggs . add the eggs in the bowl . take a spoon . whisk the eggs in the bowl .

whisk the eggs with a fork .
put two eggs into a bowl . use a fork to whisk the eggs . continue to stir until the egg yolks are mixed together well .

whisk the eggs and place the bowl over a pan of water .
place two egg yolks into a large mixing bowl . using a large whisk , begin to rapidly mix the eggs . then , place the bowl over a boiling pot of water and continue to whisk .

whisk the eggs and place the bowl over a pan of water .
put some water in a pan and put it on the stove . turn the stove on low to simmer the water . crack two eggs into a glass bowl just bigger than your pan and throw away the shells . stir eggs with a whisk until mixed really well . set the glass bowl on the top of the pan on the stove .

whisk the eggs and place the bowl over a pan of water .
add 2 eggs to a bowl . use the whisk to stir the eggs very well . put the bowl over a pan of simmering hot water .

stir butter into the eggs .
now take your pan of simmering water , and place the mixing bowl on top of the pan . this will heat up the ingredients in the bowl . now just add some butter to your eggs . whisk the butter into the eggs . now keep adding small amounts of butter and keep stirring it in and whisking it . do this until your butter is all mixed in .

stir butter into the eggs .
take a big bowl and break open some eggs . mix the eggs properly . take a pot and boil the water in it . now place the bowl of eggs on the boiling water pot . add some butter in to the eggs and mix it properly .

stir butter into the eggs .
add butter to the bowl . use the whisk to stir the butter into the sauce . repeat this , adding more butter , after the butter has been whisked .

squeeze lemon juice into the sauce .
take a knife and cut a lemon in half . squeeze the lemon over the bowl , making the juice go through your hand . let the juice go in the bowl , but catch any seeds in your hand because you do n't want the seeds in the mixture .

squeeze lemon juice into the sauce .
roll the lemon on a hard surface to loosen the juice . cut the lemon and squeeze the juice into the bowl . squeeze it into your hand , so you can catch any of the seeds before they go into the bowl .

squeeze lemon juice into the sauce .
put a whole lemon on a cutting board . cut lemon in half . next squeeze 1 teaspoon of lemon juice into bowl . squeeze the lemon through your hand to collect any pits .

add salt to the sauce and mix .
add a few finger pinches of sea salt . use your whisk to stir the bowl . it should remain thick as your stir .

add salt to the sauce and mix .
to add flavor , we will add a pinch of sea salt into our eggs . you can also add some pepper if you like , but not everyone prefers this . now take you whisk and begin mixing you salt and any other seasoning in . do n't go to fast or you may spill the mixture .

add salt to the sauce and mix .
gather ingredients . mix ingredients in bowl with a wire whisk . use sea salt to make your mixture taste better .

add vinegar and salt to the pot of water .
put one tablespoon of white wine vinegar in the pot of water . add a pinch of salt to the water and vinegar in the pot .

add vinegar and salt to the pot of water .
find the vinegar . open the vinegar and add a tablespoon to the pot . find the salt . add a small amount of salt between your fingers . stir in the ingredients .

add vinegar and salt to the pot of water .
add water in a pot halfway . turn on stove to heat water in pot . after boiling , add vinegar and salt . add eggs . lower down temperature of stove .

crack an egg into a cup and then drop the egg into the water .
boil water in a pot . crack an egg into a cup with a handle , like a coffee mug . hold the handle of the cup and slowly lower towards the boiling water . gently tilt the cup so the egg slides gently gently into the boiling water .

crack an egg into a cup and then drop the egg into the water .
lightly hit the egg on a hard surface to crack it . pull the shell open where it 's cracked open over the water so it falls in .

crack an egg into a cup and then drop the egg into the water .
crack an egg against the side of a cup . be careful to only drop the yolk of the egg into the cup . pick out any pieces of shell that might get in . drop the egg into the water .

layer ham on the english muffins .
set the bottom bread end of the muffin on the table . place the rolled up ham on top of the bread . put 3 pieces of ham on each bread .

layer ham on the english muffins .
take the english muffins from the bag and open two of them . you may need to use a butter knife to open them if stuck together . place the english muffins open side up . take sliced ham from a bag and roll it into tubes . place three tubes of ham on each english muffin bottom .

layer ham on the english muffins .
put english muffins in the toaster to toast . put toasted english muffin on a cutting board . roll the slices of ham . put the rolled ham slices on the toasted english muffins . put poached egg on top of ham .

place the poached egg on the layer of ham .
gently set the poached egg on top of the biscuit . the egg should be on top of the layer of ham .

place the poached egg on the layer of ham .
poached eggs go right on top of the ham on the ham sandwich . the hollandaise sauce is going to bring it together with the egg and the ham .

place the poached egg on the layer of ham .
pick up the poached egg very carefully . place an egg on top of the ham rolls on each piece of bread .

pour the sauce on top of the egg .
use a spoon to put the sauce on top of each egg . then top each with some chives .

pour the sauce on top of the egg .
use a small spoon to scoop out the sauce . place the sauce on top of the egg .

pour the sauce on top of the egg .
using a small spoon , scoop some sauce out of the bowl . using the spoon full of sauce , spread the sauce on top of the egg .

top with chopped chives .
take a chive and hold it over your sandwiches . with scissors , snip away at the chive while holding it over the sandwiches . sprinkle a tad of black pepper on each sandwich .

top with chopped chives .
take your scissors and cut the chives . take the cut chives and place them on top . finally , add some black pepper to the top .

top with chopped chives .
put the sauce on top of the egg . then add cut up fresh chives to the top .

spray cooking oil on the pan .
get a can of spray cooking oil . spray the oil on the pan be careful not to spray outside of it .

spray cooking oil on the pan .
spray cooking oil onto a frying pan . set the pan on the stove and cook over medium heat .

spray cooking oil on the pan .
butter each slice of bread on one side only . place a skillet on the stove and turn the flame on the stove to medium heat . use a spray can of cooking oil and spray the oil on the entire pan .

flip the sandwich over .
once the sandwich has cooked on the first side , slide a spatula under the sandwich until it 's under the center of the bread . life the spatula up a couple inches above the pan , and quickly flip it over so you can brown the other side .

flip the sandwich over .
put some tomato sauce on the sandwich bread . spread butter on the other piece of sandwich bread . put the bread you buttered on top of the one with the tomato sauce . make sure to keep the butter side on the outside . after the bread cooks for a little bit , take the spatula and carefully flip the sandwich over .

flip the sandwich over .
add a piece of buttered bread . take a plastic spatula and slide it under the sandwich . lift and flip the sandwich , place it back in the pan .

add a layer of bread cheese and pepperoni .
place the bread on top . place the cheese on top of the bread . place pepperoni on top of the cheese .

add a layer of bread cheese and pepperoni .
heat the pan . add a piece of bread . place cheese on bread with marinara sauce . add another slice of bread on top of that . add some more cheese , some pepperoni and marinara sauce on top of that piece of bread . top with another piece of bread .

add a layer of bread cheese and pepperoni .
add a layer of bread . now add 2 slices of cheese on the bread . cut some pepperoni in to small slices . take the pepperoni in a bowl . add the pepperoni slices on the cheese .

place cheese and pepperoni on the bread .
take a pan and heat the pan . add a slice of bread on the pan . add 2 slices of mozzarella cheese on the bread . add slices of pepperoni on the cheese . add some sauce on the pepperoni .

place cheese and pepperoni on the bread .
place buttered bread on the pan . add 2 slices of mozzarella cheese . next put pepperonis on top of the cheese . then add 1/4 cup of marinara sauce on top of the cheese and pepperonis .

place cheese and pepperoni on the bread .
put the buttered bottom slice of bread onto the hot pan . on top of the bread add 2 slices of mozzarella cheese . add half pepperonis on top of the cheese . add 1/4 cup of marinara sauce on top of the half pepperonis .

cut the pepperoni in half .
using your knife to carefully cut the pepperoni in half . cut 10 - 16 pepperonis .

cut the pepperoni in half .
take the pepperoni out of the refrigerator . take out a smooth knife from the knife block . take out a cutting board . one by one , use the knife on the cutting board to cut each pepperoni in half . place all cut pepperonis to the side and continue to cut all of the pepperonis in half .

cut the pepperoni in half .
get 10 - 16 pepperonis . place a few in a stack on a cutting board . cut them in half with a sharp knife . repeat until all the pepperonis are cut .

spread marinara sauce on top .
take a spoon and scoop some marinara sauce on top carefully . use the spoon to spread it and cover the top nicely .

spread marinara sauce on top .
place your skillet on your hot plate with the handle safely turned to the side . have your ingredients handy . the slice of white bread will be placed first in your non - stick skillet , followed by a slice of cheese . next , cut three slices of pepperoni in half on a cutting board with a sharp knife , and place these six halves of meat on top of the cheese . next place the quarter cup of marina sauce on top of the pepperonis , spreading with a spoon almost to the edges of the bread . leave a small rim of empty surface around the marina so that as the marina spreads it will have room to spread without leaking out of your sandwich as it cooks . finally , you will cover the this sandwich with another slice of un - buttered white bread .

spread marinara sauce on top .
with one slice of bread and 1 slice of cheese in a frying pan , add a few pepperonis on top . on top of the pepperonis , add 1/4 cup of marinara sauce and spread it around with a spoon . put your second piece of ( unbuttered bread on top ) .

place bread on top of the sandwich .
on top of the bread in the pan , add a slice of cheese , pepperoni , and 1/4 cup marinara sauce . then take another piece of bread that has been buttered on one side and place it on top of the other one . make sure the side of bread with butter is facing up when you do this .

place bread on top of the sandwich .
first put butter on one side of each piece of bread . next place the piece of bread butter side down into the warm skillet . then place the cheese , pepperoni , and 1/4 cup of marinara sauce on the piece of bread in the skillet . then place your other piece of buttered bread on the sandwich butter side up . last flip the sandwich , let cook until golden brown or approx 3 - 5 min depending on how hot your skillet is . enjoy !

place bread on top of the sandwich .
add 1/4 cup of marinara sauce . put a slice of buttered bread on top . flip over with a spatula and cook on the opposite side .

spread butter on the bread .
take a butter knife . scoop butter up with it and spread it over the 2 slices of bread evenly .

spread butter on the bread .
lay out 3 pieces of bread . with a knife cover 2 with soft butter . lay another piece of bread to the side . grease frying pan . put pan on stove over med heat .

spread butter on the bread .
set the bread on the table . use a knife to put butter on the bread . spread the butter over one side of the bread . do this for two pieces of bread .

spread marinara sauce on top .
place the sliced pepperoni to your cheese covered bread that is already in the pot . now spread 1/4 cup of marinara sauce with your spoon , covering the pepperoni and cheese . now add your buttered bread slice .

spread marinara sauce on top .
take your marinara sauce and get a spoonful of it . now spread the sauce over the top of the cheese and pepperonis . keep doing so , until the top is well covered in marinara .

spread marinara sauce on top .
find a spoon . spoon marinara sauce on top of pepperoni slices . spread with back of spoon .

place the bread on the pan .
grab a pan . place the pan on the stove . heat up the stove . place the bread on the stove . flip the bread .

place the bread on the pan .
cut 10 to 16 pepperonis in half , then place the sliced pepperonis in the bowl . butter two slices of bread , then grease a pan over medium heat . lay buttered bread in the heated pan to toast , while the unbuttered side is facing up . then lay two slices of mozzarella cheese on the unbuttered side . then lay the sliced pepperonis on top of the mozzarella cheese . then pour 1/4 cup marinara sauce on sliced the pepperonis . lay second buttered bread on top of poured marinara sauce with butter side facing up . lay second buttered bread on top of poured marinara sauce with butter side facing up . then flip the entire sandwich to cook on pan to be toasted .

place the bread on the pan .
spread butter on one side of the bread slices . place a pan on the stove top over medium heat . spray the inside of the pan with cooking spray . put the bread in the hot pan ( buttered side down ) . place mozzarella slices on the slice of bread .

slice the potato pumpkin and eggplant .
" cut the whole potato into slices , about 1/4 thick . " " . " " cut the pumpkin in half , and after cleaning it , cut it into 1/4 slices . " " . " " cut the eggplant , turning it a bit so the slices are more oval that round , into 1/4 slices . " " . "

slice the potato pumpkin and eggplant .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a potato and an egg plant and a pumpkin . cut the potato in to quarter inch pieces . cut the pumpkin in to thin strips . cut egg plant in to quarter inch pieces .

slice the potato pumpkin and eggplant .
cut up the potato and eggplant . cut them into circles that are as thick as your finger .

make diagonal cuts into the shrimp .
to make the shrimp lay flat when you fry it . you do n't have to do that . but if you want to make it flat and not curl up when you cook . you take the knife and make x 's all the way down the shrimp . turn the shrimp on it 's back and cut the x 's to make it flatter and then bend it a little to make it straighter .

make diagonal cuts into the shrimp .
after peeling the shrimp , put diagonal cuts into shrimp . diagonal cuts make the shrimp straighter .

make diagonal cuts into the shrimp .
lay the shrimp down flat . make cuts across on each side , without cutting all the way through .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
mix together flour , baking powder , and salt . whisk it all together .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
pour the flour , baking powder , and salt together in a small bowl . mix the ingredients together well with a whisk . make sure it is well mixed so that when you add the water you do n't want to mix it too much .

mix flour baking powder and salt .
put the flour , baking powder , and salt into a bowl . mix them up very good with a spoon .

pour water into the flour mixture and mix .
add ice water to the bowl with the flour . mix only 10 times .

pour water into the flour mixture and mix .
make sure your water is ice cold by placing the water in the fridge or adding some ice cubes . slowly pour the ice water into your bowl of flour . stir the water and flour only ten times with a spoon .

pour water into the flour mixture and mix .
pour ice water into the flour mixture . mix the bowl in a circular motion using chop sticks ten times .

dip the vegetables into the batter and drop into the oil .
put the vegetables into the batter until they are coated . put the coated vegetables into the pan with boiling oil .

dip the vegetables into the batter and drop into the oil .
using chop sticks , dip the vegetables into the batter . then drop the vegetable into the oil . do this one by one .

dip the vegetables into the batter and drop into the oil .
have a grown up help you with this next step . heat oil in a large pan until hot . dip the vegetable in cold batter . use long tongs or chopsticks to gentle put the vegetables in the oil , being very careful not to splash the oil . only put a few pieces in at a time because they will cook very fast .

add egg white water chicken powder brown sugar and potato starch to the meat .
mix the egg whites with a little water in a bowl . add a teaspoon of chicken powder , one teaspoon of brown sugar to the bowl . lastly add one and a half teaspoons of potato starch .

add egg white water chicken powder brown sugar and potato starch to the meat .
pour the egg and white water into the other bowl . use a teaspoon that measures tsp and scoop 1 spoon of chicken powder in the bowl . put 1 spoon of brown sugar . put 1 and a half spoons of potato starch .

add egg white water chicken powder brown sugar and potato starch to the meat .
add one egg white in to the bowl . add some water in to the bowl . add chicken powder in to the bowl . add some brown sugar and some potato starch in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

clean the chicken and throw the bones in a pot of boiling water .
clean the chicken . toss the bones a pot of boiling water . drain the boiling water and then repeat . this will help drain the excess oil from the bones .

clean the chicken and throw the bones in a pot of boiling water .
take chicken bones and clean well . place into a pot of boiling water . drain boiling water and repeat to remove excess oil and fat from water .
