clean the chicken and throw the bones in a pot of boiling water .
boil water in a medium pot about three fourths full . clean the chicken bones and place them into the boiling water . drain the boiling water . repeat the process to remove the excess oil and fat from the water .

place a handful of dried shrimp and crushed garlic in the broth .
put a handful of dried shrimp into the broth . next add some crushed garlic to the broth and cook for 30 minutes .

place a handful of dried shrimp and crushed garlic in the broth .
grab a handful of shrimp with your hand . put the shrimp in the broth . crush some garlic by smashing it with a knife . throw the garlic in the broth .

place a handful of dried shrimp and crushed garlic in the broth .
take a handful of dried shrimp and put it into the broth . crush some garlic with the edge of a knife . take the crushed garlic and add it to the broth .

add a pinch of brown sugar chicken powder and fish sauce to the boiling broth .
wait until the water is boiled . add a pinch of brown sugar into the sauce pan . add a spoon of chicken powder . add a small quantity of fish sauce into the boiling broth .

add a pinch of brown sugar chicken powder and fish sauce to the boiling broth .
add 2 tablespoons of chicken powder to the broth . put in a small pinch of broth sugar . add 1 tablespoon of fish sauce .

add a pinch of brown sugar chicken powder and fish sauce to the boiling broth .
boil the broth in a pan . add little brown sugar in to the broth . add some chicken powder in to the broth . add a teaspoon of fish sauce in to the broth . mix everything in the broth .

wash and slice the prawn and add it to the meat .
wash the prawns under cool running water . using a knife gently cut into the spine . remove the unwanted parts . now carefully cut the prawns into small pieces . place in with the meat .

wash and slice the prawn and add it to the meat .
take your prawn over to the sink and wash off just with water each individually . take over the prawn to a cutting board and cut / slice with a knife . add the cut / sliced prawn to your meat .

wash and slice the prawn and add it to the meat .
hold the prawns under the sink with running water to rinse them . put the prawns on a cutting board . carefully hold them as you cut down the middle of the prawn . cut it into small squares .

place one tbsp of meat mixture in the middle of the wanton strip fold it and seal it .
measure one tablespoon of meat mixture using correct measuring spoon . spread / sprinkle in the middle of the wanton strip . fold the wanton strip and pinch the open area to seal it .

place one tbsp of meat mixture in the middle of the wanton strip fold it and seal it .
use chopsticks put 1 tablespoon of meat mix into the wanton strip . fold the strip and seal up the edges . twist the end of the strip .

place one tbsp of meat mixture in the middle of the wanton strip fold it and seal it .
grab wanton strip . place one tbsp . of meat into the wanton strip . use fingers to fold and seal it . place them on a plate . repeat each wanton .

cook the wantons in boiling water add cold water and add the noodles into the pot .
bring the water in the pot to boiling , so that the water is bubbling constantly . drop the wontons in gently to avoid splashing hot water on to your hand . when the water begins to boil again , add some cold water to make it stop boiling . then add the egg noodles to the pot with the wontons .

cook the wantons in boiling water add cold water and add the noodles into the pot .
put the wontons into the pot of boiling water . squeeze the wontons as you put them in , so the meat does n't leak out . once the water bowls a 2nd time , add some cold water in the pot . add the egg noodles into the pot containing the wontons .

cook the wantons in boiling water add cold water and add the noodles into the pot .
wait until the water is boiled in the pot . add the wantons into the boiling water . cook the wantons in the boiling water . add 2 cups of cold water in to the pot . add the noodles into the pot .

mix all the ingredients with a pair of chopsticks .
you will now have a bowl containing all of the ingredients that will need to be mixed . get out a pair of chop sticks . gently , without spilling the contents of the bowl , use the chopsticks to mix the ingredients . holding the bowl over a sink might help with any spills while mixing . mix thoroughly for one minute .

mix all the ingredients with a pair of chopsticks .
take a medium sized bowl . add all the ingredients in to the mixing bowl . take two chop sticks . using chop sticks mix the contents of the bowl . mix everything properly .

mix all the ingredients with a pair of chopsticks .
use a pair of chopsticks to mix together all of the ingredients in the bowl . mix it for 1 minute .

drain and rinse the noodles and pour oyster sauce oil over it .
place a strainer in a large bowl . drain the water from the noodles by pouring into strainer . pour cold water over the noodles . put the cooked noodles in a bowl . add 1 teaspoon of cooking oil and 1 tablespoon of oyster sauce to the noodles .

drain and rinse the noodles and pour oyster sauce oil over it .
pour the water and paste out into a strainer in the sink . rinse the noodles under the sink . pour oyster sauce on the pasta all over it .

drain and rinse the noodles and pour oyster sauce oil over it .
stir the noodles with chopsticks as they 're cooking so they do n't stick together . when the noodles are cooked , pour them through a colander . rinse the noodles in the colander in cold water . measure out one teaspoon of cooking oil and one tablespoon of oyster sauce . put the cooked rinsed noodles in a bowl . pour the oil and oyster sauce on the noodles .

chop the onions and coriander and place it in a bowl .
use a knife to carefully chop up the green onions . cut up the coriander . take the chopped onions and coriander and place them in a bowl .

chop the onions and coriander and place it in a bowl .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some green onions on the board . cut the green onions in to small pieces . cut the coriander in to small pieces . add them in to the bowl .

chop the onions and coriander and place it in a bowl .
use a straight edged knife to cut the coriander into pieces about the width of a finger . use a straight edged knife to cut the spring onions into pieces about the width of a finger . place both the spring onions and the coriander into a bowl .

add chopped green onions coriander black pepper and broth to the noodles .
take a medium sized bowl . take the noodles in the bowl . cut the coriander in to small pieces and add it to the noodles . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . add the broth in to the noodle bowl .

add chopped green onions coriander black pepper and broth to the noodles .
put chopped onions on top . put so black pepper on top . then scoop the broth with a spoon on top of noodles .

add chopped green onions coriander black pepper and broth to the noodles .
put some green onions on top . add a little bit of coriander and black pepper . scoop the broth into the dish . prepare to serve .

peel and grate the potato .
was the potato . grab the peeler . peel the potato leaving little to no brown skin . grab the grater . grate the potato .

peel and grate the potato .
using a peeler , peel the skin off of a clean potato . discard skin . place a clean towel on a counter or table . place a grater on the towel . grate the potato on to the surface of the towel .

peel and grate the potato .
peel all of the skin off of the potato . put the potato skins into a bowl . put a cloth over the bowl . grate the potato over the cloth so that any wetness in the potato is soaked up in the cloth .

squeeze the water out of the potato .
put the grated potato in a clean kitchen towel . close the towel with one hand . holding the towel over a bowl with one hand . squeeze the lump of potato with your other hand until the liquid pours into the bowl . keep squeezing until you get as much water out as you can .

squeeze the water out of the potato .
take the cloth and squeeze out the water over an empty bowl . put the grated potatoes into a bowl .

squeeze the water out of the potato .
wrap in cloth . extract water . squeeze cloth over bowl . open cloth . put in bowl .

mix shredded potato mashed potato and flour together .
put shredded potatoes into bowl . put the same amount of mashed potatoes to bowl . put the same amount of flour as mashed potatoes into bowl . use your hands to mix the 3 ingredients . make patties and cook in hot pan .

mix shredded potato mashed potato and flour together .
pour the potato from the towel into a medium sized bowl . add the same amount of left - over mashed potato to the same bowl add the same amount of left - over mashed potato to the same bowl . then gently pour in about the same amount of flour to the potatoes . using your clean hands gently mix up the flour and potatoes in the bowl .

mix shredded potato mashed potato and flour together .
put shredded potato into the bowl . add about the same amount of mashed potato into the same bowl . add the same amount of flour into the bowl . mix the things in the bowl together .

mix salt and milk with the potato mixture .
add one teaspoon salt . add one cup of milk . mix together for a minute or two . let sit for 10 minutes to let it thicken .

mix salt and milk with the potato mixture .
put a small amount of salt in your hand . add salt to the potatoes . add milk to the potatoes . stir to combine . wait for batter to thicken .

mix salt and milk with the potato mixture .
add in a small pinch of salt . and then pour in the milk to form your batter . the batter will need to settle a little while for the starch to be released . then it will begin to thicken .

add butter and oil to the pan .
make sure your stop top is set to low heat . then add about a spoonful of butter to the pan . next , add just a little oil to the pan .

add butter and oil to the pan .
add 1 tablespoon of butter to the pan . add a tablespoon of oil to the pan . cook on low heat .

add butter and oil to the pan .
get pan on to stove . put a little bit of butter into pan . put a little pit of grape seed oil into pan . turn heat on low . cook on low heat .

spread batter on the pan .
pour the batter into the hot pan , filling up most of the pan . spread the batter evenly like a pancake .

spread batter on the pan .
dump batter on the pan . spread it around with spatula until all the same thickness .

spread batter on the pan .
slowly pour your potato batter into the pan , like you would with pancakes . be careful , and take your time pouring it . it will take about 5 minutes for the potato to cook out .

flip the pancake in the pan .
hold the handle of the pan and move the pan around . when the pancake moves around easily , flip the pancake quickly . catch the pancake by moving the pan under the pancake as it falls .

flip the pancake in the pan .
move wrist up and back . flick the wrist . catch it .

flip the pancake in the pan .
take pancakes in the griddle and slowly lift the pan off the heat . move the pancake around slowly to make sure it 's loose . use your wrist and slowly lift the pan up so the pancake flips out . catch the pancake back in the griddle to cook the other side .

finely chop onions garlic and carrots in a mini food processor .
set out food processor and ensure the correct blade is installed to finely chop vegetables . place vegetables on a cutting board and chop into two - inch long chunks . measure and add garlic to the food processor . using extreme caution , add the large chunks of vegetables to the food processor . select the option for finely chopping vegetables .

finely chop onions garlic and carrots in a mini food processor .
cut the carrot and celery in to long pieces . take a mini food processor . add the pieces of carrot and celery in to the food processor . run the food processor on . cut them in to small pieces in the food processor .

finely chop onions garlic and carrots in a mini food processor .
cut your onion in half and each of those pieces in half again . cut each piece of celery into 3 pieces . cut each carrot into 3 pieces . add garlic , onion , celery , and carrots into a small food processor . put the lid on the food processor and turn it on .

add in the vegetables and the herbs and saute .
put the vegetables into the frying pan . add the herbs to the pan . use the stirring spoon to mix them around as they cook . cook until the mixture is soft .

add in the vegetables and the herbs and saute .
take a pot on the stove . add some oil in to the pot . add the vegetable paste in to the pot . add the herbs in to the pot . mix and cook them in the pot .

add in the vegetables and the herbs and saute .
slowly pour in the vegetables . hold the herbs over the pan and slowly pour them in . use a spatula to stir everything up .

heat some oil in pot add in some pancetta and cook it until it turns brown .
turn the heat on the stove up . pour in some oil in the pot . pour in some pancetta . cook it until the pancetta turns nice and brown .

heat some oil in pot add in some pancetta and cook it until it turns brown .
add some oil in a pan and heat the oil . cut the pancetta in to small pieces , . add the pancetta in to the pan . fry the pancetta in the pan . fry them till they are brown .

heat some oil in pot add in some pancetta and cook it until it turns brown .
put a pot on the stove and turn the heat up to medium . pour a little bit of olive oil into the pot . put the chopped pancetta in the pot . stir it with a spoon to make sure it does n't stick . let it cook for a few minutes , until the pancetta starts to turn brown .

grate some parmesan cheese on it .
use a grater to grate some parmesan cheese . put the parmesan cheese on top of the soup .

grate some parmesan cheese on it .
hold a grater firmly in one hand . hold the cheese in the other hand . rub the cheese against the grater . move the grater around the bowl to spread the cheese as you grate .

grate some parmesan cheese on it .
take a bowl . add the cooking soup in to it . take a block of parmesan cheese . take a small grater . grate some parmesan cheese into the bowl .

add the pasta .
take bowl of pasta . pour bowl of pasta into boiling pan .

add the pasta .
hold the pasta over the pot . carefully pour in the pasta slowly careful not to splash .

add the pasta .
pour pasta into the boiling liquid . now wait .

add salt and pepper and stir .
put salt and pepper in the pot . use a wooden spatula to give it a quick stir .

add salt and pepper and stir .
with your fingers , sprinkle a pinch of salt into the pan . take a pepper grinder and grind a bit of pepper into the pan . use a spoon to stir it all together .

add salt and pepper and stir .
pinch some salt in your fingers and sprinkle it in the pot . shake in some black pepper . stir everything with a wooden spoon .

add in the chicken broth sauce and the beans .
hold the chicken broth over the pot . slowly pour the broth into the sauce . carefully pour in the beans .

add in the chicken broth sauce and the beans .
pour the chicken broth into the hot pot . pour the tomato sauce into the hot pot . pour the can of beans into the pot .

add in the chicken broth sauce and the beans .
pour chicken broth into the pot . add the can of beans . put in tomato sauce and mix the ingredients together in the pot .

sprinkle cheese on the dish .
measure out half a cup of cheese with a measuring cup and sprinkle it over the top of the dish . let it melt .

sprinkle cheese on the dish .
use a scoop to scoop up some cheese . pour the scoop of cheese by shaking it over the dish .

sprinkle cheese on the dish .
take some cheese in a small cup . cook the contents of the dish in the pot . add the cheese on to the dish . spread the cheese evenly on the dish . cook the contents of the pot .

add condensed tomato soup salsa water and the chopped tortillas to the cooked beef .
add a can of tomato soup , salsa and water to the pot . then add the chopped tortillas to the pot . turn the heat up to high .

add condensed tomato soup salsa water and the chopped tortillas to the cooked beef .
take can of tomato soup and pour it into the beef . then pour some salsa and hot water on top of it all . finally add in some chopped up tortilla pieces .

add condensed tomato soup salsa water and the chopped tortillas to the cooked beef .
add 1 can of condensed tomato soup into the pot . add salsa to the pot . pour in 1/2 cup of water . add in the cut tortilla squares . turn the heat to high and stir the mixture .

simmer the dish .
let the pan cook longer . turn the heat to low . let the pan bubble very slightly .

simmer the dish .
when you see that the mixture starts boiling , turn the heat down to low . then stir it with a wooden spoon . let it cook on low for about 5 more minutes .

simmer the dish .
when the dish begins to boil , turn it down to simmer . cook for 5 minutes on simmer .

cook ground beef in a pan and cut tortillas into squares .
turn the stove top to medium . cook the ground beef in a pan . use a pizza cutter to cut a tortilla into 1 in squares .

cook ground beef in a pan and cut tortillas into squares .
put the stove on to medium . spread out the ground beef with a wooden spoon . cut the tortes in to one inch squares . make sure to use a pizza cutter so you can do it easily . use about six tortes .

cook ground beef in a pan and cut tortillas into squares .
turn the ninja cooker to medium and add the ground beef . use a pizza cutter to cut the tortilla into bite size pieces .

drain the extra water from the beef .
wait until the meat looks brown . move the meat to one side of the pot with a wooden spoon . drain the liquid from the beef .

drain the extra water from the beef .
as the beef cooks , use the spoon to break up larger chunks . turn off the heat once the beef turns brown . move all the beef to one side . dump out the grease .

drain the extra water from the beef .
take beef and put in pan . add heat and cook until brown . stir with wooden spoon . when cooked , drain the water from the beef . then put back in the pan .

add chicken salt coriander leaves and garam masala powder and mix well .
put boned chicken in the tomato sauce in the pan . add salt and mix well . add in coriander leaves and garam powder , mixing well again . cook for 20 minutes or until gravy consistency . add hot water if needed .

add chicken salt coriander leaves and garam masala powder and mix well .
put the chicken pieces , salt and fresh coriander in the pan . use a spoon to mix well . add some garam masala and mix well . put a lid on the pan and allow to cook for about 20 minutes .

add chicken salt coriander leaves and garam masala powder and mix well .
add chicken pieces in to the pan . add some salt in to the pan . add cut coriander leaves in to the pan . add some garam masala powder in to the pan . mix everything well with a spoon .

cover the pan .
place the lid on the pan . reduce the heat to medium .

cover the pan .
you will want to cook the food around 20 minutes on medium heat . make sure you cover the pan with the lid .

cover the pan .
take a pan on the stove . cook the chicken on the pan . mix the cooking ingredients in the pan . take the lid of the pan . cover the pan with the lid and cook the chicken .

garnish with chopped coriander .
take the coriander and cut it into very tiny pieces . sprinkle the coriander into the pot with your hands . be careful not to touch the hot food .

garnish with chopped coriander .
sprinkle the chopped coriander over the dish . the color and texture serves to make the dish look better .

garnish with chopped coriander .
take small amount of chopped coriander and pick it up with your hands . it should be about a tablespoon . release it over the dish .

add ginger paste and garlic paste .
use a spoon to pick up the ginger and garlic paste . put the ginger and garlic paste into the hot pan . use a spoon to mix the paste in the pan .

add ginger paste and garlic paste .
toss some ginger paste into the frying pan . then put some garlic paste in the pan .

add ginger paste and garlic paste .
use spoon to get ginger paste out of bowl . dump ginger paste from spoon into pan . use spoon to get garlic paste out of bowl . dump garlic past from spoon into pan .

add tomato puree and salt and mix .
add a bowl of tomato puree to pan . stir and add little bit of salt and pepper and then stir again .

add tomato puree and salt and mix .
pick up the bowl of tomato puree and pour carefully into the pan . stir everything in the pan with a spoon . use your measuring spoon and measure the correct amount of salt . sprinkle the salt into the pan . stir the contents of the pan with the spoon again .

add tomato puree and salt and mix .
carefully and slowly pour in the tomato puree . add in the salt . use a spatula to mix everything .

add grated onion and cook until the onion turns brown .
squeeze the onion bits until the water comes out . pour a little bit of oil in the pan . put the onions in the pan and start to cook the onions . move the onions around with the spatula until it starts to turn brown .

add grated onion and cook until the onion turns brown .
drain all the extra water out of the onions . add the onions to the cooking pan . continue to cook the onions until they turn brown .

add grated onion and cook until the onion turns brown .
pick up the bowl of onions and squeeze out the water . add the onions to the black pan . take the wooden spoon and stir the onions . let the onions turn brown then add other ingredients as directed .

add turmeric powder red chili powder cumin powder coriander powder water and salt and mix .
put in turmeric powder . then use a spoon and put in some red chili powder . then add some cumin and coriander powder . add a little water to prevent burning . mix the spices together on the frying pan for about 1 minute .

add turmeric powder red chili powder cumin powder coriander powder water and salt and mix .
add a teaspoon of turmeric powder and chili powder in to the pan . add a teaspoon of cumin powder and coriander powder in to the pan . add little water in to the pan . add some salt in to the pan . mix everything in the pan with a spoon .

add turmeric powder red chili powder cumin powder coriander powder water and salt and mix .
add a small quantity of turmeric powder . add a small quantity of red chili powder . add a small quantity of cumin powder . add some quantity of coriander powder . add water and salt into the pan and mix all the masalas together .

heat oil in a pan and add cinnamon green cardamom and cloves .
pour a bit of oil in the pan . turn up the heat on the stove . pour in the cinnamon green cardamom and cloves .

heat oil in a pan and add cinnamon green cardamom and cloves .
use a nonstick pan . pour a small amount of oil into the pan , enough to lightly cover the bottom of the pan . break up a small piece of cinnamon and place it in the pan . add a pinch of green cardamom and cloves to pan as well .

heat oil in a pan and add cinnamon green cardamom and cloves .
pour some oil into a nonstick pan , tip the pan to make oil cover the bottom . turn on the stove to heat up the pan . add some cinnamon , green cardamom and cloves to the oil in the pan .

in pan take 1 pound ground beef add 1 finely chopped onions 2 cloves finely minced garlic cook 5 mins .
lets take our one pound of ground beef and add one chopped onion to the meat . now we will take 2 cloves of garlic and add it in with the meat . for 5 minutes we will stir our pan and let the meat brown . remember , we wo n't need to drain any of the grease and oil off at the end of the cooking .

in pan take 1 pound ground beef add 1 finely chopped onions 2 cloves finely minced garlic cook 5 mins .
place 1 pound of ground beef into a frying pan . add 1 whole onion that has been chopped up . put in two cloves of garlic that has been cut up . mix the ingredient together while they cook . cook for about 5 minutes until the beef is brown .

in pan take 1 pound ground beef add 1 finely chopped onions 2 cloves finely minced garlic cook 5 mins .
to the ground beef , add one onion that has been chopped into very small pieces . also add two cloves of garlic that have been chopped very small as well . fry the mixture until the meat is completely brown . stir while frying to make sure all the meat gets cooked . there is no need to drain unless there is a lot of fat coming from the meat .

add 1 cup of water and 6 ounce of canned tomato paste blend it well and season it with salt .
pour one cup of water over the meat that is in the frying pan . take a six ounce can of tomato paste and add it to the other ingredients in the frying pan . using a large spoon , mix the water and tomato with the other ingredients . after all the ingredients are mixed well , sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt on top .

add 1 cup of water and 6 ounce of canned tomato paste blend it well and season it with salt .
take a cooking pan on the stove . add 1 cup of water in to the pan . add 6 ounces of canned tomato paste in to the pan . mix it well with a spatula . add some salt in to the pan and mix well .

add 1 cup of water and 6 ounce of canned tomato paste blend it well and season it with salt .
now we want to add in one cup of water . once the water is in , we will add 6 oz of tomato paste to the pan . now stir the dish with a spoon until it is blended good . now we can add about half a teaspoon of salt on top of the dish to season it .

steam frankfurters for 4 minutes in same steamer place the hot dog buns and steam for a couple of minutes .
now , turn off the stove , move the pan off of the hot burner and let it cool somewhere . put your steamer pan on the burner instead . make sure your steamer pan is holding the water measured out in the beginning . then , turn on the heat again , and put the lid on the steamer pan . when the water begins to boil , put the hot dogs in the steamer basket . put the lid back on , and let the steam for about 4 minutes . remember to set your timer . after the hot dogs have steamed for 4 minutes , remove the lid , and add the hot dog buns right on top of the hot dogs . carefully put the lid back on the pan while the buns steam .

steam frankfurters for 4 minutes in same steamer place the hot dog buns and steam for a couple of minutes .
put water in the bottom part of the steamer . place the steamer on the stove top and turn the heat on high . put the hotdogs in the top part of the steamer , let steam for about 4 minutes . place the buns on top of the hotdogs , and put the lid back on the steamer . let the buns steam for about 1 minute .

steam frankfurters for 4 minutes in same steamer place the hot dog buns and steam for a couple of minutes .
place steamer on stove . turn on high heat . add frankfurters for 4 minutes . open lid . place hot dog buns on top and let steam for a couple minutes .

add 1 tbls prepared yellow mustard 1 tbls worcestershire sauce 2 tsp brown sugar mix simmer 5 minutes .
add your mustard with a teaspoon into the pot . pour your worcestershire sauce into the pan . with your hands grab your brown sugar mix and add it to the pan . with your wooden spoon mix the mixture together .

add 1 tbls prepared yellow mustard 1 tbls worcestershire sauce 2 tsp brown sugar mix simmer 5 minutes .
put in 1 tablespoon of yellow mustard to the mix . add 1 tablespoon of worcestershire sauce . put in 2 teaspoons of brown sugar . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together . let simmer for 5 minutes .

add 1 tbls prepared yellow mustard 1 tbls worcestershire sauce 2 tsp brown sugar mix simmer 5 minutes .
to the meat mix in the pan , add 1 tb of plain yellow mustard , and 1 tb worcestershire sauce . mix well into the other ingredients . continue to simmer . add 2 tsp brown sugar and mix well . simmer for about 5 more minutes .

place frankfurter in middle of bun cover sausage with chili prepared earlier top with mustard sauce garnish with chopped onions .
place a steamed hotdog bun on a cutting board . put one hotdog wiener on the steamed bun . use a wooden spoon to top the hotdog with chili . put some mustard and raw chopped onion on top of the chili .

place frankfurter in middle of bun cover sausage with chili prepared earlier top with mustard sauce garnish with chopped onions .
put the frankfurter inside a bun . put chili inside a bowl , pour mustard into chili and stir . put chili inside the bowl on top of frankfurter with a spoon . put mustard on top of the chili . sprinkle raw onions on top of the mustard .

place frankfurter in middle of bun cover sausage with chili prepared earlier top with mustard sauce garnish with chopped onions .
place the hotdog ( also called the frankfurter ) in the middle of the hot dog bun . use a wooden spoon to put some chili on the hot dog . add some mustard . add some chopped onions .

now add 2 tbls of chili powder 1 tbls of cumin powder and cook for 3 minutes .
measure 2 tablespoons of chili powder with a measuring spoon . add that to the meat . mix it together with a spoon .

now add 2 tbls of chili powder 1 tbls of cumin powder and cook for 3 minutes .
sprinkle 2 tablespoons of chili powder over the meat . sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cumin powder over the meat . mix the spices in until they are evenly spread over the meat . let the meat and spices cook on low heat for about 3 more minutes .

now add 2 tbls of chili powder 1 tbls of cumin powder and cook for 3 minutes .
sprinkle two tablespoons of chili powder on the meat that is in the pan . sprinkle one tablespoon of cumin powder on the meat that is in the pan . using a spoon , stir all of the ingredients together . mix the ingredients well and let them cook for three minutes .

add rice to the pot of water .
bring the water in the pot to a boil . scoop the rice into a pot of boiling water . stir the rice as it cooks for 4 to 5 minutes .

add rice to the pot of water .
bring a pot of water with some salt and oil to a boil . add basmati rice to the boiling water . stir the rice with a spoon . cook the rice for about 4 to 5 minutes .

add rice to the pot of water .
take a pot on the stove . boil some water in the pot . take the rice in a bowl . add the rice into the bowl of hot water . mix the rice and water in the bowl .

add seeds salt oil to a pot of water .
add seeds to the pot of water . put in some salt . pour in 4 to 5 teaspoons of oil .

add seeds salt oil to a pot of water .
heat up a pot with 5 cups of water . add a teaspoon of black cumin seeds . add 4 - 5 teaspoons of oil and 3 teaspoons of salt to the water . you can add some cardamoms , cinnamon sticks and a few cloves .

add seeds salt oil to a pot of water .
put a large pot of water on the stove top . add cumin seeds , salt and oil to the pot of water .

add oil and seasoning to a pot .
add oil to the pan using a spoon . add seasoning to the pan .

add oil and seasoning to a pot .
add oil into the pot . spread the oil around so the bottom of the pot is covered in oil . add the seasoning to the pot .

add oil and seasoning to a pot .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add seasoning ingredients in to the pan . mix the ingredients in the pan .

fry onions in the pot .
pour the onions into the cook . cook the onions while stirring them with a spatula .

fry onions in the pot .
add the diced onions to the pot . stir the onions into the mix as they fry .

fry onions in the pot .
add onions that have been cut to a pan . mix the onions in oil . add heat and let the onions get soft . mix around in the heat . repeat until soft .

pour the rice into the pot with the vegetables and stir .
gently add the rice to the pot of vegetables . use a spoon to mix the rice and vegetables . let it cook for about 5 minutes .

pour the rice into the pot with the vegetables and stir .
gently add the rice into the vegetables . gently mix everything together . wait 5 minutes .

pour the rice into the pot with the vegetables and stir .
pour the plate into the pot . use a stirring spoon to mix everything together evenly .

top the rice and vegetables with some nuts .
add some nuts to the vegetable and rice mixture . spread the nuts around the top of the mix .

top the rice and vegetables with some nuts .
cook rice by adding to boiling water . then drain . add vegetables to the rice . then mix all together . finally serve .

top the rice and vegetables with some nuts .
sprinkle some nuts into the pan . it is now ready to serve .

add vegetables and salt to the onions and stir .
take a pan and add some oil in to the pan . cut the vegetables in to small pieces . cut the onions in to small pieces . add the vegetables in to the pan . add the onions in to the pan and mix .

add vegetables and salt to the onions and stir .
add carrots to the bowl and stir in with a stirring spoon . pour in some salt and continue to stir as it cooks .

add vegetables and salt to the onions and stir .
add the vegetable all at once . stir together and mix everything . add salt and mix for another minute and stir . add onions and stir until they are clear .

cover the pot with a lid .
add a little bit of water to the pot . place the lid on the pot .

cover the pot with a lid .
get a lid that fits nicely on the pan . cover the pan with the lid .

cover the pot with a lid .
cover the pot with a lid . let the ingredients simmer .

place the strained rice on a plate .
use a strainer to scoop out the rice . pour the rice out on a new plate .

place the strained rice on a plate .
strain the rice . after draining the water , pour the rice onto a plate .

place the strained rice on a plate .
after cooking and straining the rice pour the rice onto a plate . spread the rice evenly over the plate .

add paneer chilies mint and seasoning to the vegetables and stir .
add paneer chilies mint into the pan . add seasoning to the pan . add vegetables to the pan . using a spoon stir the mixture together .

add paneer chilies mint and seasoning to the vegetables and stir .
add paneer into the bowl . add chilies . pour in some mint . add seasoning . use a spoon to stir all of the ingredients in with the vegetables in the bowl .

add paneer chilies mint and seasoning to the vegetables and stir .
chop vegetables into small pieces with a knife . put into a pot . add in chili and mint . take a spoon and stir . mix everything thoroughly .

pour saffron and water into the pot .
put saffron into the pot . put water into the pot .

pour saffron and water into the pot .
cook the dish in the pot . take a small bowl . add some water in the bowl . add some saffron in to the water and soak . pour the saffron and water in to the dish .

pour saffron and water into the pot .
pour the saffron into the pot . add water to the pot . with a spoon stir it all together .

serve in a bowl with sauce on the side .
place in a bowl . very healthy to eat . have the sauces on the side and add as much as you want .

serve in a bowl with sauce on the side .
scoop everything into a bowl with a scoop . serve the dish with some sauce in a separate bowl next to it .

serve in a bowl with sauce on the side .
put the rice into a bowl . serve the rice with sauce on the side .

cut the wing at the two joints .
you will need an adult 's help with this because you will be working with a sharp knife . place a wing on your cooking surface and look where the wing bends . it will remind you of your shoulder . the joint should be larger than where the other side of the wing bends . cut between the joint ( the big , round , bone looking object ) and the rest of the wing . there should not be any bones to cut through . when you have cut the joint , move down to the thinner side of the wing . this part will remind you of an elbow . cut through where it bends . always know where your fingers are when you 're using a knife . make sure you have an adult with you and watching you . always wash your hands after you touch raw chicken .

cut the wing at the two joints .
get a chef 's knife ( to help with cutting of chicken wings ) . spread the first wing so that the thicker end is to your right . slice through the skin at the top of the thick end ( above the large joint ) . spread the wing open and carefully cut through the joint ( do n't cut through bone ) . cut through the small joint at the other end ( the narrow wing ' tip ' ) .

cut the wing at the two joints .
with a sharp knife ( be careful ! ) cut through the skin between the wing and thigh . until you can see the joint . when you can see the joint , cut between the bones . to cut off the wing tip , place the knife , sharp side down , on top of the wing . first cut through the skin . give the top ( dull side ) of the knife blade a little whack with the palm of your free hand .

mix salt seasoning pepper and baking powder in a bowl .
take a small bowl . add some salt in to the bowl . add seasoning pepper powder in to the bowl . add baking powder in to the bowl . mix everything properly .

mix salt seasoning pepper and baking powder in a bowl .
put 2 tablespoons of salt mix in the bowl . then put 2 tablespoons of pepper in the bowl . finally , add 2 tablespoons of baking powder in . then take your mixing tool and mix it together well .

mix salt seasoning pepper and baking powder in a bowl .
add seasoned salt and pepper to the bowl . also add baking powder ( to help crisp the wings ) . mix thoroughly with a whisk .

coat the wings in the seasoning mix .
cover the wings with the seasoning mix inside your bowl . use your hands to make sure the seasoning is all over the wings .

coat the wings in the seasoning mix .
rub the wing with the seasoning mixture . get it all covered .

coat the wings in the seasoning mix .
sprinkle half of the seasoning mix over the chicken wings . using your hands , mix and rub the seasoning over the wings . sprinkle the rest of the seasoning over the chicken . use your hands to finish mixing the seasoning mix over every bit of the wings .

cook the wings in the oven .
put the wings on a baking sheet . put the baking sheet in the oven on the rack . turn the oven on and leave the wings in the oven for 25 minutes .

cook the wings in the oven .
take your pan of chicken wings and slide them into the oven . do this very carefully so you do not burn your hand on the hot oven . now set a timer and for 25 minutes so the chicken can bake evenly .

cook the wings in the oven .
line the wings up on the cooking rack so they are spaced about a finger apart . line them in rows . put the wings in the oven carefully .

flip the wings .
use tongs to flip each wing over . put pan back in the over after all wings have been flipped .

flip the wings .
flip every wing with a pair of tongs . if the wings stick a little bit , shake them side to side with the tongs until they come loose .

flip the wings .
grab tongs . carefully use them to turn the wings over on the baking sheet .

cook the wings in the oven .
use oven mitts or a towel to grab the pan and rack . place the wings back in the oven .

cook the wings in the oven .
put on your oven mitts . place the wings back into the oven for an extra 20 to 25 minutes .

cook the wings in the oven .
put the wings into the oven . let cook for twenty more minutes .

mix hot sauce and melted butter together .
put butter in a bowl of measuring cup , ( not metal ! ) place in microwave for a few seconds to melt . add 1/2 cup hot sauce to the melted butter .

mix hot sauce and melted butter together .
melt some butter in a measuring cup . get the hot sauce . measure half a cup of hot sauce . add the hot sauce into the measuring up with the butter . get a big bowl .

mix hot sauce and melted butter together .
stir hot sauce . add in melted butter . mix together .

coat the wings in sauce .
wings are already cooked and on a cookie sheet on the counter . get a big bowl and put it on the counter . if you like sauce on wings , pick the one you want and put in a cup . pour the sauce in the big bowl and count 12 wings , put into the bowl and shake the bowl around to have sauce on all the wings . if you do not want sauce on some wings , keep them on the cookie sheet .

coat the wings in sauce .
pour your sauce into a nice big bowl . place almost all of the chicken wings into the sauce bowl ( just in case some of the people who will be eating want wings with no sauce ) . shake the bowl around to mix the sauce with the wings .

coat the wings in sauce .
put sauce into bowl . add chicken to the sauce . toss the chicken in the bowl until all the chicken is coated .

crack the eggs into the bowl .
find a bowl . take an egg and hit the egg on the side of the bowl softly or on the table . take the same egg and use your fingers to open the shell . drop the egg and yoke out of the egg . continue to do this 7 times .

crack the eggs into the bowl .
carefully crack your eggs and release the yolk and egg whites into the bowl . crack 7 eggs into your bowl , and it is best to use a flat surface to crack the eggs , rather than the edge of the bowl . this will decrease the chances of getting egg shell into your bowl .

crack the eggs into the bowl .
get a medium sized bowl . get 7 eggs . crack the eggs on a flat surface to reduce chance of egg shells in the mix . crack one egg at a time and put it into the bowl . put all the cracked eggs into the same bowl .

add milk creme and butter .
in the bowl of eggs , pour your milk . pour your measured cream next . lastly add the cubes of butter .

add milk creme and butter .
add milk and double cream to the eggs in the bowl . then add a small amount of butter .

add milk creme and butter .
slowly pour in the cup of milk so it does n't spill . scoop in a few pieces of butter .

add salt and pepper and whisk .
add small amount of pepper . add a pinch of salt . stir just a bit using a fork or whisk , not too much because it will put air in the mix .

add salt and pepper and whisk .
all we need to season it is a small pinch of salt and another small pinch of pepper . just drop the salt and pepper into your mixing bowl and grab a fork or whisk . take the fork and mix the pepper and salt into your mixture .

add salt and pepper and whisk .
add the salt and the pepper . stir the ingredients quickly with a fork until they 're blended .

place the bowl over a pot of water .
get ready a pot of light simmering water . take the bowl and place it over the pot of simmering water .

place the bowl over a pot of water .
wait for your pot of water to simmer very lightly or gently with very few bubbles . now place the bowl of your mixture gently over the simmering water .

place the bowl over a pot of water .
add some water to a pot , just about 1 inch of water from the bottom of the pot . heat some water until it just starts to boil and adjust the heat so the water never boils very much , just a little bit . place your egg mixture in a glass bowl that can be heated . the bowl should rest on the rim of the pot over the lightly boiling water so it can be heated from below . it is important to use a glass bowl that can be heated like a pyrex bowl .

stir the eggs .
get a spatula . gently stir the eggs without splashing them .

stir the eggs .
add eggs to a bowl . place bowl of eggs over a hot pot with water in it . cook low and slow . stir with a plastic spoon . it should take 15 minutes to cook .

stir the eggs .
add 2 cups of water to a large pot . find a glass bowl that can be heated ( like a pyrex bowl ) . place the bowl over the boiling water in the pot so that the sides of the bowl is resting on the top rim of the pot . add your egg mixture to the glass bowl and stir gently as you boil the water in the bottom of the pot . this will take about 15 minutes and some lumps will form in the egg mixture which is ok . the egg mixture gets thicker as it cooks .

melt the butter in a pan .
put butter into pan . let butter sizzle and melt . boil butter .

melt the butter in a pan .
put the butter in the pot . when the butter starts to sizzle it is losing the water in it . this is when the butter melts .

melt the butter in a pan .
take a small pan on the stove . heat the pan on the stove . take some butter in a bowl . add the butter in to the hot pan . melt the butter in the pan .

slice the salmon into small pieces .
hold the salmon carefully . slowly slice the salmon into into small bits .

slice the salmon into small pieces .
cut the salmon into small pieces with a knife . be very careful , ask an adult for help .

slice the salmon into small pieces .
place the salmon onto a cutting board . slice it down the side a few times until its into small pieces .

add the salmon to the eggs .
you are first going to want to add your cut smoked salmon in with your eggs . just take the salmon and drop it into your scrambled egg mixture . now just mix the salmon and eggs together using a rubber spatula .

add the salmon to the eggs .
add the smoked salmon to the eggs with your clean hands . stir the salmon into the eggs until the salmon is nicely , evenly incorporated with the eggs .

add the salmon to the eggs .
add the smoked salmon to the scrambled eggs , and stir everything gently . add the mixture to the toasted piece of bread .

place the eggs on the toast .
mix it . now take it and put in onto the toast .

place the eggs on the toast .
use a large spatula to pick up some eggs . place the eggs on top of your toast .

place the eggs on the toast .
crack eggs and put into bowl . add a little bit of milk , butter and seasoning . stir until there are no chunks . pour eggs into pan on medium heat . stir to avoid burning eggs . dump scrambled eggs into a bowl and spoon onto bread or plate as needed .

top the eggs with the salmon butter and vinegar .
take a bread slice on a plate . add cooked eggs on top of bread . add small pieces of salmon on to the eggs . add some butter on to the eggs . add little vinegar on to the eggs .

top the eggs with the salmon butter and vinegar .
add salmon butter to the top of the eggs . put a few drops of sherry vinegar on top .

top the eggs with the salmon butter and vinegar .
put the eggs on top of the toasted bread . next add the salmon pieces to the top of the eggs . next add butter . then sprinkle the vinegar to the top .

break three eggs and add a little cream .
break 3 eggs . put the insides of the eggs into a bowl . be careful not to get any shell in the bowl . and 1/3 cup of cream into the bowl .

break three eggs and add a little cream .
break three eggs into a bowl . add one - third cup of cream to the bowl .

break three eggs and add a little cream .
to start , we need to break our 3 eggs into the bowl . just use the edge of the bowl to crack them and let them fall into the bowl . make sure not to get any shell inside the bowl . now we can add 1/3 cup creme to the eggs .

mix the cream and eggs .
put your eggs and cream into a small bowl . using a fork , quickly stir the egg and cream mixture . continue mixing until the egg yolks can no longer be seen .

mix the cream and eggs .
put a pan on the stove and heat it up . use a fork to mix the cream and egg mixture .

mix the cream and eggs .
now while the pan is heating up , we can take a fork and mix up our cream and egg . just spin the fork around in a circular motion to start mixing it . keep going until the yolk of the egg is all mixed in and there are no streaks left .

spread some parmesan cheese and stir the egg mixture .
grate parmesan cheese into the pan with a cheese grater . using a wooden spoon scrape the bottom of pan to mix in the cheese and cook the eggs . turn off the heat .

spread some parmesan cheese and stir the egg mixture .
using a grater , grate parmesan cheese in the pan . use a spatula to mix up the eggs .

spread some parmesan cheese and stir the egg mixture .
grate some parmesan cheese into the pan . use a spatula to stir the cheese into the egg mixture . turn off the heat on the stove .

put a pan on medium to high heat .
put pan on the stove . put the dial to medium or high heat .

put a pan on medium to high heat .
get a non - stick skillet . put the skillet on the stove and turn the knob up to medium high .

put a pan on medium to high heat .
put a non stick pan on the oven . turn on the heat to medium to high .

pour the egg mixture to the pan and shake the pan .
after you have added butter to the pan and it 's melted good , add the mixed eggs into the pan . gently shake the pan back and forth a little bit , but do n't stir it . wait about 20 seconds until you see small bubbles .

pour the egg mixture to the pan and shake the pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . melt some butter in the pan . take the egg mixture in a bowl . add the egg mixture in to the pan . shake the pan to evenly spread the egg .

pour the egg mixture to the pan and shake the pan .
have a pan ready and heated . dump the bowl of egg mixture into the pan . scoot the pan back and forth by the pan handle . wait 20 seconds to stir the eggs .

heat the butter and some sea salt flakes in the pan .
take one slice of butter and put it into the frying pan . add some sea salt flakes to the pan .

heat the butter and some sea salt flakes in the pan .
put the butter in the pan . pinch some sea salt and sprinkle it in the pan .

heat the butter and some sea salt flakes in the pan .
grab pan from cupboard and place on burner . turn burner on low . cut butter into a small cube and place in bottom of pan . grab small bowl of sea salt flakes . take two pinches of sea salt flakes and put it on butter in pan .

stir in the milk and add vanilla extract .
take flour and add to bowl . then add milk . stir with a whisk . add in vanilla extract . keep stirring until there are no lumps to make your pancake mixture .

stir in the milk and add vanilla extract .
use a whisk to stir the bowl . add milk to the bowl and continue whisking . add a drop or two of vanilla extract . continue to whisk the bowl .

stir in the milk and add vanilla extract .
as you whisk the flour , gently mix in your milk as you continue to stir . you may notice a bit of clumps , but continue to gently mix until it 's mostly smooth . add a drop or two of vanilla extract , and use your whisk to mix the vanilla in completely .

spread butter on the grill pan .
drop a piece of a stick of butter on the pan . use a spatula to spread the butter all over the pan .

spread butter on the grill pan .
put a slice of butter on the pan . spread the butter around the entire pan .

spread butter on the grill pan .
put a piece of butter on the pan . spread the butter around on the pan .

spread butter and maple syrup on the pancakes .
use a knife and scoop up some butter . spread the butter on the pancakes with the knife . pour maple syrup on the pancakes .

spread butter and maple syrup on the pancakes .
using a butter knife spread some softened butter over the tops of your pancakes . finally , top your pancakes with some maple syrup . do n't put too much syrup or your pancakes will become soggy . grab a fork and enjoy your breakfast .

spread butter and maple syrup on the pancakes .
use a knife to spread butter on top of each of the pancakes . take a bottle of maple syrup and spread it across the top of the pancakes .

beat two eggs into the milk and whisk in a cup of melted butter .
crack two eggs into the cup of milk . mix it all together with a whisk . pour in the melted butter . mix everything more with the whisk .

beat two eggs into the milk and whisk in a cup of melted butter .
pour milk into a measuring cup . crack two eggs and drop them into the cup . stir milk with a whisk . melt butter in microwave , let butter sit a few minutes . pour butter into the cup and whisk .

beat two eggs into the milk and whisk in a cup of melted butter .
crack two eggs over top of the milk , letting the eggs fall into the glass . then set aside or throw away the eggshells . use a whisk to stir it very well for a few seconds . pour some melted butter that 's sat out a minute ( so it is n't too hot ) into the milk . use the whisk to stir everything together again .

combine flour salt baking powder and sugar in a bowl .
get a clean mixing bowl . put the pre - measured flour , salt , baking powder and sugar in that bowl . get a whisk . mix the ingredients in the bowl with the whisk .

combine flour salt baking powder and sugar in a bowl .
set aside a bowl . pour in the flour salt baking powder and sugar . mix everything together with the whisk .

combine flour salt baking powder and sugar in a bowl .
pour flour into a large bowl . add salt , baking powder and sugar to the flour . slowly mix with a metal whisk .

pour batter on the pan .
take an electric griddle . heat the griddle . spread the oil on the griddle . pour the batter on the griddle . spread the batter to a pan cake .

pour batter on the pan .
add 1/3 cup of batter to the pan . add the batter for as many pancakes as will fit on the sheet .

pour batter on the pan .
grab the batter with a cup . pour it onto the pan in a small circle .

remove the onion rings from the pan and onto a paper towel .
take an onion and cut into slices . dip the onions in batter . add oil to a skillet . add heat then dip the onions into the skillet . fry until light brown then remove and serve .

remove the onion rings from the pan and onto a paper towel .
now we want to take our onions out of the pan and set them on a paper towel . the towel will help soak up some grease . the tongs will help you keep your fingers away from the hot grease in the pan .

remove the onion rings from the pan and onto a paper towel .
take out the onion rings from the pan with tongs . place the onion rings on a paper towel .

dip the onion rings into the batter .
take the batter in a bowl . take some onion rings . add the onion rings in to the batter . dip the onion rings in the batter . coat the onion with the batter .

dip the onion rings into the batter .
turn the heat up to 375 degrees . use tongs to dip the onion rings in the batter . be sure to cover all sides of the onion rings in batter .

dip the onion rings into the batter .
get a pair of tongs . life one onion ring with the tongs and dip it in the batter . make sure the ring is completely covered with batter .

place the onion rings into pan of hot oil .
take an onion and cut into thin slices with a knife . then coat with batter . add oil into a pan and heat . then drop the rings into the pan . fry until light brown and repeat until all are cooked .

place the onion rings into pan of hot oil .
use tongs to pick up the onion rings . place the onion rings into a pan of hot oil . cook for a few minutes until golden brown . use tongs to place the finished onion rings onto a plate covered by paper towels .

place the onion rings into pan of hot oil .
use tongs to grab the onion rings . put the onion rings in the pan of oil slowly .

chop an onion into thick slices and separate into rings .
take an onion on the cutting board . remove the peel of the onion . cut the onion in to thin circles . take the onion circle in to hand . separate the rings from the onion circle .

chop an onion into thick slices and separate into rings .
get an onion , get a plastic knife or ask an adult to help you , and a plate . peel the outside paper skin off of your onion . ask and adult to cut your onion into circles or you carefully cut with a plastic knife . separate your onion layers until each onion piece forms only one circle . " put each onion circle or ring " " on a plate . " " . "

chop an onion into thick slices and separate into rings .
using a knife , chop up an onion into thick pieces . separate the pieces with your hands into rings .

add flour buttermilk baking powder onion powder oil salt pepper sriracha and garlic powder into a bowl and mix .
poor the buttermilk into a bowel . add ingredients to the bowel with a pinch of salt . add hot sauce of any type . mix everything together using a whisk to make sure there are no clumps .

add flour buttermilk baking powder onion powder oil salt pepper sriracha and garlic powder into a bowl and mix .
add flour to the bowl . add baking powder to the bowl . add onion powder to the bowl . add oil to the bowl . add salt to the bowl .

add flour buttermilk baking powder onion powder oil salt pepper sriracha and garlic powder into a bowl and mix .
pour in buttermilk to the flour in the bowl . add some baking powder and onion powder . add a pinch of salt and some black pepper . pour in a bit of sriracha and garlic powder . use your whisk to mix everything together for 1 minute until it has no lumps .

then dice them up .
place peppers on cutting board . cut the peppers into small pieces .

then dice them up .
hold the peppers carefully . cut them into lines or strips . now turn the knife or board and cut the other way to make tiny squares .

then dice them up .
place the peppers onto a cutting board . carefully cut the pepper into thin strips . then cut the strips of pepper into little cubes .

keep it in the oven at 400 degrees for 30 mins .
keep it in the oven . set the oven to 400 degrees on the knob . wait 30 minutes .

keep it in the oven at 400 degrees for 30 mins .
put the food dish into oven that should be preheated at 400 degrees . leave it in stove and set timer for 30 minutes . after the 30 minutes are done take out you food dish .

keep it in the oven at 400 degrees for 30 mins .
put the pan in the oven at 400 degrees for 30 o 40 minutes . bake until the edges start to brown up .

take 2 peppers and 1 green bell pepper take out the seeds and cut it into half .
put the green bell peppers on a cutting board . use a knife to cut the peppers in half . remove the seeds and the white ribbed part . line a baking sheet with tin foil and rub the tin foil with oil . put the peppers on the oiled pan cut side down .

take 2 peppers and 1 green bell pepper take out the seeds and cut it into half .
slice two peppers and 1 green bell pepper in half and remove the ribs and seeds from each one . cover a baking sheet with foil . pour a tablespoon of oil onto the baking sheet and with your hand spread the oil evenly over the foil . place the peppers cut side down on the baking sheet .

take 2 peppers and 1 green bell pepper take out the seeds and cut it into half .
use a knife to slice a green bell pepper in half . take the seeds out of the pepper . put oil on the aluminum on the pan . set the 2 bell papers upside down on the sheet .

grease the pan and place them upside down at 400 degrees for 30 minutes in the oven .
cover a baking sheet with aluminum foil . after you have cut the peppers in half place them cut - side down on the aluminum foil . preheat the oven to 400 degree fahrenheit . use oven mitts to carefully place the peppers in the oven . cook the peppers for 30 minutes in the oven .

grease the pan and place them upside down at 400 degrees for 30 minutes in the oven .
place aluminum foil on the baking tray . take some bell peppers . place them upside down in the baking tray . set the oven to 400 degrees . bake them for 30 minutes in the oven .

grease the pan and place them upside down at 400 degrees for 30 minutes in the oven .
you 're going to roast the peppers at 400 degrees . place the peppers in your sheet pan that you ' ve covered with foil first . now roast them for about half an hour .

serve the burrito with sour cream .
set the burrito on a plate . put sour cream on the side of the burrito on the plate .

serve the burrito with sour cream .
after place burrito on plates to serve to eat . place at least a spoon full of sour cream on the side .

serve the burrito with sour cream .
cut out the burrito one slice at a time with a knife . take a spatula and take out the burrito . place the burrito on a plate .

you can easily peel the skin and get roasted pepper .
peel the skin off the edge of the pepper . set the remaining roasted pepper on the tray .

you can easily peel the skin and get roasted pepper .
after the peppers were cooked in stove and cooled off . peel off the skin to the peppers using your hands .

you can easily peel the skin and get roasted pepper .
grab the skin of the roasted pepper . peel the skin off of the peppers .

add the roasted pepper .
add the refried beans from the can and stir . add 3/4s of the roasted peppers , reserving the rest to put on top of the dish . mix the beans and peppers well with the other ingredients , using a spoon . take the pan off the heat . add seasonings .

add the roasted pepper .
add most of the roasted pepper into the pan . use stirring spoon to mix the ingredients . take the pan off the heat .

add the roasted pepper .
now we are going to scrape in 3/4 of our roasted pepper . save 1/4 of them for our topping later on .

take tortilla and fill the baked mix into it and add shredded cheese and roll it .
put stuffing on your tortilla , about two big spoonfuls . add cheese on top . the roll up the burrito .

take tortilla and fill the baked mix into it and add shredded cheese and roll it .
lay burrito on a flat surface . take a spoon and scoop 2 cups of the mix . add the mix on top of the tortilla . add shredded cheese . roll it up .

take tortilla and fill the baked mix into it and add shredded cheese and roll it .
set the tortilla on the table . use a spoon to scoop the filling from the pot . put the filling in the middle of the tortilla . add cheese to the top of the filling . fold the edges of the burrito and roll it up .

take out and turn the oven to boil and keep it for 3 - 5 mins .
turn the oven on broil . put the pan of food in the oven . let the food cook for 3 - 5 minutes .

take out and turn the oven to boil and keep it for 3 - 5 mins .
put on oven mitts and put the pan in the oven . set the oven dial to broil . keep the pan in the oven for 3 - 5 minutes .

take out and turn the oven to boil and keep it for 3 - 5 mins .
take the baking tray out of the oven . turn the oven in to broil . place the tray in the oven and bake for 3 - 5 minutes . open the door of the oven . now take the tray out of the oven .

put the leftover filling on top and some sauce and some more cheese .
use a spoon to put the leftover filling on top of the burritos and then spread it out . use a spoon to sprinkle homemade or jarred salsa all over the top . sprinkle roasted peppers and shredded cheese on the top . make sure there are enough toppings to look colorful like a mexican christmas tree . put the dish into the oven that should still be heated to 400 degrees .

put the leftover filling on top and some sauce and some more cheese .
put filling on top of the tortilla . put some sauce on top . add more cheese to the top .

put the leftover filling on top and some sauce and some more cheese .
spread the leftover filling over the burritos in the dish . get out your salsa , either homemade or store bought . using a spoon , spread salsa over the top of the burritos in the dish . get your cheese out of the refrigerator , open package . spread cheese over the top of your enchiladas in the dish .

when it is done take out and cover them up and let them steam in its heat for 15 mins .
take the pan of peppers out of the oven . cover the peppers with a pan and let them steam for about 10 to 15 minutes . this will loosen up the skin .

when it is done take out and cover them up and let them steam in its heat for 15 mins .
cut bell pepper in half and cook in oven in a aluminum covering the bottom of pan . when the skin appears roasted , skin will look wrinkled and bubbly . take out of oven when they are bubbly , with an oven mitt . set pan inside a larger pan . cover so the bell pepper will become soft and able to peel easily .

when it is done take out and cover them up and let them steam in its heat for 15 mins .
put oven mitts on . open the oven to carefully take out peppers . set peppers on the tables . over up the peppers . let steam in its heat for 15 minutes .

grease the pan and place all the rolls in it .
grease a glass pan with cooking spray . place the burritos into the greased pan side by side .

grease the pan and place all the rolls in it .
spray grease onto the bottom of the pan . roll up the burritos . place the burritos onto the pan .

grease the pan and place all the rolls in it .
now we want to grease our pan . once the pan is completely greased , just set as many burritos as you can into the pan .

add 1 can of kidney beans and 1 can of refried beans and mix it well .
pour in 1 can of kidney beans into the mix . add 1 can of refried beans . use the spatula to mix the pan together as it cooks .

add 1 can of kidney beans and 1 can of refried beans and mix it well .
open 1 can of kidney beans with the can opener . open 1 can of refried beans with the can opener . dump both cans in the pot .

add 1 can of kidney beans and 1 can of refried beans and mix it well .
open one can of kidney beans with a can opener . pour the kidney beans into a colander to drain the liquid . pour drained kidney beans to the mixture . open one can of refried beans with a can opener . use a spoon to add refried beans to mixture .

add seasoning at last chili powder cumin powder salt and pepper powder and mix it well .
from the container add some chili powder to the contents of the pan . then add some cumin to the pan . next add some salt and pepper . using a wooden spoon mix it up .

add seasoning at last chili powder cumin powder salt and pepper powder and mix it well .
with your mixture still cooking on the stove in a large sauce pan , mix in some chili powder . about 1 teaspoon . next , add in some cumin powder . about 1/2 teaspoon . add salt and pepper to taste and mix the mixture with a wooden spoon so that the spices are spread around evenly . note , if you like spicy food you can add a little bit of hot sauce too .

add seasoning at last chili powder cumin powder salt and pepper powder and mix it well .
cook the contents in the pan . add little chili powder in to the pan . add little cumin powder in to the pan . add salt and pepper powder in to the pan . mix the contents of the pan .

take a pan and put some ground beef and add some chopped onions and garlic .
put some ground beef in the pan . chop up the beef with a spatula and let it get brown . add in the cut up onions and garlic .

take a pan and put some ground beef and add some chopped onions and garlic .
put ground beef into a pan and start breaking it up with your spatula . add the chopped onions and garlic to the pan . mix it well and cook all together .

take a pan and put some ground beef and add some chopped onions and garlic .
crushed the ground meat on the hot pan . brown up the meat ( you can use beans instead ) . add a lot of onions . put in a lot of garlic . mix them up well .

cook the pasta .
put a large pot half full of water on the stove . turn the heat on under the pot and wait for the water to boil hard . pour the past into the boiling water .

cook the pasta .
in a large pot pour 16 cups of water . add salt to taste . let water boil until you see rolling bubbles . pour pasta into the boiling water and stir . let pasta boil for 20 minutes or until the pasta is tender .

cook the pasta .
take your pasta and slowly put it in your boiling water . be careful and do it slow because it will be hot .

chop the pancetta .
cut 1/4 lb of pancetta ( italian bacon ) into little pieces . 2 tbsp butter . warm frying pan to medium heat . add butter to warm frying pan .

chop the pancetta .
take a 1/4 pound of pancetta . cut the pancetta into small pieces . put pan on stove . add 2 tablespoons of butter to pan . melt butter and add pancetta .

chop the pancetta .
take your lancets and put it on a cutting board . go straight across the pancetta and cut it into small pieces . cut them into cubes . butter pan .

add butter and oil to a pan .
heat up the pan . add some butter to the pan . pour oil onto the same pan .

add butter and oil to a pan .
put the 2 tablespoons of butter and place in your heated pan . add the olive oil to the butter .

add butter and oil to a pan .
add 2 tablespoons of butter to a pan . the measurements for a tablespoon are on the butter package . add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to the pan so that it keeps the butter from burning .

add the pancetta to the pan .
chop up the pancetta into small cubes . with your pan hot , add in the cubes of pancetta carefully . then lower the heat just a little .

add the pancetta to the pan .
when the pan is hot , add the pancetta to the pan . then lower the heat a little bit .

add the pancetta to the pan .
chop up the pancetta . add the pancetta to the pan .

chop the onion .
pancetta is cooking in pan . get a medium onion . peel onion . cut off ends of onion . cut onions into small pieces .

chop the onion .
peel off skin . cut the onion into small pieces . do n't worry about the size .

chop the onion .
while pancetta cooks . take a medium onion . peel onion . cut off ends . chop the onion into small pieces .

chop the parsley .
slide cut up onions to side of cutting board . grab fresh parsley . pull leaves from stem . put parsley on cutting board . chop the parsley until it is finely chopped .

chop the parsley .
add the parsley to the cutting board . chop up the parsley into small pieces .

chop the parsley .
we are going to break the parsley . to break the parsley , grab a large knife . using the knife , press the sharp end down against the parsley over and over . you want to break it into little pieces . once it is broken , we can move on .

add the onions to the pan .
in a pan cook pancetta . peel an onion . chop up an onion into small pieces . add onion to the pan with the pancetta . stir the onion and pancetta as they cook .

add the onions to the pan .
take the onion on a chopping board . cut the onions in to small pieces . take the onions with hand . keep the onions in to the pan . mix them good .

add the onions to the pan .
pick up the chopped onions . carry the chopped onions to the pan .

pour in the vodka and tomato sauce .
pour the small bowl of vodka into the hot sauce pan . start stirring the pan with a wooden cooking spoon . while stirring with one hand pour the tomato sauce into the pan with your free hand . keep stirring with the wooden spoon .

pour in the vodka and tomato sauce .
pour the vodka into the hot pan so it sizzles . stir the vodka around . next add the tomato sauce to the pan . mix the tomato sauce with the vodka .

pour in the vodka and tomato sauce .
pour the vodka in to the mixture . we can hear the sound when we pour it . add the fresh tomato sauce into the mixture . stir all together with the help of a spatula .

drain the pasta .
place the strainer into your sink , with a pan underneath it . grab your pan of pasta and take it over to the sink . slowly pour the contents of the pan in your hand into the strainer . you want to keep about a cup of the reserved pasta water aside .

drain the pasta .
put the drainer in the sink . once the pot with pasta is cool enough , grab it by the handles . pour the pasta and water into the drainer in the sink . pick up the drainer and shake it a little bit so more water comes out . now you are left with just pasta and all the water is gone .

drain the pasta .
place your strainer in the sink over a larger pot . pick up your pan carefully and carry it to the strainer . be careful because the water is very hot . lean the pan just enough to pour it slowly into the pot in the sink . lift the strainer off the pot , and keep the water below .

add cream to the sauce .
add what your mom has for cream . could be half and half . add cream , whatever kind your mom has in the frig .

add cream to the sauce .
take the cream from the refrigerator . pour the amount of cream that the recipe says you need into a measuring cup . get a spoon that is ok to use in a hot pan . slowly pour the cream from the cup into the hot sauce gently stirring the sauce while you are pouring it . once you have poured all the cream into the pan , put the cup down and keep cooking the sauce for as long as the recipe says .

add cream to the sauce .
the tomatoes are in the sauce pan . pour the cream into the tomatoes .

add the parsley to the sauce .
wash the herbs nicely . cut the cleaned herbs in to small pieces . add the beautiful cut herbs into the sauce . stir the sauce at the last .

add the parsley to the sauce .
the pan on the stove is warm . the sauce is warm in the pan . take the chopped parsley from cutting board . add the parsley to the sauce . mix the parsley into the sauce with a spoon .

add the parsley to the sauce .
add the chopped parsley into the sauce . stir in the parsley with the sauce , mixing well .

add red pepper to the sauce .
add a little bit of red pepper to the pan mixture . this is so the mix will be spicy . once you add a little red pepper , mix everything in the pan well .

add red pepper to the sauce .
with pan on stove with gravy . add red pepper to gravy for spice . stir the gravy . grab the cooked pasta in the strainer . add pasta to pan with gravy .

add red pepper to the sauce .
put in red pepper . stir it up . toss pasta . add to sauce . serve .

add pasta to the sauce and stir .
take the pasta and pour it into the sauce . stir the pasta into the sauce very well .

add pasta to the sauce and stir .
pick up your freshly strained bowl of pasta . pour the pasta out of the bowl and into the pan of sauce . please be careful , the pan of sauce is hot . stir the pasta into the sauce until it is all together .

add pasta to the sauce and stir .
take the strainer with the pasta and pour the pasta into the sauce . stir the pasta into sauce while it is in the pan . let the pasta and sauce simmer for a few minutes .

add cheese on top .
add a little bit of romano cheese on top of the pasta . you can add more cheese to your liking , if you want .

add cheese on top .
take the bowl to which cheese is to be added . take romaine cheese . sprinkle cheese on top of contents of bowl . mix the contents . wash the hands .

add cheese on top .
put pasta in bowl . add romano cheese . get out a fork . taste the pasta . if needed add more romano cheese on top .

sprinkle oil on the dosa .
sprinkle oil on the dosa in the hot pan . continue cooking .

sprinkle oil on the dosa .
put pan on stove and preheat . put dosa in pan , then drizzle some oil onto the dosa .

sprinkle oil on the dosa .
take a spoon and put it in a bowl of oil . take the oil and sprinkle it around the dosa .

place the filling on the center of the dosa .
place 2 tablespoons of filling right on the center of the dosa . place a cover over the dosa . ( do your best to find a cover that is not too big and not too small ) .

place the filling on the center of the dosa .
pick up a spoon . use the spoon to pick up a little bit of the mushy green and yellow stuff . put the spoonful onto the circle of bread in the pan . add more until there is about a baseball sized piece of the green and yellow stuff . put the lid on the pan .

place the filling on the center of the dosa .
use a spoon and scoop up some filling . put some spoonfuls of the filling in the middle of the dosa circle .

fold the sides of the dosa over .
take a spatula and fold the right side of the dosa over so it meets the middle . then fold the left side over so it meets the middle .

fold the sides of the dosa over .
use a spatula to fold one side of the dosa . use a spatula to fold the other side of the dosa . use a spatula to press down to seal the dosa .

fold the sides of the dosa over .
using the thin part of a spatula slide it under the dosa . lift the dosa and fold the sides into the middle of the circle .

separate the batter into smaller portions .
use a large spoon or ladle to take some batter out of the pot and put it into a smaller bowl . add just as much batter as you will need .

separate the batter into smaller portions .
take your ladle and take out as much batter as we will need for our doses . you want to put the batter in a smaller container after you have separated it from the larger pan .

separate the batter into smaller portions .
move batter to smaller bow . add .

mix salt with the batter .
take about one spoon full of salt and pour it into the pot . now take your ladle and pour the batter in with the salt , and start mixing it well !

mix salt with the batter .
put salt in batter . mix the salt and batter together .

mix salt with the batter .
fill a tea spoon with salt . put it into the batter . add a little more batter . mix everything together .

spread the batter in the pan .
get a nonstick frying pan hot . pour out a ladle full of batter into the pan . using the ladle , spread the batter around the bottom of the pan until it is coated .

spread the batter in the pan .
all you need to do is take a spoonful of the batter and put it into the middle of the pan . now using the same spoon , just spread the batter out all along your pan in a circular motion , until it is the size you want it to be .

spread the batter in the pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . heat the pan on the stove . take the batter in a bowl . take a spoon and pour some batter in to the pan . spread the batter on to the pan .

add pepper and dressing to the salad and toss .
grind some black pepper onto the lettuce in the bowl . place a couple spoons of dressing on the lettuce . be sure to add the dressing just before serving , so the lettuce does n't wilt . stir the dressing to coat the lettuce .

add pepper and dressing to the salad and toss .
add pepper to the salad . add dressing to the salad . using tongs mix the salad .

add pepper and dressing to the salad and toss .
use your pepper grinder to grind about 10 twists of pepper onto the salad . add your dressing to the salad as you are about to serve it by using a spoon full of dressing . mix the salad with the dressing with tongs as to coat the lettuce with dressing evenly .

cut up the tomatoes and add them to the salad .
use a knife to carefully cut the cherry tomatoes across the middle . toss the tomatoes into the bowl .

cut up the tomatoes and add them to the salad .
get a knife . cut the tomatoes . add them to the salad .

cut up the tomatoes and add them to the salad .
on a large cutting board set a large handful of cherry tomatoes . using your non - dominate hand , hold all the tomatoes down with your hand flat . next , take a serrated knife and slice the tomatoes in half by cutting horizontally underneath your hand . if you do n't feel comfortable doing this step , it 's okay to leave them whole too . once tomatoes are cut , add them into the bow of lettuce .

chop up the basil and add them to the salad .
chop up the basil carefully with a knife . add the basil to the salad with your hands .

chop up the basil and add them to the salad .
use a knife to cut up the sweet basil leaves . toss the basil into the salad .

chop up the basil and add them to the salad .
put some basil leaves on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the basil leaves and add to the salad bowl .

add butter pepper salt and garlic to the pan .
add some butter into the pan . add some salt and pepper . put in some garlic flakes into the pan . stir the pan and mix everything around .

add butter pepper salt and garlic to the pan .
add butter to the pan . sprinkle salt and pepper in the pan . add garlic to the pan .

add butter pepper salt and garlic to the pan .
add bread cubes , butter , salt , pepper and garlic to the hot pan . shake the pan to mix .

squeeze lemon juice into the dressing and mix .
