use a knife to carefully slice the lemon . squeeze the lemon juice into the dressing . use a whisk to mix the ingredients of the dressing bowl together .

squeeze lemon juice into the dressing and mix .
take a lemon on a cutting board and cut it in to two halves . squeeze half a lemon juice . take the salad dressing in a bowl . add the lemon juice in to the bowl . mix the salad dressing and the lemon juice .

squeeze lemon juice into the dressing and mix .
squeeze a lemon over the dressing to get the juice . mix up the mixture with a spoon .

sprinkle cheese and pepper on top .
sprinkle the remaining grated cheese so that it is spread out nicely on top of the salad . using a pepper mill , grate some freshly ground black pepper on top of the salad as well , according to how you want it to taste .

sprinkle cheese and pepper on top .
sprinkle the cheese on top of the salad . grind some pepper over the top of the salad .

sprinkle cheese and pepper on top .
use your hands to grab some cheese . sprinkle some cheese on top . sprinkle pepper on top the same way .

rip the lettuce into pieces and add to the bowl .
with your hands tear the lettuce into shreds . put the lettuce into the bowl .

rip the lettuce into pieces and add to the bowl .
tear the lettuce leaves apart by pulling apart and twisting away from the stem . you want your pieces to be small enough to eat as a single bite . add your bite sized pieces to the bowl .

rip the lettuce into pieces and add to the bowl .
take the lettuce . take a medium sized bowl . remove the bottom of the lettuce . rip the lettuce in to pieces . add the pieces of lettuce in to the bowl .

crush the garlic mash with salt and chop .
use the edge of the knife to crush the garlic . use the knife to carefully crush the garlic . add some salt to the garlic .

crush the garlic mash with salt and chop .
place peeled garlic cloves onto the surface of the cutting board . add a heavy pinch of salt ( about a teaspoon ) over top of the garlic . use the flat side of your knife to smash the garlic . mash it until it 's broken up . use the sharp end of your knife to roll the knife back and forth on the garlic until it is chopped into tiny pieces .

crush the garlic mash with salt and chop .
put garlic on a cutting board . use the side of the knife blade to slightly crush the garlic . sprinkle salt on garlic and mash the garlic . then use the knife to chop the garlic into little pieces .

add lemon juice and cheese to the dressing and mix .
squeeze a lemon into the bowl . shave some cheese with a grater . add the cheese and mix with a whisk .

add lemon juice and cheese to the dressing and mix .
use a knife to carefully slice the lemon . squeeze the lemon juice into the bowl . add the cheese to the bowl . use a spoon to stir the dressing together in the bowl .

add lemon juice and cheese to the dressing and mix .
use a sharp knife to carefully cut a small lemon in half . hold one half of the lemon over the bowl and gently squeeze the juice into your dressing mixture . do not force all of the juice out of the lemon half , because you do n't want to use so much juice that the lemon flavor overpowers the dressing . rest a cheese grater against the table , and drag a large wedge of parmesan cheese downwards against the grates . when the wedge of cheese become small , slow down - you want to be very careful that you do not scrape your hand across the grates . when you have enough cheese to fill a 1-cup measuring cup , put the cheese into the dressing mixture . use a whisk to blend the cheese into the dressing mixture .

add dollops of dressing croutons and peppers on top .
on a plate , place your lettuce . take the small bowl of salad dressing and add a couple small spoonfuls of the dressing over the salad . note : too much dressing can make the salad watery . now , take your already prepared croutons and bell peppers and put a small handful around the top of the salad . lastly , sprinkle the top with parmesan cheese .

add dollops of dressing croutons and peppers on top .
use a spoon to add some scoops of dressing around the salad . add croutons over the top of the salad . put some peppers on top .

add dollops of dressing croutons and peppers on top .
add small spoonfuls of dressing onto the salad . add croutons to the salad . add peppers on top of the salad .

add mayonnaise garlic and pepper to a bowl .
use a knife to chop up some garlic . add mayonnaise , black pepper to the bowl . add the garlic to the bowl .

add mayonnaise garlic and pepper to a bowl .
get a small bowl and tablespoon . put the mayonnaise in the bowl . add the chopped garlic to the bowl and add a little bit of pepper ( just 1 or 2 shakes from the pepper shaker ) .

add mayonnaise garlic and pepper to a bowl .
use a spoon to put some mayonnaise into a bowl . add some chopped up garlic . add some ground pepper to the bowl .

cut up the bread into chunks and add to a pan .
cut up pieces of bread into chucks with a knife . add the pieces of bread to a pan .

cut up the bread into chunks and add to a pan .
take a knife and cut the bread into big squares . put the bread pieces in the pan .

cut up the bread into chunks and add to a pan .
take the bread on a cutting board . cut the bread in to thick slices . now take each slice in to small pieces . take a pan on the stove , add the bread in to the pan .

cut up the bell peppers .
use a knife to cut up the bell peppers . slice the peppers into small sections .

cut up the bell peppers .
put the red and yellow peppers on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the peppers into small pieces .

cut up the bell peppers .
take bell peppers and put on cutting board . use a sharp knife and cut into pieces . be sure to slice into bite size pieces . while cutting , saute chicken in a skillet . then mix all together and add lettuce .

add the peppers to the pan .
add peppers into the pan . mix the peppers in the pan with the other ingredients .

add the peppers to the pan .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some bell peppers . cut the peppers in to small pieces . add the peppers in to the pan . mix the peppers by shaking the pan .

add the peppers to the pan .
put the chopped peppers in the pan with the other ingredients . shake the pan to combine the ingredients , being careful not to spill anything out of the pan . cook it until the flavors absorb , but not so long that the peppers lose their crunch .

add chick peas to a food processor .
use a can opener to open your can of garbanzo beans . using a strainer which is a bowl with tiny holes , get rid of all the extra water from the can of garbanzo beans . take the garbanzo beans and put them into the plastic bowl piece of the food processor .

add chick peas to a food processor .
we want to take a can of garbanzo beans and slowly pour them into the food processor . did you know that many people also call garbanzo bean , chick peas ? . no matter what you call them , make sure they all make it into the food processor .

add chick peas to a food processor .
add the garbanzo beans to the food processor . turn on the food processor to mix .

squeeze the garlic paste into the food processor .
take a food processor jar . add chick peas in to the food processor . take a pack of garlic paste . squeeze the garlic paste in to the food processor . close the lid and on the jar .

squeeze the garlic paste into the food processor .
put chickpeas in the food processor . put the cooked garlic into the food processor . you might have to squeeze it .

squeeze the garlic paste into the food processor .
wrap a bulb of garlic in tin foil and bake in oven for one hour . put chick peas in food processor . after garlic has cooled , remove the tin foil . squeeze the garlic into the food processor .

add salt pepper and oil to a food processor .
add salt and pepper to the food processor . add some olive oil .

add salt pepper and oil to a food processor .
use the grinder and twist some salt and pepper into the bowl of the machine . slowly pour a bit of olive oil into the bowl .

add salt pepper and oil to a food processor .
using the salt shaker , add in a little salt . then using the pepper shaker , add in a little pepper . after that , pour some olive oil into the food processor .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
place the ingredients in a blender . make sure the lid is tightly closed . if there is a blender speed choice , use low to start . turn on the blender . continue blending until no large pieces of your ingredients are left .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
add all the ingredients to the food processor . lock the lid on top . mix it on high until smooth . add more oil if it needs to be more smooth .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
take a blender with a lid . add the ingredients in to the food processor . close the lid of the food processor . turn the food processor on . blend the ingredients in to a smooth paste .

take all the shredded vegetables in a bowl add 4 tsp salt and mix well .
we now can take our shredded vegetables and place them into our large bowl . we then need to add in 4 teaspoons of salt to our bowl . using your hands , just go ahead and start mixing the veggies and salt all together . make sure it is mixed well !

take all the shredded vegetables in a bowl add 4 tsp salt and mix well .
shred the vegetables in a food processor . place all the vegetables in a large bowl . add about 4 teaspoons of salt . the salt will help get the juices out of the vegetables . mix the salt in with your hands until it is well - mixed . you want enough water to come out of the vegetables , that you will have liquid to cover the vegetables when they are put in the jar .

take all the shredded vegetables in a bowl add 4 tsp salt and mix well .
add the shredded vegetables to a very large mixing bowl . put in 4 teaspoons of salt . use hands to mix all of the ingredients together .

shred the onions radish and the carrot .
peel the onions radish and the carrot . use a mandolin and rub the vegetables against it to shred them to thin pieces .

shred the onions radish and the carrot .
take a slicer and a glove . with your gloved hand grab the carrot and slice it by placing it up and down .

shred the onions radish and the carrot .
take some carrots , onions and radish . remove the peel of the carrot and radish . take a shredder . shred the radish in to thin circles . now repeat the same with carrots and onions .

cut the cabbage in small pieces and shred it using the shredder .
put the head of cabbage on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the cabbage in half . remove some of the outer leaves of the cabbage . use a knife to remove the core ( hard part ) of the cabbage . cut in half again and place in the food processor to shred .

cut the cabbage in small pieces and shred it using the shredder .
cut the cabbage in half with the knife . cut out the core and the outside pieces . cut the cabbage into small pieces with a knife then shred it using the shredder .

cut the cabbage in small pieces and shred it using the shredder .
use a knife and carefully cut the cabbage into two pieces . cut off the bottom of the cabbage and discard it . continue to cut the cabbage . place the smaller pieces of cabbage into the shredder .

fill the jar with the vegetables and cover the jar .
use your hands to put the vegetables in the jar . fill the jar about three - quarters of the way full . use a small plate to press the vegetables into the jar . the place a heavy jar on the plate . cover the jar with a clean kitchen towel .

fill the jar with the vegetables and cover the jar .
use your hands to take the vegetables and transfer them into a jar . pack the vegetables into the jar . put the lid on the jar and cover it .

fill the jar with the vegetables and cover the jar .
mix the ingredients together using your hands . use your hands and move the vegetables into a jar about three quarters full . check everyday and if there is mold or anything in it you need to remove it . it will be ready around the fourth day .

preheat the fry pan and heat a quarter cup of oil .
turn heat on half way , under your pan . add 1/4 a cup of either peanut oil or canola oil to heated pan . heat pan for a couple of minutes until the oil shimmers . test the oil using a strip of potato ; if the oil sizzles and bubbles around the potato when placed in it is ready . add 3 cups of shredded potatoes to pan .

preheat the fry pan and heat a quarter cup of oil .
place your pan on top of your stove and turn the dial to medium to sit for 2 minutes . add 1/4 cup of oil to the bottom of your pan so it can get hot .

preheat the fry pan and heat a quarter cup of oil .
turn on the top of the oven onto medium heat . put the oil into the pan . put the potatoes into the pan .

add 3 cups shredded potatoes in fry pan season with salt and pepper and cook on medium heat 5 - 6 minutes .
take a fry pan and add some oil in to the pan . shred the potatoes and rinse and dry them on a paper towel . add 3 cups of shredded potatoes in to the pan . add salt and pepper about a teaspoon each . cook on a medium hit for 5 - 6 minutes .

add 3 cups shredded potatoes in fry pan season with salt and pepper and cook on medium heat 5 - 6 minutes .
take shredded potatoes and place them under the water and rinse them off . pat the potatoes with a paper towel to get them dry . put oil into the pan . put the potatoes into the pan . using a spatula press the potatoes down until they are flat .

add 3 cups shredded potatoes in fry pan season with salt and pepper and cook on medium heat 5 - 6 minutes .
add three cups of shredded potatoes once you have washed and dried the potatoes . be sure they potatoes are dry to prevent the oil from spattering . season the potatoes with salt and pepper . do not use too much . you can always add more seasoning but once it is in you can not take it out . cook the potatoes on medium heat ( make sure the dial on your stove is at medium ) for 5 to 6 minutes .

cook the potatoes until golden brown on both sides .
turn the heat down to low and cook for another 5 minutes until brown on bottom . use a metal spatula to flip the potatoes over . once flipped use a spatula to press the potatoes into a pancake shape . cook another ten minutes . take the potatoes out of pan and put on paper towels . taste and season if needed .

cook the potatoes until golden brown on both sides .
take a pan on the stove . cut the potatoes using a grater . add the potatoes in to the pan and cook on one side till golden brown . turn the potatoes on to the other side . cook the other side of potatoes till they are golden brown .

cook the potatoes until golden brown on both sides .
turn the heat to the low setting , then cook the potatoes until they are golden . use a spatula to flip small pieces of the potatoes over , then cook for 5 more minutes .

take 6 pieces of thinly sliced sirloin .
make sure you have thinly sliced sirloin steak . six pieces of sirloin will be needed .

take 6 pieces of thinly sliced sirloin .
you first want to make sure that you have the correct amount of sirloin to cook our dish . take your sirloin out of the package and make sure that you have at least 6 thinly sliced pieces .

take 6 pieces of thinly sliced sirloin .
you will need 6 slices of thinly sliced sirloin tip . it will cook very quickly .

put the sliced sirloins in to a zip lock cover .
carefully place the sliced meat into a ziplock bag . place it in one piece at a time .

put the sliced sirloins in to a zip lock cover .
have a ziplock bag ready as well as sauce for sliced sirloins . have the meat ready to be placed in ziplock bag . place meat in ziplock bag for seasoning ( marinating ) . once in begin to pour sauce , close ziplock bag and shake . once you have shared enough your meat is seasoned and ready to sit a while .

put the sliced sirloins in to a zip lock cover .
put the meat in a ziplock bag . wash your hands after touching the meat .

also put some citrus fruit shells like orange and lemon skin into the bag .
take all the orange rinds and pull them into smaller pieces . add them to the marinade bag . add all the lemon and / or lime rinds to the bag as well .

also put some citrus fruit shells like orange and lemon skin into the bag .
tear some orange apart peeling them . put the peels in the bag . put the lemon skins in the bag .

also put some citrus fruit shells like orange and lemon skin into the bag .
after you have washed the fruits and squeezed out the juice , you can add them to the bag . add the lemon skins the bag with the meat . rip up the orange skins into small pieces before putting in the bag . also add the skins of some limes to the bag with the meat .

pour the marinate into the bag .
pick up the mixing bowl with marinade in it . hold it carefully and pour it into the bag . use the spoon to get any remaining marinade into the bag .

pour the marinate into the bag .
placed squeezed lemons and limes into a zip lock bag . mix marinade mixture in a bowl . pour marinade mixture into bag of squeezed lemons and limes and seal .

pour the marinate into the bag .
pick up pan . make sure bag it open and hold pan over bag . carefully pour marinate into bag . use spoon to help scrape marinate into the bag . put pan back into sink .

remove the air and lock the cover .
press the ziplock bag with your hands until there is no air left in the bag . zip the bag once all of the air is removed .

remove the air and lock the cover .
press the bag to remove as much air as possible from the bag . while pressing the bag and reseal it .

remove the air and lock the cover .
put all the ingredients in a ziplock type bag . you can put it all in the bag in no specific order . squish the air out of the bag as much as you can . you can zip close the top and leave about an inch open for air to escape , then press down on the bag and get as much air out as possible . when you have squeezed as much air out of the bag as you can , quickly zip the last inch of the top .

massage the mixture properly to marinate the meat .
use your hands to press on the bag . massage the bag to spread the flavor throughout the bag .

massage the mixture properly to marinate the meat .
take a zip lock cover . take the mixture to be marinated . place the marinated mixture in the zip lock bag . massage the mixture . mix every thin to get the marination .

massage the mixture properly to marinate the meat .
take the bag and squish it around in your hands . turn and flip the bag while you squeeze and squish it . do not force open the ziplock opening or it will come out .

open the cover and reseal it and put it into the fridge .
open the bag of food . reseal the bag of food and put it in the fridge until it 's time to grill .

open the cover and reseal it and put it into the fridge .
put into the ziplock bag . seal the ziplock bag . put the ziplock bag into the fridge . keep the ziplock bag of marinating meat into the fridge until it is time to grill . take it out of the fridge when it is time to grill .

open the cover and reseal it and put it into the fridge .
open the cover . carefully reseal the bag and make sure no air can come out . put it in the fridge .

spread oil on a pan and heat till smoky spread the marinated meat and cook both the sides flipping it .
put oil on the skillet . place the meat on the skillet . using tongs flip your meat .

spread oil on a pan and heat till smoky spread the marinated meat and cook both the sides flipping it .
take a pan and heat the pan . spread some oil on the pan . add the marinated meat to the pan and cook it till smoky . flip the meat to the other side . cook the other side of meat in the same way .

spread oil on a pan and heat till smoky spread the marinated meat and cook both the sides flipping it .
first spread oil all across you hot pan . make sure the oil is spread across the entire pan . now wait for the oil to start smoking under the high heat . once it begins to smoke , slowly place your meat onto the pan . because the meat is so thin , it will take no more than a couple minutes to cook . you will know to flip it , when you are able to easily lift the meat up off the pan without it sticking .

remove the cooked meat and set it aside and chop it into small pieces .
chop the meat in one direction until thin . chop the meat in the other direction until thin . the meat should be small meat cubes .

remove the cooked meat and set it aside and chop it into small pieces .
take the cooked meat and set it onto a cutting board . with your knife , chop the meat from top to bottom . turn the sliced meat to its side and chop again . continue this until the meat is in super small cubes .

remove the cooked meat and set it aside and chop it into small pieces .
remove the meat . chop the meat in one direction . turn the meat in the opposite direction and chop again . make sure you chop any left over big pieces .

wrap it along with other vegetables to make tacos .
set the carne asada tacos onto a plate . serve the tacos .

wrap it along with other vegetables to make tacos .
get a pate . chop the meat with a knife . find the tacos . add vegetables . add sour cream .

wrap it along with other vegetables to make tacos .
take the vegetables in a plate . take the tacos in a plate . take a tongs spoon . take the vegetable mixture and add it to the tacos . wrap it to make tacos .

mix garlic ginger pepper flakes green onion and honey in a bowl .
get a medium sized bowl . add your finely minced garlic , and finely minced ginger . add the pepper flakes and chopped green onions . use a teaspoon to add the honey to your bowl . now use your spoon to mix all the ingredients together .

mix garlic ginger pepper flakes green onion and honey in a bowl .
put garlic , ginger , pepper flakes , green onions and honey into the bowl . use a small spoon to mix it all together .

mix garlic ginger pepper flakes green onion and honey in a bowl .
add garlic to a mixing bowl . put in some ginger . add pepper flakes and green onion . pour in the honey . mix all of the ingredients together in the bowl with a spoon .

mix the rind with salt .
pour the sea salt into the bowl . use your hands to mix the rind with the salt . mix until all of the extra moisture is taken out . let it sit for 1 hour .

mix the rind with salt .
in a glass bowl , place your cut up melon rind . now take some coarse sea salt and sprinkle it over the melon rind . important : make sure that the salt is coarse and not fine , otherwise this dish will not work ! using your hands mix together the two ingredients until the melon is completely covered .

mix the rind with salt .
pour some sea salt into the rind . use your hands to mix everything together .

mix the paste with the rind .
mix the paste into a big bowl with the rind . drain and rinse the rind before use . mix with your hand for five to ten minutes .

mix the paste with the rind .
add the paste into the bowl . mix the paste and rind together in the bowl .

mix the paste with the rind .
using a strainer , rinse off and drain the melon rind so it 's not too salty . place the rind back in the bowl . add the paste and mix for about 3 - 4 minutes using your hands until it 's nicely covered .

scoop out the inside of the water melon .
take a watermelon on a cutting board . cut the water melon in to two halves horizontally . take one half of water melon . scoop the red portion of watermelon and take it in to a bowl . clear the entire half of watermelon .

scoop out the inside of the water melon .
use an ice cream scoop to remove off the watermelon . place the watermelon into a bowl .

scoop out the inside of the water melon .
take an ice cream scoop . scoop out the inside of the water melon .

cut the water melon into strips .
take a water melon on a cutting board . remove the inside of the water melon . take the outer layer of water melon . cut the watermelon in to long strips . take each strip and cut in to smaller strips .

cut the water melon into strips .
get a knife . use the knife to cut watermelon into strips .

cut the water melon into strips .
use the knife to cut the melon . cut the melon in half . cut the halves into another half . take each piece and cut them into small strips .

cut away the skin of the water melon .
scrub the watermelon . scrape the inside of the watermelon out . use a knife to cut away the top of the watermelon . cut off the edge of the watermelon skin .

cut away the skin of the water melon .
use a knife and cut the watermelon in half after washing watermelon well . cut the green skin away from the pink / red watermelon .

cut away the skin of the water melon .
scrub the watermelon . use a sharp knife to shave the skin off the watermelon .

once all the wraps are rolled heat 2 cups of peanut oil high in a pan about 350 degrees .
once all the wraps are finishing rolling turn the knob for the stove heat to high . peanut oil in a pan to 350 degrees .

once all the wraps are rolled heat 2 cups of peanut oil high in a pan about 350 degrees .
get 2 cups on peanut oil . put the peanut oil into a large skillet . turn on the heat to the burner . pour the peanut oil . check the temperature to 350 .

once all the wraps are rolled heat 2 cups of peanut oil high in a pan about 350 degrees .
once all the spring rolls are wrapped , heat your 2 cups of peanut oil on high . wait until the oil is sizzling and about 350 degrees .

mix 3 tsps of corn starch with water .
measure out 3 tsps of cornstarch in a bowl . have a cup of water at hand and add a small amount of water to the cornstarch at a time . mix this together until it makes a paste . you are going to use this paste to seal your spring rolls .

mix 3 tsps of corn starch with water .
grab a plate and a spoon . grab corn starch and place three teaspoons on the plate . grab a cup of water and add just a little bit to the corn starch on the plate . with the spoon mix it in a circle motion until it starts to get sticky and is all mixed together . if you need to you can add more water to make sure it is all mixed . we want it to be pasty so that we can use it to close our spring rolls .

mix 3 tsps of corn starch with water .
using a teaspoon , measure out 3 teaspoons of cornstarch . add the 3 teaspoons of cornstarch to the center of a plate . add a little bit of water to the cornstarch . mix well so that the water and cornstarch combines into a paste .

now add the rolls into the hot oil and cook for 6- 8minutes until they are light golden brown .
get a wok pan of oil very hot . carefully put the rolls into the oil , one at a time , without touching the hot oil . let them cook in the oil until they are brown in color .

now add the rolls into the hot oil and cook for 6- 8minutes until they are light golden brown .
slowly and carefully place rolls in the pan full of hot oil . cook the rolls until the are a brown color . remove the rolls from the pan using tongs .

now add the rolls into the hot oil and cook for 6- 8minutes until they are light golden brown .
take the rolls and add them to the pan of hot oil . cook the rolls for 6 to 8 minutes . continue to cook until the rolls are brown .

put the mixture on edge roll and fold it tucking in edges and at the end spread corn starch mixture .
put the wrappers on a plate . put the mixture in the center of the wrapper closest to you . slowly fold and roll the wrappers into a roll . tuck in the sides , so there are n't any holes . use your finger to put the corn starch mixture to seal the edge of the wrapper .

put the mixture on edge roll and fold it tucking in edges and at the end spread corn starch mixture .
place the wrapper onto a plate . put the mixture on the roll near the center but closer to one side . fold the wrapper . fold the sides of the wrapper tightly and continue to roll the wrap . at the end take some corn starch and put it on the end and seal the wrapper .

put the mixture on edge roll and fold it tucking in edges and at the end spread corn starch mixture .
now go ahead and place the wrappers in the plate . take the mixture and put it about 1/4 of the ways from an edge , but make sure it is centered . now roll in the edges , and tuck them well . now we will roll the wrapper up until it is almost sealed . but before you seal it , use some corn starch mixture to moist the edge and then roll it shut .

microwave the mixture on high for 1 - 2 minutes just until slightly soft but crisp .
mix the vegetable / sprouts thoroughly in the bowl . place the mix bowl in a microwave . set / confirm the microwave power level at high . microwave for 1 - 2 minutes until mix is slightly soft .

microwave the mixture on high for 1 - 2 minutes just until slightly soft but crisp .
but your bowl of ingredients in the microwave . set on high set for 1 - 2 minutes . this is just to soften it a bit there should be crispness to it .

microwave the mixture on high for 1 - 2 minutes just until slightly soft but crisp .
now we will microwave the mixture in our microwave oven for about 1 - 2 minutes . we only want it to microwave until the noodles have a slightly soft crisp to them .

1 lbs large peeled and cooked frozen shrimps soak in cold water for 15 - 20 minutes or until they are defrosted .
use 1 lb of large peeled cooked frozen shrimp from the store . soak the shrimp in cold water until they are not frozen . about 15 or 20 minutes .

1 lbs large peeled and cooked frozen shrimps soak in cold water for 15 - 20 minutes or until they are defrosted .
now for the filling , we are going to use 1 lbs . of jumbo shrimp . this shrimp is precooked , so we will just soak them in cold water . this will defrost the shrimp out for us .

1 lbs large peeled and cooked frozen shrimps soak in cold water for 15 - 20 minutes or until they are defrosted .
take a bag of large peeled and precooked frozen shrimp and put contents in a bowl . add cold water to the bowl until shrimp is just covered . soak shrimp in the cold water for 15 - 20 minutes until they are defrosted ( slightly squishy . ) . using a strainer , drain the water from the defrosted shrimp .

add 1 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp five spice powder 1 grated lime rind tsp himalayan pink salt and mix .
pick up the bottle of ground coriander and shake some into the bowl . pick up the bottle of five spice powder and shake some into the bowl . grate the peel of the lime into the bowl with a cheese grater . pour a little bit of himalayan pink salt into your hand and then pour the salt in your hand into the bowl . mix it all up !

add 1 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp five spice powder 1 grated lime rind tsp himalayan pink salt and mix .
add about a teaspoon of coriander . now add one teaspoon of the five spice powder you can find at most oriental stores or the ethnic section of your regular grocery store . use a zester or a fine grater with the smallest holes to add the zest of one lime by placing the grater over your bowl and grating the lime . add about half a teaspoon of the pink himalayan salt . now use your spoon to give the mixture a good stir .

add 1 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp five spice powder 1 grated lime rind tsp himalayan pink salt and mix .
take the contents in a mixing bowl . add 1 table spoon of coriander powder in to the bowl . add 1 table spoon of five spice powder in to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of grated lime rind in to the bowl . add little himalayan pink salt and mix .

once the shrimps are defrosted drain the water .
take the shrimp and place them into a colander . drain the shrimp .

once the shrimps are defrosted drain the water .
defrost the shrimps . take the shrimps with water in a bowl . take a strainer bowl . drain the shrimps . pour away the water in the bowl .

once the shrimps are defrosted drain the water .
take the shrimp from the freezer , and place them in a bowl of cool water . allow the shrimps to defrost . every ten minutes , squeeze two shrimps between your thumb and forefinger . when both of your test shrimps are soft , they have defrosted . check a few more shrimps for softness to be sure they have all defrosted completely . now , hold a colander over the sink , and carefully pour the bowl of shrimp into the colander .

broccoli slaw in a bowl add 1 tbsp peanut oil grated ginger chopped green onions and 2 tsps chopped garlic .
open the bag of broccoli slaw and pour it into a medium sized bowl . measure our 1 tbsp of peanut oil and pour onto the slaw in the bowl . using a grater , grate a small amount of fresh ginger and place in the bowl . chop up green onion and place it into the bowl . measure out 2 tsps of garlic and place into the bowl .

broccoli slaw in a bowl add 1 tbsp peanut oil grated ginger chopped green onions and 2 tsps chopped garlic .
take a mixing bowl and add the vegetables . add some broccoli slaw and 1 tablespoon of peanut oil in to the bowl . add 1 teaspoon of grated ginger in to the bowl . add some cut pieces of green onions . add 2 tablespoons of cut pieces of garlic .

broccoli slaw in a bowl add 1 tbsp peanut oil grated ginger chopped green onions and 2 tsps chopped garlic .
pour the peanut oil into the slaw bowl . add grated ginger , green onions and chopped garlic to the same bowl .

now add the chopped shrimps and stir until the shrimp is combined with the mixture well .
add shrimp into the bowl . use a stirring spoon and mix the shrimp into the bowl with the rest of the ingredients . stir well the shrimp is mixed evenly throughout the bowl .

now add the chopped shrimps and stir until the shrimp is combined with the mixture well .
take a small mixing bowl . cut the shrimps in to small pieces . add the shrimps in to the contents of the bowl . take a spoon . mix the contents of the bowl and the shrimps well .

now add the chopped shrimps and stir until the shrimp is combined with the mixture well .
add the cut up shrimp to the bowl with the other contents . then stir until the shrimp is combined with the mixture .

once the rolls turn brown remove and place them on a plate with paper towels and serve .
wait until the rolls turn brown . use tongs to grab them out of the oil carefully . put them on a plate with paper towels on top .

once the rolls turn brown remove and place them on a plate with paper towels and serve .
line a plate with paper towels . once the spring rolls are golden brown use tongs to remove them from pan . place the cooked rolls on the plate lined with paper towels to drain .

once the rolls turn brown remove and place them on a plate with paper towels and serve .
get a plate and put 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on it . when the spring rolls have turned golden brown use a pair of tongs to remove them from the oil and put them on the paper towels .

once it is done remove from the microwave and stir it around to mix the ingredients .
once the vegetables have cooked 1 to 2 mins . take out of the microwave . get a spoon and stir the vegetables to mix all together .

once it is done remove from the microwave and stir it around to mix the ingredients .
put the broccoli in microwave . operate the microwave 1 - 2 minutes . check the broccoli soft . mix every ingredients . make sure every ingredients are mixed well .

once it is done remove from the microwave and stir it around to mix the ingredients .
once the broccoli has become soft after about 1 - 2 minutes , grab a fork . take your fork and just stir around the noodles and broccoli . make sure the ingredients are mixed well .

peel the skin of 1 inch long ginger and grate it and set it aside .
use your peeler to peel all of the skin off of the ginger . watch your fingers ! then use a grater to grate the garlic , again watch your fingers ! slowly grate the ginger by moving the ginger up and down the grater .

peel the skin of 1 inch long ginger and grate it and set it aside .
use a peeler to peel the skin off of the ginger . take a grater and grate the ginger . set the pile of ginger for the moment .

peel the skin of 1 inch long ginger and grate it and set it aside .
take a long piece of ginger . take a peeler and remove the peel of the ginger . take a grater and a bowl . grate the ginger in to small pieces . keep it aside .

cut off the tails and chop the shrimps into rough pieces about inch thick and set them aside .
with a knife cut off the tails off the shrimp . cut the shrimp into pieces using a knife .

cut off the tails and chop the shrimps into rough pieces about inch thick and set them aside .
take some shrimps on a cutting board . cut the tails of the shrimps with the knife . cut the shrimps in to one inch thick pieces . repeat the same with all the shrimps . place the shrimps aside .

cut off the tails and chop the shrimps into rough pieces about inch thick and set them aside .
use a knife to cut the tail of the shrimp . then cut the rest of the shrimp . the pieces should be about 1/4 of an inch thick . set the shrimp aside .

take rinsed and dried green onions cut off an inch in start and root bases chop into 1/4 inch pieces .
wash off the green onions and then dry them . bunch the green onions together on a cutting board . using a knife cut an inch off of the top of the onions to remove any bad ends and to even out the length of the onions . now cut off the roots at the bottom of the green onions . cut up the onions into small pieces about 1/4 of an inch .

take rinsed and dried green onions cut off an inch in start and root bases chop into 1/4 inch pieces .
now we are going to take an inch off the top of the greens with our knife . now take the knife and remove the roots as well . once this is done , take your knife and cut the stem into about 1/4 inch pieces . keep your fingers clear of the path of the knife .

take rinsed and dried green onions cut off an inch in start and root bases chop into 1/4 inch pieces .
get out your cutting board . get your sharp knife . wash your onion with water . put your onion onto the cutting board . cut your onion .

mix flour pepper garlic powder salt and paprika in a bowl .
take a small bowl of flour and add salt and pepper to it . add some garlic powder to the flour . add some onion powder to the flour . last , add some paprika to the flour . stir it around with a spoon to completely combine .

mix flour pepper garlic powder salt and paprika in a bowl .
mix the flour in a bowl with salt and pepper . pour in some garlic and onion powder . add paprika and mix .

mix flour pepper garlic powder salt and paprika in a bowl .
take a small mixing bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . add some paprika and garlic powder in to the bowl . add little salt in to the bowl and mix .

fry the chicken wings in deep oil .
grab the chicken one piece at a time . carefully lower each chicken piece into the oil slowly . cook the chicken in the oil until golden brown .

fry the chicken wings in deep oil .
place the chicken in the pan carefully as the oil is very hot . cook the chicken in the pan for around 12 minutes for smaller pieces and 15 minutes for larger pieces . turn the chick every few minutes . turn the heat off . drain the chicken on a plate that has been covered with a napkin .

fry the chicken wings in deep oil .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add the chicken wings in the oil . fry the chicken in hot oil .

coat the chicken wings with both mixture .
put the chicken into the egg wash . completely coat the chicken with egg wash . put the chicken into the flour , shaking off the extra flour . then repeat the process .

coat the chicken wings with both mixture .
completely coat chicken in egg wash . roll chicken in flour . roll chicken again in flour . coat the chicken again in egg wash . roll chicken again in flour .

coat the chicken wings with both mixture .
take a chicken wing from a bowl . dip it into a wet mixture . then put it into corn meal . roll it around until completely coated . repeat until all chicken is coated .

drain the chicken wings with paper towel and serve .
place several paper towels on a plate . use tongs to remove the chicken from the fryer . place the chicken on the paper towels so the extra oil can be absorbed .

drain the chicken wings with paper towel and serve .
take out your chicken wings with a knife . place your chicken wings onto a paper towel .

drain the chicken wings with paper towel and serve .
take a pot on the stove . add some oil in to the pot and heat the oil . fry the chicken in the oil . take a bowl and place some paper towels in the bowl . now remove the chicken from the pot and drain them on the paper towel .

beat an egg and mix with some milk .
crack the egg . place the egg into the bowl . add milk to the bowl . with a fork mix the egg and milk together .

beat an egg and mix with some milk .
tap an egg to crack and open it into the bowl . take a fork and mix the egg up . pour in a bit of milk and mix everything .

beat an egg and mix with some milk .
take a small bowl and crack an egg into it . pour a little milk on top of the egg in the bowl . use a fork to mix the egg and milk together until the yolk and white are combined .

cook bacon in a pan until crispy .
place your frying pan on the stove top . grab your sharp knife and chop up your bacon into cubes . turn on the heat under your frying pan , and put your bacon into the bacon . watch bacon closely , and heat until crispy . once bacon is crispy , turn off the heat and place cooked bacon on a paper towel to absorb the oil .

cook bacon in a pan until crispy .
take a pan on a stove . cut the bacon in to cube shaped pieces . add the bacon in to the pan . mix with the spatula . cook the bacon till it is crispy .

cook bacon in a pan until crispy .
put the squares of bacon into your pan . stir the bacon and make sure each side gets cooked . when the bacon is crispy , it 's finished .

put 2 tsp of olive oil add cut bread dices and fry .
add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to hot pan . then add cut up pieces of bread . fry the bread in the oil .

put 2 tsp of olive oil add cut bread dices and fry .
add two tablespoons of olive oil to hot pan with the bacon fat . add cubed pieces of bread to pan . fry bread until golden brown .

put 2 tsp of olive oil add cut bread dices and fry .
take a pan on a stove . add 2 tsp of olive oil in to the frying pan . cut the bread slices in to the cube shaped pieces . take the bread in a bowl . add the bread in to the frying pan .

tear fresh lettuce leaves and add them with seasoned kale leaves .
take a clean big glass bowl . take cut pieces of lettuce leaves in to the bowl . take fresh kale leaves . tear the kale leaves in to small pieces with hand . add the kale leaves in to the bowl .

tear fresh lettuce leaves and add them with seasoned kale leaves .
tear the lettuce leaves in pieces . the pieces should be small enough to fit in your mouth . and big enough you can pick them up with a fork . put the pieces in the bowl with the kale .

tear fresh lettuce leaves and add them with seasoned kale leaves .
take the lettuce with your hands . tear it with your hands .

add roasted bread crumbs crispy bacon slices of parmesan cheese shaved to seasoned greens and pour dressing blend on top .
