add roasted bread crumbs crispy bacon slices of parmesan cheese shaved to seasoned greens and pour dressing blend on top .
place kale and greens in large salad bowl . add roasted bread crumbs . sprinkle on top crispy bacon slices . using a cheese slicer , slowly shave thin slices of parmesan cheese . pour dressing blend on top .

add roasted bread crumbs crispy bacon slices of parmesan cheese shaved to seasoned greens and pour dressing blend on top .
add bread crumbs , cooked bacon , pieces of parmesan cheese . pour dressing on top .

tear raw kale leaves in bite size pieces add lemon juice and salt and massage thoroughly keep it aside .
tear the raw kale into small pieces that can be easily eaten and place in bowl . cut the lemon in half with a knife . squeeze the lemon so that the juice will spray on the kale pieces . turn the salt shaker and add salt to the kale leaves . rub the lemon and salt into the kale leaves so that they are coated with the lemon juice . put away from you while you do something else .

tear raw kale leaves in bite size pieces add lemon juice and salt and massage thoroughly keep it aside .
tear kale into bite size pieces . add lemon juice from a whole lemon . next add salt to kale . use your hands to mix the kale , lemon , and salt together .

tear raw kale leaves in bite size pieces add lemon juice and salt and massage thoroughly keep it aside .
rip apart dark green lettuce into small pieces . add lemon juice and salt . mix with hands .

mix 1 cup of whole egg mayonnaise dijon mustard paste half a lemon juice 2 anchovies finely chopped .
add 1 cup of whole egg mayonnaise to the bowl . next add 1 teaspoon of dijon mustard . then add a 1/2 of lemon . finally , add garlic and 2 anchovies cut up very small . mix all ingredients together .

mix 1 cup of whole egg mayonnaise dijon mustard paste half a lemon juice 2 anchovies finely chopped .
put 1 measuring cup of mayonnaise and 1 tablespoon of dijon mustard into a bowl . cut one lemon in half and squeeze 1 half into the bowl . cut up 2 anchovies and put into the bowl ( you can skip this step if you do not like anchovies ) . cut up 1 clove of garlic into very small pieces . mix everything that is in the bowl .

mix 1 cup of whole egg mayonnaise dijon mustard paste half a lemon juice 2 anchovies finely chopped .
scoop one cup of mayonnaise and dijon mustard paste into a bowl . squeeze half a lemon into the same bowl . use a knife to chop two anchovies into small pieces .

1 clove of garlic finely chopped 2 tsp of grated parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper .
pull apart a bulb of garlic separating it into cloves . cut one of the cloves up into very tiny pieces and add to dressing . using a cheese grater , rub the parmesan cheese up and down the grater . when you have 2 teaspoons of cheese grated , add it to the dressing . twist the pepper grinder to sprinkle a little pepper into the dressing and mix with a whisk .

1 clove of garlic finely chopped 2 tsp of grated parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper .
add 1 clove of garlic to the bowl . then add grated parmesan cheese . next add some fresh ground black pepper . mix it together . add some water to get the consistency you want .

1 clove of garlic finely chopped 2 tsp of grated parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper .
place on counter : chef 's knife , medium size bowl , medium jar , small grater , whisk . with the chef 's knife and 1 clove of garlic , chop the garlic into small bits . carefully scrape the bits of garlic onto the knife and drop them into bowl . over the bowl , rub a block of parmesan cheese on the grater to make 2 spoonfuls . turn a black pepper grinder a few turns over the bowl .

pour the blend into a jar .
pour the mixture into a jar . the jar will make it easier to serve .

pour the blend into a jar .
find a jar with a spout for pouring the dressing . carefully pour the dressing from the bowl into the jar .

pour the blend into a jar .
hold up the bowl with your hands . slowly and carefully pour the blend from the bowl into a jar .

dice the short cut bacon .
dice the short cut bacon . be sure to use a knife .

dice the short cut bacon .
cut the short cut bacon into small cubes . you can first cut it into strips . then you can cut them to small cubes by cutting the strips .

dice the short cut bacon .
with a sharp knife , cut the bacon into 1/2 inch strips . turn the strips sideways on your cutting board and cut them in 1/2 inch strips again , making very small squares .

cut the bread loaves into half remove the crust and dice .
cut the loaf of bread in half with a knife . using a knife cut the hard crust off of the bread . cut the bread into small squares .

cut the bread loaves into half remove the crust and dice .
we are going to first prepare the croutons - start by cutting the loaf in half . day old bread is best . cut off the crust , because we want to use the soft bread and not the hard crust . add bacon squares in the pan . the cut up bread will suck up the bacon oil while cooking .

cut the bread loaves into half remove the crust and dice .
use a bread or serrated knife to cut the bread into half width wise using a sawing motion . cut the outer edge or crust off of all sides , top and bottom , until just the fluffy bread is left . cut into cubes using a sawing motion .

add beef cubes to the pot .
hold the bowl of beef over the pot . pour the beef cubes into the pot .

add beef cubes to the pot .
put two pounds of beef chuck cubes into the hot pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the beef .

add beef cubes to the pot .
cut the 2 pounds of beef into 1 inch cubes . toss the cut beef into the bowl with the noodles . mix them together with a stirring spoon .

melt butter in a pot .
take a pot on the stove . heat the pot . add some butter in to the pot . heat the butter in the pot . melt the butter in the pot .

melt butter in a pot .
place a piece of butter in the pot . let the butter sit until it becomes liquid .

melt butter in a pot .
add 2 tablespoons of butter to the pan . melt the butter and spread it around the pan .

add paprika to the pot and stir .
measure 2 teaspoons of hungarian paprika and sprinkle it into the pan with the other ingredients . turn the stove down on low . let it cook for about an hour , and occasionally stir it with a wooden spoon . while it cooks , add another cup of water or beef stock if you need to , to keep everything moist .

add paprika to the pot and stir .
take a pot on the stove . add the ingredients in to the pot . cook the ingredients . add a table spoon of paprika in to the pot . mix it with other ingredients of the pot .

add paprika to the pot and stir .
add 2 tablespoons of paprika to the pot . adjust the heat to low . use a mixing spoon to stir for 1 hour . add 1 cup of water and continue stirring the bowl .

cook onion in the pot .
put onion in the hot pot . cook the onions in the pot .

cook onion in the pot .
heat up a large pot on the stove with a couple tablespoons of oil inside . take the thinly sliced onions and put them in the pan once the pan is hot . cook the onions until they are soft and a little bit see through . this will take about 5 - 8 minutes .

cook onion in the pot .
add 2 thinly sliced onion into the pot . cook for 5 to 8 minutes .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
grab some salt and pepper with your fingers . sprinkle it into the pot .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
take meat and cut into small pieces with a knife . add to pot . then add salt and pepper . stir with wooden spoon . cook until completely heated .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
add salt into the pot . put some pepper in . use a stirring spoon to mix it together in the pan . cook for 1 more hour .

pour water into the pan .
pour in 1 cup of water to the pan . use stirring spoon to mix the ingredients while it cooks .

pour water into the pan .
hold the water cup over the pan . carefully pour the water in the pan without splashing .

pour water into the pan .
pour one cup of beef stock to your mixture in the pot . use your wooden spoon to mix it . you can also add one cup of water instead of the beef stock .

mix together flour baking powder baking soda salt and sugar .
add correct amounts of flour , baking soda , salt , and sugar to a bowl . using a whisk or spatula , stir the ingredients together until they are mixed .

mix together flour baking powder baking soda salt and sugar .
add 1 tsp of baking powder . add 1/4 tsp baking soda . add 1/4 tsp salt . add 2 t sugar . whisk all together .

mix together flour baking powder baking soda salt and sugar .
put flour into bowl . add 1 teaspoon of baking powder and 1/4 teaspoon of baking soda . add 1/4 teaspoon of salt for flavor . add 2 tablespoons of white granulated sugar which helps keep pancakes moist . use wire whisk to blend together until no lumps .

mix together an egg butter and butter milk .
put one large egg into a bowl . whisk the egg . add 3 tbsp of melted butter to the eggs , mixing them together . add 1 cup of buttermilk to the egg and butter . mix all the ingredients together .

mix together an egg butter and butter milk .
take a large egg and break into the bowl . beat the egg very clearly . add 40 grams of butter which we weighed using a machine into the egg . add 240 ml of buttermilk into the bowl with egg and butter .

mix together an egg butter and butter milk .
put one large egg into a bowl and whisk it . add 3 tablespoons of melted room temperature butter to the egg . mix the butter and egg thoroughly . add 1 cup of buttermilk to the egg and butter mixture . mix all the wet ingredients together thoroughly .

pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir .
put mixture in bowl first . add all wet ingredients . mix it , but not too much ( a few lumps is fine ) . put batter on hot pan in ladle fulls . let cook .

pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir .
put dry ingredients into one bowl and mix together . put wet ingredients into one bowl and mix together . put wet ingredients into dry ingredients . stir gently , do not over mix . lumps are okay in pancakes .

pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir .
add all the wet ingredients into the bowl of dry ingredients . gently mix the ingredients together . stir gently until lightly mixed together . if it 's mixed too much the batter will be tough .

spray the pan with a nonstick spray .
spray the skillet with a nonstick spray . you can also use butter or oil but they have more fat then the spray .

spray the pan with a nonstick spray .
spray the pan with non - stick vegetable spray . if you do n't have spray , you can use a little oil and spread it on the pan . if you do n't have oil you can use melted butter and spread it on the pan .

spray the pan with a nonstick spray .
take a skillet and spray with non stick spray . make sure you cover all the corners so nothing will stick . if you do n't have pam you can brush on melted butter to the whole skillet .

pour some batter onto the pan .
once you have mixed your batter , use your spoon or kitchen utensil of choice to pour batter onto your pan . make sure you leave enough room for spreading , especially if you plan on making several pancakes on the same pan at the same time .

pour some batter onto the pan .
use a ladle to put the pancake batter on the pan . make sure you leave enough room for the batter to spread .

pour some batter onto the pan .
let griddle heat up to 350 . make batter with buttermilk and pancake mix . with a large spoon , scoop up some of the batter and spoon it onto the griddle , make sure that the batter is in a circle . this is because it gives more room to add more cakes . when you see the batter bubbling wait 1 minute and flip with a flipper . let the cakes brown . take cakes off of the griddle .

after bubbles form flip the pancake .
start cooking the batter . look for bubbles on top then check if bottom is brown . do a quick flip . let other side cook .

after bubbles form flip the pancake .
put pancake batter onto pan . watch the batter . when top starts to bubble lift with spatula to check . look for the bottom to be golden brown . flip the pancake with spatula .

after bubbles form flip the pancake .
once you see bubbles popping on the top , check the bottom of the pancake with your spatula . if it is golden brown , flip the pancake .

after both sides brown move the pancakes to a plate .
check for color of pancake . if it is brown , pancake is ready . check both side of pancake for brown color . make a plate ready . move pancake one by one , side by side .

after both sides brown move the pancakes to a plate .
get out griddle and turn it on . spray griddle with pam oil from can . put a small amount of batter onto griddle . cook on each side until brown . remove from griddle and put onto plate next to each other .

after both sides brown move the pancakes to a plate .
take pancakes off the griddle onto plate . turn each side over to make sure they are a patchy brown color . if not then put it back on the griddle . once done do n't stack the pancakes as you 'll make them soggy . do one layer of pancakes so make sure you have a big platter .

roll a lime and cut it in half .
roll a lime between your palm and the cutting board . this will start to break down the lime . cut the lime in half .

roll a lime and cut it in half .
roll a lime on a cutting board . make sure you roll it a lot to get the juice loose in the lime .

roll a lime and cut it in half .
take a lime and roll it back and forth with the palm of your hand . cut the lime in half with a knife .

squeeze lime into a bowl .
carefully cut a whole lime into two halves . hold the cut lime half over the bowl and squeeze the juice out into the bowl . do the same for the second half of the lime .

squeeze lime into a bowl .
take a lemon on a board . cut the lemon in to two halves with a knife . take a clean small bowl . squeeze one half of lemon in to the bowl . now squeeze another half of lemon .

squeeze lime into a bowl .
grab a bowl . grab the green lime . grab a knife but have a adult supervision . cut in half . squeeze the lime in the bowl .

add sugar to the lime juice in the bowl and mix .
add the sugar to the bowl of lime juice . stir the juice and sugar together until the sugar dissolves .

add sugar to the lime juice in the bowl and mix .
take a clean medium sized bowl . take lemon juice in to the bowl . take a tablespoon measurement . add two tablespoons of sugar in to the lime juice . mix the sugar in the bowl with a spatula .

add sugar to the lime juice in the bowl and mix .
use a measuring spoon to measure out two tablespoons of sugar . add the sugar to the lime juice in a bowl . use a spoon to stir the sugar into the lime juice until it is dissolved .

add fish sauce to the bowl and mix .
pour fish sauce in the bowl . using your spoon , mix up the ingredients in the bowl .

add fish sauce to the bowl and mix .
add two table spoons of fish sauce to the bowl . mix well .

add fish sauce to the bowl and mix .
add 2 tablespoons of fish sauce in bowl . then mix .

add water to the bowl while mixing .
add water to the bowl . at the same time you are adding the water , stir it .

add water to the bowl while mixing .
add a table spoon of water to the bowl . continue stirring in the water as you pour .

add water to the bowl while mixing .
start mixing the things in the bowl . while mixing add a tablespoon of water to the bowl .

add garlic and chili to the bowl .
mince- you are going to cut it very small . mince the garlic and red chili peppers . add them to your bowl .

add garlic and chili to the bowl .
your important flavors are garlic and red chili . put the garlic and chili in the bowl .

add garlic and chili to the bowl .
chop the garlic very small with a knife . put the chopped garlic on the knife and slide it into a bowl . chop the red chili very small with a knife . put the chopped red chili on the knife and slide it into the bowl with the garlic .

chop herbs and mix them into the bowl .
cut up all the herbs into little pieces . add them into the bowl .

chop herbs and mix them into the bowl .
place herbs on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut herbs into very small bits , being very careful not to cut your fingers . the best was to do that is to hold the top of the knife down with one hand on top , and using an up and down chopping motion with the other . add the chopped herbs to the bowl , using the side of the knife to move them from the cutting board . use a spoon to stir the herbs into the sauce .

chop herbs and mix them into the bowl .
chop herbs really fine . add to bowl of dipping sauce . mix the herbs and oil together .

fill soaked rice paper sheets with prawns cucumber carrots and spring onions .
place 3 prawns in a row on the rice paper . add some slices of cucumber on top of them . then add a few slices of carrots . put some spring onions on the top of that .

fill soaked rice paper sheets with prawns cucumber carrots and spring onions .
place prawns on rice paper sheets . cut cucumbers , carrot and spring onions into long thin strips . add carrots on top of prawns . add cucumbers on top of shrimp . add spring onions on top of prawns .

fill soaked rice paper sheets with prawns cucumber carrots and spring onions .
add prawns to a sheet of soaked rice paper . top the prawns with sliced cucumber . add a little bit of sliced carrot to the cucumber . add spring onions on top of the cucumber .

wrap the rolls tightly .
put the contents on top of the rice paper . next fold the ends . then wrap the roll up as tightly as possible .

wrap the rolls tightly .
prepare the roll . put the vegetables into the roll . using both hands , put the roll into the vegetables in the middle . close them and make it tight . roll it gently .

wrap the rolls tightly .
place everything into the wrapper . pull both ends to the center . then take the other side and start wrapping the roll up into a cylinder . keep the wrap as tight as you can . once the whole wrap is tightly wrapped up your done .

peel off some zest from a lemon .
with a knife , carefully shave the zest from the lemon . cut off one piece about the size of a fingernail for each serving .

peel off some zest from a lemon .
get your clean lemon . use a sharp knife to slowly shave off only the top yellow layer of the lemon peel by holding the lemon with one hand and angling your knife until it 's pretty flat with the lemon . you need a piece as big as your finger nail .

peel off some zest from a lemon .
you can use a peeler or a knife . take a lemon and cut some of the skin off - that is what they call zest from a lemon .

add snow peas to the broth .
use your hands and carefully lower the snow peas into the broth . be careful not to touch the hot broth and pot .

add snow peas to the broth .
wait for your broth to simmer . now add six snow peas to your simmering broth with your hand , gently placing it in the pot as not to splash yourself . cook it for about 60 seconds .

add snow peas to the broth .
turn on stove . fill pot up with broth . let the broth heat up . place peas carefully into broth . let the broth simmer .

cook udon noodles in a pot with boiling water .
fill a pot with water and turn up the heat . wait until the water bubbles up . put the noodles in the wt .

cook udon noodles in a pot with boiling water .
fill a large pot with water . turn up the heat on the stove to make the water boil . slowly add the udon noodles to the boiling water so that the water does n't splash on you .

cook udon noodles in a pot with boiling water .
fill a pot with water and put it on high heat until it comes to a rolling boil ( bubbles that keep coming to the top all the time ) . place a package of noodles into the boiling water until the are done . usually they require 3 - 4 minutes of boiling .

mix in soy sauce .
hold the bowl of soy sauce over the pan . carefully pour in the soy sauce . mix with a wooden spoon .

mix in soy sauce .
add the rest of the soy sauce to the mix . use a spoon to stir the mixture . cook until the mixture thickens . take off the heat and set aside .

mix in soy sauce .
add the soy mixture to the pan . use a spoon to stir and cook until thickened . take the pan off the heat once thickened and set pan aside .

mix brown sugar soy sauce and mirin .
have a small bowl that you can mix your ingredients in . put two tablespoons of brown sugar in the bowl . pour in three tablespoons of soy sauce . pour in three tablespoons of mirin . using a whisk , mix the three ingredients together .

mix brown sugar soy sauce and mirin .
pour 2 tablespoons of brown sugar into a bowl . add 3 tablespoons of soy sauce . add 3 tablespoons of mirin . use a whisk to mix together all of the ingredients in the bowl .

mix brown sugar soy sauce and mirin .
get a small bowl . add 2 tb of brown sugar to the bowl . combine 3 tb each of soy sauce and mirin with the sugar . mix with a whisk until all the ingredients are dissolved ( you can no longer see the sugar ) .

add lemon zest and then noodles to the bowl .
add the lemon zest into the bowl . put the noodles into the bowl with chopsticks . using a spoon place the broth into the bowl .

add lemon zest and then noodles to the bowl .
add 1 piece of lemon skin to each bowl with your fingers . grab some noodles with chopsticks and put it on top of the lemon pieces in both bowls .

add lemon zest and then noodles to the bowl .
use a sharp knife to cut come lemon zest from a lemon . put a piece of lemon in the bottom of each bowl . add the strained udon noodles to each bowl . add soup stock to each bowl .

fry mushrooms in a pan .
cut the bottom off the mushrooms . use hands to shred the mushrooms . add to pan . cook on high heat . continue to cook until the mushrooms are golden brown .

fry mushrooms in a pan .
on a cutting board , cut the bottom off a bunch of oyster mushrooms . pull the mushrooms apart into smaller sized pieces that can be stirred easily . heat a frying pan on high heat and add 2 tb of butter until it is melted . add the mushrooms and cook ( saute ) them until they are golden brown and smell good .

fry mushrooms in a pan .
gather your bunch of mushrooms and using a knife , cut the bottom of them off . then using your hands , break apart the mushrooms into small pieces . measure out 2 tablespoons of butter and add to a pan on high heat until it starts to heat up and bubble a little bit . add the mushrooms to the pan of butter . saute , or mix , the mushrooms up in the pan until they reach a golden brown color and are done .

add soup stock snow peas and an egg .
take the noodles in a bowl . add soup stock in to the bowls . add snow peas in to the bowl . take a boiled egg in a bowl . add the egg in to the bowls .

add soup stock snow peas and an egg .
add soup stock to the bowl . then add some snow peas . put some mushroom on the top . finally add an egg .

add soup stock snow peas and an egg .
add soup stock with a large spoon to the bowl of noodles . add cooked snow peas , about 4 of them . add cooked mushrooms to the bowl . add a just barely cooked egg to the bowl .

add dashi to the pan .
hold the dashi cup over the pot . carefully and slowly pour the dashi in the pot .

add dashi to the pan .
get a measuring cup and the dashi . slowly pour the dashi into the measuring cup until it reaches the 2 1/2 cup marker line . slowly and carefully pour the measured dashi into the pan with the soy mixture . mix the dashi in with the soy mixture using a whisk . keep the burner on low heat to bring the mixture to a low boil ( simmer ) and then you can move on .

add dashi to the pan .
take a large pot on the stove . cook the contents of the pot . take the dashi in a bowl . add the dashi to the pan . mix everything properly with a whisk .

garnish with furikake .
top off the dish with a sprinkle of furikake . serve the dish .

garnish with furikake .
sprinkle some furikake on top . use your fingers to sprinkle .

garnish with furikake .
once the dish is complete , you need to sprinkle the furikake on it . using your hand , sprinkle the furikake on top of the other ingredients .

heat the mixture in a sauce pan .
put the soy sauce mixture in a sauce pan . heat the mixture and use a wire whisk to mix it . simmer until everything is dissolved and combined .

heat the mixture in a sauce pan .
take a small pan and heat it . take the sauce in a small bowl . add the sauce in to the hot pan . heat the mixture in the pan . whisk the mixture in the pan .

heat the mixture in a sauce pan .
pour 2/3 soy sauce in a small bowl . grab a pan and place it on the stove . heat up stove . add soy sauce to mixture . simmer until everything is dissolved .

pour in boiling water bean curd and carnation milk .
pour water into the mixture . pour carnation milk to the mixture . with a spoon scoop out the carnation milk mixture to make sure you get it all .

pour in boiling water bean curd and carnation milk .
pour the measured boiling water into the pot on the stove . add the fried bean curd into the pot . ( optional ? pour the coconut cream into the pot ) . pour the carnation milk into the pot . gently stir the mix in the pot .

pour in boiling water bean curd and carnation milk .
now you will pour in the boiling water into the pan . careful not to spill any . now you want to add in the fried bean curd . now take the coconut cream and carnation milk and pour them in as well . remember to keep stirring as you pour each ingredient in .

place the noodle bean sprout prawn fish cake and eggs into a bowl and pour the gravy over .
take a bowl and add the noodles in to the bowl . add bean sprouts in to the bowl . add prawn fish cake in to the bowl . cut the boiled egg in to halves and add it to the bowl . add the gravy in to the bowl .

place the noodle bean sprout prawn fish cake and eggs into a bowl and pour the gravy over .
put the noodles into a bowl . add bean sprouts and prawns to the bowl . put fish cake and eggs in the bowl on top of the noodles . pour gravy over everything in the bowl . garnish the bowl with chopped laksa leaves over the top .

place the noodle bean sprout prawn fish cake and eggs into a bowl and pour the gravy over .
boil some water in a pot . put prawns into the boiling water for about 5 minutes . take the prawns out of the boiling water with a big spoon after 5 minutes and put them in a separate bowl . put your noodles in another bowl and put the cooked prawns on top of your noodles . put your beansprouts , fish cakes , and eggs on top of the noodles and prawns . use a big spoon and pour gravy all over the noodles , prawns , eggs , and fish cakes .

place the noodles and bean sprout in boiling water .
put the noodles and bean sprout into boiling water . after they have cooked , drain each separately . pour into a serving bowl .

place the noodles and bean sprout in boiling water .
now we want to poach the noodles and bean sprouts . put them in boiling water and let them poach . now we can drain them separately and place them in the serving bowl .

place the noodles and bean sprout in boiling water .
get a medium size sauce pan and fill it half way with water . put the pan on the stove and turn the burner on to a medium low setting . when the water is very hot , carefully put the noodles and beansprouts in the water . wait until the noodles are cooked until tender . turn off the heat . get a colander and pour the noodles and beansprouts in the colander to drain thoroughly . put the noodles and beansprouts in a bowl .

slice the fish cakes bean curd and boiled eggs .
slice bean curd , hard boiled eggs and fish cakes on cutting board using knife . heat up cooking oil in pain .

slice the fish cakes bean curd and boiled eggs .
place the fishcakes , bean curd and hard boiled eggs on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to slice the fishcakes , bean curd and hard boiled eggs .

slice the fish cakes bean curd and boiled eggs .
before we start cutting our ingredients , make sure to choose a very sharp knife . a sharp knife is always safer because you wo n't have to force it to cut the food . forcing often leads to accidents . once you have a very sharp knife , place the hard boiled eggs on a cutting board . cut a small wedge from one side of each egg , so that you can set them down and they wo n't roll away while you cut them . then cut them into slices that are almost as wide as your pinkie finger . next , cut the fish cakes into quarters . first cut them in half , then turn them so you can cut them in half again . you should have four pieces . finally , cut four slices of bean curd . set all of your ingredients aside , and put the cooking oil we measured at the beginning into a pan .

heat up cooking oil in a pan and add laksa paste .
place a pan on one burner of the stove . pour cooking oil into the pan . adjust the heat for that burner to heat the pan . shake the jar of chng kee 's laksa paste too add the paste to the pan . use a ladle to stir the paste and oil in the pan to mix them together .

heat up cooking oil in a pan and add laksa paste .
with a spoon place some oil in a pan . place the whole jar of laksa paste into the pan . using a spoon mix the two together .

heat up cooking oil in a pan and add laksa paste .
add cooking oil to a pan and heat it up . put laksa paste to the pan . use the stirring spoon to stir the paste into the pan .

sprinkle the bowl with laksa leaves .
take a spoon and scoop up some laksa leaves . add the laksa leaves to the top of the bowl . spread the leaves evenly to the top of the bowl .

sprinkle the bowl with laksa leaves .
take your finely chopped laksa leaves . use a small teaspoon to add it to your bowl . use only the tip of the spoon to sprinkle it nicely over your bowl .

sprinkle the bowl with laksa leaves .
using a spoon scoop out laksa leaves . using a spoon place the laksa leaves on top of the mixture .

mix bread crumbs milk 1 egg dried inly herbs granulated garlic splash olive oil pinch red pepper flakes whisk together .
put bread crumbs , milk , 1 egg , dried herbs , granulated garlic , a little olive oil , and some red pepper flakes into the bowl . mix everything together with your whisk .

mix bread crumbs milk 1 egg dried inly herbs granulated garlic splash olive oil pinch red pepper flakes whisk together .
in mixing bowl add bread crumbs and then carefully pour measured milk on top . add your egg and be sure there are no pieces of egg shell that fall in too . add the herbs , garlic , and two teaspoons of olive oil . add a half a teaspoon of red pepper flakes or according to how you like it ( they can be spicy ) ! using a whisk mix everything together until it all looks the same , no identifiable egg bits or milk puddles .

mix bread crumbs milk 1 egg dried inly herbs granulated garlic splash olive oil pinch red pepper flakes whisk together .
gather the slurry ingredients you set aside in the beginning . put the plain breadcrumbs into a mixing bowl . make sure you do not use seasoned breadcrumbs . pour in the milk and add one egg . any type of egg will be fine for this slurry , but make sure not to include any egg shells . you do n't need to mix this until the rest of the ingredients are in the mixing bowl . add the italian herbs , the olive oil , and the red pepper flakes . use a whisk to mix everything until it is well blended . make sure all of the breadcrumbs are moistened before you stop mixing .

take out meat balls put them to pasta sauce mix well bring to boil and let simmer for 30 minutes .
use tongs to take meatballs from pan and place them in pot with pasta sauce . use wooden spatula to mix meatballs and sauce . wait till sauce simmers to eat . optional : let meatballs simmer in sauce for 30 minutes . use large spoon to put meatballs an sauce onto spaghetti .

take out meat balls put them to pasta sauce mix well bring to boil and let simmer for 30 minutes .
fill pot with pasta sauce and place on stove . turn burner on to medium heat . place cooked meatballs into pasta sauce . allow pasta sauce with meatballs to begin to boil . once boiling , reduce burner heat to low and allow pasta sauce and meatballs to cook for about thirty minutes .

take out meat balls put them to pasta sauce mix well bring to boil and let simmer for 30 minutes .
use tongs to take the meatballs and put them into the pasta sauce pan . discard the grease from the meatballs . mix the sauce and meatballs together . bring the pan to a boil and let simmer . simmer for 30 minutes .

place the tray under broiler and bake the meat balls until well browned .
put the tray of meatballs under the broiler . heat the meatballs until they are browned .

place the tray under broiler and bake the meat balls until well browned .
turn on the oven . get out a cookie sheet . line the cookie sheet with foil . spray with no stick spray . place the meatballs on the foil pan and into the oven .

place the tray under broiler and bake the meat balls until well browned .
set your broiler to high . once the meatballs are on the tray , and the broiler is hot , place them under a broiler . broil the meatballs until they are browned .

take ground beef and ground veal in a bowl .
pour the ground beef into a large bowl . add the ground veal into the bowl with the beef .

take ground beef and ground veal in a bowl .
get a large bowl to place the meats in . crumble the ground beef into small pieces and place in the bowl . crumble the ground veal into small pieces as well and place in the bowl too .

take ground beef and ground veal in a bowl .
get a medium size size bowl . put the ground beef in the bowl , crumble the ground beef up . put the ground veal in the bowl and crumble it up too .

spread aluminum sheet on baking tray brush with olive oil and scoop meat mixture on foil into small balls .
spread aluminum foil on a baking sheet . use a brush to spread olive oil on the foil . use a scoop to scoop the beef into meatballs . place the meatballs on the foil on the sheet .

spread aluminum sheet on baking tray brush with olive oil and scoop meat mixture on foil into small balls .
cover a baking tray with a large piece of aluminum foil making sure to secure it around the sides so it does not fall off . pour a small amount of oil into the center of the tray . using a silicone brush spread the oil over the foil until the bottom of the tray is completely coated with the oil . one by one , using a small scoop , place the meat balls on the tray until all the meat is used up . make sure the meat balls are close but not touching so they do n't stick together while they are cooking .

spread aluminum sheet on baking tray brush with olive oil and scoop meat mixture on foil into small balls .
line a baking sheet with tin foil and lightly brush the foil with oil . use the sorbet spoon to form the meat mixture into small balls . place each meatball onto the lined pan .

top the sauce over spaghetti garnish with grated cheese and serve hot .
use a deep spoon to put the meatballs and sauce over the spaghetti . top the spaghetti with some parmesan cheese and serve hot .

top the sauce over spaghetti garnish with grated cheese and serve hot .
use a ladle or big spoon to scoop the sauce . pour the scoop of sauce onto the pasta . shake some cheese on top of everything .

top the sauce over spaghetti garnish with grated cheese and serve hot .
using a not too full utensil carefully spoon or ladle the sauce , as much or as little as you want , over your meatballs and pasta . sprinkle your parmesan over the sauced pasta . remember with both the sauce and cheese you can always add more easily but it 's almost impossible to take away after , less can be more ! dig in and enjoy !

meat balls can be flipped and broiled if needed .
use tongs to flip the meatballs . cook them longer to brown the other side if needed .

meat balls can be flipped and broiled if needed .
line tray with tin foil and place meatballs on top . space the meatballs out evenly on tray . flip the meatballs over to brown the other side .

meat balls can be flipped and broiled if needed .
now we can flip the meatballs if you would like the meatballs to be evenly browned . this step is not necessary , but is up to your personal preference .

now season the ground meat with salt black pepper and a little pinch of white pepper .
add salt to the ground meat bowl . put in a some black pepper to the bowl . add one small pinch of white pepper .

now season the ground meat with salt black pepper and a little pinch of white pepper .
sprinkle meat with salt . sprinkle with black pepper . next a small pinch of your fingers of white pepper which is optional . now add some parmesan cheese .

now season the ground meat with salt black pepper and a little pinch of white pepper .
sprinkle salt and black pepper on the meat . add a pinch of white pepper to the ground meat .

add grated parmesan cheese to the meat and transfer the slurry mixture into meat bowl and give a good mix .
add grated parmesan cheese on top of the other seasonings . make sure you are using fresh , authentic parmesan - the kind that looks like shredded cheese , not the kind that looks like powder . now put the slurry mixture on top of the cheese and seasonings . use the spoon to gently mix the meat with the cheese and seasonings . keep mixing until everything is very well blended . do n't worry about over mixing - make sure you mix until everything is well blended .

add grated parmesan cheese to the meat and transfer the slurry mixture into meat bowl and give a good mix .
set the meat bowl onto the work counter . add the grated parmesan cheese onto the meat . add the slurry mixture into the meat bowl . mix well the meat - cheese - slurry mixture . stop mixing when all ingredients have been blended .

add grated parmesan cheese to the meat and transfer the slurry mixture into meat bowl and give a good mix .
sprinkle grated parmesan cheeses over the raw meat in a bowl . pour the slurry mix over the meat and cheese . use a rubber spatula to mix everything til it is well mixed .

add butter to hot pan little veggie oil 1 tbsp brown sugar and place onion slices on pan to caramelize .
heat a frying pan to medium heat . add butter to the pan to melt it . add a little bit of vegetable oil . add 1 1/2 tablespoons of brown sugar . place the onion slices in one layer in the pan to caramelize them ( turn them golden brown ) .

add butter to hot pan little veggie oil 1 tbsp brown sugar and place onion slices on pan to caramelize .
add butter into a hot frying pan . add vegetable oil to the pan . add 1 1/2 tablespoons of brown sugar . add onion slices to the pan . cook until the onions begin to caramelize .

add butter to hot pan little veggie oil 1 tbsp brown sugar and place onion slices on pan to caramelize .
add butter to the pan . add oil to the pan . add brown sugar to the pan . with your fingers place the onions on the pan .

slice open the buns and place the sausages between them .
cut open buns with a knife . put griddle on top of stove , turn stove on , cook sausages . take sausages off griddle with tongs . put sausages inside buns .

slice open the buns and place the sausages between them .
hold the burn carefully . cut the buns in half carefully . put the sausage in between the cut bun .

slice open the buns and place the sausages between them .
cut open the buns with a knife . put a sausage in the middle of the bread .

add wine to the pan to cover onions and wrap pan with aluminum foil and let cook 5 - 6 min .
add some wine to the pan as it cooks . put some aluminum foil over the onions . let it cook for 5 to 6 minutes .

add wine to the pan to cover onions and wrap pan with aluminum foil and let cook 5 - 6 min .
add wine to the pan . it is used to cover the onions . take an aluminum foil and cover the pan . let it cook for 5 - 6 minutes . remove the foil once its cooked .

add wine to the pan to cover onions and wrap pan with aluminum foil and let cook 5 - 6 min .
carefully pour in the wine to the pan so that it covers the onions . put aluminum foil on the pan .

add little thyme and grated nutmeg .
take the sausage . add some thyme and grated nutmeg .

add little thyme and grated nutmeg .
break some thyme in your hands and sprinkle it in the pan . rub nutmeg on a grater above the pan .

add little thyme and grated nutmeg .
tear off a handful or so thyme leaves and sprinkle them into the skillet on top of the onions . use a microplane and grate quite a bit of nutmeg into the pan , about half a teaspoon . use a fork or spoon and stir everything in the pan together .

grate little orange zest into the pan .
use a grater to grate some zest from an orange . add the grated zest into the pan .

grate little orange zest into the pan .
hold your grater in your left hand and use your right hand to slide the orange across over the bowl . this creates orange zest !

grate little orange zest into the pan .
grab a zester ( which looks like a cheese grater with extra small holes ) , take an orange and grate just the orange part of the skin into the pan on top of your mixture .

now put the caramelized onions between the buns squeeze mustard over it to serve .
place the onions onto of the sausage . then add mustard and it is ready to serve .

now put the caramelized onions between the buns squeeze mustard over it to serve .
set the hot dogs in a row side by side . take a pair of tongs and put a small amount of the caramelized onions on top of each hot dog . next , take the mustard and squeeze a small amount onto each hotdog . they are now ready to serve and eat .

now put the caramelized onions between the buns squeeze mustard over it to serve .
take a hot dog and put in a bun . then add mustard . take onions that have been cooked and add to the top . repeat until all have been covered . then serve and eat .

oil the sausages and place them on a griddle pan .
place griddle pan onto the stove . turn stove burner on to a medium - high heat . allow griddle to heat for 3 minutes . lightly drizzle oil over top of sausages by slowly pouring with your finger slightly covering the hole as to not let it drip out too fast . place oiled sausages into the griddle pan to sear .

oil the sausages and place them on a griddle pan .
place the griddle pan on the stove . add some oil to the sausages . coat the sausages with oil . place the oiled sausages into the griddle .

oil the sausages and place them on a griddle pan .
pour oil over the sausages . place the sausages on the grill and cook .

cut the onions into thin slices .
take a cutting board and a knife . take an onion on a cutting board . cut the tip of the onion . remove the peel of the onion . cut the onion in to thin slices .

cut the onions into thin slices .
cut the ends of the onions and discard . slice the onions into this slices longways .

cut the onions into thin slices .
take an onion and use a sharp knife . cut the onion into very thin slices . then add the onion to a burger . repeat until the onion is completely cut . serve as a topping .

preheat the oven to 350 degree fahrenheit and 175 degree celsius .
turn the knob on the oven to 350 degrees . wait until the oven beeps .

preheat the oven to 350 degree fahrenheit and 175 degree celsius .
turn on the oven . turn the temperature to 350 degrees to preheat it .

preheat the oven to 350 degree fahrenheit and 175 degree celsius .
turn the oven on the 350 degrees f or 175 degrees c. . let the oven preheat .

spray 9x12 inch casserole dish with nonstick spray preferably gluten free .
spray a 9x12 baking dish with cooking spray . preheat the oven to 350 degrees .

spray 9x12 inch casserole dish with nonstick spray preferably gluten free .
turn your oven on and set it at 350 degrees . in your kitchen , find a casserole dish that is 9 by 12 . take some gluten - free cooking spray and spray all over the inside of the casserole dish .

spray 9x12 inch casserole dish with nonstick spray preferably gluten free .
turn on oven to 350 . then prepare your casserole dish by using a spray bottle . spray a layer of oil from the bottle onto the inside of the dish . get the sides and the bottom well covered .

in a sauce pan add the evaporated skimmed milk chicken bouillon granules and stir over a medium heat until the milk boils .
find a small saucepan and add the evaporated milk and the chicken boullion granules . turn the stove on medium . stir it with a spoon and keep stirring until everything is mixed well and the milk starts boiling .

in a sauce pan add the evaporated skimmed milk chicken bouillon granules and stir over a medium heat until the milk boils .
put a sauce pan over medium heat . grind up bouillon cubes . add to sauce pan with evaporated skim milk . whisk until the granules disappear and the milk begins to boil .

in a sauce pan add the evaporated skimmed milk chicken bouillon granules and stir over a medium heat until the milk boils .
add evaporated to the sauce pan . add chicken bouillon pieces . stir with a spoon over a medium heat . stir until the chicken melts and the milk begins to boil .

then add the corn starch slowly and stir for 1 - 2 minutes or until the mixture thickens .
put cornstarch in a bowl and add water to make a thin paste . slowly pour the cornstarch and water into the pot . stir for 1 to 2 minutes to thicken .

then add the corn starch slowly and stir for 1 - 2 minutes or until the mixture thickens .
slowly pour in the bowl of cornstarch careful not to spill . use a wooden spoon to mix it around evenly . the mix will look thick after a bit .

then add the corn starch slowly and stir for 1 - 2 minutes or until the mixture thickens .
bring to a boil . then slowly add the cornstarch . stir for 1 to 2 minutes with a wooden spoon or until mixture thickens .

remove it from heat and pour it into a large mixing bowl to cool down .
using oven mitts pick up the pot and remove it from the heat . carefully pour the mixture into a large mixing bowl . let cool .

remove it from heat and pour it into a large mixing bowl to cool down .
remove your pan from the heat . let the pan sit and cool down . when it is cool , pour it into a large mixing bowl .

remove it from heat and pour it into a large mixing bowl to cool down .
remove it from the heat and pour it into a large mixing bowl and wait until it 's not hot anymore .

once it is cooled add the chopped onions grated cheddar yogurt salt pepper and melted butter and mix well .
put everything in a mixing bowl and let it cool down . once it has cooled down , add in the onion and cheddar that we measured earlier . add in the salt and pepper that we measured earlier . put the butter on a platter and microwave it for 7 seconds . if it is n't melted all the way , use a butter knife to stir the solid butter with the hot , melted butter until all of the butter has completely melted . then pour the butter into the mixing bowl . stir everything in the mixing bowl until it is well mixed .

once it is cooled add the chopped onions grated cheddar yogurt salt pepper and melted butter and mix well .
once it 's cooled add the onions , cheddar , yogurt , salt , pepper and melted butter . mix it all up .

once it is cooled add the chopped onions grated cheddar yogurt salt pepper and melted butter and mix well .
cool the contents of the bowl . add the cut pieces of onions in to the bowl . add grated cheddar in to the bowl . add yogurt , salt and pepper in to the bowl . melt some butter and add it in to the bowl .

pour the sauce mixture over the grated potatoes in a very large bowl and mix until everything is well combined .
put the grated potatoes into a very large bowl . carefully pour the sauce mixture over the grated potatoes . mix the sauce and potatoes together with a spoon until it is well - blended .

pour the sauce mixture over the grated potatoes in a very large bowl and mix until everything is well combined .
pour the sauce mixture over the potatoes in a very large bowl . use a a spoon to mix everything together until everything is combined .

pour the sauce mixture over the grated potatoes in a very large bowl and mix until everything is well combined .
take a large bowl . add the grated potatoes in the large bowl . take the sauce mixture in a bowl . add the sauce mixture in to the large bowl . mix every thing until it is well mixed .

now pour the prepared mix into the ready casserole and top with diced butter .
pour the mixture into the ready casserole dish . cover the top of the mixture with butter that is cut into small cubes . the butter will help the casserole get nicely browned on top .

now pour the prepared mix into the ready casserole and top with diced butter .
pour the mixture you just made into your casserole dish . cut up a stick of butter into tiny pieces and spread that evenly on top of the mixture ( this will help the dish to get nicely browned on top ) .

now pour the prepared mix into the ready casserole and top with diced butter .
take the ingredients in the bowl and pour it into the casserole dish . next , cut butter into small cubes and place evenly on top of the ingredients .

bake for 55 minutes 1 hour when it is done let it set for 15 minutes .
take the recipe in a baking tray . bake it for 55 minutes to 1 hour . off the oven when it is done . leave the tray in the oven . let it set for 15 minutes .

bake for 55 minutes 1 hour when it is done let it set for 15 minutes .
bake for 55 minutes to 1 hour . check for the color you want on top . when it is finished , let is set for 15 minutes .

bake for 55 minutes 1 hour when it is done let it set for 15 minutes .
bake in oven for an hour . look at the color on top it should be brown . if its not brown on top cook for another 2 minutes . check color . let it stand for 15 minutes before you eat it .

cut the beef into thin long slices .
put the beef on a cutting board . using a large sharp chef 's knife cut the beef ( against the grain ) into long thin slices . be very careful not to cut your fingers .

cut the beef into thin long slices .
put the meat on the cutting board . get a very sharp knife . cut up all the meat into long , thin strips .

cut the beef into thin long slices .
use a sharp knife to cut the beef into thin long slices . watch your fingers and take your time while cutting the beef .

chop onions extremely thin .
hold the onion carefully . angle the knife . cut straight pieces out of the onion .

chop onions extremely thin .
use a cutting board and a knife and first cut the onion in half . hold the onion half steady with one hand while you cut very thin slices with the other hand , using the knife . make sure you watch your fingers so that you do n't cut them with the knife .

chop onions extremely thin .
using a knife , cut the onions . chop them into very thin pieces .

add the marinated meat spread out evenly and fry .

add the marinated meat spread out evenly and fry .
use a spoon to place the marinated meat into the hot pan . spread the meat evenly in the pan . stir the other pot containing the onions . stir the meat in the pan and add some more meat . keep stirring and cooking the meat .

add grated fresh pear to the marinade mix well and keep aside .
" adding some fresh pear into the marinade will make it extra yummy , and chemicals in the pears called enzymes " " will help to make the meat more tender . ! " " . " using a child safe grater carefully rub 2 pears over the grater to make pear mush . be careful not to get the seeds or rough center of the pears in the sauce , just the soft flesh of the pears . add the pear mush to the bowl with the other ingredients already in there , and mix it well . put the bowl aside for now .

add grated fresh pear to the marinade mix well and keep aside .
now we will take our fresh pair and start grating it . hold the grater with one hand and rub the pear across the surface of the grater . now once you grate your pears just mix them around with your marinade in the bowl .

add grated fresh pear to the marinade mix well and keep aside .
shave the pear by rubbing it on a grater . mix the pear in the marina well with a spoon .

put the cooked meat on a plate and garnish with fried onions chopped spring onions and sesame seeds .
put the cooked meat on a serving plate . put the fried onions on top of the meat . sprinkle a few chopped spring onions on top of the fried onions . sprinkle a little bit of sesame seeds on the food for decoration .

put the cooked meat on a plate and garnish with fried onions chopped spring onions and sesame seeds .

put the cooked meat on a plate and garnish with fried onions chopped spring onions and sesame seeds .
to serve this , start by putting the cooked meat on a plate . on top of the meat , add the fried onions , and then the chopped spring onions . sprinkle some sesame seeds on top to finish .

mix soy sauce sesame oil sugar finely chopped spring onions and minced garlic .
add 3 table spoons of soy sauce , 1 1/2 tablespoon of sesame oil , 1 1/2 tablespoons of sugar to a medium sized bowl . cut spring onions into small pieces until you have 1 1/2 tablespoons of the pieces and add the pieces to the bowl . cut garlic into tiny pieces until you have about 2 tablespoons and add the pieces to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl together .

mix soy sauce sesame oil sugar finely chopped spring onions and minced garlic .
you need 3 tablespoons of soy sauce , use a measuring spoon to measure it . now you will need sesame oil , again use your measuring spoon to measure 1.5 tablespoons . next up measure out 1.5 table spoon of sugar . add to the mixture and mix . now add 2 tablespoons of a spring onion that is finely chopped . add in 1 to 2 full table spoons of minced garlic and mix the mixture together .

mix soy sauce sesame oil sugar finely chopped spring onions and minced garlic .
get a mixing bowl . using a measuring spoon add soy sauce , sesame oil , sugar , finely chopped spring onions and minced garlic ( insert measurements ) . stir until all the ingredients are well blended .

add pepper to the marinade mixture .
grind pepper into the bowl of the marinade . use the fork to stir it in to the mixture .

add pepper to the marinade mixture .
take a medium sized bowl . take the marinated mixture in the bowl . take some pepper in a pepper grinder . add the pepper in to the bowl . mix the pepper and the marinated mixture .

add pepper to the marinade mixture .
now we can add in some ground pepper . 2 or less teaspoons of freshly grounded pepper should be plenty .

mix it again and transfer it equally to 2 jars .
mix everything with your hands . take everything and put them into jars .

mix it again and transfer it equally to 2 jars .
chop the cabbage . get 2 equal size jar . transfer the chopped cabbage in both jars half and half .

mix it again and transfer it equally to 2 jars .
mix the cabbage again . leave the cabbage for 1 hour . mix the cabbage again . put the cabbage into two jars .

chop cabbage mix with salt and let it sit .
use a knife or food processor and chop up 1 cabbage . put the sliced cabbage into a large bowl . add salt . mix it together with your hands . let it sit for 1 hour .

chop cabbage mix with salt and let it sit .
put the cabbage in the food processor . close it and press the on button . pour the cabbage out and mix some salt into it .

chop cabbage mix with salt and let it sit .
using your hands mix the cabbage mix . add salt and mix the cabbage mix with your hands .

after filling the jars 3 quarters push the content inside .
put the cabbage into a jar . smash down the cabbage . fill the jar only 3/4 full of cabbage .

after filling the jars 3 quarters push the content inside .
take three glass jars . add the filling in to the jar . fill up to 3 quarters of jars . take a pushing tool . push the contents in the jar .

after filling the jars 3 quarters push the content inside .
fill 3 jars 3/4 of the way full . push the stuff in the jars with a spoon to mash it down .

leave the jars at the room temperature closing the lids not too tight for 5 - 6 days .
leave the jars out at room temperature with the lid on top . do n't close the lids too tight .

leave the jars at the room temperature closing the lids not too tight for 5 - 6 days .
fill the jars two thirds full with the cabbage mixture . two thirds is just a little bit more than half . if you are having a hard time knowing how much space to leave empty , use a pencil or marker to draw two lines on the jar so that you have three equally sized areas . then , fill the jar up to the second line . this is two - thirds full . when you put the lids on , do not close them too tight . you can make sure you do this correctly by setting the lid on top of the jar , turning the lid only a small amount , and then gently shaking the jar . if the lid makes slight clinking sounds but does not fall off , you have done it correctly . when you are done , double check that each jar is only filled two thirds full and that each lid is not closed tightly . these steps are very important , because your cabbage will not ferment and will not become delicious sauerkraut if they are too full or their lids are too tight . if you are working with a lot of jars , start off with all jars on the left side of the table or workspace , and as you double check them , move them over to the right side of the table or workspace . that way you are sure to double check every jar .

leave the jars at the room temperature closing the lids not too tight for 5 - 6 days .
put the lids on the jars . do n't put the lids on too tight , so do n't completely turn the lid . let the jars sit for 5 to 6 days .

chop up the garlic in the food processor .
turn on the food processor . drop the garlic cloves into the processor over the top , one by one .

chop up the garlic in the food processor .
some processors have feed tubes on the top which let you add ingredients while the processor is running . separate the individual parts ( called cloves ) of your garlic . turn on the food processor , on slow at first . add the cloves of garlic one at a time . this will help to get the garlic chopped up nice and small .

chop up the garlic in the food processor .
turn the food processor on . drop the garlic pieces into the tube in the middle .

add the chickpeas chickpea juice and cayenne pepper to the food processor .
find the juice machine . put in a cup of chickpeas . add 1/4 cup of cooking liquid . add 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper . add a little lemon juice from a lemon .

add the chickpeas chickpea juice and cayenne pepper to the food processor .
drain chickpeas and add to the processor bowl . next add a 1/4 of the liquid from the can . then add an 1/8th of a teaspoon of cayenne to the processor bowl .

add the chickpeas chickpea juice and cayenne pepper to the food processor .
slowly pour the chickpeas into the container on top . add the cayenne pepper in after .

juice a lemon into the food processor .
put half of a lemon into a hand squeezed juicer . place the juicer over the opening of the food processor . squeeze the handles of the juicer tightly to squeeze the juice out of lemon . you do n't need to measure the lemon juice , you can just add it to taste . if you like it more acidic ( or lemon - y ! ) add more !

juice a lemon into the food processor .
squeeze a few table spoon of lemon juice into the food processor . put a quarter cup of tahini .

juice a lemon into the food processor .
set out 2 lemons , a chefs knife and a citrus press on a cutting board . get a can of tahini puree out , and a 1/4 cup measuring cup . cut the lemons into halves ( 4 ) . place a lemon half in the press , squeeze the juice out over the processor . fill the 1/4 cup measuring cup with tahini puree and put it in the processor .

add tahini and salt to the food processor .
add tahini and salt to the food processor . turn on the food processor and blend everything .

add tahini and salt to the food processor .
measure out one cup of tahini . if the package has a bunch of oil at the top , stir it really well before you measure it . add the tahini to the food processor . add two big pinches of salt to the food processor .

add tahini and salt to the food processor .
use a small spoon and scoop up the tahini and salt . slowly and carefully put it in the bowl of the machine .

blend the ingredients until smooth .
put all your ingredients into the food processor . cover with the lid . turn the processor on until all the ingredients are blended smoothly . turn the processor off and remove the mixture .

blend the ingredients until smooth .
put the lid on the blender . blend the ingredients until it is smooth .

blend the ingredients until smooth .
when ingredients are put into the blender you hit the button to process / mix / chop . continue until it smooth like icing / makes it easy to spread etc .

marinade the chicken with dark soy sauce salt sugar and pepper .
add 1/2 teaspoon of soy sauce . add 1/4 teaspoon of salt . add 1/4 teaspoon of sugar . take a small finger pinch of pepper and add it . finally , add 2 tablespoons of water .

marinade the chicken with dark soy sauce salt sugar and pepper .
put chicken into bowl . add 1/2 tablespoon of black soy sauce to the bowl with chicken . then add 1/4 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of sugar to the bowl . next add a little pepper to the bowl . finally add 2 tablespoons of water to the bowl .

marinade the chicken with dark soy sauce salt sugar and pepper .
soak chicken with . dark soy sauce , salt , sugar , and pepper . add water .

add in some flour and baking soda to the chicken too and mix it well .
add 1 teaspoon of corn flour and a quarter of a teaspoon of baking soda . use chopsticks to mix the corn flour and baking soda into the chicken .

add in some flour and baking soda to the chicken too and mix it well .
take a medium sized bowl . take some chicken in to the bowl . add tablespoon of flour in to the bowl . add teaspoon of baking soda in to the bowl . mix it well to coat it with chicken .

add in some flour and baking soda to the chicken too and mix it well .
use a small spoon . scoop out flour and baking soda into the bowl . mix everything up with chopsticks .

pour boiling water to bouncy noodles and drain it .
put 3 egg noodle balls in the bowl . pour boiling water over the egg noodles . once the noodles start to loosen up , use chopsticks to break them apart . pour noodles into a strainer . shake the strainer to get all the water out .

pour boiling water to bouncy noodles and drain it .
pour boiling hot water over 250 grams thin egg noodles . when there soft and bouncy like rubber bands drain them in a colander . and there ready !

pour boiling water to bouncy noodles and drain it .
carefully and slowly pour the boiling water into the bowl with noodles in it . be careful not to splash . when it 's soft slowly drain the water out by pour everything in a strainer .

cook ginger garlic and the chicken with olive oil in a pan and set it aside .
heat your wok until it is hot . add 2 tablespoons of oil . add your chicken , ginger , and garlic to the pan . shake the pan around , then put the top on and let everything cook .

cook ginger garlic and the chicken with olive oil in a pan and set it aside .
heat wok up so it is hot and add 3 tablespoons of olive oil . add half of the ginger and garlic to the wok . next lay out the chicken in a single layer and cook for two to three minutes . finally add 600 ml of water and cover quickly to trap in the flavors . cook for a minute and then set to the side .

cook ginger garlic and the chicken with olive oil in a pan and set it aside .
turn stove eye on high . place the wok on the eye , let it heat up . add 2 tablespoons of olive oil . add half of the ginger and garlic . add chicken allow to cook for 5 minutes , stir and cover , add 1/4 cup water .

wash the pan and cook ginger garlic carrot bean sprouts and broccoli in the pan with oil .
wash the pan with soap and warm water . turn on the stove . put one tablespoon of oil in the pan , and the rest of the garlic and ginger . cook until the smell of the garlic and ginger gets a little stronger . add in half a handful of carrots , a full handful of beansprouts , and a full handful of broccoli . give it all a good , 5 - 10 second stir .

wash the pan and cook ginger garlic carrot bean sprouts and broccoli in the pan with oil .
carefully pour in the oil into the pan . pour out the ginger garlic carrot bean sprouts and broccoli in the pan . let the vegetables sizzle and mix them around with a spatula .

wash the pan and cook ginger garlic carrot bean sprouts and broccoli in the pan with oil .
wash your pan . put it onto the stove again . add 1 tablespoon of oil then the rest of your ginger and garlic . let it cook until you smell it . add a half of a handful of carrots , 1 whole handful of bean sprouts and broccoli .

cover it to cook and then add in the noodles .
put the lid on the pot . turn the heat down to low . boil the noodles and cut them up with some scissors . add them to the pot .

cover it to cook and then add in the noodles .
cover the pan with lid . check whether it is cooked . add the noodles into it .

cover it to cook and then add in the noodles .
cover the lid on the pan and let it cook . turn the dial of the stove to low . carefully pour the noodles in the pan .

add back the chicken with salt and dark soy sauce and stir .
pour the chicken and gravy on top . add 3/4 teaspoon salt , 1 1/4 teaspoons of sugar and of 1 teaspoon duck soy . slide 2 spatulas underneath the noodles and pull them up a bit and jiggle the spatulas . keep doing this until everything is mixed .

add back the chicken with salt and dark soy sauce and stir .
put the gravy on top . put the chicken on top . carefully toss the noodles with the chicken . season with duck soy , 1 1/4 tspn of salt , 1 1/4 tsp of sugar .

add back the chicken with salt and dark soy sauce and stir .
pour gravy on top . add the chicken . add 3/4 tablespoon of salt . add 1 teaspoon of duck soy . use two spatulas to mix together everything .

make shallow cuts into the foie gras .
take a foie gras on a plate . take a sharp knife . pass the knife through the foie gras along the length . now cut the foie gras along horizontally . the cut should be shallow .

make shallow cuts into the foie gras .
take a knife . cut the tips of the foie gras making shallow cuts into it lengthwise .

make shallow cuts into the foie gras .
now we can take our crackers and score them with the end of our knife . just draw lines across the top of them in a criss - cross manner . this will help them sear evenly .

now you want to use a spoon to scoop out the jam . take the spoon and carefully smear the jam all over the surface of your cracker .
