flip the foie gras over .
cook one side of the foie gras in a hot pan . next pick up the pan in one hand and grab a spoon with the other . use the spoon to flip the foie gras over . move hot pan back over the burner to cook .

flip the foie gras over .
use a spoon to flip over the foie gras . cook the other side of the foie gras until it is golden brown .

flip the foie gras over .
use a spoon to pick up the foie gras . flip it over with the spoon .

place the foie gras on the crackers .
use a spoon to get the foie gras out of the pan . set the foie gras on top of the crackers on a plate .

place the foie gras on the crackers .
cook the foie grass in a pan . remove the pan from the stove . take the crackers on a plate . now take the foie gras with a spoon . place the foie gras on top of crackers .

place the foie gras on the crackers .
you will need foie gras rounds , crackers , a saute pan , 2 tablespoons butter , a spatula or spoon and other cracker topping if you wish . put the butter into the saute pan and heat on medium - high until the butter melts . add the foie gras to the pan and cook until one side is brown . use a spatula or spoon to turn the foie gras over and cook the other side until it is brown . use the spoon or spatula to take the cooked foie gras out of the pan and serve on crackers with your choice of other toppings .

place the foie gras in the pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . take the foie gras from the plate . place the foie gras in to the pan .

place the foie gras in the pan .
now , once the pan is hot set the scored side down into the pan . make sure to keep your hands clear , as there will be a lot of fat forming and popping in the pan .

place the foie gras in the pan .
place foie gras into the pan . be careful because the fat may start to spatter .

spread peanut butter on the cracker .
take some peanut butter with a spoon . spread about 2 spoonfuls of peanut butter onto a cracker .

spread peanut butter on the cracker .
using a spoon , put the peanut butter on the cracker . smooth the peanut butter on the cracker .

spread peanut butter on the cracker .
take peanut butter in a bowl . take a cracker in hand . take a spoon and take some peanut butter . add the peanut butter on to the cracker . spread the peanut butter on the cracker .

mix yeast water and sugar in a cup .
take a measuring jar . add 1/4 cube of yeast in to the cup . add table spoon of sugar in to the cup . add 140 ml of lukewarm water in to the cup . mix everything properly .

mix yeast water and sugar in a cup .
put one quarter cube of yeast into a measuring cup . add 1 tablespoon of sugar . add 140 ml of of lukewarm water , then stir with a spoon .

mix yeast water and sugar in a cup .
first breakup about 1/4th milligrams of yeast in a 1 litter container . add one table spoon of sugar . add 140 milliliters of water . stir with whisk until smooth .

mix flour oil salt and the yeast mixture together .
get a large mixing bowl and place it on a steady surface . pour the flour , oil , salt and yeast you have measured into the bowl . use a hand mixer to carefully and slowly mix the ingredients . keep mixing until the mixture makes a large ball .

mix flour oil salt and the yeast mixture together .
pour flour into the bowl . add salt to the bowl next . then add oil to the bowl . next add yeast to the bowl . mix all ingredients together with a mixer .

mix flour oil salt and the yeast mixture together .
add 250 g of flour in to the mixing bowl . add 2 - 3 tablespoons of oil in to the bowl . add a teaspoon of salt in to the bowl . add yeast mixture in to the bowl . mix everything in to a dough .

form the dough into a ball and cover .
the dough should be a little sticky but not overly sticky . the dough should also be smooth and easy to mold . form the dough into a bowl and place into a bowl . place a towel over the bowl and cover and let rest for 30 minutes .

form the dough into a ball and cover .
grab all of your dough and roll it in your hands until it forms a ball . place the ball back in your pot and cover it with a kitchen towel .

form the dough into a ball and cover .
put dough in your hands and roll into a ball . put the dough ball in mixing bowl . cover bowl with a clean kitchen towel . leave in covered bowl for 30 minutes .

knead the dough and cut into pieces .
place floor on cutting board . place dough on cutting board . kneed dough by moving around on cutting board . flatten dough out . slice dough in strips with knife .

knead the dough and cut into pieces .
flour the work surface . knead the dough on the floured surface . flatten it and cut it into several pieces .

knead the dough and cut into pieces .
roll the dough into a ball . press the dough into the table with your hands . fold it in half and press again . repeat for a few minutes . cut the dough into five pieces that are all the same size .

form each piece into a ball roll out and roll up .
roll each piece of dough into a ball the size of a golf ball . use a rolling pin to flatten and stretch the dough by gently rolling toward your body , then away from your body . when then dough is flattened into a rectangle , use your fingers to roll the long edges of the rectangle until the dough looks like a log .

form each piece into a ball roll out and roll up .
loosely hold the dough with one hand . move the dough around like you 're rolling a ball . use a rolling pin to roll the ball out long and flat . make sure they are pretty thin . use both hands to roll into a hot dog shape .

form each piece into a ball roll out and roll up .
put each piece of dough on cutting board and form into small balls . use a rolling pin to roll each ball flat into an oval shape . roll the long side with your hands until you have long bars of dough .

place on a pan and cover with a towel .
place the dough apart from each other because they will rise . cover the dough with a towel and let rest for 30 minutes .

place on a pan and cover with a towel .
place a baking pan on the counter . cut and place a piece of wax paper long enough to fit in the baking pan . place the first rolled bread dough into the pan . place the other dough rolls in the pan with 2 - 3 inches between each roll . cover the pan with a clean dish towel .

place on a pan and cover with a towel .
place a sheet of wax paper on a cookie sheet . place your long rolls of batter side by side on the cookie sheet so they do n't touch . place a clean , light weight dish towel over the pan so all is covered .

bake the bread in an oven .
place the bread on a baking sheet , about 1 - 2 inches between the loaves . gently place the tray in the oven . leave the bread in the oven until fully cooked . leave on the counter to cool .

bake the bread in an oven .
put the dough on parchment paper on a baking sheet . next place in 200 degree oven . cook for 10 to 12 minutes .

bake the bread in an oven .
grab a pan . put wax paper on the pan . grab pieces of long dough and place them on the sheet of wax paper separate from each other . take the pan and place it in the oven . let the bread bake in the over for 40 minutes , then take it out and let it cool down .

slice the bun and open it up .
take the bun and turn it on one side . take a knife and cut one side of the bun , straight down the middle , long ways . be careful to not cut all the way through the bun . use your hands to open the bun through the area you cut .

slice the bun and open it up .
take the bun and slice it with a serrated knife down the side . do n't slice the bun completely into two pieces . open the bun like a book .

slice the bun and open it up .
take the bun of the bread and very carefully take your knife and cut it down the middle . then open the bun up .

spread the bun with mustard .
open up the bread . scoop up some mustard with the knife . using the knife , spread mustard on the open bread until the bread is covered in mustard .

spread the bun with mustard .
open the sliced bun . use a butter knife to spread mustard . spread mustard on both sides of bun .

spread the bun with mustard .
use butter knife to put mustard on bun . you will want to make sure both sides of bun are coated in mustard .

place cucumber salad and then the hot dog on the bun .
put cucumber salad on both sides of the bun . next add hot dog to the bun .

place cucumber salad and then the hot dog on the bun .
put the cucumbers on the bun in a single layer , covering both sides . place the hot dog on the middle of the bun on top of the cucumbers .

place cucumber salad and then the hot dog on the bun .
place sliced cucumbers all along both sides of a hot dog bun . place the sausage on the bun .

drizzle ketchup and fried onions on top .
place the hotdog on top of the pickles that are on the bun . make sure the hot dog is in the middle of the bun where the crease is . drizzle ketchup on top of the bun and hotdog . next add fried onions on top of the hotdog and bun . serve promptly . ( serve right after you are done ) .

drizzle ketchup and fried onions on top .
squirt ketchup bottle over hotdog . put the ketchup across the whole hotdog . take a spoon and scoop some friend onions . with the spoon , add the fried onions to the hotdog . put the spoon , fried onions , and ketchup away .

drizzle ketchup and fried onions on top .
squirt ketchup evenly through the hot dog . once ketchup is on the hot dog , place onions on top of the hot dog using a spoon . make sure to place onion inside of the bun , so that onion does not spill out .

fry the garlic and ground beef with soy sauce sesame oil and sugar .
put the chopped garlic into the hot pan and stir . add ground beef , soy sauce , sesame oil and sugar to the pan . use chop sticks to stir everything together while cooking .

fry the garlic and ground beef with soy sauce sesame oil and sugar .
place your chopped garlic into your pan . with a wooden spoon mix the garlic around so it is all over the pan . add your ground beef to the pan . add your soy sauce to the pan . add sesame oil to the pan .

fry the garlic and ground beef with soy sauce sesame oil and sugar .
pour the garlic in the pan . stir the garlic with chop sticks . pour in the beef . carefully pour in the soy sauce sesame oil and sugar .

fry the carrots with oil and salt .
pour the oil onto the pan . grab the carrots with your hands and place them in the pan . put salt on the carrots .

fry the carrots with oil and salt .
put a fry pan on the stove and add a little oil . turn on the heat . when the oil is hot , add the carrots , which have been cut into thin strip . add kosher salt . stir the carrots .

fry the carrots with oil and salt .
pour olive oil on the frying pan . place the carrots on the pan and cook them . add salt to the carrots and stir with a spoon .

fry the zucchini with oil and salt .
put a pan onto the burner and turn it on to a medium - high heat setting . add oil to the pan and let it warm up for 2 - 3 minutes . carefully add the cut zucchini and salt to the pan . let the zucchini cook until it is soft , stirring with a wooden spoon or spatula . turn the burner off and carefully pour the cooked zucchini onto a plate from the pan .

fry the zucchini with oil and salt .
add oil to the frying pan . mix the oil around so it cover the pan . add the zucchini to the pan . stir around so that it cooks . add salt to the pan and continue to mix .

fry the zucchini with oil and salt .
put a small amount of oil into a hot frying pan . add the sliced pieces of zucchini to the pan . sprinkle some kosher salt onto the zucchini . stir the zucchini in the pan with a spoon or chopsticks while it cooks in the pan . when it 's finished cooking , empty the zucchini from the hot pan onto a plate .

mix pepper paste soy sauce rice vinegar and sesame seeds .
put korean hot pepper paste , soy sauce , rice vinegar and sesame seeds into a cup . use a spoon to mix it all together .

mix pepper paste soy sauce rice vinegar and sesame seeds .
use a spoon to scoop the pepper paste into the a cup . pour soy sauce rice vinegar and sesame seeds into the same cup . mix everything with the spoon .

mix pepper paste soy sauce rice vinegar and sesame seeds .
in a small cup combine korean hot pepper paste , soy sauce , seasoned rice vinegar and sesame seeds . using a small spoon gently mix the ingredients together until well mixed .

chop the garlic finely .
put big pieces of garlic on the cutting board . get a knife from the cutting block . cut the big pieces of garlic into a lot of small pieces . put the small pieces of garlic into a bowl .

chop the garlic finely .
take peeled garlic cloves and put on cutting board . with a chef 's knife carefully chop the garlic finely . put chopped garlic in bowl .

chop the garlic finely .
hold the garlic carefully . cut the garlic with a knife into small pieces .

fry the onion and mushrooms with soy sauce and sesame oil .
use a knife to cut mushrooms and onions into big pieces and put them into the hot pan . use chopsticks to stir mushrooms and onions for a moment while they cook . pour a little soy sauce on top . pour a little sesame oil on top and stir everything together . when it finishes cooking , carefully empty it all onto a plate .

fry the onion and mushrooms with soy sauce and sesame oil .
pour the onion and mushrooms in the pan . pour in the soy sauce and oil . let them cook while mixing them with chopsticks .

fry the onion and mushrooms with soy sauce and sesame oil .
put chopped white onions into a hot pan . add sliced mushrooms to the same pan with the onions . add soy sauce and sesame oil to the pan of mushrooms and onions . stir to mix it all together . put the food on a plate .

mix soy sauce and sesame oil with the bean sprouts and spinach .
pour in the soy sauce . add some sesame oil into the bowl . mix together the bowl together using your hands .

mix soy sauce and sesame oil with the bean sprouts and spinach .
pour the bowl of soy sauce and sesame oil in both the spinach bowl and sprout bowl . use your hand to mix both the bowls up .

mix soy sauce and sesame oil with the bean sprouts and spinach .
place bean sprouts in one bowl . place spinach in a separate bowl . put sesame oil and soy sauce in bowl with bean sprouts . put sesame oil and soy sauce in bowl with spinach . mix each bowl with hands in order to get all three ingredients in the bowl evenly mixed .

slice the mushrooms and zucchini .
take the mushrooms and hold them carefully . cut them into thin lines . do the same with the zucchini but cut it into thin circles .

slice the mushrooms and zucchini .
slice shiitake mushrooms on diagonal with large knife . lay out on plate . slice zucchini all of it in half , approx . 1 inch thick . after you slice it , tear pieces and slice into cubes . spread slices onto a plate .

slice the mushrooms and zucchini .
" with a sharp knife , slice the mushrooms into slices about 1/2 thick . " " . " cut a zucchini in half , and then in half again . " slice the zucchini into about 1/2 thick slices . " " . " slice them again , cutting the zucchini into small cubes .

slice the carrot and seaweed .
using a knife slice the carrot in half . using a knife slice the carrot into thin pieces . using kitchen scissors cut the seaweed into strips .

slice the carrot and seaweed .
use a knife and cut the carrot in half . slice each half of the carrot into small sections . set the carrot on a plate . use scissors to cut the seaweed into smaller sections .

slice the carrot and seaweed .
put a carrot on a board . use a sharp knife to cut the carrots into thin strips . use kitchen scissors to cut the seaweed into strips .

place the beef vegetables and egg on a plate with rice .
use a spoon to add pre - cooked steamed rice to the middle of the place . use another spoon to add one spoonful of cooked ground beef to one section of the plate . do not place ground beef on top of the rice . with kitchen tongs , or cleaned hands , add a small amount of dried seaweed next to ground beef , followed by a handful of sliced carrots next to the dried seaweed . add a handful of zucchini slices next to the sliced carrots followed by the sliced mushrooms , white onion , soy bean sprouts , and spinach . your spinach should be next to the ground beer when the circle around the steamed rice is completed . to finish , use a spatula to add the cooked egg on top of the pile of steamed rice on the center of the plate .

place the beef vegetables and egg on a plate with rice .
take a large plate and add a cup of rice in the middle . add some beef on side of plate . add cut strips of carrot and cucumber on side of plate . add other vegetables on the sides of the plate . add a cooked egg on top of rice .

place the beef vegetables and egg on a plate with rice .
use a small bowl to shape a rice pile on the center of the plate . place ground beef , dry seaweed , carrots , zucchini , mushrooms , white onion , soy bean sprouts , and cooked spinach around the rice completing a circle . place a fried egg on top of the rice pile .

fry the egg in the pan .
gently crack the egg into a hot pan that has 2 teaspoons of oil in it . do not try to flip the egg or stir it . cook the egg until the entire egg white is fully cooked , it will be the same white as a piece of paper .

fry the egg in the pan .
take a frying pan on the stove . heat the pan and add some oil in to the pan . after the oil is hot , take an egg . break open an egg and place it in the pan . fry the egg with yellow side upwards .

fry the egg in the pan .
crack an egg . be careful not to let any of the shell fall into the pan . add the egg to the pan with the yolk side facing up .

blanch the bean sprouts and spinach .
take a pot on the stove . boil some water in the pot . take some bean sprouts in a steel strainer and immerse in hot water and blanch them . now take the spinach in the strainer and blanch the spinach . take the bean sprouts and spinach in a plate .

blanch the bean sprouts and spinach .
put the bean sprouts in a strainer and lower the strainer into boiling water . lift the strainer of bean sprouts out of the water and pour into a bowl . put the spinach in a strainer and lower the strainer into boiling water . lift the strainer of spinach out of the water and pour into a bowl .

blanch the bean sprouts and spinach .
put a pot of water on the stove . turn on the stove . let water boil until you see bubbles . put bean sprouts in a strainer , dip strainer into water , take bean sprouts out and put them into a bowl , put spinach into the strainer , dip strainer into water . pour spinach into a bowl .

add yeast and oil to the water .
add your yeast to the water . now slowly pour some oil into the water and mix it all around with your hands . do n't mix to fast as it will spill over the edges .

add yeast and oil to the water .
crumble the yeast into the bowl of water . pour a bit of oil into the water . use your fingers to mix it all together .

add yeast and oil to the water .
carefully pour in the oil to the water . add the yeast to the water .

add the water to the flour on the table .
take some flour on the table . create a space in middle of flour by pushing the flour to the sides . add water in to the center space . mix the flour with water . add some more water and mix the dough properly .

add the water to the flour on the table .
take the container of water and slowly pour it inside the circle . push the circle back against the water .

add the water to the flour on the table .
spread the flour into a circle , creating a large hole of empty space for the water to be poured . slowly pour the water into flour circle , just enough so that it does n't spill over the edges . drag a small amount of flour from the edges into the water and mush the flour into the water until it creates a doughy center . add more water and mush more flour into it until the circle of flour is now a roll of dough . once you have a dough roll , continue pressing and squishing it by using the dry flour left on the counter to keep it from sticking to your fingers .

add salt to the dough .
sprinkle salt on top of the dough . use your hands to fold the dough in half so that the salt is in between layers of dough . use your hands to roll the dough .

add salt to the dough .
sprinkle salt over the top of the ball of dough . use your hands to push in the dough . roll the dough up and keep pushing to get the salt mixed in .

add salt to the dough .
sprinkle bowl of salt onto dough . fold the dough and then press it together with your hands until its mixed in .

knead the dough .
squish the dough into a ball . squish the ball of dough flat . repeat this for awhile to knead it .

knead the dough .
push down on the dough and roll it . repeat this step several times . pour olive oil on top of the dough .

knead the dough .
put some flour on the surface to knead the dough . use your hands to push down , roll , wrap and then repeat . then brush the dough with olive oil .

coat the dough with oil and cover .
put some olive oil on the dough . rub the dough with the olive oil . go find a small towel . put the towel over the dough . wait 20 minutes .

coat the dough with oil and cover .
take the dough and pour some oil onto it . rub the oil into the dough softly . place the cover onto the dough and let it cover for 20 minutes .

coat the dough with oil and cover .
pour oil on the dough . use your hands to rub the oil all over the dough . cover it with a cloth .

cut the dough into pieces .
using a knife carefully cut the dough . separate the dough evenly into four pieces .

cut the dough into pieces .
cut your dough into 4 even pieces . pieces should be about the size of a baseball .

cut the dough into pieces .
cut dough into four pieces . knead dough .

spread tomato sauce onto the dough .
take a spoonful of tomato sauce and pour it into the middle of the dough . now take the rounded edge of your spoon , and smear / spread the sauce around your dough . spread it in circles and make sure you get it up to the edges .

spread tomato sauce onto the dough .
using a ladle , scoop up some tomato sauce . pour the sauce onto the dough somewhere in the middle . using the bottom of the ladle , spread the sauce toward the edge of the dough in a circular motion .

spread tomato sauce onto the dough .
use a curved spoon . grab a spoon full to tomato sauce . spread the sauce on your dough . using a circular motion .

top with mozzarella cheese oil and basil .
put mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce part of the pizza . drizzle a little oil all over the cheese . rip some basil and put on top of the pizza . take a pan . place pizza on the pan .

top with mozzarella cheese oil and basil .
pizza dough should be flat and topped with red sauce . sprinkle mozzarella cheese over whole pizza . pour a small amount of oil over pizza . rip basil leaves into small pieces . sprinkle basil leaves over pizza .

top with mozzarella cheese oil and basil .
take your mozzarella cheese and spread it all over your dough . now take your olive oil and gently pour it over the dough . do n't use to much though . just a light sprinkling . now take the cut basil and add as much as you would like on top of the cheese .

cook the pizza in the oven .
turn the oven on , so that it is set at 400 degrees . wait for the oven to beep . put the pizza pan with the pizza on it in the oven . wait 20 minutes while it cooks . take the pizza out of the oven using oven mitts .

cook the pizza in the oven .
carefully place your pizza on your pizza paddle . carefully place it into an oven that is turned onto 400 degrees . leave the pizza for 20 minutes .

cook the pizza in the oven .
move pizza onto wooden paddle . slide into wood fire oven . cook until golden .

add butter to the macaroni and stir .
add the butter to the macaroni . make sure the noodles are still hot . this will insure that the butter melts . stir it thoroughly . until the butter is melted .

add butter to the macaroni and stir .
put butter into the bowl of macaroni . use a spoon to stir the butter into the pasta .

add butter to the macaroni and stir .
take a table spoon . add 2 table spoon of fresh butter to the macaroni . stir the macaroni and butter together . stirring can be done with the help of a spatula .

add cheez whiz and stir .
put cheez whiz into the bowl of noodles . stir it into the noodles .

add cheez whiz and stir .
open a jar of cheez wiz . take a spoon and scrape all of the cheese out of the jar into the hot pot . hold the pot handle and stir the cheese into hot macaroni until it melts . you can also use velveeta cheese if you want .

add cheez whiz and stir .
open cheez whiz . put the cheeze whiz in . mix together .

add milk and stir .
add 4 cups of milk to the pot . use a spoon to carefully stir .

add milk and stir .
measure four cups of milk into a measuring cup . pour it into the macaroni mixture and stir it up well .

add milk and stir .
pour four cups of milk into the pot . stir it up !

pour macaroni into a pan .
pour some macaroni in the pan . use a spoon to spread it around some .

pour macaroni into a pan .
take a spoon and stir the macaroni . then pick up the pan , tilt it and pour the macaroni into the foil pan .

pour macaroni into a pan .
take your pan and slowly pour the macaroni into the pan . do n't pour to fast , or it will go everywhere . now spread the macaroni around so it lays in the pan flat .

sprinkle cheese on top .
make sure the noodles are evenly spread along the pan . open the bag of shredded cheese . sprinkle the cheese on top of the macaroni . make sure that the cheese is evenly distributed too . if there are any spots uncovered , add more cheese .

sprinkle cheese on top .
take mild cheddar cheese packets . cut open them . add cheese on the top of prepared dish . add second packet of cheese . spread the cheese properly .

sprinkle cheese on top .
sprinkle a layer of mild cheddar cheese on top of the macaroni noodles . sprinkle a layer of sharp cheddar cheese on top of the mild cheddar cheese .

add layers of macaroni and cheese .
pour the macaroni on the top . pour cheese on top of the macaroni evenly .

add layers of macaroni and cheese .
prepare the pan for the macaroni and cheese . put some macaroni into the pan and spread it . add some cheese to it and spread it on top . add some more macaroni for another layer . add more cheese to finish it .

add layers of macaroni and cheese .
add a layer of macaroni into the tray . add another layer of cheese . add another layer of macaroni into the tray . add another layer of cheese over the macaroni .

mince cabbage and chop some green onions .
take a half of a cabbage . mince it . take the green onions and mince them .

mince cabbage and chop some green onions .
cut the cabbage into long strands or pieces with a knife . be careful it 's probably sharp . get some green onions and cut them to small pieces also with a knife .

mince cabbage and chop some green onions .
take your clever or knife and slowly chop the cabbage starting at the edge . keep your fingers out of the way ! just slowly press the sharp edge down on the cabbage and mince the cabbage up with small chops . now we want to take the green onion and chop it up as well . just line up the long onion stems and make small cuts across all of the onions , until you have the desired amount that you want .

add chopped green onions cabbage and ground pork to a large bowl .
gather ground pork , already cut up green onions , and already cut cabbage . put ground pork in a big bowl . add in green onions an adult has cut up for you . put in cabbage an adult has cut for you .

add chopped green onions cabbage and ground pork to a large bowl .
hold the pork over the bowl and carefully push it out with chopsticks . add the green onions in the bowl .

add chopped green onions cabbage and ground pork to a large bowl .
add the ground pork to a bowl . cut green onions into small pieces . cut the cabbage into long strips . add green onions and cabbage to the bowl .

add soy sauce sesame oil and salt and mix together .
take the small bowl that has two tablespoons of soy sauce and pour it into the big bowl with the cabbage . next take your small bowl with two tablespoons of sesame oil and pour it into the big bowl as well . finally take the small bowl that has one tablespoon of salt and pour it into the big bowl with your other ingredients . shake the bowl to make sure you get all of it out . take your chopsticks and use those to mix all ingredients in the mix bowl together .

add soy sauce sesame oil and salt and mix together .
pour two tablespoons of soy sauce into the mixing bowl . pour two tablespoons of sesame oil . gently pour salt into a tablespoon and then add that to the bowl also . use a wooden spoon to mix your ingredients together . stir until the ingredients are very thoroughly mixed together .

add soy sauce sesame oil and salt and mix together .
put mixture in large metal bowl . dump in 2 tablespoons of soy sauce . dump in 2 tablespoons of sesame oil . dump in 1 tablespoon of salt . mix it all up with chopsticks , or a spatula .

add chopped carrots and shiitake mushrooms and mix .
add the cut up carrots and shiitake mushroom pieces . mix everything together .

add chopped carrots and shiitake mushrooms and mix .
mix the basic pot sticker ingredients well in a large bowl . chop 1 or more carrots on the cutting board into small pieces ( ~ 1 cup ) . chop shiitake mushrooms on the cutting board to make 1 cup of small pieces . add both the carrots and mushrooms to the pot sticker bowl . stir the carrots and mushrooms into the pot sticker ingredients .

add chopped carrots and shiitake mushrooms and mix .
you 're going to cut carrots and the shiitake mushrooms into small pieces . add small cut up carrots and mushrooms to the mix .

place 1 tbsp of the filling in the center of a pot sticker wrapper .
wash your hands and grab a clean spoon . open up your package of pot sticker wrappers . grab one pot sticker wrapper out of the bag . fill your clean spoon completely with the pork mixture that you made . add the pork mixture to the middle of the wrapper and seal the edges of the wrap tightly with your fingers .

place 1 tbsp of the filling in the center of a pot sticker wrapper .
1 tbsp of ground pork mix in the center of the potsticker wrapper . keep filling one wrapper after the next .

place 1 tbsp of the filling in the center of a pot sticker wrapper .
take the filling in a bowl . take the pot stick wrapper in the hand . take a spoon . add one tablespoon of filling in the center of pot stick wrapper . place it aside from the hand .

place the pot sticker wrapper on the dumpling and seal the edges with water .
lay the potsticker down on top of a potsticker mold . put some water in a small dish and use your fingers to rub the water all over the edges of the dough . fold both sides of the mold together and press hard until both sides of the dough are stuck together and sealed . then open up the mold and there you have your potsticker .

place the pot sticker wrapper on the dumpling and seal the edges with water .
grab sticker dough onto the mold . next place your ingredients in the middle of the dough . now using your fingers , rub some water on the edges of the dough . finally , press each side of the mold together . press tightly .

place the pot sticker wrapper on the dumpling and seal the edges with water .
place the pot sticker on the dumpling mold . fill the dumpling with the mixture . spread water on the edges . close the mold to seal the pot sticker .

heat a pan and spread vegetable oil on the surface .
put 1 tablespoon of vegetable into a non - stick pan . spread the oil around the pan .

heat a pan and spread vegetable oil on the surface .
take a medium sized pan . place it on the stove and on the stove . heat the pan . add some vegetable oil on to the pan . spread the oil uniformly on the pan .

heat a pan and spread vegetable oil on the surface .
how to cook pot stickers . add 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil to a non stick pan . using chopsticks grab a frozen pot sticker . spread the oil around with pot sticker in circles .

lay the pot stickers and cook both the sides until they are golden brown .
lay in the pot sticker in the pan and cook until they are golden brown . once they are done , flip them over and browned the other side as well .

lay the pot stickers and cook both the sides until they are golden brown .
get a pan and put some oil in the pan . put the pan on the stove . turn the heat on and wait for the oil to heat up . when the oil is hot , gently and carefully lay your potstickers in the pan . make sure not to touch the pan or the oil . cook the potstickers until they are brown on the bottom . when the potstickers are a golden brown color , turn them over with chop sticks or a fork and cook the other side until the same color as the other side .

lay the pot stickers and cook both the sides until they are golden brown .
lay the pot stickers in the pan . cook until the first side is golden brown . next flip them over and cook until golden brown .

once they are browned pour some water and cover with a lid and cook .
when the potstickers are brown , pour a little water from a cup into the pan so that the bottom of the pan is covered . cover the pot with a lid . turn the heat down to medium . continue cooking for 3 - 5 minutes , or until the water is gone .

once they are browned pour some water and cover with a lid and cook .
when they look brown pour water in the pan . cover the pan with the top and like them cook like that more .

once they are browned pour some water and cover with a lid and cook .
take a small cup of water and pour it into your pan of pot stickers . the water should not cover the pot stickers up it should only come up a little under half way of the pot sticker . cover up your pan of pot stickers with a lid that fits your pan . turn the dial on your stove down to medium heat and let your pot stickers cook for about 3 to 5 minutes , this is around the same time it will take until all the water in the pan is gone .

combine the cheeses mustard paprika and pepper in a small bowl .
use measuring spoons to add the spices to the shredded cheese . first , 1 teaspoon of dry mustard . then , 1/2 teaspoon of paprika . last , 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper that was just ground by a pepper grinder . use your fingers to mix the spices and the cheese together really well .

combine the cheeses mustard paprika and pepper in a small bowl .
mix together in a bowl . 1 teaspoon of dry mustard . 1/2 teaspoon of smoke paprika . 1/4 teaspoon of freshly ground black pepper .

combine the cheeses mustard paprika and pepper in a small bowl .
mix together the cheeses , mustard , paprika and pepper . place in a small bowl .

divide the cheese mixture evenly between the spatula - trays and set aside .
take some foil and place it around the spatula . put some cheese onto the spatula .

divide the cheese mixture evenly between the spatula - trays and set aside .
take half of the cheese and put on one spatula tray . put the rest of the cheese on the other spatula tray .

divide the cheese mixture evenly between the spatula - trays and set aside .
make a tray on 2 hamburger turners . use foil to make the top of the hamburger turners into boats . now you have a bed for cheese . put one half of your cheese on each bed . it 's ok if one bed gets more than the other just try hard to make them even .

set the cheese - filled spatula - trays on the grill .
put the cheese down on the grill but make sure it is not on top of the coals . be sure it is on the other side so it receives indirect heat . make sure the cheese does not burn . shift the cheese often from one side to the other side facing the heat so it melts well . this will take 6 to 9 minutes .

set the cheese - filled spatula - trays on the grill .
put the cheese onto the grill . be sure the cheese is not on direct heat , or it will burn . leave the cheese on the grill for about 6 to 9 minutes .

set the cheese - filled spatula - trays on the grill .
put the cheese filled spatula trays on the grill . you will have to move the spatula trays around a few times while they cook . it will take 69 minutes to cook .

cook the cheese until the cheese melts and bubbles around the edges .
cook the cheese until the cheese melts . there should be bubbles around the edges .

cook the cheese until the cheese melts and bubbles around the edges .
place on the grill and cook until the cheese begins to bubble , about 9 minutes . allow it to stay on the grill until it bubbles .

cook the cheese until the cheese melts and bubbles around the edges .
heat the charcoal grill . place tin foil boats on grill . cook for 8 to 9 minutes until it bubbles around the edges .

grill the bread on each side .
spread butter on each side of the bread using a knife . place the bread on the grill . grill each side until browned . flip the bread and repeat . take it off the grill .

grill the bread on each side .
put the bread on the grill with long tongs or pinchers . move the bread around a lot , flip it over . it is better to put it on the side of the grill where it is n't too hot . do not move the bread with your hands always use a grill tool . cook until it looks toasted .

grill the bread on each side .
use tongs to put the bread on the hot grill . do n't leave the bread alone ! it can burn quickly . as soon as you see dark lines on the bottom side of the bread , then flip it over . once both sides have dark lines , the slices of bread can be taken off the grill .

remove the bread from the grill .
take the bread off the grill . take the cheese off the grill .

remove the bread from the grill .
use tongs to remove the break from the grill . place them on a sheet of tin foil .

remove the bread from the grill .
lay down enough foil to cover the counter top work area . get a pair of long handled tongs . open the lid of the bbq grill . carefully grip each bread slice . place each slice onto the foil .

drizzle cheese onto one slice of bread .
bend the foil with your tongs . use the tongs to scrape the cheese onto the bread .

drizzle cheese onto one slice of bread .
open your foil wrapper that has the hot cheese inside . take a fork and push the cheese onto the top of the bread . spread the cheese around the top of the bread .

drizzle cheese onto one slice of bread .
be extremely careful as the cheese will be really hot . have a parent help to fold down the front of the aluminum foil . holding the foil up pour the cheese onto the burger . you can use the tongs to help get the cheese onto the burger .

top it with the a second slice of bread .
place the other slice of bread on top . use foil to wrap up the sandwich .

top it with the a second slice of bread .
using a spoon , put the sauce on top of the bottom loaf of bread . then place the other loaf of bread on top of the sauce . wrap the sandwich with the foil paper .

top it with the a second slice of bread .
take two slices of bread on a foil . toast the two slices of bread . on one slice of bread add the mixture on top . place the other slice on top of other bread . wrap the sandwich in the aluminum foil .

fold the foil around the sandwich .
put the sandwich on its own piece of aluminum foil . roll the sandwich inside the foil to make a tube shape . then roll and scrunch up the ends of the tube so they are closed and the sandwich is all wrapped up .

fold the foil around the sandwich .
wrap the sandwich in the aluminum foil ( shiny silver foil ) to cover the whole sandwich . put the sandwich inside the oven for 2 - 3 minutes to warm it up . take the sandwich out of the oven .

fold the foil around the sandwich .
take the silver wrapping foil and put the bread in it . fold the wrapping foil up . put the wrapped up bread back on heat to keep it warm .

place the wrapped sandwich on the grill .
pick up foil - wrapped sandwich . place sandwich on the coolest part of the grill .

place the wrapped sandwich on the grill .
wrap the sandwich into foil tightly . walk over to grill and make sure it is on . place the foil onto the grill . step away so you do n't get burned .

place the wrapped sandwich on the grill .
wrap the sandwich up in aluminum foil where it is all covered . put it on the grill on the side where the coals are not .

add chicken ribs to a bowl of water and let it boil .
put the chicken ribs in the pan . let the water start bubbling .

add chicken ribs to a bowl of water and let it boil .
take a large cooking pot and place it on your stove . fill the pot with 8 cups of water . place chicken ribs into the water in the pot . turn the dial on the stove to high and wait for the water to start to boil .

add chicken ribs to a bowl of water and let it boil .
fill a pot with water . add chicken ribs to the water . " turn the stove on high " " setting . " " . " wait for the water to boil . have an adult near to help .

pound the shallots cut the chili pepper cut the lemon grass into slices and cut some galongo .
take the shallots and pound them . next take the peppers and pound them and slit them down the middle . take the lemon grass and slice it down the stalk into two pieces and then pound it . add about 4 slices of galonga to the ingredients .

pound the shallots cut the chili pepper cut the lemon grass into slices and cut some galongo .
crush the shallots to release their flavor . crush the chili peppers , cut them in the middle and set aside . cut the lemongrass in half , then crush it lightly . cut up 4 slices of galongo .

pound the shallots cut the chili pepper cut the lemon grass into slices and cut some galongo .
take some shallots and place the knife on the shallots and crush the shallots . take 2 - 3 red chilies and crush them with knife . cut the red chilies in to two halves . cut the lemon grass in to pieces . take some galongo and cut in to small pieces .

remove the foamy froth from the boiling water .
after the water boils , use a long ladle spoon to scoop out the foam . repeat the process and remove all of the foam from the soup . when the water is clear , most of the dirty foam should be out .

remove the foamy froth from the boiling water .
boil the water . using a ladle remove the foamy froth from the boiling water until it is clear .

remove the foamy froth from the boiling water .
once the water is boiling , get your ladle . use the ladle to scoop the foam off the top of the boiling water . once the foam changes to a white color and the water is clearer you can stop scooping out the foam .

add the shallots chili pepper and lemon grass into the bowl and cover the lid .
add the lemon grass in to the bowl . add 2 chili peppers in to the bowl . add some shallots in to the bowl . cover the lid . simmer the stove and let it boil for 30 minutes .

add the shallots chili pepper and lemon grass into the bowl and cover the lid .
add shallots to the broth in the pot . then add one or two lemon grass stalks to the pot . then add whole dried chili peppers . cover with lid and simmer and cook for 30 minutes .

add the shallots chili pepper and lemon grass into the bowl and cover the lid .
put the shallots into the pan . put the chili pepper into the pan . put the lemon grass into the pan . put the lid on the pan . let it cook slowly for 30 minutes .

add some lemon grass fish sauce sugar salt chicken powder chili flakes and stir it to combine .
put the lemon grass into the pan . put the fish sauce and sugar into the pan . add some salt into the pan . put the chicken and powder chili flakes into the pan . stir all the ingredients .

add some lemon grass fish sauce sugar salt chicken powder chili flakes and stir it to combine .
add some lemon grass to the soup . then add in the fish sauce and sugar . next add salt and chicken to the pot . finally add chicken pepper and chili flakes to the soup . stir the soup to combine the ingredients .

add some lemon grass fish sauce sugar salt chicken powder chili flakes and stir it to combine .
add sliced lemongrass to the pot . pour in fish sauce , sugar , salt , chicken powder , chili flakes ( add less chili flakes if you do n't like spicy food ) . stir it well to combine these ingredients .

put all the vegetable into the bowl and cook them .
you have it to the final step ! slowly poor the vegetables in the pot with your soup . now just stir and let cook for 2 - 3 more minutes .

put all the vegetable into the bowl and cook them .
pour all of the vegetables into the pan . allow them to heat up and cook on the stove .

put all the vegetable into the bowl and cook them .
put all the vegetables into the pot . stir it .

cut the cilantro and lime .
place the cilantro on a cutting board . use the knife to carefully cut the cilantro into small strips . remove the cilantro from the cutting board and place to the size . place the lime on the cutting board . use the knife to cut the lime in the middle so that you have to half limes .

cut the cilantro and lime .
cook it until it is a little soft . leave it a little crunchy . now cut the cilantro into thin slices with a knife . cut the lime in half . get a lime juicer . it looks like a little plastic man with a hat .

cut the cilantro and lime .
get veggies ready . cut cilantro in small pieces and put to side . cut the lime in half . take the lime and juice it on juicer . put juicer to the side .

transfer the chicken soup into a bowl sprinkle cilantro and add some lime juice .
get a big bowl out . pour the chicken soup into this bowl . take cilantro out of the cabinet and open the top , and shake a little out into the soup , take lime juice out of the fridge , pour a little into the soup .

transfer the chicken soup into a bowl sprinkle cilantro and add some lime juice .
put the chicken soup in to a bowl . cut the cilantro in to small pieces . add the cilantro on top of chicken soup . squeeze juice from one lemon . add the lime juice on top of chicken .

transfer the chicken soup into a bowl sprinkle cilantro and add some lime juice .
scoop the soup into a bowl . make sure there are pieces of chicken and liquid in the bowl . sprinkle some cilantro on top . take some lime juice in a spoon . put as much lime juice as you want into your soup .

pour soup into the bowl .
use a ladle to scoop up some soup . pour the soup into the bowl with the ladle .

pour soup into the bowl .
put noodles into a bowl . using a big soup ladle pour the soup over the noodles . add enough soup to mostly cover the noodles .

pour soup into the bowl .
place noodles in a bowl . using a ladle , ladle the soup on top of the noodles . add in just enough soup to cover the noodles .

thinly slice the green onion .
put your green onions on the cutting board . chop off the ends that have the roots . set aside some of the onions for the broth . slice the rest of the green onions very thinly to use for the topping , then set them aside .

thinly slice the green onion .
put the green onions on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to trim off the bottoms . use a sharp knife to thinly slice all of the green onions .

thinly slice the green onion .
put the end off of the green onions and throw away . carefully use the knife to thinly slice the green onions .

place pork corn an egg and green on the noodles .
use chopsticks to grab the pork . place the pork in the bowl . use your hands to add the egg and green onions into the bowl so they are not touching .

place pork corn an egg and green on the noodles .
put broth and noodles in the bowl . add slices of roast pork on top . add sauteed corn , a boiled egg , and chopped green onions to the bowl .

place pork corn an egg and green on the noodles .
set two slices of roast pork on top . then add some corn . add some egg on the side . top it off with green onions .

add sugar soy sauce sake miso paste and chili paste to the broth .
add sugar , soy sauce , sake , miso paste and chili paste to the broth . stir well with chopsticks or a spoon .

add sugar soy sauce sake miso paste and chili paste to the broth .
add sugar to the pot . pour in soy sauce . add some sake . add miso paste . add a bit of chili paste to the broth in the pot .

add sugar soy sauce sake miso paste and chili paste to the broth .
hold the ingredients over the pot and carefully pour in the sugar soy sauce and sake to the broth . use a spoon to add the miso paste and chili paste . stir with chopsticks .

add the garlic and sesame oil to the soup .
grate a clove of garlic with a cheese grater . carefully add it into the soup . carefully pour sesame oil into the soup . gently stir the garlic and sesame oil to mix it in evenly as the soup cooks .

add the garlic and sesame oil to the soup .
add grated garlic to the soup . stir the soup with a stirring spoon . add some sesame oil . continue to use the spoon to mix everything into the soup .

add the garlic and sesame oil to the soup .
add garlic to the pan . add sesame oil to the pan .

slice the ginger into pieces .
use the knife to cut the ginger . slice the ginger across into thin pieces .

slice the ginger into pieces .
carefully hold one end of the ginger . angle the knife . cut strips out of the ginger by cutting thin strips straight down .

slice the ginger into pieces .
put a piece of ginger on the cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the ginger into slices .

crush and grate the garlic .
press a knife on the garlic to smash it . take the garlic and rub it on a grater .

crush and grate the garlic .
use a knife to carefully cut up the ginger . crush some garlic . take 1 clove of garlic and crate it . set the grated garlic to the side .

crush and grate the garlic .
place ginger on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to slice the ginger . place garlic on cutting board and use a knife to crush it . grate one clove of garlic and set aside to use later .

place the noodles in the bowl .
pick up noodles with chopsticks . put the noodles in a bowl .

place the noodles in the bowl .
finish straining any extra water out of the noodles . use chopsticks to put the noodles into a bowl .

place the noodles in the bowl .
strain the noodles . place the noodles in a bowl with chopsticks .

add baking soda and pasta to a pot of water .
add baking soda to a large pot of boiling water . carefully add the pasta to the pot . follow the directions for cooking on the package of the pasta .

add baking soda and pasta to a pot of water .
add water to a large pot . allow to come to a rolling boil . add baking soda . then add pasta . allow the pasta to cook and get soft .

add baking soda and pasta to a pot of water .
add a big pot with some water on the stove . turn on high heat until boiling . add baking soda to the water . add the pasta to the water .

strain the broth .
hold the pot over a strainer in the sink . pour the pot carefully through the strainer being careful of the hot liquid .

strain the broth .
turn off the stove . grab oven mitts . carefully grab the pot with the broth in it . grab a strainer . pour the broth into the strainer .

strain the broth .
on the counter , place a strainer over a large soup pot . turn off heat under the vegetables / chicken . pour the vegetable / chicken contents over the strainer . keep the strained broth in the large soup pot to make the soups base .

add ginger garlic pork and green onion to the pot of water .
put a pot of water on the stove . to the water , add sliced ginger and crushed garlic . next add the ground pork and whole green onions to the water . turn on the heat .

add ginger garlic pork and green onion to the pot of water .
pick up the ginger and onion and throw it in with your hands in pot of water . push the pork into the pot of water .

add ginger garlic pork and green onion to the pot of water .
add ginger into the pot of water . put some crushed garlic into the water . add the pork to the mixture . add some green onions to the pot . use chopsticks to stir the pot .

add garlic powder chili powder paprika salt cayenne pepper buffalo wing sauce to the wings and mix .
add in a tablespoon of garlic powder , chili powder , and paprika to the bowl . add half a teaspoon of kosher salt and cayenne pepper . then add a quarter cup of your favorite buffalo wing sauce to the wings . now use your hands to really mix and coat all the wings with the sauce and seasonings .

add garlic powder chili powder paprika salt cayenne pepper buffalo wing sauce to the wings and mix .
sprinkle with the garlic powder , chili powder , and paprika all over the wings in the bowl . then also sprinkle the salt and cayenne pepper all over the wings . pour the buffalo wing sauce inside the bowl . mix up the wings and spices inside the bowl with your hands until all of the wings are covered . wash your hands .

add garlic powder chili powder paprika salt cayenne pepper buffalo wing sauce to the wings and mix .
take some chicken wings in a bowl . add some garlic powder and chili powder in to the bowl . add some salt and paprika in to the bowl . add buffalo sauce in to the wings . mix all the contents in the bowl .

place wings on the baking sheet and cook flipping midway .
preheat the over to 400 degrees . use tongs to place the wings on the baking sheet . cook in the over for 20 minutes . take out of the oven and use tongs to flip them over . cook the wings for 20 more minutes .

place wings on the baking sheet and cook flipping midway .
put the wings on a baking sheet . place them into the oven at 400 degrees . 10 minutes through , flip the wings . cook for 20 minutes total .

place wings on the baking sheet and cook flipping midway .
use tongs to grab the chicken wings . put the wings on the baking sheet so they are not touching each other . let them cook and flip them with the tongs .

rinse dry and cut the wings .
put the wings under cold water and rinse them . use a towel to dry the wings . use a knife to carefully cut the wings away from the drum .

rinse dry and cut the wings .
rinse the wings under cold water . place them on a cutting board . using a paper towel , pat the water off the chicken . take a knife and separate the wing from the drummete .

rinse dry and cut the wings .
take the chicken wings in the hand . wash the wings in the tap water . place the wings on a plate . take a paper towel and dry the wings . cut the wings using a knife .

mix the wings with buffalo sauce .
take tongs and put the wings in a bowl . pour buffalo sauce into the bowl . use the tongs to mix together the sauce and wings .

mix the wings with buffalo sauce .
use prongs to place the wings into a big bowl . then use the prongs to toss them with another half of cup of buffalo sauce .

mix the wings with buffalo sauce .
take tongs and grab the wings . put the wings in a bowl . pour the sauce onto the wings in the bowl . stir around the wings with tongs .

mix the ricotta cheese and the coconut sugar .
get a small amount of ricotta cheese . get a small amount of coconut sugar . add coconut sugar to ricotta cheese . microwave for thirty seconds . mix the warm ricotta cheese and melted sugar together .

mix the ricotta cheese and the coconut sugar .
measure out one cup of ricotta cheese in a small bowl . measure out 1 tablespoon coconut sugar and mix . microwave for 30 seconds . take out of microwave and mix until well combines .

mix the ricotta cheese and the coconut sugar .
add the coconut sugar into the bowl of ricotta cheese . microwave the mixture for 30 seconds . stir the mixture well .

two pieces of bread . put cheese on bread . only on side that does not have butter . after you put cheese on both pieces of bread . put bread together like a sandwich , and now it 's ready for you to grill .

cover one of them on the other 's top to make a sandwich .
finish topping sugar onto the cheese . place the other slice of bread onto the other top to complete the sandwich .

cover one of them on the other 's top to make a sandwich .
after adding the sugar , you will place the other piece of bread on top of that one . now you will have the sandwich complete and ready to eat .

cover one of them on the other 's top to make a sandwich .
add the ingredients onto the bread . once you have added the contents , take one piece of the bread and put it on top of the other piece of bread .

cook in a pan with butter .
you want to heat the pan . grease the pan as it is heating up . place the sandwich into the pan on the grease . flip the sandwich over and cook the other side . use the spatula to make sure the sandwich cooks evenly .

cook in a pan with butter .
grease pan with butter . let butter get hot . cook one side . cook other side . plate , and eat it .

cook in a pan with butter .
take a stick of butter and unwrap slightly to discover butter . lightly butter the pan so all corners of pan are covered . put sandwich in pan for 3 minutes and then flip . cook on other side for 3 minutes or until brown . remove and enjoy .

add bean sprouts to the pan . add the garlic chives . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together spreading around evenly .

add the bean sprouts and the garlic chives and toss .
add bean sprouts to the pan . add garlic to the pan . add chives to the pan . stir around with the spoon t .

scramble an egg with oil and mix with the ingredients .

scramble an egg with oil and mix with the ingredients .

place thai noodles in a bowl and pour water on top .
put the noodles in a bowl . carefully pour water to cover the noodles . let the noodles soak .

add tamarind paste fish sauce chili sauce palm sugar to a pan and stir .
now lets make the sauce . first put in the tamarind into our pan . next we will add in the fish sauce and chili sauce . after that we will put in some sugar ( either palm or white sugar ) . now we want stir our mixture over medium heat in the pan with our spatula .

add tamarind paste fish sauce chili sauce palm sugar to a pan and stir .
add tamarind to a preheated pan . put in the fish sauce . add chili sauce to the pan . pour in the sugar into the pan . stir the ingredients together over medium heat bringing it to a boil .

add tamarind paste fish sauce chili sauce palm sugar to a pan and stir .
get a pan and put it on the stove . turn the heat up to medium . put the tamarind pate in the pan . add the fish sauce , chili sauce , and the sugar . use a wooden spoon and stir the sauce and bring it to a boil . turn off the heat and set the pan aside .

now we will add oil to our preheated pan . then we want to add in our chopped shallots and garlic . once they are all in , just use your spoon or spatula to saute the veggies .

put the soaked thai noodles into the pan . add water to the pan . mix up the ingredients with a spoon . push the food over to one side of the pan .

add the soaked thai noodles and water toss and push the mixture to one side of the pan .
add some thai noodles to a bowl of warm water . when the pan is ready , add the noodles to the mixture . add a little water , about 1/4 cup . mix the noodles into the meat and vegetables . use a spoon to push everything to the side in a pile .

add the soaked thai noodles and water toss and push the mixture to one side of the pan .
put in the soaked thai noodles to the mix . add water . use the stirring spoon to mix the noodles with everything else in the pan . when mixed , push everything to one side of the pan .

plate the dish and garnish with roasted peanuts chives bean sprouts and lime wedges .

spread mayonnaise on top of one slice of toast .
use a butter knife to transfer a little bit of mayonnaise onto one piece of toast . use the knife to spread the mayonnaise evenly across the entire surface of the piece of toast , adding more if necessary .

spread mayonnaise on top of one slice of toast .
place a slice of toasted bread in front of you on the counter top . open a jar of mayonnaise and use a knife to scoop out about 1 tablespoon or enough to cover the top of the piece of toast . using the knife , spread the mayonnaise evenly over the top of 1 piece of toast . you may use the knife to get more if you need it . if you prefer to use a substitute form of mayonnaise called ' miracle whip ' you may use that ; or you may even use a sandwich spread containing pickles , according to your taste .

spread mayonnaise on top of one slice of toast .
put mayonnaise on a knife and place it on the bread . spread the mayonnaise on the toast with the knife .

place the crisp bacon on the toast spread with mayonnaise .
take a piece of bacon and tear it in half with your fingers so that it fits on top of the piece of toast that you have just put mayonnaise on .. . lay several bacon strips like this in a row lying flat on top of the toast , enough to cover one side . two to three slices of bacon on this piece of toast can be laid in a row or criss - crossed over the bread .

place the crisp bacon on the toast spread with mayonnaise .
break apart the bacon in the center . place the bacon on the toast . about three slices works well .

place the crisp bacon on the toast spread with mayonnaise .
take the bacon and break each piece in half . put the bacon pieces on the toast .

place 2 small tomato slices on top of the bacon .
place one tomato slice on the bacon . place another tomato slice on the bacon if you 'd like !

place 2 small tomato slices on top of the bacon .
slice a tomato with a knife on a cutting board . put two small slices , or one big slice on top of bacon .

place 2 small tomato slices on top of the bacon .
ask an adult to slice the tomato for you because the knife needs to be sharp . take 1 big piece or two smaller pieces of tomato and put them on top of the bacon .

place lettuce leaves on the tomatoes .
take lettuce leaves out of bowl . place lettuce leaves on tomatoes on sandwich . place lettuce leaves as flat as possible to make sandwich stay flat .

place lettuce leaves on the tomatoes .
lay bread . place tomatoes on bread . place leaves on tomato .

place lettuce leaves on the tomatoes .
tear off pieces of lettuce into large pieces that will fit on your sandwich . lay the lettuce on top of the tomatoes ( already on the sandwich ) . distribute the lettuce pieces so they are an even layer over the sandwich .

cover the sandwich with the other slice of toasted bread .
pick up the second slice of toast . put the toast on top of the sandwich .

cover the sandwich with the other slice of toasted bread .
add a little bit more lettuce on top . put the top piece of bread on the sandwich .

cover the sandwich with the other slice of toasted bread .
put one slice of toasted bread on the cutting board . stack the food items you want to eat on top of the slice of toast . take a second slice of toasted bread and put it on top of the sandwich like a lid .

cut the sandwich in half .
put the sandwich together . next cut the sandwich half way diagonally .

cut the sandwich in half .
the sandwich is ready . we can cut the sandwich in to two with the help of a knife . cut the sandwich from corner to corner . the sandwich is cut into two equal halves .

cut the sandwich in half .
using a knife , cut the sandwich in half . be careful so as not to cut your fingers !

add chicken to water and cook until tender and remove .
put a pot on the stove and add water . once the pot is boiling put the chicken in . cook until the chicken is not pink and is tender .

add chicken to water and cook until tender and remove .
remove the prawns using your straining spoon . using the same straining spoon add the chopped chicken pieces to your boiling pot . take care to gently add the chicken to the pot as not to splash you with the hot liquid . cook until the chicken has cooked through . then using your straining spoon remove the chicken pieces from your broth .

add water and bring to boil .
add the water slowly and cover . once at boil slowly turn down heat to leave at a boil .

add water and bring to boil .
add the water to the pot and turn the heat up until it starts to boil . you 'll know it 's boiling when it starts to bubble .

add water and bring to boil .
fill the pot with water . turn the heat up on the stove knob . wait until the water is bubbling up .

heat saved oil in a pan and add spicy paste .
get a pan and heat it up on stove top . then add your saved oil . add some spicy paste to your oil .

heat saved oil in a pan and add spicy paste .
warm up the pan by turning the eye on , on the stove top . reheat the prepared fragrant oil from earlier in the pan . add the paste . fry on low heat . stir often .

heat saved oil in a pan and add spicy paste .
take a cup and measure out oil . add to a pan . add heat . then add a small amount of paste . heat until completely warm .

add prawns and poach for 2 minutes then remove .
put the prawns in the water . let the prawns cook in the pot for 2 minutes and remove with a spoon .

add prawns and poach for 2 minutes then remove .
do not discard the water you cooked your noodles in . using the same boiling water add your prawns to the boiling water . cook for about two minutes until they are tender . using a metal strainer or spoon fish out the prawns the same way you did the noodles leaving the water .

add prawns and poach for 2 minutes then remove .
add some prawns to you pot of boiling water . let poach ( cook ) and set timer for 2 minutes . after timer ends remove from pot .

add coconut milk and bring to a simmer .
slowly pour in the coconut milk . let it heat until it starts to make small bubbles .

add coconut milk and bring to a simmer .
use your measuring cup to slowly add the coconut milk to your boiling pot . use a spatula to mix it . make sure to bring it back to a simmer .

add coconut milk and bring to a simmer .
take the coconut milk . add to the pan . let mixture come to a simmer .

add bok choy and remove from heat after 30 seconds .
take pieces of bok choy lettuce and place on cutting board . cut into pieces . add to a skillet . turn on the heat . allow to heat then remove .

add bok choy and remove from heat after 30 seconds .
put the bok choy in the pan . with your large spoon , stir the bok choy into the sauce . only let in cook for 30 seconds . remove the pan from the heat .

add egg noodles to pot and remove when tender .
in a heated pot put in the egg noodles . once the noodles are tender it is cooked enough and should be removed from heat . noodles are done take the pot off the stove top .

add egg noodles to pot and remove when tender .
add the egg noodles to the pot of water . wait until they are soft .

add egg noodles to pot and remove when tender .
add the egg into the pot . add the noodles into the pot . wait until the noodles becomes tender . remove the noodles into the plate .

boil water cook rice noodles and remove when tender .
start with boiling the water . once the water is boiling add the rice noodles stir occasionally . once the noodles are tender turn off the stove and strain the noodles .

boil water cook rice noodles and remove when tender .
turn on the stove top and place a pot of water over the portion of the stove you turned on . heat the water until boiling ( large bubbles rise up from the bottom and burst when they hit the air ) . put the noodles into the water . let the noodles boil in the water for 2 to 4 minutes , or until the noodles are soft and flexible . remove the noodles from the water .

boil water cook rice noodles and remove when tender .
take noodles and add to pot . add water to pot . bring to a boil . cook noodles until soft . remove from heat and drain and serve .

place both types of noodles into bowl add prawns chicken broth and garnish with beans and shallots .
place noodles in a bowl . then add cooked shrimp into the bowl . add chicken broth . decorate with shallots and beans . then serve .

place both types of noodles into bowl add prawns chicken broth and garnish with beans and shallots .
take a large glass bowl . place both the types of noodles into the bowl . add prawns into the bowl . add chicken into the bowl . decorate it with beans and shallots .

place both types of noodles into bowl add prawns chicken broth and garnish with beans and shallots .
