fry shallots and drain onto paper towel .
place a fry pan with enough oil on a burner ; set to medium heat . place layers of paper towels on work counter . get bowl of thinly sliced shallots and drop shallots into pan . fry shallots until they are crisp and light golden brown . remove shallots from pan and drain on paper towels .

fry shallots and drain onto paper towel .
playback of this video . has been disabled by the video owner .

fry shallots and drain onto paper towel .
put shallots into the fryer . take the shallots out with a basket to drain the grease . put the shallots on a paper towel to soak up the grease .

strain oil and discard shells .
get a strainer and a small bowl . hold the strainer over the bowl . carefully pour the oil and prawn shells through the strainer . throw away the prawn shells and keep the oil .

strain oil and discard shells .
pour everything into a strainer . like the oil strain out . throw away the leftover shells .

strain oil and discard shells .
clean the prawns ( shrimp ) and de - vein them . reserve the outer skins or shells of the prawns . cut the chicken into bite size pieces . heat the oil in a small sauce pan and stir in the prawn shells from earlier .

add tofu puffs lime juice fish sauce and brown sugar to pan .
cut the tofu puffs in half . place the tofu puffs gently into the pan with the broth . then cut your limes in half . gently squeeze the limes over the pan so the juice is added . measure out the fish sauce and gently add it to the pan with the broth .

add tofu puffs lime juice fish sauce and brown sugar to pan .
fry prawn shells and strain . boil egg noodle and regular noodle separately and drain them . cook or own and chicken separately and strain . fry the sauce paste on low heat . fry onions and add the other veggies and spices . mix all and serve .

add tofu puffs lime juice fish sauce and brown sugar to pan .
get a cutting board and knife . cut the tofu puffs in half and add them to the mixture in the pan . sprinkle the lime juice in the pan . add the fish sauce to the pan . next , add the brown sugar to the pan but only a little at first , stir the ingredients together and taste it to see if it needs more brown sugar .

heat fragrant oil in sauce pan and cook prawn shells .
can not play this video . playback has been disabled by the video owner .

heat fragrant oil in sauce pan and cook prawn shells .
place bowl with cleaned prawn shells on work counter . place sauce pan on a burner . set heat to low - medium . add oil to sauce pan . add shells to the pan and fry until the shells turn red .

heat fragrant oil in sauce pan and cook prawn shells .
clean the prawns by removing the shell and removing the vein . keep the shells in a bowl for the next step . next we will get the oil ready by heating it in a sauce pan . once it is hot , slowly add the shells to the pan with the oil and cook while stirring with a wood spoon for one to two minutes or until the shells are red in color and smell good . pour the oil over a bowl in a metal strainer and throw away the shells . keep the oil because we will use it to fry the paste . fill another pot of water and heat it until it bubbling hot . add the rice noodle to the boiling water , stirring occasionally . after straining and removing the rice noodles , add a little more water to the pot and heat back up until it is bubbling . use the slotted spoon or strainer to remove the prawns once cooked . use a spatula to stir the paste while cooking . make sure to keep stirring the paste and mixing all of the paste so none of it burns . cook until you can see oil spots on top of the paste . after frying the thinly sliced shallots , remove with a slotted spoon or strainer to a paper towel .

add chopped bacon to a hot pan and stir .
cut strips of uncut bacon into small rectangles . put a pan on the stove , add a small amount of oil . turn the stove on , if gas , turn to the end and wait for flame to ignite . turn the dial for the stove to the middle . add the bacon and stir it around until it turns a light brown color .

add chopped bacon to a hot pan and stir .
add chopped bacon to hot pan . stir until the bacon is cooked .

add chopped bacon to a hot pan and stir .
place the pan over a flame or eye on the stove ( circle ) . preheat the pan and once the pan is nice and warm place the chopped bacon into the pan . stir occasionally to make sure the bacon does n't burn .

remove the bacon from the pan .
take the browned bacon out of the pan . use a spoon to scoop the bacon out of the pan and put in a bowl .

remove the bacon from the pan .
once bacon is browned use a large metal spoon and scoop out of pan . place all of bacon into a medium sized bowl .

remove the bacon from the pan .
use a spoon to carefully remove the bacon . leave the bacon fat in the pan , as you do it .

place the beef into a towel and pat dry .
place the beef meat into a clean kitchen towel . fold the towel over and pat the meat dry .

place the beef into a towel and pat dry .
take a towel on a board . cut the beef in to small pieces . place the beef on to the towel . press the beef with the towel . pat dry the beef with the towel .

place the beef into a towel and pat dry .
place the beef in one layer onto a towel . pat the beef dry .

place the beef into a hot pan to brown .
place the pan in the stove to boil . place the cut and cleaned beef into the hot pan . flip it over the beef pieces once it is cooked and turns brown .

place the beef into a hot pan to brown .
place your beef into a pan that has been heating on your stove . turn the beef so that all sides get nice and brown .

place the beef into a hot pan to brown .
put the pieces of beef into a hot pan and cook them until they are brown . stir while cooking and turn them .

add onion and carrots to the pan .
make sure the pan is preheated and well oiled . pour the carrots and onions into the pan .

add onion and carrots to the pan .
take a pan on a stove . cut the onions in to thin long slices . add the onions in to the pan . cut the carrots in to thin rounds . add the carrots in to the pan .

add onion and carrots to the pan .
locate your cooking pan . grab your onions and carefully put them inside the pan . next , carefully add carrots to the pan . you may pick up the onions and carrots by hand or use a cup to carry them to your pan .

pour the meat back into the pan and add flour .
put the meat back into the pan . put one tablespoon of flour into the pan .

pour the meat back into the pan and add flour .
empty your bowl of meat back into the pan on your stove . sprinkle 1 tablespoon of flower over the top of everything in the pan .

pour the meat back into the pan and add flour .
pour the meat from the bowl back into the pan . add 1 tablespoon flour into the pan . stir well .

place the pan into the oven .
place oven mitts on hands to prevent burns . carefully open the oven door fully . grab pan with oven mitts and place on bottom rack of oven . close oven door .

place the pan into the oven .
be sure to preheat your oven . there will be a button that says bake and buttons for up and down . be sure to press up or down to adjust the temperature of your oven . then hit the start button . once the beeper goes off on the oven after warming up ( this means your oven has reached the temperature you programmed it for ) you can place the pan into the oven .

place the pan into the oven .
open the oven door . put pan into the oven to cook . close oven door .

add bay leaves thyme red wine beef stock garlic and tomato paste to the pan and boil .
add 3 bay leaves in to the pot . add fresh thyme leaves in to the pot . add 1 cup of red wine and beef stock in to the pot . add a teaspoon of garlic tomato paste in to the pot . boil the pot .

add bay leaves thyme red wine beef stock garlic and tomato paste to the pan and boil .
( aromatics means herbs that will give off good scents ) add fresh bay leaves and thyme ( herbs ) not dry herbs . add good tasting wine ( ask your parents what their favorite wine is ) . add beef stock . add garlic paste and tomato paste . bring to a boil ( cook till bubbling ) .

add bay leaves thyme red wine beef stock garlic and tomato paste to the pan and boil .
put bay leaves , fresh thyme and red wine in pan . then add beef stock , add garlic and tomato paste . stir well and allow pan to come to a boil .

add pearl onions to a hot pan and add beef stock bay leaf and thyme .
add your pearl onions to your cast iron skillet . allow onions to turn slightly brown in your skillet with butter . pour in the beef stock . add a couple of bay leaves . add a thyme leaf and cover pot with lid .

add pearl onions to a hot pan and add beef stock bay leaf and thyme .
very carefully , add pearl onions to the hot pan with butter and let them brown . once onions are browned , add in the beef stock very carefully to the hot pan . add in bay leaves and thyme .

add pearl onions to a hot pan and add beef stock bay leaf and thyme .
first add the onions in the pan . next add beef stock on th pan . third , you throw in some bay leaves . finally you heat the food in low temperature .

add mushrooms to a hot pan .
put mushrooms in a hot pan . shake pan .

add mushrooms to a hot pan .
put sliced mushrooms in hot frying pan . cook over medium heat ,

add mushrooms to a hot pan .
make sure your butter is covering the bottom of your preheated pan . pour the mushrooms into the pan .

add the mushrooms and pearl onions to the meat .
add the mushrooms and pearl onions to the meat with a spoon . if the sauce is too thick add more stock .

add the mushrooms and pearl onions to the meat .
fry the mushroom on a pan . fry the pearl onions in a pan . take the meat in to a bowl . add the mushrooms in to the meat pot . add the pearl onions in to the meat pot .

add the mushrooms and pearl onions to the meat .
get a spoon to get the mushrooms out of the pan and put them into the sauce . use the same spoon and scoop the pearl onions out of the pan and add them to the sauce also .

add dijon mustard to the pan .
add dijon mustard to the pan . mix well .

add dijon mustard to the pan .
use a spoon to add a little bit of dijon mustard to the pan on your stove . mix it together .

add dijon mustard to the pan .
open a jar of dijon mustard , also known as spicy mustard or brown mustard . use a small spoon to get a spoonful of the mustard . pour the mustard off of the spoon onto the top of the food in the pan .

for salad dressing- mix tbsp of mayonnaise 3 tbsp milk cream 1 tsp honey salt and pepper to taste .
add 1/2 tablespoon of mayonnaise into the pan . add 3 tablespoons of milk cream . then put in 1 teaspoon of honey . add salt and pepper to the pan . mix all of the ingredients together with a stirring spoon .

for salad dressing- mix tbsp of mayonnaise 3 tbsp milk cream 1 tsp honey salt and pepper to taste .
in a small bowl , add a 1/2 tablespoon of mayonnaise and 3 tablespoons of milk cream . next add 1 tsp of honey and a little salt and pepper . mix the ingredients with a spatula until they are well - blended .

for salad dressing- mix tbsp of mayonnaise 3 tbsp milk cream 1 tsp honey salt and pepper to taste .
take a small glass bowl . add 3 tablespoons of mayonnaise in to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of honey and 3 tablespoon of milk cream in to the bowl . add salt and pepper in to the bowl . mix everything to make a salad dressing .

in a bowl mix two green apples chopped and four stalks celery chopped .
take green apples and cut into small pieces with a knife . the add celery . cut the celery into small pieces . add salt and pepper to season the dressing . then mix all together and serve .

in a bowl mix two green apples chopped and four stalks celery chopped .
add the celery into the bowl . with a spoon mix the mixture together .

in a bowl mix two green apples chopped and four stalks celery chopped .
put two apples that have been chopped into a bowl . add four chopped stalks of celery . mix the ingredients together with a spatula in the bowl .

now add salad dressing and toss until the dressing gets coated on the ingredients .
use a spatula to scoop the dressing out into the bowl of salad . now use the spatula to mix everything all over good so it looks evenly coated .

now add salad dressing and toss until the dressing gets coated on the ingredients .
add in the salad dressing to the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the dressing around the bowl .

now add salad dressing and toss until the dressing gets coated on the ingredients .
add the dressing . with a spoon mix the salad until the dressing covers it .

now add 100 grams of nuts toasted and chopped to it .
set aside a large bowl . cut two green apples into small cubes . add them to the bowl . cut four stalks of celery into small pieces . add to the bowl . now take your toasted and chopped nuts and add about 100 g into the bowl as well .

now add 100 grams of nuts toasted and chopped to it .
now we want to add in the nuts . make sure the nuts have been chopped well , and scrape them into the bowl as well .

now add 100 grams of nuts toasted and chopped to it .
toast 100 grams of nuts . take the toasted nuts in a bowl . take the contents in a large bowl . add the nuts in to the big bowl . mix the nuts with other ingredients .

also add chopped raisins and mix all the ingredients well .
toss chopped raisins into the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the salad ingredients well . evenly mix everything around the bowl .

also add chopped raisins and mix all the ingredients well .
take raisins and add to a bowl with onions and walnuts . using a spatula , mix thoroughly . then continue mixing . add in onions . keep mixing and serve .

also add chopped raisins and mix all the ingredients well .
put the chopped raisins into the bowl . use a spatula to mix everything together well .

serve it over a layer of chopped lettuce .
use a spoon to scoop . scoop out the mixture on top of a plate of lettuce .

serve it over a layer of chopped lettuce .
place a layer of lettuce into a bowl . scoop the mixture into the bowl on top of the lettuce . serve the salad bowl .

serve it over a layer of chopped lettuce .
use a spoon to pick up the salad . place the salad on a bed of chopped lettuce .

add one quarter cup of corn meal and one cup of flour .
put one quarter cup of cornmeal and one cup of flour in the bowl . use a wire whisk to mix the batter .

add one quarter cup of corn meal and one cup of flour .
add 1/4 cup of corn meal . add 1 cup of flour . use a whisk to mix everything in the bowl together .

add one quarter cup of corn meal and one cup of flour .
now we want to add in a quarter cup of corn meal . once the cornmeal is added , we can add in our flour . now we will start mixing the ingredients with our whisk .

remove the onions and place on paper towel .
take a pot on the stove . add some oil in the pot . heat the oil in the pot . fry the onion rings in the pot . remove the fried onions and place them on the paper towel .

remove the onions and place on paper towel .
pick the onions out with tongs . put the onions on a paper towel .

remove the onions and place on paper towel .
fold 3 pieces of paper towel . put paper towel on a plate . get a fork . use fork to pick up onion rings from hot oil . put onions rings on the plate with the paper towel .

crack one egg into a bowl .
take an egg and crack in a bowl . then cut an onion using a knife into thin slices . add batter to a bowl . dip onions in the egg and batter mix . then coat until all onions are coated .

crack one egg into a bowl .
tap the egg to crack it open . open the eggshell over the bowl so the egg falls inside the bowl .

crack one egg into a bowl .
crack open an egg by gently hitting it against the top of a small bowl . put the egg into the small bowl and throw away the shell .

cover with plastic wrap and let sit over night .
take a small mixing bowl . add the ingredients in the mixing bowl . mix the ingredients in to a paste . take a plastic wrap and cover it on the bowl . keep it aside over night .

cover with plastic wrap and let sit over night .
cover the bowl with plastic wrap . let the bowl sit over night .

cover with plastic wrap and let sit over night .
tear off a big sheet of plastic wrap . cover the bowl with the plastic wrap sealing it .

slice big onion and separate into rings .
slice the onion in half on a cutting board . once sliced off take the peel off and throw it away . and then separate it into rings .

slice big onion and separate into rings .
use a knife to carefully cut the onion . peel the outside peel off the onion . take the rings out of the onions .

slice big onion and separate into rings .
carefully hold the onion . angle the knife . cut the onion into discs with a knife .

add one cup of beer and mix .
open the beer and add to the mix . use about a cup and a quarter of corn meal .

add one cup of beer and mix .
hold the bear over the bowl . carefully pour in 1 cup . mix everything with a whisk .

add one cup of beer and mix .
open a can of beer and add most of it to the bowl , about 1 cup . add 1/4 cup of corn meal .

add one table spoon of oil salt and cayenne pepper and baking powder and beat .
in a big bowl put one table spoon of vegetable oil . put one teaspoon of salt , 1/8 teaspoon of cayenne pepper in bowl . put one teaspoon of baking powder in bowl then stir the mixture in bowl with a whisk .

add one table spoon of oil salt and cayenne pepper and baking powder and beat .
add one tablespoon of oil . then add 1 teaspoon and baking powder . then add 1/8 teaspoon of cayenne pepper . then beat the mixture well together .

add one table spoon of oil salt and cayenne pepper and baking powder and beat .
put in 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil . add 1 teaspoon of salt . add 1/8 tspn of cayenne pepper . add 1 teaspoon of baking powder . use a whisk to stir everything together in the bowl .

add onions into batter and drop into hot oil .
put some onions into the batter . use a fork to lower the battered onions one at a time into the hot oil . once the onion rings are golden brown use a fork to remove from the oil .

add onions into batter and drop into hot oil .
use a fork to dip the onions in the batter . use the fork to lower the onion into the oil after covering with batter mix .

add onions into batter and drop into hot oil .
put the onions into the batter . cover all sides of the onion in the batter . with a fork place the onion into the hot oil .

boil the wrapped pierogies in boiling salted water .
put a large pot of water on the stove and bring to a boil . drop the pierogies into the boiling water . use a wooden spoon to stir the pierogies to prevent sticking .

boil the wrapped pierogies in boiling salted water .
boil a big pot of water with salt in it . put the pierogies , one at a time , into the boiling water and go slow so you do n't burn your hands . you do n't want them to get too crowded , so if your pan is smaller , just cook fewer at a time . use a wooden spoon to stir very gently while they cook .

boil the wrapped pierogies in boiling salted water .
boil the wrapped pierogies in boiling salted water . be gentle and careful so you do n't get burned . do n't put too many in the pot . use your spoon to stir them gently .

chop the other half of the onion and cook it with a little bit of oil .
add 1 tablespoon of oil to the frying pan . add the chopped onion into the frying pan . cook for 3 or 4 minutes until they are soft .

chop the other half of the onion and cook it with a little bit of oil .
chop half of an onion with a knife . put it in a pan with oil .

chop the other half of the onion and cook it with a little bit of oil .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . cut the onion in to small pieces . add the onions to the oil in the pan .

let the food processor process the dough for another minute .
turn your food processor off when you notice the dough is forming a ball . remove the lid and use your hands to feel the dough . check if the dough feels soft to the touch .

let the food processor process the dough for another minute .
look at the dough in the food processor . when the dough starts to form a ball , check if it is soft .

let the food processor process the dough for another minute .
turn on the food processor to process the dough . the dough will start to form into a ball . when the dough forms into a ball , turn off your processor and remove the lid .

keep rolling until you get 1 to 2 mm thick dough .
put one half of the dough into a ziplock bag and set aside . use a rolling pin to flatten the dough .

keep rolling until you get 1 to 2 mm thick dough .
keep rolling the dough with a rolling pin making it more flat . roll until the dough is about 2 mm thick .

keep rolling until you get 1 to 2 mm thick dough .
take a ball of dough . take a rolling pin . roll the dough in to circle . roll it on all directions , roll the dough till it is 1 to 2 mm thick .

wrap the meat mixture in the small dough portions .
take the dough in to small pieces . roll the dough in to flat circles . take the meat mixture in a bowl . add the meat mixture in to the dough . wrap the meat in the dough .

wrap the meat mixture in the small dough portions .
lay one dough circle flat in the palm of your hand . using a small scoop or spoon place about 1 tablespoon of the meat mixture in the center of the circle and press it down with your finger to flatten in slightly . carefully fold the dough around the mixture until you have a half moon shape . make sure to press the edges together to seal it closed . pinch the edges between your thumb and pointer finger to secure it and make a nice decoration around the edge .

wrap the meat mixture in the small dough portions .
put a piece of meat in the middle of the dough circle . fold the dough over the meat .

combine the meat with half of the onion salt bay leaf dried mushrooms peppercorns and water .
put the meat in a large pot with half an onion , salt , bay leaf , dried mushrooms , and peppercorns . add water to the pot .

combine the meat with half of the onion salt bay leaf dried mushrooms peppercorns and water .
put meat into a large pot . add half of an onion , a bay leaf , a teaspoon of salt , a few peppercorns , and dried mushrooms . add water to the pot until the meat is completely under water .

combine the meat with half of the onion salt bay leaf dried mushrooms peppercorns and water .
put the meat into the pot . add half of an onion . put in a bay leaf , peppercorns and dried mushrooms . pour in enough water to cover the meat . add 1 teaspoon of salt .

season with salt and pepper and mix very well .
take a small mixing bowl . add the mixing contents in to the bowl . add little salt in to the bowl . add some pepper in to the bowl . mix the contents well .

season with salt and pepper and mix very well .
use a spoon and scoop out the salt and pepper into the bowl . use the spoon to mix everything .

season with salt and pepper and mix very well .
put salt and pepper on the item . mix good .

pulse few times and then add the water .
press the pulse button a few times . open it and pour water into the mix .

pulse few times and then add the water .
put the lid on the food processor and lock into place . pulse the processor a few times to mix the salt with the flour . slowly pour some hot water into the top of the food processor .

pulse few times and then add the water .
press the button on the blender to pulse a few times . add water to the blender .

divide the dough in 2 portions .
roll the dough and form an oval . carefully use a large knife to cut the dough in half . watch your fingers and pay close attention when using a knife .

divide the dough in 2 portions .
take the dough and hold it carefully . cut the dough in half with a knife .

divide the dough in 2 portions .
roll the dough with your hands . take a knife and carefully cut the dough into 2 sections .

with a glass or large cookie cutter cut circles and take the remaining dough .
roll the dough in to a thin circle . take a glass or a cookie cutter . place the glass inverted on to the dough . cut the dough in to circles . remove the circles from the dough .

with a glass or large cookie cutter cut circles and take the remaining dough .
use a glass and cut a circle in the leftover dough . cut circles throughout the rest of the leftover dough .

with a glass or large cookie cutter cut circles and take the remaining dough .
use a glass to cut circles into the dough . get as close to each circle as you can when making them . the closer you place the circles the more you are able to make .

grind the cooked meat mixture in a food processor .
slowly take a piece of meat and put it through the grinder . keep doing this with more pieces of meat .

grind the cooked meat mixture in a food processor .
get a cutting board and a sharp knife . place the cooked meat mixture on the board and cut into medium size pieces . take the pieces and put them into the food processor . make sure to secure the cover . blend on medium speed until all the meat has been ground .

grind the cooked meat mixture in a food processor .
cut the meat into small chunks with knife . then using your hands , put the meat through the grinder . then add the onion . next add the dried mushrooms .

in the food processor add flour and salt .
we now want to take our flour and pour it into the food processor . go ahead and add a teaspoon of salt into the processor as well .

in the food processor add flour and salt .
find a food processor and plug it in . with all your flour in a bowl , dump it into the food processor . add in one teaspoon of salt .

in the food processor add flour and salt .
pour flour into the food processor . shake salt into the flour .

fry the boiled pierogies with a little oil in a pan and then serve .
with your spoon grab the pierogies out of the water . put your pierogies into the pan . add oil into the pan . turn over your pierogies with a spatula . take the pierogies out with a spatula .

fry the boiled pierogies with a little oil in a pan and then serve .
heat up some oil on a pan . put the pierogies in the pan with your hand .

fry the boiled pierogies with a little oil in a pan and then serve .
spray some non - stick spray onto the pierogies . set the pierogies onto a frying pan . cook on the pan until brown . remove with a spoon when cooked .

cook for around an hour and let it cool .
turn the heat to medium to medium high heat . cover the pot with a lid . let it cook for 1 hour . turn off the heat and let it cool .

cook for around an hour and let it cool .
take your water and add it in with the meat . once the water is added turn the heat to medium or medium - high and let the meat cook for an hour .

cook for around an hour and let it cool .
cover the pot with a lid . let the pot cook covered for around an hour . let it cool .

transfer the meat in to a bowl and add the onion .
put the meat into a bowl . add the chopped onions into the bowl . stir them together with a stirring spoon .

transfer the meat in to a bowl and add the onion .
find wooden spoon . pick up the pan of onions and hold over bowl of meat . use spoon to transfer onion to bowl of meat .

transfer the meat in to a bowl and add the onion .
now we will add our meet into a new bowl . just use your spoon to slide the meat off your plate and into the bowl . once the meat is in the bowl , do the same with your onions .

add fish sauce to the pan and add coconut and water mixture too .
pour the water into the bowl with the coconut milk . use a spoon to mix . pour the mixture into the pot and stir .

add fish sauce to the pan and add coconut and water mixture too .
pour fish sauce into the pan . mix together coconut and water . then add this mixture to the pan . use a stirring spoon to stir everything together .

add fish sauce to the pan and add coconut and water mixture too .
carefully pour in some fish sauce to the pan . now pour in the coconut and water mixture . mix everything with a wooden spoon .

take the soup out with some boiled ramen to serve .
take the soup out of the pan with a scoop . pour the soup over the boiled ramen . prepare to serve .

take the soup out with some boiled ramen to serve .
scoop out the soup liquid or broth on the noodles . cover the noodles in the bowl with the broth .

take the soup out with some boiled ramen to serve .
using a spoon put some of the mixture on top of your bowl . mix it together using your spoon .

add more chopped ginger to the pan .
while the dish is cooking and boiling . use a wooden spoon to push in the stick of ginger gently .

add more chopped ginger to the pan .
pour more chopped ginger into the pan as it cooks . use a stirring spoon to mix it into the pan .

add more chopped ginger to the pan .
cut ginger into small pieces . measure ginger . add to the pan .

add one chicken stock cube .
pick up the box with the chicken on the front . open the box . take out one cube . open the foil . drop the rectangle shaped seasoning in the pot .

add one chicken stock cube .
open the knorr chicken stock container open , and take one cube out . unwrap the chicken stock cube . place the chicken stock cube in the pot . stir with a spoon .

add one chicken stock cube .
unwrap one knorr chicken cube . put one chicken cube into the pot .

add onion garlic and ginger slice and chicken filet to a sauce pan and cook .
add your medium chopped onion first using your wooden spoon to push all of it into the pot give it a quick mix with your spoon . add your two cloves chopped garlic and one sliced ginger again using your spoon to push it into the pot and to give it a mix . then add the chicken breast filet pieces into the pot . again give it mix with your spoon and let it cook .

add onion garlic and ginger slice and chicken filet to a sauce pan and cook .
cut up garlic , onion and ginger . place sauce pan on stove . add vegetables to pan . stir vegetables . add chicken to pan and let it cook .

add onion garlic and ginger slice and chicken filet to a sauce pan and cook .
add chopped onion , chopped garlic and sliced ginger to hot pan . add chicken breast filet . use wooden spoon to stir chicken in pan .

add some chopped cucumber and red chili .
add the papaya to the pot . add the annatto to the pot . use a spoon to stir into the sauce .

add some chopped cucumber and red chili .
take a glass bowl on the stove . cook the ingredients in the bowl . cut the cucumber in to pieces . add the cucumber in to the bowl . add some red chili in to the bowl .

add some chopped cucumber and red chili .
with a spoon add some cumbers into the bowl . with a spoon add some red chili with a spoon .

add spinach leaves to the pan .
put chili leaves in the pot . use a spoon to stir the leaves in the pot .

add spinach leaves to the pan .
put speech leaves into the pan . use the spoon to stir the leaves in to the mixture .

add spinach leaves to the pan .
take spinach leaves with your hand and place them into the bowl . with a wooden spoon mix the mixture together .

add milk to the onions and stir .
hold the milk over the pan . carefully pour the milk in the pan slowly . use a wooden spoon to stir everything together .

add milk to the onions and stir .
now we want to add in our milk . as we pour the milk in with the onions , make sure you keep stirring with your spatula or spoon . add a little more milk if it looks like the dish could use it . you want your onions to be submerged in milk .

add milk to the onions and stir .
pour the milk onto the cooking onions . use a wooden spoon to mix the onions and milk . keep stirring so there are no lumps . keep cooking and stirring until the milk boils and the sauce gets thicker .

mash the potatoes with a masher .
take the lid off of the pot . use a potato masher to mash the potatoes . mash the potatoes until there are n't any lumps .

mash the potatoes with a masher .
drain the boiled potatoes . use a potato masher to mash the potatoes . keep mashing until the big chunks are broken up .

mash the potatoes with a masher .
now take your potato masher , or a large fork and start to smash you potatoes . make sure you smash them fine , because we do not want them to have chunks . we can also use an electric mixer if you have one available .

add salt pepper and flour to the onions .
be careful because the hot oil may spatter , and could burn you . stand back as you add the ingredients in the next steps . add the salt and pepper that you measured earlier to the pan with the onions . then add the flour that you measured earlier to the pan with the onions . stir the onions well until the flour is completely coated with oil and mixed with the onions .

add salt pepper and flour to the onions .
pour in salt and pepper to the pan . add the flour . use a stirring spoon to mix everything .

add salt pepper and flour to the onions .
add salt and pepper to the pot with the onions . add flour to the pot . mix carefully with a wooden spoon .

add butter and milk to the mashed potatoes and mix .
measure out about 2 tablespoons of butter . add it to the pot of potatoes . measure about 2 tablespoons of milk . you can use cream instead of milk . pour milk into pot of potatoes . use a fork to stir the potatoes .

add butter and milk to the mashed potatoes and mix .
add butter into the pot . pour in milk to the mashed potatoes . use a whisk and stir the mixture together .

add butter and milk to the mashed potatoes and mix .
cut a piece of a stick of butter into the potatoes . pour milk in the potatoes . use a fork to mix everything together .

add butter and onions to the pan .
take a pan on the stove . add some butter in to the pan . melt the butter in the pan . take an onion and cut in to small pieces . add the onions in to the pan and mix .

add butter and onions to the pan .
add butter to the pan . put the chopped onions in the pan . cook the onions in the butter but do n't let them turn brown .

add butter and onions to the pan .
chop an onion into small pieces , so that you have 4 ounces . melt some butter in a pan . cook the onions gently in the melted butter until they are softened and clear , but not browned . stir the onions while they are cooking .

place the sausages mashed potatoes and onion sauce on a serving plate .
use tongs to place a few sausages on a plate . get a big spoon and spoon some potatoes onto the plate . use a spoon to put some gravy on the plate .

place the sausages mashed potatoes and onion sauce on a serving plate .
use tongs to put two pieces of sausage on a serving plate . use a spatula to put mashed potatoes and onion sauce on a serving plate .

place the sausages mashed potatoes and onion sauce on a serving plate .
to plate your dish , you will need the cooked sausages , the mashed potatoes and the onion sauce and your serving plates . first use tongs to put 2 sausages on the plate at 12 o'clock . use a large spoon to serve a generous scoop of mashed potatoes at 3 o'clock on the plate . add the onion sauce to the plate at 9 o'clock . you can spread some onion sauce in toward the center of the plate between the sausage and potatoes . enjoy .

add pork and shrimp into a bowl season with salt sugar garlic shallots pepper and chicken stock .
take both your minced shrimp and pork and combine them into the same mixing bowl . you can then lightly season your meat mixture with salt , sugar , and some chicken stock . you only need 1/2 a teaspoon of each . now you can add a tablespoon of shallots and a tablespoon of minced garlic . now you can shake some pepper into your bowl . last , you will mix everything together in a circular motion using your hand .

add pork and shrimp into a bowl season with salt sugar garlic shallots pepper and chicken stock .
put on some gloves . place the pork and shrimp in the bowl . pour the salt sugar salt sugar garlic shallots pepper and chicken stock on top of the meat in the bowl .

add pork and shrimp into a bowl season with salt sugar garlic shallots pepper and chicken stock .
add chopped up pork and shrimp to the bowl . add sugar , salt , garlic , shallots , pepper , and chicken stock to the bowl . use your hands to mix everything up good .

add the mushrooms carrots glass noodles into a bowl and mix .
add the mushrooms , carrots , and glass noodles to the bowl . mix them with your hands . add some egg whites and mix them again . let them sit for about 15 minutes .

add the mushrooms carrots glass noodles into a bowl and mix .
pour all the shredded mushrooms , carrots , and glass noodles into a large bowl . mix everything in the bowl together really well with your hands . pour in one egg or egg white . this will make the mixed food sticky . mix well again with your hands and let it sit for 15 minutes without touching it .

add the mushrooms carrots glass noodles into a bowl and mix .
get a big bowl . add the shredded mushroom , shredded carrots and the glass noodles to the bowl and mix with your hands really well . now take an egg and crack it into a separate bowl . add the egg to the mixed - up vegetables and noodles in the bowl , and mix well with your hands . the egg will help it all stick together . leave it to sit for 15 minutes .

wipe the rice paper with a damp cloth .
take the rice paper and place it onto a damp cloth . press the damn cloth onto the rice paper . continue this until the rice paper is completely damp .

wipe the rice paper with a damp cloth .
get a small rag and set it slightly until it is damp . wring out excess water . lay your damp cloth on the table . place rice paper flat on top of the damp cloth . good cloth gently over the rice paper , and press gently to moisten the rice paper . repeat for each piece of rice paper .

wipe the rice paper with a damp cloth .
place the rice paper onto a large damp cloth . fold the damp cloth over the rice paper and press down . you are moistening the rice paper with the damp cloth . rotate until the whole rice paper is damp .

place the fillings on one end of the rice paper and roll .
lay out the rice paper . next add the filling to the top of the rice paper . start rolling the rice paper to just past the center . then fold the ends over . then continue rolling forward to the end of the paper .

place the fillings on one end of the rice paper and roll .
gather the fillings at one end of the sticky paper . make the filling into the shape of an thick tube . roll the sticky paper forward while keeping the fillings inside . fold each end of the sticky paper in , like you are wrapping a gift ! close it up when you get to the end and you 're done !

place the fillings on one end of the rice paper and roll .
take your fillings and place them into the rice paper roll . make sure you flatten the ingredients out well so you can roll the paper . push the filling to one end of paper circle . now begin rolling the paper with the fillings inward , until you make it halfway . now fold the ends in to the middle of the paper , and continue to roll the paper until you reach the end .

place the rolls in a pan of hot oil .
use tongs or chopsticks to grab the rolls . very slowly place rolls one at a time into the pan of hot oil . be careful of splashing the oil .

place the rolls in a pan of hot oil .
turn the stove onto medium . add the egg rolls into the pan with a metal hand cooking tool that looks like chop sticks . the rolls might be sticky at first so leave some space between the rolls .

place the rolls in a pan of hot oil .
pour oil in pan and turn gas onto medium heat . wait until oil begins to heat up . slowly place rolls in pan using tongs , leaving space between rolls . fry on each side for about 5 to 6 minutes . remove with tongs and place onto paper towels .

remove the rolls from the oil and serve with a sauce .
carefully remove the egg rolls with chopsticks from hot oil . place on a paper towel . after oil is off the rolls , place on a plate . you can dip them in sauce .

remove the rolls from the oil and serve with a sauce .
use tongs to carefully grab the rolls from the oil . grab them one by one and take them out of the oil .

remove the rolls from the oil and serve with a sauce .
use your tongs and remove the rolls from the hot oil . set the hot rolls on a paper towel . serve the rolls with sauce .

add an egg to a bowl of carrots onions tofu mushrooms pork salt sugar and pepper .
crack the egg in half . put the egg into the bowl . put salt in the bowl . put sugar in the bowl . put pepper in the bowl .

add an egg to a bowl of carrots onions tofu mushrooms pork salt sugar and pepper .
take a bowl and add grated carrot in to the bowl . add cut pieces of onion and mushrooms in to the bowl . add cut pieces of tofu and pork in to the bowl . add salt and pepper in to the bowl . break open an egg and add it in to the bowl .

add an egg to a bowl of carrots onions tofu mushrooms pork salt sugar and pepper .
once pork , shredded carrots , chopped onion , tofu have been added to the bowl , season with salt , sugar and pepper . crack and add a whole egg to the mix . mix thoroughly .

place the filling on one end of the sheet and roll .
place some of your filling into a sheet . take the corners of the sheet and push the filling . roll it slowly until its completely rolled .

place the filling on one end of the sheet and roll .
place the filling on one small end of the wrap sheet . pinch the end with the filling . while pinching it together wrap over the filling and keep rolling it .

place the filling on one end of the sheet and roll .
the sheet is fragile , so be careful not to rip or fold it . put the amount of filling we measured out before onto the right end of the sheet , leaving a little bit of the sheet uncovered . use both hands to grab the bit of sheet you left uncovered , and roll it over the top of the filling . keep rolling carefully until the entire sheet is wrapped around the filling . you do not need to fold the ends of the sheet when you are done .

cut the rolls on top of a bowl of rice noodles and serve with herbs and sauce .
cut the rolls in small pieces . put them on top of the noddles . add fresh vegetables and herbs . mix and serve .

cut the rolls on top of a bowl of rice noodles and serve with herbs and sauce .
take a bowl of rice noodles . take the rolls on a plate . cut the rolls in to inch sized pieces and add it to the rice bowl . add herbs in to the rice bowl . add some sauce in to the bowl and mix it .

cut the rolls on top of a bowl of rice noodles and serve with herbs and sauce .
take a roll and some scissors . cut the roll into bite - sized pieces on top of the bowl of noodles . add a few herbs and some sauce . mix the ingredients together in the bowl and serve .

cook bulgur wheat in boiled water .
take your bulgur wheat and slowly add it to the 2 cups of boiling water . do not pour it in to fast , or it may cause the water to splash out and burn you . now let the bulgur wheat cook until the water has evaporated .

cook bulgur wheat in boiled water .
the water in the pot will be bubbling . pour the wheat into the pot carefully and slowly so it does not spill . let the wheat cook in the pot .

cook bulgur wheat in boiled water .
boil two cups of water . now add a spoon to add your bulgur wheat with a spoon into the boiling water . cook it until the water evaporates or is completely gone .

mix lemon juice minced garlic and olive oil .
add 3 tablespoons of lemon juice to a small bowl . next add the cut up garlic to the bowl . then add the olive oil to the bowl . stir ingredients together in the bowl .

mix lemon juice minced garlic and olive oil .
get a spoon or whisk . stir in a circle : lemon juice , minced garlic , and olive oil .

mix lemon juice minced garlic and olive oil .
mix lemon juice , garlic , and olive oil . stir them together .

add salt and pepper and mix again .
take a small bowl . break open some eggs and add it in to the bowl . add some salt in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything properly with a spoon .

add salt and pepper and mix again .
put eggs in a bowl . use a fork to mix the eggs . add salt and pepper to the eggs . use a fork to mix the salt and pepper into the eggs .

add salt and pepper and mix again .
add salt to the dressing in the bowl . then add pepper to the dressing . stir the salt and pepper into the dressing .

mix the cooked bulgur wheat boiled chickpeas diced tomato cucumber leeks and parsley .
cook bulgur wheat according to package directions . boil chickpeas . chop up tomatoes , cucumbers , leeks and any other vegetables / whole herbs that you would like to add . mix all ingredients well in a bowl .

mix the cooked bulgur wheat boiled chickpeas diced tomato cucumber leeks and parsley .
take a small bowl and add cooked bulgur wheat in to the bowl . add the boiled chick peas in to the bowl . cut the tomatoes in to cube size pieces and add it to the bowl . cut the tomato in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl . cut green onions and parsley in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl .

mix the cooked bulgur wheat boiled chickpeas diced tomato cucumber leeks and parsley .
fluff the bulgur wheat with a fork after it has cooked in the pot . in a large bowl add all of your ingredients one at a time . add chickpeas , chopped tomatoes , chunks of cucumber , cut green onions , and fresh parsley . blend all of these ingredients until they are evenly mixed .

pour in the prepared dressing and mix again to serve .
pour in the dressing moving it around so it 's even . mix everything together .

pour in the prepared dressing and mix again to serve .
after you mix it all up . add the dressing . then mix again .

pour in the prepared dressing and mix again to serve .
take a small bowl . add the ingredients in to the bowl . take the dressing in a bowl . add the dressing on to the ingredients . mix everything with a spoon .

add broccoli to a pot of boiling water and set in an ice water bath .
take a pot place water into it . put your oven on and let the water boil . once the water is boiled put broccoli into the pot . take a pot put some water into it . put the broccoli into the ice water using a spoon .

add broccoli to a pot of boiling water and set in an ice water bath .
put broccoli in a pot of boiling water and boil for 1 minute . remove broccoli from boiling water and put in ice and water in a bowl .

add broccoli to a pot of boiling water and set in an ice water bath .
fill a pot with water and place on stove . turn on stove to high heat and wait until boiling . add broccoli to water and let boil for 1 minute . remove broccoli from hot water with a spoon , or drain with a colander . add broccoli to bowl filled with ice and cold water to stop cooking .

add the vegetables pasta pepperoni and mozzarella cheese to a bowl .
add vegetables , cooked pasta , pepperoni and mozzarella cheese into bowl . stir well with big wooden spoon .

add the vegetables pasta pepperoni and mozzarella cheese to a bowl .
pour pasta into bowl . hold bowl near counter edge and push vegetables , pepperoni and mozzarella cheese into bowl .

add the vegetables pasta pepperoni and mozzarella cheese to a bowl .
place the vegetables , pasta , pepperoni , and mozzarella cheese into a deep bowl . mix all the ingredients until they are all well blended .

add salad topping to the salad .
take your jar that is filled with nuts and bits of bacon and other things and pour it on top of the salad . move it all over the top part of the salad .

add salad topping to the salad .
take a salad in a large bowl . take a salad topping in to a small jar . add the half salad topping on to the salad bowl . now take remaining amount of salad topping . add the remaining half of salad topping in to the bowl .

add salad topping to the salad .
take a bottle of the salad topping ( nuts , bacon bits , etc . ) . pour the entire bottle on top of the salad .

add italian dressing to the salad .
shake the bottle of italian dressing . pour the bottle on top of the salad .

add italian dressing to the salad .
take a bottle of italian dressing and shake gently . pour the entire bottle of dressing onto the salad . gently use the spoon to mix the salad , topping , and dressing together .

add italian dressing to the salad .
pour the whole bottle of dressing onto the salad . mix the salad with the dressing .

mix the salad together .
put the dressing on the pasta salad . mix the dressing with the pasta and vegetables using a wooden spoon .

mix the salad together .
gather vegetables from fridge . mix noodles and vegetables together . add sauce . cool in fridge cool in fridge .

mix the salad together .
mix the salad well with a wooden spoon . feel free to use whatever vegetables are in season or just whatever vegetables you want .

add chicken broth rice vinegar soy sauce and brown sugar to a bowl .
pour 1/4 cup of chicken broth into your bowl . then take 2 tablespoons of rice vinegar and put it into the bowl . then pour in 2 tablespoons of soy sauce . then put in 1 tablespoon of brown sugar into the bowl . finally , we will add some garlic .

add chicken broth rice vinegar soy sauce and brown sugar to a bowl .
put chicken broth into the bowl using a measuring cup . put the bowl of rice vinegar into the bowl . put the bowl of soy sauce into the bowl . put the bowl of brown sugar to the bowl . put the bowl of garlic into the bowl .

add chicken broth rice vinegar soy sauce and brown sugar to a bowl .
prepare a bowl and to it add chicken broth or stock , then add two tablespoons of rice vinegar . then add two tablespoons of soy sauce into the same bowl . then add a tablespoon of brown sugar . then add two cloves of garlic that are cut up very small .

add garlic red pepper flakes ginger and green onions and mix .
add about 1/4 tsp of red pepper flakes ( depending on how spicy you like your food ) . add in two teaspoons of ginger paste . whisk the ingredients together carefully , so they do n't spill out of the bowl . add about 1/2 of the scallions to the sauce .

add garlic red pepper flakes ginger and green onions and mix .
add 1/4 teaspoon of red pepper flakes . add 2 teaspoons of ground ginger paste . whisk the ingredients . add some green onions .

add garlic red pepper flakes ginger and green onions and mix .
you 're going to cut the chicken into small cubes . next , put a few teaspoons of ginger and a few teaspoons of scallions into a small bowl of soy sauce .

coat the chicken in flour .
hold the plate of chicken close to the bag . shake the chicken off the plate into the bag . shake the chicken in the bag and they will be covered .

coat the chicken in flour .
put the chicken in the bag with the flour . make sure the bag is closed . shake the bag until each piece of chicken is covered with flour .

coat the chicken in flour .
first you will want to add your pound and a half of cubed chicken into the bag . make sure you seal the ziplock bag real well before this next step . now start shaking the bag so that the chicken is completely coated in the flour mixture .

fry the chicken in the pan .
get skillet nice and hot . add the chicken until there 's nice brown crust . keep flipping them until it has a fried effect .

fry the chicken in the pan .
wait for the skillet to become very hot . this should take about two minutes . use tongs to add the chicken to the pan . you 'll know that your pan is hot enough if the chicken makes a sizzling sound as soon as it touches the pan . if it does n't make the sizzling sound , allow the pan to heat for another minute and try again . let the chicken cook until the bottom side is golden . when the chicken is golden , use tongs to carefully turn each piece of chicken over .

fry the chicken in the pan .
get the pan hot to where the oil is bubbling . use tongs to pick up the chicken pieces and place them into the pan .

add the sauce to the pan .
heat a pan on the stove . add the sauce to the heated pan . cook the sauce for about one minute , stirring while it cooks , to let it thicken .

add the sauce to the pan .
empty the sauce into the pan . cook sauce for one minute .

add the sauce to the pan .
very carefully , grab your sauce and place it close to the bottom of the pan . then begin to pour the sauce into the pan . avoid any splashes because the pan is hot and avoid touching the sides of the pan .

toss the chicken with the sauce .
sauce is in . put the chicken back in . the flour thickens the sauce . keep stirring with the tongs . no need to use cornstarch .

toss the chicken with the sauce .
once the sauce is in the pan , just slowly add your chicken into the pan by pouring it in off your plate . now just toss the chicken around in the pan on medium heat . keep tossing the chicken until the sauce is covering the chicken .

toss the chicken with the sauce .
keep the heat at medium heat . add the chicken to the sauce that is already in the pan . use your tongs or a spoon to move the chicken around in the sauce . keep moving the chicken around the help thicken up the sauce . make sure all the chicken is coated in the sauce from the pan .

sprinkle green onions on top .
add scallions to top of food . do n't add too many .

sprinkle green onions on top .
cut green onions into small pieces . use your fingers to sprinkle the green onions over the top of the dish .

sprinkle green onions on top .
use your hands and grab some green onions . sprinkle the onions over the top even not all in one spot .

cut the pancetta into thin strips and fry them with oil .
put the pancetta on the cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the pancetta into nice thin strips . heat pan with no oil in the pan . put the pancetta into hot pan and let fat render out . while the pancetta is cooking , separate the eggs .

cut the pancetta into thin strips and fry them with oil .
get an adult to help you or very carefully , put the pancetta on a cutting board and use a knife to cut it into this strips the short way across . get out a saute pan and add 2 tsp . cooking oil . heat the saute pan on the stove until it is hot . add the pancetta strips and stir them constantly with tongs while they are cooking . cook the pancetta until it is browned and slightly crispy .

cut the pancetta into thin strips and fry them with oil .
take your knife and begin cutting nice thin strips of pancetta . cut the entire strip up and then toss them into the pan . we do n't need an oil , because the pancetta has a lot of fat in it . stir the pancetta in the pan with your tongs or a spatula .

separate three egg yolks from the egg whites .
take two small bowls and place them next to each other side by side . now take two eggs , using one egg at a time crack the egg into a cupped hand over one bowl . let the egg whites drip through your fingers and gently place the yoke in the other bowl . repeat this process with the second egg .

separate three egg yolks from the egg whites .
lightly tap one egg on the rim of the bowl to crack it . once it 's cracked , separate the egg shell with your thumbs , slowly , being careful not to drop the egg yolk ( the yellow portion ) . as you separate the egg shells , rock the yolk back and forth in the shell , moving the yolk ( yellow portion ) from one half of the shell to the other . while you are doing this rocking motion , the egg whites ( clear slimy part of the egg ) will fall into the bowl . place the yolks in a separate bowl and repeat two more times .

separate three egg yolks from the egg whites .
crack 3 eggs . put the yolks into a bowl . be sure not to put any of the white in the bowl .

beat the egg yolks and add a little bit of salt and black pepper .
beat the egg yolks in a bowl . use a fork to beat them . add seasoning and black pepper .

beat the egg yolks and add a little bit of salt and black pepper .
take egg yokes and put them into a bowl . using a fork break the egg yokes . using the fork move it in a circular motion until they are all mixed up . set the fork aside . add a pinch of salt and pepper to the egg yokes .

beat the egg yolks and add a little bit of salt and black pepper .
use a fork to quickly mix the egg yolks in a large bowl until the color looks the same throughout the bowl . for about 2 or 3 seconds shake some salt into the bowl . for about 2 or 3 seconds use your pepper grinder to add some pepper to the bowl by twisting the grinder back and forth .

combine the pasta water eggs and parmesan cheese .
use tongs to remove the pasta from the pot and put in the bowl with the eggs . use the tongs to toss the pasta into the eggs . add parmesan cheese to the pasta and some of the pasta water . use a fork to mix well . add the pancetta to the pasta .

combine the pasta water eggs and parmesan cheese .
use tongs to scoop up the pasta . add the pasta to the mixture with the water and eggs . use the tongs to stir the mixture in the bowl . add some parmesan cheese to the bowl . continue stirring . add water if it begins to get too thick .

combine the pasta water eggs and parmesan cheese .
put the pasta in the bowl with the eggs . stir them together with your tongs or spoon .

place the fried pancetta on a towel .
use tongs to pick up the fried pancetta from the pan . place it on a towel .

place the fried pancetta on a towel .
remove the fried pancetta with tongs . place the pancetta onto a towel .

place the fried pancetta on a towel .
place a towel on a plate . use tongs to remove the pancetta from the pan and put on the towel .

place the spaghetti in hot water to cook .
carefully lower the spaghetti into the pot of hot water . leave the spaghetti in there to cook it .

place the spaghetti in hot water to cook .
get out the spaghetti . add the spaghetti the pot of hot water . stir the spaghetti into the water with a stirring spoon .

place the spaghetti in hot water to cook .
take a pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . place the spaghetti in the pot . cook the spaghetti in the hot water .

add some pancetta olive oil parmesan and black pepper .
add some of the pancetta to the pasta . be sure to leave some pancetta to sprinkle on top later . stir the pancetta into the pasta . pour a very small amount of olive oil over the pasta and stir it in . using tongs , lift the pasta out of the bowl and place it in the center of a serving plate . try to make a nice little pile . sprinkle the rest of the pancetta on top of the pasta . sprinkle some parmesan and black pepper on top .

add some pancetta olive oil parmesan and black pepper .
use your hands and sprinkle in some pancetta . pour in a bit of olive oil . sprinkle in black pepper and stir everything with tongs .

add some pancetta olive oil parmesan and black pepper .
add the pancetta and mix . add a bit of olive oil . scrape the sides and stir . serve a small portion onto a plate . top with more pancetta , parmesan , and black pepper .

put the chicken slices into boiling water .
get an adult , stand back . put on an apron . grab a big spoon that can scoop . grab the bowl of chicken . give it to an adult to pour inside the hot water .

put the chicken slices into boiling water .
take the chicken slices and put them into the pan with boiling water . stir the chicken around a little bit with a ladle .

put the chicken slices into boiling water .
bring water to a boil . place chicken in boiling water . let boil for two to three minutes .

add chicken peas salt and soy sauce to the pan and fry .
add your chicken peas and sprinkle of salt and soy sauce to pan . stir until all mixed on med heat . then put on high heat for a min and all done .

add chicken peas salt and soy sauce to the pan and fry .
add chick peas into the frying pan . add salt into the frying pan . add some of soy sauce into the pan . mix all the ingredients in the pan .

add chicken peas salt and soy sauce to the pan and fry .
add your peas and slightly cooked chicken to the hot wok . use your ladle to give it a good stir by also moving the wok and shaking . use the ladle to add a few drops of soy sauce mix it using your ladle . add some salt with your ladle as well . make sure it 's on high heat and keep mixing it with the ladle and shaking the wok back and forth moving the contents .

add peas to the boiling water with chicken .
toss the peas into the wok with the chicken already cooking . with your other mixture in your other wok , mix it up by grabbing your wok by the handle and gently shaking it .

add peas to the boiling water with chicken .
add chicken to pot of water . bring to boil . cook chicken almost done . using small bowl for peas . toss peas into chicken and boiling water in pot .

add peas to the boiling water with chicken .
take a pan on the stove . add some water in to the pan . boil the water in the pan . add some peas in to the boiling water . mix them with the spoon .

put an egg and rice into a frying pan and saute .
put an egg into the frying pan . add the rice into the pan . mix together with a stirring spoon as it cooks .

put an egg and rice into a frying pan and saute .
put oil into pan and stir- be careful not to burn yourself ! put egg into pan and stir . put rice into pan and stir quickly .

put an egg and rice into a frying pan and saute .
heat oil in a wide pan . add in rice . add in egg . stir - fry on high heat .

take two strips of breast chicken and cut it into thin slices .
take a chicken breast and cut off 2 strips from the breast . make sure the strips are around 1 inch x 4 inches . then set the other part of the chicken breast aside . take your two stripes and cut them into very thin slices .

take two strips of breast chicken and cut it into thin slices .
take a cutting board and a knife . take two strips of chicken on the cutting board . take one strip and cut it in to thin slices . now cut the other strip in to thin slices . place the cut chicken in a bowl .

take two strips of breast chicken and cut it into thin slices .
put the chicken on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the chicken into thin slices . put the sliced chicken into a bowl .

add the mushroom and the leftover water to 5 cups of boiling chicken stock .
add chopped mushrooms . pour the mushroom liquid . you can strain the liquid if you want to . leave the sentiments in the bottom . place in sink with the sentiments .

add the mushroom and the leftover water to 5 cups of boiling chicken stock .
boil the chicken stock in a pot . cut the mushrooms in to thin pieces . add the mushrooms in to the boiling stock . now take the remaining stock in a bowl . add the 5 cups of remaining stock in to the pot .

add the mushroom and the leftover water to 5 cups of boiling chicken stock .
put the chopped up mushrooms in the pot . pour in the mushroom liquid . be sure to leave the sediment in the bowl .

add 4tbsp of soya sauce 1 tbsp of white pepper and simmer for five min .
find a tablespoon . it is a big silver spoon with the letters ' tbsp ' on it . fill the tablespoon all the way to the top four times with soy sauce . pour all of that soy sauce into the silver cooking pot . now you will find a teaspoon . a teaspoon is different than a tablespoon . a teaspoon will have the letters ' tsp ' on it . if this confuses you , think of this difference . tablespoons are bigger than teaspoons and tablespoons just so happen to have the letter ' b ' on them . ' b ' stands for big . so the letters ' tbsp ' mean it is a tablespoon and the letters ' tsp ' mean it is a teaspoon . add just one teaspoon of white pepper , now wait for five whole minutes and let everything cook on a low heat together .

add 4tbsp of soya sauce 1 tbsp of white pepper and simmer for five min .
measure out 4 tbsp of soya sauce . measure out 1 tbsp of white pepper ( this is where the hot flavor comes from ) . add both to your soup . simmer on low for 5 minutes .

add 4tbsp of soya sauce 1 tbsp of white pepper and simmer for five min .
using a tablespoon measuring spoon measure four tablespoons of soy sauce and add to pot . using a teaspoon measuring spoon measure one teaspoon of white pepper and add to pot . using a spoon stir the pot and cook on low for about five minutes .

add the scallions bamboo shoots and the tofu and simmer for five min .
put the scallions in the pot but save about 4 tablespoons for decoration . add the bamboo shoots . add the tofu . stir with a large wooden spoon . turn the heat on low and let it cook for 5 minutes .

add the scallions bamboo shoots and the tofu and simmer for five min .
cut the scallions in to small pieces and add in to the pot . cut the bamboo shoots in to the small pieces and add in to pot . cut the tofu in to small pieces . add the tofu in to the pot . simmer the pot and cook for five minutes .

add the scallions bamboo shoots and the tofu and simmer for five min .
place the green part of the scallions ( 4 tablespoons place 4 tablespoons pf the green part of the scallions into the liquid . also , put the shoots and the tofu into the liquid , and place it in the liquid . turn the burner just high enough where it does not make bubbles .

mix 2 tbsp of cornstarch with 4 tbsp of cold water in a bowl .
put 4 tablespoons of cold water or chicken stock in a small bowl . add 2 tablespoons of corn starch to the cold water . use a wire whisk to mix the corn starch and water . mix until the corn starch is mixed in .

mix 2 tbsp of cornstarch with 4 tbsp of cold water in a bowl .
find a measuring tablespoon . fill the tablespoon 2 times with cornstarch and set aside in a bowl . fill the tablespoon 4 times with cold water and pour in a small bowl . pour the cornstarch into the cold water . take a whisk and stir the mixture until the cornstarch has no clumps .

mix 2 tbsp of cornstarch with 4 tbsp of cold water in a bowl .
find a tablespoon measure and a small bowl . use the tablespoon to put two scoops of cornstarch in the bowl . use the tablespoon to put four scoops of cold water in the bowl . use a whisk to mix the ingredients .

add the cornstarch mix to the soup while whisking it .
slowly pour the cornstarch mix into the soup while you are whisking . continue to whisk in a circular motion until it all mixes well .

add the cornstarch mix to the soup while whisking it .
once your cornstarch slurry is made , find a whisk . pour the slurry into the soup whisking continuously as it is simmering . whisk the entire time until it thickens as it will clump up if you do n't whisk .

add the cornstarch mix to the soup while whisking it .
using the utensil that looks like wires in a loop you will whisk the soup . mix the cornstarch with water in a bowl , use the whisk to get out lumps . while the soup is cooking , whisk the soup in a circle . carefully and slowly , so you do not splash , pour the cornstarch liquid into the soup . continue to whisk the soup the whole time you are pouring the cornstarch liquid .

add 3 tbsp of vinegar .
get a tablespoon measuring spoon and vinegar . add two tablespoons of vinegar to pot . stir it up with a wooden spoon . taste and add another tablespoon if needed .

add 3 tbsp of vinegar .
take out measuring spoon labeled 1 tbsp . pour vinegar into spoon until filled . pour full spoon three times .

add 3 tbsp of vinegar .
take the cooking pot on a stove . take a tablespoon measurement spoon . take vinegar . add 3 tablespoons of vinegar in to the pot . mix well the contents in the bowl .

add 1 beaten egg to the soup while stirring .
crack an egg into a bowl and throw away all the shell . stir the egg very fast with a fork for about 20 seconds . pour the egg into the soup while stirring the soup .

add 1 beaten egg to the soup while stirring .
start to stir the pot and slowly pour in the egg . do n't over stir the pot else the eggs can scramble .

add 1 beaten egg to the soup while stirring .
slowly stir your soup . slowly pour in the egg while you stir . do n't stir too long or it will turn into scrambled egg .

sprinkle the rest of the scallion greens on top of the soup . get a ladle and scoop the soup into a bowl and eat .

cut the scallions into slices . you cut the white parts and the green parts .

take a knife . cut the scallions into small pieces .

cut the bamboo shoots into thin strips using a knife . place the cut bamboo into a bowl .

soak 1 ounce of mushroom in 11/2 cup of boiling water .
add 1 ounce of mushrooms to 1 1/2 cups boiling water . squeeze excess water from mushrooms .

soak 1 ounce of mushroom in 11/2 cup of boiling water .
take 1 1/2 of boiling water . take 1 ounce of mushroom . soak this mushrooms in the boiling water . this makes the mushrooms soft .

soak 1 ounce of mushroom in 11/2 cup of boiling water .
soak 1 once of mushrooms in 1 and 1/2 cups of boiling water . this will re - hydrate the mushrooms .

slice the mushrooms and save the leftover water .
pull the mushrooms from the water . slice the mushrooms a 1/4 inch thick . save the leftover water to add to the soup later .

slice the mushrooms and save the leftover water .
save the water . cut mushrooms into tiny strips .

slice the mushrooms and save the leftover water .
firstly cook the mushrooms . save and keep the leftover water . cut the cooked mushrooms into thin pieces . the left over water will give extra taste and flavor to the soup .

cut 7 ounces of tofu into inch cubes .
measure 7 oz of tofu on a little kitchen scale . get a knife and cut it into small cubes . put the cubes into a bowl .

cut 7 ounces of tofu into inch cubes .
put 7 ounces of firm tofu on cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut tofu into small cubes . put chopped tofu in a bowl .

cut 7 ounces of tofu into inch cubes .
take out your tofu and put it onto a cutting board . slowly and carefully cut the tofu into a bunch of slices . turn the slices to their side and cut them into even smaller slices . continue until all of the tofu looks like tiny cubes .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
slowly pour the bag of pasta into the boiling water carefully . let it cook in the boiling water .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
cook the pasta in boiling water . drain the pasta in a colander .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
boil water in a large pan . add pasta when water is boiling . pasta cooks in about 10 minutes . drain pan in sink . eat pasta .

take a small bowl . add some pesto sauce in to the bowl . take balsamic vinegar bottle . add 2 tablespoons of balsamic vinegar in to the bowl . mix both properly .

mix pesto and balsamic vinegar together .
put some pesto in a small bowl . add a little balsamic vinegar to the pesto . whisk the 2 ingredients together in the bowl until well - combined .

mix pesto and balsamic vinegar together .
mix some pesto and balsamic vinegar together in a small bowl with a whisk .

take bowl of dressing and pour it into the bowl of pasta . then use a spatula to mix the pasta and dressing together .

pour the dressing over the pasta and stir .
hold the bowl of dressing over the pasta . carefully and slowly pour the dressing into the pasta . mix everything together with a spatula .

fry bacon in a skillet .
put 4 or 5 slices of bacon onto a skillet . cook over medium heat on stove . cook until crispy . remove it from skillet and put it on paper towels .

fry bacon in a skillet .
chop up 4 or 5 slices of bacon . put bacon in skillet and cook over medium heat . cook until golden brown . using a slatted metal spatula remove from pan . drain bacon and place on paper towels .

fry bacon in a skillet .
take 4 or 5 slices of bacon and cut them into squares . turn the dial on the stove to medium . cook the bacon in a skillet until it is golden brown and crispy . put the bacon on a paper towel to drain .

chop cheese and grate in the food processor .
you need an adult to help you with this . you will have to use a knife . chop the cheese in small pieces that will fit into the top of the food processor . you will need to put the grater attachment in your food processor . make sure you do this when the bowl is not on the base of the food processor . after you put the grater in , put the top of the food processor on the bowl . place and lock bowl on the food processor . turn the food processor on and you will see the grater spinning . carefully and slowly insert the cheese pieces into the hole in the top of the food processor . keep putting in the cheese . if you ca n't push the cheese down the hole , use the pushing tool that comes with your food processor .

chop cheese and grate in the food processor .
set up a food processor with a cheese grating disc and its feed tube ' pusher ' . move the large chunks of cheese from the fridge to the cutting board . " use a chef 's knife to cut chunks of cheese into squares no bigger than 2 - 3 " " , start the processor and begin to feed small chunks of cheese into the feed tube " " . " use the feed tube pusher to push the cheese through the feed tube for grating .

chop cheese and grate in the food processor .
use a knife to carefully cut up the cheese into small sections . place the small pieces of cheese into the food processor .

melt butter in a pan and stir in flour .
put the butter in the pan . let it sit until it 's melted . then you can add your flour . mix it up .

melt butter in a pan and stir in flour .
melt the butter in the hot pan . stir in the flower with a spoon . after a few minutes add some half and half .

melt butter in a pan and stir in flour .
melt the butter in the pan and stir it around with a wooden spoon . pour in a little flour and sit it together until it 's mixed well and you ca n't see powder anymore .

stir in half and half garlic powder salt pepper and paprika .
add garlic powder . put in salt . add pepper . add paprika . stir in all of the spices to the mixture .

stir in half and half garlic powder salt pepper and paprika .
you 're going to add half and half liquid into the pot and mix very well . then you 're going to add garlic powder , and stir the liquid . then you 're going to add salt and pepper , and stir the liquid . then you 're going to add the paprika , and stir the liquid .

stir in half and half garlic powder salt pepper and paprika .
add some half and half to the pan . about 2 cups . sprinkle about two tablespoons of garlic powder and a little salt and pepper to it . then sprinkle about two teaspoons of paprika into the sauce and stir it all together .

fold in cheese and stir until the sauce thickens .
put the cheese in to sauce . stir in the cheese slowly until you ca n't see anymore cheese so that it all melts . keep stirring slowly til the sauce thickens . sauce should be gooey .

fold in cheese and stir until the sauce thickens .
pour cheeses into the pan . mix it all up until it turns into a thick sauce .

fold in cheese and stir until the sauce thickens .
grab the cheese with your hand . slowly drop the cheese into the pot . stir everything with a spatula carefully so it does n't splash . stir until it 's nice and smooth and even .
