add macaroni to the pan and then pour the cheese sauce on .
take a medium sized pan . drain the water from cooked macaroni . add the macaroni in to the bowl . take cheese sauce in a pot . pour the cheese sauce on the macaroni covering entirely .

add macaroni to the pan and then pour the cheese sauce on .
take a big casserole dish and fill it a little more than half way with the cooked macaroni noodles . using a potholder or oven mitts , pick up the pan of cheese sauce and hold it over top of the macaroni . go really slow , and carefully pour the cheese sauce all over the top of the macaroni , making sure you cover it all the way .

add macaroni to the pan and then pour the cheese sauce on .
add the drained and cooled macaroni into a large pan . pour the heated cheese sauce liberally on top of the macaroni until it is coated .

top with more grated cheese .
add some handfuls of cheese to the top . spread the cheese around evenly . turn the oven to 400 degrees . put the dish into the oven .

top with more grated cheese .
find the cheese . grate the cheese with the cheese grater . put the cheese in a bowl . add the cheese to the top of the dish . continue to spread the cheese until it is even .

top with more grated cheese .
use your fingers to put the shredded cheese on top of the macaroni . put the pan in the preheated 400 degree oven .

cook in oven until the cheese is browned .
use oven mitts to place the pan in the oven . let it cook until the cheese on top has brown spots .

cook in oven until the cheese is browned .
put the pan of macaroni and cheese in the over . cook in the oven until it is browned on top .

cook in oven until the cheese is browned .
put it in the oven . when the top is brown and bubbly carefully take it out . make sure you use pot holders because it will be very hot .

fry dark meats together and white meats together .
use the tongs and put more chicken in . lower the tray in the fryer again .

fry dark meats together and white meats together .
use tongs to take the cooked chicken out of the fryer basket . continue frying the rest of the chicken . fry dark meats with dark meat . fry white meat with white meat .

fry dark meats together and white meats together .
put the dark meat in the fryer . also fry the white meat in the same fryer .

coat the chicken pieces in the flour .
put the chicken into the flour . cover both sides of the chicken in flour .

coat the chicken pieces in the flour .
put the chicken in bowl of flour . turn the chicken around in the bowl to fully coat it .

coat the chicken pieces in the flour .
choose which spices you 'd like to season your chicken breading with . for example , you could use red pepper for a hot and spicy breading , or garlic and onion powder for a milder breading . mix about two tablespoons of your chosen spices into the flour , and blend them in well using the whisk . to keep your hands clean , use tongs to pick up one piece of chicken and toss it into the flour mixture . to keep your hands clean , use a spoon to cover the chicken with flour mixture . tap the spoon against the chicken to help the flour mixture stick to it . use tongs to turn your chicken so that you can pat flour onto the entire surface of the chicken . when the chicken is covered in flour mixture , use tongs to set the chicken on a rack . using a rack will help the whole piece of chicken dry . if you do n't have a rack , you will have to allow the top side of the chicken to dry before turning it over with tongs to allow the bottom half to dry . repeat the breading steps for every piece of chicken , and make sure your last piece of chicken has time to dry before moving on to the frying steps .

season the flour with salt pepper and celery salt .
put salt into the flour . sprinkle pepper into the flour . sprinkle celery salt into the flour .

season the flour with salt pepper and celery salt .
sprinkle a few big pinch fulls of salt into a big bowl of flour . then shake lots of black pepper for several seconds into the flour . then add some celery salt , just a few shakes .

season the flour with salt pepper and celery salt .
add some salt to the bowl of flour . pour in some celery salt . add some pepper to the bowl .

combine salt butter milk and hot sauce in a bowl .
pour the salt butter milk and hot sauce in the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

combine salt butter milk and hot sauce in a bowl .
pour kosher salt and hot sauce into the buttermilk . use a spoon to stir it all together .

combine salt butter milk and hot sauce in a bowl .
pour salt into a pan with butter milk . add hot sauce into the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the bowl together .

pour off the brine and rinse chicken off thoroughly and shake off excess water .
remove the tin foil from the top of the bowl . pour the brine off of the chicken and into the sink . rinse the chicken under running water and shake off excess .

pour off the brine and rinse chicken off thoroughly and shake off excess water .
pour the brine down the drain . rinse the chicken off and shake off any water that 's on there still .

pour off the brine and rinse chicken off thoroughly and shake off excess water .
pour out the brine from the bowl . put the chicken under the water . rinse off the chicken . shake the extra water off of the chicken .

place chicken in hot oil and fry until golden brown .
place your seasoned chicken drums into the fryer basket and slowly lower into the 325 degree preheated oil . allow the chicken drums to cook in the oil for about 16 minutes .

place chicken in hot oil and fry until golden brown .
put the chicken in the frying tray . slowly lower the chicken into the oil . cook until it is golden brown .

place chicken in hot oil and fry until golden brown .
when the oil is really hot ( 325 degrees ) put the chicken in and cook it until it 's golden brown . be careful - hot oil can spit which can burn ! when the chicken is golden brown , take it out of the oil .

place chicken in a small bowl and pour brine over chicken and freeze it for 1 hour .
put chicken pieces in a bowl . pour the brine over the chicken .

place chicken in a small bowl and pour brine over chicken and freeze it for 1 hour .
place the cleaned chicken in a small glass bowl . add the pour brine into the bowl . stir it evenly so that brine is blended with chicken . place the bowl inside the refrigerator for 1 hour .

place chicken in a small bowl and pour brine over chicken and freeze it for 1 hour .
place chicken into a small bowl . pour brine into bowl to cover chicken . freeze for one hour .

place chicken on a plate or tray and season generously with mixed spices .
put the chicken onto a tray . add seasoning over the top of the chicken . spread the spices evenly across the chicken .

place chicken on a plate or tray and season generously with mixed spices .
grab the chicken and put them on a plate or tray . pinch the seasonings with your hands and sprinkle a lot over the chicken .

place chicken on a plate or tray and season generously with mixed spices .
cover a tray or plate in aluminum foil and place the chicken on top . use the spices you mixed to cover the chicken . try and keep it even , otherwise some bites wo n't taste very good and others will taste far too spicy !

drizzle the dressing on the salad and toss to combine .
add all the cut vegetables into the bowl . spread the dressing on the salad . toss the vegetables into the bowl . mix the vegetables in the bowl for more tasty .

drizzle the dressing on the salad and toss to combine .
lightly drizzle the dressing on top of the salad . toss the salad in order to spread the dressing .

drizzle the dressing on the salad and toss to combine .
pour the dressing over the top of the salad . use your stirring spoons to mix the salad . be sure to mix the salad well enough that everything is mixed evenly .

take one piece of cut up toasted pita bread . put the pita bread in .

add 1 chopped toasted pita bread .
take a piece of pita bread and put it in the toaster . push the toaster button down and wait for the bread to pop back up . when it pops up it will be hot , so carefully place it on the cutting board . using a serrated knife , cut the pita bread into small squares . place the pita bread squares into the pan .

toss everything well to combine .
get a mixing spoon . slowly stir all the ingredients together until the sauce is mixed in well . it is now ready to eat !

toss everything well to combine .
get a wooden spoon and wooden spatula . to toss you mix use them both and stir with both hands lightly . make sure nothing sits a bottom of the bowl .

toss everything well to combine .
take a spoon . stir all the ingredients together .

combine pomegranate molasses lemon juice salt and pepper and olive oil .
take a bowl . add 1 cucumber cut in to small cubes , 4 tomatoes cut into small cubes , 1 red onion cut into thin slices . then add 1 pita bread which has been toasted and cut into square pieces . stir with a spoon and mix everything well to combine . for the molasses dressing , add 2 tablespoons pomegranate molasses to a bowl , add the juice of 1 lemon and stir vigorously with a spoon , add a pinch of salt and pepper , and stir in 1/2 a cup of extra virgin olive oil . mix everything well till its combined well . add the pomegranate dressing to the bowl containing all our other ingredients . mix well with a salad spoon . fatoush is ready to serve .

heat butter in a pan and cook the calamari .
put a piece of butter on the pan and spread around . turn the heat on high medium . place the calamari on the pan . cook for 3 to 4 minutes . turn over after 2 minutes .

heat butter in a pan and cook the calamari .
take a pan on the stove . add some butter to the pan . melt the butter in the pan . add the calamari pieces in to the pan . cook the calamari till they become brown .

heat butter in a pan and cook the calamari .
take a slice of butter . put it in a pan and allow it to melt . then place breaded calamari in the pan . toss the calamari in the pan and allow it cook . repeat until the calamari turns light brown .

mix bread crumbs cornflakes and parmesan cheese .
add 1/2 cup of bread crumbs to a bowl . add 1/8 cup of cornflake crumbs to the bowl . put in 1/4 cup of parmesan cheese . mix all of the ingredients in the bowl together .

mix bread crumbs cornflakes and parmesan cheese .
pour one half cup breadcrumbs into a bowl . pour one quarter cup cornflake crumbs into the same bowl . add one quarter cup grated parmesan cheese . mix all three items around in the bowl with your dry fingers .

mix bread crumbs cornflakes and parmesan cheese .
add bread crumbs , corn flake crumbs and parmesan cheese to the bowl . use your hands to mix everything together .

dip the calamari in the flour beaten egg and bread crumbs .
dip the calamari in the flour , then into the egg , then into the crumb mix . repeat this with all of the calamari .

dip the calamari in the flour beaten egg and bread crumbs .
hold the calamari with your hand . dip a piece in the flour . now dip the same piece in the egg mix . now dip the piece in bread crumbs . repeat this to make more .

dip the calamari in the flour beaten egg and bread crumbs .
use your hand to dip the calamari in the flour . next coat the calamari in the egg mix . then dip the calamari into bread crumbs .

cut the lettuce into bite size and put it in a bowl .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the lettuce leaves on the cutting board . cut the lettuce in to bite size pieces . take the lettuce pieces from the board . add the lettuce in to the bowl .

cut the lettuce into bite size and put it in a bowl .
use a knife to carefully chop up the lettuce . cut into 1 inch pieces . put the lettuce into the bowl .

cut the lettuce into bite size and put it in a bowl .
place several lettuce leaves on the cutting board . " with a sharp knife , chop the lettuce into 3/4 - 1 pieces . " " . " chop all the lettuce , but one leaf , in the same way . save one lettuce leaf for a garnish ( decoration ) .

add some salt and ground pepper and process .
put a teaspoon of salt and a 1/2 teaspoon of pepper into the food processor . put the lid on the food processor and lock the lid in place . turn the processor on and mix for 3 seconds .

add some salt and ground pepper and process .
take the contents in the food processor . take some salt and add it to the food processor . take some pepper in a pepper grinder . add some pepper powder in to the food processor . close the lid of food processor .

add some salt and ground pepper and process .
add some seasoning into the processor . grind some pepper into the processor . put the lid on and blend .

cut the bread into one inch cubes .
carefully hold the bread loaf . cut the bread into 1 inch cube shapes .

cut the bread into one inch cubes .
get a very sharp , serrated knife ( the kind with a wavy cutting surface ) . cut the bread into one - inch slices . cut each slice in half . " slice the halves again so that you wind up with 1 cubes . " " . " you may use any kind of bread you like including stale bread .

cut the bread into one inch cubes .
use a knife to slice the bread into a few slices . cut the slices into one inch cubes .

add sauce and bread toos and garnish with cheese and lettuce .
use a spoon to scoop some sauce into the salad . add some croutons . use two forks to mix the salad together to evenly spread the sauce .

add sauce and bread toos and garnish with cheese and lettuce .
add 3 tablespoons of sauce to your big bowl of lettuce . add a handful of croutons to the bowl . mix the salad very well with large spoons , until the dressing is on all of the lettuce . use the spoons to serve the salad into a small bowl . add a pinch of parmesan cheese and the leaves from before .

add sauce and bread toos and garnish with cheese and lettuce .
take the vegetables in a large mixing bowl . take the sauce in a small bowl . add some sauce in to the small bowl . add some croutons in to the bowl . add some cheese and lettuce on top .

add the yogurt lemon juice worcestershire sauce tabasco the mayonnaise and process to combine .
add the ingredients to the salad . combine .

add the yogurt lemon juice worcestershire sauce tabasco the mayonnaise and process to combine .
use a spoon to add the yogurt . add the lemon and the sauces . if you use fresh mayonnaise make sure to use the sauce in a few days because their are raw eggs in it .

add the yogurt lemon juice worcestershire sauce tabasco the mayonnaise and process to combine .
add yogurt to the processor . pour in the lemon juice and worcestershire sauce . add tabasco sauce and mayonnaise . put the lid on the processor . blend everything together .

place the garlic in the food processor add the anchovy fillets and the capers and process well .
put the garlic into the food processor . add anchovy fillets in . put in capers . turn on the processor and blend the ingredients . use a spatula to push everything down and process again .

place the garlic in the food processor add the anchovy fillets and the capers and process well .
put the garlic , anchovies and capers into the food processor bowl . put the lid on the processor and process . take the lid off of the processor and use a spatula to scrape the sides . put the lid back on and process again .

place the garlic in the food processor add the anchovy fillets and the capers and process well .
place your garlic cloves , anchovy fillets and capers into your food processor . process them until well until it sticks to the wall of the processor . stop the food processor and scrape the mixture off of the sides and process it again .

heat olive oil in a skillet and cook the bread .
pour the olive oil into a large skillet which has been pre - heated . once the oil is hot , add the bread cubes . cook on high heat , making sure to get all the sides golden brown . you can shake the pan to turn the cubes , or use a spoon or spatula to turn them . cook the croutons until they are crispy and golden brown . you can also bake the croutons instead of frying them , if you wish . when finished , place the croutons on a paper towel to remove the excess fat .

heat olive oil in a skillet and cook the bread .
pour olive oil into a skillet and heat it . spread the olive oil all around so it cover the pan . turn the stove on high heat . add the croutons to the pan and cook until they are golden brown .

heat olive oil in a skillet and cook the bread .
poor olive oil into a large pan and turn burner on high . add chunks of bread to the pan . cook bread until it is golden brown . stir often by shaking the pan .

cut the snow peas diagonally .
use a knife and cut the snow peas . cut the snow peas diagonally across the long part of the snow pea .

cut the snow peas diagonally .
place the snow peas on a cutting board . using a sharp knife , cut them in half , diagonally ( slant - wise ) .

cut the snow peas diagonally .
hold the snow peas down flat with one hand . with your other hand cut them diagonal in half the long ways .

add the garlic snow peas and bean sprouts to the pan .
add garlic with a spoon or spatula to a heated frying pan . turn down heat a little in order not to burn the garlic . add snow peas to the pan . add bean sprouts to the pan .

add the garlic snow peas and bean sprouts to the pan .
add some garlic to a pan . add in vegetables . stir .

add the garlic snow peas and bean sprouts to the pan .
put in the garlic . add snow peas to the pan . add some bean sprouts . stir the mixture together for about 30 seconds .

heat oil in a pan .
heat a large pan or wok on the stove with some oil . shake the pan around to spread the oil in the pan . heat the pan until very hot .

heat oil in a pan .
put a pan onto the stove and turn the burner on to a medium - high setting . add three tablespoons of oil to the pan and let it cook until very hot .

heat oil in a pan .
take a large pan and pour oil into it . spread the oil around the pan . heat the oil in the pan .

scramble the egg .
using a fork mix the egg together . put the egg mixture into the bowl .

scramble the egg .
scramble egg with a fork . be careful not to spill the egg .

scramble the egg .
take a fork and hold the bowl of egg in the other hand . mix at the egg with the fork to scramble it .

add water from the jar of sauce .
while you 're stirring the dish you 'll want to make sure you ' ve added all of the sauce . get the empty sauce jar you used earlier . fill it a little ways with some hot water . swirl the water around in the jar to try to get all of the sauce out of the jar . pour that water with the sauce into the pan .

add water from the jar of sauce .
continue stirring the pan with tongs . add water to the jar of hot thai sauce . mix the water around with the sauce . pour the jar into the pan .

add water from the jar of sauce .
take the tongs and mix everything around in the pan . take the pad thai sauce jar and put a little bit of water into the jar . shake the jar really well , this will help to get the sauce out of the jar . pour the rest of the sauce from the jar into the pan . mix everything around with the tongs again , and let it cook for a couple more minutes .

cook the egg and remove from the pan .
take out the half cooked shrimp . add the egg and cook . take eggs out until they are just set .

cook the egg and remove from the pan .
take an egg and break it over the pot . cook it until it is not runny anymore , stirring it with the tongs you used for the shrimp . remove the egg after it 's cooked .

cook the egg and remove from the pan .
using tongs take out the shrimp and put them in a bowl . add eggs to the pan . with the tongs stir the eggs around until cooked . using tongs take the eggs out of the pan into the bowl .

cook the shrimp until halfway cooked in the pan and then remove .
put the shrimp in the pan with tongs . flip the shrimp over with the tongs until cooked .

cook the shrimp until halfway cooked in the pan and then remove .
put oil in the pan and heat on the stove top . put the shrimp in the hot pan . cook the shrimp about a minute on each side . use tongs to flip the shrimp over . be sure you do not overcook the shrimp .

cook the shrimp until halfway cooked in the pan and then remove .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . add the shrimp in to the pan . cook the shrimp till they are half cooked . remove the shrimps from the pan .

soak the noodles in water .
take a large bowl . add some water in to the bowl . take a pack of noodles . soak the noodles in the water . cover the noodles bowl .

soak the noodles in water .
fill a big bowl with water . take the noodles and put them in the water sinking them to the bottom .

soak the noodles in water .
fill a bowl with hot water . remove the noodles from the package . place the noodles in the bowl making sure the water covers all the noodles . place another bowl on top of the noodles to make sure all the noodles are covered by the water .

add the pad thai sauce noodles shrimp and egg .
when you smell the garlic , it is time to add the pad thai sauce . use tongs to add noodles to the pan . pour in the shrimp . add the egg . use the tongs to mix everything together as it cooks .

add the pad thai sauce noodles shrimp and egg .
take a pan on the stove . add thai sauce in to the contents of the pan . add rice noodles in to the pan . and shrimp and eggs in to the pan . mix everything in the pan .

add the pad thai sauce noodles shrimp and egg .
get a spoon and hold the pad thai sauce over the pan . scoop the sauce into the pan . take some tongs and pick the noodles up and place them in the pan . add the shrimp and egg .

top with chopped peanuts .
add chopped peanuts to the top of the mix . put on some chopped cilantro . serve the noodles with a wedge of lime .

top with chopped peanuts .
take a pan and place it on the stove . cook the contents of the pan . take some cut pieces of peanuts in a bowl . add the peanut pieces in to the pan . mix them with other ingredients in the pan .

top with chopped peanuts .
add chopped peanuts and fresh cilantro to the pan . remove from the pan and put on a plate . serve on a plate with a wedge of lime .

roll it on a bamboo mat and cut them into thin pieces and serve .
place the sushi in the bamboo mat . bring one side of bamboo to the middle of the sushi pulling tightly . now continue rolling it tightly . you can take it out of the bamboo and cut it once in half . then you can cut it into 6 or 8 pieces .

roll it on a bamboo mat and cut them into thin pieces and serve .
place the sushi onto a bamboo map . firmly roll the sushi together . take a knife and carefully cut the sushi roll . cut it into 8 pieces . put the sushi onto a plate and serve .

roll it on a bamboo mat and cut them into thin pieces and serve .
take the paper and roll it with the bamboo mat . take a knife and cut the roll into thick circles .

place a small amount rice on the seaweed and spread it flat leaving about half inch of seaweed .
place a little bit of rice on the seaweed . spread the rice out evenly . leave half inch of seaweed on the sides .

place a small amount rice on the seaweed and spread it flat leaving about half inch of seaweed .
place a small amount rice on the seaweed and spread it flat leaving about half inch of seaweed . take your fingers and pat the rice on the seaweed so it 's all packed together .

place a small amount rice on the seaweed and spread it flat leaving about half inch of seaweed .
place the rice onto the seaweed . spread the rice flat and evenly with your fingers , leaving about 1/2 of space at the top end of the seaweed .

season it sesame seeds and fish eggs sauce .
add some sesame seeds to the top of the rice . pour some fish eggs across the top . spread them evenly . flip over the seaweed .

season it sesame seeds and fish eggs sauce .
take the sea weed and sushi rice on a plate . now sprinkle some sesame seeds on top of sushi rice . add some fish eggs sauce on the rice . spread the sauce on the rice properly . now turn the seaweed to the other side .

season it sesame seeds and fish eggs sauce .
make sure the rice side of the sushi roll is facing up . get the sesame seeds out . sprinkle a pinch of sesame seeds down the middle of the rice , lengthwise . get the fish egg sauce out . sprinkle a little fish egg sauce on top of the sesame seeds spread a bit over the rice .

flip it and place the crab meat and avocados .
turn over the sushi to the rice is facing down . put the crab meat and avocados onto the seaweed . place them in the middle of the seaweed .

flip it and place the crab meat and avocados .
flip the seaweed wrap over so the seaweed is on top . put the crab meat and avocados in the middle of the seaweed in a line that goes long ways .

flip it and place the crab meat and avocados .
flip the sushi over . put the crab meat on the seaweed side down the middle . put the avocados on the seaweed side down in the middle .

finely slice the cabbage .
take a cutting board and knife . take a cabbage . cut the cabbage in to four halves . take each half and cut the cabbage in to very thin slices . now repeat the same with other pieces .

finely slice the cabbage .
place a small head of cabbage on your cutting board . using a sharp medium sized vegetable knife , cut the cabbage in half , then into quarters . remove the outside leaves and cut the core ( where it was attached to the stem of the cabbage plant ) out . slice each quarter from one pointed end to the other as thinly as you can . slice slowly so you can keep from cutting your fingers .

finely slice the cabbage .
you 're going to grab a cutting board big enough to fit your cabbage . make sure you have adult with you to make sure you 're using the knife correctly . carefully grab the knife and cut the cabbage in half . grab the leaves on the outside of the cabbage and take them away . also , find the core of the cabbage . it will be hard and be toward the middle . cut that off , too . grab one slice of the cabbage and put it on its side . cut it in half once more . once you are done , you will have created two quarters from what was once called a half . now , take the piece of cabbage that you have n't cut into quarters yet and turn it into two more quarters . carefully slice the first quarter you are working on and cut it into very small pieces . do this by starting from one of its ends and working your way to the other end . do the same thing for the rest of the quarters until everything has been sliced thinly , kind of like shredded cheese slices .

cook the cabbage in a pot of water .
take a large pot on a stove . add water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . cut the cabbage in to small pieces . add the cabbage in to the pot of water .

cook the cabbage in a pot of water .
bring a pot of water to a boil . the water is boiling when bubbles rapidly rise to the surface . place cabbage pieces in boiling water . cook for 2 - 3 minutes . cabbage should be tender .

cook the cabbage in a pot of water .
get a large pot and fill it with water . place on stove and turn on the heat . while the water is heating up on the stove , you 'll need to cut the cabbage in half , then cut the half parts in half . this will make sure the cabbage cooks all the way through . you may need an adult to help you cut the cabbage . it can be tricky . when the water starts to boil , carefully , and slowly place the cabbage in the water . make sure not to touch the water or the pot . you can use tongs to pick up the cabbage and place it in the water if you feel more comfortable . cook the cabbage for a few minutes until it is tender . use a fork to try and slide it through the cabbage . if it goes through easily , it is tender and done .

mash the potatoes until chunky .
mash the potatoes with a potato masher . the potatoes do n't need to be smooth . this way they can give a little texture to the dish .

mash the potatoes until chunky .
take a large pot . add boiled potatoes in to the pot . take a potato masher in to the hand . mash the potatoes in the pot . repeat it until the potatoes are about small pieces .

mash the potatoes until chunky .
mash the potatoes . there should be some lumps in them .

add the cabbage to the mashed potatoes .
take your bowl of cabbage and place it near the mashed potatoes . add about half the amount of cabbage to the mashed potatoes .

add the cabbage to the mashed potatoes .
place colander in a pot . add cooked cabbage to the colander . allow cabbage to drain . add cabbage to pot containing potatoes by hand . add about half as much cabbage as you have potatoes .

add the cabbage to the mashed potatoes .
drain the water from the cabbage . taste cabbage to see if it is soft but not too soft . add cabbage to the potatoes so there is twice as much potato .

add milk and spring onions to a pot .
pour the milk into a pot on a stove . add the spring onions to the pot with the milk and leave it on your stove over high heat so it can come to a boil .

add milk and spring onions to a pot .
put the milk in the pot . put spring onions in the pot . bring the milk and onions to a boil .

add milk and spring onions to a pot .
put the milk into a pot . add the spring onions , which should be in tiny pieces , into the milk .

mix the milk and spring onions with the mashed potatoes .
boil milk in a pot . slowly pour milk into the pot containing mashed potatoes . stir until mashed potatoes are fluffy . it should taste somewhat like onion , continue to stir . consistently add more milk to the pot with potatoes .

mix the milk and spring onions with the mashed potatoes .
boil milk in a pot . pour a small amount of boiled milk into the potatoes . slowly stir the milk into the potatoes and add more of the milk as needed . keep stirring until the potatoes are the right texture .

mix the milk and spring onions with the mashed potatoes .
pour the heated milk / spring onion mixture from the saucepan into the pan with the mashed potatoes . mix the milk into the mashed potatoes with the spatula . scrape the sides and bottom of the mashed potato pan with the spatula so that all of the mashed potato is combined with the milk / spring onion mixture .

add butter to the mashed potatoes .
put about 3 tablespoons of butter on top of the mashed potatoes right in the middle . leave it to melt .

add butter to the mashed potatoes .
take the butter from the freezer . cut a small portion of butter with the help of a knife . add the butter into the mashed potatoes .

add butter to the mashed potatoes .
put your mashed potatoes in a bowl . push potatoes down in the middle to make a bowl shape . use a knife to cut out a chunk of softened butter . put butter into the middle of the mashed potatoes .

skin and cut the salmon into pieces .
put fish on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the fish into smaller pieces . put a sharp knife in between the fish meat and skin . slowly move the knife to cut the skin off of each piece of fish .

skin and cut the salmon into pieces .
cut the salmon in half horizontally . cut off three hand widths of the salmon off each of the halves from the previous step .

skin and cut the salmon into pieces .
get a knife . slice the salmon piece in half long way . then slice the salmon in half again down the middle . repeat for the other half of the salmon .

sprinkle salt on both sides of the pieces .
lay the salmon out in one layer . salt one side of the salmon then turn it over and salt the other side .

sprinkle salt on both sides of the pieces .
take some salt in your finger tips . put it all over , on both sides .

sprinkle salt on both sides of the pieces .
put salt on one side of each piece of fish . turn the fish over and put salt on the other side of each piece of fish . .

wash the salmon pieces .
get a pan . put water in the pan . place the salmon pieces in the water . take the salmon out of the water . place the clean salmon in a bowl .

wash the salmon pieces .
put a bowl or large container in the sink . fill the container with cold water . put each of your salmon pieces into the water . swish the salmon around in the water and gently rub it with your fingers . shake the extra water off each piece and place it in a basket .

wash the salmon pieces .
put the salmon pieces in a pan of cold running water . rinse each piece of salmon under the running water . take each piece out of the water and place in basket .

dip the pieces in ice cube water and dry them using paper towel .
place ice cubes in a bowl and cover with water . dip the pieces completely under the water one by one . place all the pieces flat on top of a paper towel . cover the pieces with another paper towel . pat them lightly to dry them off .

dip the pieces in ice cube water and dry them using paper towel .
put fish in the cold ice water . remove the fish from ice water and lay it on top of paper towels . put another towel on top of the fish . push the towel gently on top of the fish . remove the paper towel and throw it in the trash . check to make sure the fish is dry .

dip the pieces in ice cube water and dry them using paper towel .
take a bowl and add water . add ice cubes in to the bowl of water . take the fish pieces and dip them in ice cubes water bowl . take a paper towel and place the fish on it . cover them with another paper towel and dry them .

wrap the pieces in thin plastic wrap .
rip off a piece of saran wrap about the size of a cutting board . take 1 piece of the cut fish and place it on the wrap . fold over the excess edges of the saran wrap until the plastic is wrapped around the entire piece of fish .

wrap the pieces in thin plastic wrap .
place fish onto a large piece of plastic wrap . fold the plastic wrap over the fish wrapping it tightly around the fish .

wrap the pieces in thin plastic wrap .
put fish on clear wrap . cover entire fish with clear plastic wrap .

add rice urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a bowl .
get another container . slowly pour both the bowls into the container .

add rice urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a bowl .
measure the fenugreek seeds . put rice in a large bowl . add urad dal and fenugreek seeds to the bowl of rice .

add rice urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a bowl .
get a large bowl . add the rice urad dal and fenugreek seeds into the bowl . mix with spoon ,

rub oil over a pan .
pour oil onto a paper napkin . use the napkin to rub oil around the pan .

rub oil over a pan .
fold up a paper towel into a square . use the paper to rub the oil around the pan in a circle .

rub oil over a pan .
carefully pour a teaspoon of oil onto a paper towel . slowly rub paper towel onto your pan , being sure not to burn yourself .

add dosa batter to the pan and spread into a big circle .
use a big spoon to scoop the batter into the pan . use the spoon to spread the batter into a circle shape .

add dosa batter to the pan and spread into a big circle .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . take dosa batter in a bowl . take a large spoon and take dosa batter . pour dosa batter on to the pan . spread the batter with the spoon in to a circle .

add dosa batter to the pan and spread into a big circle .
use a spoon to add the dosa batter to the pan . use the back of the spoon to spread the batter into a big circle .

roll the dosa onto itself and remove from the pan .
use a spatula to lift one edge of the dosa from the pan so that the edge touches the middle of the circle . fold the edge over so that it touches the center of the circular dosa . continue rolling the dosa . use the spatula to remove the dosa from the pan .

roll the dosa onto itself and remove from the pan .
do not flip the dosa to the other side like you would a pancake . instead , fold it gently as if you were rolling it so that it stays crispy .

roll the dosa onto itself and remove from the pan .
when the dosa is done . get the spatula ready . take the spatula and gently lift one side up and start to carefully and loosely roll it inward . try to make it look like a log . if you do not want to use your fingers , use a fork to help roll the dosa with the spatula . when you have rolled the dosa all the way up , remove it from the pan with your spatula . be careful the pan will be very hot .

add a potato curry in the middle of the dosa while on the pan .
take your cooked curry . add it to the pan with the dosa in it . place the curry in a line in the center of the dosa , but not going all the way to the top or bottom edge .

add a potato curry in the middle of the dosa while on the pan .
use your spoon to add potato curry to the middle of the dosa . line it up in the middle of the dosa in the pan .

add a potato curry in the middle of the dosa while on the pan .
put the potato curry in the center of the dosa . then put some ghee ( clarified butter ) on top of the curry .

add tahini to a food processor .
using a spoon , stir the tahini while it is still in the bottle . pour the tahini into a measuring cup until you have 1/4 cup . pour the 1/4 cup of tahini into the food processor .

add tahini to a food processor .
pour tahini into the measuring cup . using a spatula pour the tahini into the blender .

add tahini to a food processor .
stir the tahini in the jar . next pour the tahini into a measuring cup . using a rubber spatula pour the tahini to a food processor bowl .

top the hummus with olive oil and paprika .
blend the hummus in a blender . pour some olive oil on top of the hummus . spread some paprika in the hummus .

top the hummus with olive oil and paprika .
use a spoon to remove the hummus from the mixer . place the hummus on a plate . put a small amount of olive oil and paprika on top of the hummus . it is now ready for you to eat and enjoy .

top the hummus with olive oil and paprika .
pour olive oil in circles over the hummus . shake some paprika on the hummus moving so it covers it evenly .

blend the chickpeas in the food processor .
was the chickpeas by putting them under the water in the sink . put the washed chickpeas into the blender . with a spatula scrape the edges of the blender . add more chickpeas to the blender . with the spatula scrape the hummus off the blender .

blend the chickpeas in the food processor .
add half of the chickpeas into the bowl of the food processor and turn processor on for a minute . use silicone spatula to scrape the sides of the bowl . add remaining chickpeas to the food processor . turn processor on for 1 - 2 minutes until mixture is very smooth . use silicone spatula to scrape the bowl again .

blend the chickpeas in the food processor .
open can of chickpeas pour into drainer in sink to drain and rinse . add 1/2 of chickpeas into food processor . turn food processor on for 1 minute then stop machine and scrape bowl . add the other rest of the chickpeas . turn food processor on for 1 - 2 minutes until very smooth .

add water to the hummus and blend .
add 2 to 3 tablespoon of water to hummus while in blender . add more water in you want it less thick .

add water to the hummus and blend .
add 2 to 3 tablespoons of water to the mixture . continue to blend the hummus . add water as necessary to make it thinner .

add water to the hummus and blend .
use a measuring spoon to measure the 2 spoons of water . put the water in the blender . cover the lid and press blend .

drain and rinse the chick peas .
put the chick peas into a colander . rinse warm water over the chickpeas .

drain and rinse the chick peas .
open a can of chick peas with a can opener . pour them into a strainer . rinse the chick peas under the sink .

drain and rinse the chick peas .
open a can of chickpeas with a can opener . over the sink pour the chickpeas into a strainer , let the water from the can drain . rinse the chickpeas .

squeeze a lemon and add the juice to the food processor .
cut a lemon in half with a knife carefully . hold the lemon over the bowl . use a grinder to squish into the lemon and get the juice out .

squeeze a lemon and add the juice to the food processor .
cut the lemon in to two halves . take a half lemon and squeeze juice in to the bowl . remove the pulp from the lemon juice with a strainer . add the lemon juice in to the food processor . close the lid of the food processor .

squeeze a lemon and add the juice to the food processor .
use a knife and careful cut a lemon in half . squeeze the juice of the lemon into a measuring cup . add about 1/4 of a cup of juice . pour the lemon juice to the bowl . pour through a strainer so the seeds do n't get in .

crush and mince the garlic and add it to the food processor .
now we want to take the edge of our knife and press on it to crack open our clove of garlic . now we just need to dice half the clove up . do n't forget to peal it and keep your fingers clear . once the garlic is minced finely , just scrape it into the food processor .

crush and mince the garlic and add it to the food processor .
crush the garlic under a flat metal surface like the side of a wide knife . be careful not to put your hand by the blade . then use the knife to cut the garlic into small pieces , this is called mincing . then carefully scoop it up with the knife and add it to the food processor .

crush and mince the garlic and add it to the food processor .
get one clove of garlic . mash it flat under a knife and remove the skin . mince it into very fine pieces with your knife so no one will get a big chunk of garlic in their mouth . add the minced garlic to the food processor .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
add tahini and lemon juice into food processor . blend for 1 minute or until ingredients are at a creamy consistency .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
add the ingredients in to the food processor . close the lid of the food processor . turn on the food processor . blend the contents for about a minute . open the lid of food processor and check .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
after all of the ingredients are in the food processor , put the lid on tightly and make sure it clicks so you know it wo n't come off . push the button to process it and do this for one whole minute . make sure it 's ready by checking to see if the mixture is thick , whipped , and creamy .

mix and blend the ingredients in the food processor .
use a spatula to scrape everything to the bottom of the food processor . put the lid on . blend the ingredients . take the lid off . scrape the bottom of the bowl again .

mix and blend the ingredients in the food processor .
use a spatula to scrape the bottom of the food processor bowl . place the lid back on the food processor and process again . after about a minute , open up the lid and scrape again .

mix and blend the ingredients in the food processor .
put you ingredients into a blender or food processor and put the lid on . push the button on blender or food processor to make it blend / mix the ingredients .

add oil cumin salt to the food processor .
in the food processor add 2 tablespoons of olive oil . add 1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin . add 1/2 teaspoon salt .

add oil cumin salt to the food processor .
get a spoon to scoop with . carefully add cumin and sale to the food processor .

add oil cumin salt to the food processor .
add 2 tablespoons of olive oil . put in 1/2 teaspoon of cumin to the food processor . add 1/2 teaspoon of salt .

add spicy mayo to the tuna .
use a spoon to add spicy mayonnaise to the tuna . use a spoon to mix the mayonnaise into the tuna .

add spicy mayo to the tuna .
take the mayo mixture in a bowl . take the tuna pieces in a bowl . take a tablespoon of mayo mixture . add the mixture in to the tuna . mix the tuna and the mixture .

add spicy mayo to the tuna .
use a regular spoon to add a heaping spoonful of the spicy mayonnaise to the tuna . use the spoon to mix the mayonnaise and the tuna all the way .

slice the avocado .
place the avocado on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the avocado into slices .

slice the avocado .
hold the avocado on one end . take a knife and cut long strips diagonally on the avocado .

slice the avocado .
use a knife to cut the avocado . slice the avocado into a few small pieces .

pour in spicy sauce .
open the sriracha sauce , and squeeze in about one teaspoon . you can add more if you want your sauce to very hot , or less if you want it to be milder . if you are unsure what a teaspoon of sauce looks like , squeeze the sauce into a teaspoon - sized measuring spoon first . to be sure you have the right level of spiciness before moving on , mix the sauce and taste a very small amount of it . if you 'd like it to be hotter , add a pea - sized amount of sriracha sauce , mix , and taste it again . keep doing this until it has the hotness that you want .

pour in spicy sauce .
add 1 teaspoon of sriracha sauce into the cup . mix the sauce together with a spoon .

pour in spicy sauce .
hold the bottle of spicy sauce over the bowl . carefully squeeze out some sauce into the bowl .

flip the rice upside down .
transfer the rice unto the mat . flip it upside do . add chicken and other ingredients and fold .

flip the rice upside down .
transfer the rice and seaweed onto the plastic on top of the bamboo sheets . flip the rice so it is facing upside down on the plastic .

flip the rice upside down .
take a mat on the board . take a seaweed and spread the rice on it . take the seaweed in the hand . flip the rice upside down . put the seaweed side above .

flatten a ball of rice onto the seaweed .
place the ball of rice onto the seaweed . flatten the rice onto the seaweed . spread the rice around evenly on the seaweed .

flatten a ball of rice onto the seaweed .
roll a handful of rice into a ball in your hands . press the rice down on the seaweed . use your hands to flatten and spread the rice to cover the seaweed .

flatten a ball of rice onto the seaweed .
put a seaweed sheet on the counter top . use your hands to roll the rice into a large ball . place the rice ball on the seaweed . use your fingers to flatten and spread the rice across the seaweed .

spread black sesame seeds on the rice .
use your fingers to sprinkle black sesame seeds over the rice . then sprinkle some white sesame seeds over the rice .

spread black sesame seeds on the rice .
put black sesame seeds onto the bed of rice . spread the seeds evenly around on the rice .

spread black sesame seeds on the rice .
take black sesame seeds with your fingers . coat the rice with the black sesame seeds .

add the tuna to the rice and seaweed .
add the tuna into the center of the roll . place cucumbers on top of the tuna .

add the tuna to the rice and seaweed .
prepare rice and seaweed base with avocado . scoop out tuna from bowl . place heavy tuna layer on top of avocado layer using both fingers and spoon . place celery on one side of tuna in preparation for rolling .

add the tuna to the rice and seaweed .
use a spoon to spread tuna on top of rice , seaweed and avocado slices . put cucumber sticks on top of the tuna . use the bamboo sheet to roll everything together .

roll it all up in plastic wrap .
line up the food roll evenly on the cutting board . your plastic wrap and straw rolling mat should be uniform on the surface . using your fingers , begin rolling the entire wrap , tucking food in with your fingers as you go . once you have completed a single roll , use your fingers to tuck the roll all the way under and give it a squeeze to make sure the food components stay inside the roll . push down on the roll and squeeze firmly . roll straw mat away from the food roll . plastic wrap should still be holding in the food roll and the food wrap should look neat and firmly in place .

roll it all up in plastic wrap .
roll the bamboo sheet . squeeze the sushi roll and pack all the ingredients in . continue to roll the sushi until the roll is packed securely in the plastic wrapper .

roll it all up in plastic wrap .
take the sushi . roll in plastic wrap .

dice the tuna .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the tuna on the board . cut the tuna in to small pieces . take a small sized bowl . add the tuna in to the small bowl .

dice the tuna .
put the tuna on a cutting board and use a sharp knife to cut into tiny squares . place the chopped tuna in a bowl .

dice the tuna .
use a knife to carefully cut the tuna . take the tuna and dice it into small squares .

unwrap the roll and cut it with a sharp knife .
unwrap the sushi roll from the plastic . take a nice and carefully cut the sushi into pieces . cut into 8 equal pieces .

unwrap the roll and cut it with a sharp knife .
grab the end of the roll and unwrap it . use a sharp knife and carefully cut 1 inch circles out of the roll .

unwrap the roll and cut it with a sharp knife .
we now want to unwrap our roll . now grab a very sharp knife and wet it down . take the knife and slice the roll int even chunks , about an inch and half wide .

fry some sausage on a pan .
heat oil in a pan over high heat . add sausage links . get until brown on all sides .

fry some sausage on a pan .
the oil in the pan will be bubbling when its hot . slowly put the meat in the pan carefully the oil is hot and will burn you .

fry some sausage on a pan .
once your pan is hot , put the sausage in the pan . cook the sausage on both sides . wait until both sides are brown .

cook some chopped onion and leek in another pan .
carefully and slowly push the cut up onion and leek into the pan . use a spatula to mix them around while they cook .

cook some chopped onion and leek in another pan .
put an onion and a leek on a cutting board . use a knife to chop the onion and leek into small pieces . use your hand to push the chopped onion and leek from the cutting board into the pan .

cook some chopped onion and leek in another pan .
put some chopped onion into the pan . add some leeks to the pan . stir the pan until the mixture of leeks and onions are soft .

add some water to the vegetables and add stock cube and black pepper .
add water to the pot . after you add water add the stock cube . sprinkle a little pepper into the pot . stir it all together with a spatula .

add some water to the vegetables and add stock cube and black pepper .
add 500 ml of water to the pan . put in a stock cube to the pan . put in a little black pepper .

add some water to the vegetables and add stock cube and black pepper .
there are some cut up vegetables in the pot on the stove . the stove is already turned on . find a glass measuring cup with red writing and red lines on the outside of the cup , turn on the water at the sink and fill it to the top . cut the water off . pour all the water into the pot on the stove that has the cut up vegetables in it . unwrap the small cube that reads stock on it , mash it up in your hand and put in the same pot of vegetables . take the pepper shaker , looks like salt but darker . put a little bit in the vegetable pot too . stir with the thing that looks like a flat spoon .

pour dry parsley leaves to the pan .
put a small amount dry sage into the pot . use a spatula to stir .

pour dry parsley leaves to the pan .
get your sage ready . very carefully pour it into your pot of boiling water .

pour dry parsley leaves to the pan .
boil the contents in the pot . add some dry parsley leaves to the pan . stir the pot .

mix boiled potato butter milk mustard and mash them .
put half a stick of butter over the potatoes . the heat from the potatoes will help it melt . measure out 100 milliliters of cream into a measuring cup . pour it over the potatoes . ( you could also use milk ) . put in an overflowing tablespoon of whole grain mustard . sprinkle in 1 teaspoon of sage . mash it up with a masher . use a big metal spoon as a substitute if you do n't have a masher .

mix boiled potato butter milk mustard and mash them .
put the boiled potatoes , butter , cream or milk , 1 tsp of sage , and 1 tsp mustard into a bowl . mash everything together .

mix boiled potato butter milk mustard and mash them .
add butter , milk , mustard and sage to the bowl with the potatoes . use a masher to mash the potatoes and mix everything together .

place the sausage and vegetable mixture on the potatoes .
place the potatoes in the center of the plate so they make a nice , centered mound . place 2 sausages onto the potatoes , spaced evenly and secured into the potatoes so they do n't roll off . cover the potatoes and sausages with the vegetable and gravy mixture .

place the sausage and vegetable mixture on the potatoes .
put the potatoes onto the plate and flatten . next add the sausages to the top of the potatoes . then add the vegetable gravy to the top of the sausages and potatoes .

place the sausage and vegetable mixture on the potatoes .
make sure your potatoes are centered on the plate . place the 2 pieces of cooked sausage on top of the pile of mashed potatoes . leave a dash of salt on top of the plate . then , pour 2 large spoonfuls of gravy mix onto the sausage and potatoes .

add flour corn starch salt and water to a bowl and stir .
get a large mixing bowl , a fork and a whisk . put 1/2 cup of flour , 1/2 cup corn flour , and 1/8 teaspoon of salt in the bowl . get a large measuring cup and put 3/4 cup of water in it . slowly add a little bit of water to the flour mixture . stir the flour mixture with the whisk . keep adding water until it looks like a thick batter . use the fork to get the flour lumps out of the batter by squeezing the lumps against the side of the bowl . keep doing this until the batter has no lumps .

add flour corn starch salt and water to a bowl and stir .
add half a cup of plain flour , half a cup of corn flour and a pinch of salt . this will be added to a large mixing bowl . stir to combine all of the dry ingredients . add a little of water at a time to make a batter that is free of lumps . if need be use a sieve to remove any lumps .

add flour corn starch salt and water to a bowl and stir .
in a mixing bowl add half a cup of flour . in a mixing bowl add half a cup of flour . add half a cup of corn flour to your mixing bowl . add half a cup of corn flour to your mixing bowl . add a pinch of salt to your mixing bowl . slowly add 3/4 cup of water while you are stirring everything in your mixing bowl together . stir until your there are no more lumps .

heat and grease a pan and pour the batter on the pan .
heat the pan up and grease it lightly with oil . turn the stove top on by turning the knob on the oven . tilt the pan on all tides to grease the entire bottom of the pan . you can use a paper towel to absorb and excess oil . pour in a ladle of batter into the pan and tilt the pan on all sides to thin out the batter . this will create a larger circle .

heat and grease a pan and pour the batter on the pan .
pour a small amount of oil into a frying pan . use a paper towel to spread the oil in the pan . heat the pan on the stove . using a deep spoon pour batter into pan and move pan around to form a circle .

heat and grease a pan and pour the batter on the pan .
heat the pan and put oil in it . pour some batter in the pan . tilt the pan around to make a thin circle .

cook the wrapper .
turn the heat on to medium under the pan . cook the batter to make a wrapper by cooking it until the edges start to come up off of the pan . then , flip the wrapper over and cook the other side for just a few seconds . repeat this with the rest of the batter to make more wrappers .

cook the wrapper .
switch on the stove . place a pan on the stove . keep the wrapper on the pan until it cooks . flip the wrapper and cook the other side when the sides get peeled off . remove and keep it aside .

cook the wrapper .
heat a pan on your stove top with the dial at medium . when the pan is hot put your wrapper into the pan . when the sides start to come up from the pan , use a spatula to flip the wrapper over . leave in pan for a few seconds . use spatula to move the wrapper to a plate .

heat oil and add chopped onions grated ginger green peppers .
turn on the stove to high heat and place down pan . pour some oil into the pan and let it heat up . then add 1/4 cup of sliced onions . now add a teaspoon of grated ginger . finally 1/4 cup of sliced green peppers and let it all heat up in the oil .

heat oil and add chopped onions grated ginger green peppers .
pour 1 tablespoon into a wok that is on top of your stove with the dial turned to high . add in 1/4 cup of sliced onion , 1 teaspoon of grated ginger , 1/4 cup of sliced green peppers .

heat oil and add chopped onions grated ginger green peppers .
put 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok on high heat . wait for the oil to get hot . add 1/4 cup of cut up onions and 1/4 cup of cut up green pepper and 1 teaspoon of ginger cut up into very small pieces .

add shredded cabbage julienned carrots salt and pepper .
add shredded cabbage to heated pan . add julienned ( small match shaped slices ) of carrot to pan . stir occasionally and cook until veggies are soft . add salt and pepper and stir again .

add shredded cabbage julienned carrots salt and pepper .
cut the cabbage into thing string like structures . cut the carrots really thin almost like paper . add some salt and pepper .

add shredded cabbage julienned carrots salt and pepper .
put your shredded cabbage into the pan . put your julienned carrots into the pan . add salt into the pan . add pepper into the pan . use a spoon to mix all together .

add flour and water .
put 3 tablespoons of flour in a bowl . add a small splash of water . mix with a fork until it becomes a paste .

add flour and water .
add 3 tablespoons of flour to a small bowl . add a small amount of water to the flour . use a spoon to stir until it makes a smooth , thick paste .

add flour and water .
put 3 tablespoons of flour in a small bowl . add a small amount of water and stir . you want a thick paste that is smooth . if the paste is too think , or not smooth , add in small amounts of water until it looks the way you want it to .

place the wrapper and filling down and put paste on the edges .
take the spring roll wrapper on a plate . take the filling in a bowl . place the filling in one half of wrapper . take the flour past in a bowl . apply the flour paste to the edges of wrapper .

place the wrapper and filling down and put paste on the edges .
take 1 wrapper and put onto cutting board . take a spoonful of filling and place onto middle of wrapper . dip finger into paste and paint around the edge of the wrapper .

place the wrapper and filling down and put paste on the edges .
place the rice paper on a very flat surface . put 1 tablespoon of your filling in the lower portion of the rice paper . gently rub flour paste around the edges of the rice paper . the flour paste works like glue to keep the spring roll sealed while it is cooking .

fold roll and seal the wrapper .
without applying a lot of pressure pull up the wrapper and fold over the filling . roll until you reach the center of the wrapper . add a little paste on the edges and fold in the sides . continue to roll the wrapper until the end has been reached . seal the edges well so nothing falls out when it is fried .

fold roll and seal the wrapper .
put the mix on the wrapper . put paste around the edge of the wrapper . next without too much pressure roll wrapper to the center . then add more paste to folded edges . fold each end in and then roll until you reach the end .

fold roll and seal the wrapper .
take one end and carefully roll it until you get to the middle . put a tiny bit more paste on the folded sides of the roll . pick up the left edge and fold it to the center of the roll . pick up the right edge and fold it to the center of the roll . roll the entire folded piece forward until it 's completely closed and nothing leaks out .

fry the rolls in oil .
place a pan onto the stove top . add about a cup of oil to the pan . turn the stove heat to medium by turning the control know to halfway . add the rolls , one at a time into the pan . once the roll is a golden brown color , ( about 4 - 5 minutes ) , use a spoon to lift the roll . once the oil is drained , place the roll on a plate .

fry the rolls in oil .
heat the oil in a pan . once the oil is heated , put one roll at a time in the oil . cook roll for 4 to 5 minutes until golden brown in color . using a slotted spoon take the roll out of the pan and allow oil to drain off of roll . put cooked rolls on serving plate .

fry the rolls in oil .
once you have your spring rolls wrapped , put the oil in a frying pan to medium heat . once the oil is heated , put one roll at the time into the frying pan . each roll should be left in the oil for about 4 - 5 minutes , or until the roll turns into golden brown completely . using a deep fry skimmer , take the roll out of oil , and leave it on top of pan , so that the extra oil in the roll drips back into the pan . place 2 - 3 pieces of paper towel on top of a place , and place roll on top of this plate .

boil and strain the potatoes put them into a pan and mash .
boil the potatoes in a pan . then strain the potatoes to get rid of the extra water . pour the potatoes into a pan . use a masher or fork to smash down the potatoes .

boil and strain the potatoes put them into a pan and mash .
the peeled potatoes are taken out of the pot they were cooked in . they were put into a strainer . the put into an to mash . she mashes them with a potato masher . then she adds milk .

boil and strain the potatoes put them into a pan and mash .
take potatoes and enough water to cover them in a large pot and put it on the stove with a medium - high heat setting . let these boil . when the potatoes have boiled and are soft , carefully drain the potatoes into a strainer being careful not to splash yourself . use pot holders . once your potatoes are drained , put them back into the pan . use a potato masher to smash up all of the potatoes in the pan until they look like mashed potatoes .

transfer the mashed potatoes into a mixing bowl and mix with cabbage .
with a big spoon , scoop the mashed potatoes from the pot to a mixing bowl . with large tongs , move the cabbage into the bowl with the mashed potatoes . take the large spoon and gently mix the potatoes and cabbage together by moving the bottom of the mixture to the top and repeat until blended .

transfer the mashed potatoes into a mixing bowl and mix with cabbage .
use a spoon to scoop the mashed potatoes into a mixing bowl . add cabbage to the mixing bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the potatoes and cabbage together .

transfer the mashed potatoes into a mixing bowl and mix with cabbage .
transfer a couple spoons of potatoes into another bowl . add a scoop or two of cooked cabbage to the potatoes . do n't forget to add the salt . fold the ingredients together with a large spoon until they are well - mixed , but do n't stir them .

add some milk and mash the potatoes .
now we are going to add in our milk to the pan . once the milk is in , we can start mashing the potatoes . using our masher , just keep pressing until they are smooth and creamy .

add some milk and mash the potatoes .
cut potatoes with a knife into small pieces . put them in a pot and cook until soft . drain them and add milk . take a tool to mash them . mash until all potatoes are thick and mashed .

add some milk and mash the potatoes .
pour milk into the potatoes in the pot . use a potato masher to mash the potatoes until smooth and creamy .

scoop the mixture on a plate and garnish with chopped parsley .
take a scooper and scoop up some mixture . place it on a plate like ice cream scoops . sprinkle some parsley on top of the scoops on the plate .

scoop the mixture on a plate and garnish with chopped parsley .
use your ice cream scoop . scoop the mixture onto the plate . sprinkle some parsley on top of the mixture with your fingers .

scoop the mixture on a plate and garnish with chopped parsley .
use an ice cream scoop and scoop the mashed potatoes onto a plate . take some parsley and sprinkle it over the top of the potatoes .

sprinkle some salt and pepper and continue mixing .
add some salt and pepper to the bowl . use a spoon to keep mixing .

sprinkle some salt and pepper and continue mixing .
add some salt and pepper . you will continue folding the mixture together with your large spoon . fold it over into its self a few times .

sprinkle some salt and pepper and continue mixing .
grab some salt and pepper with your fingers . sprinkle the salt and pepper in the bowl . keep mixing with a big spoon .

boil some water in a pan and add cabbage green onions salt and pepper .
get a cooking pan and add water about half way up . let the water come to a boil . add some cabbage and some cut up green onions . add a little bit of salt and pepper .

boil some water in a pan and add cabbage green onions salt and pepper .
pour water in a pan . turn the heat up on the stove . wait until the water is bubbling up quickly . use tongs to push in the cabbage green onions salt and pepper .

boil some water in a pan and add cabbage green onions salt and pepper .
bring a pan of water to a boil . add cabbage , green onions and salt and pepper to the pan of water . put a lid on the pan , and let it simmer for about 5 to 7 minutes .

place celery and carrot sticks into water .
put your celery and carrot sticks into the water and ice in a bowl to make them crispy . leave them in the cold water and ice while you are cooking .

place celery and carrot sticks into water .
put some water and ice into a bowl . put the celery and carrots sticks into the ice water to make them crisp .

place celery and carrot sticks into water .
grab a cutting board . cut up carrot and celery into sticks . fill up cup with water . add ice . place celery and carrots into ice bath .

coat the wings with sauce .
put the wings in the hot pan . use a spoon to toss the wings in the sauce and make sure they are coated . remove the wings from the pan and put on a plate .

coat the wings with sauce .
slowly add the wings to the sauce being careful not to splash the hot sauce . use a large mixing spoon and stir the wings and the sauce together . when the wings are covered with the sauce turn off the heat . put the wings on a plate .

coat the wings with sauce .
gently and carefully pour the chicken wings into the wok . using a large spoon , gently stir the wings into the sauce . keep stirring until all wings are covered with the sauce .

add baking powder black pepper and salt and mix .
first add about a tablespoon of baking powder . then add a teaspoon of crushed black pepper and three quarter of a tablespoon of regular sea salt . mix it using your gloved hands to incorporate all the flavors . let the mixture sit out for about ten to fifteen minutes before adding it to the oil so they 're not ice cold .

add baking powder black pepper and salt and mix .
use measuring spoons . put 1 tablespoon of baking powder . put 1 teaspoon of pepper powder . put 3/4 teaspoon of salt . mix the meat and make sure the powders have coated the meats .

add baking powder black pepper and salt and mix .
pour in the baking powder . pour in the salt and black pepper . use your hands to squeeze and squish everything together mixing it .

heat cooking oil and fry the chicken wings .
add 3 cups cooking oil to pan . heat oil on high . add chicken wings to oil . make sure when you add the chicken that the oil is making a sizzling sound . while chicken wings are cooking take a metal cooking spoon and stir gently to make sure the chicken does not stick together or to the bottom . have the chicken evenly coated in oil , then lower the heat to medium high heat to cook the chicken through and not burn .

heat cooking oil and fry the chicken wings .
place a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add the chicken wings in to the hot oil . fry the chicken wings in the oil .

heat cooking oil and fry the chicken wings .
put 3 cups of cooking oil into a frying pan . pour the chicken wings into the pan of oil . stir the chicken around in oil . set on medium high and cook for 15 minutes .

cut chicken wings and drumette .
with a knife cut the legs off the chicken . cut the wing and drumette so you have 2 pieces .

cut chicken wings and drumette .
hold the end of the chicken . use a butcher knife and carefully chop the end of the chicken off by the foot .

cut chicken wings and drumette .
put the chicken wing on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut off the chicken toe . use a knife to cut the wing into two portions - wing and drumette . repeat the same steps for all 20 pieces of chicken .

add butter hot sauce vinegar cayenne and tomato ketchup .
first , put in a tablespoon of butter into the wok . shake the butter around in the wok and let the butter melt . now once the butter is melted , add in the hot sauce of your choice . around 3 tablespoons of so . next we can add in 2 tablespoons of vinegar . use a spoon to mix the sauce around and then add a little cayenne followed by about 3 tablespoons of ketchup straight into the wok . now stir some more !

add butter hot sauce vinegar cayenne and tomato ketchup .
add a tablespoon of butter to your hot wok that 's on the stove . add franks red hot sauce of about three tablespoons to your wok . now add about two tablespoons of vinegar to your wok and cook it for a bit using a spoon to mix it . add a pinch of cayenne . now add about three tablespoons of ketchup and mix it with your spoon .

add butter hot sauce vinegar cayenne and tomato ketchup .
take a pan and heat the pan . melt some butter in the pan . add some hot sauce in to the butter . add some vinegar and cayenne pepper in to the pan . add some tomato ketch up in to the pan and mix everything in the pan .

spread rice onto the sheet and flip over .
spread the rice gently onto the sheet . flip the sheet over .

spread rice onto the sheet and flip over .
use your fingers to press rice onto sheet . then turn the sheet over .

spread rice onto the sheet and flip over .
lightly pat the rice onto the sheet and spread the rice evenly . flip the sheet over carefully .

place the tuna in the center of the sheet .
add the spicy tuna on top of the sheet that you have flipped over . make sure to put it in a line along the middle of the sheet .

place the tuna in the center of the sheet .
take the tuna in a bowl . take the sheet . place the tuna mixture on the sheet . spread the mixture along the center of the sheet . cover the entire length of sheet .

place the tuna in the center of the sheet .
place your tuna into the middle of the sheet in a row . have it touch the sheet on the left and right side but it does n't need to go all the way to the top and the bottom of the sheet .

place the cucumber next to the tuna .
place the tuna on top of the rice . next place the cucumber next to the tuna .

place the cucumber next to the tuna .
place a spoonful of tuna onto the pastry . using a vegetable knife , slice a cucumber into thin sticks . lay a cucumber stick beside the tuna .

place the cucumber next to the tuna .
place a strip of cucumber next to your line of tuna . you may need two strips to get it all the way to the edge .

roll up the sheet .
fold the roll over . keep rolling and be careful not to let the inside of the roll fall out .

roll up the sheet .
once you place all the ingredients onto your roll you can start to roll it . you first fold it and tightly tuck it and roll it . it 's better to roll it away from you .

roll up the sheet .
once you add your ingredients into your sushi wrapper . slowly roll it away from you . like you are rolling a log . careful not to squish it or you will end up with a flat sushi roll .

place tuna on top of the roll .
after you roll the sushi roll , it is time for the tuna . make sure your surface is clean and the tuna is kept cold until right before using . this will make sure the tuna tastes fresh . the tuna should be cut into strips about 1 1/2 to 2 inches long , just enough to cover the top and sides of the roll . lay the tuna across the top of the roll like you are draping a blanket over the roll . ( imagine you are laying the tuna on the roll like railroad track but much closer together ! ) . repeat with the tuna until you have covered the entire roll and there is no rice showing . we want this roll to be all pink on top ! wash your hands after handling any raw fish .

place tuna on top of the roll .
take the roll on a plate . take the tuna on a cutting board . cut the tuna in to thin strips . take the tuna strips on a bowl . place the tuna slices on top of roll .

place tuna on top of the roll .
lay the sliced tuna over the top on the roll . keep adding slices of tuna next to each other so the whole roll is covered in tuna .

place saran wrap and a mat on top of the roll and press the roll .
place saran wrap on top so it does n't come apart . then cover with bamboo and press just enough to mold .

place saran wrap and a mat on top of the roll and press the roll .
use a square of plastic wrap and place flat over top of roll . place a bamboo mat on top of place wrap flat . press inward around the roll with the bamboo mat . do not press too hard , just enough to keep it molded together .

place saran wrap and a mat on top of the roll and press the roll .
put plastic wrap and bamboo mat on top of roll . use your hands to press to form a roll . be sure side are tucked in , so nothing is loose .

cut the roll into pieces .
leave the saran wrap on the roll . you will want to cut the roll into 5 or 6 pieces .

cut the roll into pieces .
find a sharp knife . use the knife to slice the roll into small pieces .

cut the roll into pieces .
use a sharp knife and cutting board . carefully slice the roll into eight even sized pieces .

place the spinach on top of the rolls .
place your spinach on top of the rolls . one piece on top of each slice of roll is plenty .

place the spinach on top of the rolls .
grab the spinach from the bigger plate and put it in your hands . take each piece of spinach and put them one at a time on top of the rolls . make sure to create layers .

place the spinach on top of the rolls .
place the spinach on top of the sushi rolls . serve afterwards .

add the cut pork to the sauce and mix well to marinate and leave for 20 minutes .
you 're going to take the pork that you have already cut . using a knife to carefully slide the pork off of the cutting board , add the pork into the bowl of sauce . grab a large spoon . using the spoon , you 're going to mix the pork in with the sauce by shifting it around in the bowl , making sure to stir from the bottom up . allow the pork to sit in the sauce to marinate for 20 minutes .

add the cut pork to the sauce and mix well to marinate and leave for 20 minutes .
mix the sauce in the bowl . place the cut pork into the bowl of sauce . move the pork around into the sauce until the sauce is covering all of the pork . leave the pork in the sauce for 20 minutes so that the flavor of the sauce soaks into the pork for better flavor .

add the cut pork to the sauce and mix well to marinate and leave for 20 minutes .
hold the bowl of cut pork pieces over the sauce bowl . use a spoon to scoop the pork into the sauce . mix everything together well with the spoon .

put chopped onions and stir for 2 - 3 minutes until it is fragrant .
put in the cut up onions into the pan . use chopsticks to mix the onions around while they cook . they are ready when they smell nice after 2 or 3 minutes .

put chopped onions and stir for 2 - 3 minutes until it is fragrant .
put the chopped onions into the pan . stir for 2 to 3 minutes until you can smell the onions .

put chopped onions and stir for 2 - 3 minutes until it is fragrant .
now we want to take our chopped onions and put them into our oiled pan . we will heat them for 2 - 3 minutes . while heating them , make sure you stir the noodles around using a spoon or cooking utensil .

then put a layer of white rice in the center of vegetables .
cover the bottom of the plate with the lettuce . next , add a handful of your carrot sticks . then add one spoonful of the cut tomatoes . next , add a spoonful of the yellow corn . finally , use a spoon to cover the middle of the plate with rice .

then put a layer of white rice in the center of vegetables .
take a spoon or paddle to scoop the rice . gently place a scoop of rice and put it in the middle of the vegetables .

then put a layer of white rice in the center of vegetables .
get a plate . place all the vegetables on the plate . have the cooked white rice ready . get a spatula . use a spatula and put the white rice on top of the colorful vegetables .

add the marinated pork and cook while stirring until the pork cooks through .
take the marinated and put it into the pan . stir it around for 6 - 8 minutes and you hear the marinated sizzle nicely in the pan . now you just want to keep stirring until it is all heated up .

add the marinated pork and cook while stirring until the pork cooks through .
pour the marinated pork into the frying pan . use your stirring sticks to spread the pork around the pan allow it all to cook . continue to cook until the pork cooks through on all sides .

add the marinated pork and cook while stirring until the pork cooks through .
marinate the pork with the sauces and keep it for sometime . add the marinated cook into the pan . keep stirring until the pork gets cooked . the color looks orangish and tasty .

chop cucumber lettuce tomatoes and carrots into slices .
cut cucumbers in half and slice each half about one centimeter thick . chop lettuce in one inch wide slices each way . chop tomatoes in half . then cut the half into quarters . cut carrots in halves . then chop into thin slices . then chop into strands . chop the carrot slices into four or five inch thin strands .

chop cucumber lettuce tomatoes and carrots into slices .
chop the cucumbers using a knife diagonal . cut the lettuce lengthwise . cut the lettuce again . cut the tomatoes in half . cut the tomatoes in half again .

chop cucumber lettuce tomatoes and carrots into slices .
take a large cleaver and cut the cucumber , at a slight diagonal , into an eighth inch slices . repeat with the lettuce , tomatoes , and carrots .

cut pork into bite size pieces .
put the pork on the cutting board . get a sharp knife from the knife block . very carefully hold the pork , folding your fingers under to protect them . cut the pork into small bite size pieces . repeat until you ' ve cut all the meat .

cut pork into bite size pieces .
cut pork into cubed pieces . start by cutting pork into strips . then cut strips into small cubed bite sized pieces .

cut pork into bite size pieces .
get 200 grams of pork . chop the pork into bite sized pieces with a sharp knife .

heat a frying pan on a medium heat and drizzle little sesame oil .
place the frying pan on the stove . heat the frying pan to a medium heat . sprinkle the sesame oil in small drops over the whole pan .

heat a frying pan on a medium heat and drizzle little sesame oil .
put a frying pan on the stove . turn the stove to medium heat . take sesame oil and put it across the bottom of the pan .

heat a frying pan on a medium heat and drizzle little sesame oil .
put the pan on the stove and turn the knob up halfway . slowly pour sesame oil in circles on the pan .

combine gochujang soy sauce white sugar lime juice garlic and black pepper to prepare the marinade .
