to make the sauce , add 1 tb korean red pepper paste , 1 tb soy sauce , 1 tb white sugar , about 1 tb lemon juice , finely chopped garlic and sprinkle with a little black pepper . use a spoon to combine all the ingredients very well . this sauce can be used as marinade for the pork , or also as sauce for the rice .

combine gochujang soy sauce white sugar lime juice garlic and black pepper to prepare the marinade .
add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce . add white sugar . put in 1 tablespoon of lime juice . add garlic and black pepper . use a spoon to stir the mixture together .

combine gochujang soy sauce white sugar lime juice garlic and black pepper to prepare the marinade .
take a medium sized bowl to prepare marinade . add a tablespoon of gochujang sauce and soy sauce in to the bowl . add a tablespoon of white sugar in to the bowl . add some lime juice in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl and mix .

cut an onion into wedges and chop some garlic .
find a large kitchen knife .. . find one medium onion and a couple of cloves of garlic . chop the onion in wedges . chop the garlic into tiny , tiny pieces .

cut an onion into wedges and chop some garlic .
get out a cutting board . take out a sharp knife . put the onion onto the cutting board and cut in half . after the onion is cut in half , cut it into wedges that look like the shape of lemon slices . put the garlic on the cutting board and cut into very small pieces .

cut an onion into wedges and chop some garlic .
take a cutting board and a knife . take half an onion and cut it in to long thin pieces . then cut the other half of onion in same way . take some garlic cloves on the cutting board . cut the garlic in to small pieces .

finally top the rice with spicy pork bibimbap and serve drizzling little bit of sesame oil on top .
add little rice on top of other ingredients . take the spicy pork in a bowl . add the spicy pork bibimbap on top of rice . take some drizzling sesame oil . add the sesame oil on top .

finally top the rice with spicy pork bibimbap and serve drizzling little bit of sesame oil on top .
put rice on top of the veggies with a spoon . put the pork on top of the rice using chopsticks .

finally top the rice with spicy pork bibimbap and serve drizzling little bit of sesame oil on top .
after the rice is on top , put the spicy meat on top of the rice . if you want you can put seaweed slices on top . if you want you can put sesame seeds on top also .

to assemble the dish place a layer of lettuce leaves then arrange carrots tomatoes cucumber and a tbsp of sweetcorn .
place some chopped iceberg lettuce on a plate . arrange the other vegetables on top of the lettuce in any way you like , so that it looks nice .

to assemble the dish place a layer of lettuce leaves then arrange carrots tomatoes cucumber and a tbsp of sweetcorn .
first add your lettuce leaves to your plate using your fingers to spread them nicely . add your thinly sliced carrots carefully to one side of your lettuce nicely arranging them . after that add the slice tomatoes and cucumbers nicely to your plate using your fingers to spread them and arrange them nicely . now add a tablespoon of sweet corn to your plate . now it 's complete .

to assemble the dish place a layer of lettuce leaves then arrange carrots tomatoes cucumber and a tbsp of sweetcorn .
place your chopped iceberg lettuce in a nice pile in the middle of a large plate . take a handful of carrot sticks and leaving them in a bunch place them on one side of the mound of lettuce . next to your carrot sticks , arrange some sliced tomatoes on top of the lettuce . then arrange your sliced cucumbers next to your tomatoes on top of the lettuce . finally , top off the rest of the lettuce with about a handful of sweet corn .

put bread crumbs in food processor process transfer to a bowl and soak in milk .
rip up pieces of bread and put the pieces in a food processor bowl . put the lid for the food processor on the food processor bowl . push the button on the food processor to chip the food . hit the stop button when all the pieces are very small . take the lid off the food processor bowl . pour the bread crumbs from the food processor bowl into a large mixing bowl . pour the milk from the measuring cup into the bowl with the bread crumbs . stir with a fork so that the crumbs soak up the milk .

put bread crumbs in food processor process transfer to a bowl and soak in milk .
tear apart 2 slices of fresh sandwich bread and place into food processor . put lid on processor and push the start button to process for 10 seconds . dump breadcrumbs out of processor bowl into a medium bowl . pour 1/3 cup of milk into the bowl and stir with a fork so the bread can absorb it .

put bread crumbs in food processor process transfer to a bowl and soak in milk .
tear the bread into smaller pieces . place the pieces into the food processor and close the lid . turn the food processor on and wait 10 seconds . pour the processed bread into a bowl . pour 1/3 cup of milk onto the bread , use a fork to stir the bread just a little , and let the bread sit still in the bowl .

put 28 ounces of tomato into the processor and puree .
pour your 28 oz can of tomatoes into the food processor . turn your food process on and allow the tomatoes to puree for about 20 seconds .

put 28 ounces of tomato into the processor and puree .
read the can label to see how many ounces of tomatoes you have . you will need 28 ounces of tomato . pour the tomato into the food processor . put the lid on the food processor and turn on . keep the food processor on until the tomatoes are cut up and look like liquid .

put 28 ounces of tomato into the processor and puree .
take 28 ounces of tomato in a jar . take a blender , add the tomato in to the blending jar . close the lid of the blender . blend the tomato in to puree .

add olive oil and garlic to a pot and saute it till the garlic is turns gold .
add olive oil and garlic to the pot . stir the garlic in the pot until it turns a gold color .

add olive oil and garlic to a pot and saute it till the garlic is turns gold .
turn stove on medium heat . using a tablespoon , pour olive oil into pot and place pot on stove . when the oil begins to bubble add the garlic . watch the garlic change from white to a dark , golden yellow . remove pot from stove .

add olive oil and garlic to a pot and saute it till the garlic is turns gold .
take a pot and heat it . add some olive oil in to the pot . heat the oil for few seconds . cut the garlic in to very small pieces . fry the garlic till they are golden brown .

add the tomatoes 1/2 tsp of italian spice 2 tsp of sugar 1/4 of salt and some pepper and stir .
add the tomatoes to the pot on the stove . add 1/2 teaspoon of italian seasoning , two teaspoon of sugar , 1/4 teaspoon of salt , and some pepper . stir well . next add some fresh basil .

add the tomatoes 1/2 tsp of italian spice 2 tsp of sugar 1/4 of salt and some pepper and stir .
after it has cooked for a minute , add the tomatoes . next add a 1/2 teaspoon of italian spice . then add 2 tablespoons of sugar . next add 1/4 teaspoon of salt and pepper to taste . stir all ingredients together .

add the tomatoes 1/2 tsp of italian spice 2 tsp of sugar 1/4 of salt and some pepper and stir .
add the tomatoes . add 1/2 tsp of italian spice , 2 tsp of sugar , 1/4 tsp salt and a little pepper . stir everything together and let it cook .

add an egg parsley parmesan italian spice garlic salt and pepper to the bread crumbs and mix .
break open an egg in to the bowl . add 1 table spoon of cut parsley in to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of parmesan and italian spice in to the bowl . add little salt and pepper in to the bowl . mix everything with bread crumbs in the bowl .

add an egg parsley parmesan italian spice garlic salt and pepper to the bread crumbs and mix .
gather ingredients : egg , parsley , parmesan , italian spice , a clove of garlic , salt , pepper . cut the garlic clove into very tiny pieces . add all ingredients to the meat . mix well with hands .

add an egg parsley parmesan italian spice garlic salt and pepper to the bread crumbs and mix .
add an egg to the mixture to the bread crumbs in the bowl . 1 tablespoon of parsley and 1 tablespoon of parmesan cheese . next add 1/2 teaspoon of italian spice . then add 1 clove of chopped garlic and 1/4 teaspoon of salt and some fresh pepper . then mix together well before adding the meat .

add 3/4 pound of ground beef and mix well to incorporate all the ingredients .
make sure to grab some gloves before the mix . put the 3/4 pounds of meat inside of the bowl with the mixture . once the meat is on top of the mixture , flip the meat to the bottom of the mixture . using your hand , mix with meat with the mixture . you can squeeze the meat and mixture together until all ingredients are well blended .

add 3/4 pound of ground beef and mix well to incorporate all the ingredients .
put the meat into the bowl . you can use gloves if you want . grab the meat with your hands and smash it together . fold it over the unmixed part . keep grabbing handfuls and folding it over itself until it 's all mixed together .

add 3/4 pound of ground beef and mix well to incorporate all the ingredients .
pick up the tray of beef and turn it over so it goes into the bowl . then put on a pair of latex gloves . next , begin squeezing and moving around the beef so it mixes with the other ingredients .

make 8 meat balls out of the mixture prepared .
divide the meat into four sections . each section will make two meatballs . roll all of the meat into meatballs first . you should have a total of 8 meatballs . afterward , you will drop them into the sauce to cook .

make 8 meat balls out of the mixture prepared .
divide the meat into eight balls . each ball should be the same size . pick up one of the balls and roll it in between your hands . put the ball on the tray . do the same thing with each of the seven balls you have left .

make 8 meat balls out of the mixture prepared .
divide the meat mixture into 4 equal parts . each part will make 2 meatballs . use your hands to roll each meatball for a total of 8 . place each meatball on a plate and then add to pot of sauce to cook .

drop all the meatballs into the boiling pot of sauce and cook .
place 7 inch saucepan on stove and pour sauce in the pot . turn on the burner to high until sauce starts to boil . once sauce is boiling , gently add the meatballs to the pot . cover meatballs by pressing down on them with a spoon . cook meatballs for 20 minutes . you may have to turn down the heat if the pot starts boiling over .

drop all the meatballs into the boiling pot of sauce and cook .
place the sauce into a pot and place the pot on the stove . turn the heat to medium heat . let the sauce cook until bubbly . place the meatballs into the sauce with your hands . be careful not to touch the sauce . take a spatula and tap the tops of the meatballs down in the sauce until the sauce covers them . let the sauce cook on the stove for about 20 minutes .

drop all the meatballs into the boiling pot of sauce and cook .
get a seven inch sauce pan . add enough marinara to sauce pan so that it will cover meatballs . heat the marinara up so it is simmering . add the meatballs carefully by hand . submerge any meatballs that are not covered .

add 3 ounces of spaghetti into boiling water .
put 3 ounces of spaghetti into a pot of boiling water . boil according to package directions .

add 3 ounces of spaghetti into boiling water .
take the boiling water . take 3 ounces of spaghetti . add 3 ounces of spaghetti into the boiling water .

add 3 ounces of spaghetti into boiling water .
once your water is boiling grab 3 ounces of spaghetti noodles . place the noodles into the boiling water .

chop and add fresh basil and stir .
chop 2 tablespoons of basil into small pieces . add in pot and stir in for flavor .

chop and add fresh basil and stir .
slice fresh basil into small strips . right before the dish is done add basil to pot and stir .

chop and add fresh basil and stir .
take fresh basil and pinch slightly . bring down knife in slicing or sawing motion to make strips . measure 2 tablespoon of basil . pick up and add to pot . stir in .

drain the spaghetti .
once the spaghetti is finished cooking , we must remove the water from the pot . using potholders or mitts , because the pot will be hot , grab on both sides of the pot . take the pot to a sink . put a colander , which is like a bowl with holes in it , into the sink . carefully pour the water and the spaghetti noodles into the colander to separate the noodles from the water .

drain the spaghetti .
put your strainer in the sink . carefully pick up the pot of spaghetti and water . pour the spaghetti and water into the strainer .

drain the spaghetti .
take a colander . put the colander into the sink . take the pot of spaghetti into the colander . take the colander of spaghetti and put it into a bowl .

stir sauce into the spaghetti serve with meatballs in the center and sprinkle on parmesan .
put cooked spaghetti into a bowl and add some cooked sauce to the spaghetti . use some tongs to toss the spaghetti noodles around until the are coated with the sauce . put the coated spaghetti onto a plate . take two meatballs out of the pot and place them on top of the spaghetti that is on the plate . add a bit of extra sauce and then sprinkle some parmesan cheese over the top off the whole plate .

stir sauce into the spaghetti serve with meatballs in the center and sprinkle on parmesan .
put a little sauce on your spaghetti . use a pair of tongs to stir the spaghetti and sauce together . put the spaghetti in a serving dish . use a spoon to scoop two meatballs and more sauce on top of the spaghetti . sprinkle parmesan cheese on top .

stir sauce into the spaghetti serve with meatballs in the center and sprinkle on parmesan .
use a spoon to scoop up sauce . spoon sauce onto the spaghetti , use tongs to mix . use spoon to pick up meatballs and place on top of spaghetti . lastly , put some parmesan cheese on top .

blend the onions and garlic .
pour the chopped onion and garlic into the food processor bowl . place the lid on the food processor and lock lid into place . turn the food processor on to process the onion and garlic . add the processed onion and garlic to the bowl of chick peas .

blend the onions and garlic .
add cut up onions to the food processor . add cut up garlic into the food processor .

blend the onions and garlic .
place cut up onion into food processor . next add garlic cloves to the food processor . put the lid tightly on the food processor . turn on the food processor to blend the two together .

peel slice and grate the cucumber .
first , peel the skin off of the cucumber with a vegetable peeler . next , cut the cucumber in half on a cutting board with a knife . using a spoon , scoop out the soft insides of the cucumber . grab a vegetable grater and rub the cucumber on the side with the holes . put the grated cucumber into a bowl .

peel slice and grate the cucumber .
take a cucumber . remove the peel of the cucumber . cut the cucumber in to two halves vertically . scoop out the seeds of the cucumber . grate the cucumber .

peel slice and grate the cucumber .
cut a cucumber in half and use only one end . peel the cucumber with a vegetable peeler . slice the cucumber in half , lengthwise . scoop out the seeds from the middle using a teaspoon . with a grater , grate the flesh of the cucumber into a bowl .

fry the falafel .
at 180 degrees c for about three minutes . make sure to evenly space them out so they do not touch each other .

fry the falafel .
heat oil to 180 degrees celsius or 356 degrees fahrenheit . slowly lower fry basket into oil . fry falafel for 3 minutes .

fry the falafel .
roll the prepared falafel into balls , about the size of a golf ball . pour cooking oil into the deep fryer and heat to 180 degrees celsius . once fully heated , place falafel balls on frying grate . cook for about 3 minutes and then carefully remove using ladle . transfer cooked falafel onto a serving platter and enjoy !

blend the chickpeas in a food processor .
pour the chickpeas into the food processor . screw the lid on the food processor . spin the food processor for about 30 seconds . using a spatula scrape the ends off the food processor . tighten the lid and blend the chickpeas again .

blend the chickpeas in a food processor .
put the chickpeas in the food processor . blend . scrape the chickpeas off the side of the food processor with a spatula . blend again .

blend the chickpeas in a food processor .
pour half of the chickpeas into a food processor . put the lid on the food processor and turn it on for a few seconds . turn the food processor off , open the lid , and scrape the sides with a spatula . put the lid back on and turn the food processor to blend the chickpeas into a smooth mixture . repeat with the other half of the chickpeas .

form the mixture into balls .
take the mixture around the size of a golf ball in your hand . press the mixture together into a ball shape . continue until all the mixture is used .

form the mixture into balls .
take some mixture into your hands . shape the mixture into balls using your hands .

form the mixture into balls .
first , clean your hands , we 'll be using our hands for this part . with one hand , grab a bit of the ingredients and put it into the palm of the other hand . then , you 'll want to roll the ingredients into a ball about the size of a golf ball in your hands . place the golf ball sized ball onto a plate and make another ball . keep doing this until the entire mixture of ingredients has been turned into balls .

mix tahini lemon garlic and salt .
pour the lemon juice and salt into the tahini . use a whisk to mix together .

mix tahini lemon garlic and salt .
mix salt , lemon , garlic , and tahini together . whisk it until everything is combined .

mix tahini lemon garlic and salt .
start with a bowl of tahini . get 1 clove of chopped garlic and put in a bowl with 1/2 teaspoon salt . put 1/4 cup lemon juice into a bowl . pour the salt and the lemon juice into the bowl of tahini . next pour the salt and garlic mixture and the lemon juice into the tahini . use a whisk to stir all the ingredients until they are mixed well .

mix the cucumber garlic mint yogurt and black pepper .
take a medium sized bowl . add grated cucumber in to the bowl . add little cut pieces of garlic in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of mint leaves and a cup of yogurt in to the bowl . add little pepper powder in to the bowl and mix .

mix the cucumber garlic mint yogurt and black pepper .
place small cubed up cucumber in a medium size mixing bowl . add one clove of garlic that has been crushed to the cucumber . add 2 tablespoons of mint that has been chopped to the cucumber and garlic . measure 1 cup of yogurt and add it to the same bowl . mix everything together with a spoon . add ground black pepper and mix again .

mix the cucumber garlic mint yogurt and black pepper .
add 1 crushed garlic clove to the bowl . put in 2 tablespoons of chopped mint . add 1 cup of yogurt . use a spoon to mix everything together . add some crushed black pepper and then mix again .

mix the chickpeas onions garlic coriander and spices together .
add the chickpeas to a medium sized bowl . use a spatula to get the onion and garlic out of your food processor and on top of the chickpeas . now add your previously chopped coriander to bowl . now you can add all the spices to the mixture . use your hand to mix it all together making sure it 's all incorporated .

mix the chickpeas onions garlic coriander and spices together .
get a large bowl and have all of your ingredients ready . add the chickpeas , onions , garlic , coriander , and spices all to the large bowl . mix well with your hands so that all the ingredients are combined .

mix the chickpeas onions garlic coriander and spices together .
pour the chickpeas evenly into the bowl . pour the onions evenly onto the chickpeas in the same bowl . pour the garlic , coriander and other spices into the bowl . use your hands and gently mix the ingredients all together , be sure to scoop down ! you 're done mixing when you can see bits of onion all through the chickpeas end to end , top to bottom .

add some diced vegetables and ground beef to a sauce pan .
take the sauce pan on the stove . take the ground beef in a bowl . cut the vegetables in to small pieces . add the vegetables in to the sauce pan . add the ground beef in to the pan .

add some diced vegetables and ground beef to a sauce pan .
pour chopped vegetables into pan with oil in it on stove . stir vegetables a few minutes and add bay leaf . when vegetables are soft , add thyme and beef to the pan and stir .

add some diced vegetables and ground beef to a sauce pan .
take the vegetables and clean it properly . cut the vegetables into small pieces . add the diced vegetables into the sauce pan . toss the vegetables for some time . add the ground beef into the pan .

cover the sauce pan .
now , you 'll have a hot pot and you 'll need to cover it . get the lid to the pot out . make sure the lid fits the pot . carefully , place the lid onto the pot . this will help you to simmer your ingredients .

cover the sauce pan .
place the lid on top of the pan . wait 1 hour .

cover the sauce pan .
place lid on pot . simmer for 1 hour .

blend the potatoes .
now take your mixer and set your potatoes in larger pan and begin mixing . if your potatoes are dry , you can add a little milk . make sure your potatoes are in a tall pan so they do not go every where . mix for about 2 minutes or until they are smooth .

blend the potatoes .
put the mixer into the pan . mix the potatoes . if needed , add some more milk as you blend the potatoes .

blend the potatoes .
you will need a mixer to mix the potatoes . put the potatoes in a high sided bowl . mix the potatoes with the mixer , add milk if they seem too dry . mix until the potatoes are smooth .

cover the dish with mashed potatoes .
use a spoon to put the mashed potatoes on top of the dish . use the spoon to spread the mashed potatoes in an even layer across the top . make sure to flatten them so they are equal .

cover the dish with mashed potatoes .
using a spoon cover the dish with mashed potatoes . make sure the dish is covered and even using a spoon .

cover the dish with mashed potatoes .
mix the mashed potatoes with your wooden spoon . take a big scoop of the potatoes and slowly and gently spread the potatoes on top of your mixture in the pan . repeat adding the potatoes and spreading out the potatoes until the whole thing is covered .

cook it in the oven and then serve .
turn the dial of the oven to 400 . let it beep . carefully put the pan in the oven and do not touch the hot oven .

cook it in the oven and then serve .
take the pan and carefully place it in a 400 degree f preheated oven . cook for 15 minutes . take out with hot pads and place it on top of the oven . serve using a spatula in desired portions .

cook it in the oven and then serve .
pick up the pan with both your hands . place it into the oven carefully not to burn yourself . cook it for 15 minutes at 400 degrees fahrenheit or 200 celsius . once your timer is off you can carefully remove it from the oven using oven mitts . carefully avoiding touching the pan as it 's very hot , use a spatula to cut a piece of the cottage pie and carefully place it into a dish .

add milk and pepper while mashing the potatoes .
put parsnips and rutabaga into a bowl . add milk to the bowl from a cup . then add the pepper from a small bowl . next use a potato masher and mash the parsnips and rutabaga .

add milk and pepper while mashing the potatoes .
find a potato masher . remove drained vegetables from heat . while still hot add in milk and cumin . mash until smooth .

add milk and pepper while mashing the potatoes .
put parsnips and rutabaga in a bowl . add milk and cumin to the parsnips and rutabaga . use a potato masher to mash the mixture .

add salt tomato paste and stock to the pan .
today we are preparing curried cottage pie with spiced parsnip mash , and you are in the kitchen with bloggin ' out . using a large saucepan that is on and cooking , and a wooden spoon , sprinkle the flour into the cooking sauce . the flour should be pre - measured and ready to toss in . stir after adding . next , add the pre - measured curry powder , lightly sprinkling it in to get it spread evenly . stir . next , add the tomato paste from the tube . you will want to squeeze the tube , giving it about a three second squeeze , about a large tablespoon . stir . next , add the pre - measured beef stock . continue to stir .

add salt tomato paste and stock to the pan .
add the flour , curry powder and tomato paste ( from a tube ) to the pot , while continuing to stir . add the pre - measured beef stock to the pot , and stir it in .

add salt tomato paste and stock to the pan .
pour the cup of tomato paste in the pan carefully . add the salt to the pan .

boil peeled potato and sweet potato in water .
bring a large pot of water to a low boil . pour chopped potatoes into pot .

boil peeled potato and sweet potato in water .
take your potatoes and slowly put them into your boiling water . the peeled potatoes should not be dropped in real fast or it may send hot water everywhere and burn you .

boil peeled potato and sweet potato in water .
put water into a pot and put on the stove . turn stove on high . wait for water to bubble and boil . put your peeled potatoes and sweet potatoes in a bowl . slowly put potatoes one by one into the boiling water .

pour the mixture into a baking tray .
set a baking tray on the counter . pour the pot with the mixture carefully into the baking dish .

pour the mixture into a baking tray .
have a baking dish available . pour the mixture from the pot into the baking dish .

pour the mixture into a baking tray .
get your baking dish ready . now add the hot mixture carefully to your pot . use a wooden spoon to get all of the mixture into your dish . then place your dirty pot into the sink .

drain and dry the potatoes .
take pot off hot stove . strain water out of pot into sink . pour potatoes into bowl .

drain and dry the potatoes .
you now will want to take your pot of potatoes from the stove and carry them over to the sink . we will slowly pour them into our colander and strain them . be careful , the steam and water will be very hot .

drain and dry the potatoes .
take your cooked potatoes carefully to your strainer in the sink . carefully pour the potatoes and water into the strainer . bring your bowl you 're going to use to mash the potatoes in close to the sink and your strainer . give the potatoes a shake over the sink to make sure all the water has strained . carefully pour the potatoes into your bowl .

add red bell pepper green onion and garlic to a hot pan and stir .
add the red bell pepper , green onion , and garlic to the hot pan . stir them in the pan with a spoon to soften . add 1/4 cup of spiced scallions to the pan and stir . add 2 cloves of chopped garlic to the pan and stir .

add red bell pepper green onion and garlic to a hot pan and stir .
have the pan get hot on the stove first . take handfuls of the veggies and slowly add the cut up vegetables to the pan . mix them together with a wooden spoon .

add red bell pepper green onion and garlic to a hot pan and stir .
take a pan and heat the pan . cut the bell pepper in to thin strips . add the bell pepper in to the pan . cut the green onion in to small pieces and add it to the pan . cut the garlic in to small pieces and add it to the pan .

add frozen peas tomato paste turmeric and white pepper to the pan and stir .
add frozen peas in to the pan . mix and cook it for few minutes . add tomato paste in to the pan and mix . add a teaspoon of turmeric powder and mix . add white pepper powder in to the pan and mix well .

add frozen peas tomato paste turmeric and white pepper to the pan and stir .
use a spatula . scoop out the frozen peas tomato paste turmeric and white pepper in the pan slowly without spilling . use the spatula to mix everything all up .

add frozen peas tomato paste turmeric and white pepper to the pan and stir .
add peas to the pan with the chilies . add 1 teaspoon of tomato paste . then add 2 teaspoons of curry powder . next add 1/8 teaspoon of turmeric and white pepper . stir the ingredients in the pan as you add more .

add rice noodles to the pan .
prepare rice noodles according to package directions . put two packets of cooked rice noodles into the pan . use a wooden spatula to stir noodles in pan .

add rice noodles to the pan .
take a pan on a stove . cook the vegetables in the pan . take the rice noodles and boil them . remove excess water from the noodles . add the rice noodles in to the pan .

add rice noodles to the pan .
pick up all of the rice noodles from the bowl with your hand . place the noodles on top of the items that are already in the pan , being careful not to touch anything that is hot .

stir the rice noodles with the vegetables .
use your spatula and stir the noodles with the vegetables . mix together so they are all mixed up .

stir the rice noodles with the vegetables .
first soak the rice noodles in a little bit of water for a couple of minutes . then add to pan and stir into the ingredients in the pan with a wooden slatted spoon . next add a cup of vegetable stock .

stir the rice noodles with the vegetables .
get a wooden spoon . use it to slowly mix around the noodles with the vegetables . mixed everything together evenly .

add chicken stock to the pan .
use a spoon to add the chicken stock to the pan . stir the mixture in the pan together .

add chicken stock to the pan .
take a pan on the stove . cook veggies and noodles in the pan . take chicken stock in a mug . pour chicken stock in to the pan . mix the noodles and chicken stock .

add chicken stock to the pan .
take your measuring cup with chicken stock and pour it evenly over the noodles in the pan . stir together .

place the meatballs in the sauce .
take a pan on the stove . fry the meat balls in the pan . cook the sauce in another pan . take the meat balls from the pan . add the meatballs in to the sauce pan .

place the meatballs in the sauce .
use a spatula to remove the meatballs from the pan . place the meatballs into the sauce pan .

place the meatballs in the sauce .
once the meatballs are browned , remove them from the frying pan . place the meatballs into the marinara sauce . stir the sauce until the meatballs are coated .

add oil and herbs to a pan .
add oil to the pan by using a spoon . pour the oil from the spoon all around the pan . sprinkle the herbs into the heated oil that is in the pan . stir the herbs around in the oil by carefully moving the pan around .

add oil and herbs to a pan .
place a pan on the stove over a medium flame . using a measuring spoon carefully add 3 teaspoons of oil and 1/4 teaspoon of mixed herbs to the pan .

add oil and herbs to a pan .
use a spoon to put the oil into the pan . put the herbs into the pan with the oil . lift the pan and tilt to mix the oil and herbs .

add garlic and tomatoes to the pan .
add chopped garlic to hot pan and stir and cook for about two minutes . add the chopped tomatoes to the hot pan and stir .

add garlic and tomatoes to the pan .
cut the garlic into small pieces . add the garlic into the pan . cook the garlic for 2 minutes . add the tomatoes into the pan .

add garlic and tomatoes to the pan .
pour the cut up garlic into the pan . add tomatoes to the pan . stir everything with a spatula .

add oregano pepper salt paprika tomato puree water and sugar to the sauce .
use a spoon to scoop in some oregano pepper salt and paprika . pour tomato puree water and sugar to the sauce . mix everything with a spatula .

add oregano pepper salt paprika tomato puree water and sugar to the sauce .
add oregano to the pan . put in pepper and salt . add paprika to the mixture and stir in . pour in tomato puree and water . add 1 teaspoon sugar and mix everything together with a stirring spoon .

add oregano pepper salt paprika tomato puree water and sugar to the sauce .
add dried oregano , pepper , salt to the pan and stir . add paprika , tomato puree and water to the pan and stir . add a small teaspoon of sugar to the pan and stir again .

add oil and onions to the pan .
put 3 spoons of oil in the pan pouring the spoons in circles on the pan . drop in the cut up onions to the pan .

add oil and onions to the pan .
place a pan on the stove , turn the stove on to a medium heat and wait 2 minutes for the pan to heat up . measure about 3 teaspoons of your olive oil with a spoon and dump into the pan . add the onions and garlic you cut up to the pan , and use the spatula to stir the onions and garlic . you will hear a sizzling sound .

add oil and onions to the pan .
put 2 or 3 teaspoons of oil and add it to the pan . spread the oil around the pan . add chopped onions into the pan . stir the onions around the pan .

add pasta to the pan .
add the cooked spaghetti to the pan with oil . toss the spaghetti around with tongs to get the oil all over the noodles . the oil will help loosen up the noddles and make it more manageable .

add pasta to the pan .
make sure the oil is spread across the entire bottom of the pan , and then add the cooked spaghetti to the oiled pan . use tongs to gently shake , lift , and turn the clumps of noodles , so that the oil starts to coat most of each noodle . when you can lift some noodles out of the pan without all the noodles being stuck to them , you have mixed the oil in well enough . this will allow you to separate the noodles into servings when the meal is ready . for an easier method , next time put oil in the pan while you strain your pasta in a colander . then return your noodles to the now oily pan , and add a bit more oil on top of them . lift the noodles using a fork , over and over until they are coated in oil . this works very well because the noodles wo n't have much time for the starch to cool and stick to other noodles .

add pasta to the pan .
hold the pasta over the pan . scoop it out with the tongs into the pan .

add oil to a pan .
turn the stove on to medium and let the pan warm up . add a few spoonfuls of oil to the pan .

add oil to a pan .
add a teaspoon of oil to pan . then add meat . cook the meat until brown . add spice the meat . then add tomato sauce and allow to simmer for about ten minutes .

add oil to a pan .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan on the stove . take some oil in a bowl . add 3 tablespoons of oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan .

form the meat into balls and fry .
pour oil into a pan . roll meat into meatballs . set the balls onto the frying pan . cook the balls until they are brown .

form the meat into balls and fry .
using your hands , roll the meat into a ball . put the balls into the pan to fry .

form the meat into balls and fry .
using your hands , form the meat into small balls . you do n't want to make the meatballs too large , so make them a little smaller than golf balls . put the formed meatballs into a hot pan with a little oil . cook the meatballs until the pink color is gone .

add basil leaves to the sauce .
add a few basil leaves to the pan . use a spoon to mix the basil into the sauce .

add basil leaves to the sauce .
get fresh basil leaves and wash them . add a handful of leaves to the pot of sauce .

add basil leaves to the sauce .
get basil leaves . place a few leaves into the meat sauce , just enough to cover the top roughly . turn up the heat and let the sauce take in the flavor . mix leaves into sauce using a spatula .

mix breadcrumbs with the meat .
add breadcrumbs to the bowl . use a fork to mix the breadcrumbs together with the meat .

mix breadcrumbs with the meat .
in a bowl , pour some breadcrumbs , about 1/2 cup , on top of the ground meat . use a fork to mix the meat and breadcrumbs until it is combined .

mix breadcrumbs with the meat .
take a small mixing bowl . take some meat in to the bowl . take some bread crumbs in a cup . add the bread crumbs in to the meat . mix them together with a spoon .

mix garlic salt pepper worcestershire sauce and an egg with the meat .
add garlic , salt , pepper and worcestershire sauce to the meat . whisk and egg and add to the meat . use a fork to mix everything together .

mix garlic salt pepper worcestershire sauce and an egg with the meat .
use a spoon to add some cut up garlic to the contents of the bowl . then add some salt and pepper with a spoon . next add some worcestershire sauce to the bowl . use a fork to gently mix one egg and then pour into the bowl with other contents . mix all the ingredients together gently with a fork .

mix garlic salt pepper worcestershire sauce and an egg with the meat .
take a bowl and add some meat in the bowl . add some garlic salt and pepper powder in to the bowl . add a teaspoon of worcestershire sauce in to the bowl . add one beaten egg in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl properly .

fold the tortilla into a roll and tuck it at the ends .
fold the tortilla , roll and press it . after rolling , tuck in the ends .

fold the tortilla into a roll and tuck it at the ends .
pull the ends of the burrito up toward the center until almost touching . bring the side of the burrito nearest you up to the center while you hold the ends up . press the bottom edge of the burrito down toward the ingredients and tuck it in underneath , being sure to secure the ends . pull the edge under the ingredients until it feels secure , then continue rolling it toward the top edge until you have one big roll .

fold the tortilla into a roll and tuck it at the ends .
fold the sides of the tortilla in . now fold in the other ends and roll it up .

top it off with some salsa guacamole and a spoon of sour cream .
the next topping to spoon onto the burrito filling in the middle of the tortilla is salsa . add one or two spoonfuls of salsa evenly on the filling mixture . next , add a spoonful of guacamole . use your spoon to spread it evenly across the filling mixture . next add sour cream . use the spoon to drop little dollops of sour cream on top of the filling mixture . be careful not to use too much filling , as that will make it hard to wrap the burrito . make sure there is an inch of bare tortilla at one end of the filling , and two inches of bare tortilla at the other end of the filling . when you have added all of the toppings , we can move on to wrapping the burrito .

top it off with some salsa guacamole and a spoon of sour cream .
on top of the burrito mixture add a spoon full of salsa . then add a spoonful of guacamole to the top of that . and at last add a spoon of sour cream .

top it off with some salsa guacamole and a spoon of sour cream .
with a spoon take some salsa and spoon it onto your mixture . with a spoon take some guacamole and spoon it onto the mixture . with a spoon take some sour cream and spread it onto your mixture .

repeat the steps for each tortilla and serve .
place your ingredients , in the same way , onto the center of the next burrito shell . add the beans , rice , guacamole , salsa and sour cream . you may add cheese if you wish . pull the ends into the center and wrap the side closest to you over the ends . squeeze the top down over the ingredients and then roll it over until it is completely wrapped . cut the burrito diagonally and serve .

repeat the steps for each tortilla and serve .
spread the refried beans on the tortilla . add mexican rice . place guacamole . put cheese on the burrito . roll up the burrito starting with the edge .

repeat the steps for each tortilla and serve .
use a spoon to spread refried beans in the center of the tortilla . next add the mexican rice , salsa , guacamole , sour cream and cheese . then fold each side over and roll to keep all the stuffing inside . use a sharp knife to cut in half .

spread the refried beans on the tortillas and add the cooked mexican rice over it .
take tortillas on a plate . take some refried beans paste in a bowl . spread some refried beans on to the burrito . take mexican cooked rice in a bowl . spread some mexican rice in to the tortillas .

spread the refried beans on the tortillas and add the cooked mexican rice over it .
place the tortilla on a cutting board or counter top . put 2 tablespoons of refried beans into the middle of the tortilla and spread it into a rectangle shape . put 2 large tablespoons of the mexican rice on top of the refried beans and spread the rice to cover the refried beans .

spread the refried beans on the tortillas and add the cooked mexican rice over it .
use a spoon to spread the refried beans in the center of the tortilla . use the spoon to spread the mexican rice on top of the refried beans .

place the chicken on a bowl of rice and garnish with spring onion .
scoop the chicken with a big spoon and put it on a bowl of rice . sprinkle some spring onions on top .

place the chicken on a bowl of rice and garnish with spring onion .
put rice in a bowl . spoon the chicken on top of the rice . put spring onion on top .

place the chicken on a bowl of rice and garnish with spring onion .
spoon a serving of cooked white rice into an individual bowl / . use a spoon to scoop up 2 spoonfuls of chicken stir - fry from the cooking pan . spoon the chicken onto the white rice in the bowl . using a knife or scissors , slice a spring onion ( green onion ) into half - inch pieces . garnish the dish by putting the spring onion slices ( green part , not white part ) on top of the chicken in the bowl .

add soy sauce chinese rice wine corn starch to a bowl of chicken .
to your small bowl of chopped chicken , measure and add about a tablespoon of soy sauce . then measure about a tablespoon of chinese rice wine or dry sherry and pour it over the chicken . measure about 1 tablespoon of corn starch and add it to the chicken . use a spoon to stir everything together with the chicken and then set the bowl aside .

add soy sauce chinese rice wine corn starch to a bowl of chicken .
measure a tablespoon of soy sauce , and add to a bowl of chicken that is cut into cubes . measure a tablespoon of rice wine or dry sherry into the bowl of chicken . measure a tablespoon or corn flour or corn starch and add . mix well with the spoon . leave to the side until you are ready to cook .

add soy sauce chinese rice wine corn starch to a bowl of chicken .
add 1 tablespoon of soy sauce to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of rice wine or sherry to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of corn starch to the bowl . use a spoon to mix them all together .

add the red chilies chicken garlic ginger peanuts spring onions and sauce to a pan and stir .
add the red chilies to pan with a little oil . next add in the chicken and toss it around with a spatula . once the chicken is brown , add garlic , ginger , peanuts , and some spring onions and some of the sauce to the pan . save some of the onions for later . continue to mix and stir everything with your spatula .

add the red chilies chicken garlic ginger peanuts spring onions and sauce to a pan and stir .
pour the red chilies into your wok . add the chicken to your wok and use your spatula to mix with the chilies . make sure the heat on the stove is n't up too high so you can slowly cook the chicken without burning your chilies . add your garlic , ginger , peanuts , spring onions , and sauce once the chicken has browned . keep stirring until everything is coated with the oil and cooked .

add the red chilies chicken garlic ginger peanuts spring onions and sauce to a pan and stir .
take a pan and heat it . add some oil in to the pan . add some red chilies and some peanuts in to the pan . add some chicken , ginger and garlic in to the pan . add some cut pieces of spring onions in to the pan and mix .

cut the red chilies in half and remove the seeds .
using a knife , carefully cut the chilies straight down the middle . using a shaking motion , remove the seeds from the chilies .

cut the red chilies in half and remove the seeds .
cut the red chilies in half lengthwise . shake them out or gently scrape with tip of knife . discard seeds , and use red chilies .

cut the red chilies in half and remove the seeds .
use a knife to cut the red chilies in half . cut the chilies along the long end . take the seeds out of the center of the chilies .

add soy sauce chinese rice vinegar sugar water and corn starch to a bowl and mix .
put in 2 tablespoons of soy sauce . add 1 teaspoon of rice vinegar . put in 1 teaspoon of sugar . add 2 tablespoons of water . add 1 teaspoon of corn flower and mix everything together with a spoon .

add soy sauce chinese rice vinegar sugar water and corn starch to a bowl and mix .
take a small mixing bowl and add soy sauce in to the bowl . add some chinese rice and vinegar in to the bowl . add little sugar in to the bowl . add some water in to the bowl . add little corn starch in to the bowl and mix them .

add soy sauce chinese rice vinegar sugar water and corn starch to a bowl and mix .
pour in the soy sauce chinese rice vinegar sugar water and corn starch into the same bowl . mix everything with a spoon very well .

slice the spring onions into thin pieces .
use a knife to cut the spring onions . slice the onions into medium to small sized pieces .

slice the spring onions into thin pieces .
put the spring onions on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to slice the spring onions .

slice the spring onions into thin pieces .
put spring onions on a cutting board . grab a knife . cut spring onions into thin pieces with the knife .

heat some butter in the pan and pour in some mixture in to cook .
place some butter into a pan . move the butter around the frying pan evenly . place the mixture on the frying pan and begin to cook .

heat some butter in the pan and pour in some mixture in to cook .
make sure the pan is on medium - high heat . if the pan is too hot , the butter will melt too quickly and burn . get the butter we measured out at the beginning , and put it into the pan . pick the pan up and tilt it back and forth , so that the butter slides around the pan and covers the entire bottom of the pan . set the pan back down on the stove until the butter begins to gently bubble . this should only take a few seconds . if you are unsure of how long to wait , count to 12 . add large dollops of the batter to the pan . do n't add too many at once ! be sure to leave about an inch between each dollop , because they will expand while they cook , and we do n't want to have siamese pancakes , now do we ? .

heat some butter in the pan and pour in some mixture in to cook .
take the pancake mixture and stir together . add butter to pan . then add pancake mixture . allow to heat up . when pancakes are ready you need to flip and cook on both sides .

cook some bacon on a pan .
take a pan . place it on the pan . heat the pan . cut the bacon in to small pieces . add the bacon in to the pan and cook .

cook some bacon on a pan .
set the bacon onto a pan . let the bacon cook . turn over the bacon and allow both sides to cook .

cook some bacon on a pan .
put the bacon into a hot pan . do n't cook it fully because you have to allow for extra cooking time .

grate the potatoes and rinse and drain them on a towel .
use a grater and grate the potatoes into a pan . rinse the potatoes off with water . pour the potatoes onto a towel . use the towel to dry the extra water off of the potatoes .

grate the potatoes and rinse and drain them on a towel .
carefully use a potato peeler to peel the skins from the potatoes . use one hand to hold the grater by its handle . rest the grater against a table or counter top so that it does n't move while your work . hold the potato in your other hand . place the potato at the top of the grater , and drag it downwards over the grater . do n't drag the potato upwards , as that wo n't grate your potato and may even damage it and cause large chunks to break off . always drag the potato downwards against the grate only . when the potato becomes small , start grating more slowly so that you can watch closely and make sure you do n't cut your hand while grating . it is okay to throw away the potato nubs at the end , or to use a knife to cut them into strips . once you have enough grated potato , rinse it in very cold water , pour the potato onto a tea towel , spread the potato out evenly , and fold the other half of the towel over and press on it to remove the extra water from the potato strips .

grate the potatoes and rinse and drain them on a towel .
take a potato and remove the peel of the potato . take a grater on a strainer bowl . grate the potato in to small pieces . wash the potato and lay a towel on the board . pour the potato in to the towel and rub them .. .

serve them with the bacon and scrambled eggs .
mix the pancakes according to the directions on the box . add the mixture to the pan . flip with a spatula . turn on both sides . repeat and add to a plate .

serve them with the bacon and scrambled eggs .
put bacon and scrambled eggs on a plate . take the cakes out of the pan with a spatula . set the cakes on the plate .

serve them with the bacon and scrambled eggs .
flip them over with a spatula to make sure they are cooked on both sides . serve them with scrambled eggs and bacon .

add some salt and pepper to the milk and whisk around .
the milk should be in the measuring cup . add a number of twists of fresh black pepper to the milk based on how you want it to taste . add salt to the milk . whisk the salt , pepper and milk around in the measuring cup using a fork .

add some salt and pepper to the milk and whisk around .
take a cup . add some milk in to the cup . add some salt in to the milk . add some pepper powder in to the milk . whisk the milk .

add some salt and pepper to the milk and whisk around .
add milk into a measuring cup . add some pepper by grinding into it . add some salt into the milk . whisk all the ingredients together .

crack an egg in 1/2 cup milk .
tap the egg against the cup to crack . open the egg over the cup so the egg falls in the milk .

crack an egg in 1/2 cup milk .
pour 1/2 of milk into a big measuring glass . crack one free - range egg and let it fall into the milk . throw away or set aside the eggshell .

crack an egg in 1/2 cup milk .
put 1/2 cup of milk into a large measuring cup . crack one egg into the measuring cup with 1/2 cup milk .

mix everything well in the bowl .
stir everything in the bowl very well . make sure everything in the bowl is mixed well .

mix everything well in the bowl .
using a spoon mix the mixture . make sure it is well incorporated , you do not need to be gentle when mixing .

mix everything well in the bowl .
use a spoon . mix everything really good in the bowl with the spoon .

cover and cook under medium heat .
turn the stove burner on to medium , and place your pan on the burner . cover the pan with a glass lid .

cover and cook under medium heat .
cook on medium heat . carefully place the lid to the pan on and wait a few minutes .

cover and cook under medium heat .
cover the pot with a lid . turn the knob to medium heat or halfway up . let the meat cook .

peel the potatoes and cut them to halves .
first , set out all of your ingredients from the recipe . take your three potatoes and using a peeler peel the skins off . using a knife , carefully cut each potato in half . divide the cut potatoes in half . you will half of them .

peel the potatoes and cut them to halves .
use a potato peeler or knife to cut off the peel from the potato . peel 3 potatoes . cut the potatoes into two pieces .

peel the potatoes and cut them to halves .
use a knife to peel three potatoes . put the potatoes on a cutting board and use a knife to cut them in half .

flip the stuff over when the bottom is done .
flip the food over on the pan with a spatula . flip over when the bottom is done .

flip the stuff over when the bottom is done .
once bubbling in pan . flip with spatula . continue cooking until cooked evenly .

flip the stuff over when the bottom is done .
use a spatula to turn over the cakes . cook until each side is brown .

mix the potato baking powder and flour .
add one teaspoon of baking powder to the bowl . then add the flour to the bowl . use a spoon to quickly mix together .

mix the potato baking powder and flour .
take a small bowl . add the grated potato in to the bowl . add a teaspoon of baking powder in to the bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

mix the potato baking powder and flour .
add 1 teaspoon of baking powder . put flower into the bowl . use a spoon to mix the ingredients together in the bowl .

boil a kettle of water and use them to boil the potatoes .
place some water into a kettle and turn it on . once it is boiling , pour the hot water in the kettle over some potatoes in a pot .

boil a kettle of water and use them to boil the potatoes .
fill a kettle of water and turn it on to boil it . put the potatoes into a big pot . when the kettle is ready , carefully pour the hot water into the pot with the potatoes .

boil a kettle of water and use them to boil the potatoes .
first fill your kettle until it 's pretty full and bring it to a boil . place the potatoes in a pot . now add the boiling water with the kettle to your pot with the potatoes .

mash the boiled potatoes with some milk added .
pour milk in the pan with the boiled potatoes . use a potato masher to press down on the potatoes and milk until they are all mashed up .

mash the boiled potatoes with some milk added .
now add in the milk with your potatoes . using your masher , or a blinder if you have one , start mashing the potatoes .

mash the boiled potatoes with some milk added .
grilled the meat . prepare a bowl . put in the potatoes . add some milk . mash the potatoes .

add the cooked potatoes to the grated potato and add the milk mixture .
use a spoon to put the cooked potatoes into the grated potatoes and flour mix . add the milk and egg mixture to the potato and flour mixture . use a spoon to stir and mix well .

add the cooked potatoes to the grated potato and add the milk mixture .
add the cooked potatoes into the grated potatoes and flour mix . add in milk mixture . mix together well with a spoon .

add the cooked potatoes to the grated potato and add the milk mixture .
cook the potatoes in a pan . take the grated potatoes in a bowl . transfer the cooked potatoes in to the grated potatoes . add the milk mixture in to the bowl . mix the contents in the bowl .

spread butter on a slice of bread .
spread butter on one side of each piece of bread in a thin layer . you may use whatever kind of bread you like , but the type of bread used will change the taste of the sandwich . pre - heat a non - stick skillet on low heat .

spread butter on a slice of bread .
scoop up some butter with a butter knife . spread the butter over the bread evenly with the butter knife .

spread butter on a slice of bread .
place a square of butter on the slice of bread . use a knife to spread the butter across the bread evenly .

mix swiss cheddar and monterey jack cheese together in a bowl .
add some swiss cheese to the bowl . put in some cheddar cheese . add some monterey jack cheese to the bowl . mix all three cheese together in the bowl .

mix swiss cheddar and monterey jack cheese together in a bowl .
grab the swiss cheddar and monterey jack cheese with your hand . put each cheese in the bowl . mix everything with your hands .

mix swiss cheddar and monterey jack cheese together in a bowl .
get a small bowl . add in as much as you want of the shredded swiss , cheddar and monterey jack cheese . you may use other types of cheese if you prefer . mix the shredded cheeses together in the bowl with your hands .

place the sandwich into a hot skillet .
put the sandwich into a non - stick pan . cook the sandwich on low heat .

place the sandwich into a hot skillet .
grab the sandwich . put the sandwich into the hot pan .

place the sandwich into a hot skillet .
pick up the sandwich with your hands . carefully put the sandwich on the hot skillet . make sure the stove is on low .

cut the sandwich diagonally in half .
get a sharp knife to cut the sandwich with . using the knife , cut the sandwich in half , diagonally , from one corner to the opposite corner , creating two triangles .

cut the sandwich diagonally in half .
use a knife and carefully cut the sandwich . cut it diagonally making two sections .

cut the sandwich diagonally in half .
put the sandwich in the middle of the cutting board . get a knife from the cutting block . angle the knife over the sandwich so that the sandwich looks like a triangle on both sides . carefully cut the sandwich into two big triangles . put the knife in the sink and put the two sandwiches on a plate .

place the cheese onto one side of the bread .
take a bread slice on the board . take some cheese on a bowl . add the cheese on top of bread slice . spread the cheese evenly on the bread . place another bread on the cheese .

place the cheese onto one side of the bread .
grab 2 slices of bread , lay slices of bread on the counter . put shredded cheese on one slice of bread . put the other slice of bread on top of the bread with the cheese on it .

place the cheese onto one side of the bread .
put a slice of bread down of a plate or counter . measure out a quarter of a cup to a third of a cup of the cheese mixture . put another slice of bread on top of the cheese .

add chickpeas garlic cloves parsley squeezed lemon juice tahini paste black pepper and salt into a food processor and blend .
remove the lid from the food processor . add in the chickpeas , garlic cloves , and fresh parsley . squeeze out the juice of a whole lemon , being careful to catch the seeds before they go into the food processor . add some tahini paste and salt and pepper to taste . turn on the food processor and blend until just slightly chunky .

add chickpeas garlic cloves parsley squeezed lemon juice tahini paste black pepper and salt into a food processor and blend .
put the chickpeas into the food processor jar , then add the garlic and parsley . add the juice of on lemon in the food processor jar . cut the lemon in to halves and squeeze out all the juice . add two spoons of tahini paste into the food processor jar . add some salt and some pepper using a pepper mill in to the food processor jar . close the lid of the food processor jar and run the food processor on pulse mode so that you get a chunky mixture .

add chickpeas garlic cloves parsley squeezed lemon juice tahini paste black pepper and salt into a food processor and blend .
add chickpeas to the food processor . add in garlic cloves and parsley . squeeze in some lemon juice . add tahini paste and grind in some black pepper . add some salt and then blend everything together .

pour the mixture to a bowl and serve with sliced cucumber .
blend the mixture in a food processor . take a medium sized bowl . transfer the mixture in to the bowl . cut the cucumber in to thin slices . eat the mixture with sliced cucumber .

pour the mixture to a bowl and serve with sliced cucumber .
pour the mixture into a bowl . serve with sliced cucumbers .

pour the mixture to a bowl and serve with sliced cucumber .
use a spatula to remove the hummus from the food processor bowl . put hummus into a serving bowl . spoon some hummus on the cucumber slices and eat .

drizzle some olive oil into the processor and mix again .
measure 1 tbsp of olive oil . slowly pour olive oil in the processor . mix for 3 seconds .

drizzle some olive oil into the processor and mix again .
put some olive oil into the food processor . mix everything with the food processor .

drizzle some olive oil into the processor and mix again .
while mixing poor olive oil into the mixer . make sure the lid is on top so nothing sprays everywhere .

slice the salmon .
get a cutting board and a sharp knife . place the salmon on the cutting board , making sure the pink side is up and the silver skin is facing down so you can not see it . start at one end of the salmon and cut it into long , thin strip ( about the size of a finger ) . when cutting , make sure not to cut all the way through to the skin so the slices are only pink and no silver . place the sliced salmon on a plate .

slice the salmon .
take sharp knife . cut salmon nearly all the way and start turning knife sideways and cut off skin .

slice the salmon .
with a sharp knife , carefully cut into the salmon , but do n't cut through the skin on the bottom of the salmon . once the knife touches the skin on the bottom , turn the knife that 's still against the skin so the sharp end is facing the side with the least amount of salmon . with the knife still touching the skin and turned , carefully scrape the knife along the skin until the salmon slides off . do this again to get three slices of salmon .

spread the rice onto the seaweed .
take the seaweed on a plate . take the rice in a plate . take a spoon and place rice on seaweed . spread the rice on the seaweed . completely fill the seaweed with rice .

spread the rice onto the seaweed .
place rice on top of the nori ( seaweed ) carefully . you do n't want to tear the nori . make sure the rice is even when placed .

spread the rice onto the seaweed .
get a cutting board . place the sheet of seaweed on the cutting board . put a thin layer of cooked rice on the seaweed sheet to cover the whole sheet .

cover with plastic wrap and the mat and flip over .
take a piece of plastic and put it over the rice . make sure it is wrapped all the way around the rice . then put the special carpet on top of the plastic . then very carefully turn the carpet over being careful not to drop any rice .

cover with plastic wrap and the mat and flip over .
take a piece of plastic wrap and cover the rice . take your mat and place that on top . pick up one end of wrap and hold together with mat . hold mat , plastic wrap and seaweed wrap . carefully flip everything over so seaweed is now on top .

cover with plastic wrap and the mat and flip over .
put plastic wrap and mat on rice and seaweed . then flip the mat and plastic wrap over .

place the salmon and cucumber on the seaweed .
lay the salmon and cucumber slices on the seaweed on the side closest to you . then , start to roll the seaweed sheet .

place the salmon and cucumber on the seaweed .
ingredients need to go on the seaweed . put the sliced salmon on seaweed first . put it in lines . add cucumbers . roll seaweed .

place the salmon and cucumber on the seaweed .
lay slices of salmon on seaweed horizontally leaving large gaps in between . you may need to slice some of the salmon pieces smaller to fit on the roll and not hang off of the edge . place cucumber slices in the gaps you left . once the seaweed is topped with ingredients , begin rolling . begin rolling from the side you are closest to .

roll up and squeeze the roll .
roll the roll , using the plastic to guide it . once rolled wrap in plastic . wrap bamboo roller around roll . press to finish off the roll .

roll up and squeeze the roll .
using plastic , line the rice roller with it . next put the rice , seaweed paper and other ingredients on plastic . start to roll and keep plastic with you and not rolling into roll . once rolled , wrap in plastic . using the rise roller squeeze the roll tightly .

roll up and squeeze the roll .
roll the food to make a long tube . once rolled , squeeze the roll .

cut the roll into pieces .
first cut roll in half . then put the two halves next to each other . next cut the two halves into about 1 inch pieces .

cut the roll into pieces .
cut the roll in half first . place the rolls next to each other so you can make accurate cuts .

cut the roll into pieces .
place sushi on a cutting board . pick up a knife . slice sushi loaf in half . slice each half into one inch strips . place on plate .

combine mayonnaise and dijon mustard and add the spread to the bread .
mix the mayonnaise and dijon mustard together in a small bowl . with a butter knife , spread this mixture onto each slice of bread .

combine mayonnaise and dijon mustard and add the spread to the bread .
get a small bowl . add dijon mustard to bowl . add an equal amount of mayonnaise . mix dijon mustard and mayonnaise together . put the spread onto the bread .

combine mayonnaise and dijon mustard and add the spread to the bread .
put he mayonnaise and mustard into a bowl . the mustard is spicy , so make sure you mix it in well . now take your new mixture and spread it on top of the bread .

top the bread with ham and add grated gruyere cheese .
add pieces of ham to the 4 bread slices . add the grated gruyere cheese on top of the ham .

top the bread with ham and add grated gruyere cheese .
place ham on four pieces of bread to start your sandwiches . next you will add a little cheese on top of the ham .

top the bread with ham and add grated gruyere cheese .
get out 8 pieces of bread . put the spread on each piece of bread . add ham to four of the pieces of bread . add grated gruyere cheese to the top of the ham . put the other piece of bread on top of the cheese .

and sprinkle little pepper and top with another bread .
shake a little pepper onto each sandwich . put a slice of bread on top .

and sprinkle little pepper and top with another bread .
sprinkle each sandwich with a little pepper . top the sandwiches with a slice of bread .

and sprinkle little pepper and top with another bread .
grab your bowl of pepper and sprinkle a small about onto the sandwich . once you have done this once , you will top your sandwich off with it 's second piece of bread .

combine egg and milk soak the sandwich arrin it and put it on hot skillet and fry until golden brown .
beat an egg and combine it with the milk . put the sandwich into the bowl with the eggs and milk . turn the sandwich over and coat the other side . next add the sandwich to the hot skillet . cook until the sandwich is golden brown .

combine egg and milk soak the sandwich arrin it and put it on hot skillet and fry until golden brown .
add milk to egg and mix together . soak both sides of sandwich in egg wash . add sandwich to hot skillet . cook sandwich on each side for about 3 minutes . remove sandwich from skillet when golden brown .

combine egg and milk soak the sandwich arrin it and put it on hot skillet and fry until golden brown .
put a skillet on the stove , turn the stove on . crack eggs , pour eggs in a bowl , pour milk in the bowl with the eggs . put the sandwich in the bowl , turn the sandwich over and put it back in the bowl . take the sandwich out of the bowl , put the sandwich in the skillet , let it cook for 3 minutes . flip the sandwich over and let it cook for another 3 minutes , then take the sandwich out the skillet .

garnish with cilantro leaves and serve with rice roti or paratha .
now are going to want to garnish our dish with cilantro leaves . now we can serve this dish with some rice roti or paratha . either one will do , it is up to you . remember , this dish is slightly spicy , so warn your guests ,

garnish with cilantro leaves and serve with rice roti or paratha .
grab a handful of cilantro . sprinkle the cilantro all over the curry evenly . put this on plates with rice roti or paratha .

garnish with cilantro leaves and serve with rice roti or paratha .
sprinkle cilantro leaves over the dish . put either rice , roti , or paratha on a plate or in a bowl . use a large spoon to transfer one portion of the dish to the plate or bowl that has the rice , roti or paratha .

add chicken and mix everything well together so that chicken gets coated properly .
push in the chicken from the dish into the pan with a spatula . mix everything in the pan with the spatula .

add chicken and mix everything well together so that chicken gets coated properly .
take a pot on the stove . add the onions and fry them . cut the chicken in to thin pieces . add the chicken in to the pan . mix the chicken to get it coated properly .

add chicken and mix everything well together so that chicken gets coated properly .
add the chicken to the mixture to the pan . stir it around with a spoon so the chicken is coated .

remove the fat and skin of the chicken and keep it aside .
remove the skin from the chicken . remove the fat from the chicken . place it on a cutting board .

remove the fat and skin of the chicken and keep it aside .
with a sharp knife , remove the skin from the chicken . place the knife under the skin and loosen any of the places where it is attached to the meat . the fat is usually separate from the skin and is white or yellowish . slice that off to and set it aside .

remove the fat and skin of the chicken and keep it aside .
with a knife carefully slice off the fat from the chicken . with a knife carefully slice the skin off the chicken .

add 1 tsp of curry powder and 1 tbsp of tomato paste and mix well .
sprinkle curry powder in to the mixture . stir it all together . add one tablespoon of tomato paste and stir it all together .

add 1 tsp of curry powder and 1 tbsp of tomato paste and mix well .
cook the contents of the pan on the stove . add about 1 tablespoon of curry powder in to the pan . add 1 tablespoon of tomato paste in to the pan . take a big spatula . mix everything properly .

add 1 tsp of curry powder and 1 tbsp of tomato paste and mix well .
put in 1 teaspoon of curry powder . stir the curry powder in to the pan . then add 1 tablespoon of tomato paste . use a spoon to mix everything together as it cooks in the pan .

add oil cumin seeds and then chopped onions to a wok and fry .
set the chicken pieces to the side . put 2 to 3 tablespoons oil in the wok and put on stove to to heat oil . put the cumin seeds into the oil . add chopped onion to the cumin seeds and oil , stir with large spoon . next , add some ginger garlic paste and some spices .

add oil cumin seeds and then chopped onions to a wok and fry .
add 2 to 3 tablespoons of oil . put in 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds . put in 1 chopped onions . stir the mixture adding in spices and is cooks .

add oil cumin seeds and then chopped onions to a wok and fry .
take a pan and add some oil in the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add a tablespoon of cumin seeds in to the oil . cut the onions in to small pieces . add the onions in to the pan and fry them .

add 1 - 2 cups of water based on the consistency required and cook for 15 - 20 minutes .
measure 2 cups of water into a measuring cup . pour 1 to 2 cups of water into the hot pan . the amount of water you add with determine the thickness of the curry . use a spoon to stir and allow chicken to simmer .

add 1 - 2 cups of water based on the consistency required and cook for 15 - 20 minutes .
add 1 - 2 cups of water . if you want a thicker gravy , add less water . if you want your gravy to be thin , add more water . stir and simmer for 15 - 20 minutes , until the gravy has thickened .

add 1 - 2 cups of water based on the consistency required and cook for 15 - 20 minutes .
add 1 - 2 cups of water into the chicken bowl . add water to make it concentrated or diluted . cover the chicken with lid . cook it for 15 - 20 minutes .

add ginger garlic paste salt turmeric and dried red chilies mix and cook .
add one spoon of ginger garlic into the onions . add salt into the pan . add turmeric powder into the pan with onions . add dried chilies to the pan . mix all the ingredients together for 4 - 5 minutes .

add ginger garlic paste salt turmeric and dried red chilies mix and cook .
add some turmeric powder in to the pan . add some dried chilies in to the pan and mix . add some ginger garlic paste in to the pan . add some salt in to the pan . mix everything in the pan and cook .

add ginger garlic paste salt turmeric and dried red chilies mix and cook .
put in 1 tablespoon of ginger garlic paste . add 1 teaspoon of salt . put in 1/2 teaspoon of turmeric . then add some dried red chilies . then mix together everything with a spoon while it cooks .

add onions to the bratwurst in the pan and stir .
add the onions to the bratwurst in the pan and stir a bit with tongs . cook everything until the onions become soft .

add onions to the bratwurst in the pan and stir .
put onions into pan with bratwurst . use tongs to stir . continue cooking until onions are soft .

add onions to the bratwurst in the pan and stir .
place your bratwurst in the bottom of the pan on the stove . add your onions to the pan with the bratwurst . use tongs to stir them together while they are cooking .

chop the cabbage .
using a chef knife , start cutting the cabbage into strips . turn the cabbage in different directions as you are cutting the cabbage . make sure to cut in the direction away from your hand .

chop the cabbage .
get the head of cabbage and take the outside leaves off . turn on the water and put the cabbage under the water . dry off the cabbage with a paper towel . ask and adult to cut the cabbage in small slices . if there is not adult with you , get a plastic knife and practice cutting one leaf at a time .

chop the cabbage .
put cabbage on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut cabbage into thin strips .

continue chopping the cabbage .
take a knife . cut the cabbage into small pieces to look like shredded lettuce .

continue chopping the cabbage .
use a knife on a cutting board and carefully finish chopping all of the cabbage into slices . make sure it is all chopped up .

continue chopping the cabbage .
take your knife and carefully chop the cabbage . take a sharp knife , and carefully chop up the cabbage into smaller pieces .

continue chopping the cabbage .
place cabbage on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut cabbage into strips .

continue chopping the cabbage .
use a knife to cut the cabbage into smaller circles . continue cutting the cabbage until it is piled in small pieces .

continue chopping the cabbage .
cut up cabbage with a knife . cut up cabbage .

add the cabbage tomatoes and beer to the pan .
use your hands to put the chopped cabbage in the frying pan with the meat . carefully pour the tomato soup over the cabbage . slowly pour a bottle of beer over the top of the meat , cabbage and soup . if you have another green such as swiss chard you may use that instead of the cabbage .

add the cabbage tomatoes and beer to the pan .
cut the cabbage in to thin strips . take a pan on the stove . add the cabbage in to the pan . add the tomato paste in to the pan . now add the beer in to the pan and mix .

add the cabbage tomatoes and beer to the pan .
put the cabbage in the pan . put the tomatoes in the pan . pour the beer in the pan .

season the cabbage with salt and pepper .
put some salt onto the cabbage . put some pepper onto the cabbage .

season the cabbage with salt and pepper .
pick up a small amount of salt by pinching it with your fingers . sprinkle the salt over the cabbage in the pot . pick up a small amount of black pepper by pinching it with your fingers . sprinkle the pepper over the cabbage in the pot .

season the cabbage with salt and pepper .
1 pinch of salt . 1 pinch of pepper .

transfer the bratwurst and cabbage to plates .
take a tongs and put the noodles onto a plate . take the bratwurst with the tongs and put them onto a plate .

transfer the bratwurst and cabbage to plates .
place a single sausage on a plate . add the cooked cabbage dish to a plate . using a knife , cut the cornmeal as if it were a pie .

transfer the bratwurst and cabbage to plates .
take the bratwurst and cabbage in a pan . take 2 plates and a tongs . take bratwurst and cabbage in to one plate . take another plate . add bratwurst and cabbage in to the plate .

cut the cornbread .
use a knife to cut a piece of pie . use a spatula to hold in place and then remove the piece you prefer .

cut the cornbread .
slice cornbread into triangles . serve and enjoy .

cut the cornbread .
using a knife , cut the cornbread by slicing all the way across from one side of the pan to the other . next , move over a few inches and do the same thing again . do this until the whole thing is cut into triangles . it should look like a birthday cake after it 's cut .

flip the foie gras over .
using a spatula flip the foie gras over . make sure it cooks on both sides .

flip the foie gras over .
use a spatula to turn the foie gras over . use your fingers to make flipping easier .

flip the foie gras over .
use a spatula to flip over the foie gras . fry the second side of the foie gras .

place the foie gras in the pan .
grab the foie gras block with your hand . carefully place the foie gras on the pan .

place the foie gras in the pan .
make sure your pan is hot . place the foie gras into the pan , being careful not to let oil spatter up onto you .

place the foie gras in the pan .
put the foie gras into a hot pan . the pan should sizzle when you put the foie gras in the pan .

remove the foie gras from the pan .
get a large spatula . while the pan is still sizzling , put the spatula under the meat . lift it up carefully and set it down on a plate to cool .

remove the foie gras from the pan .
turn off the heat under the pan careful of the hot oil in the pan , do not panic if a little splatter hits you . bring the landing plate or cutting surface for the foie gras as close to your pan as you can safely have it . hold the pan securely with one hand and then using your favored hand carefully , but with confidence , slide your spatula under the middle of the foie gras . carefully lift the foie gras just a bit off the surface of the pan , make sure the foie gras is well balanced on your spatula it 's not going to flip or slide off . when you 're sure the foie gras is balanced again , carefully but confidently , move it to your next plate or cutting surface .

remove the foie gras from the pan .
use a spatula to lift the foie gras out of the pan . place the foie gras on a serving plate .

cook the onions in the pot .
place 1/2 cup of thinly sliced onions into the pot . cook them until they turn clear and shiny .

cook the onions in the pot .
pour 1/2 cup of thinly sliced onions into a heated pan . cook onions until translucent ( somewhat see - through ) .

cook the onions in the pot .
take a cooking pot on the stove . cut the onions in to small pieces . take the cut onions in to the big bowl . add the onions in to the cooking pot . cook the onions in the pot .

add the potatoes to the pot .
grab the steam bowl wearing finger mitts . pour the potatoes into the pot .

add the potatoes to the pot .
get the potatoes out of the steamer . add the hot potatoes to the pot , being careful not to touch them .

add the potatoes to the pot .
take the colander full of potatoes and , using hot pads , pour them into the pot . scrap any leftover potatoes into the pot with the hot pads .

mash the potatoes in the pot .
get the potato masher or a large fork . using a pot holder , hang onto the pot , be careful , it 's hot . using the potato masher or a large fork , squish the potatoes . the potatoes do n't have to be smooth . keep squishing them until they are how you like .

mash the potatoes in the pot .
take your hands our a potato masher and begin mashing the potatoes . mash around the potatoes in the pain until it is smaller chunks of potato .

mash the potatoes in the pot .
