now you want to take your masher or a larger fork and start smashing the potatoes in the pot . you do n't have to smash them to small . we want them to be more old fashioned and have skins and larger pieces still in there .

add the cabbage to the pot .
take a large pot on the stove . cut the cabbage in to thin long strips . place the cabbage in a bowl . add the cabbage in to the pot . mix it with other contents in the pot .

add the cabbage to the pot .
take 6 cups of cabbage and use a knife to slice it thinly . pour the sliced cabbage into the pot .

add the cabbage to the pot .
thinly slice about six cups of cabbage using your chefs knife . make sure you use a cutting board and make very thin slices of the cabbage until they look like shredded cabbage . while your pot is on the stove and hot add your cabbage making sure to get it all in there .

add the milk to the pot .
hold the cup of milk over the pot . slowly pour it in the pot careful not to spill .

add the milk to the pot .
take a big pot on the stove . take a cup of milk . add the milk in to the pot . take a big wooden spoon . mix the milk in the pot .

add the milk to the pot .
pour 1/2 cup to a cup of milk into the pot where your other ingredients are cooking . as soon as you pour the milk into the pot start stirring with your cooking spoon .

add the grated potatoes to the mixture and blend .
pour the grated potatoes into the bowl with the mixture . use a stirring spoon to mix all of the ingredients in the bowl together .

add the grated potatoes to the mixture and blend .
add the potatoes with your hands into the bowl . with a wooden spoon mix the mixture together .

add the grated potatoes to the mixture and blend .
take a large mixing bowl . grate some potatoes in to small strips . add the potatoes in to the bowl . add the potatoes in to the mixture bowl . mix the contents in the bowl .

mix an egg milk and the mashed potatoes .
crack one egg and add it to your bowl . pour one tablespoon of skim milk and whisk it together with the egg . dump one cup of mashed potatoes into the bowl . mix everything together with a spoon .

mix an egg milk and the mashed potatoes .
crack 1 egg into a cup . pour the egg into a medium sized bowl . measure 1 tablespoon of skim milk and add it to the bowl . whisk the egg and milk together . add one cup of mashed potatoes to the bowl and mix it all together .

mix an egg milk and the mashed potatoes .
add an egg into the bowl . use a whisk to mix the egg into the bowl . add mashed potatoes into the bowl . use the whisk to stir everything together .

grate squeeze and add potato to a bowl .
measure one and a half cups of grated potato . pour the grated potato into a large bowl .

grate squeeze and add potato to a bowl .
clean your potatoes . peal your potatoes . get out your grate for the potatoes . run the potatoes over the grate into a plate or bowl . grate your potatoes until you have one and half cups .

grate squeeze and add potato to a bowl .
now use 1 and 1/2 cup of grated potato to your mixing bowl . just take the potatoes and slowly poor them in the mixing bowl , being sure not to spill any .

scoop the batter on the pan .
take a pan on the stove . take some butter in a bowl . take a large wooden spoon . take the butter out of the bowl . add the butter in to the pan .

scoop the batter on the pan .
use the spoon to scoop the batter . put the batter into the pan on the stove .

scoop the batter on the pan .
use a spoon to put the batter into the hot pan . let the batter cook for a little while .

add the potato starch salt and pepper .
pour the starch into the bowl . add salt and pepper . use a stirring spoon to mix the ingredients in the bowl together .

add the potato starch salt and pepper .
slowly pour in the potato starch in the bowl . pour in the salt and pepper in the bowl .

add the potato starch salt and pepper .
pour the leftover potato starch into the bowl . add in the salt and pepper . stir all the ingredients together in the bowl .

add flour to the potatoes and mix .
measure a cup of all - purpose flour . place the mixing bowl with the potatoes onto the work space - counter . pour the flour into the mixing bowl . using a wooden spoon or a spatula , mix the flour and potatoes well .

add flour to the potatoes and mix .
take a flour in a cup . take the potatoes in a large mixing bowl . add the flour in to the bowl of potatoes . take a large wooden spoon . mix the flour to the potatoes .

add flour to the potatoes and mix .
add 1 cup of flour into the bowl . mix the flour into the bowl with a stirring spoon . add the potatoes . continue to mix all of the ingredients together in the bowl .

add thyme bay leaves onion and clam juice and boil the mixture .
first , you will need to add 1/2 a teaspoon of thyme to the pot . second , you will need to add 1/2 a teaspoon of bay leaves to the pot . third , you will need to chop up an onion and add it to the mixture . fourth , you will need to add 2 bottles of clam juice to the pot . fifth , you will need to let the mixture boil on medium heat .

add thyme bay leaves onion and clam juice and boil the mixture .
take a pan and cook the ingredients . add a teaspoon of thyme in to the pan . add some bay leaves and onions in to the pan . add 2 jars of clam juice in to the pan . boil the ingredients in the pan .

add thyme bay leaves onion and clam juice and boil the mixture .
add a little more than one - half tsp of thyme to your cooked veggies , and mix . add a bay leaf , and stir until the vegetables are tender . add 2 cups of raw , diced onions and mix everything together . add two 8-ounce bottles of clam juice and bring to a boil . add clams .

add salt and pepper .
take a spoon and measure the salt in it and pour it in the soup . shake some pepper into the pot after .

add salt and pepper .
add 1/2 teaspoon of salt . add fresh crack black peppercorn to taste . stir to combine .

add salt and pepper .
use a 1/2 teaspoon measuring spoon . pour salt slowly into measuring spoon . try not to overfill the measuring spoon . black peppercorns are pepper that has n't been ground up or crushed . use the pepper mill by twisting the ring 5 times . this grinds the pepper .

cook onion green peppers and red peppers .
take a pan on the stove . cut onions in to small pieces . cut green and red peppers in to small pieces . add the onions and peppers in to the pan . cook them for few minutes .

cook onion green peppers and red peppers .
melt a half cup up butter in a large pot . use a spoon to mix the onions , peppers and butter in the pot .

cook onion green peppers and red peppers .
put the cut up pieces of onion green peppers and red peppers in a pan . cook the vegetables while stirring with a spatula .

add clams flour worcestershire sauce and hot sauce to the pot .
carefully open your cans of clams . open 4 cans all together . next add a cup of half and half into your mix . add 10 tablespoons of flour . make sure to mix with each scoop added .

add clams flour worcestershire sauce and hot sauce to the pot .
open and pour 3 cans of clams into the pot . add 2 cups of half and half and mix . mix a table spoon of flour continuously until it gets thick . add 2 teaspoons of worcestershire . add as much hot sauce and stir with a spoon .

add clams flour worcestershire sauce and hot sauce to the pot .
you need to open the can of clams with a can opener . then add all three cans to soup . add two cups of half and half then stir . add 10 tablespoons of flour to soup gradually while stirring the soup . add 2 teaspoons of worcestershire sauce while stirring soup . add 1 teaspoons of any hot sauce of you choice . then stir .

cover the pot .
put water in large stockpot . bring to a boil . then put mussels in pot . allow them to cook . then drain and serve .

cover the pot .
place the lid onto the pot . continue to cook the mussels .

cover the pot .
now we want to make sure the steam stays in with the clams . so take your lid and set it on top of your pot .

add garlic pieces into the pot .
lift the garlic off of the cutting board using the side of the knife blade and your hand . add the chopped garlic pieces to the pot .

add garlic pieces into the pot .
scoop up the garlic pieces with your hand . drop the garlic pieces into the pot .

add garlic pieces into the pot .
garlic will now be added into the bowl once it is minced . scrape the garlic on top of your knife and slowly lower it into the pot . be careful not to cut your hand .

take mussels out from the pot and pour some parsley .
get a big straining spoon . scoop the mussels out of the pot with the spoon . place a few mussels into each bowl that you will eat from . place the butter and flour in a bowl and mix together .

take mussels out from the pot and pour some parsley .
take mussels out of the pot using a strainer and i is them into serving bowls . put some parsley on each serving bowl .

take mussels out from the pot and pour some parsley .
use a scoop to take the mussels out of the pot . put the mussels into different serving bowls . add some parsley on top of the mussels .

add wine stock and simmer into the pot .
pour wine into the pot . add the broth stock to the pot . let it simmer for 10 minutes .

add wine stock and simmer into the pot .
take a large pot on the stove . cook the contents in the pan . take a bottle of wine stock . add the wine stock in to the pot . simmer the pot .

add wine stock and simmer into the pot .
slowly pour the wine in the pot . pour in the broth . now let it cook to where small bubbles are coming up .

add parsley flakes into the pot .
get cut parsley flakes . sprinkle them in the pot .

add parsley flakes into the pot .
grab some cup up parsley with your hands . drop the parsley in the pot .

add parsley flakes into the pot .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some parsley in to the board . cut the parsley in to small pieces . add the parsley in to the pot . mix them with the contents in the pot .

add onion pieces into the pot .
grab the onion pieces with your hand . put the onions in the pot on the oil .

add onion pieces into the pot .
pour oil into the bottom of the pot . add diced onions into the pot .

add onion pieces into the pot .
put some oil in a large pot . put the chopped onion and garlic into the pot .

mix butter and flour .
use a fork to scoop butter into a bowl . add flour into the bowl . use the fork to mix the butter and flour together .

mix butter and flour .
soften some butter to room temperature . put it in a small bowl . add flour to the butter . mix together with a fork .

mix butter and flour .
using room temperature butter put it in a small bowl . then add your flower and use a fork to mix well . it should have a paste like consistency .

add oil to pot .
use spoons to fill with oil . take the spoon and pour the oil out into the pot .

add oil to pot .
pour out into the soup pot . heat the oil over medium heat .

add oil to pot .
get a spoon of oil . pour it into the pot .

pour the soup on the mussels .
use a scoop to scoop up the soup . pour the soup over the mussels .

pour the soup on the mussels .
cook the soup in a large pot . take the mussels in a bowl . take a large spoon . pour the soup on to the mussels . cover the entire mussels with the soup .

pour the soup on the mussels .
make sure the mussels are in a medium sized bowl . use a ladle to pour the broth you just made over the mussels .

add mussels into the pot .
pick up the bowl of mussels . use your hands to add the mussels to the pot .

add mussels into the pot .
take your bowl of mussels . use your hand to drop the mussels into the pot .

add mussels into the pot .
make sure you have a large metal pot on the stove . use your hands to add your mussels into the large pot .

add hot pepper flakes into the pot .
take a pot on the stove . cook the other ingredients in the pot . take a teaspoon of chili flakes . add the chili flakes in to the pot . mix everything in the pot .

add hot pepper flakes into the pot .
use a scoop and add hot pepper flakes into the pot . use a stirring spoon to mix the pepper into the pot .

add hot pepper flakes into the pot .
using a spoon put the hot pepper flakes into the bowl . mix them together using a spoon .

boil mixture in the pan .
take a pan on the stove . add the mixture in the pan . mix the contents in the pan . boil the contents in the pan . mix the contents in between .

boil mixture in the pan .
drop the mixture into the boiling liquid . stir , using a whisk , to mix everything together .

boil mixture in the pan .
in the pot of boiling water put spoon full at a time of the mixture into the pot .

cover the pot and steam .
put the lid on the pot . let it simmer for about ten minutes .

cover the pot and steam .
take a pot on the stove . add the ingredients in the pot . take the lid of the pot . cover the pot with the lid . steam the contents of the pot .

cover the pot and steam .
put the lid onto the pot . leave the pot to simmer for 10 minutes .

cut a cabbage into quarters and remove the stem .
take the large knife and cut the cabbage down the middle , hot - dog style . cut each large piece of cabbage down the middle again , hot - dog style . cut off the stems of each piece . the stem is the hard part at the ends of each piece of cabbage .

cut a cabbage into quarters and remove the stem .
take your knife and carefully cut the cabbage at the top . after cutting it , pull the cabbage open . take your knife and carefully cut the stems off the end of the cabbage .

cut a cabbage into quarters and remove the stem .
using a large knife make a split from the stem down toward the leaves . using your hands , pull the cabbage apart so it is in 2 pieces . cut each half into half again using the large knife . use the knife to cut off the stem .

prepare some water in a large bowl and add some rock salt .
pour some water into a bowl . then add a tablespoon or two of rock salt to the water . mix the salt into the water with your hand .

prepare some water in a large bowl and add some rock salt .
pour some water into a big bowl . grab some rock salt with your fingers and drop it into the water . mix the salt around in the water with your hands .

prepare some water in a large bowl and add some rock salt .
get a large bowl . pour some water into the bottom of the bowl . add rock salt . mix the salt to help it dissolve .

combine the cabbage and salt water .
put some water and rock salt into a large bowl . put the cabbage in the bowl with the salt and water . use the salt water to wet the cabbage . put salt in between the cabbage leaves and let sit for 4 hours .

combine the cabbage and salt water .
add the cabbage to the water in the bowl . pull up each leaf of the cabbage and add salt so the whole cabbage is salted . let the cabbage sit in the bowl for 4 hours .

combine the cabbage and salt water .
pour the water and salt into bowl . put cabbage in the bowl . use your hands and sprinkle the water onto the cabbage . next , sprinkle salt into each layer of cabbage . finally , turn cabbage over in bowl so each side is covered with water .

pour water on dried cod .
fill a container with water . pour the water onto the bowl with dried cod in it .

pour water on dried cod .
put a little bit of warm water into a cup . pour the warm water on top of the dried cod . put some gloves on and then gently mix it up just a little with the water using your hands .

pour water on dried cod .
add some warm water . this will help make it soft .

add chopped daikon radish green onion apple puree and minced ginger and garlic to a large bowl .
add chopped daikon into the bowl . then add green onion . put 1 cup of apple puree into the mixture . add garlic to the bowl . pour 1/4 cup of onion puree to the bowl .

add chopped daikon radish green onion apple puree and minced ginger and garlic to a large bowl .
chop daikon and add to bowl . chop green onion , puree half an apple , chop ginger finely . add all ingredients to bowl and mix well with hands .

add chopped daikon radish green onion apple puree and minced ginger and garlic to a large bowl .
take a large bowl . add the cut pieces of radish in to the bowl . cut the green onions in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl . add a cup of apple puree in to the bowl . add ginger and garlic that is cut in to very small pieces .

add salted shrimp anchovy fish sauce and lance fish sauce .
add a cup of salted shrimp . add a cup of anchovy fish sauce . add a cup of lance fish sauce .

add salted shrimp anchovy fish sauce and lance fish sauce .
add salted shrimp , anchovy fish sauce , and lance fish sauce to the bowl . add plum extract to the bowl .

add salted shrimp anchovy fish sauce and lance fish sauce .
set up large cups of salted shrimp , anchovy fish sauce and lance fish sauce . fill a 1/4 cup measuring cup with salted shrimp , and add it to the vegetable mix . fill a 1/4 cup measuring cup with anchovy fish sauce , and add it to the mix . fill a 1/4 cup measuring cup with lance fish sauce , and add it to the mix .

add plum extract onion puree and the cod .
add plum extract to the bowl using a scoop . next break the fish apart with your hands and add to the bowl .

add plum extract onion puree and the cod .
pour in plum extract to the bowl . add pieces of the cod to the bowl .

add plum extract onion puree and the cod .
when you have added all the other ingredients to the bowl you can start adding the next step . add plum extract , the onion puree ( looks like a soup ) and the codfish . mix them together well .

add korean red chili pepper flakes to the mixture and mix with hand .
add 1/2 cup of red chili pepper flakes to the mixture . mix the ingredients in the bowl with hands .

add korean red chili pepper flakes to the mixture and mix with hand .
add a big spoonful of the chili pepper in the mix . use your hands and mix everything around so it looks the same .

add korean red chili pepper flakes to the mixture and mix with hand .
add korean red chili pepper flakes to the mixture . mix it together with your hands until everything is combined . rub the mixture in a circular motion .

spread the mixture between the cabbage leaves .
take the lettuce from the bowl and put it in the same bowl as the red mix . rub the red mix on the outside of the lettuce . make sure it is totally covered . then separate each lettuce leaf from each other and rub the red mix on each leaf . repeat step 3 until the lettuce is totally covered in the red mix .

spread the mixture between the cabbage leaves .
take some of the mixture with your hands and rub it onto the cabbage so it 's completely covered . make sure you get the mixture in between the leaves too .

spread the mixture between the cabbage leaves .
put the cabbage into the bowl . start rubbing the mixture all over the cabbage . make sure you get the mixture between each leaf of the cabbage .

heat the pan for about fifteen minutes .
stir the pan with a spatula as it cooks . put it on low heat . cook for 15 to 20 minutes .

heat the pan for about fifteen minutes .
heat over low heat . stir with spatula . heat for 15 - 20 minutes .

heat the pan for about fifteen minutes .
heat dal mixture on the stove on low heat for up to several hours . the longer it cooks the better it will taste . if there is not much time , you can turn the heat up to medium heat and cook for about fifteen minutes , stirring it occasionally with a spoon .

close the cooker and put on high flame .
we want to cook our dish on a high flame . so make sure your pot is on a burner and turn heat all the way up .

close the cooker and put on high flame .
put a lid on the cooker and close it . place the cooker on a high flame .

close the cooker and put on high flame .
put the lid on the pressure cooker . put the pressure cooker on a high flame on the stove top .

mash some of the dal with a spatula .
use a spatula to mash down the dal . continue to mix the dal together as it cooks .

mash some of the dal with a spatula .
take a spatula and stick it in the pot . use the spatula to squish the dal down .

mash some of the dal with a spatula .
using a spatula mash the dal . using a spatula stir the dal .

add cilantro and heavy whipping cream .
put some chopped cilantro into the pot . add some heavy whipping cream to the pot . stir the ingredients to mix everything together .

add cilantro and heavy whipping cream .
use your hands and grab some cilantro . drop the cilantro in the pot . pour some heavy whipping cream into the pot . stir everything with a spatula .

add cilantro and heavy whipping cream .
cook the dal in a pot . cut the cilantro in to small pieces . add the cilantro in to the dal . add heavy whipping cream in to the pan . mix everything in the pan .

add onion and cook until golden brown .
add the chopped onion into the cooking pan . mix the onions around the pan with a spatula . cook into they are golden brown .

add onion and cook until golden brown .
in a heated pan put your cut up onions into the pan . as it cooks stir around . when the onions are done the should be a golden brown color .

add onion and cook until golden brown .
chop one medium size onion . put into a cup and carefully pour it into the frying pan . mix with spatula until the onions are golden brown .

melt butter in a pan and add cumin seeds and garlic .
add 2 tablespoons of butter to the red pan and let it melt . add the cumin seeds to the pan and stir . add 1 tablespoon of minced garlic and stir .

melt butter in a pan and add cumin seeds and garlic .
place pan on the stove top and add butter . melt two tablespoons of butter in the pan . add cumin seeds to the pan and use a spatula to stir while cooking . add one tablespoon of chopped garlic to the pan . use a spatula to stir in the garlic while cooking .

melt butter in a pan and add cumin seeds and garlic .
put butter in the pan and let the butter become liquid . add the cumin seeds and garlic and mix with a spatula .

add salt chili powder and green chili .
cook the contents in the pan . add 2 tablespoons of salt in to the cooking pan . add one tablespoon of coriander powder in to the pan . mix them with the contents in the pan . cook the contents in the pan properly .

add salt chili powder and green chili .
put in 1 teaspoon of salt to the pan . put in some red chili powder . add green chili powder .

add salt chili powder and green chili .
use a tiny spoon to scoop salt chili powder and green chili . scoop in the salt chili powder and green chili into the pot .

add soaked dal and kidney beans ginger and oil into the pressure cooker .
add the water to the pressure cooker that was used for soaking the dal . put dal , kidney beans , ginger and oil into the pressure cooker .

add soaked dal and kidney beans ginger and oil into the pressure cooker .
add 1 cup of soaked dal into a pressure cooker . put in 3 cups of water . add some ginger . put in some oil .

add soaked dal and kidney beans ginger and oil into the pressure cooker .
soak dal and kidney beans and add cloves to pressure cooker . add soaked dal and kidney beans to pressure cooker . add ginger and oil into pressure cooker .

put the dal into sauce pan .
use a scoop to scoop up the dal from the pressure cooker . place the scooped dal into the sauce pan .

put the dal into sauce pan .
using a spoon take out the dal into the sauce pan . make sure you leave the water in the pan .

put the dal into sauce pan .
grab a spoon . scoop dal into pan . repeat until dal is all in the pan . stir together ingredients . set aside .

add tomato puree and cook until it starts to lose oil .
take a large spoon and scoop the tomato puree into the pan . stir the tomato puree around the pain . continue to cook the tomato until it begins to lose oil .

add tomato puree and cook until it starts to lose oil .
put 4 tomatoes that are blended in the pan . once the tomatoes start to let out clear liquid it is done .

add tomato puree and cook until it starts to lose oil .
use a large spoon to add tomatoes to the pot . stir the tomatoes in the pot and cook for about 5 minutes .

cut the tofu into squares .
take a knife and cut the aburaage in half . the aburaage will look like a square when you cut it .

cut the tofu into squares .
place 2 pieces of tofu , stacked , onto a cutting board , take a large knife and cut the tofu in half , making 4 large squares .

cut the tofu into squares .
grab a knife . place the rectangle pieces of tofu on top of each other . cut the rectangle pieces of tofu in half to make 2 squares per piece . place the knife down .

chop up the green onion .
place the green onion on a cutting board . find a sharp knife and cut about an inch of the bottom white part off , and half of the dark green part . starting from the bottom white part , cut the green onion into very thin slices , carefully .

chop up the green onion .
chop green onions . set green onions to the side once chopped .

chop up the green onion .
grab a large knife . chop the green onions into very thin slices .

boil the tofu .
take a large pot on the stove . pour some water and boil it . add the pieces of tofu in to the boiling water . boil for few seconds . take the tofu out of the water and strain the water .

boil the tofu .
quickly boil to help remove grease . only boil it for a few seconds , then remove it . use a colander , the metal item with holes , to strain the water .

boil the tofu .
put the tofu into the boiling water . wait until the tofu is soft .

add water sugar soy sauce sake and mirin to a pan .
add sugar to a pot of water . then add sake , soy sauce , and mirin . turn the dial on the stove up halfway and heat up the mixture . stir with a wooden spoon while it 's heating up .

add water sugar soy sauce sake and mirin to a pan .
take a pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . add some sugar and soy sauce in to the water . add some sake and some mirin in to the pot . mix everything in the pot with chop sticks on a medium heat .

add water sugar soy sauce sake and mirin to a pan .
add water to the pan . add sugar to the pan using a cup . add soy sauce to the pan using a cup . add sake to the pan using a cup . add mirin to a pan using a cup .

add the tofu and cook until the liquid is gone .
bring the mixture to a medium heat . add the tofu to the pot . cook tofu until all the liquid is gone .

add the tofu and cook until the liquid is gone .
turn the dial of the stove halfway up . put the tofu in the pot . let it cook until the water is not there .

add the tofu and cook until the liquid is gone .
add the tofu to the liquid and cook . flip the tofu with chopsticks . cook until the liquid is completely gone .

heat dashi soy sauce mirin and sake in a pan .
fill a big pot half way with water then place it on the stove . then , turn the stove to medium heat and wait until it begins to boil / bubble . turn the heat of the pot to low using the dial on the stove . add a dash of salt with your fingers , add soy sauce that should have been measured beforehand after you add the salt . after that , add the rest of your liquid ingredients . stir the pot of seasoned water with a large spoon . add the udon noodles last directly into the pot .

heat dashi soy sauce mirin and sake in a pan .
heat dashi to a boil . add salt and soy sauce to the dashi . then add mirin to the pot . last you will add the sake . mix all ingredients together .

heat dashi soy sauce mirin and sake in a pan .
heat dashi to boil . add soy sauce into the hot water in the pan . add mirin inside the pan . also add sake to the pan make it to boil .

add the udon noodles and let simmer .
take a large bowl on a stove . add water in the bowl . boil the water for some time . add the noodles in to the soup . let the noodles boil in simmer for 2 - 3 min .

add the udon noodles and let simmer .
add the different type of noodles called udon noodles . turn the knob of the stove to simmer level . keep it on stove for 2 - 3 minutes .

add the udon noodles and let simmer .
add the noodles to the soup . let is cook for 2 - 3 minutes .

put the noodles soup and tofu in bowl and top with green onion .
first take out two bowls . next , use chopsticks to take the noodles out of the pot and put them into a bowl . pour the soup broth on top of the noodles until the bowl is almost full . use your chopsticks to pick up two pieces of tofu and place them in the bowl on top of the noodles . for the last step , sprinkle the pieces of green onion on top of the tofu .

put the noodles soup and tofu in bowl and top with green onion .
take the soft cooked noodles in to a bowl . add cooked soup in to the noodles . add two slices of tofu on to the top of noodles . take some green onions and cut them in to small pieces . add these green onions on to the top of noodles .

put the noodles soup and tofu in bowl and top with green onion .
with chopsticks carefully take out the noodles from the hot water inside the pot and put in to a clean bowl . put some of your soup broth in to the same bowl . take two of your aburaage pouches and put them on top of your soup in the bowl . take a small handful of your cut up green onions . put the green onions on top of your aburaage inside the bowl .

cook them in a pot of water with lid on .
hold the bowl over the cooker . slowly pour everything in careful not to spill . cover it with a lid and cook .

cook them in a pot of water with lid on .
place the beans with water into the pressure cooker . make sure for every one cup beans to use four to five cups of water . now put on the lid . and now cook to five to six minutes .

cook them in a pot of water with lid on .
find a rubber spatula . use to move mixture from mixing bowl to pressure cooker .

pour the sauce in the pan and add the lentil and red kidney beans to the pot and mix them well .
put the sauce in the pan and stir using a spatula . put a lid on the pan and cook for 2 minutes . stir and add the dal to the pan . mix very well and bring to a boil .

pour the sauce in the pan and add the lentil and red kidney beans to the pot and mix them well .
pour the bowl of sauce into the pan . using a spoon mix the mixture together . put the lid on the pan . take the lid off . with a spoon mix the mixture together .

pour the sauce in the pan and add the lentil and red kidney beans to the pot and mix them well .
pour the sauce into the frying pan and stir it together with a spatula . cover the pan for 2 to 3 minutes . add the lentil and kidney beans to the pan and mix it very well . bring the pan to a boil .

blend the lentil and red kidney beans in the pot .
blend the lentil and kidney beans together in the pot . just blend it a little bit , not a complete blend of the whole pot .

blend the lentil and red kidney beans in the pot .
use an immersion blender to blend . move the blender to a few areas of your pot and pulse the blender for a few seconds . you do n't need to completely blend it , just a quick blend .

blend the lentil and red kidney beans in the pot .
use a hand blender to lightly blend the ingredients in the pot . use a spoon to look at the texture after blending .

heat a pan add butter oil cumin seeds coriander seeds and onion and stir .
switch on the stove and keep the pan on it . heat the pan . add butter and oil into it . add cumin seeds and coriander seeds into it . add onion and mix well until its cooked .

heat a pan add butter oil cumin seeds coriander seeds and onion and stir .
take a pan and heat the pan on the stove . add some butter and oil in to the pan . add some cumin seeds and coriander seeds in to the oil . add some cut pieces of onions in to the pan . stir them with a spatula .

heat a pan add butter oil cumin seeds coriander seeds and onion and stir .
put a pan on the stove and heat it . add butter and olive oil to the bottom of the pan . put in cumin seeds and coriander . add chopped up onions . use a spatula to stir the mixture as it cooks .

top the dal with cream and cilantro .
cook the dal in a pot . take some cream in a bowl . add some cream with a spoon on dal . cut the cilantro in to small pieces . add the cilantro on to the dal .

top the dal with cream and cilantro .
use a spoon to put cream on top of the dal in a circular pattern . then add cilantro to the very top of the dish .

top the dal with cream and cilantro .
once done cooking add cream . cilantro to top of dal .

add some salt .
take a pot and place it on the stove . cook the ingredients of the pan . take some salt in hand . add some salt in to the pan . mix the salt with other ingredients .

add some salt .
measure about one tablespoon salt . add it to the palm of your hand estimating it . now add it to the pot .

add some salt .
grasp a container of salt and carefully open the metal spout . pour a small amount of salt into the palm of your hand . using your hand , sprinkle the salt over the top of the food in the pan . close the spout on the container of salt and put the container on the counter .

soak some black lentils and red kidney beans in water .
put the black lentils and red kidney beans into a large pot and cover with water . let the black lentils and red kidney beans soak in the water for 6 - 8 hours . after the lentils and bean are done soaking , put them in a pressure cooker .

soak some black lentils and red kidney beans in water .
take the black lentils and red kidney beans and put them in a bowl . fill the bowl with water . let the black lentils and red kidney beans soak in water for 6 to 8 hours .

soak some black lentils and red kidney beans in water .
put the black lentils into a large bowl . put the red kidney beans into the same large bowl . pour enough water into the same bowl so that the water covers all the beans . let sit on the counter top for six to eight hours .

add chopped tomatoes mix it well and cover .
add the tomatoes into the mixing pan . mix the tomatoes with the other ingredients with a spatula . cover the pan with a lid . cook for 2 minutes .

add chopped tomatoes mix it well and cover .
add the cut up tomatoes to the pan . using your spatula stir the tomatoes in well . then cover with a lid .

add chopped tomatoes mix it well and cover .
slowly pour in the cut up pieces of tomatoes into the pan . use a spatula to mix everything together . cover the pan with a lid .

mix dal makhni masala red chili powder and turmeric powder in a small bowl of water .
get a cup of water . gather all your spices together . put them in the cup of water . then mix all the spices together . mix it so the spices do n't get burned .

mix dal makhni masala red chili powder and turmeric powder in a small bowl of water .
fill a bowl a third of the way full of water . take 3 tablespoons of dal makhni masala and pour it into the bowl . take 1 tablespoon of red chili powder and pour it into the bowl . take 1 tablespoon of turmeric powder and pour it into the bowl . still with a spoon .

mix dal makhni masala red chili powder and turmeric powder in a small bowl of water .
how much of each spice to put in ? get bowl to put one teaspoon water . put water in bowl . put measured spice in water . mix well . add to recipe when needed .

cover with a lid and stir .
cover with a lid . let simmer for a while . uncover . stir ingredients together .

cover with a lid and stir .
take a pan on the stove . add the ingredients in to the pan . mix them with a spatula . take the lid of the pan . cover the pan with the lid and mix with the spoon .

cover with a lid and stir .
cover the pan with a lid that fits tightly . after a little bit remove the cover and stir everything in the pan .

heat the apple in a pan with some oil .
carefully pour the apples in the pan . use a spoon to move them around in the pan .

heat the apple in a pan with some oil .
add oil to the pan . spread the oil around the pan until it is hot . add the apples . use the spoon to stir the apples and cook all sides .

heat the apple in a pan with some oil .
set a small frying pan on the stove and add some oil to the pan . turn on the stove and wait for the oil to get hot . when the pan and oil are hot , add the apples . while the apples are cooking , stir them around with a spoon to make sure they brown evenly .

garnish the apple and the goose liver with rock salt and chives and serve .
take a medium sized plate . add the apple in to the plate . add the cooked goose liver in to the plate . sprinkle some rock salt on the apple and liver pieces . add some cut pieces of chives on the dish .

garnish the apple and the goose liver with rock salt and chives and serve .
slice the liver into pieces 2 cm thick . season with salt and pepper and allow to sit for a few minutes . peel and slice apple and spray sugar on top of it . heat up a pan and add oil . add the apple and cook till crispy . heat up a pan and place the liver and allow to cook for 2 minutes on each side . serve apple and liver together .

garnish the apple and the goose liver with rock salt and chives and serve .
add some salt on top of the apple as a garnish . put some chives over the top . prepare to serve .

cook the liver on another pan with oil .
heat up pan to medium high and add a spoonful of oil . add pieces of liver and set a timer for 1.5 minutes . flip liver over to other side and set another timer for 1.5 minutes for the liver to cook on the other side . look at the pan to make sure that the liver does not burn while it is cooking . the liver is ready when it looks cooked by its brown outside appearance .

cook the liver on another pan with oil .
add a drop of oil . spread the oil around the pan . place the liver on the pan . let each side cook for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes . cook until the middle is medium done . then remove from pan .

cook the liver on another pan with oil .
put a small amount of oil in the pan . use a spatula to carry the liver and put it on the pan .

sprinkle with flour on both sides .
take the liver pieces on a plate . add the flour on top of liver pieces . now flip the liver pieces to the other side . sprinkle flour on the other side . evenly coat the liver pieces with the flour .

sprinkle with flour on both sides .
sprinkle flour onto the liver . flip over the liver and add flour to the other side .

sprinkle with flour on both sides .
place the liver on top of the tray . take some flour to spread over . spread over the flour on both sides of the liver .

sprinkle some salt on top of the apples and add some butter .
place slices of apple in a hot pan on the stove . turn the slices over with a spoon when they begin to get brown . sprinkle a spoonful of sugar over the apples in the pan . mix the apples around . add about an inch thick butter to the apples and stir around .

sprinkle some salt on top of the apples and add some butter .
take an apple and slice into large chunks . then put into a pan . add heat . then add sugar and cinnamon . add heat and butter and cook until done .

sprinkle some salt on top of the apples and add some butter .
spring some sugar over the top of the apples as they cook . put a slice of butter into the pan . stir the pan mixing the sugar and apples . continue to cook until the apples become caramelized .

season them with salt and pepper .
season the food with salt . grind pepper on the food .

season them with salt and pepper .
grab the salt . season all pieces with salt . grab the pepper . season all pieces with pepper .

season them with salt and pepper .
pour salt across the top of the pieces . add pepper across the pieces .

cut the goose liver into small slices .
put the liver onto a cutting board . with a large kitchen knife cut the liver into 1 inch slices .

cut the goose liver into small slices .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the goose liver on the board . cut the liver in to slices . the slices are 1 inch thick . place the liver slices aside .

cut the goose liver into small slices .
take a piece of goose liver . place it on a cutting board . using a knife , cut the liver into small slices . then keep cutting . repeat until all is done .

pour some olive oil in a pot and add some onions .
take a pot and keep it on top of stove . add some olive oil in to the pan . take 1 medium onion and cut it in to small pieces . add onions to the oil . fry the onions till they are brown .

pour some olive oil in a pot and add some onions .
pour some olive oil in a pot . it should start to bubble when it 's hot enough ... . ... to add the onions to the pot . cook them until they start to brown around the edges , stirring every now and then .

pour some olive oil in a pot and add some onions .
take virgin olive oil , and pour it into the pot . take nice chopped onions until they go brown .

add a bottle of masala crushed tomatoes salt and pepper and stir .
slowly pour in your 700 gram jar of masala . pour carefully ! now we are going to pour in the 800 gram can of crushed tomatoes . once both of those are in the pan we are going to add some salt and pepper .

add a bottle of masala crushed tomatoes salt and pepper and stir .
the onions will start to brown . pour in a bottle of masala . add the crushed tomatoes . sprinkle in salt and pepper . stir all the ingredients together .

add a bottle of masala crushed tomatoes salt and pepper and stir .
open a can of masala and a can of crushed tomatoes . pour both cans into the pot on the stove . grab your pepper grinder and grind it into the pot approximately 5 times . grab your salt grinder and grind it into the pot approximately 5 times .

place the meatballs in the sauce and keep stirring while cooking .
place meatballs into the boiling sauce . stir it once in awhile as it cooks .

place the meatballs in the sauce and keep stirring while cooking .
put the meatballs into the sauce on the stove . stir the meatballs with a spoon as they are cooking .

place the meatballs in the sauce and keep stirring while cooking .
carefully place your meatballs into the pot of boiling marinara . use a wooden spoon to gently stir the meatballs while they cook . be careful not to break the meatballs up while stirring .

boil some spaghetti in some salt water .
get your spaghetti . put the spaghetti into boiling salt water .

boil some spaghetti in some salt water .
place a large pan of water on the stove top and turn the heat to the high setting . add a pinch of salt to the water . wait for the water to boil ; then add 500 grams of pasta to the boiling water . " boil pasta for 8 - 10 minutes , stirring occasionally with a slotted spoon , until it is soft , but firm to the bite ( this is called al dente " " ) . " " . " take a single piece of pasta out with the spoon , being careful not to burn yourself , and taste it to make sure it is cooked thoroughly . if it is cooked thoroughly , use potholders to lift the pan and pour away from you into a colander a bowl with holes in it ) that has been placed in the sink .

boil some spaghetti in some salt water .
the water will start to boil sooner if you add salt to the water . when the water is a rolling boil , it will boil intensely . when it looks like it 's rolling , add the pasta to the salted water . stir it as it boils . make sure the noodles are separated .

combine pasta and sauce .
put the spaghetti in a colander and drain all the water out of it . put the spaghetti back into the large pot . add some of the sauce on the spaghetti . stir it up with a large spoon .

combine pasta and sauce .
using a large spoon , scoop the sauce onto the pasta . use the spoon to stir the sauce and pasta together until the sauce is covering all of the pasta .

combine pasta and sauce .
have your pasta in your pot , with all the water removed . using a large serving spoon , scoop some pasta sauce onto the pasta . mix the two together so that the sauce is on all the pasta .

put minced beef minced garlic and chopped parsley into a bowl .
take the minced beef into a bowl . also add minced garlic into beef . cut the cleaned a hand full of continental parsley . add the cut parsley into the beef and garlic .

put minced beef minced garlic and chopped parsley into a bowl .
finely chop 4 cloves of garlic and add to the bowl . finely chop up a handful of parsley and add to the bowl .

put minced beef minced garlic and chopped parsley into a bowl .
take a big steel bowl . put some minced beef in to the bowl . take some garlic and parsley . cut the garlic in to small pieces and cut parsley in to small pieces . add garlic and parsley in to the bowl .

season with a little bit salt black pepper and mix them up .
put some salt and black pepper on the meat . mix the meat up with the stuff you just added .

season with a little bit salt black pepper and mix them up .
get salt . get pepper . sprinkle some salt and pepper on the food . use a spoon and mix the food together with the salt and pepper .

season with a little bit salt black pepper and mix them up .
add some black pepper and salt to the meat . mix them up until it all looks uniform .

divide mixture into meatballs .
grab a chunk of meat mixture with your hands . roll the chunk of meat mixture into a ball to make a meatball . repeat step 1 and 2 until all the meat mixture is rolled .

divide mixture into meatballs .
grab handfuls of the meat . for each handful of meat , make a ball out of the meat .

divide mixture into meatballs .
mix the meat and spices together . divide the meat mixture into golf ball size meatballs .

pour some korean barbecue sauce into a bowl .
get an empty bowl . put one cup of the sauce into the bowl .

pour some korean barbecue sauce into a bowl .
pour about a cup of korean barbecue sauce into a bowl . there should be enough to cover the whole bottom of the bowl .

pour some korean barbecue sauce into a bowl .
you will need a measuring cup or a regular small coffee cup . you will also need a bowl . open bottle of korean barbecue sauce . so you have the right amount of sauce pour the barbecue sauce into the cup . fill the cup . now take the cup and pour the sauce from the cup into the bowl and you are done .

add chopped garlic and soy sauce to the bowl and mix .
measure two tablespoons of cut up garlic . use measuring spoons and not spoons you eat ice cream with . measure two tablespoons of teriyaki sauce . give it a couple of good swirls to mix everything together .

add chopped garlic and soy sauce to the bowl and mix .
put two tablespoons of chopped garlic in the bowl . then add 2 tablespoons of soy sauce . next take a spoon and stir it all together .

add chopped garlic and soy sauce to the bowl and mix .
add chopped garlic to the bowl . pour soy sauce into the bowl . mix it all together with a spoon .

add beef into the bowl and mix .
add the beef into the bowl . thoroughly mix the beef into the marinade .

add beef into the bowl and mix .
take the beef out of the four packages and put it in the bowl of sauce mixture . mix the pieces of meat into the sauce with the spoon . stir until all of the meat is covered with sauce .

add beef into the bowl and mix .
add meat to marinade in the bowl . mix the meat into the marinade until all meat is coated .

place the beef onto a grill .
take beef out of bowl using a fork , or tongs . anything but your bare hands . place beef on hot grill using fork or tongs . avoid touching hot grill with hands . place beef close to each other on hot grill until bowl is empty .

place the beef onto a grill .
heat the grill . take the beef in a big bowl . take a tongs and put beef on to top of grill . add the beef one by one till it covers the grill . cook the beef .

place the beef onto a grill .
turn on the grill for the required time . wait until the light turns off and to beep until it is ready . place the marinated chicken into the grill . place it evenly to get all the chicken pieces cooked even . enjoy it after grilling .

flip the beef to the other side .
cook the meat on the grill . flip the meat over to cook the other side .

flip the beef to the other side .
let adult light the grill . take seasoned meat out the bowl place on the grill . let cook for 15 minutes . turn your meat over with the spatula . let cook until done then remove from grill .

flip the beef to the other side .
take your metal flipper . flip all of the meat to the other side on the grill .

heat oil and add dumplings and water .
put a non - stick pan on a burner , set heat to medium . put 2 tablespoons of oil into the pan and wait for oil to get hot . place dumplings in pan , keeping some space between them . after 2 minutes check the dumplings to see if bottom is golden and crispy . add a 1/4 cup of water to pan .

heat oil and add dumplings and water .
put 2 tablespoons of oil on the pan . spread the oil around so it cover the whole pan . place the pot stickers into the pan . cook for 2 minutes and then flip over and cook the other side . add water to the pan .

heat oil and add dumplings and water .
add 2 tablespoons of sunflower oil to a non stick pan . heat the pan with the oil . add the dumplings very slowly to the hot oiled pan . let it cook 2 minutes . add 1/4 cup of water .

heat little oil in a nonstick skillet add diced scallions ginger garlic and saute .
put some oil into the pan . put the scallions into the pan . put the ginger into the pan . put the garlic into the pan . mix the mixture together .

heat little oil in a nonstick skillet add diced scallions ginger garlic and saute .
you must add a tablespoon sesame oil to a non stick pan . turn on the heat of stove to medium . chop scallions , ginger and garlic small ( smaller than your fingernail ) . add to pan and stir .

heat little oil in a nonstick skillet add diced scallions ginger garlic and saute .
pour some oil into the frying pan . add some scallions , ginger and garlic . use a stirring spoon to mix together in the pan .

add the chopped vegetables salt black pepper and soy sauce .
add the vegetables to the hot frying pan . you can use any vegetables you like , as long as you chop them into small pieces . stir the vegetables while they are frying . add salt , but remember that the soy sauce also contains salt so do n't add too much . add the black pepper and soy sauce and continue to stir .

add the chopped vegetables salt black pepper and soy sauce .
add the vegetables onto the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the vegetables as they cook . add some salt and black pepper . add soy sauce to the pan . continue to mix .

add the chopped vegetables salt black pepper and soy sauce .
hold the plate of the chopped vegetables over the pan and pour it in . use a wooden spoon to stir . pour in the salt black pepper and soy sauce . stir more with the spoon .

cover the pan and simmer .
put a lid on the pan to cover it . continue to let the pierogies simmer in the oil .

cover the pan and simmer .
put the lid on the pot . let the pot stickers steam with the lid on the pot .

cover the pan and simmer .
cover the pan with a lid that fits it . let the pan bubble up under the cover .

mix in some peanuts freshly chopped cilantro and fried vegetables .
now we want to drop in our peanuts and freshly chopped cilantro . once you have all this in we want to stir in the cilantro and peanuts with our veggies . just use your spoon to toss around everything .

mix in some peanuts freshly chopped cilantro and fried vegetables .
with a spoon add peanuts . with a spoon add cilantro . with a spoon add fried vegetables . with a spoon mix it all together .

mix in some peanuts freshly chopped cilantro and fried vegetables .
add some peanuts to the bowl . put some chopped cilantro into the bowl . use a spoon to mix the ingredients in the bowl together .

spread little water on the potsticker wraps and stuff a spoonful of fried vegetables fold it and seal it .
take a potsticker wrapper and add a spoonful of vegetables . dip your finger in water and touch the edge . seal the potsticker along the edge .

spread little water on the potsticker wraps and stuff a spoonful of fried vegetables fold it and seal it .
put a wrapper on the cutting board . spoon the filling ( peanuts and vegetables ) in the center of the wrapper . dip your finger in some water and apply to the edge of the wrapper . fold the wrapper around the filling and seal the wrapper .

spread little water on the potsticker wraps and stuff a spoonful of fried vegetables fold it and seal it .
take a pot sticker wrap on the board . take the filling in a bowl . add the vegetable mixture filling in the middle of the wrap . add little water on sides of the wrap . seal the two ends of the wrap .

add the macaroni and let it cook for 8 minutes .
grab a measuring cup and measure out 1/2 cup of macaroni ( or a different favorite type of pasta if you 'd like . ) . add the pasta into the mixture cooking on the stove . cook the pasta for about 8 minutes .

add the macaroni and let it cook for 8 minutes .
pour a 1/2 cup of macaroni into the pan . let the macaroni for 8 minutes . stir the macaroni around the dish .

add the macaroni and let it cook for 8 minutes .
add a half of a cup of macaroni to the hot pan . stir and let it cook for about 8 minutes .

add some shredded kale and beans .
pour some beans into the mixture in the pan . next add in some chopped kale . then add some green beans . use a spoon to stir the mixture together for 2 minutes .

add some shredded kale and beans .
add shredded kale to the pan . add beans to the pan .

add some shredded kale and beans .
rinse and drain the cannellini beans . add the cannellini to the pan . add finely shredded kale and green beans to the pan . stir and cook for about two minutes .

add 1 can of tomato chicken stock and water and let it boil .
take a pan on the stove . add 1 can of tomato in to the pan . add 1 can of chicken stock in to the pan . add some water in to the pan . let the contents boil in the pan .

add 1 can of tomato chicken stock and water and let it boil .
carefully pour in 1 can of tomato chicken stock and water . let the liquid heat until it bubbles up .

add 1 can of tomato chicken stock and water and let it boil .
pour 1 can of tomato into the pan . add chicken stock to the pan . continue to stir to mix it all together . add some water . let the mixture boil for about 10 minutes , stirring it while it boils .

add in carrot and potato cubes and cook .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . cut the carrot and potato in to cubes . add the carrot in to the pan . add the potato in to the pan . mix the contents and cook .

add in carrot and potato cubes and cook .
grab the carrot and potato cubes with your hand and throw them in . cook them while stirring with a wooden spoon .

add in carrot and potato cubes and cook .
now we are going to add in the garlic , carrot , and potato to the pan . now lets cook it so that it is nicely cooked and heated all the way through .

add the tomato paste and stir .
use a spoon to scoop 1 tablespoon of tomato paste and add it to the pan . stir the paste and mix it in with the rest of the ingredients .

add the tomato paste and stir .
add one tablespoon of tomato paste to the cooking vegetables . stir the paste in and cook for about 1 minute . cooking the paste helps make the flavor less strong .

add the tomato paste and stir .
add one tablespoon of tomato paste to the pan . stir the paste into the pan and cook for one minute .

saute onion and celery with olive oil in a pan .
saute the onion leak , and celery with the olive oil in a hot pan . stir them with your spoon .

saute onion and celery with olive oil in a pan .
put olive oil in the pan . throw the onion and celery in the pan . cook the onion and celery until they get soft .

saute onion and celery with olive oil in a pan .
place a pan on the stove and turn on the heat . add olive oil to the pan . cook the onion , celery , and leek in the pan on medium - high heat . stir frequently .

add bread crumbs onions salt and pepper to the meat .
in a large bowl put in about a cup of bread crumbs or stuffing mix . put in half a cup of chopped onions and teaspoon of salt . add half a teaspoon of pepper then mix everything in the bowl together .

add bread crumbs onions salt and pepper to the meat .
add 1 cup of bread crumbs to the bowl . toss in 1/2 cup of chopped onions . add 1 teaspoon of salt and a 1/2 teaspoon of pepper .

add bread crumbs onions salt and pepper to the meat .
pour one cup of bread crumbs or stuffing mix into the meat bowl . next , add the onions , salt and pepper into the meat bowl .

add ketchup and maple syrup to a bowl .
add 5 to 6 tablespoons of ketchup to the bowl . pour in 4 tablespoons of maple syrup to the bowl .

add ketchup and maple syrup to a bowl .
take a bottle of ketchup . then using a measuring spoon , measure out 4 tablespoons . after that , take a bottle of maple syrup and add to the mixture . then stir all together . finally add an egg and stir .

add ketchup and maple syrup to a bowl .
use a tablespoon to measure . squeeze 4 spoons of ketchup into the bowl . squeeze 4 spoons of maple syrup into the bowl .

add ground beef an egg ketchup and milk to a bowl .
take a glass mixing bowl . add some ground beef in to the bowl . break open an egg and add it to the bowl . add some ketch up in to the bowl . add some ketch up in to the bowl .

add ground beef an egg ketchup and milk to a bowl .
add 1 pound of ground beef into a bowl . add 1 egg to the bowl . put in 1/2 cup of ketchup . add 1/2 cup of milk to the bowl .

add ground beef an egg ketchup and milk to a bowl .
open the package of ground beef meat and put the meat into a bowl . discard the package . crack open an egg . put the egg yolk and white into the bowl with the beef . discard the egg shell . open the ketchup and squirt , while counting to three , a big squirt of ketchup onto the meat . open the milk and pour some milk , while counting to three , into the bowl with the meat .

add mustard and worcestershire sauce and stir .
add 2 tablespoons of mustard to the bowl . pour in 1 tablespoon of worcestershire sauce into the bowl . use a spoon to mix the sauce together .

add mustard and worcestershire sauce and stir .
take a glass mixing bowl . add some mustard in to the bowl . add some worcestershire sauce in to the bowl . take a spoon . mix the ingredients with the spoon .

add mustard and worcestershire sauce and stir .
now we will put in about 2 tablespoons of mustard . next is the worcestershire sauce and we will only need about 1 teaspoon of this . now we can mix all of this together well using a fork or spoon .

mix the meat mixture together .
take meat from package . add onions and meat to bowl . using hands , mix all together very well . then put in pan . add spices and put in oven to cook .

mix the meat mixture together .
with your hands mix the mixture together . kneed the mixture with your hands .

mix the meat mixture together .
use your hands or a spoon and mix the meat mixture . mix it so everything spread around evenly .

put the rest of the sauce on the meatloaf and cook again in the oven .
now we can put the majority of our sauce into the meatloaf pan . make sure to brush it all over the top and on the sides of the meatloaf . once it is brushed in , we can put it back in for 15 minutes .

put the rest of the sauce on the meatloaf and cook again in the oven .
open the oven and carefully take out the meatloaf pan . pour the rest of the sauce on and around the meatloaf . with a spatula make sure all sides of the meatloaf are covered in sauce . put back in the oven and finish baking .

put the rest of the sauce on the meatloaf and cook again in the oven .
pour the rest of the sauce onto the meatloaf . use the fork to even it out in the pan . put the pan back in the over for 15 minutes .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
take a loaf pan . add some meat in to the loaf pan . place the loaf pan inside the oven . cook the meat in the loaf pan . remove the loaf pan from the oven .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
now we want to have our oven preheated to 350 degrees . once it is preheated , we are going to set our one lbs of beef into the oven . we set the pan in there for 45 minutes before the next step .

cook the meatloaf in the oven .
place meatloaf pan into the oven . heat the over to 350 degrees . leave the pan in the over for 45 minutes .

place the meat mixture into the pan .
grab the meat with your hands . squish the meat into the pan .

place the meat mixture into the pan .
get a loaf pan and place on counter in front of you . heat oven to 350 degrees . take the meat mixture from the bowl and put into pan . shape the meat mixture .

place the meat mixture into the pan .
set a pan on the table . add the meat mix to the pan . use your hand to shape the meat . heat the over to 350 degrees .

pour some of the sauce onto the meat .
hold the sauce over the pan . use a spoon to scoop out some sauce onto the meat .

pour some of the sauce onto the meat .
use a spoon to scoop the sauce out of the bowl . spread the sauce evenly over the meat .

pour some of the sauce onto the meat .
take a meat loaf pan . take some meat in a loaf pan . take the sauce in a bowl . pour some sauce on the meat . spread the sauce .

dissolve yeast and a little sugar into warm water .
get a small bowl and a tablespoon for stirring . put a 1/4 cup of warm water in the bowl . add the yeast to the warm water . add about a teaspoon of sugar to the yeast and water . stir it up with the tablespoon until it is mixed well .

dissolve yeast and a little sugar into warm water .
add the yeast into a bowl of warm water . add a little bit of sugar to the water . use a stirring spool to mix everything together well in the bowl .

dissolve yeast and a little sugar into warm water .
pour the yeast into the water bowl . add just a little bit of sugar to the yeast and water . use a spoon to mix well .

roll out the dough .
use a rolling pin to roll the dough . flatten out the dough in an oval shape .

roll out the dough .
take the dough and place it on a lightly floured surface . use your rolling pin , or if you do n't have one you can use a glass carefully to roll out your dough . you can keep sprinkling with some flour so it does n't stick to your rolling pin . keep rolling it out to as thinly as you want making sure not to make a hole in your dough . you can use your fingers to stretch out the dough like you would a pizza as well to get it to your desired thinness .

roll out the dough .
now slowly roll out the dough . you can use a glass if a rolling pin is not available . just make sure you get the dough flat and keep stretching it and rolling the dough flat .

spray some oil in a bowl and put the dough in .
mix the dough in to a ball . take a medium sized bowl . spray the bowl with some oil . take the ball of dough in to the hands . place the dough in the bottom of bowl .

spray some oil in a bowl and put the dough in .
take some oil into the bottom of a bowl . put the rolled up ball of dough into the bowl .

spray some oil in a bowl and put the dough in .
mix the flour with yeast , olive oil , warm water , salt . bring a clean bowl and spray with oil and add the dough and cover . wait for one hour to rise . spread flour on clean surface and knead . preheat a pan to medium hot . put the kneaded flat dough in the pan heat for 2 minutes on each side .

add in the flour and mix and form the dough .
take a large bowl . take the flour in the bowl . add the water in to the flour and mix . add some more flour in to the bowl . mix the flour in to the dough properly .

add in the flour and mix and form the dough .
in a bowl add the flour and mix with your hands . try to get all pieces off side of bowl , it will be sticky . form dough or make into a ball .

add in the flour and mix and form the dough .
add the rest of the flour to your mixture . using a spatula , wooden spoon , or clean hands mix the ingredients together well . put your dough mixture onto a flat surface and kneed it for 6 - 8 minutes by folding it over itself and pressing down .

cook the naan in the pan .
place the naan bread in the pan flat . cook the naan with the stove on medium heat .

cook the naan in the pan .
pre - heat the pan at 350 degrees on medium high . put grease on the pan . put the naan in the pan . cook each side for 2 to 3 minutes . when bubbles appear , it is time to flip it over .

cook the naan in the pan .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan . roll the naan in to oval shape . place the naan on the pan . cook the naan on both sides till it is brown .

mix flour sugar salt olive oil and the yeast mixture .
gather all of the measured wet and dry ingredients on the work counter . using a sifter ( screen ) , shake 1 1/2 cups of flour into the mixing bowl . add sugar and salt to the mixing bowl . create a depression in the flour mix and pour the soy milk into the depression . add the olive oil and yeast mixture into the bowl ; mix ingredients in the bowl well .

mix flour sugar salt olive oil and the yeast mixture .
fill a bowl with the flour sugar salt olive oil and yeast mix . mix everything together .

mix flour sugar salt olive oil and the yeast mixture .
divide the flour into 1 1/2 cups and 1/2 cup . swift 1 1/2 cup flour into a mixing bowl . add sugar and salt to flour and mix dry ingredients . now make a small dent in center of dry ingredients and add wet ingredients soy milk oil and yeast mixture . now mix all ingredients in bowl together .

chop garlic slice onion and place them in a bowl .
with a chef knife , place it on top of the garlic , with a blade away from you , and press both ends of knife using your hands , so the garlic is smashed . once the garlic is smashed , cut the garlic into as many as small pieces as possible . take the onion and cut it into very fine slices using the chef knife . make sure the slices are very thin .

chop garlic slice onion and place them in a bowl .
cut garlic into very small pieces . use a knife to thinly slice one half onion . put cut garlic and onion into a bowl .

chop garlic slice onion and place them in a bowl .
get a large knife and a cutting board . chop the garlic until it is in very small pieces . put the garlic in a medium size bowl . cut a half of a large onion into thin slices . add the onion to the bowl with the garlic .

add some chopped green onions and pear to the mixture .
carefully use a knife on a cutting board to cut your green onions into chunks about an inch long . use a cheese grater to grate some of your pear into a bowl with the green onions .

add some chopped green onions and pear to the mixture .
add chopped green onions . add pear . use a cheese grater to grind it into the bowl .

add some chopped green onions and pear to the mixture .
cut the green part of the green onions into inch long pieces . add the green onions to the mixture . use a grater to grind the asian pear into mush . add the ground pear to the mixture .

add some soy sauce stock oil sugar sesame oil sesame seeds and black pepper .
add three tablespoons of soy sauce , one tablespoon of saki ( rice wine ) . add one tablespoon of seasoned rice wine , two tablespoons of sugar , one tablespoon of sesame oil . next , add one teaspoon of salt , one teaspoon of black pepper , 1/2 tablespoon of sesame seeds . make sure that it become combined well .

add some soy sauce stock oil sugar sesame oil sesame seeds and black pepper .
add soy sauce , stock , oil , sugar , sesame oil , sesame seeds , and black pepper . these should be in the same bowl . use your hands to work the oils through the ingredients in the bowl .

add some soy sauce stock oil sugar sesame oil sesame seeds and black pepper .
add 2 table spoons of soy sauce in to the bowl . add a table spoon of sugar in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of sesame oil in to the bowl . add a teaspoon of black pepper powder and a table spoon of sesame seeds in to the bowl . mix them with the hand properly .

add some rib eye beef to the sauce and mix them together .
take the beef and put them into the bowl . with your hands mix everything together .

add some rib eye beef to the sauce and mix them together .
take the rib eye beef and put it into the bowl . next mix it together with the sauce and mix them together with your hands . mix them very gently so the meat does n't break apart too much .

add some rib eye beef to the sauce and mix them together .
place a plastic glove on hand and place thin rib eye slices into sauce mixture . use hand with glove to gently mix together . avoid breaking meat slices .

cook the beef on a grill .
use tongs to remove the beef from the bowl . place the beef onto the grill . make sure the beef is spread out . remove the beef from the grill with tongs when it is cooked .

cook the beef on a grill .
place a wire grill sheet on the grill about 2 inches above the coals . use a set of tongs to place the meat gently on the grill . cook until the meat is fully cooked on the inside .

cook the beef on a grill .
heat grill . place seasoned beef and vegetables to grill , using tongs to spread to one layer . occasionally stir meat to cook evenly . cook meat all the way through .

cook some white onions in a pan .
put you stove on medium low heat . let your onions brown for about three minutes . add in your diced garlic . then season .

cook some white onions in a pan .
turn on the stove and set the dial to medium low . put a saucepan on the stove . put the onions that you chopped up into little pieces in the pan . cook for three minutes . as you do , stir with a spatula . add in garlic , cut into very very tiny pieces ( minced ) .

cook some white onions in a pan .
cut up onions small . cook on low heat fro 3 minutes while stirring for 3 minutes . add minced garlic . stir ingredients . stir .

add finely chopped green onions and a lot of tomato paste .
saute the garlic no more than a 15 to 20 seconds as to not burn it and add basil . add one can of crushed tomatoes and one can of peeled tomatoes . add one cup of water to loosen the sauce a little . use a potato masher to mash all the tomatoes . and stir the sauce with it . this will allow the sauce to have some chunks of tomatoes in your sauce .

add finely chopped green onions and a lot of tomato paste .
add green onions that have been cut into very small pieces to the pan on the stove . add one can of crushed tomatoes . add one can on peeled tomatoes . add one cup of water . use a potato masher to mash the tomatoes in the pan .

add finely chopped green onions and a lot of tomato paste .
add very small chopped green onions , a can of peeled tomatoes , and a can of crushed tomatoes to the pan . use a potato masher and mash up the tomatoes in the pan .

season with sugar salt and black pepper and stir .
pour a small handful of sugar into the sauce . sprinkle a generous amount of pepper into the sauce . sprinkle a small handful of salt into the sauce . mix together .

season with sugar salt and black pepper and stir .
add sugar . add salt and oregano . add half of a grated carrot ( if you like ) .

season with sugar salt and black pepper and stir .
sprinkle salt into the pot . sprinkle sugar into the pot . sprinkle oregano into the pot . sprinkle black pepper into the pot . use a large wooden spoon to stir the ingredients together in the pot .

mix meat loaf blended bread chopped parsley and a beaten egg together .
put one slice of bread into your food processor and turn it on . pour the processed bread into the bowl . beat an egg with an egg beater in another bowl . add parsley , fresh garlic , and the beaten egg to the bowl with meat . use your fingers to mix the ingredients in the bowl together .

mix meat loaf blended bread chopped parsley and a beaten egg together .
use your hands and mix up the meat . throw in the bread and herbs and egg .

mix meat loaf blended bread chopped parsley and a beaten egg together .
use your hands to break apart the chopped meat . cut a slice of bread into small pieces in a food processor and add to the meat . add cut up fresh parsley . cut 2 pieces of garlic into tiny pieces and add to the food . add one egg .

add some milk parmesan cheese and black pepper to the meat and mix it again .
add milk . add a small amount of chili powder . use a greater to add lots of parmesan cheese . add salt and pepper . using your hands , mix everything together until it is all blended .

add some milk parmesan cheese and black pepper to the meat and mix it again .
to your meat mixture , add some milk , to help make things moist . also add a little chili powder , parmesan cheese , and some salt and pepper . use your hands to mix all the ingredients until everything is well - combined ( no longer separate ) .

add some milk parmesan cheese and black pepper to the meat and mix it again .
add some milk . add a small pinch of chili powder . add some grated parmesan cheese . add black pepper to the bowl . use your hands to mix together all of the ingredients until everything is combined .

shape the meat mixture into balls and fry them in a pan .
use your hands to roll the meat into balls . put the meatballs in the hot oil and fry 3 to 4 minutes on each side . cook them over medium to high heat , shake the skillet to turn them over . the meatballs will still be raw inside and will finish cooking in the sauce .

shape the meat mixture into balls and fry them in a pan .
take your hands and roll the meat into balls . set the balls into the pan . fry them on each side for 3 to 5 minutes . the oven should be on medium heat .

shape the meat mixture into balls and fry them in a pan .
slowly roll the meatballs into small or large meatballs , your choice , using your hands . try and keep the meatballs about the same size though . just roll them and set them on your plate . now slowly sit them in the skillet and slowly rock the skillet back and forth so that they roll around and evenly cook . just do this for about 3 - 4 minutes on each side .

coat the meatballs and spaghetti with the sauce .
first add the meatballs to the sauce . cover the pan and simmer for 20 minutes . then place the spaghetti into the sauce . mix the spaghetti into the sauce .

coat the meatballs and spaghetti with the sauce .
drop the meatballs into the pot carefully . mix everything together so the sauce covers everything .

coat the meatballs and spaghetti with the sauce .
with a spoon stir your sauce . put your meatballs into the pan . with your spoon cover the meatballs with the sauce . add your spaghetti to the pan . with your tongs mix the pasta .

boil the potatoes in water .
pour water into a pot . leave room at the top of the pot for the potatoes . turn the burner on high . bring the water to a boil . add the potatoes to the pot and cook for 30 minutes .

boil the potatoes in water .
get a large pan and fill it half way with water . put the pan on the stove and ask a grown - up to turn the heat to medium . place 7 medium size potatoes in the water and let it boil . the potatoes should take about 30 minutes to cook .

boil the potatoes in water .
put water in pot . place pot on the stove . turn the stove on so that the water boils . grab 9 potatoes . when water is boiling , place potatoes into boiling water .

sprinkle salt and pepper on the sausages .
set sausages on a plate . preheat the oil on medium - high . as the oil heats , sprinkle salt onto the sausages . sprinkle pepper on the sausages as well . wait for the oil to finish heating .

sprinkle salt and pepper on the sausages .
add salt into the sausages . then add pepper in to the sausages . we need to wait till the salt and pepper gets into the sausages .

sprinkle salt and pepper on the sausages .
place the sausages on a plate . grab the salt . put very little salt on the sausage . grab the pepper . put very little pepper on the sausage .

place the sausages on the pan .
take out a pan . take out the sausages . put the sausages into the pan .

place the sausages on the pan .
look in your fridge for a sausage . take them to your pan . make sure your pan is big enough for two sausages to fit without touching each other . place the sausages in the pan . turn the sausages once they start to brown on one side .

place the sausages on the pan .
take the sausage . take a pan and place it on top of stove . now put the sausage in to the pan . cook on one side . turn the sausage to other side and cook .

add butter and herbs to the pan .
take some butter . add the butter in to the cooking pan . when the butter melts pour on to the cooking thing . now add fresh herbs like basil and parsley . add 1 garlic in the last .

add butter and herbs to the pan .
add the butter to the pan . add the herbs to the pan . add some garlic as well . as it starts to melt , move the pan around so that it coats everything . take a spoon and scoop some of the butter up and ladle it over the sausage .

add butter and herbs to the pan .
put the butter in the pan . put the herbs in the pan .

finely chop up the chives .
get chives , a knife , and a cutting board . in fast motions , chop up the chives in tiny pieces . when finished , move to the side and repeat step 2 with other chives until finished .

finely chop up the chives .
place chives in a neat pile on cutting board . keeping the tip of the knife on the cutting board make small movements across the pile of chives .

finely chop up the chives .
get a sharp knife out . always keep your hands away from the sharp part of the knife . line up the chives in a stack . with one hand holding all the chives together but out of the way of the knife , rock the blade back and forth chopping the chives . once you 're to the end of the chives , push them to the end of the cutting board in a pile for later use .

mash the potatoes and top with sour cream and chives .
take a fork out of the cabinet . using the tines of your fork , smash the potatoes . repeat until all the potatoes have been smashed . put a spoonful of sour cream on top of the potato mash . sprinkle chives on top of the sour cream .

mash the potatoes and top with sour cream and chives .
squash the potatoes with a fork . put sour cream on top of the potatoes . put chives on top of the sour cream and potatoes .

mash the potatoes and top with sour cream and chives .
after potatoes are cooked , mash them with a fork . put sour cream on top of potatoes . sprinkle chives on top of sour cream .

cook the potatoes in the oven and cut them into half and spoon out the potatoes on to a sieve .
using a hot pad to protect your hands , take the baking sheet of cooked potatoes out of the oven . using a sharp knife , cut each potato in half the long way . put a strainer ( a pan that is full of holes , similar to a metal basket ) into a pan . watch out - the potatoes are hot ! pick up half a potato with a towel or hot pad . using a large spoon , scoop out the cooked potato from the potato skin and put the potato in the strainer . discard the potato skins . do this to each potato .

cook the potatoes in the oven and cut them into half and spoon out the potatoes on to a sieve .
cook potatoes in oven . cut in half . scoop out the insides . place on pan .

cook the potatoes in the oven and cut them into half and spoon out the potatoes on to a sieve .
cook the potatoes in the oven . take the potatoes out of the oven . cut the potatoes in to halves . take a spoon and a strainer . spoon out the potatoes and place them in the strainer .

push the potatoes through the sieve onto a pan .
take the mashed potatoes . push the potatoes to a pan using a sieve . need to push it hard so that it can go through the sieve .

push the potatoes through the sieve onto a pan .
use the flat end of a spoon . push the potatoes through the sieve in the pan .

push the potatoes through the sieve onto a pan .
