take the mesh thing and put the potatoes in it . push the potatoes through the holes of the mesh thing with a spoon .

add hot whole milk butter salt black pepper and mix it well .
fill a cup with milk and put it in the microwave for 30 seconds . pour the hot milk into a pot with 1/4 of a stick of butter . put a little bit of salt in the mixture . put a little bit of pepper in the mixture . mix all of the ingredients .

add hot whole milk butter salt black pepper and mix it well .
carefully pour in the hot whole milk . add the butter . add the salt and pepper . stir it well with a large spoon .

add hot whole milk butter salt black pepper and mix it well .
take some whole milk and bring it to boil . add hot milk in to the bowl . add some butter in to the bowl . add little salt and pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything with a spatula .

soak the mushrooms in nearly boiling water .
put some mushrooms is some water . make sure the water is hot , but not bubbling .

soak the mushrooms in nearly boiling water .
place the mushrooms in the nearly boiling water . let the mushrooms soak in the water while you complete the next steps .

soak the mushrooms in nearly boiling water .
take your mushrooms . put them into very hot , but not boiling , water .

cook the carrots onions and garlic on medium heat until soft .
turn the dial on the stove to medium heat . put carrots , onions , and garlic into the pan . cook them until they are soft .

cook the carrots onions and garlic on medium heat until soft .
cut the carrots and onions into small cubes . add the cut carrots and onions into the pan . add the garlic along and mix well . cook the vegetables on medium heat until it becomes soft .

cook the carrots onions and garlic on medium heat until soft .
put carrots , onions , and garlic in a bowl . heat pan and then add the carrots , onions and garlic . cook on medium heat until vegetables are soft .

add in the mushrooms stir fry until the mushrooms are cooked .
clean and wash the mushroom . cut the cleaned mushrooms to small pieces . add the mushrooms into the pan . stir fry the mushrooms . stir it until it is cooked .

add in the mushrooms stir fry until the mushrooms are cooked .
take the mushrooms on a cutting board . cut the mushrooms in to small pieces . add the mushrooms in to the pan . add the spice to the mushroom . mix the mushrooms well .

add in the mushrooms stir fry until the mushrooms are cooked .
grab all the mushrooms . place them in the pan . add herbs . cook them over medium high heat . fully cook mushrooms .

heat oil in a pan add the lamb and season it with salt and pepper .
let the oil in the pan heat up . put the lamb in the pan . sprinkle a small amount of salt and pepper on the lamb .

heat oil in a pan add the lamb and season it with salt and pepper .
add a bit of olive oil into the pan and let it heat , as you carefully add the lamb into the pan . make sure you break the lamb up in the pan with a spatula as it is cooking . as the lamb is cooking , lets slowly season the lamb by adding salt and pepper into the pan .

heat oil in a pan add the lamb and season it with salt and pepper .
pour oil into pan and heat it up . next add the ground lamb to pan . chop lamb as it cooks with spatula . next add some salt . then add some pepper .

add some wine and chopped mushrooms to the meat and stir and add the vegetables .
add wine to the mix . chop the mushrooms . add them to the pan . add vegetables as well . stir .

add some wine and chopped mushrooms to the meat and stir and add the vegetables .
pour some of the wine into the pan . using a knife , carefully cut the mushrooms . add them to the pan too and stir it up . then pour the vegetables back into the pan .

add some wine and chopped mushrooms to the meat and stir and add the vegetables .
cut the mushrooms into pieces . add a little bit of wine and the mushrooms you just cut to the meat . stir everything together . add the vegetables .

add a little ketchup baked beans frozen peas salt pepper and worcestershire sauce .
first , squeeze some ketchup over the food . not too much , but not too little ! next add some baked beans . now add some frozen peas to the mix . add a little salt and pepper . finally , add some worcestershire sauce .

add a little ketchup baked beans frozen peas salt pepper and worcestershire sauce .
add ketchup to the pan . add baked beans to the pan . add frozen peas to the pan . add salt and pepper to the pan . add worcestershire sauce to the pan .

add a little ketchup baked beans frozen peas salt pepper and worcestershire sauce .
add a small amount of ketchup . add baked beans . add frozen peas . add salt and pepper . add worcestershire sauce .

add the mushroom water and mix it .
use a large plastic ladle to scoop three spoonfuls of the mushroom water into the pan . stir the pan to mix in the mushroom water .

add the mushroom water and mix it .
grab a spoon and the pot with the mushrooms in it . use the spoon to transfer the mushrooms and water to the skillet . mix it the skillet ingredients together .

add the mushroom water and mix it .
take the heated pan with mushroom in it off the stove . grab a large spoon and dig out the mushrooms . place the contents of the large spoon in the center of the dish . repeat this step three times . take the spoon and mix all the ingredients in the dish together .

transfer the meat to a bowl top with a layer of mashed potatoes and grate some cheese .
put the meat into a bowl . add the mashed potatoes on top of the meat . use a grater to slice up the cheese on top of the potatoes and meat .

transfer the meat to a bowl top with a layer of mashed potatoes and grate some cheese .
take a large bowl to mix all the ingredients . transfer the meat into the bowl . add the mashed potatoes on the top layer . grate some cheese and add top of it .

transfer the meat to a bowl top with a layer of mashed potatoes and grate some cheese .
add a few scoops of meat into the bowl with a plastic spoon . use the plastic spoon to flatten out the top of the meat . add a three scoops of mashed potato to the bowl . use the spoon to spread the mash until it covers the meat and touches all the sides of the bowl . with a cheese grater , grate mature cheddar onto the top of the mash .

cook dish in the oven .
turn on the oven so that the dial is on the mentioned heat . open the oven door . grab the dish with an oven mitt and put in in the oven . close the oven door .

cook dish in the oven .
wait until the oven turns into the required temperature . place the chicken in the oven . wait for the required time to beep until it is done . take out the cooked chicken . have it tasty .

cook dish in the oven .
get your dish . put it in the oven on the rack .

add flour ghee carom seeds and salt to a bowl and mix well .
add 1/2 cup of flour to a bowl . put in 1/2 tablespoon of melted ghee . add 1 teaspoon of carom seeds . add some salt as needed to the bowl . mix the ingredients together in the bowl .

add flour ghee carom seeds and salt to a bowl and mix well .
pour in the flour and ghee into the big bowl . use a small spoon and scoop the salt and seeds into the bowl . mix everything around with your hands .

add flour ghee carom seeds and salt to a bowl and mix well .
get out a large glass bowl . add 1/2 cup of plain flour to bowl . add 1/2 teaspoon melted ghee and 1 teaspoon of carom seeds to the bowl , also . add a pinch of salt , or just enough to give it a slightly salty flavor . stir the ingredients together lightly using your fingers .

heat oil for deep frying later .
put oil in a deep pan on the stove . turn on the heat under the pan .

heat oil for deep frying later .
grab pot from cabinet . place pot on top of a burner . fill with oil . ignite burner until flame underneath appears .

heat oil for deep frying later .
turn up the heat on the stove . heat the oil in the pot .

knead dough and roll into oval shape .
take the dough and knead it once or twice . separate the dough into two equal parts and roll it into balls using your hands . now use your rolling pin to roll the dough onto your cutting board . keep rolling the dough into an oval or round shape by flipping it to different sides . roll it until it 's fairly thin .

knead dough and roll into oval shape .
put the dough on a board and , knead it once by pressing and rolling . split the dough into two equal parts . use a rolling pin to roll the dough into an oval or round shape .

knead dough and roll into oval shape .
take the dough ball and squish it flat . squish it into a ball again . keep doing this several times . now roll the dough into an oval with a rolling pin .

add chopped coriander mix and cook .
add your chopped coriander to your pot . use your wooden spoon to mix it all together . now you can turn the heat off and your stuffing is ready .

add chopped coriander mix and cook .
take some coriander on a cutting board . cut the coriander in to small pieces . take the pot on the stove . cook the contents in the pan . add the coriander in to the pot and mix .

add chopped coriander mix and cook .
add 1 teaspoon of chopped coriander . use the stirring spoon to mix the coriander into the bowl while it cooks .

add a little water and mix .
add water into the bowl . use hands to mix the water in with the rest of the ingredients in the bowl . mix until it becomes one firm ball .

add a little water and mix .
hold the cup of water over the bowl . slowly pour water into the bowl . mix everything together with your hands .

add a little water and mix .
sprinkle a bit of water into the dry ingredients and mix together with your fingers . sprinkle a little bit more water and mix again with your fingers . mix this together with your hands until it forms a dough . if the dough is too sticky , add a teaspoon of cornstarch to it and mix it up again . use your hands to knead the dough by mashing it down and folding over again until it makes a nice ball and is ready .

add stuffing to cone and use some water to seal the top edges .
use a spoon to fill the cone almost to the top with stuffing . use your fingers to press down the stuffing a bit . dip your fingers in the water . put the water on the open edges of the cone . press the sides of the open end of the cone together , sealing it .

add stuffing to cone and use some water to seal the top edges .
take a tortilla from a pack . form it into a small cone shape . fill it with pepper mix from the bowl . take water and seal the edges closed . then repeat the process until all are complete .

add stuffing to cone and use some water to seal the top edges .
use a spoon to scoop stuffing and stuff it in the cone . brush some water on the edges and squeeze the top shut .

cut into two halves and roll one half into a cone .
roll the dough in to an oval shape . take a knife and cut the dough in to two halves . take one half of dough . take the dough in the hand . roll the dough in to a cone .

cut into two halves and roll one half into a cone .
place the dough on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the dough in half . use your hand to fold the dough and form into a cone . press the edge of the dough to seal it .

cut into two halves and roll one half into a cone .
cut the dough into two equal halves . pick up one portion and hold it in your palm . roll it from one end to the other forming a cone . make sure the seam is sealed by pressing it with your fingers and pinching the sharp point or edge to make sure it 's sealed .

drain on paper towel .
line a plate with paper towels . use a spatula to remove the samosas from the pain . put the samosas on the paper towel lined plate to drain . place the samosas on a serving plate to serve .

drain on paper towel .
grab a plate and lay a couple paper towels on it . next , grab a skimmer ( looks like a long spatula with tiny holes at the end . ) . when the samosas turn a light golden yellow color they are done cooking . gently lift up the samosas with the skimmer and lay them down on the paper towel . let the samosas cool down for a couple minutes , as they will be hot !

drain on paper towel .
prepare a plate with paper towel on it and bring it close to your pot . use a straining spoon or a spoon with holes to get your samosas out of the frying pot . gently place them on your plate with the paper towel to drain the excess oil . now they 're ready to be served on your nice serving plate .

deep fry sealed samosa on medium heat until golden brown .
scoop the samosa on a spoon . set the samosa into the hot oil . set the stove to medium heat . cook the samosas until they are golden brown .

deep fry sealed samosa on medium heat until golden brown .
take a pot on the stove . add some oil in to the pot . heat the oil in the pot . add the samosas in to the oil and deep fry them . turn the samosas until they are brown in color .

deep fry sealed samosa on medium heat until golden brown .
use a spoon and lower the samosas in the oil slowly . set the stove to medium heat . cook until they turn golden brown .

add garam masala dry mango powder whole coriander seeds and salt .
cook the ingredients in the pan . add 1 teaspoon of garam masala powder in to the pan . add 1/4 th teaspoon of dry mango powder in to the pan . add some coriander seeds in to the pan . add little salt and mix every thing in the pan .

add garam masala dry mango powder whole coriander seeds and salt .
add 1/2 teaspoon of garam masala . add 1/4 teaspoon of mango powder . put 1/4 teaspoon of coriander seeds into the pan . pour in salt as needed .

add garam masala dry mango powder whole coriander seeds and salt .
add 1/2 teaspoon of garam masala to mixture on stove . next , add 1/4 teaspoon dry mango powder . next , add 1/4 teaspoon of whole coriander seeds . lastly , add salt to taste ( about 1/2 teaspoon ) .

cover the dough and let rest for 15 minutes .
put a lid on the bowl of dough . let the bowl sit for 15 minutes .

cover the dough and let rest for 15 minutes .
cover the bowl with another plate . let it sit covered for another 15 minutes .

cover the dough and let rest for 15 minutes .
put a plate on top of the bowl to cover the bowl of dough . set the dough aside and let sit for 15 minutes .

heat oil in pan and add cumin seeds asafoetida ginger potatoes and peas .
heat up some oil in a pan until it is really hot . add the cumin seeds , the asafoetida , the ginger green chili paste , and mix it all up . add the potatoes you cut up and the peas you cooked . mix it until the potatoes and peas are covered in the spices .

heat oil in pan and add cumin seeds asafoetida ginger potatoes and peas .
pour 1 teaspoon of oil into the pan and spread the oil around . heat the pan . add 1/2 teaspoon of cumin seeds . add a pinch of asafoetida . add ginger , potatoes , and peas and mix together with a stirring spoon .

heat oil in pan and add cumin seeds asafoetida ginger potatoes and peas .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . add one tablespoon of oil in to the pan and heat it . add one tablespoon of cumin seeds and little asafoetida in to the pan . add 1 1/2 teaspoons of cut pieces of ginger in to the pan . add i bowl of potato pieces and a bowl of green peas in to the pan .

crush coriander seeds and fennel seeds and put it in a bowl .
the roasted coriander seeds and fennel seeds are to big and hard to eat whole and need to be crushed into smaller pieces . put the whole coriander and fennel seeds on a cutting board . take a rolling pin and roll over the seeds crushing them into smaller pieces . scrape up the crushed seeds and put into a bowl .

crush coriander seeds and fennel seeds and put it in a bowl .
get a rolling pin ready . it is time to crush the roasted coriander and fennel seeds . remove both types of seeds from the bowls and put them together on a cutting board or hard , clean surface . take the rolling pin and slowly roll over the seeds , crushing them into tinier pieces . make sure to crush them the best you can and as small as you can . scoop up the seeds with your hands or spoon then the crushed seeds in a bowl .

crush coriander seeds and fennel seeds and put it in a bowl .
put roasted coriander seeds and roasted fennel seeds onto a cutting board . move a rolling pin over the seeds crushing them into small pieces . put the crushed seeds into a small bowl .

heat oil in a nonstick pan and add 1 tsp cumin seeds finely chopped ginger green chilies and salt .
put a non stick pan on the stove . heat the pan and add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pan . add cumin seeds to the oil , stir , then add chopped ginger . add chopped green chilies . if you do n't want it spicy , then do n't add chilies .

heat oil in a nonstick pan and add 1 tsp cumin seeds finely chopped ginger green chilies and salt .
place nonstick pan on burner and turn on . add 2 tablespoons oil till hot . add 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds to oil . once cumin starts to crackle add 1 thinly chopped ginger root , salt , and 2 chopped green chilies to pan .

heat oil in a nonstick pan and add 1 tsp cumin seeds finely chopped ginger green chilies and salt .
turn on the stove to medium high and place a frying pan on the stove . add oil to cover the bottom of the frying pan and let the oil get hot , about a minute . get a teaspoon measuring spoon and fill with cumin seeds to the edge . add the cumin seeds to the frying pan and let it fry a few seconds . chop ginger green chilies with a knife and add to the frying pan . add a little salt to the frying pan and stir with a spoon .

add mashed potatoes and green peas and mix .
put green chilies in hot pan . add the boiled potatoes and peas to the pan . use a wooden spatula to mix all in pan . turn the flame down , so the cumin seeds do not burn .

add mashed potatoes and green peas and mix .
when the ginger has a brown color , take your wooden spoon and put in the potatoes . then using the same spoon , add in the green peas . mix everything together with the spoon . turn down the heat a little .

add mashed potatoes and green peas and mix .
mix ginger until it is brown . using a wooden spoon , place the smashed potatoes and green peas inside of the pan . turn the heat to low so that the ingredients do not burn . mix all the ingredients inside of the pan using the wooden spoon .

add red chili powder turmeric powder chat masala salt ground spice mixture and garam masala powder and mix .
use a measuring spoon to scoop 1/2 teaspoon of red chili powder , then pour it onto the food in the pan . next , use the measuring spoon to scoop 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric powder , then pour it onto the food in the pan . scoop 1 teaspoon of chat masala with measuring spoon and pour onto food in the pan . scoop up a little bit of salt and ground spice mixture with a spoon and sprinkle onto the food in the pan . scoop 1 teaspoon of garam masala powder , pour onto the food , and mix together with large wooden spoon .

add red chili powder turmeric powder chat masala salt ground spice mixture and garam masala powder and mix .
take the chili powder and pour into pot . take turmeric powder and pour into pot . take chat masala salt and pour into pot . take ground spice and gram masala powder and add to pot . stir everything together with a spoon .

add red chili powder turmeric powder chat masala salt ground spice mixture and garam masala powder and mix .
first dump your chili powder and turmeric powder into the pan . next dump in the chaat masala and salt . finally , dump the ground spice mixture and garam masala powder in to the pan . use your wooden spoon mix all the spices into the food .

add lemon juice .
get a teaspoon measure . pour lemon juice into the teaspoon measure until it is full . pour the lemon juice that is in the teaspoon into the food .

add lemon juice .
slowly pour two teaspoons of lemon juice . pour the juice over top of your pan .

add lemon juice .
add 2 teaspoons of lemon juice using measuring spoons . mix well with a wooden spoon . set aside to cool for 10 - 15 minutes .

roll and cut the dough .
roll a one tablespoon piece of dough into a ball with your hands . dab oil all around your ball of dough using one finger . roll dough into a thin oblong shape . cut rolled dough in half width wise .

roll and cut the dough .
take the big ball of dough . divide the dough in to small balls . roll it round using palms . apply oil and roll it with a stick in to long strip . take a knife and cut it in half .

roll and cut the dough .
put the dough in your hands and roll into small balls and apply oil . put the balls on a cutting board and flatten down . use a rolling pin to roll into an oval shape . use a sharp knife to slice the dough .

shape the dough fill it and seal the edges .
take the cut pieces of dough . shape the dough in to cone like shape . place the filling in the center . apply the water along the sides of the cone . seal the edges to close the filling .

shape the dough fill it and seal the edges .
cut pasta in half first . then shape into cone . next fill with the mixture . moisten the edges and fold to seal it .

shape the dough fill it and seal the edges .
fold the dough a little bit . put the food in the dough . close the dough .

deep fry the samosas .
place frying pan on stove top . heat oil in frying pan to medium heat . lower food item in frying pan of medium hot oil . when nice golden brown take out of pan . drain on a plate lined with paper plate .

deep fry the samosas .
place the samosas in the fryer . fry until golden brown .

deep fry the samosas .
put oil into a pot so it is almost full and place it on the stove . turn the cooking stove to medium heat , or the middle number . place a napkin on top of an empty plate . slowly drop the samosas into the oil . wait until the samosas turn golden brown , not very dark and use a spatula to take them out and place them on the napkin on the plate .

melt a piece of butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat .
put the dial on the stove to medium . put a piece of butter into the pan . wait for it to melt completely .

melt a piece of butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat .
get a heavy sauce pan . turn on stove burner to medium or turn stove knob half way . you want to melt the butter . drop butter in sauce pan and let cook for about a minute .

melt a piece of butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat .
place saucepan on burner . turn on burner to medium . place butter in pan . let it melt for about a minute .

add in some flour and milk and whisk it .
add some flour in to the butter in the pan . whisk it until the bubbles pop up for a minute . add the milk and whisk properly . and make it boil nicely .

add in some flour and milk and whisk it .
add flour to the pan . add milk to the pan . using a whisk , stir the ingredients together .

add in some flour and milk and whisk it .
you have your butter in the pot . add flour to the pot and whisk it until it bubbles . then add in the milk . whisk it until it thickens up .

preheat an oven to 425 f degrees .
set your oven temperature to 425 degrees . keep the oven door closed . wait for the inside of the oven to be heated to 425 degrees .

preheat an oven to 425 f degrees .
preheat the oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit . preheat the oven for at least 5 minutes so that it heats up .

preheat an oven to 425 f degrees .
turn on the oven . press the button or turn the dial , whatever method your oven has . stop when you reach the number 425 f . the oven needs time to get hot , so you need to wait a while until you hear a beep or a timer ( if your oven has one ) that tells you the oven reached the correct temperature .

brush the sauce on two piece of bread and add ham and cheese on top of them .
take two slices of bread . put some sauce on top of bread with a spoon . put some ham on top of each bread . add 2 slices of cheese on to each bread . place the bread on to a tray and bake .

brush the sauce on two piece of bread and add ham and cheese on top of them .
turn the oven on and set it to 425 , when it beeps you know it 's ready . take two pieces of bread , use a spoon and cover them with the sauce . then put a piece of ham on top of the spread . now cover the ham with two slices of cheese . move both pieces of bread onto an oven safe baking sheet . let them bake until you see the cheese turn brown and begin to bubble .

brush the sauce on two piece of bread and add ham and cheese on top of them .
add some sauce on both slices of bread . add as slice of ham to each slice . add two slices of cheese to each slice . bake it in the oven until the cheese is bubbling and brown .

bake it in the oven for 10 minutes and they are ready to serve .
put them in the oven and wait 10 minutes . once 10 minutes is up , let them cool for 2 minutes and they 're ready to eat !

bake it in the oven for 10 minutes and they are ready to serve .
place the pan in the oven . after 7 min , turn the oven light on and peak into the oven . check to see if the cheese is bubbly and brown , usually 10 - 12 minutes . once it 's bubbly and brown , take it out of the oven . cool for 2 minutes .

bake it in the oven for 10 minutes and they are ready to serve .
put on oven mitts . put the baking sheet in the oven . let it bake until the cheese is bubbly and brown , about 10 to 12 minutes . put on your oven mitts and remove the baking sheet from the oven . let it cool 1 to 2 minutes .

add ginger and green onion to the wok .
hold the bowl of ginger and onion over the pan . use something to push them out of the bowl into the pan slowly .

add ginger and green onion to the wok .
take a medium bowl . cook the wok in the bowl . cut the ginger in to small pieces . add the ginger in to the bowl . add cut pieces of green onion in to the bowl .

add ginger and green onion to the wok .
have a spoonful of thin ginger slices ready in a separate bowl . have 2 spoonfuls of chopped green onion ready in a separate bowl . add the ginger to the wok . add the green onion to the wok . stir and mix the wok 's contents while they are still cooking .

roll up the spring roll .
grab a plate . place pastry on plate . add fillings into the spring roll . fold pastry in front and sides with finger . and roll .

roll up the spring roll .
take a spring roll sheet on a paper . fill the contents in the sheet . take one side of the sheet and roll it on to the filling . roll the sides of the sheet . complete the rolling of the spring roll to the other side .

roll up the spring roll .
take one corner of the roll and bend it not quite in half over the stuffing . fold the two side corners over the middle . start rolling from the first folded edge . before it is completely rolled , wet the little corned sticking out with a little water .

seal the roll with water .
now we want to roll it up and get ready to seal it . gently wet your finger with some water and seal up the wrap by rubbing your finger on the edge and rolling once again .

seal the roll with water .
take the spring roll sheet on a plate . fill the center of the sheet with the filling . complete the rolling of spring roll . take some water on the finger tip . apply some water on the free end of roll and seal it .

seal the roll with water .
dip your finger in a small bowl of water . place the water on the remaining corner of the roll . press the corner into the roll to seal .

add cabbage and carrot to the wok and stir fry .
julienne both cabbage and carrots . add to hot wok . stir fry for 2 minutes .

add cabbage and carrot to the wok and stir fry .
put the cabbage and carrots into the pan . use chopsticks to stir the cabbage and carrots . cook for about 2 minutes .

add cabbage and carrot to the wok and stir fry .
hold the cabbage and carrot over the wok . slowly push them into the wok . mix them around with chopsticks while you cook them .

fry pork in oil in a wok .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in the pan . cut the pork in to small slices . add the pork in to the oil . fry the pork in the oil .

fry pork in oil in a wok .
put the fried pork in the pork . cook for 1 minute on medium high heat .

fry pork in oil in a wok .
put a little cooking oil in a wok or deep frying pan . heat the wok or pan over medium high heat . when pan is hot , carefully add sliced pork . stir the pork with chopsticks and cook for about one minute .

place the filling in the center of a pastry wrapper .
put one pastry sheet on a plate . use chopsticks to put the filling in the center of the pastry sheet . roll up the pastry like so .

place the filling in the center of a pastry wrapper .
take one spring roll pastry and lay it on a plate . use a scoop and scoop up the filling . put the filling in the center of the wrapper of the pastry . roll up the pastry .

place the filling in the center of a pastry wrapper .
place a spring roll wrapper on a plate . remove a pair of chopsticks from a drawer . take the spring roll filling and place it on the wrapper . then roll the wrapper up like a tube . finally , repeat until all the wrapper are full .

add salt and pepper to the wok .
take a medium sized bowl . place the contents in the bowl . add some salt in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

add salt and pepper to the wok .
sprinkle a small spoonful of salt on to your ingredients in the wok . then , you will need to add a few sprinkles of red pepper powder to the wok .

add salt and pepper to the wok .
sprinkle some salt and pepper sparingly to wok / dish . stir .

fry the spring rolls in oil until golden .
add spring rolls into the cooking oil . turn them over throughout the cooking process . remove them when they 're golden and brown .

fry the spring rolls in oil until golden .
place the spring rolls into the cooking oil . cook at medium high heat . turn over the rolls so both sides are equally fried .

fry the spring rolls in oil until golden .
take the prepared spring rolls in a plate . take a pot and add some oil in to the pot . heat the oil in the pot . place the spring rolls in the oil . fry the spring rolls till they are golden brown .

cut the avocado and place in a bowl .
take a knife and down the center cut it down the middle . take your knife and grab the pit with it and take it out . take a fork and scrape all of the avocado . put the avocado into the bowl .

cut the avocado and place in a bowl .
use a knife to cut one large ripe avocado in half . remove the seed . use a fork to scoop out the avocado and place into a small bowl .

cut the avocado and place in a bowl .
take your knife and carefully cute the avocado into two pieces . take the pit in the middle of the avocado out . use a fork to scoop out the green middle of the avocado . scoop the middle into an empty bowl . use your fork to mash up the avocado .

cut a lime squeeze on the avocado and stir .
roll a lime on your table , pressing it gently to help release the juice . cut the lime in half through its middle . squeeze 1/2 of the lime so the juice mixes with the avocado . stir the juice until it is completely mixed with the avocado .

cut a lime squeeze on the avocado and stir .
roll lime on the counter . cut in half with a knife . squeeze each half over avocado .

cut a lime squeeze on the avocado and stir .
roll lime on counter . cut lime in half . squeeze lime into avocado . stir .

add 1 tbsp of olive oil to it and season it with a pinch of salt and stir .
put in 1 tablespoon of olive oil in the bowl . take your thumb and pointer finger - and pinch up some salt . mix the stuff in the bowl around .

add 1 tbsp of olive oil to it and season it with a pinch of salt and stir .
put 1 teaspoon in of olive oil . take your fingers and add a little salt . mix it up .

add 1 tbsp of olive oil to it and season it with a pinch of salt and stir .
use a measuring spoon to measure out one tablespoon of olive oil . add olive oil to the bowl . add a small amount of salt to the bowl . stir it all together with a spoon .

lay bacon slices over the coin rack .
take your bacon with your fingers . put the bacon on the rack with some space in between them .

lay bacon slices over the coin rack .
first , get your materials . you will need a metal tray , a coiled rack , aluminum foil that fits on the metal perfectly , and 4 bacon strips . second , place your aluminum foil onto the metal tray . fun fact : the foil will collect the oil from the bacon ! third , put your coil rack on top of the foil . fourth , put your bacon onto the coiling rack one by one in a line . make sure the strips are not touching one another . lastly , put the tray with your bacon strips into the oven for 10 to 15 minutes , and happily serve the bacon nice and hot .

lay bacon slices over the coin rack .
cover the bottom of a cookie sheet with aluminum foil . put a cooling rack on top of the foil . put bacon on the rack , each slice not touching the other . make sure your oven is heated to 350 . put the cookie sheet in the oven for about ten minutes .

cut firm artisan bread into slices .
put your bread on a hard surface . use a sharp knife and cut 4 slices about 1/2 inch thick . put the 4 slices into a pan . turn the oven dial to broil . place pan under the broiler in oven .

cut firm artisan bread into slices .
using a bread knife slice loaf in half . cut 1/2 inch slices of bread from the center . cut 4 slices .

cut firm artisan bread into slices .
using a sharp knife cut bread into half inch slices . four slices are needed for two sandwiches . place bread on a pan and place in broiler to toast .

add 2 eggs and season with salt and pepper .
break two eggs and put it in the pan . spread salt all over the egg into the pan . also spread pepper all over the egg .

add 2 eggs and season with salt and pepper .
use the side of the pan to gently crack the egg shell and pour the contents into the pan . sprinkle a little bit of salt and pepper on top of the eggs in your pan .

add 2 eggs and season with salt and pepper .
spray a large pan with non stick spray . crack two large eggs lightly onto the side of a firm clean surface and add them to the pan . season the eggs lightly with salt and pepper .

slice tomatoes into thin slices .
use a knife cut the tomatoes into thin slices . hold the tomato on its side and carefully use the knife to slice .

slice tomatoes into thin slices .
start frying the eggs and bacon and have it cooking o medium heat . toast your bread . spread the bread with avocado and butter . slice the tomatoes and get them ready for the sandwich . slap them all together once the egg and spinach is done cooking .

slice tomatoes into thin slices .
get 1 tomato and put it on a cutting board . cut the tomato into thin slices using a kitchen knife .

spread avocado mixture on one toast and on the other toast spread olive oil mayonnaise .
take one table spoon of avocado mix . spread this to one toast . take some olive oil mayonnaise . spread this to another toast .

spread avocado mixture on one toast and on the other toast spread olive oil mayonnaise .
get two slices of bread , some avocado spread and a jar of olive oil mayonnaise . generously add avocado spread on one slice of bread and spread with a butter knife . add olive oil mayonnaise to the other slice of bread , and spread with the butter knife . place the two slices of bread together to create your sandwich . enjoy .

spread avocado mixture on one toast and on the other toast spread olive oil mayonnaise .
put the bread on the plate with the toasted side down . with a spatula , spread the avocado mixture on one piece of the bread . with a spoon or spatula , spread a small amount of olive oil mayonnaise on the other piece of bread .

place few leaves of spring greens over the avocado spread slightly press them and add sliced tomatoes on them .
take your leaves and put them onto of your bread . put a tomato on top of your leaves . with your fingers press on your tomatoes and leaves into your bread lightly .

place few leaves of spring greens over the avocado spread slightly press them and add sliced tomatoes on them .
put some lettuce leaves on top of the avocado layer . press on them a little so they stay put . put some sliced tomatoes on top of the lettuce . having the lettuce between the tomatoes and the bread keeps the bread from getting soggy .

place few leaves of spring greens over the avocado spread slightly press them and add sliced tomatoes on them .
add the avocado spread onto one piece of the bread . put the lettuce on top of the avocado spread . add tomatoes on top of the greens .

break the 2 bacon slices into pieces and lay them on the tomatoes .
break two slices of freshly cooked bacon in half . lay slices of bacon over the top of the rest of the ingredients .

break the 2 bacon slices into pieces and lay them on the tomatoes .
cut the bacon in half . put the two pieces of bacon on top of the tomatoes .

break the 2 bacon slices into pieces and lay them on the tomatoes .
take the first slice of bacon and fold it back and forth until it breaks . lay each part of the slice on top of the tomatoes . put them side by side . take the next slice and do the same thing .

place sunny side egg over the top and serve .
take the fried egg out of the pan with a spatula . place the egg on top of the bacon . serve the food right afterwards .

place sunny side egg over the top and serve .
carefully use a spatula to place the cooked egg on top of the bacon . serve your sandwich and eat .

place sunny side egg over the top and serve .
do not turn the egg over in the pan . using the spatula , slide the egg out of the pan . put it on the sandwich , with the part that was in the pan touching the rest of the sandwich .

add lard into a pot .
measure 1/4 cup of lard . use a spoon . put the lard into the pot .

add lard into a pot .
put a 1/4 cup of lard into a pot . if it is difficult to get the lard off the spoon , try tapping it against the top edge of the pot until it comes off .

add lard into a pot .
put a heavy pan onto the stove . turn on the heat . add about 1/4 cup of lard to the pan .

add chopped onions to the pot .
heat pot on the stove . next add cut up onions to the pot .

add chopped onions to the pot .
chop the onion up into tiny pieces using a sharp knife . add the onions that you chopped up into the bowl .

add chopped onions to the pot .
put on goggles to protect your eyes from onion fumes , get out a clean cutting board , find a sharp knife , and peel the outer skin away from the onion . carefully use a sharp knife to cut an onion into small cubes . put the pan on the stove top and turn the burner on so that the dial is set to the middle notch , which is medium - high heat . place the amount of butter we measured into the pan . now add the onion cubes into the pan .

fry the onions in the pot and stir .
the onions in the pan will start bubbling and turning brown . mix them as they cook .

fry the onions in the pot and stir .
set heat to low . put oil in pan over fire . cut onions in small pieces . mix in pan and stir with spoon until brown .

fry the onions in the pot and stir .
put the onions in a hot pan . stir the onions until they start to brown up .

add pork to the pot .
once the mixture begins to turn a little brown on the stove , add your pork in on top . note : your pork should be cut into tiny pieces , about 1 inch high and 1 inch long .

add pork to the pot .
the pan will be bubbling and hot . add the meat pieces in the pan .

add pork to the pot .
wait for the onions to become golden brown . now you can add the pork chunks carefully to the onions and the oil .

add caraway seeds and paprika to the pot and stir .
you are going to want to add a half teaspoon of caraway seed to your pan . just sprinkle it over the meat , making sure your hands do n't touch the hot pan ! no using the same technique , add 1/4 spoon of paprika to the pot . once you have your seasonings in the pan , stir them in with your spoon and let the meat begin to brown .

add caraway seeds and paprika to the pot and stir .
add caraway seeds and paprika to the pot . stir with a wooden spoon .

add caraway seeds and paprika to the pot and stir .
carefully and slowly pour the caraway seeds and paprika to the pot . take a wooden spoon and mix everything around evenly .

pour water in to the pot and cover .
take a measuring cup and put one cup of water in it . pour that water into the pot . cover the pot with a lid .

pour water in to the pot and cover .
measure a cup of water . add the water slowly to the pot . stir everything with your wooden spoon . cover the pot with the lid and let it simmer or cook on low heat for an hour .

pour water in to the pot and cover .
measure out a half cup of water into your measuring cup . add the water to the pan . put a lid on the pot . turn the heat down to low so that the water very slightly boils called simmering ) . let it simmer for an hour .

add flour and water to the pot and stir .
add 1 tablespoon of flour . mix it up until the flour is mixed well . add 1 cup and half of water . mix in . let cook until it starts to get thick .

add flour and water to the pot and stir .
add flour into the pan . using a spoon mix the mixture . put water into the pot . using the spoon mix the mixture .

add flour and water to the pot and stir .
add 1 tablespoon of flour . stir the flower into the bowl . add 1 cup and 1/2 of water and stir it in . cook until it begins to become thick .

put some cloves of garlic chopped red onions chopped parsley into a food processor .
take a clean food processor . add 12 - 13 cloves of garlic in to the food processor . take an onion and cut it in to cubes . add onion in to the food processor . cut parsley and coriander in to small pieces and add it to food processor .

put some cloves of garlic chopped red onions chopped parsley into a food processor .
peel 2 cloves of garlic and put into the food processor . cut 1 red onion 4 ways and put into the food processor . put in 1 handful of coriander and 1 handful of parsley into the food processor .

put some cloves of garlic chopped red onions chopped parsley into a food processor .
put some cloves of garlic . cut the red onions into small pieces . add the cut onions into the food processor . cut the coriander and parsley leaves in to the food processor . everything together in the food processor .

blend them and then add chickpeas .
put it in the blender . press the button to blend it . add chickpeas to the blended food .

blend them and then add chickpeas .
blend the mixture in the food processing bowl . next add cooked chickpeas to the bowl .

blend them and then add chickpeas .
cut the coriander in to small pieces . add the coriander in to the blender . close the lid of the blender and blend it . take the chick peas in to bowl . add the chickpeas in to the blender .

season with cumin powder coriander powder chili powder and sesame seeds .
now you put some of the seasoning on top in the bowl . put the cumin powder coriander powder chili powder in the bowl . throw in a little sesame seeds on everything .

season with cumin powder coriander powder chili powder and sesame seeds .
add little salt on to the food processor . now add some black pepper powder , and one tablespoon of cumin powder . add one table spoon of coriander powder . add one tablespoon of chili powder . add some sesame seeds if you like it .

season with cumin powder coriander powder chili powder and sesame seeds .
add cumin powder to the blender . add coriander powder to the blender . add chili powder to the blender . add sesame seeds to the blender .

add some flour and oil and blend the mixture .
add some baking powder to the bowl ( flour is okay too ) . next add some oil to the bowl . blend the mixture in the food processor .

add some flour and oil and blend the mixture .
add some flour in to the blender jar . take 2 spoons of oil . add the oil in to the blender jar . close the lid of blender jar . on the blender and make it in to paste .

add some flour and oil and blend the mixture .
add some baking powder to the mixture . pour some oil in . blend mixture until it 's uniformly blended .

fry the falafel .
when the oil starts to bubble a little , carefully place up a few falafel into the oil . keep filling the pan with falafel until it 's almost full , but leave enough space so that they do n't touch each other . let the falafel to fry for about 2 - 3 minutes , until they turn golden - brown . use a slotted spoon to remove the finished falafel from the pan .

fry the falafel .
get the falafel . put it into the pan filled with boiling oil .

fry the falafel .
add the uncooked pieces of falafel to the pot of oil one by one . drop them in the pot gently and do n't touch the oil - it will be very hot . add as many falafel pieces as you can without letting them touch each other in the pot . wait a few minutes until the falafel turns a golden brown . use a straining ladle ( one with holes in it ) to carefully scoop out the falafel piece by piece .

heat butter and an onion in a pot .
use a spoon to scoop in the butter into the pot . add one 1 chopped onion into the pot . use a spoon to stir together for 5 minutes .

heat butter and an onion in a pot .
heat butter in a large pot over medium heat . finely chop a medium onion . add onion to pot .

heat butter and an onion in a pot .
put a pot on the stove and turn on the heat under it . add butter to the pot to melt it . add a medium onion which has been chopped into very small pieces . stir the onions every minute or so for 5 minutes .

add tomato paste and cream to the pot .
use a spoon to scoop tomato paste into the pot . then add 1 cup of cream to the pot . use a stirring spoon to mix everything together in the pot .

add tomato paste and cream to the pot .
put the bowl of tomato paste in the pan using a spoon . put the cream into the pot . with a spoon mix them together .

add tomato paste and cream to the pot .
blend some tomatoes in to a fine paste . take the tomato paste in a bowl . add the tomato paste in to the cooking pot . add cream in to the cooking pot . mix the contents of the pot .

stir pasta into the sauce .
hold the pasta bowl over the sauce . carefully scoop in the pasta into the sauce and mix it around with a spoon .

stir pasta into the sauce .
add the cooked pasta into the sauce . use a stirring spoon to mix the pasta into the sauce .

stir pasta into the sauce .
take cooked pasta and slowly add it to the sauce . slowly mix pasta with a spoon or spatula . make sure the pasta and sauce are fully mixed together .

add salt pepper and hot sauce to the sauce .
add 1/2 teaspoon of salt to your sauce . add 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper to your sauce . add 3 drops of hot sauce to your sauce . taste the sauce and see if you would like to add more of the salt , black pepper , or hot sauce to your sauce ,

add salt pepper and hot sauce to the sauce .
put a half of teaspoon salt and a quarter teaspoon of black pepper into the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the salt and pepper in the pot . lastly , add 3 drops of tabasco to the pot . stir the tabasco into the pot .

add salt pepper and hot sauce to the sauce .
hold the salt over the pot . pour the salt in the pot . do the same with the black pepper . drip a couple drips of hot sauce in the pot .

add vodka to the pot .
put vodka in a measuring cup . add vodka to heated pot . lower the heat and let the vodka simmer for 4 - 5 minutes .

add vodka to the pot .
add some vodka to the pot . stir it in to the mixture . cook for 4 to 5 minutes .

add vodka to the pot .
take a pot and place it on the stove . cook the ingredients of the pot . take one cup of vodka . add one cup of vodka in to the pot . mix the contents in the pot .

mix spinach parsley tomatoes green onion crest lemon juice and pepper .
take a medium sized mixing bowl . add some spinach in to the bowl . add cut pieces of parsley and tomato in to the bowl . add green crest in to the bowl . add some lemon juice and some pepper powder in to the bowl .

mix spinach parsley tomatoes green onion crest lemon juice and pepper .
put the spinach into the bowl . a handful of parsley chopped → you are going to cut the parsley into pieces . then add your tomatoes and green onion that are sliced → cut into thin small strips . add some crest trimmings → cut the top of the crest with scissors . squeeze some lemon juice and add some pepper and mix together everything with your hands .

mix spinach parsley tomatoes green onion crest lemon juice and pepper .
pour the spinach parsley tomatoes green onion crest lemon juice and pepper into a big bowl . use your hands to mix everything together .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
put the lid onto the food processor . run the food processor and blend all of the ingredients . pour the finished blended ingredients into a bowl .

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
take a small food processor . add the ingredients in the food processor . close the lid of the food processor . run the food processor . blend the ingredients ,

blend the ingredients in the food processor .
put the lid on the food processor . press the power button on the food processor to blend .

fry the falafel in a pan .
set the falafel into the frying pan . let them sit for 2 to 3 minutes . after 3 minutes flip them over and let the other side cook for the same time .

fry the falafel in a pan .
heat a pan up on the stove . place the falafel in a pan one by one , you should hear them sizzle . cook for about 2 - 3 minutes per side . then remove them from pan and repeat until all your falafel are done . do n't crowd the pan .

fry the falafel in a pan .
heat the pan with the oil in it . gently add the falafels to the pan , it should sizzle if heated properly . cook until browned about 2 - 3 minutes . flip and cook that side for another 2 - 3 minutes until browned . remove the falafels from the pan and set on a plate .

stuff the pita bread with salad falafel and chili sauce .
take the pita bread with opening in the middle . place the salad falafel in to the pita bread . add some vegetables in to the bread . take some chili sauce in a small bowl . add the chili sauce in to the pita bread .

stuff the pita bread with salad falafel and chili sauce .
open the pita bread so there is an opening on one side . use your hands to stuff the pita with salad . f . put falafel in pita with lettuce . put more salad into pita . sprinkle a few drops of sweet chili sauce in pita .

stuff the pita bread with salad falafel and chili sauce .
put some salad inside the pita . add the falafel in the pita . top the falafel with more salad . drizzle the chili sauce on top . eat .

add chickpeas lemon juice onion coriander garlic paprika cumin and flour to a food processor .
add chick peas in to the food processor bowl . add cut pieces of onion in to the bowl . add garlic and paprika in to the bowl . add cumin in to the food processor . add some flour and lemon juice in to the food processor .

add chickpeas lemon juice onion coriander garlic paprika cumin and flour to a food processor .
open the can of chickpeas . put the chickpeas , measured onion , coriander , garlic , paprika and cumin into the food processor . sprinkle one and a half table spoons of flour on the top of the other ingredients . cut the lemon in half with a knife , and squeeze the juice of one half on the flour . put the lid on the food processor .

add chickpeas lemon juice onion coriander garlic paprika cumin and flour to a food processor .
add the ingredients to the food processor . add lemon and cumin on top then it is ready for the next step .

roll the pizza dough and place it on parchment paper .
place your dough on a cutting board if you have a big one . roll out the pizza dough with a rolling pin . make it about 1 foot wide . stretch the pizza dough a little bit with your fingers . try to keep it even .

roll the pizza dough and place it on parchment paper .
use a rolling pin and flatten the dough into a 12 inch pizza base . flatten the dough out even . set the dough onto wax paper .

roll the pizza dough and place it on parchment paper .
take a rolling board and a rolling pin . place the pizza dough on the rolling board . roll the dough in to thin oval sheet . take the parchment paper on the board . . place the pizza dough on to the parchment paper .

remove from the oven and slice .
get oven mitts for both hands and put them on . very carefully take the pizza out of the oven . put the pizza on the counter and wait 10 minutes for it to cool . very carefully cut the pizza into triangles with the pizza wheel . put a slice or two of pizza on a plate .

remove from the oven and slice .
get some oven mitts . grab the pan with the oven mitts carefully from the oven .

remove from the oven and slice .
remove the pizza from the oven using oven mitts . use a pizza slicer to cut the pizza into even pieces .

add tomato puree salt chili flakes oregano and garlic and stir .
in a food processor puree a large can of whole tomatoes . you will know when it is done because it will look like a spaghetti sauce ! add a couple pinches of salt and red pepper flakes . add fresh oregano . chop a whole garlic clove into very small pieces and add to your sauce . stir over a heated stove until it boils . lower your flame and keep the sauce on a low flame until it looks like half of it has disappeared ! this is called a reduction .

add tomato puree salt chili flakes oregano and garlic and stir .
add 300 grams of tomato puree to the pan . put in some salt and chili flakes . add oregano and garlic to the pan . use a spoon to stir all of the ingredients together as it cooks .

add tomato puree salt chili flakes oregano and garlic and stir .
carefully pour in the tomato puree . shake the salt and chili flakes into the tomato puree . use your hand and drop in the oregano and garlic . stir with a wooden spoon .

pour and spread the sauce on the pizza base and add a layer of grated mozzarella cheese and top with pepperoni .
scoop sauce out of the pot with a large ladle . use the bottom of the ladle to to smooth the sauce onto the crust so that it evenly covers the top of the crust . using your hands gently sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the sauce . using your hands place pepperonis on top of the cheese about two inches from each other .

pour and spread the sauce on the pizza base and add a layer of grated mozzarella cheese and top with pepperoni .
scoop up the pizza sauce with spoon . spread the sauce evenly around the pizza dough . add mozzarella cheese to cover the sauce . add pepperonis top the top of the cheese .

pour and spread the sauce on the pizza base and add a layer of grated mozzarella cheese and top with pepperoni .
use a ladle or big spoon to spread the sauce around the crust . make sure it 's even and covers all of the crust . use one hand to sprinkle the cheese around . place pepperonis in even lines over the crust .

bake it in the oven .
take the baking sheet and place it in the oven . bake the pizza for 10 minutes .

bake it in the oven .
preheat your oven and put your pizza onto a baking sheet or pizza stone . place the pan and pizza into the oven very carefully . allow the pizza to bake for about ten minutes or until the crust becomes a deep golden brown .

bake it in the oven .
preheat oven to 350 degrees . remove the pizza from all of it 's packaging . place pizza on a baking sheet . place the baking sheet on the center rack of the oven . bake the pizza for ten ( 10 ) minutes .

add vegetable to a hot pan .
turn on your stove and put it on low heat . low heat helps the oil not to splash . grab a decently big pan and put it on the stove with low heat . grab your bottle of oil and pour the oil into the pan in a small circle . grab the handles of the pan and tip it to where the oil spreads everywhere inside the pan . leave it for few seconds to warm up .

add vegetable to a hot pan .
add oil to the pan . heat oil up . add vegetables to the hot pan .

add vegetable to a hot pan .
warm up the pan by turning the knob on your stove top . add vegetable oil to the pan once it has been warmed up . tilt the pan to all sides so the bottom of the pan is covered by the oil .

add pieces of chicken to the pan and mix .
put a skillet on the stove and turn the stove to medium . add a little olive oil in the pan . add the cut up chicken to the pan and stir it around with a wooden spoon until it is no longer pink .

add pieces of chicken to the pan and mix .
add chicken to pan . cook it .

add pieces of chicken to the pan and mix .
add your pieces of chicken to your hot pan on the stove . use a spoon to stir the chicken around as it starts to cook .

add onion ginger carrots and curry powder to the pan and stir .
add onion , ginger , carrots and 2 tablespoons of curry powder . stir in ingredients well .

add onion ginger carrots and curry powder to the pan and stir .
add onion and ginger into a pan . cut the carrots into small pieces . add the cut carrots and the curry powder into the pan . mix together and stir altogether with the spatula .

add onion ginger carrots and curry powder to the pan and stir .
put the chopped onion , ginger and shredded carrots to the pan . measure two tablespoons of curry powder and add to pan . use a wooden spoon to stir all in pan .

add minced garlic to the pan and stir .
add a teaspoon of minced ( cut into very small pieces ) garlic to the pan . use a wooden spatula to stir while cooking .

add minced garlic to the pan and stir .
first , you want to add one teaspoon of minced garlic to the pan . make sure you mix it in well . move it all around the pan and get it mixed in with the other ingredients . stir with a wooden spoon and make sure you do n't touch the pan with your hands .

add minced garlic to the pan and stir .
add the minced garlic to the pan . carefully stir the mixture with a wooden spoon .

add soy sauce and hoisin sauce to the pan and stir .
pour a small amount of soy sauce to the pan . do n't add too much , soy sauce is very salty . next add three teaspoons of hoisin sauce to the pan . stir well .

add soy sauce and hoisin sauce to the pan and stir .
add some soy sauce to the skillet . add some hoisin sauce to the skillet . stir .

add soy sauce and hoisin sauce to the pan and stir .
pour some soy sauce into the pan . pour some hoisin sauce into the pan . use a spoon to stir the food in the pan .

add bean sprouts to the pan and stir .
add bean sprouts to pan . stir evenly .

add bean sprouts to the pan and stir .
put bean sprouts in pan . stir the bean sprouts .

add bean sprouts to the pan and stir .
put bean sprouts into pan . use a wooden spoon to stir the bean sprouts into the pan .

add udon noodles to the pan and stir .
add cooked udon noodles to the pan . use a spaghetti spoon to break the noodles apart and stir . use a spaghetti spoon and wooden spoon to help mix everything up .

add udon noodles to the pan and stir .
add the udon noodles ( they have already been cooked ) to the pan . stir well with a spoon .

add udon noodles to the pan and stir .
add noodles to the pan . stir . cook on stove .

cover the pan with a lid .
grab a towel to pick up the lid if it is metal . pick up the lid for the pan that you are currently cooking with . gently place the lid onto the pan .

cover the pan with a lid .
set the food to simmer so all the flavors can mix . cover the pan with a lid .

cover the pan with a lid .
put the lid on top of the pan to cover . leave the lid on the pan to allow all the flavors to blend .

add water chestnuts to the pan .
pour water chestnuts into the pan . cover the pan back with the lid .

add water chestnuts to the pan .
put water chestnuts into the pan . put lid back on pan .

add water chestnuts to the pan .
add water chestnuts to the pan . they add some crunch .

put some olive oil in the pan and saute guanciale .
pour some olive into a pan . add some guanciale to the oil . now you let it get really hot . wait until it turns brown , stirring with a wooden spoon every few seconds !

put some olive oil in the pan and saute guanciale .
turn the heat on under a frying pan . add enough olive oil to just about cover the bottom of the pan . ( some people prefer to use butter instead of olive oil . ) . once the oil is hot , add the guanciale . fry the guanciale until it begins to become brown and a little crispy .

put some olive oil in the pan and saute guanciale .
heat up the pan , on medium high heat . add a little olive oil to the pan . add guanciale to the oil and cook it . stir the guanciale while you cook until it turns brown .

mix some parmesan cheese and pepper with the eggs in a bowl .
crack about 3 eggs into a bowl . try to use mostly of the yellow part of the inside of the egg . mix in about 1/4 cup of grated parmesan cheese . use your pepper shaker or grinder to add in some pepper . stir all these ingredients .

mix some parmesan cheese and pepper with the eggs in a bowl .
grab a pinch full of parmesan cheese and place it on top of the eggs . next , add a pinch of pepper on top of that . finally , mix with a large spoon .

mix some parmesan cheese and pepper with the eggs in a bowl .
put the cheese and pepper in the bowl with the eggs . use a spoon and careful mix it together so it does n't spill .

drain the pasta and add it to the pan .
stir the ingredients in the pan . drain the noodles in the strainer over the sink . put the noodles into the hot pot with tongs . then you add the mixture from the bowl .

drain the pasta and add it to the pan .
grab drain for pasta . drain out water to get ready for mixture . mix in hotpot . add mixture .

drain the pasta and add it to the pan .
you need to drain the pasta into the colander placed in the sink carefully . then you can put the pasta back in its pot to take it to the stove to add to your skillet . now you can add the pasta to your hot pot with the mixture . you can use tongs to make sure all the pasta is in your pot . now you can stir it using the tongs to combine everything .

add the egg mixture on the pasta and mix .
use a spoon to scoop the mixture from the bowl into the pasta . use a spoon to stir the mixture into the pasta .

add the egg mixture on the pasta and mix .
use a spoon to scoop your egg mixture into the pasta bowl . use some of the pasta to help you get extra egg mix out of the bowl . use your stirring spoon to mix the egg mix and pasta together .

add the egg mixture on the pasta and mix .
hold the mixture over the pasta . use a fork to scoop the mixture out into the pasta . mix the pasta up with the fork .

gradually add milk while stirring the potatoes .
add a little bit of milk at a time . stir as you add the milk . do not add more than one half cup of milk total . when it gets to the way you like it , they are ready !

gradually add milk while stirring the potatoes .
now you will add some milk to the mashed potatoes . slowly pour some in , then mix it in . you want to go slowly to get the thickness that you want for the potatoes . continue to add a small amount of milk , stirring , and checking the thickness .

gradually add milk while stirring the potatoes .
add a small amount of milk into the potatoes . stir the milk with your spoon into the potatoes . continue to add small amounts of milk and stirring until the potatoes become smooth and fluffy .

mash the potato .
get the potato masher . mash the pieces of potato with the potato masher until all the lumps are gone .

mash the potato .
potatoes are in the pot and drained . with a potato masher , mash the potatoes until there are no big lumps .

mash the potato .
put the drained potatoes back into the pot . using a hand potato masher , mash the potatoes . mash until all the big lumps are gone from the potatoes .

boil some small pieces of potatoes in water .
take a pot and place it on the stove . add some water in to the pot and boil the water . cut potatoes in to the inch shaped pieces . add the potatoes in to the boiling water . boil the potatoes in the water .

boil some small pieces of potatoes in water .
cover the pot with a lid . turn the heat up . let the water in the pot bubble up .

boil some small pieces of potatoes in water .
fill medium pot 2/3 full of water . add salt to water . add peeled and potatoes cut into small pieces . put lid on and heat pot to boiling and cook for 15 minutes over medium heat .

add some butter and salt and stir .
take the mashed potatoes in the large bowl . add some butter into the potatoes . add a small quantity of salt into it . mix all the ingredients properly .

add some butter and salt and stir .
add a tablespoon of butter to the pan . stir in the butter until it melts in , making sure to mix thoroughly . add some salt and pepper , for flavor . you may add optional spices now , such as garlic .

add some butter and salt and stir .
add a tablespoon of butter . stir until all melted . add a dash of salt and pepper . mix until smooth .

put butter mustard and shredded cheese in a bowl and mix to combine .
put a spoonful of creme into the bowl . put a spoonful of dijon mustard into the bowl . put a spoonful of cheese into the bowl . mix it all up together .

put butter mustard and shredded cheese in a bowl and mix to combine .
take a clean medium sized bowl . add one tablespoon of butter in to the bowl . add one tablespoon of mustard in to the bowl . add one handful of cheese in to the bowl . take a spoon and mix everything in the bowl .

put butter mustard and shredded cheese in a bowl and mix to combine .
place one spoon of creme fresh . add one spoon of dijon mustard . add a handful of brie cheese . mix the bowl of ingredients .

spread the mixture on 2 pieces of bread and put ham on top of one piece of bread .
spread the mixture onto two pieces of bread . put ham in layers on top of one slice of bread .

spread the mixture on 2 pieces of bread and put ham on top of one piece of bread .
take two pieces of bread on a board . spread the mixture on a breads with a spoon . now put the mixture on another bread with a spoon . take the ham in a bowl . place the ham on top of one bread .

spread the mixture on 2 pieces of bread and put ham on top of one piece of bread .
use a spoon to spread a thick layer of mixture on each piece of bread . place pieces of ham that are folded over on themselves on top of the bread with mixture . layer the ham on so that it 's nice and thick .

put the other piece of bread on the one with ham .
put the other piece of bread on top of the first . put just a little salt on the top .

put the other piece of bread on the one with ham .
put a piece of bread on top of the other piece of bread with ham . serve .

put the other piece of bread on the one with ham .
grab the other piece of bread . place on top on the bread with ham on it . sprinkle a pinch of salt on top of the bread .

heat some butter in a pan and put the sandwich on the pan .
use a butter knife to slice two pieces of butter off of the stick of butter . place the pieces of butter onto a pan placed on the stove . once the butter melts place the sandwich in the middle of the pan .

heat some butter in a pan and put the sandwich on the pan .
get a medium sized pan . with parental supervision , turn the stove on to medium heat . using a butter knife , cut some thick slices of butter . carefully , place the butter on to the pan making sure not to touch the pan . once you see the butter starting to bubble up , place your sandwich onto the pan .

heat some butter in a pan and put the sandwich on the pan .
turn the burner on medium and let the pan heat up . when the pan is hot , put in two pieces of butter . when the butter has melted and starts bubbling , put the sandwich in the pan . be careful , it is hot !

cook the sandwich in an oven .
turn the oven on medium . put the sandwiches on the pan and place the pan into the oven . wait for 8 minutes . use a pot holder to remove pan with sandwiches from the oven and place on counter .

cook the sandwich in an oven .
turn your oven on to 350 degrees . grab the pan from the stove with your sandwich on it and place it into the hot oven . leave it for 8 minutes . remove the pan carefully from the oven and turn the oven off .

cook the sandwich in an oven .
take the pan off heat . place the pan into the heated oven . once it 's melted and looks browned , remove it . remember : it 'll be hot so use an oven mitt .

add some fresh parsley leaves and black pepper and mix it well .
put some fresh parsley and black pepper into the bowl . use a mixing spoon to mix all together .

add some fresh parsley leaves and black pepper and mix it well .
chop up some fresh parsley , about a tablespoon , and add it to the bowl . add about half a teaspoon of black pepper to the bowl . mix the ingredients in the bowl with a wooden spoon .

add some fresh parsley leaves and black pepper and mix it well .
grab some fresh parsley leaves with your hands and throw them in . throw in some black pepper . mix everything mix a spoon .

add red bell pepper and green peppers onto the bowl .
take a mixing bowl . add the contents in the mixing bowl . take a red and green bell pepper . cut the peppers in to small pieces . add the bell peppers in to the mixing bowl .

add red bell pepper and green peppers onto the bowl .
hold the ingredients over the big bowl . pour in the bowls of pepper and green peppers .

add red bell pepper and green peppers onto the bowl .
add red bell peppers into the bowl . pour in chopped green peppers .

add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
take a large mixing bowl . add the pasta and other ingredients in the bowl . cut the cucumber in to small pieces and add them in to the bowl . add some cherry tomatoes in to the bowl . add a cup of cheese and mix everything in the bowl .

add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
pour in the cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese . use a wooden spoon to mix everything together all around .

add cucumber dry tomatoes and cheese and mix it well .
a large bowl add cucumber , dry tomatoes , and cheese . mix well .

toss the pasta salad .
in a large metal mixing bowl stir together the pasta and the other ingredients with a large wooden cooking spoon . put the pasta mixture on plates and serve it .

toss the pasta salad .
in a silver bowl , medium size stir contents with a spatula . inside the bowl is pasta . past is multi colored , green and green . also in bowl are diced tomatoes , diced cucumbers , diced olives . mix thoroughly and put on a plate .

toss the pasta salad .
put all ingredients in a large bowl . find a large spoon . use spoon to mix ingredients until fully mixed .

add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
use one cup of fusilli pasta that should be precooked and put into a bowl . get some black olives and cherry tomatoes and add them to the bowl of pasta .

add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
pick up the bowl of colorful pasta and pour it in the silver bowl . then add the black olives . then add the red tomatoes .

add 1 cup of fusilli pasta into a bowl and add the black olive and cherry tomatoes .
pour in 1 cup of pasta into the bowl . add black olives to the bowl . pour in the cup of cherry tomatoes to the mixture .

mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
mix the dressing which is 5 tablespoons olive oil , 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar . 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder , 1/2 teaspoon oregano , 1/2 teaspoon black pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt . use a whisk to mix and then add to the pasta .

mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
used a whisk to stir the dressing . pour the dressing onto the pasta . stir the pasta and spread the dressing evenly throughout .

mix the dressing and pour on the pasta .
get a small bowl . measure out 5 tablespoons olive oil , 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar , 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder , 1/2 teaspoon oregano , 1/2 teaspoon black pepper , and 1/2 teaspoon salt . pour all the measured ingredients into the small bowl and mix them with a small whisk . pour mixture in bowl into the bowl of pasta .

add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
add some heavy cream into a large bowl . add milk to the bowl . add the cheese mixture into the bowl . stir the bowl with a stirring spoon .

add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
hold the bowl of milk over the bigger bowl . pour in the milk slowly . use your hands and throw the cheese in the mix .

add cream milk and cheese to a bowl .
take a large glass bowl . take some cream milk in a small bowl . take some cheese in a plate . add the cream milk in to the big bowl . add the cheese in to the milk in the bowl .

sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
take a large glass bowl . add the cooked macaroni along with the sauce in the glass bowl . take some cheese in a bowl . sprinkle the cheese on to the macaroni . spread the cheese evenly on the macaroni .

sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
add cheese to the macaronis . spread the cheese evenly over the pan .

sprinkle cheese onto the macaroni .
now we will sprinkle on our smoked cheddar cheese . after we put a good amount of he cheddar we can go ahead and add some colby monetary jack cheese as well .

add seasoning .
mix the macaroni and milk in the bowl . sprinkle pepper into the mixture . sprinkle salt into the bowl . stir the mixture with a big plastic spoon .

add seasoning .
add in some salt and pepper to the bowl . use the stirring spoon to mix in the seasoning with the rest of the ingredients in the bowl .

add seasoning .
add a pinch of salt and black pepper . stir with a spoon to mix in well .

cook the macaroni in boiling water .
pour the macaroni into the boiling water . follow the directions on the back of the box for how long to cook it .

cook the macaroni in boiling water .
wait until the water is bubbling fast . pour the macaroni into the boiling water . let the macaroni cook in the water .

cook the macaroni in boiling water .
add water to a pot . heat the water on high until it bubbles and boils . add raw macaroni to the boiling water . let macaroni cook in the boiling water . check the box for the amount of time to boil .

grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
use butter to grease the bottom of the pan . spread the butter all around the bottom of the pan . add the pasta to the bottom of the pan .

grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
rub a stick of butter all over the pan . fill the pan with the cooked macaroni .

grease the pan with butter and fill with macaroni .
unwrap the paper off the top inch of a stick of butter . holding the stick of butter around the wrapped side , rub the unwrapped portion of butter all along the inside of the dish . make sure to spread butter covering the entire bottom and sides of the pan . take the boiling pasta and pour it into a colander in the sink to drain it . take the drained pasta and spoon it into the buttered ( greased ) pan .

pour the sauce onto the pasta .
mix the sauce very well with a spoon . pour the sauce all over the pasta that is in a dish . use a spoon to spread it around evenly .

pour the sauce onto the pasta .
pour the sauce into the pan over the pasta . use a stirring spoon to spread the sauce evenly out throughout the pan .

pour the sauce onto the pasta .
hold the bowl of sauce over the pasta pan . carefully pour the sauce onto the pasta .

bake the macaroni in the oven .
sprinkle cheese over the top of the macaroni . pick up the glass pan of macaroni . place it into an oven that is already heated to 350 degrees . let it bake for 35 - 45 minutes . it is ready when it is starting to turn a golden brown on the top .

bake the macaroni in the oven .
add the macaroni and cheese into the tray . switch on the oven to preheat the oven . wait until the beep sound comes . put the tray inside the oven . wait for at least 10 - 15 minutes .

bake the macaroni in the oven .
set the macaroni pan into the over . set the oven to 350 degrees . bake for 30 to 45 minutes .

mix in the eggs .
add the egg mixture into the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the eggs in with the rest of the ingredients .

mix in the eggs .
pour the bowl of mixed eggs into the big bowl of mixture . stir with a spoon .

mix in the eggs .
pour in the bowl of eggs . use a spoon to mix everything up good .

add chard to pot and stir .
dump in some chard into the pot . using the stirring spoon and mix in the chard and cook for 15 minutes .

add chard to pot and stir .
put the greens into the hot contents of the pot . stir the greens into the contents with a wooden slatted spoon . simmer for about 15 minutes .

add chard to pot and stir .
add chart to the pot . stir it with a spoon .

dice chard and put in a bowl .
be sure to thoroughly wash your swiss chard . you may use the stems as well as the leaves . chop the stems in thin slices . chop the leaves into bite - sized pieces using a sharp knife .

dice chard and put in a bowl .
carefully take a knife and cut across the leaves of the chard . turn them and cut the other way to make small pieces . put the chard in a bowl .

dice chard and put in a bowl .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the chard leaves on a board . cut the chard in to long strips vertically . cut each strip in to small pieces . take the cut pieces of chard in a bowl .

add onions and diced celery .
drop in the diced onions to the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix the onions into the dish . add diced celery to the pot . continue to mix for 4 minutes until the onion begin to turn brown .

add onions and diced celery .
once your meat is starting to brown , toss in your onions . once the onions are in there , start stirring them up . now go ahead and add in the diced celery . once the veggies are in , cook them for around 4 minutes . make sure you keep stirring them with your spoon .

add onions and diced celery .
take a pan on the stove . cut the onions in to small pieces . add the onions in to the pan . cut the celery in to small pieces . add the celery in to the pan .

add minced garlic .
take a large pan on the stove . add the vegetables in to the pan . add the onions in to the pan . cut the garlic in to very small pieces . add the garlic in to the pan .

add minced garlic .
add 4 cloves of minced garlic . stir the garlic in and cook for about 1 minute .

add minced garlic .
add finely chopped garlic . stir it in with your spoon . just cook it for about a minute .

add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .
pour some chopped cabbage into the pot and stir it with a wooden spoon . put in a big pinch of red pepper flakes and a big pinch of italian herbs . put an even bigger pinch , maybe a tablespoon of salt into the pot . stir everything together again with your spoon .

add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .
put chopped cabbage into the pot . stir with a spoon . put red pepper flakes into the pot . put dry italian herbs into the pot . put salt into the pot , stir with a spoon .

add chopped cabbage red pepper flakes and italian herbs .
add chopped cabbage to the soup . put in red pepper flakes . add italian herbs . use a spoon to stir all of the ingredients into the soup .

take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
remove the beans from the pods . get about 1 cup of beans . pour the beans into the pot .

take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
open each pod . remove the beans . you can run your thumbnail along the pod to remove the beans . drop the beans in the pot .

take the beans out of the pods and put them into the pot .
