push the beans out with your thumb into a clean empty bowl . take bowlful to sink and turn faucet on so water will cover the beans . swish your clean hand around beans to rinse stuff off them before cooking . when they are clean , drain water from bean bowl and put clean beans into a really big pot of water , cover with lid and let pot of beans soak overnight so they will be soft and quicker to cook . in the morning , pour beans into a strainer then rinse them and now the beans are ready to be cooked so go - ahead and dump beans into a fresh clean pot .

add pasta to pot .
open up a bag of pasta . pour pasta into the pot .

add pasta to pot .
get out some pasta . pour the pasta into a large pan .

add pasta to pot .
cook the sauce in one pot . next put the ditalini , little mini tubes to another pot .

add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .
once the garlic is cooked , we will add in our chicken broth . we can also pour in a bit of water with the broth . now add one can of crushed tomatoes to our mixing bowl . careful not to spill anything .

add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .
after the garlic has cooked for about a minute , add chicken broth and water . add one can of plum tomatoes .

add chicken broth and water and crushed tomatoes .
slowly pour in the chicken broth and water . open 1 can of crushed tomatoes with a can opener and pour it in .

add garbanzo beans .
add garbanzo beans to the mixture . stir the mixture together .

add garbanzo beans .
put the garbanzo beans into the pot of soup . use a wooden spoon to stir .

add garbanzo beans .
pour garbanzo beans into the soup . stir the beans into the soup with a spoon .

saute chopped bacon in oil .
cook the chopped bacon in oil . stir it around with a wooden spoon .

saute chopped bacon in oil .
grab a large pot and place it on the stove . turn on heat to about medium high . put about 2 tablespoons of olive oil in pot . cut up some bacon into small bits . add bacon into the pot .

saute chopped bacon in oil .
get a pot and put it on the oven at medium heat . cut up some italian bacon . put the italian bacon in the pot . add a few tablespoons of olive oil . when just browned add chopped onions .

add water to pot .
pour water into the soup . stir the water in the soup and continue to cook .

add water to pot .
bring the soup to a boil . while the soup is boiling , add water . you should add water when you notice the level of soup getting lower in the pot .

add water to pot .
once you see the soup boiling , we need to add water . just slowly pour the water into the soup , but do n't pour to fast or it may splash out .

simmer the soup .
turn the heat to medium low . simmer the mixture . cook for about 45 minutes .

simmer the soup .
cook the canned bean product on high . wait for the soup to simmer . turn heat down to a medium - low heat for 45 minutes . cranberry beans should be tender .

simmer the soup .
let the soup heat up on the stove . set the dial to medium low . let the soup bubble up a little bit .

stretch the dough .
put dough on to table covered with flour . pat it until it is flat and even . play with the dough make a rectangle shape out of it . fix any holes .

stretch the dough .
spread and flatten the dough out . pick it up and stretch it in the air so it gets longer and flatten it out more .

stretch the dough .
sprinkle flour over a clean counter . put flour on your hands and fingers so the dough does not stick to your hands . place the dough on top of the floured counter . use your hands to gently stretch and roll the dough out from the corners . shape the dough into a rectangular shape .

cut the dough into squares .
use your knife to cut the dough in half the long way . then , still going the long way , cut each half in half again . now cut the dough in half the other way - going across the short way . then , still going across , cut each of those halves in half again . you will end up with pieces that are like small squares . they do n't have to be exact .

cut the dough into squares .
cut dough in squares by first making a line down middle with knife . carefully pull knife lengthwise down middle , then down middle of both sides . cut across the width of dough until you have 16 squares .

cut the dough into squares .
use a knife to cut the dough in half . now cut both of those pieces in half . you should now have 4 pieces . now turn your knife where it is facing the other direction . cut across the other pieces , making small squares .

lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
cut your dough into squares that are about 3 inches long . put two pieces of pepperoni on each square . put a piece of cheese on top of the pepperoni . put one last piece of pepperoni on top of the cheese . roll it up into a ball , keeping the pepperoni and cheese in the middle .

lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
place two pieces of pepperoni on each piece of dough . add one piece of cheese on top . roll up the dough into a ball with the cheese and pepperoni inside .

lay pepperoni and cheese on the dough and roll into a ball .
roll out dough with a rolling pin and cut the dough into squares . next , place two pieces of pepperoni on each square and one piece of cheese on top of the pepperoni . if you want , you may add another piece of pepperoni on top of the cheese . then , roll the dough up with the pepperoni and cheese into a ball . make sure the ball is closed , with no cheese or pepperoni showing !

put the rolls in a pan .
rub in grease or butter to the bottom of a pan so the buns do n't stick to the pan . place buns in a square pan 13 by 9 inches . bake in oven as directed .

put the rolls in a pan .
place the rolls in a pan . set them side by side in rows .

put the rolls in a pan .
now place your rolls into your square pan . place them close together because you are going to fill the whole pan .

brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
using a brush dip it into the butter in the bowl . paint the butter over each of the bites . pinch some italian seasoning with your finger and sprinkle it over the top of each bite .

brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
put some melted butter into a bowl . with a brush , put some of the butter on the top of each pizza bite . take some italian seasoning , and with your fingers , sprinkle a tiny bit on top of each pizza bite .

brush each pizza bite with some melted butter and sprinkle some italian seasoning on top .
use the brush to put melted butter on top of eat pizza bite . use your fingers to spread a little italian seasoning on top of each .

slice the roll .
wet your knife . using your knife cut your roll in half . using your knife cut the roll in half again . using your knife cut the roll again .

slice the roll .
dip your knife into water to moisten the blade . use the knife to cut the roll into 6 equal pieces . if the rice starts to stick , wet the knife again .

slice the roll .
wet your knife with water . cut the roll into 6 even pieces . start by cutting the roll into half , then cut each half into three pieces . when the rice starts to stick to your knife , wet the knife with the water again . when cutting , do n't push down on your knife . cut the roll by gently pulling the knife through the roll .

prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
set some crab meat on a plate . use a knife to cut around the avocado and take the peel off . take the pit out of the center of the avocado . use a knife to cut the avocado into 8 slices .

prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
take some pieces of crab meat into a plate . take two avocados and clean with water . cut the avocado into two pieces . peel the avocado . cut the avocado in to thin pieces .

prepare some crab meat chop and peel an avocado into thin slices .
cut some crab meat in to thin strips . cut the avocado in to two halves . remove the seed from the avocado . remove the peel of the avocado . cut the avocado in to eight slices .

add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
use your fingers to sprinkle sesame seeds onto the rice . turn the rice covered seaweed over on top of the plastic wrap . put the sticks of crab meat and avocado sideways over the seaweed . roll up the wooden mat with the sushi on it . roll it kind of firmly . when it 's all rolled up gently squeeze the sushi mat so it all holds together .

add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
add some sesame seeds on top of sushi rice . turn the sea weed to the other side . add long strips of crab meat and avocado on the sea weed in the middle . start rolling the mat in to a circle . finish the rolling and stick the two sides of the rice .

add sesame seeds crab meat and avocado roll it up and press firmly .
sprinkle the sesame seeds over the sushi rice . then turn it over , so the rice is on the bottom . put crab meat and avocado on the seaweed wrap long ways . roll the bamboo mat and press firmly to shape the roll .

wrap the mat with plastic .
cover the bamboo sushi roll mat with plastic wrap . press the plastic wrap to smooth it out .

wrap the mat with plastic .
cover the sushi roll mat with plastic . wrap the plastic around the sushi roll mat .

wrap the mat with plastic .
place the mat down flat on a plastic wrap sheet . cover the mat with another plastic wrap and press it together .

mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
mix the vinegar sauce in a small bowl . using hot cooked rice , pour the sauce over the rice . mix the sauce and rice together using a rice paddle . lastly , let the rice cool down .

mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
microwave the vinegar mixture and then stir until everything is mixed well . your rice should now be done cooking , and very hot . drizzle the vinegar mixture over the rice , getting it on as much rice as possible . now , slice the rice with a rice paddle in order to mix the vinegar mixture into the rice . make sure to slice . stirring could create clumps . let the rice mixture cool down before moving on to the next step .

mix the sauce and pour on the rice .
mix the sauce and heat in the microwave for a few seconds to mix well . pour the sauce over the freshly cooked , very hot rice . use a rice paddle to slice through the rice and mix the sauce . cool down the rice .

place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
place the seaweed on a bamboo sushi roll mat . wet you fingers with water . put some rice on the seaweed . gently spread out rice with fingers . make sure to spread rice all the way to each edge .

place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
place nori onto the bamboo sushi mat . wet your fingers . spread the rice evenly along the nori leaving some room at the ends . cover the nori sheet almost to the edge with the rice .

place the seaweed down and put the rice on it .
you will need a bamboo sushi mat . nori seaweed , stick rice that is already prepared and sesame seeds . cover the bamboo mat with wax paper so that food will not stick to it . cut one sheet of nori in half and lay it on the bottom half of the sushi mat . use your fingers to put rice in an even layer on top of the nori until the nori is covered up with rice . next , sprinkle sesame seeds all over the rice .

combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
hold the ingredients over the bowl . carefully pour the rice vinegar sugar and salt into the bowl . let them mix together .

combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
put two tablespoons of vinegar into a bowl . add 2 teaspoons of sugar to the bowl . put in 2/3 teaspoon of salt to the mixture .

combine rice vinegar sugar and salt .
add two tablespoons ( tbs ) of rice vinegar . add two teaspoons ( tsp ) of sugar . teaspoons are smaller than tablespoons . add 2/3 teaspoon of salt .

add water and grind the mixture .
add water to the mixture . grind the mixture very finely to create a green liquid in the bowl .

add water and grind the mixture .
pour water into the mix bowl . grind the mixture up and mix with the water .

add water and grind the mixture .
finely grind mixture in a bowl . continue until curry is smooth in consistency .

add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
put fresh coriander , onions , garlic , green chilies , coriander seeds in a bowl . then add cumin seeds , pepper , ginger , salt , lemon juice and peel to the same bowl .

add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
put raw , fresh coriander in a bowl . add a few chopped onions , garlic , green chilies , coriander seeds , and cumin seeds . add black pepper , a piece of ginger . add salt to taste . to maintain the green color add lemon juice and lemon peel .

add coriander onions garlic green chilies coriander seeds cumin seeds pepper ginger salt lemon juice and lemon rind to a bowl .
add 1 cup of coriander to the bowl . add 1/4 cup of chopped onions and coriander seeds . add 2 teaspoons of cumin seeds , 1/2 teaspoons of pepper , 1 piece of ginger . add salt and 1/2 teaspoons of lemon juice . use a spoon to mix together all of the ingredients .

add oil and then onions to the wok .
add 1 teaspoon of oil to the frying pan . spread the oil around the pan evenly . add 1/4 cup of chopped onions to the pan . stir the onions around the pan .

add oil and then onions to the wok .
hold the oil over the wok and carefully pour it in . use a spoon to scoop onions out into the wok .

add oil and then onions to the wok .
place the wok on the stove . switch on the stove . add oil into the wok . once the oils is heated , add the onions into the wok .

fry cumin seeds in oil in a pan .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add some cumin seeds in to the pan . fry cumin seeds in the oil .

fry cumin seeds in oil in a pan .
add 2 teaspoons of oil to the pan . add 1/2 teaspoon of cumin seeds to the pan . let them cook for a while .

fry cumin seeds in oil in a pan .
put some oil into the pan . put some cumin seeds on top of the oil in the pan .

add green chilies and curry paste .
hold the chilies over the pan . pour them in the pan carefully . use a spoon to scoop curry pasta into the pan .

add green chilies and curry paste .
add 1 1/2 teaspoons of green chilies . add 2 tablespoons of curry paste . continue to stir the pan .

add green chilies and curry paste .
add a small bowl of green chili 's to the frying pan . then add two tablespoons of curry paste to the frying pan . mix with all the ingredients in the frying pan with a wooden spoon .

add soy sauce .
hold the soy sauce bottle over the pan . pour very little soy sauce into the pan .

add soy sauce .
add 1 teaspoon of soy sauce . use the stirring spoon to mix in the sauce in the pan .

add soy sauce .
take rice and place in skillet . then add soy sauce mixture . add heat to skillet . take large spoon and mix completely . allow mixture to become heated and then serve .

pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
take rice and add to pot . cook until tender . then make a hole . add sauce to center of mold . then serve .

pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
use the scoop to pour the sauce into the middle of the rice . add 1 tablespoon of chopped spring greens on top .

pour the sauce in the center of the rice .
now we want to slowly add the sauce to our center of the rice cake . just spoon it in with your serving spoon , one scoop at a time . once you have your sauce inside just sprinkle some spring onions on the inside as well .

add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
pour 1 teaspoon lemon juice into the sauce in the pan . sprinkle salt into the sauce . pour one quarter cup of water into the sauce . stir with a plastic spoon . add a half teaspoon of green curry paste .

add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
add 1 teaspoon of lemon juice to the pan . add some salt . pour in 1/4 cup of water . add 1/2 teaspoon of curry paste . use a stirring spoon and mix everything together in the pan .

add lemon juice salt water and curry paste to the sauce .
add the lemon juice to the sauce . add the salt water into the sauce . also add the curry paste into the sauce . mix altogether nicely to blend all the flavors together .

add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .
add the chopped spring onion whites to the hot pan , stir . add the split green chili to the hot pan , stir . add some spring onion leaves to the pan , stir . add the coconut milk to the pan and stir .

add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .
add onion into the pan . add the green chilies into the pan . add spring onions into the pan . also add the coconut milk into the pan . mix all the ingredients together to blend nicely .

add onion green chilies spring onion and coconut milk to the pan .
take a pan on the stove and heat some oil in the pan . add small cut pieces of onion in to the pan . add cut pieces of green chilies in to the pan . add cut pieces of spring onions in to the pan . add coconut milk in to the pan .

add the rice salt and pepper .
dump your cooked rice in to the hot pan , you will hear it sizzle . then add salt and pepper to taste . then stir .

add the rice salt and pepper .
use a spoon to put the cooked rice in the pan . add salt and pepper to the rice . use a wooden spoon to mix it all together .

add the rice salt and pepper .
pour 3 cups of cooked rice to the frying pan . add some salt . pour in ground pepper . use a stirring spoon to mix the ingredients together .

add baby corn capsicum and spring onions to the wok .
add the corn to the pot with onion leaves and mix . mix non stop so nothing burns . make sure to gently add the ingredients so nothing spills anywhere .

add baby corn capsicum and spring onions to the wok .
add baby corn to the wok . add capsicum to the wok . add spring onions to the wok .

add baby corn capsicum and spring onions to the wok .
add 1/2 cup of sliced baby corn . add 1/2 cup of slices capsicum . put in 2 tablespoons of chopped onions . use the spoon to stir all of the ingredients as it cooks .

place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
pour water into the bowl . leave it for 10 minutes .

place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
put the bulgur wheat in a bowl . pour in boiling water in the bowl . add enough water to cover the what . leave for 10 minutes .

place bulgur wheat in a bowl and add boiling water .
put the bulgur wheat in a bowl . hold the boiling water over the bowl . carefully pour in the water enough to cover the wheat .

place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .
put the salad onto a plate . pour lemon juice over the top of the salad . pour some olive oil over it . prepare to serve .

place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .
place the salad on a plate . take half lemon and squeeze juice in to a bowl . add the lemon juice in to the salad . take half a cup of olive oil . add the olive oil all over the salad .

place the salad on a plate and drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over it .
using a spoon place the salad on the plate . add lemon juice over the salad . add olive oil over the plate . mix the mixture with a spoon .

cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .
use a knife to cut the tomato into four pieces . use a spoon to scoop out the seeds . slice the tomato into thin slices . put the slices into the bowl .

cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .
cut the tomato into four pieces with the knife . scoop out the seeds with a spoon and throw them away . chop the tomato pieces up into small pieces with the knife .

cut a tomato into quarters remove the seeds chop finely and add to the bowl .
place the tomato on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the tomato into quarters . use a spoon to scoop out the tomato seeds . use a knife to cut the tomato in very small pieces . add the chopped tomato to the bowl .

drain the bulgur wheat and add to the salad and mix .
drain the bulgur wheat , put it in a sieve and push it down to get the water out . add it to the bowl with everything else . mix it with a spoon then put it in the refrigerator to chill .

drain the bulgur wheat and add to the salad and mix .
take the bulgur wheat in a strainer . drain the water from the bulgur wheat . take the salad in a bowl . add the bulgur wheat in to the salad . mix the contents in the salad bowl .

drain the bulgur wheat and add to the salad and mix .
pour the bulgur wheat into a bowel . squeeze the bulgur wheat to get the moisture out . add the bulgur what to the salad bowl . use a fork to mix everything together .

season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .
put salt and pepper into the bowl . add 2 - 3 pinches of allspice . add a pink of cinnamon . use a spoon to mix .

season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .
hold the seasonings over the bowl of salad . put the salt pepper allspice and cinnamon in the bowl . mix with a spoon .

season the bowl with salt pepper allspice cinnamon and mix .
put the salt into the bowl . put the pepper into the bowl . put the all spice into the bowl . put the cinnamon into the bowl . with a spoon mix it all together .

remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .
pick the leaves from the stem part of the mint . use a knife and cut the mint leaves to small pieces . push the mint in the parsley with your hand .

remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .
take the leaves off of the stalks of the min . use a knife to carefully cut up the mint . add the mint along with the parsley into the bowl .

remove the leaves from stalks of mint chop finely and add to the parsley .
take some stems of mint . remove the mint leaves from the stems . take a cutting board and a knife . cut the mint leaves in to small pieces . place the mint leaves in a bowl .

finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
use a knife to carefully chop the parsley . cut it up into small pieces . add the parsley into the bowl .

finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
put the parsley on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to remove the stems from the parsley . use the knife to cut the parsley leaves into very small pieces . put the chopped parsley into a bowl .

finely chop a bundle of parsley and add to a bowl .
cut the stems off of the bundle of parsley . get rid of the stems . cut the parsley into very small pieces . place the parsley into a bowl .

finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .
use a knife and carefully cut the spring onions into very small slices . add the onions to the mixture bowl .

finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .
put the onions next to each other and cut slowly into small circular pieces . finally add the onions to the bowl .

finely chop the spring onions and add to a bowl .
carefully hold the spring onions . get a knife and start cutting very thin pieces out of the onions . scoop the onions in the bowl with your hand .

chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
carefully hold the cucumber and cut it in half with a knife . turn it over and use a spoon to scoop the seeds out of it .

chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
use a knife to carefully cut a cucumber in half . use a spoon to scoop out the seeds . take each half of the cucumber and slice into small sections . then cut these sections into small cubes . add the diced cucumbers to the bowl .

chop a cucumber in half remove the seeds finely chop and add to the bowl .
put the cucumber on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the cucumber in half . use a teaspoon to scoop the seeds out and throw the seeds away . cut the cucumber into small piece . place the cut cucumber into the bowl .

blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
put the canned tomatoes in the blended . add salt , one garlic clove , basil and one tablespoon of olive oil to the tomatoes . put the lid on the blender and give it a quick blend .

blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
you need to add your tomatoes into the blender , be careful not to make a mess . you then can add some oil and salt into the blender . next is a clove of garlic and about 10 leaves of basil . take your lid and make sure it is secured onto your blender . now just give your mixture a quick blend .

blend tomatoes oil salt garlic and basil together .
get a blender . add tomatoes or tomato sauce to the blender . add in olive oil , salt , garlic and about 10 fresh basil leaves . turn the blender on and blend until smooth .

cook the sauce in a pan .
the sauce will bubble up in the pot do n't let it bubble too much . stir it together carefully .

cook the sauce in a pan .
simmer the sauce in the pan until the juices boil about half . then left it cool completely .

cook the sauce in a pan .
put the sauce in the saucepan on the burner over a medium heat . heat the sauce until small bubbles appear . stir occasionally with a spoon while it continues to simmer until the sauce has half of the sauce remaining . remove from heat and let the sauce cool completely .

spread tomato sauce on the dough .
sprinkle some corn meal on the pizza board . place the pizza dough on the board . smear pizza sauce on the pizza dough .

spread tomato sauce on the dough .
use a spoon to scoop the sauce onto the middle of the dough . use the spoon to spread it by moving the spoon in circles that get bigger .

spread tomato sauce on the dough .
put a small amount of cornmeal onto a pizza board . put the dough on the pizza board . use a spoon to put the sauce on the dough . use the back of the spoon to spread the sauce to cover the dough .

place the pizza on the stone .
place aluminum foil on grill and cooking stone over foil . turn on the grill to a medium heat and wait about five to ten minutes . slide the pizza that you have prepared from a wooden board to the cooking stone . make sure you do n't touch the hot surface of the grill with your hands .

place the pizza on the stone .
hold your pizza board by the handle . gently shake the pizza board to slide the pizza onto the pizza stone .

place the pizza on the stone .
place a cooking stone in the cook stove to heat it up . take the pizza you have made from the plate and place it in the middle of the cooking stone .

place the cheese on the pizza .
place chunks of cheese on top of the pizza . close the top of the pizza maker .

place the cheese on the pizza .
put the cheese on top of the sauce . close the lid .

place the cheese on the pizza .
you 'll want to take your cheese and place it in different places along the top of the pizza . do n't put it all in one spot , make sure it is spread around so it will melt evenly throughout your pizza .

cook the pizza .
carefully and slowly close the lid of the grill . let the pizza cook in the grill until it looks a little brown .

cook the pizza .
carefully place pizza on grill and close the lid . once pizza is golden brown , carefully use your pizza spatula and remove pizza from grill .

cook the pizza .
take a barbecue oven . take a pizza that is to be baked . put the pizza in the barbecue oven . close the lid of barbecue grill . cook the pizza till it is brown .

place basil leaves on top of the pizza .
grab a little basil with your fingers . place the basil spread out evenly on top of the pizza .

place basil leaves on top of the pizza .
get some fresh basil leaves . place them around on top of the pizza , so they are evenly spaced , but do n't cover the entire pizza with them . use about 6 -10 leaves . serve the pizza .

place basil leaves on top of the pizza .
put the fresh basil leaves on the top of the pizza . make sure not to put too much or too little .

mix flour ghee salt together .
in a tray add 1 and a half cup of flour . 2 tablespoon of clarified butter ( ghee ) . add as much or as little as you like . start with a little , you can always add more . now mix it all up .

mix flour ghee salt together .
put 1 1/2 cup of flour to mixing tray . add in 2 tablespoons of ghee . add salt to taste . mix everything together with a spoon .

mix flour ghee salt together .
put one and half cup of all purpose flour into mixing tray . pour two tablespoons of clarified butter into the flour . use a spoon to mix the butter into the flour until well blended . add salt to taste and mix with spoon .

add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .
take a baking tray and add flour in to it . take some negella seeds in to the tray . take some carom seeds and add it in to the tray . add some oil in to the tray . mix everything properly with hand .

add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .
add some negella seeds to the mixture . put in one teaspoon of olive oil .

add some negella seeds carom seeds and oil .
put some negella seeds into your pan . put oil into your pan . with your hands mix the mixture .

add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
add a small amount of water . use your hands to mix the water in . mix with hands for eight minutes , until it becomes a dough . roll together into ball .

add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
add some water to the flour . using your hand , mix the water into the water . mix for 7 to 8 minutes until it makes a firm ball .

add some water and mix it well until it is a little bit hard .
first we will add some water to the mixture and mix it by hand . keep mixing for about 7 - 8 minutes and while you kneed the mixture it will slowly form into ball shape as you pinch in all together .

heat some oil cumin seeds and coriander seeds in a pan .
melt clarified butter in preheated pan . add cumin and coriander seeds to the pan .

heat some oil cumin seeds and coriander seeds in a pan .
put the frying pan on the stove and add a teaspoon of butter . add the cumin seeds . then add the coriander seeds . stir the seeds around and let them cook in the butter until they start to smell spicy . now you can remove the pan from the heat .

heat some oil cumin seeds and coriander seeds in a pan .
heat some butter in a pan . add cumin seeds . put in coriander seeds .

add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
add the cut up ginger red onion . mix it around with a wooden spoon .

add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
add the chopped ginger , add some green chilies . after 30 seconds add the cut up red onions . mix it up .

add minced ginger red onion and give a quick stir .
add ginger that has been cut up into small pieces . after 20 seconds add red onion that has been cut into small pieces . use a wooden spoon to stir up the ingredients .

add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
add frozen peas to the pan with the onions . stir for 1 1/2 minutes to cook . add black salt to the pan next . then pour in the cut up cooked potatoes .

add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
mix the frozen peas to the pot . saute them , keep mixing for about 1 and a half minutes . add some black salt . now put in the boiled potatoes .

add peas salt and boiled potatoes .
your going to want to mix everything together nicely . now add some frozen peas into the pan . stir them around with the wooden spatula . after 1 and a half minutes have passed , you can add in some salt . then take your boiled potatoes and place them in the pan with your other ingredients .

shape the dough into a cone .
flatten the dough ball and put it on a hard surface . roll it with a rolling pin into about a 6 inch oval . roll it about 1/4 inch thick , so it 's not too thin . cut the oval in half and moisten the cut edge with water . pull the cut edges together into a cone shape and press the moistened edges together .

shape the dough into a cone .
get a rolling pin . divide the dough into 3 equal parts . " flatten the dough with your hand and roll it out until it is a 6 circle . do n't make it too thin . " " . " get a knife and cut the circle of dough in half . move 1 of the halves away for now . put a little bit of water along the straight edge of the dough . gently pick up each end of the straight edge and bring them together , forming a cone shape . press the dough gently to seal the seam of the cone .

shape the dough into a cone .
put ball of dough on surface and use a rolling pin to roll it into a circle . make sure you do n't roll the dough too thin . use a knife to cut the circle of dough almost in half . apply water to the edge of the bigger piece of dough . fold to form a cone and seal it where water was applied .

fill the dough with the mixture .
shape the dough in to a cone shaped structure . take the filling mixture in a bowl . take a medium sized spoon . add the mixture in to the cone with the spoon . add 2.5 spoons of mixture in to the bowl .

fill the dough with the mixture .
hold the dough cone in one hand . get a tablespoon . put about 2 1/2 tablespoons of the potato mixture into the dough one .

fill the dough with the mixture .
using a spoon , put the mixture into the dough . continue adding spoonfuls of the mixture until the dough is filled to the top .

deep fry the samosas .
use a spoon to add the samosas to the hot deep fry oil . fry them over low to medium heat . after 5 minutes turn the heat up . fry for 12 to 15 minutes until samosas have a golden brown color .

deep fry the samosas .
take your samosas and place them in the hot oil . only add a few into the pot at the same time . maybe 4 or 5 . cook them on medium heat for 5 minutes and then increase the heat some for about 20 minutes . this will take the samosas to a nice golden brown color .

deep fry the samosas .
put them into the hot oil with a spoon that has holes in it . the oil in the pot should be on low - medium . after 5 minutes increase the heat . it will take about 15 minutes to get them a golden brown color .

melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
put a pan on the stove and turn on the heat . put two tablespoons of butter and two tablespoons of olive oil into a hot pan . let the butter melt in the pan .

melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . turn on the stove . heat the pan . add 2 tablespoons of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil in to the pan . melt the butter in the pan .

melt butter and olive oil in a hot pan .
put 2 tablespoons of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large frying pan . put the pan on the stove and turn it on . allow the mixture to melt until it is sizzling and bubbling .

toss the contents of the bowl together .
use two spoons and mix together all of the ingredients . make sure to mix everything together evenly . prepare to serve .

toss the contents of the bowl together .
take your serving spoons and toss around your salad . once you are done tossing the salad , it will be ready to serve !

toss the contents of the bowl together .
using two salad spoons , gently toss the contents of the bowl together . you want to get all the ingredients coated and evenly mixed , but not crushed or damaged .

pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
take a small mixing bowl . pour some olive oil in to the bowl . take some balsamic vinegar . add the balsamic vinegar in to the bowl . whisk everything in the bowl .

pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
get the bottle labeled olive oil and pour a little amount into the bowl . find the balsamic vinegar bottle ( has a strong smell ) and pour a small amount into bowl . stir the bowl with spoon so that everything gets covered in olive oil / vinegar mix .

pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a small bowl and mix .
pour the olive oil into a small bowl . pour the balsamic vinegar into a small bowl . use a small whip to mix it together .

cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
put the pita bread flat on the cutting board . get a serrated knife from the cutting block ( ask an adult if you are not allowed to use knives yet ) . lay the knife flat , parallel to the cutting board , with the sharp blade facing away from you , onto the pita bread , and slice them open . one half at a time , angle the knife and cut diagonally into 3/4 inch wide strips . take your pita bread strips and turn them ninety - degrees and cut 3/4 inch wide triangles .

cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
use a knife to cut the pita bread open in the center . cut the pita bread into 3 1/4 inch triangles .

cut pieces of pita breads open and cut into small triangles .
use a sharp knife to cut open the pita bread . cut pita bread into three quarter triangles .

remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
take a spoon with holes in it and scoop the bread pieces out onto a plate . carefully add the uncooked pieces of bread in the pan now .

remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
let the bread cook until it 's golden brown . use a big spoon with holes on the bottom to take the bread out of the pan . put the bread on a plate covered with paper towels to drain the oil . add the rest of the bread to the pan . repeat steps 2 through 4 .

remove the bread from the pan and add the remaining pita bread to the pan .
fry the bread pieces in the oil . when the bread pieces are brown remove them from the pan . take the fried bread in a plate . now add the remaining pieces of pita bread in the pan . fry them till they are golden brown .

add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
pour in half of the pita bread into the pan . cook the bread for a couple of minutes . stir the bread until both sides are golden brown .

add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
take a pan and heat it on the stove . add some butter in to the pan and melt the butter . cut the pita bread in to triangle shaped pieces . add the bread pieces in to the butter in the pan . fry the bread on both the sides .

add half of the pita bread triangles to the pan and fry until golden brown .
add pita bread to the pan . using a wooden spoon spread the bread around the pan . flip the bread so it cooks on both sides . with a spoon scoop out the pita bread and put it on a plate .

add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
now we are going to put our pita bread into the salad bowl . go ahead and add the lettuce in as well . put the cucumbers , radishes , and tomatoes in as well . now take the lemon juice , garlic and salt , along with the olive oil and balsamic vinegar . now just toss the ingredients and mix them well with a spoon .

add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
take a medium sized bowl and add pita bread pieces in to the bowl . add cut pieces of lettuce and cucumber in to the bowl . add cut pieces of tomatoes and radishes in to the bowl . add some lemon juice and olive oil in to the bowl . add little balsamic vinegar in to the bowl and mix .

add the pita bread lettuce cucumber tomatoes radishes lemon juice olive oil and balsamic vinegar to a bowl .
put the pita bread into the bottom of a large bowl . then add lettuce on top . add cucumbers , tomatoes , and radishes . then pour a cup of lemon juice and olive oil . finally add some balsamic vinegar and use your stirring spoons to mix it all together .

add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
put the red onions into the larger bowl . put the spices into the larger bowl . if onions are stuck together , break them apart with your fingers . mix the onions and spice together . make sure onions are coated with spice .

add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
pour the red onion into a bowl . pour the spices over the onion . rub the spices over the slices of onion until the onions are evenly coated .

add a chopped red onion sumac allspice and black pepper to a bowl and rub together .
put chopped onion in clean bowl . add sumac . add allspice . finally add black pepper . mix onions and spices together .

add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
get a bowl and add the lemon juice garlic and salt . take a whisk and mix it all together .

add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
pour your lemon juice into a small bowl . add the garlic clove and salt to the lemon juice . using a small whisk mix the lemon juice , garlic , and salt together .

add lemon juice garlic and salt to a small bowl and mix .
put the lemon juice , garlic clove and salt together in a small bowl . mix the ingredients together with a small whisk .

cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
cut 1 - 2 yukon gold potatoes into small pieces . add all the cut potatoes into water . cover the potatoes in the pan . allow the potatoes to cook .

cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
clean and cut some yukon gold potatoes into halves . place them in a saucepan and pour water until the potatoes are completely covered . cook the potatoes until they are cooked through .

cut some yukon gold potatoes add them to water in a pan and cook .
get a large pot . do not turn the heat on yet . you 'll need to cut at least 5 yukon gold potatoes in half . cut them in the middle to make them shorter , not long and skinny . put the potatoes in the pot and fill the pot up with cold water just until it covers the potatoes with about an inch of water . put the pot on the stove and turn the heat on . wait for the water to boil and turn the heat down just enough so the water is still boiling but not to where the bubbles are coming up hard and fast . cook the potatoes until tender . you can test the tenderness with a fork or an object that can poke through the potatoes . if the fork pokes all the way through the potato , they are ready .

melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
put some butter into the pan and let it melt . cut some leeks , get help from an adult to handle a knife . put the leeks in a bowl filled with water .

melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
chop some leeks and put them in water . get another pan and put it on the stove . put some butter in the pan . turn the stove on . stir the butter gently until it melts .

melt some butter in another pan and chop some leeks put them in water and keep ready .
put some butter into a pot and melt it . next put some leeks into a bowl of water and keep for later .

brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .
heat a pan on the stove . add the sausages to the pan and brown then . once brown , set them aside for later .

brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .

brown some sausages in a separate pan take them out and keep aside .
cook the sausage until they turn brown in a different pan . when they are brown , take them out . put them on the side in a bowl .

add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
after the sausages are browned , remove the sausages and put them on a plate for later . keep the heat on because it is time to cook the onions and leeks . slowly add the onion pieces and stir around in the pan to get the flavor of the sausages mixed with the onions . slowly add the chopped leeks and stir again . add salt and pepper . stir together until mixed .

add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
chop a medium white onion into pieces about 1 - 2 inches long . chop 3 - 4 leek stalks into 1 - 2 inch long pieces . add the onions to the pan and stir them into the butter mix . add the leeks to the pan and stir them into the onions . shake a small amount of salt into the pan ; turn the pepper grinder 2 + times over pan .

add some onion pieces to the pan and stir add chopped leeks some salt and freshly ground pepper to it .
cut the onion in half and very carefully cut it into half circles , as thick as your pinkie . cut the leaks into circles of similar thickness as the onions and add them to the pan . put the onions in the pan . add the leaks to the pan . add a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper .

once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
wait until the onions are cooked . also check whether the onions are golden brown . add some portion of butter into the pan . mix altogether and stir it with the help of a spatula .

once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
continue cooking the onions until they start to turn brown . when they are brown add your butter to the pan it stir it really well .

once the onions are brown add some butter and stir .
check and stir the onions over 2 - 3 minutes on medium heat . use the ruler - guide on a wrapped stick of butter to cut 2 tablespoons off the stick . if the onions have turned golden to brown in color , put the cut butter into the pan . stir the butter and onions until the butter begins to melt down .

now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
measure 2 tablespoons of flour and add into pan . " add 1 tablespoon or a splash " " of oil and stir " " . "

now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
add 2 tablespoons of flour to hot pan . add 1 tablespoon of oil . stir until evenly mixed .

now add 2 tbsp of flour little oil and stir .
add butter to the pan with the cooked onions . then add two tablespoons of flour . next add some olive oil to the pan . stir ingredients together .

add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
add a bottle of guinness beer to the pan with the onions . next , pour in a can of beef broth . stir to mix the beer and broth with the other ingredients .

add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
put in some beer . add a whole can of beef broth . mix it up .

add some guinness beer and a can of beef broth and stir .
after adding the flour , make sure to mix it until you can no longer see the flour . it will make a thick paste coating on the vegetables . if you are a child , you 'll want an adult 's help . slowly pour the guinness beer and the can of beef broth into the pot . make sure you know where your arms and face are at all times so you do n't burn yourself . stir the mixture in the pot over the heat carefully until all the way mixed together . do n't worry about beer being in the pot . it will only leave flavor in the gravy . all the alcohol will boil out but it is still wise to have an adult helping you with this recipe .

now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
cut the onion in two and then cut it into half circles . cut the leaks into half circles as well . add the onions and the leaks into a pan . add a pinch of salt and a pinch of pepper .

now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
brown the sausages in a skillet till the skin is cooked and brown . use a pair of tongs to turn them several times so they do n't burn . add those fried sausages to the other mixture . turn the heat down to low and cover the skillet with a lid . cook ( simmer ) for about 20 minutes .

now add the fried sausages to it and cook .
there is fried sausage on the side . the fried sausage needs to be cooked . put the fried sausage in the pan . watch it cook . turn stove off when it is done .

put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
cover the pot with the lid . let it cook for 20 minutes .

put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
after the sausages are browned , set them on a plate . put your gravy ingredients in the sausage pan and turn the heat on medium . stir while scraping the bottom of the pan so nothing sticks . place the sausages back into the pan . place the pan lid on the pan and allow the gravy to slowly boil for 20 minutes .

put the lid on simmer for about 20 minutes .
once the food is bubbling on the heat , turn down the heat on the burner to low . once the burner is on the low setting , put the lid onto the pan . set an oven timer for 20 minutes . occasionally lift the lid and stir the food to make sure it is not sticking to the pan . if the food is sticking , stir lightly , turn heat lower and recover with the lid .

remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
carefully remove the lid of the pan . use tongs to lift the sausages and see if they have cooked all the way through . there should n't be any pink left .

remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
after the sausages have been cooking for the time given in the recipe , carefully remove the lid of the pan . make sure to lift the side of the lid that is away from your face . the steam from the food can be very hot and burn your face . safety first ! use a fork or tongs to see if they are done . if the sausages are done , turn off the stove and carefully remove the pan from the heat . if the sausages are not done yet , put the lid back on the pan and cook the sausages for a few more minutes . keep checking the sausages until they are cooked all the way . once again , use safety in the kitchen over the hot stove . put the sausages on a plate and enjoy once they have cooled down to a safe eating temperature .

remove the lid and check if the sausages are done .
wait for some time . now remove the lid . check if the sausages have become soft . then it is cooked and ready to eat .

add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .
add finely cut up fresh rosemary . to pan . stir into the other ingredients . cover pan with a lid . cook on low heat for 8 to 10 minutes .

add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .

add finely chopped fresh rosemary and stir put the lid on and cook in low heat for 8 - 10 minutes .

add potatoes to the pot .
wait until the food is boiling . add cut up potatoes to the pot .

add chili to the pot .
add fresh green chili 's to the pot . you may add as much or as little as you wish . be careful : the pot is very hot .

add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .
add chili to the pot . put in turmeric . add coriander and cumin . add some salt to the dish .

add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .

add chili turmeric coriander cumin and salt .
add chili to the bowl . add turmeric to the bowl . add coriander to the bowl . add cumin to the bowl . add salt to the bowl .

add the lamb to the pot .
use your hand to pick up the lamb pieces one by one . carefully put the lamb into the pot .

add the lamb to the pot .
place the lamb into the pot . stir the lamb so both sides are heated by the oil .

add the lamb to the pot .
take a pot on the stove . add some tempering in to the pot . cut the lamb in to small pieces . add the lamb in to the pan . cook the lamb pieces in the pan .

add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
add about three teaspoons of garlic ginger paste to the pan . put in some chopped onion - can be red or white onion .

add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
dump the bowl of ginger paste in the pan . use a spoon to scoop the onions into the pan .

add garlic ginger paste and chopped onions to the pot .
add garlic to the pan . put in some ginger paste . pour in some chopped onions . mix all the ingredients into the frying pan .

cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
get out the pressure cooker . add the butter to the pressure cooker . add the garlic and ginger to the pressure cooker . turn on the pressure cooker to cook .

cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
add 3 to 4 cloves of garlic in butter of pressure cooker . add 1 centimeter piece of garlic in butter of pressure cooker .

cook garlic and ginger in butter in a pressure cooker .
cut 3 garlic cloves into small cubes . cut a small piece of garlic into small cubes as well . put 2 tablespoons of butter in the pressure cooker , using measuring spoons . add the garlic and the ginger to the butter .

add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
first we will pour in our lentils , that also have ginger and garlic mixed in . do this by slowly pouring the mixture into the pan , making sure not to spill it outside the cooking pot . we want to keep it on high heat until our first timer goes off and then we will decrease the heat .

add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
carefully pour the water and the lentils ( beans ) into the pressure cooker . after the onions cook for a minute , pour the beans and water into the pot .

add the lentils to the pressure cooker .
in a pressure cooker saute ( cook ) diced ( chopped ) onions . add lentils and chopped ginger and chopped garlic mix to the cooked onions . cook everything on high heat . when you hear one whistle . lower the temperature .

add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
pour two cups of water into a pressure cooker . add 3 teaspoons of salt . add 1 teaspoon turmeric . add red chili powder to taste .

add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
add 2 cups of water in to the cooker . add two teaspoons of salt in to the pressure cooker . add a teaspoon of turmeric powder in to the cooker . add a teaspoon of chili powder in to the cooker . mix everything and simmer and cook .

add water salt turmeric and chili powder to the pressure cooker .
add two more cups of water to the pressure cooker . add three teaspoons of salt , a teaspoon of turmeric , a teaspoon of chili powder . cook for half and hour ( 30 minutes ) until the lentils are tender if you are cooking in a pot .

melt ghee in a pan .
put the ghee in the pan . make sure that it becomes a liquid .

melt ghee in a pan .
put 2 tablespoons of butter or ghee in the skillet . heat the skillet . when the butter melts add coriander and cumin spice .

melt ghee in a pan .
turn on the burner under the pan . use a measuring spoon to put 2 tablespoons of ghee into the pan . after the ghee is melted , measure 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds and add them to the pan .

add the coriander seeds cumin seeds onions and green chili to a pan .
" when the oil is hot , put the coriander seeds in the pan - careful ! sometimes oil spits " " which can be very hot ! " " . " add the cumin seeds as well . now add the onions . now add the green chili peppers too .

add the coriander seeds cumin seeds onions and green chili to a pan .
add coriander seeds to the pan . add cumin seeds to the pan . add onions to the pan . add green chili to the pan .

add the coriander seeds cumin seeds onions and green chili to a pan .
add one teaspoon of crushed coriander seeds to the pan using a spoon . add one teaspoon of cumin seeds to the pan . chop one large onion into small cubes , add the onion to the pan . chop one green chili into small pieces , about the size of a black bean , and add them to the pan .

add salt to the pan .
measure 1 teaspoon of salt . add to pan .

add salt to the pan .
use a spoon to mix the lentils . add half a tea spoon of salt .

add salt to the pan .
in the pan , mix everything with the lentils . with a spoon , add the amount of salt instructed in the recipe .

add tomato paste to the pan .
get out your measuring spoons and find the tablespoon . scoop out two tablespoons of tomato paste into the pan . if the paste is having a hard time coming off the spoon use a clean finger or butter knife to help guide the paste into the pan .

add tomato paste to the pan .
once the onions are cooked and turned into golden brown . add 2 tablespoons of tomato paste . mix together in order to blend the paste accordingly .

add tomato paste to the pan .
put two tablespoons of tomato paste in the pan . use a spoon to stir .

add the turka pan to the dal .
get a spoon and put the turka into the dal . stir the turka and dal until mixed together . cook it on low heat for another 15 to 20 minutes .

add the turka pan to the dal .
add the turka to the dal by using the spoon to scoop the turka into the dal . let the dal simmer for another 15 to 20 minutes .

add the turka pan to the dal .
in a pan add oil mustard , onion and tomato . saute this for 2 - 4 minutes . pour this turka into the dal . simmer the dal for another 15 - 20 minutes . the dal is ready .

add cream to the dal .
pour the carton of cream into the pan . mix the cream into the pan .

add cream to the dal .
put the cream into the pot . you may use yogurt instead of cream . once cream is added , stir with spoon to mix .

add cream to the dal .
slowly pour the cream into the dal . stir the dal with a spoon until the cream is mixed in .

add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
add half a teaspoon garam masala to pot . slice a handful of cilantro leaves into small strips and ad to pot .

add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
add garam masala ( a mix of indian spices ) . add fresh cilantro leaves which have been torn into small pieces .

add garam masala and cilantro to the dal .
put a half of teaspoon of garam masala to the pot . add some chopped green cilantro leaves .

arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
take some sesame seeds in a bowl . cut the tuna in to thin slices . arrange the tuna slices in a plate . add the seaweed along side of the plate . sprinkle some seeds on to the tuna slices .

arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
place the tuna slices on the plate next to the seaweed . use a spoon to scoop up some sesame seeds . sprinkle the sesame seeds over the plate .

arrange the tuna slices along with the seaweed and sprinkle some sesame seeds over it .
take the sliced tuna pieces and arrange nicely on a plate . sprinkle the tuna slices with sesame seeds .

chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
thinly slice some yellow onions carefully with a knife . set the onion slices on top of the tuna .

chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
put yellow onions on the cutting board . chop the yellow onions carefully with a knife in straight lines . place the slices on the tuna .

chop some yellow onions and arrange the slices on the tuna .
chop yellow onions up into thin slices with a knife . arrange the onions on top of the tuna .

tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
take the dry seaweed and tear it into smaller pieces . take the smaller pieces of seaweed and set them on a plate .

tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
take a piece of seaweed and fold it in half to make it easier to tear . tear the seaweed down the fold and keep doing this until you tear it all into smaller pieces , about 2 inches wide . set the small seaweed pieces to the side on a plate .

tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces and put them on a plate .
use your hands to tear the dried seaweed into smaller pieces . put the seaweed pieces on a plate .

cut tuna meat into thin slices .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take the tuna meat on the cutting board . cut the tuna in to long thin slices . cut the tuna entirely . take the tuna slices on a plate .

cut tuna meat into thin slices .
hold the tuna carefully . cut the tuna into thin strips with a knife .

cut tuna meat into thin slices .
place the tuna onto a cutting board . hold one end of the tuna and use a sharp knife to slowly cut off thin pieces .

put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
add some seaweed salad on the plate . put some bean sprouts on the side of the plate . next to the bean sprouts add some lettuce to the plate .

put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
we can put our seaweed salad on top of the fish . a nice helping of beansprouts and lettuce can also be added to the plate as well .

put some seaweed salad on top place some bean sprouts and lettuce on the side .
place 1 - 2 spoon fulls of seaweed salad on top . then place about a 1/4 cup of beans sprouts and a few pieces of lettuce on the side .

wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
use your seaweed papers to gently place your food items into . roll the seaweed around the food items to make a hotdog shaped roll with the food items inside . use your hands to dip your seaweed roll into the soy sauce .

wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
pick up each topping and put them on the seaweed . roll it up . dip the roll in soy sauce and relish .

wrap everything in the seaweed dip in soy sauce and relish .
grab seaweed wrap with hand . using chopsticks , grab contents that you want on wrap . using both hands , roll contents into seaweed wrap . then use spoon to drizzle soy sauce onto wrap to desired taste .

add refried beans to a preheated pan .
put a pan on the stove and turn on the burner . when the pan is warm add the refried beans to the pan .

add refried beans to a preheated pan .
heat the pan up until it 's hot . add the refried beans to the pan . you can find the beans at any grocery store .

add refried beans to a preheated pan .
open a can of refried beans . place a no - stick frying pan on the stove and turn the burner onto low - medium . using a rubber spatula , scoop the refried beans out of the can into the warmed up pan .

add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
add several pinches of chili powder over top of mixture . stir mixture non - stop with a wooden spoon over medium heat . we will stir the mixture for about 3 to 4 minutes , just until it gets hot .

add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
add a little bit of chili powder and stir the mixture . continue keeping the pan on the stove over medium heat . keep stirring for about 3 minutes until it gets hot .

add chili powder and stir to cook under medium heat .
put some chili powder into the meat . with your spoon mix around your chili powder into your meat .

on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
take the tortilla bread and put it on your hot pan . warm the first side for one minute . flip over your tortilla bread and heat the other side for one minute as well .

on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
set the flower tortilla in the heated pan . after a minute , use tongs to turn the tortilla over . after another minute , remove the tortilla from the pan .

on a new preheated pan add the flour tortilla and heat on both sides .
put a frying pan on the stove and turn on the heat to medium . let the pan get hot for about a minute . put the flour tortilla in the pan and let it heat for one minute . take tongs and turn the tortilla to the other side in the pan . heat the tortilla for one minute and then remove it with the tongs .

place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
use a spoon to put the beans in the middle of the tortilla . then spread the beans left and right using the spoon . next , put a piece of lettuce on top of the beans .

place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
lay the tortilla flat on a large plate . use a spoon to scoop some refried beans on to the center of the tortilla . spread the refried beans on the open tortilla . make sure to leave some room around the edge of the tortilla .

place the beans on the tortilla and spread out .
get a tortilla , refried beans , a plate , and a spoon . take the tortilla out of the package and lay it on the plate . get a scoop of refried beans and spread it onto the middle of your tortilla . spread the beans on the tortilla almost to the edge . imagine spreading frosting only down the middle of a cake .

add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
add on top of the re - fried beans on the tortilla chopped up lettuce evenly . now add about 10 pieces of cubed tomatoes , 5 cubed pieces of onion and about 4 pieces of sliced jalapeno peppers and black olives . now add a spoonful evenly across the burrito of mild salsa and sour cream . now add a layer of of shredded cheddar cheese . make sure that all ingredients are spread out evenly and do n't add to much .

add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
on top of the re fried beans place lettuce , diced tomatoes , onions , black olives , and jalapeno peppers . next add the salsa and sour cream . top it off with shredded cheddar cheese .

add lettuce diced tomatoes onions olive pepper salsa sour cream and cheddar cheese .
put lettuce and tomato on top . then put onions , black olives and jalapeno peppers . then places the salsa and sour cream . finally , top with shredded cheddar cheese .

roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
pick up one edge of the burrito and tuck it in the side . then roll the burrito until it 's almost all the way rolled up . then on the last piece you did n't roll up spread a little bit of sour cream . to make the burrito look nice you can press the edges in .

roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
lift one edge of the burrito over the topping and roll . tuck the edge under the toppings and keep rolling . spread some sour cream on the bottom edge to seal . tuck in each end of burrito to finish .

roll the burrito up and use sour cream to seal it up .
pull one edge of the tortilla over the toppings . tuck the edge under the toppings and roll it until a half inch of tortilla remains . use a spoon to spread a small spot of sour cream near the open edge of the tortilla . roll the tortilla over the sour cream to seal the toppings . fold the ends of the tortilla to seal the burrito .

cut the tuna into smaller sections .
cut the big fish into bi pieces . use a big knife . keep the pieces on ice .

cut the tuna into smaller sections .
place the fish on flat surface . cut the fish 's fin . now starting in the middle make a cross cut horizontally and then vertically . now you will make a cut parallel to the table . this will allow us to pull 4 chunks of fish .

cut the tuna into smaller sections .
using a big knife chop away the fins . use the knife 's edge to slice the top of the fish down form it 's head to it 's tail . use the knife to cut all the way down the fish . use the knife and cut the fish into squares . with your knife carefully take the fish meat out .

cut the skin off the section .
use the big knife to cut a hunk of skin from the middle . make sure the hunk of skin is a long hunk of skin . place the hunk of skin aside .

cut the skin off the section .
steel yourself to touch a cold dead fish . carefully , holding the knife , slice into the cold dead fish as close to the skin as possible , carefully slide the knife a bit at at time into the fish , slicing into the flesh until the skin is fully free from the meat of the fish . you may need to slice along the skin many times until it 's completely separated . discard the skin .

cut the skin off the section .
using a sharp knife cut the skin off of the fish . as you are cutting keep pulling the skin back until it is removed .

cut the dark part off .
first take the skin off the fish . next remove any thing on the fish that is still dark .

cut the dark part off .
use a knife to cut off the dark part of the fish . set the dark part of the fish aside .

cut the dark part off .
using a sharp knife , cut the dark part of the fish off . as you are cutting the dark pieces off keep rolling back until all of it is removed .

cut the tuna into slices .
with a sharp knife , carefully cut the tuna into slices . place the tuna slices onto a plate .

cut the tuna into slices .
sliced the fish into pieces . the pieces should be the size and thickness of a small pancake .

cut the tuna into slices .
hold the tuna with one hand . cut the tuna into slices with a knife in your other hand . be careful to not cut too close to where you are holding the tuna . try to make the slices about as think as a slice of bread .

place wasabi next to the tuna .
use the knife to pick up a tiny piece of the wasabi . you do n't need a whole lot so be careful . using your knife put the wasabi next to the tuna on the plate .

place wasabi next to the tuna .
place tuna on plate . add a nice size scoop of wasabi next to the tuna .

place wasabi next to the tuna .
place the bowl with the wasabi on the counter . place the plate with the tuna next to the wasabi bowl . get a table knife or spoon . cut off a piece of wasabi in the shape of a 1 inch square . place the wasabi square you just cut next to the tuna .

take the cooked mashed potatoes and flour in a bowl .
put the cooked mashed potatoes in a bowl . put the flour in the same bowl .

take the cooked mashed potatoes and flour in a bowl .
take a big mixing bowl . cook the mashed potatoes in a pot . remove the water from the mashed potatoes . add the mashed potatoes in to the bowl . add some flour in to the bowl .

take the cooked mashed potatoes and flour in a bowl .
pour the cooked mashed potatoes into a bowl . carefully pour flour on top of the potatoes in the bowl .

into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
put the mashed potatoes into a cloth . wrap the potatoes tightly in the cloth . squeeze tightly . drain all the water out of it .

into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
put the potatoes into the cloth . with your hand twist the top of the cloth . twist the cloth until all the access juices come out .

into a cloth add the mashed potatoes and squeeze out all the water .
take our potatoes and put them into a clean cloth . now wrench the cloth as it starts to smash the potatoes . keep doing so to drain the starch and moisture out of the potatoes . just go until you have as much as you can get into your bowl .

pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
scoop up some batter with a ladle . pour the batter into a pan . spread the batter around the bottom of the pan .

pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
dip the ladle in the batter and fill the ladle to the top with batter . pour all the batter that 's in the ladle into the center of the skillet . drag the bottom of the ladle around in the batter to spread it out into a big circle in the skillet .

pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around .
use your ladle to scoop a full ladle of the batter out of the bowl . place your ladle full of batter into the center of the heated pan , as you use your ladle to smooth the mix around to make it all even and spread .

melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
add a pad of butter and olive oil in the pan . spread the butter and oil so it spreads around the pan evenly .

melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
take a pan and heat the pan . add little butter in the pan . melt the butter in the pan . add some olive oil in the pan . heat the oil in the pan .

melt little butter and olive oil in a pan .
add both butter and olive oil into the heated pan . swirl the butter and olive oil around in the pan until the butter is melted and it is mixed in with the olive oil .

let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
let it cook for 2 to 3 minutes . when one side is golden brown flip it over and cook the other side . let the second side cook for 2 to 3 minutes , remove it with a spatula . set on to a plate .

let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
let the dough cook for 2 to 3 minutes . flip the thing by jerking the pan up . make sure both sides are a nice golden brown color .

let it cook for 2 - 3 minutes on both side until golden and serve .
move it around so it does not burn . once one side is done flip it by moving the pan forward in a fast motion . after both sides are done serve it .

add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
add a pinch of white salt to the bowl . add white pepper to the bowl . add milk to the bowl slowly . stir the mixture .

add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
add some salt to the bowl . put in some white pepper . add about half of your milk . use a whisk and stir together . let it sit for 20 minutes .

add a little salt white pepper stir and add milk in batches to form a batter .
put some salt and white pepper into the bowl . slowly pour about half of the milk into the bowl and stir with a whisk . let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .

add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .
add starch into the batter . allow the batter to sit undisturbed for 20 minutes .

add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .
with your fingers get the starch out of the bowl and put it in the other bowl . let your batter sit for about 20 mins .

add the starch into the batter and let the batter sit for about 20 minutes .
add the starch from your bowl into your batter by scooping it out with your hands . use your whisk to mix the batter and starch mix together until it 's all blended well . allow the batter to sit for about 20 minutes .

add red wine vinegar dijon mustard raisin toasted walnut diced apple and date paste to the food processor .
pour some red wine vinegar , dijon mustard , raisins and walnuts to the blender . then add some apples and date paste to the blender .

add red wine vinegar dijon mustard raisin toasted walnut diced apple and date paste to the food processor .
pour some red wine vinegar into the blender . dijon mustard add some dijon mustard . add raisins and toasted walnuts add raisins and roasted walnuts . add apple and date paste .

add red wine vinegar dijon mustard raisin toasted walnut diced apple and date paste to the food processor .
add red wine vinegar and dijon mustard to the food processor . add raisins and toasted walnuts to the food processor . add diced apples to the processor . add date paste to the processor .

garnish the salad with some grapes and serve .
add some grapes to the top of the salad . prepare to serve the salad .

garnish the salad with some grapes and serve .
place the grapes on a cutting board . get a small knife . cut all the grapes in half down the middle . place them on top of the salad . place the salad on the table , ready to eat .

garnish the salad with some grapes and serve .
put some slice grapes on top of the salad . the salad is ready to serve .

add some kale diced celery apple toasted walnut and raisin to a bowl .
you will need 2 cups of kale , 1 apple , 2 stalks of celery , 1/4 cup raisins and a handful of raisins . measure each ingredient and put each one into a small dish . rinse and dry the kale leaves and tear into large pieces . use a knife and a cutting board and carefully cut the apple and celery into small pieces . last , add all the ingredients to the kale and toss together with your hands until mixed well .

add some kale diced celery apple toasted walnut and raisin to a bowl .
now take your kale and diced celery and add it into the mixing bowl . we can also put in the dried apple and toasted walnut . last we will put some raisins into our bowl .

add some kale diced celery apple toasted walnut and raisin to a bowl .
add some kale to the bowl . put in some celery . add diced red apple and dried toasted walnuts . add some raisins to the bowl . mix all of the ingredients together in the bowl .

add a little sea salt black pepper and water and blend it .
add sea salt to the blender . add black pepper to the blender . add salt to the blender . press the blend button on the blender till the mixture is blended together .

add a little sea salt black pepper and water and blend it .
add sea salt to the blender . add black pepper in the blender . add water to the blender . press the button to blend everything .

add a little sea salt black pepper and water and blend it .
add some sea salt with your fingers to the blender . then add some pepper with your fingers . next add some water to the blender . turn the blender on and blend the ingredients .

add the sauce to the bowl of ingredients and toss it up .
hold the sauce over the bowl . pour it in slowly . use tongs to mix everything up .

add the sauce to the bowl of ingredients and toss it up .
pour the sauce into the salad bowl . use tongs to mix the sauce into the salad so it is mixed around evenly .

add the sauce to the bowl of ingredients and toss it up .
pour the sauce all over the bowl of salad ingredients . take some tongs and mix the salad up .

pour some lime juice brown sugar and fish sauce .
pour lime juice into the wok . add brown sugar to the wok . add fish sauce to the wok .

pour some lime juice brown sugar and fish sauce .
pour lime juice , brown sugar and fish sauce into the pan . grab your favorite kitchen utensil .

pour some lime juice brown sugar and fish sauce .
add some lime juice from two limes into the frying pan . add brown sugar to the pan . pour in some fish sauce .

chop a red chili and grind it as well as some coriander leaves .
use a knife to cut up one chili . add the chili to the pot . chop up the coriander leaves . add the coriander to the bowl .

chop a red chili and grind it as well as some coriander leaves .
carefully hold a chili . now cut it into small pieces with a knife . grind the small pieces in a grinder . do the same with coriander leaves .

chop a red chili and grind it as well as some coriander leaves .
on a cutting board and with a knife cut up one red chili - remove seeds to make less spicier and grind up in grinder . grind some coriander leaves with the red chili .

stir it add a beaten egg and stir again .
use wooden mixers to mix the ingredients in the pan . crash the eggs into a cup . poor the mixed eggs into the center of the pot and then slowly spread the eggs through out the dish . once everything is starting to stick together it is done .

stir it add a beaten egg and stir again .
use stirring spins and mix all of the ingredients . crack two eggs . pour into a bowl . mix the eggs together . pour the eggs into the pan and mix them into the pan .

stir it add a beaten egg and stir again .
stir everything with 2 paddles . add the egg to the pan . stir everything again .

heat some oil in a pan add the mixture some shrimp and bean sprouts .
add oil to a wok . roll the oil around . take a pre - made shrimp and bean mixture and add to the hot oil . then take a utensil and stir around allowing the mixture to saute . repeat until cooked all the way through .

heat some oil in a pan add the mixture some shrimp and bean sprouts .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add some shrimp in the pan . add some bean sprouts in to the pan and mix .

heat some oil in a pan add the mixture some shrimp and bean sprouts .
pour oil in a pan . turn the knob on the stove up . drop in the mixture some shrimp and bean sprouts into the pan .

add some chopped green onions and rice noodles .
put the spring onions into the hot wok and stir . add the cooked rice noodles to the wok .

add some chopped green onions and rice noodles .
add a handful of chopped green onions into the pot . put in rice noodles into the pot . stir the ingredients with the stirring spoon together in the pot .

add some chopped green onions and rice noodles .
