take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut some green onions in to small pieces . add green onions in to the bowl . add some rice noodles in to the pan and mix them .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice and serve .
use your hands to put coriander leaves on top . squeeze a lime over the plate .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice and serve .
spread the coriander leaves on top . take a lime and squeeze it around the top to give it some extra flavor .

garnish with coriander leaves and lime juice and serve .
add some bean sprouts on top of the dish . put some coriander leaves over the top of the bean sprouts . add some lime juice over the top . put lime wedges on the side . prepare to serve .

shred some lime in the grinder and grind the ingredients .
use a microplane to get just the green part of two limes off and into the bowl of a mortar and pestle . use the masher to mash the lime and all of the other ingredients together until it looks like a green , mushy paste .

shred some lime in the grinder and grind the ingredients .
rub the lime against the grater holding the grater over the bowl . use a grinder to crush the lime .

shred some lime in the grinder and grind the ingredients .
use the grater and grate a lime . put the grated lime into the grinder . grind all of the ingredients together until they are mixed .

form the meat into a patty .
wash your hands with soap and water for 30 seconds . take a handful of ground beef . squeeze it back and forth between your hands so that it looks like a hockey puck . for this recipe we want the beef patty to be thick for this recipe .

form the meat into a patty .
grab some beef . use both hands . shape the ground beef . form a patty . try to make it a fat patty .

form the meat into a patty .
using your hands pat the patty . using your hands firm it to a patty shape .

when the bottom turns brown flip the burger .
use a heavy skillet and place four raw hamburgers in a hot skillet . use a flat metal spatula to flatten the burger as the meat starts to cook , and as the fat comes out , using your spatula , turn the burgers so the other side can also get brown . as the meat cooks , you will see crevices in the meat where the fat is coming out of the meat , and the top will become super crunchy while the inside of the burger stays juicy .

when the bottom turns brown flip the burger .
cook until the bottom of the burger meat turns brown . when it is brown , use your spatula to flip it over and cook the other side .

when the bottom turns brown flip the burger .
take a pan and heat it . add some oil in the pan . place burgers in the pan . when they turn brown take a spatula and flip the burger to the other side . fry the other side of the burger .

slice the tomatoes onions and pickles .
take your knife , and get ready to cut the tomatoes . we want to use a very sharp knife . slice the tomatoes up and then slice the onions as well . now take your pickles and slice them up as well .

slice the tomatoes onions and pickles .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a tomato and cut it in to thin round slices . take an onion and cut it in to thin round slices . take a pickle on the cutting board . cut the pickle in to thin round slices .

slice the tomatoes onions and pickles .
use your knife to carefully cut the tomatoes into slices . peel the onion peel off and slice the onions . use the knife to slice the pickles .

cut the beef into strips and grind the beef .
put the meat on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the meat into strips . put the meat strips into meat grinder to grind . if you do n't have a grinder , you can ask your local butcher to grind it .

cut the beef into strips and grind the beef .
now we are going to cut the beef up into little strips . once it is all cut up , you just need to start grinding it . slowly add the strips into the grinder , and make sure you keep your fingers clear . go ahead and leave the fat in the meat .

cut the beef into strips and grind the beef .
using a knife cut the beef in half . cut the beef using a knife into slices . place the beef into your grinder . moving the bowl around while you grind your meat .

add pepper and salt to the patty .
season each patty heavily . sprinkle salt and pepper to taste . flip . repeat on other side .

add pepper and salt to the patty .
add salt and pepper to the top of the beef patties . flip the patties over and do the same to the other side .

add pepper and salt to the patty .
get some salt and pepper . you can make a mix in small bowl . add the salt and pepper to the beef patty that you made to season it . it can be sprinkled or spread lightly .

fry the burger in a pan .
put the burgers into the pan . cook them for 3 mins . flip the burgers and cook again for 3 mins .

fry the burger in a pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . heat the pan on the stove . take the burgers and place it on the pan . fry the burgers on the pan . fry the burgers on both sides .

fry the burger in a pan .
put the burger on the pan and begin to cook . cook the burger for 3 1/2 to 4 minutes for each side .

layer lettuce the patty onion tomato pickle mustard ketchup and the top bun onto the bottom bun .
take a bun and add pieces of lettuce . place the patty on the lettuce . add pieces of onion and tomato on top of lettuce . top them with mustard and ketch up . place the top bun .

layer lettuce the patty onion tomato pickle mustard ketchup and the top bun onto the bottom bun .
put the lettuce on the bottom on top of the bun . then add your meat patty . next , put the onion on top . then add a tomato and pickles . finally , put ketchup , mustard and then put the top of the bun on the burger .

layer lettuce the patty onion tomato pickle mustard ketchup and the top bun onto the bottom bun .
first make a bed of lettuce on the meat by covering it with lettuce pieces . next add the onion tomato pickle one by one on top of each other . next put some mustard and ketchup on the vegetables .

top the patties with cheese .
ask adult for help . place burgher in pan . turn on stove with adult help . flip burger to other side . add two pieces of cheese to each burgher .

top the patties with cheese .
everyone loves munchies . today we will be adding sliced cheese to the burger that is cooking in the skillet . break apart the sliced cheese , two slices per burger . make the two slices of cheese look like the star of david , the land of milk and honey , a good movie . place this star of david cheese onto the top of the burger .

top the patties with cheese .
take 2 cheese slices and place one on top of the other , but not with the corners lined up . the 2 pieces of cheese should look like a star of david . place the cheese on top of the burger patties while they are still frying .

toast the buns .
with a knife add butter to your buns . place the buns onto the grill .

toast the buns .
take a butter knife and spread butter all over the inside of the buns . place the bun butter side down on the pan to toast them .

toast the buns .
butter each bun . place each bun on the pan and let them toast for a minute or two . carefully take them off once toasted .

slice the lettuce .
take a half of the lettuce and put on a cutting board . take a knife and shave lettuce off the side that is already cut into small pieces .

slice the lettuce .
use a knife to cut a head of lettuce in two halves . then slice the lettuce to make thin slices .

slice the lettuce .
place lettuce on cutting board . using your knife , cut the lettuce into thin pieces .

add broth and noodles to a bowl and top with an egg and furikake .
use a ladle to put broth in the bowl . use tongs to pick up the noodles , broccoli and add mushrooms to broth bowl . then add a fried egg , furikake , pepper and herbs .

add broth and noodles to a bowl and top with an egg and furikake .
pour some broth into a bowl . add noodles to the bowl . add some broccoli and egg to the top . sprinkle some furikake over the bowl .

add broth and noodles to a bowl and top with an egg and furikake .
scoop broth with tofu with a ladle into a soup bowl . use tongs to grab udon noodles and add to soup bowl . use tongs to add steamed vegetables to bowl . add 2 - 3 pieces of each kind of vegetable . use a spatula to add a fried egg on top of udon soup . sprinkle fukikake ( seasoned nori ) on fried egg and soup .

add broccoli other vegetables tofu and chicken into the broth and cook until the ingredients are barley cooked .
take a pot and add the broth . cut the mushrooms and tofu in to small pieces . add the mushrooms and broccoli in to the broth . add the tofu and chicken in to the broth . cook the contents till they are properly cooked .

add broccoli other vegetables tofu and chicken into the broth and cook until the ingredients are barley cooked .
place the pan of broth on the stove top and turn it on low heat . add broccoli , mushrooms , tofu , mahi mahi , or other protein source and let it cook in the broth for about a minute . stir the food as it heats in the broth , cooking ingredients until they are just barely cooked .

add broccoli other vegetables tofu and chicken into the broth and cook until the ingredients are barley cooked .
put broccoli and carrots into the broth . add mushrooms and tofu . stir the ingredients around and let it cook for a minute .

add tsuyu sauce ginger soy sauce sesame oil and mirum to another pot of water .
now we can add in one portion of tsuyu to our sauce . we can also add in a couple of slices or coins of ginger . now we will add in some sesame oil and mirum as well into our pot .

add tsuyu sauce ginger soy sauce sesame oil and mirum to another pot of water .
pour tsuyu sauce , ginger , soy sauce , sesame oil and mirin into the pot . let it simmer .

add tsuyu sauce ginger soy sauce sesame oil and mirum to another pot of water .
boil about 2 cups of water on a pan on the stove . add half a cup of tsuyu sauce . you can increase the depth and flavor of the dish by adding a few fresh ginger slices . this will increase the flavor known as umami . add a teaspoon or two of soy sauce , sesame oil , and mirum , a sweet japanese seasoning . these sauces can be found at asian grocery stores , and at some mainline american grocery stores .

put the noodle blocks in a pan of boiling water .
take the blocks of noodle and set them into a pot of water . boiling the water to soften the noodles .

put the noodle blocks in a pan of boiling water .
take a chunk of noodles . place in bowl . add water . bring to boil . let cook for about 8 minutes and serve .

put the noodle blocks in a pan of boiling water .
place the big pan on the stove . add water into the pan . wait until the water is boiled . add the noodle blocks into the boiling water .

add water an vinegar to a pan and stir .
pour the water and vinegar in a pan . use a spatula to stir it all together .

add water an vinegar to a pan and stir .
add water then vinegar to a pan . once the water and vinegar and stir so it mixes .

add water an vinegar to a pan and stir .
warm the water in a pan . add half of a tablespoon of vinegar to the pan . ( this helps the eggs stay together ) .

plate the eggs benedict with bearnaise .
use a spoon to scoop the bearnaise sauce . scoop the sauce onto the eggs .

plate the eggs benedict with bearnaise .
you can put the bearnaise sauce directly on the meat that is on the muffin or you can spoon it on top of the egg . scoop 2 tablespoons of the bearnaise sauce over the meat that 's on the muffin . using the slotted spoon get one egg from the skillet , hold it over the skillet a moment to let the water drain off . put the egg on the bearnaise sauce . you can add more bearnaise if you like or leave it like it is .

plate the eggs benedict with bearnaise .
once the eggs are cooked ( look white on the outside but soft to the look and touch ) carefully lift them from the water with a slotted spoon or spatula . let them drip over the pot for a few seconds to remove excess water . place on top of the bearnaise sauce . ( not homemade ) .

pour the eggs into the pan of hot water and mix .
can not watch on this site , so . do not know which parts of video to include .

pour the eggs into the pan of hot water and mix .
get a skillet and fill it half way with water . put the skillet on the stove and turn the heat to medium . let the water heat until it bubbles a little . get a slotted large plastic spoon . slowly pour the eggs into the hot water in the middle of the skillet , slowly swirl the hot water around with the spoon but not the eggs .

pour the eggs into the pan of hot water and mix .
after pouring the vinegar in , swirl the water and vinegar around . go ahead and have your eggs cracked out of the shells so you can inspect them . slowly pour all of the eggs into the water and vinegar . swirl the water around the eggs to help them cook .

place the egg onto a piece of bread .
use a spatula to scoop up the egg . lay the egg on your piece of bread .

place the egg onto a piece of bread .
after you have cooked your egg carefully use a spatula to get egg out of pan . the put egg on a slice of bread on a plate .

place the egg onto a piece of bread .
take out the poached eggs from the water , one egg at a time , using a slotted spoon . place each egg on a piece of bread . you can add salt and pepper if you like .

place slices of ham onto bread .
pick up the slices of ham with your hands . carefully put the ham onto the bread pieces .

place slices of ham onto bread .
you bread should already be on a plate . next put your slices of ham on the bread .

place slices of ham onto bread .
warm the plates to 190 degrees in the oven . once the plates are warmed pull them out of the oven . place toasted and buttered english muffins on your warmed plate . lay slices of ham onto your english muffins .

cut the salmon and tuna into thin slices .
get your chopping board out . get a sharp knife . place the salmon and tuna on the board . starting with the salmon carefully slice about 3 or 4 thin slices of . set aside . next move on to the tuna , and also carefully slice it into 3 to 4 thin slices .

cut the salmon and tuna into thin slices .
cut the salmon into thin slices with a knife . cut the tuna into thin slices with a knife .

cut the salmon and tuna into thin slices .
take salmon and tuna on a chopping board . cut the salmon and tuna in to 3 inch long length pieces . cut the salmon in to very thin slices by dragging the knife on to the salmon . even the tuna pieces . cut the tuna in to long thin slices by dragging the knife .

wrap the rice with avocado salmon slice and seaweed .
make a small ball with the cooked rice , about the size of large marble . take a piece of the thinly sliced avocado and wrap it about the rice ball , make sure the greenest part of the avocado is on top . get a piece of salmon and wrap it around the rice and avocado . next , wrap a strip of seaweed paper around the bottom to hold everything together .

wrap the rice with avocado salmon slice and seaweed .
first , take a small pinch of rice . then you will a small slice of avocado and wrap it around the rice , make sure you put the green stripe at the top of the roll . you then want to take a slice of salmon and wrap it around the avocado . finally , you will take a thin strip of the seaweed paper to hold it all together .

wrap the rice with avocado salmon slice and seaweed .
put a small amount of rice into a ball . next wrap avocado around the rice . then wrap a thin piece of salmon around it . last wrap a piece of nori seaweed paper to hold it together .

wrap the rice with avocado tun and seaweed .
take a little bit of rice , and make it into a small ball . wrap a thin slice of avocado flat around the rice , making sure the darker green color is facing up and the lighter color facing down ... . lightly wrap the slice of tuna around the rice and avocado . press down on the rice to make it look neater . wrap a thin slice of seaweed around the bottom of the roll .

wrap the rice with avocado tun and seaweed .
take a small ball of rice . wrap a thin slice of avocado around the rice . wrap a thin slice of tuna around the avocado . wrap a thin slice of nori seaweed along the bottom of the roll to keep it together .

wrap the rice with avocado tun and seaweed .
take an inch block sized rice ball . cut the avocado in to very thin slice and wrap it around the rice . cut the tuna in to thin strip and wrap it around avocado . cut a thin strip of seaweed . wrap the seaweed around the tuna .

finely chop the tuna and salmon .
take the cuts of both the tuna and salmon that we gathered before . now be careful and take the knife . cut the tuna into very fine slices . now turn the tuna sideways and cut it the other direction . now go ahead and grab the salmon and cut the same exact way .

finely chop the tuna and salmon .
take the meat and hold it carefully . cut small pieces of the meat in straight lines .

finely chop the tuna and salmon .
cut the tuna into very small pieces . wipe off the knife . cut the salmon into very small pieces .

transfer the tuna and salmon to different bowls and mix with sriracha sauce soy sauce lime juice and chopped chives .
chop up tuna and salmon . put the salmon in one bowl and the tuna in another bowl . add a little bit of sriracha sauce to each bowl . on top of the sriracha add just a little but of soy sauce . next add some lime juice and chopped chives to the mixture .

transfer the tuna and salmon to different bowls and mix with sriracha sauce soy sauce lime juice and chopped chives .
take the cut pieces of tuna and salmon in to two separate bowls . add some sriracha sauce in to the bowls . add some soy sauce in to the bowls . add some lime juice in to the bowls and add cut chives . mix everything in the bowl with a spoon .

transfer the tuna and salmon to different bowls and mix with sriracha sauce soy sauce lime juice and chopped chives .
put the tuna and salmon into two different bowls . add sriracha sauce to both . add soy sauce to both . add lime juice to both . add chopped chives to both .

add the tartar mix to the salmon and tuna sushi rolls and put chopped chives on the top .
for the tuna sushi roll place a small amount of salmon tartar on top . for the salmon sushi roll place a small amount of tuna tartar on top . afterwards , sprinkle chopped chives on top of both sushi rolls .

add the tartar mix to the salmon and tuna sushi rolls and put chopped chives on the top .
put the salmon on the top of one of the sushi rolls . then you will add tuna to the other sushi roll . to finish them off , sprinkle a little of chopped chives on top .

add the tartar mix to the salmon and tuna sushi rolls and put chopped chives on the top .
place the salmon tartar mix on top of the tuna sushi roll . place the tuna tartar mix on top of the salmon sushi roll . add a pinch a cut up chives to the tops of both sushi rolls .

mix some chopped celery potatoes onions and clam juice .
get 2 pots , 2 cans of clams in juice , a strainer , and 2 cups of chopped celery , 2 cups of chopped potatoes , and 1/2 a small onion that an adult chopped for you . use a can opener or ask a helper to open your cans of clams . hold a strainer over the pot and pour the clams and juice through it . clams stay in the strainer and your juice is the only thing in the pot now . put the chopped onion , celery , and potatoes in the same pot .

mix some chopped celery potatoes onions and clam juice .
you will need two pots to make this soup . put all vegetables into one pot . open up two cans of clam and strain the juice in with vegetables . once the vegetables start cooking they will release their juices giving you plenty . you can use frozen potatoes but you will add them later .

mix some chopped celery potatoes onions and clam juice .
put all of the vegetables into one pot . use a can opener to open 4 cans of clams . pour the juice from each can of clams into the vegetable pot . use a spatula to push the vegetables into the clam juice .

heat some butter in a pot and add half - half and corn starch .
chop up a stick of butter into small pieces and put it into a big pot on the stove . turn the stove on low and watch until the butter is all melted . pour a quart of half & half into the pot . use a measuring cup to measure 4 cups of milk and pour it into the pot . then use a measuring cup to measure 1 cup of cornstarch and put it in the pot as soon as you can , while the milk in the pot is still cold .

heat some butter in a pot and add half - half and corn starch .
dump the cut up pieces of butter into the pot on the stove . add one carton of half - and - half into the pot when the butter has melted . add four cups of milk . pour one small bowl of cornstarch into bowl . take your whisk , and whisk the ingredients together .

heat some butter in a pot and add half - half and corn starch .
add some butter to the pot and met it . add some half - half to the pot . add 4 cups of milk . put in 1 cup of corn starch . whisk all of the ingredients together in the pot .

add some salt black pepper and sugar and whisk .
pour the 3 teaspoon salt into the mixture . dust the top of the mixture with black pepper . add 1 teaspoon sugar to the mixture . whisk the mixture until it begins to get thicker .

add some salt black pepper and sugar and whisk .
take a pot on a stove . add 3 teaspoons of salt in to the pot . add some black pepper powder in to the pot . add two teaspoons of sugar in to the pot . mix everything with a whisk spoon .

add some salt black pepper and sugar and whisk .
use a small spoon and add a bit of salt . shake some black pepper in . mix it around with the whisk tool or spoon .

add the vegetable mixture and the clam meat .
take your bowl filled with vegetables and add it to the pot . now you can also add your frozen potatoes . then take your stirring spoon and beginning stirring the pot .

add the vegetable mixture and the clam meat .
hold the bowl of vegetables over the pot . carefully and slowly pour in the vegetables into the pot so they do not splash .

add the vegetable mixture and the clam meat .
add the vegetables to the clam meat mixture to the hot pot . add frozen potatoes to the pot . add canned clams to the pot . stir everything .

cover the pot and cook .
grab the pot cover . cover the pot .

cover the pot and cook .
place lid on the pot . warm up the chowder .

cover the pot and cook .
grab the lid to the pot . place lid on top of the pot so that the top is covered . let cook .

lay the bread on the pan and bake .
use twelve pieces regular sandwich bread . lay the bread on a baking sheet , it 's okay if it overlaps . toast in a preheated oven for about 20 minutes . at 10 minutes turn the bread over to toast the other side .

lay the bread on the pan and bake .
take regular white bread and lay it out on the baking sheet . it 's okay if the bread is touching . turn the oven on and wait for the beep . turn over the bread after 10 minutes . bake for another 10 minutes .

lay the bread on the pan and bake .
get sandwich white breads . put sandwich white bread to the pan . lay on the pan , let it over lap . toast them 20 mins . turn them over and preheat again .

spread oil over a baking dish .
gather a pan and oil . also grab a napkin . place a small amount of oil into the pan . using the napkin spread the oil all over the pan . now you 're ready for the next steps .

spread oil over a baking dish .
pour a small amount of vegetable oil into a large rectangle baking dish , with a paper towel wipe all of the oil all over the dish and do n't forget the sides .

spread oil over a baking dish .
get out a baking dish . spread oil on bottom and sides of baking dish .

add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
take a large measuring jar . add 8 eggs in to the jar and add a tablespoon of dijon mustard . add 2 cups of 2 % milk in to the jar . add teaspoon of salt in to the jar . mix everything with a hand mixer .

add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
take 3 - 4 eggs and add in to a bowl . add dijon mustard in to bowl . add 2 cups of milk into it . add a teaspoon of salt also in to the bowl . after adding all , whisk altogether properly .

add dijon mustard milk and salt to eggs and whisk it .
put in 2 tablespoons of dijon mustard into the bowl with the eggs . then add in 2 cups of 2 percent milk . next add in a teaspoon of salt . whisk all ingredients together .

place the toast in the pan .
lay the pieces of toast next to each other into the glass baking dish in a single layer . you can squish the toast if you have to .

place the toast in the pan .
get the glass baking dish . take 6 pieces of slice bread . cover the bottom of the dish with the slices of bread . press and squeeze them down onto the baking dish .

place the toast in the pan .
place the bread in a pan side by side . try to fit as many in the pan as you can .

pour some of the egg mixture on top .
hold the measuring cup with the egg mixture by the handle . face the spout of the measuring cup towards the bread and start pouring . pour for one- two seconds in the middle of each slice until there is a large circle of egg mixture on each slice . do not pour all the mixture in at once , instead pour it slowly .

pour some of the egg mixture on top .
toast the bread for 20 min . 8 crack egg 2 cup 2 % milk . layer with cheese , ham , pour remaining egg . bake the dish .

pour some of the egg mixture on top .
grab your measuring cup that is full of the egg mix . pour some of the egg mix over each piece of bread .

add a layer of cheese and ham .
put a slice of cheese on each piece of bread . put sliced ham on each piece of cheese .

add a layer of cheese and ham .
arrange the bread pieces in a layer . place one sheet of cheese on all the bread pieces and make it a layer . cut the ham into thin slices . place the slices of ham as a layer on top of cheese .

add a layer of cheese and ham .
put a cheese slice on each piece of bread . get a cutting board . cut 8 pieces of thin ham into 3 strips . put the ham on top of the cheese . make sure you cover all the cheese with the ham .

add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
sprinkle cheese over the ham . make sure it 's pretty uniform over the ham . place the bread over top of the cheese .

add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
sprinkle grated cheese on top of lunch meat . put 6 slices of bread to cover cheese .

add a layer of cheese and top with bread .
sprinkle cheese across the top of the ham to cover all the meat . place slices of bread on top of the cheese covering all the cheese .

pour the egg mixture on top .
after you place the bread in the pan dump mixture over the bread . spread egg mixture over bread .

pour the egg mixture on top .
grab the bowl containing the egg mixture . pour the egg mixture evenly over the top of all of the slices of bread .

pour the egg mixture on top .
after keeping the breads ready . break the eggs and beat into the bowl . pour the egg mixture on top of the bread . pour it slowly .

sprinkle with cheese .
put a cup of grated cheese on a plate . use your hand to pick it up off the plate . sprinkle the cheese over top of all the bread until the cheese is gone .

sprinkle with cheese .
get shredded cheese . sprinkle the cheese on top of the food .

sprinkle with cheese .
with your hands , sprinkle your grated cheese on top of the bread . make sure there is an even amount of cheese on each piece of bread .

bake in the oven .
take the dish . put the dish into the oven on the rack .

bake in the oven .
turn the oven on to the temperature the instructions say ( 350 , 375 , or 400 ) . wait for the oven to beep . put the pan in the oven and set a timer for the amount of time the instructions say ( probably 25 minutes ) . wait until the oven beeps again . turn the oven off and carefully pull the dish out .

bake in the oven .
place the pan in the oven . once the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted to a golden brown , you may take it out .

put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
clean hands . get jar . place cut up cabbage in jar . cover cabbage in the liquid known as brine . press down to pack down cabbage in jar .

put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
wash your hands . chop cabbage . use your hands to put cabbage in jar . pack cabbage down . add brine to jar while packing cabbage down .

put the mixture in a jar and press firm to the bottom .
grab the mixture with your hand and place it in a jar . when you put on handful press it hard hard squishing it to the bottom . keep doing this with more handfuls .

add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
put in 20 grams of salt . add 1 teaspoon of caraways seeds . put in 1 teaspoon of juniper berries . add 1/2 teaspoon of dill to the bowl .

add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
hold the salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill over the bowl . pour everything in the bowl .

add 20 g salt caraway seeds juniper berries and dill .
use a kitchen scale to measure out 20 grams of caraway seeds . sprinkle seeds on cabbage . use a one teaspoon measuring spoon to measure 1 teaspoon of juniper berries . use a 1/2 teaspoon measuring spoon to measure out 1/2 teaspoon of dill tips . sprinkle juniper berries and dill on cabbage .

massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
take your hands and smush the cabbage to make sure the sea salt gets into the cabbage really well . squeeze the cabbage with your fingers for about 10 minutes .

massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
toss cabbage in a bowl with brining liquid . kneed in that bowl for approximately 10 minutes .

massage the cabbage with the seasoning .
use your hands to mix the salt into the cabbage . use your hands to really squeeze the cabbage for about 10 minutes .

finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
cut the cabbage into half . then cut the cabbage in half again . cut the middle parts off first to remove the core . slowly slice the cabbage from one end to another in small pieces . then turn the cabbage around to cut it in the other direction .

finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
first we want to finely chop the cabbage . using the knife be very careful , not to cut yourself . first cut the cabbage in half and then into quarters . this will help you get the core out . now chop the cabbage into fine strips .

finely chop a cabbage to small pieces .
carefully hold the cabbage . cut the cabbage in half carefully and slowly avoiding your hand . take a chunk of cabbage and cut it into thin lines carefully .

seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
put the lid on top of the jar . place a rubber band around the top . put it into a dark place for 4 weeks .

seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
put the lid on the jar . make sure the rubber band is fitted correctly on the jar . put bracket on top of jar to seal the jar .

seal the jar and put in dark place for 4 weeks .
place the lid onto your fermenting jar . make sure the rubber band is fitted correctly around the outside . use the tool to seal the jar by pushing it on both sides so no oxygen enters your jar .

fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
heat oil in a large pot with a thermometer . carefully place the corn dogs in the heated oil with the sticks resting on the edge of the pot . the sticks should be hanging outside over the edge of the pot and not laying all the way in the hot pot of oil . fry them in the oil until the batter turns a darker , golden brown color . once they are cooked and golden brown , carefully remove them from the oil by slowly grabbing the stick ends that are on the edge of the pot . place them onto a serving dish and serve with a side of mustard .

fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
put the corn dogs into the boiling oil . boil for 3 to 5 minutes . remove when the corn dogs are golden brown .

fry the corn dogs until golden brown .
watch the corn dogs as they fry . fry them for 3 - 5 minutes until you see them turning golden brown .

mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
crack and egg into the food processor bowl . add creamed corn and salt to the food processor bowl . put the lid on the processor and lock into place . turn on the processor and mix well .

mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
break an egg into the processor . spoon in the creamed corn and salt into the processor .

mix an egg creamed corn and salt in a food processor .
add an egg to the food processor . add 4 tablespoons of creamed corn . put in 1/4 teaspoon of salt . put the lid on the food processor . mix everything in the food processor .

coat the hot dogs in the batter .
dip the hot dog into the batter . turn the hot dog so it gets batter on all sides and is completely covered .

coat the hot dogs in the batter .
dip the hot dog into the batter several times to cover it . hold the batter bowl over the oil with the hot dog .

coat the hot dogs in the batter .
holding the stick dunk the hot dog into the batter . twist the stick so the hot dog turns and gets covered with batter on all sides . lift the hot dog out of the bowl and let any extra batter drip off back into the bowl .

add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
add milk and sugar to the food processor . add flour and baking powder to the food processor . add corn meal to the food processor . press the button to mix the ingredients .

add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
pour in milk to the processor . add 1/4 cup of sugar . add 1 cup of flour . add 2 teaspoons of baking powder . put in 1 cup of corn meal and then put the lid on and blend everything together .

add milk sugar flour baking powder and corn meal and mix .
pour a cup of milk into the processor bowl . add in a 1/4 cup of sugar to the bowl . then add i cup of all purpose flour and 2 teaspoons of baking powder . next add one cup of corn meal to the processing bowl . put the lid on the processor and turn it on to mix ingredients together .

hold the hot dog in the oil .
hold the hot dog by the stick . dip it in the oil and hold it there .

hold the hot dog in the oil .
dip the hot dog in batter . hold the hot dog in the hot oil while it cooks .

hold the hot dog in the oil .
hold the corndog by the wooden stick . lower the corndog into the hot oil and keep hold of the wooden stick .

add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
add the diced tomatoes we just cut into the bowl of chicken . now add in the strips of green chili peppers . add in the ginger garlic paste we made earlier . now add in all of the spices we measured at the beginning - you should have red chili powder , coriander powder , vera masala powder , turmeric powder , and salt . use your hands to mix the chicken , tomatoes , chilies , and spices together until everything is mixed well and the chicken is coated in spices . leave the chicken in the bowl for ten minutes before you move on to the next step .

add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
add your bowl of tomatoes to your bowl . add your bowl of green chilies to the bowl . add ginger garlic paste to your bowl . add chili powder to your bowl . add coriander powder to your bowl .

add tomato chili garlic chili powder coriander powder masala powder turmeric powder and salt to the chicken and mix .
add the chopped tomatoes , green chili , ginger garlic paste , red chili powder , coriander power , masala powder , turmeric powder and salt . mix it well . put it to the side for 10 minutes .

grind the shallots into a paste .
grind the shallots until it turns into a paste . when it turns creamy , it 's ready .

grind the shallots into a paste .
take some shallots in a bowl . remove the peel of the shallots . take a blender jar and add the shallots . turn on the blender and grind the shallots in to paste . take the paste in a bowl .

grind the shallots into a paste .
mush the shallots into a paste in a bowl . make sure there are no big pieces .

cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
use a spoon to put the chicken into an oiled pan . turn the stove to medium heat . stir the chicken and cook until it is soft .

cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
heat the oil in the pan . put chicken in the pan . let the chicken cook on medium heat with the lid on .

cook the chicken in a pan with oil .
hold the bowl of chicken over the pan . take a wooden spoon and scoop the chicken in slowly without splashing it around .

cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
in a pan that 's heat d up put onion paste in it . let cook until it changes color like a light brown . remember to stir .

cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
pour the onion paste into your heated pan with oil . use a spatula to mix the onion paste around in the pan . it is done until you notice the onion paste change from white to a dark brown .

cook the onion paste in a pan with oil until the color changes .
add the onion paste to the pan with hot oil . cook in the pan until the color changes .

when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
take a wooden spoon . poke the chicken and it will seem software . use the spoon to slowly scoop in the onion mix . use the spoon to mix everything up .

when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
while the chicken is still cooking , remove the lid . once the chicken has become soft , add the onion paste . stir the onion paste together with the chicken until it is well - mixed .

when the chicken is soft add onion paste and mix .
when the chicken is soft add onion paste . mix it up real well . do n't forget to add a little water .

add water and cook more .
add a half cup of water to the pan . cook for two minutes more .

add water and cook more .
now all you need to do is add water into your pan . once you have the water in , slowly turn your mixture around in the pan using a spoon . keep doing this for 2 minutes as your dish cooks .

add water and cook more .
add some water to the mixture . cook for two more minutes .

add coriander leaves and stir .
add coriander leaves . mix well with your mixing utensil - usually a wooden spoon works best for this , but you can also use a plastic spoon or a spatula . serve .

add coriander leaves and stir .
take a cooking dish in the pan . cut the coriander leaves in to small pieces . add the coriander leaves in to the curry . take a big wooden spoon . mix the coriander leaves with the curry in the pan .

add coriander leaves and stir .
now all you need to do is add in the coriander leaves to your pan . add the leaves in and take a wooden spoon , or whatever cooking utensil you have , and mix the leaves about the entire dish . be careful though , the pan is still quite hot .

add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
add oil to wok . heat oil in wok . add onion , bell pepper and bean sprout . mix . saute .

add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
cut the onions and bell pepper on a cutting board . heat up oil in the wok . carefully pour vegetables into the wok . stir the vegetables with a spoon . let it simmer until cooked .

add the onion bell pepper and bean sprout to the wok .
put onions , bell pepper and bean sprouts into the hot wok . use a wooden spoon to stir while cooking .

add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
add your cooked chicken to the vegetables in the wok . next add the shrimp to the wok . stir all the meats and vegetables together while they are frying .

add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
put the cooked chicken and shrimp into the hot wok . use a wooden spatula to stir the shrimp and chicken .

add the chicken and shrimp to the wok .
take the plate of cooked chicken and put the chicken into the wok . take the plate of shrimp and put the shrimp into the wok . take a spatula and stir all the ingredients in the wok .

cook the egg in the wok .
put the egg into the pan . stir the egg around mixing it with the oil .

cook the egg in the wok .
put oil in the wok and heat on the stove top . crack an egg in a bowl . pour egg into hot wok . use a wooden spatula to break the egg up in the wok while cooking .

cook the egg in the wok .
add oil to your wok and place it on stove . crack your egg into a bowl . add the egg to your wok once the oil is hot . use your wooden spoon to mix the egg , giving the woke a few shakes as well . cook the egg until it is scrambled and cooked through .

add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
put the curry powder into the wok with everything else . pour the oyster sauce into the wok and use a spoon to get it all if you need to . pour the soy sauce into the wok . add the chopped red chili to the wok . use a wooden spoon to stir everything while it cooks .

add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
first add the pre - measured curry powder to your pot . then add the oyster sauce and soy sauce . add your red chopped chili . now use a wooden spoon to mix it .

add the curry powder oyster sauce soy sauce and chili to the wok .
in a heated pan add curry powder . add in soy sauce and oyster sauce . add chili . mix all ingredients well .

add the noodles to the wok .
put noodles into the frying pan . take a pair of scissors to cut up the noodles into smaller sections .

add the noodles to the wok .
take the cooked noodles out of the strainer and add to the wok . use a pair of scissors to cut the noodles into shorter pieces .

add the noodles to the wok .
now we want to put our noodles in the dish . take the noodles and drop them into into the wok . one of the best things to do is take some kitchen scissors and cut the noodles up so they are not to long . be careful not to burn yourself .

add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
put the chopped spring onion into the frying pan . add some salt . stir the ingredients together with a spoon .

add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
hold the onions and salt bowls over the wok . pour them into the wok .

add the spring onion and salt to the wok .
add spring onion , salt and ground black pepper to the pan . use a wooden spatula to stir .

add the bok choy to the wok .
chop the bok choy up into large pieces . add the pieces to the wok . stir it in with the other vegetables .

add the bok choy to the wok .
put the bok choy into the mixture in the frying pan . use the spatula to stir the ingredients together as they cook .

add the bok choy to the wok .
hold the plate of bok choy over the pan . push the bok choy in the pan with a wooden spoon .

cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
cook ground beef on the stove at medium setting until the meet turns brown . you could also use chopped steak ( check with your parents on if you have this ) . when it is done you will add the following . 1 can of refried beans and just half a can of the enchilada sauce . stir together .

cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
cook the beef until it becomes brown . it should thicken up once you add red enchilada sauce , cheese , and beans to the pot . lower the heat and stir .

cook beef cube steak chopped yellow onion red enchilada sauce cheese beans in a pot .
cook some cubed steak in a pot . add chopped yellow onion to the pot . stir the mixture and cook until well done and drain the oil . add half a can of red enchilada sauce to the meat mixture . add cheese beans to the pot .

put the tortilla on the sauce .
place sauce in crock pot . lay tortilla on top . make sure enchilada sauce covers bottom of tortilla .

put the tortilla on the sauce .
put the tortilla on top of the sauce . spread it around !

put the tortilla on the sauce .
take one whole tortilla shell and place it flat on the bottom of the pot on top of the sauce . using your fingers , swirl the tortilla shell around on the bottom of the pot so that the entire bottom of the tortilla is covered with sauce . make sure you leave the tortilla flat on the bottom afterwards .

pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
take the snack into a pan . pour the mixture of meat on top of the snack . spread the mixture evenly over the snack . add or spread cheese on top of the snack .

pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
take the beef mixture in a pan aside . spread the meat mixture on top of taco stack . take some shredded cheese . add shredded cheese on the meat mixture . place another taco stack .

pour the mixture on it and top with shredded cheese .
spread meat mixture to tortilla . next add shredded cheese on top of the mixture .

cover it with another piece of tortilla .
get a piece of tortilla . put it on top of the food in the pan .

cover it with another piece of tortilla .
on top of the mixture in the crock pot , add one more tortilla on top . make sure it is flat and press it down gently .

cover it with another piece of tortilla .
put cheese on top of the sauce first . then cover the cheese with another tortilla . you will repeat the steps again .

layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
place a tortilla in the crock - pot . use a spoon to scoop mixture and spread on tortilla in crock - pot . sprinkle shredded cheese on top of mixture and tortilla . repeat steps 1 to 3 until the ingredients are all gone .

layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
put in a layer of meat on the bottom . add a layer of cheese over the meat . place a tortilla to cover the cheese . add another layer of meat and then cheese and then tortillas . keep adding layers of each until the pot is full .

layer the mixture cheese and tortillas .
now you will put in the mixture , cheese , and tortillas in one layer at a time . first , scoop up some of the mixture and spread it onto the bottom of the crock pot . next , sprinkle a layer of cheese over the mixture . then , put a tortilla on top of the cheese . repeat this until you use up all your mixture .

pour cheese sauce on top .
open the cheese packet . use your hand to squeeze the cheese onto the top of the taco . cover the whole taco with cheese sauce . you might need to use two packages of cheese sauce .

pour cheese sauce on top .
open the pouch . squeeze 1 or 2 on top . cover the entire top of the taco .

pour cheese sauce on top .
open 2 packets of cheese sauce . squeeze the cheese sauce into the pot with the soft taco .

boil some potatoes in salted water .
place a pot of water . add salt to the water . add potatoes to the pot . add a little bit of salt to the pot .

boil some potatoes in salted water .
put peeled potatoes and water to cover the potatoes . add a big pinch of salt to the pot .

boil some potatoes in salted water .
add cold water to large pot of potatoes . add a large pinch of salt .

shred the potatoes mash it and add some salt and parsley .
carefully cut the potatoes into small strips with a shredder . place into a bowl . add a handful of thyme leaves . add just a pinch of salt . add 2 table spoons of corn flour .

shred the potatoes mash it and add some salt and parsley .
shred the potatoes on a box shredder over some parchment paper . once shredded place in bowl and mash it with a masher . add a dash of salt and chopped parsley .

shred the potatoes mash it and add some salt and parsley .
take a large bowl . take a grater and cut the potatoes with grater . add the potatoes in to the bowl . add some cut pieces of parsley . sprinkle some salt on top of potatoes .

put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
put the potatoes in the tray using a spoon . press the potatoes down in the tray .

put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
cover a flat baking sheet with parchment paper . spoon the potato mixture onto the baking sheet . press the potato mixture down with your hands to spread it out .

put the mixture on a flat baking sheet and press firmly .
scoop the potato mixture with a large spoon . put all the potatoes onto the tray on top of the wax paper . use your hands to mush the potatoes down flat . leave the potatoes as thick as you like your hash browns to be .

cut the mixture into pieces .
using a long knife cut the dough into long strips . turn the strips sideways by pulling on the parchment paper . use the knife to cut the strips into squares .

cut the mixture into pieces .
keep mixture on parchment paper to move easier . cut mixture in two inch long strips then cut again into two by two inch squares . cut squares into two triangles .

cut the mixture into pieces .
mix all of the ingredients together in a large bowl . get out a cutting board , knife , and wax paper . rip a piece of wax paper the size of a cutting board . spread mixture out onto the wax paper so it is flat and is the same height / thickness all over . carefully use the knife to cut the mixture into squares .

add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
take your oil and pour it into the hot pan . use the handle of the pan to move the oil around so it goes to all parts of the pan . then put butter in the pan and move it around so it gives it a better taste . then take your hash browns and put them into the pan on top of the melted butter and oil . make sure to turn them over when one side is finished and cook the other side .

add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
add some oil to your pan . turn on the stove . put the hash browns in the pan . cook the hash browns .

add oil to the pan and fry the hash browns .
pour oil into pan . put hash brown into pan . let hash browns sizzle . flip hash browns .

stir to cook it until it is soft .
use a wooden spoon to stir the ingredients in the pot . cook for about five minutes , just until it is soft .

stir to cook it until it is soft .
stir the vegetables with a spoon and cook everything for about 5 minutes . you 'll know that the vegetables are done cooking when they become soft .

stir to cook it until it is soft .
take a large pot on the stove . add the cooking contents in to the pot . mix the contents with a wooden spoon . cook the contents till they become soft . stir the contents in between .

add beans and italian pasta .
to your boiling ingredients , add your beans and the ditali pasta . any small - sized pasta may be used .

add beans and italian pasta .
add the beans and ditali pasta to the pot . you can use any small pasta will work , but the tubes work best .

add beans and italian pasta .
add the can of beans to the pan . add the italian pasta to the pan .

add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
reduce the heat and add the carrots using your scraper . then you can use a scraper to add the celery , garlic , onions , and celery . now use your measuring spoons to add the oregano . finally , use the measuring spoon to add the red pepper flakes .

add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
after reducing the heat , add all the ingredients you have chopped into small pieces , into the pot . this includes the carrots , celery , onion , garlic . also add your seasonings , the oregano and hot pepper flakes .

add chopped carrot celery oregano and red pepper flakes .
add the carrots into the bowl using the chopper . add celery into the bowl using the chopper . add oregano into the bowl using a spoon . add red pepper flakes into the bowl using a spoon .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
turn the stove on and place the pot on the stove . add the vegetable mixture to the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the mixture . add a pinch of salt to the mixture . take the pepper grinder and add pepper and then stir all together .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
put a little salt into the cooking pot . then add a small amount of pepper to the mixture .

add salt and pepper to the pot .
take a large pot . add the cooking ingredients in the pan . add some salt in to the pot . add some pepper powder in to the pot . mix them well with a spoon .

cook some sliced bacon with oil .
put some oil in a large pot and heat on the stove top . use a spoon to put the chopped bacon in the oil . use a wooden spoon to stir the bacon while cooking .

cook some sliced bacon with oil .
place the bacon into the pan using a spoon . mix the bacon and the oil together using a spoon .

cook some sliced bacon with oil .
pick up the plate of chopped bacon . slide the bacon into the pot with oil in it . stir until bacon is brown .

add spinach to the soup .
wait until pot is boiling . add a few handfuls of the spinach from your bowl to your pot . use your wooden spoon to give it quick stir . cook for about 3 minutes . you want the spinach wilted and bright green .

add spinach to the soup .
grab handfuls of spinach . carefully drop the spinach in the soup .

add spinach to the soup .
take a large pot and place it on the stove . cook the contents of the soup in the pot . take some fresh spinach in a bowl . add some spinach in to the soup . mix the spinach with other contents of the soup .

add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
add broth and tomatoes to the pot . bring the pot to a boil .

add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
open a can of broth and slowly place in a bowl . open a can of diced tomato , which is chopped up tomato , and place that in a bowl . slowly add the broth to the pot . slowly add the tomato to the pot . cook until bubbles come up that is called boiling .

add the stock and tomato and bring it to a boil .
now take your broth to the tomatoes and place them into your pot . now increase the heat of the stove , and bring the mixture to a boil .

add some basil and parsley .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some basil and parsley on the cutting board . cut the basil and parsley in to small pieces . take the cooking pot on the stove . add the basil and parsley in to the pot .

add some basil and parsley .
carefully cut a small handful of basil into long thin strips . chop about the same amount of fresh parsley . add both the basil and parsley to your cooking pot .

add some basil and parsley .
put basil and parsley on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the basil and parsley . add the basil and parsley to the pot .

mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
put mayonnaise in a bowl . next put dijon mustard in the bowl . then put vinegar into the bowl . sprinkle some cayenne pepper , ground pepper and salt . now mix everything in the bowl with a fork or spoon .

mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
take out the ingredients needed . put each ingredient into a big bowl . stir all the ingredients .

mix mayonnaise dijon mustard vinegar cayenne black pepper and salt .
add 3 tablespoons of mayonnaise in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of dijon mustard in to the bowl . add some distilled white vinegar in to the bowl .. . add red pepper and black pepper powder in to the bowl . add salt and mix everything properly .

add sugar and whisk .
add a few tablespoons of sugar . stir with a whisk .

add sugar and whisk .
add 1 or 2 tablespoons of sugar . take the whisk and mix it all together .

add sugar and whisk .
measure out 1 tablespoon of sugar and add it to the dressing . use a kitchen whisk to mix the sugar into the dressing . taste your dressing , if you would like it a little sweeter add 1 more tablespoon of sugar and whisk again .

add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
cut the celery and red and green bell pepper in to small pieces . grate the carrot and cut the onion in to small pieces . add the grated carrot and celery in to the bowl . add the onion and red bell pepper and green bell pepper in to the bowl . mix everything with a spatula .

add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
add small cut pieces of celery to the bowl . add small cut pieces of carrots to the bowl . add small cut pieces of onions to the bowl . add small cut pieces of red bell pepper to the bowl . add small cut pieces of green pepper to the bowl .

add diced celery grated carrot onion red bell pepper and green pepper .
first add some finally diced celery and grated carrots to bowl . then add some finely chopped onion or scallions to the bowl . next add some red pepper to mixture , then add some green poblano and jalapenos . mix the mixture up with a spatula .

mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
with a spatula stir the vegetables into the sauce until they are mixed together completely . put the bowl with the mixture into the refrigerator .

mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
use a spatula to mix dressing into the vegetables . leave the spatula in the bowl . put the bowl in the refrigerator .

mix the ingredients together and refrigerate .
mix all the ingredients together . put into the refrigerator to keep cool while making the macaroni .

cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
get a pot and fill it halfway with water . put pot on stove burner . turn the stove top on high setting . when the water starts to bubble , turn the heat down to halfway . put a pinch of salt in the water and then add the noodles to the pot . start a timer for 7 minutes . drain the noodles and you are done !

cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
take a large pot out and set on stove . add water to pot about 1/2 way full . turn stove on high and cook till boiling , then add a large dash of salt . add pasta and cook until it is tender but not over cooked . use a strainer to drain your pasta once it reaches desired doneness .

cook the elbow macaroni in salted water .
fill a large pot halfway with water . place the pot on the stove . turn the stove on underneath the pot . allow the water to boil . when the water has started boiling add salt to the pot of boiling water . add elbow macaroni to the pot of water and salt . cook until it is tender . stir the pot every two or three minutes . when the macaroni is tender , turn off the stove and drain the water out of the pot .

drain the macaroni .
carefully pour the macaroni and hot water into a strainer in the sink . shake the strainer with your hand to drain any extra water .

drain the macaroni .
when the macaroni is cooked , pour into the colander that is in the sink . drain the water from the macaroni . do not put water onto the macaroni to rinse it . let the macaroni sit in the colander to drain for 5 minutes . every few minutes shake the colander to help drain more water . after the macaroni is drained , pour it into a large mixing bowl .

drain the macaroni .
make sure an adult helps you with this step . pour the pasta into the colander over the sink . do not rinse the pasta !

pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
put cooked macaroni into a bowl . pour the dressing on top of the macaroni in the bowl . stir it all together very well .

pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
add the dressing to the macaroni that is in the bowl . it is ok if it seems like there is too much . do n't worry . it will absorb it all . mix the dressing and the macaroni together . by the time it is ready to eat it will be fully absorbed . now it not the time to taste it .

pour the dressing on the macaroni and mix everything .
pour the dressing to the macaroni . mix the macaroni with the dressing carefully , using a large mixing spoon . do n't worry that it 's too much dressing , the macaroni will soak some of it up . do n't taste it yet !

seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
once it has fully absorbed the dressing , it will be the temperature we want to serve it at . we will then place plastic wrap over top , and place it in the refrigerator for at least four hours .

seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
mix the macaroni salad together . cover with a plastic wrapper . put into fridge for at least 4 hours but 24 hours is best .

seal it with plastic wrapper and refrigerate .
cover your pasta with 2 pieces of plastic wrap . make sure all of the pasta is covered with plastic . place the bowl with pasta in the refrigerator . leave it in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours . if you have time , it would be better to leave the pasta in the refrigerator all night .

add sesame seeds salt pepper lemon juice and garlic to a blender .
put 1 - 2 tablespoons of sesame seeds into a blender . blend them into a paste . you might need to add a little oil . add salt , pepper , lime juice and garlic to the blender .

add sesame seeds salt pepper lemon juice and garlic to a blender .
add sesame seeds to a blender . add salt and pepper also in to the blender . also add lime juice into the blender . add garlic also at last into the blender .

add sesame seeds salt pepper lemon juice and garlic to a blender .
take 2 tablespoons of sesame seeds and make in to a paste . add sesame seeds paste in to the blender . add pepper powder , salt in to the blender . add some garlic in to the blender . now add lemon juice in to the blender .

add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
add a cup of the chickpeas . add a bit of water too .

add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
cook the chickpeas on the stove in boiling water for 5 - 6 minutes or until they feel soft . take them off the stove and turn the stove off . drain the water off of the chickpeas with a strainer . it is a big bowl with holes in it . turn off the stove . and add drained chickpeas to a blender . clean outer shell off of a handful of garlic and add garlic to blender . add a little bit of water .

add 1 cup of chickpeas and some water as well .
add one cup of chickpeas to the food processor with your hand . pour some water over the chickpeas .

blend everything in the blender .
place the chickpeas into a blender . make sure the top is on tightly . blend the mixture in the blender .

blend everything in the blender .
put the beans into a food processor and close the lid . press the button to cut up the beans .

blend everything in the blender .
add all the ingredients into a blender . plug on the blender . turn the knob of the blender to blend everything . and switch the blender off once it becomes paste .

add some olive oil to the mixture .
remove the lid of the food processor . pour 1/4 cup of olive oil into the food processor .

add some olive oil to the mixture .
take off the lid . pour in olive oil . then pour in some water .

add some olive oil to the mixture .
grab your olive oil to add to the mixture . add a small amount , about a tablespoon to the mixture .

blend the mixture .
add all the ingredients to the mixer . place the lid on the mixer . press and hold the on button down .

blend the mixture .
press the button on the side of the electric mixer . hold it down only for a few seconds . check if the mixture is smooth . hold down the button on the side of the mixer again for a few seconds . optional : add a little water to the mixture .

blend the mixture .
put the mixture into the blender . press the button to blend it .

season the chicken with pepper and salt .
first wash the chicken in cold running water . then pat the chicken dry with paper towels . next you want to place the chicken in a bowl . after the chicken is in the bowl you want to season both sides with salt and pepper .

season the chicken with pepper and salt .
wash chicken with water . dry the chicken with paper towels . put the chicken into a bowl . cover the chicken with salt and pepper on both sides to you taste .

season the chicken with pepper and salt .
shake salt evenly over the chicken . shake pepper evenly over the chicken . make sure all the pieces are covered with both .

pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
place the chicken in a bowl and season with spices . pour the buttermilk in the bowl , enough to cover the seasoned chicken . pour the hot sauce into the bowl with the buttermilk and chicken . stir the buttermilk , hot sauce and chicken until it is mixed . place in the fridge and marinate for 3 hours .

pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
hold the buttermilk over the bowl of chicken . slowly pour in the buttermilk so it does n't splash . slowly add the hot sauce .

pour buttermilk and hot sauce on the chicken .
pour the buttermilk over the chicken until the chicken is covered . take hot sauce and squeeze some onto the buttermilk and chicken .

mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
scoop flour into a large container . add salt , pepper and garlic powder . stir and mix it all together with a fork .

mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
take 2 cups of flour into a tray . sprinkle some salt into the flour . add some quantity of garlic powder into the flour . mix everything altogether .

mix flour salt pepper and garlic powder .
pour 3 cups of flower into your bowl . now pour 1 tablespoon of salt on top of the flower . then add another tablespoon of freshly ground pepper into the bowl as well . last , add a tablespoon of garlic powder into the mixing bowl . now , using a spoon or fork stir the mixture together . go slow , so you do n't make a mess , but be sure to mix it very well !

coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
remove chicken from fridge . put one piece of chicken into the bowl with the flour mixture . use tongs to put the flour all over the chicken , getting it completely covered until no buttermilk is left showing . shake off the excess flour by holding the chicken with your to be and gently shaking . set piece aside . repeat with each piece of chicken .

coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
take your pieces of chicken out of the fridge , and drop a piece into your flour . do n't let all the butter milk fall off the chicken though , as this helps your flower mixture stick . after that piece is covered in your mixture , set it to the side . now grab another piece and drop it in the flower . make sure you brush the mixture all over the chicken to get all the edges and sides of the chicken .

coat the chicken with the flour mixture .
take your pieces of chicken out of the fridge and place one into the flour . be careful not to let the buttermilk come off of the chicken . use the tongs to move the chicken around and cover the chicken completely with the flour mix . set that piece to the side and do the same with all the other pieces until they are all covered in the flour . make sure you get plenty of flour mix in all the creases and wet spots on the chicken .

add oil to a wok .
put the wok on the stove and turn on the heat . pour some peanut oil into the pan . be careful to not overfill the pan with oil .

add oil to a wok .
add peanut oil to the wok . let sit until the wok is hot . be careful not to splash it .

add oil to a wok .
take a large pan . place the pan on the stove and heat the pan . take some oil in a can . pour some oil in to the pan . add oil till three fourth of the pan .

drop the chicken into the oil .
take your tongs and pick up your chicken . very carefully drop each piece of chicken into the hot grease .

drop the chicken into the oil .
heat up the grease . using tongs , place the pieces of chicken in very carefully . you can put all the chicken in .

drop the chicken into the oil .
gently grab the chicken with tongs . gently place the breaded chicken into the hot oil . be sure to ease it in so that none of the oil splatters . only place two or three pieces of chicken in the pan at a time .

mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
cut the tuna in to small pieces . take a small bowl and add tuna in to the bowl . take a bowl of fish eggs . add 4 tablespoons of fish eggs in to the bowl . mix them with a spoon .

mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
take the pink colored fish and cut it into dice sized cubes on the cutting board . take the fish and put it into the bowl . take the bowl of orange fish eggs that look like little pellets . add in 3 big spoons of the fish eggs into the bowl with the fish .

mix the tuna pieces and some fish eggs in a bowl .
scrape your chopped tuna off your cutting board into a bowl . just use your hands . now put several scoops of fish eggs on top of the tuna .

cut the roll into small rolls .
use the knife to carefully cut the sushi roll . put the knife into water . slice the sushi into 8 equal sized pieces .

cut the roll into small rolls .
before you cut the sushi dip the knife into water . make sure the tap the knife on it 's handle to make sure the water coats the whole blade . cut the sushi into half . then cut sushi pieces in half again , and once more to make them bite size . then you can place them nicely on a sushi dish or any dish you have .

cut the roll into small rolls .
using a knife cut the roll in half . place your knife into hot water . using your knife cut the roll in half again . once more cut your roll in half again . using your fingers place your sushi onto your plate .

spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
set a seaweed sushi wrapper on top of the cutting board . place cooked rice on top of the wrapper . spread the rice around evenly on the wrapper .

spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
now we want to take a big handful of sushi rice . make sure your hands stay moist as you flatten the rice out across all of the sea weed . try and have rice cover the majority of the seaweed .

spread some cooked rice on seaweed sushi wrapper .
dip your hands in some water . make sure that the seaweed is on the mat . take a big handful of rice and put it on the green seaweed . carefully spread the rice in a thin layer but do n't smush the rice .

chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
use your knife to carefully cut the tuna meat . first cut the tuna meat the long way . then turn the tuna and cut it the other way into small squares .

chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
put a piece of tuna on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the tuna into small pieces .

chop some tuna meat into small pieces .
it is easier to chop tuna when it is frozen and left to sit until it 's partially thawed . find the direction that the tuna meat is facing , and use your knife to cut thin strips , about as wide as your pinkie finger . take your strips of tuna , turn them ninety - degrees and then cut again so that you have small cubes . they should all be pretty close to the same sizes .

roll it up and press firmly .
make sure the seaweed is lined up with the edge of the bamboo sheet . start rolling the seaweed , and make sure you do n't roll up the bamboo . put some water on your finger and swipe it across the seaweed .

roll it up and press firmly .
take the edge of your seaweed . place it int the middle and use the bamboo to tighten the roll making sure the bamboo does n't go into your mixture . roll it nice and tight by pulling it back as you roll . use water and with your finger spread it over the inside of the edge of the seaweed to make sure it stick .

roll it up and press firmly .
use your hands fold the bamboo sheet over . pull it tight and roll the bamboo sheet . if it does n't stick , use a little bit of water to make seal it .

add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
put some hot sauce into the bowl ( be careful not to add to much ) . put mayo into the bowl with the hot sauce . use a spoon to mix it together .

add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
add hot sauce hot to the bowl of mix . add mayo to the bowl . using a spoon mix together all of the ingredients .

add hot sauce and mayo and then mix them together .
squirt in some hot sauce in the bowl . add a squirt of mayo in the bowl too . take a spoon and stir it all up .

add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
take a spoon and scoop the tuna mix on top of the cooked rice . be sure to put the tuna mix on the center of the rice in a line . then add some sesame seeds on top of everything .

add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
using a spoon , take small scoops of tuna and place them 1 scoop at a time in a line in the middle of the rice . next , sprinkle sesame seeds evenly over both the tuna and the rice .

add the tuna mix on top and season with some sesame seeds .
use a spoon to put some tuna on top center of the rice . sprinkle some sesame seems on top of the tuna and rice .

add water and white miso to a blender .
add water to your blender using your measuring cup . now add one tablespoon of the white miso into the blender . you can use your fingers to get all the miso in there .

add water and white miso to a blender .
pour water to the blender . add one tablespoon of white miso to the blender .

add water and white miso to a blender .
take a blender jar . take a measuring cup and take a cup of water . add the cup of water in to the blender jar . add a teaspoon of white miso in to the blender . close the lid and run the blender .

add matini to the blender .
get a small spoon to use . pour the spoon of matini into the blender .

add matini to the blender .
take a blender jar . take matini in a small jar . take a tablespoon of matini from the jar . add the matini in to the blender . place the matini jar down .

add matini to the blender .
you can get tahini in a gallon bucket to save money . put tahini in blender .

add some chopped ginger to it .
add the chopped ginger to the blender .

add some chopped ginger to it .
place a bit of chopped ginger into the blender . let all the chopped ginger fall into the blender . after the ginger falls , take the skin out .

add some chopped ginger to it .
carefully use a knife to chop the ginger . drop the chopped ginger into the blender .

blend everything together and take the mixture out .
close the lid of the blender . hold the lid down and turn the blended on for a couple seconds .

blend everything together and take the mixture out .
use the blender to mix everything together . pour the contents into of the mixer into a bowl .

blend everything together and take the mixture out .
place the top on your blender . press the button to turn it on . allow the ingredients to mix until they are creamy and turn blender off . remove lid . pour mixture carefully into bowl .

add some extra ginger and cilantro .
add some shredded carrot , ginger , and some cilantro . you can also add green onion or cayenne if you 'd like .

add some extra ginger and cilantro .
you first should add in some extra ginger to the mixture if you want it to be a little spicier . now put in your shredded carrot to the mixing bowl . also feel free to add some cilantro or green onion into the bowl also if that is what you like .

add some extra ginger and cilantro .
cut the cilantro in to very small pieces . cut the ginger in to small pieces . take a small bowl . add a handful of cilantro on to the bowl . add some extra ginger in to the bowl .

top with some seaweed flakes .
rip a large piece of seaweed into small pieces over a bowl . you can rip it in half over and over again . spread the small pieces gently over your soup . this will add many vitamins and minerals to your soup .

top with some seaweed flakes .
rip up flakes into small pieces . scatter on top of soup .

top with some seaweed flakes .
rip the seaweed until its in small pieces . sprinkle it onto your soup . it gives it some salt and minerals .

chop up a block of cream cheese .
take the block of cream cheese and cut it into strips using a knife . cut the cream cheese into smaller , bite size pieces using the knife .

chop up a block of cream cheese .
put cream cheese on a cutting board . cut 8 ounces of cream cheese into small cubes .

chop up a block of cream cheese .
take 8 ounces of cream cheese . use a knife and carefully cut the cheese into small pieces .

mix the cheese with pepperoni .
take your bowl filled with cheese . add pepperoni to the bowl . use a stirring spoon to mix the pepperoni and cheese together .

mix the cheese with pepperoni .
mix in mini pepperoni with cream cheese . grab french loaf .

mix the cheese with pepperoni .
get a medium size bowl . cut cheese into small pieces . put the cheese pieces in a bowl . pour mini pepperoni slices into the bowl . use a spatula to mix the pepperoni and cheese together .

cut the top off of a french loaf .
carefully using a knife cut around the edges of the bread . remove the top of the bread .

cut the top off of a french loaf .
get a bread knife and a loaf of french bread . starting at one end of the loaf cut into the top of the bread along the side . cut all the way around the loaf until you 're back where you started . use your fingers to pull the piece you have cut out of the loaf .

cut the top off of a french loaf .
hold the bread carefully with one hand . with your other hand cut out the top and middle of the bread carefully and away from your hand .

put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
use your hands and slowly sprinkle the cheese into the opening of the loaf . do it slowly and fill each end .

put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
add mozzarella cheese to the top of the loaf . spread the cheese evenly across the top .

put the cream cheese and pepperonis into the loaf .
line baking pan with parchment paper . scoop out the center of the bread and place bread in lined baking pan . top the bread with shredded mozzarella cheese .

add mozzarella cheese to the top .
put shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the bread . put it evenly all over the top .

add mozzarella cheese to the top .
pick up your bowl of mozzarella cheese . using your fingers spread the cheese over the top . make sure to spread it even over the top .

add mozzarella cheese to the top .
sprinkle a good amount of mozzarella cheese over the top of each of your pizza sandwiches . put the top piece of the bread over the mozzarella cheese .

replace the top of the french loaf .
put the top piece of your bread on top of the cheese that you just sprinkled . sprinkle even more cheese over the top of the bread .

replace the top of the french loaf .
take the bread that was cut off before . place it back on top of the french loaf . add cheese to the top of the bread .

replace the top of the french loaf .
put the part of the bread you cut out earlier back on top of the cheese to cover the inside . then sprinkle some more cheese on top of the cover .

add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
use a cheese grater to grind a fresh piece of mozzarella cheese into small pieces over a bowl . you may also use mozzarella cheese that is already grated . after the bread is on the baking tray , sprinkle the cheese on top of the closed loaf of bread .

add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
take a small handful of shredded mozzarella . add all along the top of the bread .

add more mozzarella to the top of the loaf .
take two small loaf of bread . take a small quantity of mozzarella cheese . add more quantity of mozzarella on top of the loaf of bread .

bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
turn the over to 350 degrees . wait til the oven beeps . put in the food and let it bake for 20 minutes .

bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
line pan with parchment paper , top bread with cheese . put in 350 degree oven . bake for 20 minutes .

bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes .
set oven temp for 350 . wait for oven to preheat . place what your baking into oven and close door . set timer for 20 minutes . take out of oven once the timer goes off .

mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
put egg , cornmeal , flour , milk , and salt and pepper into a bowl . use a spoon to mix everything together .

mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
