crack your eggs into the bowl , and throw away the shells . add your cornmeal to the bowl with the eggs in it . add in your flour , salt and pepper . add the milk to the bowl . mix the ingredients in your bowl with a mixer . be careful not to turn it on a high speed at first .

mix egg cornmeal flour salt pepper and milk .
in a bowl mix together 1/2 cup of cornmeal , 1/2 cup of all purpose flower , 1 teaspoon of salt , and 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper . use a hand mixer to carefully mix it all together .

mix melted butter with the batter .
heat the pan on a stove . add about 2 tablespoons of salted butter in to the pan . melt the butter in the pan . take the batter in a mixing bowl and add the melted butter . mix the butter with the batter .

mix melted butter with the batter .
put pan on the stove . turn on medium heat . put butter in pan . stir until melted . pour into the batter . stir with spoon .

mix melted butter with the batter .
put two tablespoons of salted butter in a saucepan . heat the saucepan on low on the stove to melt the butter . once the butter is melted , pour the butter into the bowl with the batter . stir the batter and the melted butter together .

coat the sausage with the batter .
dip the sausage pieces in the batter . take it out .

coat the sausage with the batter .
use tongs to pick up each little sausage . put the sausage into the batter and wiggle it around to get it totally covered .

coat the sausage with the batter .
get your tongs . tongs look like a big pincher . pick up a sausage with your tongs . dip the sausage in the batter . get batter all over the sausage . do this with every sausage .

place the corn dogs in the oil .
pick up a corn dog with the tongs . slowly drop a corn dog into the oil . the corn dog will float to the top . add more corn dogs into the oil .

place the corn dogs in the oil .
get a steel tongue . using the tongue , grab the corn dogs and place it in the frying pan with the oil . put them all together so that they are all done at the same time . cook until hey are golden brown .

place the corn dogs in the oil .
use the tongs to pick up the corn dog . drop the corn dog into the oil .

cook the corn dogs until brown .
cook the corn dogs in the oil until they turn brown . " be really careful - hot oil can spit " " little drops out which can burn ! " " . " take the corn dogs out and put them on paper towels to drain some of the oil .

cook the corn dogs until brown .
in hot boiling oil fry corn dogs . cook till browned .

cook the corn dogs until brown .
use a slotted spoon to slowly pick up the corn dogs . check the corn dogs to see what color they are . when the corn dogs are medium brown , they are ready . removed them with the slotted spoon .

place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
use a spatula , which is usually much bigger than a normal spoon , to get the stuff out of mixing bowl into the other bowl . and then stir .

place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
use a rubber spatula to pour the vegetables into a bowl . try to get as much as you can by scraping the sides clear of the vegetables .

place the blended vegetables in a bowl .
take your vegetables and add them to your bowl . mix them together . use your spatula .

place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
put a block of tofu into the bowl . use a masher to mash the tofu into the mixture .

place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
add one square of tofu . smash the tofu into the other ingredients .

place a block of tofu in the bowl and mash .
get one block of firm ( hard , not too squishy ) tofu . put it in the bowl . get a potato masher and use it to smash up the tofu in the bowl .

add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
add salt , black pepper , garlic , sesame oil , and ginger to the bowl . mix everything up with a spoon .

add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
first find the salt and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next find the black pepper container and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next find the container with garlic and add about 1 shake to the bowl . next take a table spoon and scoop 1 tablespoon full into the bowl . lastly , take that same spoon and scoop 1 tablespoon full of ginger into the bowl and stir for about 2 minutes allowing the flavors to be mix well together in the bowl .

add salt black pepper garlic sesame oil and ginger to the bowl and mix .
add salt to the mixture . add black pepper to the mixture . add sesame oil to the mixture . add ginger garlic to the bowl to get the different taste . mix all the ingredients together to blend it well .

place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
place the filling into the middle of the wanton . fold wanton in half . put egg on the ends and roll it to seal it shut .

place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
put the filling in the middle of the square wonton . fold the square into a triangle so the wonton is covering the filling . paint the edges with some egg .

place the filling in the middle of the wonton wrapper and fold shut with egg .
add some of the filling into the middle of the wonton . fold it in half and slowly add egg to the outside edges of the wonton . then gently press the wonton in half and set it to the side .

add soy sauce and sesame oil to a pot of boiling water and add the wontons .
pour soy sauce into the boiling water . pour sesame oil into the boiling water . once it looks like it boiling , add the wontons one at a time . they 'll float but eventually they 'll start to sink .

add soy sauce and sesame oil to a pot of boiling water and add the wontons .
boil a pot of water . when the water is boiling put in soy sauce . next add your sesame oil . last add the wantons .

add soy sauce and sesame oil to a pot of boiling water and add the wontons .
wait for the water to boil . add soy sauce and sesame oil to the pot . put wontons in the pot .

add wheat chips to the mixture .
if you have store - bought pita chips , put them into the bowl . if you do not have store bought pita chips , simply preheat your oven and cut 3 to 5 pitas into squares . place the pita chips on a baking sheet and bake them until they are golden brown . be careful to take them out of the oven before the corners turn dark brown . allow your pita chips to cool , then place them into the bowl . now you are ready for the next ingredient .

add wheat chips to the mixture .
use whole wheat pita chips that have been toasted in the oven . toss the chips into the mixture .

add wheat chips to the mixture .
take some pita chips . throw in the pita chips into the mix .

toss everything well and serve .
take a big bowl . add all the vegetables into the bowl . mix all the ingredients together and toss it well . serve the tossed salad .

toss everything well and serve .
using your hands mix everything together . place the mixture onto a plate using your hands .

toss everything well and serve .
use your hands to mix the salad and the dressing in the bowl . put the salad on serving plate to serve .

chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
take the mint and carefully use your knife and chop it . chop it a few times going back and forth . add the mint leaves to your mixture .

chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
put the parsley and mint on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to chop the herbs into small pieces . put the chopped herbs into the bowl .

chop some fresh mint leaves and add it to the mixture .
take some fresh mint and parsley leaves and place them on the cutting board . chop the herbs coarsely , turning them to get them thoroughly chopped . perform the sundial technique of chopping , which is : . holding the point of the knife in one position with one hand , allow the handle of the knife to rotate in a semi - circle , cutting all the herbs in smaller pieces as it moves . move the knife back and forth until the herbs are the size you want .

add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some fresh parsley on the cutting board . cut the parsley in to small pieces . now add the parsley in to the mixture . mix them with the spoon .

add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
grab some cut up parsley with your hands . sprinkle it in the mix .

add chopped parsley to the mixture too .
put a half of a cup of finely chopped parsley in bowl . to the same bowl add one quarter cup of finely chopped mint ( no stems ) .

mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
take a small mixing bowl and then measure and pour a half a cup of lemon juice in it . then measure and pour a quarter of a cup of olive oil into the bowl . add three cloves of fresh garlic that 's already been chopped into the bowl . add a teaspoon of salt and a pinch of pepper to the bowl . add half of a teaspoon of fresh ground sumac to the bowl , then stir it with a whisk .

mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
add 1/2 cup of lemon juice into a bowl . put in 1/4 cup of olive oil . add 3 chopped garlic cloves . then put in 1 teaspoon of salt and some pepper . finally add some sumac and use a spoon to mix them together .

mix lemon juice olive oil garlic salt pepper and sumac .
put the lemon juice in a bowl . put the olive oil in the bowl . put the garlic salt in a bowl . put the pepper in the bowl . put the sumac in the bowl .

pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
you will need to save whatever dressing is left . use the left over dressing by adding it to the salad slowly .

pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
place the pita chips into the bowl . take the dressing and pour the rest of it into the mix in the bowl .

pour the remaining of the dressing to the mixture .
take the dressing in a bowl . take the mixing bowl . pour the dressing in to the mixing bowl . mix the contents of the bowl . add remaining dressing in to the bowl .

pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
with your liquid in a small bowl , pour half of it over the salad . mix it up with your bare hands ( make sure your hands are washed ) .

pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
pick up the little bowl . pour half of the liquid into the salad . wash your hands . use your two hands to mix the salad .

pour half of the liquid to the mixed vegetable .
pour half of the liquid into the mixed vegetables . play with the vegetables with your hands . it 's fun to play with your food ! massage it without breaking any the vegetables . note the smell . it 's great - is n't it ? .

mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
put in one cucumber that has been diced and put it in a bowl . add 1 diced yellow pepper . put in 2 chopped tomatoes . add 4 sliced green onions . finally put in two cups of lettuce .

mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
place chopped cucumber , yellow pepper , tomatoes and green onions in bowl . next add the herbs ( parsley and mint ) to the bowl .

mix diced cucumber yellow pepper chopped tomato green onion and lettuce .
take a diced cucumber and place it in your bowl . next add a diced pepper of whatever color you like . add the chopped tomatoes ( whatever color you like ) , and the green or red onions . add the chopped herbs . you always have to use mint to make this type of salad , but you can use other herbs as well .

chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
use the knife to carefully cut the tofu . start by cutting the tofu into long section across . then cut the opposite way so the tofu is in small squares .

chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
place tofu onto cutting board . cut into small little squares .

chop fresh tofu into small cubes .
you will need to open a pack of fresh tofu . it can either be soft or firm tofu . either works fine . you will need to gently press the water out of the block of tofu by placing a rag over the tofu and putting a plate with something slightly heavy on it to push out the moisture . take a knife and slowly dice the tofu into very small cubes . if you do not wish to use tofu you can substitute it with vegetables , sea food or meat .

boil some water and add bonito flakes .
put water into a pan and bring it to a boil . pour in bonito flakes into the boiling water .

boil some water and add bonito flakes .
fill a pot with water and heat it up . when it 's boiling it will be bubbling up fast . throw in the bonito flakes .

boil some water and add bonito flakes .
take some water in a saucepan . boil the water for 10 minutes . add some quantity of bonito flakes . wait until the flakes gets cooked .

season with chopped green onions .
add the green onions that have been chopped into small pieces . remove the pan from the heat .

season with chopped green onions .
pour green onions into the pan . take the pan off the heat .

season with chopped green onions .
take the cooking pot on the stove . cook the soup in the pot . cut some green onions in to small pieces . add the green onions in to the pot . mix them properly with the spoon .

remove the bonito flakes .
boil the bonito flakes in the water . take another big sized pot . place the strainer on top of pot . now pour the flakes in to the pot through the strainer . separate the flakes from the water .

remove the bonito flakes .
using a colander pour the juices from the bonito flakes into the pan . make sure all of the access water / juices are in the pan .

remove the bonito flakes .
place a strainer over an empty pot . take the smaller pot full of bonito flakes and water and pour it into the strainer .

add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
add tofu chunks to water over medium high heat . do not boil . dissolve in miso paste .

add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
pour the tofu into the hot water . use a strainer to dissolve the miso paste into the pot .

add the tofu chunks and dissolve miso paste in the soup .
add small square tofu pieces to water . heat the pot with water and tofu until it gets warm . add miso paste to a strainer . with chopsticks mix the paste until it dissolves in the pot . be careful the water might be hot ! ! !

add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
cook the blond roux in a pan . take some tomato puree in a bowl . add the tomato puree in to the blonde roux . take a mixing spatula . mix the contents in the pan .

add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
add tomato puree . with a spoon mix the mixture together .

add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously .
pour the strained tomato puree to the mixture . add little by little . stir continuously as you add the puree with a spatula .

add flour to the butter in a pan .
when the butter in the pan is hot and bubbly . get a teaspoon measuring spoon . measure about 1 teaspoon of flour . add the flour to the butter and stir the pan with a heatproof spatula .

add flour to the butter in a pan .
we will be making blond roux . roux is melted butter and flour mixed together and is used for thickening things like soup , stew or gravy . blond roux is golden or light brown in color . once the butter is melted , scatter flour around the pan and mix it with the butter right away .

add flour to the butter in a pan .
take a pan on the stove . add some butter in the pan . melt the butter in the pan . add flour to the butter in pan . mix the flour and butter in the pan .

heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions .
put pan on the stove , turn stove on , put butter into the pan . put cumin seeds into pan with butter , use a spatula to stir cumin seeds . put chopped garlic into pan , stir with a spatula . put chopped onions into pan , stir with a spatula .

heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions .
heat butter in a pan . put in cumin seeds . also add chopped garlic . put in chopped onions .

heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions .
put some butter in a frying pan and heat it . add some cumin seeds . add chopped garlic . add a bit of chopped onions . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together as it cooks .

add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
pour in chopped celery into the pan . use a spatula to mix in the ingredients while it cooks .

add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
hold the vegetables over the pan . carefully pour in the cut up celery chopped bell pepper mix into the pan .

add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan .
take a pot on the stove . cut the celery in to small pieces . add the celery in to the pan . cut the bell pepper in to small pieces and add it to the pan . mix the contents in the pan .

blend the mixture using a blender .
carefully hold the pan over the blender . slowly pour the pan into the blender . close the blender top and press blend .

blend the mixture using a blender .
use a mitt or cloth to hold the hot pot to pout it into your blender . take care and pour slowly and carefully as not to burn yourself . after it 's in the blender you can go ahead and blend it for a few seconds until it 's completely blended .

blend the mixture using a blender .
pour the mixture into a blender . turn the blender on and blend until it is mixed together .

cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
add one tablespoon of all - purpose flour to the butter in the pan . cook flour and butter in a pan on low heat until light brown .

cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
heat up pan and melt butter . put stove on low heat . add one tablespoon of all - purpose flour . use a spatula to mix the butter and flour .

cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color .
take a pan on the stove . add the mixture in the pan . take the wooden spatula . mix the mixture in the pan . cook the mixture till it turns light brown .

add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
pour in chopped tomatoes to the pan . add some salt . put in a basil leaf . add some pepper . use a spatula to stir the mixture .

add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
as you notice the pan sizzling , add your cut up tomatoes to the pan and allow them to cook . add a pinch of salt , dried basil leaves , and pepper to the pan as it cooks . use your spatula to mix the vegetables .

add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture .
cut vegetables into small pieces with a knife . then chop tomatoes into small chunks with a knife . add to a skillet with broth . add heat and salt and pepper . then add basil and saute for a bit .

add some sugar and cream .
use a spoon to add some sugar to the soup and stir . add cream to the soup and stir .

add some sugar and cream .
use a small spoon to scoop . scoop some sugar into the pot . slowly pour in the cream into the pot .

add some sugar and cream .
add a tablespoon of sugar to the pan . pour cream into the pan .

add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
pour chopped onion and ginger into the pan . use the spatula to stir the ingredients together evenly .

add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
put the onions and ginger in the hot pan . stir the onions and ginger while cooking .

add some chopped onion and ginger while stirring .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut the onions and gingers in to small pieces . add the onions and ginger in to the pan . stir the contents of the pan .

remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
now using a glove , remove the lid and add in a bottle of water . you may not need the entire bottle . then take your spatula or spoon and start stirring the entire mixture .

remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
take the lid off of the pan . open the bottle of water and pour water into the pan . use a spoon to stir the food in the pan while cooking .

remove the lid add some extra water and stir .
cook the food in the pressure cooker . remove the lid of the pressure cooker . add some water in the cooker . mix the water with the food . cook the food .

add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
hold the cut up tomatoes over the pan . use a spatula to push the tomatoes off the dish and into the pan . mix everything with the spatula .

add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
now we want to use our spatula slide the diced tomatoes into our pan . slowly add them in and then cover the pan with the lid . after a few minutes , uncover the pan and begin mixing your dish together .

add some chopped tomatoes and mix it .
add chopped onions to the pan . mix up the food with a spoon .

add some water and cover with a lid .
add some water to the pot . stir in the water with a spatula . cover the pot with a lid .

add some water and cover with a lid .
pour water into the pan . get a lid that fits tight and cover the pan .

add some water and cover with a lid .
add about 1/2 a cup of water to the mixture in the pan . stir everything together with your spatula . let this cook for about a minute and then put the lid on top of the pan .

add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
take a pan and cook the mixture in the pan . cut the chicken in to small pieces . add the chicken in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan . coat the chicken with the mixture .

add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
throw in the cut up some chopped chicken breast in the pan . use a spatula to mix the chicken in with the mixture in the pan .

add some chopped chicken breast and coat it with the mixture .
pour the chopped chicken breast into the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the chicken in . evenly mix everything in the pan as it cooks .

season the dish with some chopped green onion .
wait until the chicken is cooked and becomes tender . cut the cleaned green onions into small pieces . add the cut green onions into the dish and mix well .

season the dish with some chopped green onion .
add finely chopped green onion to the sizzling mixture . stir the onion throughout .

season the dish with some chopped green onion .
take a pan on the stove . cook the dish in the pan . take some green onions on the cutting board . cut the green onions in to small pieces . add the green onions in to the pan .

heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
heat the oil in a pan . add the spices to the pan and stir with a spatula or spoon .

heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
add oil to a pan . turn the heat up on the stove . add the spices in the pan and oil . stir everything with a spatula .

heat some oil add some combined spice and stir .
heat oil in a pan on the stove top . add the spices to the hot oil . use a wooden spatula to stir the spices in the oil .

add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
take 2 table spoons of cumin powder and red chili powder in a small bowl . add the cumin powder and chili powder in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan . add little garlic powder in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan with a wooden spoon .

add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
pour the plate of spices into the hot pan . use a wooden spatula to mix the spices in the pan .

add cumin powder red chili powder and garlic powder and mix it well .
add cumin powder to the pan . put in some red chili powder . add some garlic powder . use a stirring spoon to mix it together in the pan .

combine the flour butter and water .
pour the flour into the bowl . add butter to the mixture . use hands to mix the ingredients together . add water to the bowl .

combine the flour butter and water .
take a large bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . add some butter in to the bowl . add some water in to the bowl . mix everything properly in to a dough .

combine the flour butter and water .
place flour in a sifter and shake over a bowl . add butter to flour in large bowl . mix well with hands . pour water into flour and butter mixture a little bit at a time , while you continue to mix with your hands . flour , butter and water mixture should be a ball of dough when enough water has been added .

place the filling and spinach on the dough .
use a spoon to scoop up some filling . put the filling on the dough . pinch some spinach and put some on the dough .

place the filling and spinach on the dough .
use a fork and put the filling onto the dough . take a spinach leaf and set it on top of the filling . press the spinach down into the filling .

place the filling and spinach on the dough .
use a spoon to put the filling in the center of the dough . put a spinach leaf on top of the filling .

cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
get a cup to use . place the cup upside down on the dough . get a knife and cut a circle by tracing it around the cup . repeat the circle cutting step .

cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
put some flour on the counter top and spread it out . use a rolling pin to roll out the dough . use a glass and knife to cut out circles of dough .

cut out circles from the sheet of dough .
" put some flour on a flat surface and roll out your dough . after rolling out the dough , find a 3 diameter cookie cutter or drinking glass . " " . " place the cutter or glass on the edge of the dough and cut around it with a knife . lift the circle off the surface .

roll the ball of dough out .
put the ball of dough on a floured surface . use the rolling pin to roll the dough out . roll the dough to one - eighth of an inch in thickness and 10 to 11 inches wide .

roll the ball of dough out .
place the ball of dough on to a flat surface . using a rolling pin , press it down on the dough and begin rolling back and forth . continue to flatten the dough until it is very thin , about 1/8 inch , and about 10 to 11 inches wide .

roll the ball of dough out .
add some flour on the board . take a ball of dough on the board . take a rolling pin . roll the dough in to thin round . the dough roll should be uniform .

divide the dough into smaller balls .
divide the dough in half first using your hands . now take one half of the dough and divide it into three equal parts . add flour to your working surface . place one of the small balls of dough to your surface .

divide the dough into smaller balls .
after the dough has been kneaded enough tear it into two pieces . take each piece and make them into smaller balls of dough .

divide the dough into smaller balls .
hold the block of dough . tear the dough in the middle . roll the pieces into smaller balls .

knead the dough until soft .
place the dough on a counter surface on top of flour . use hands to knead the dough until it becomes soft .

knead the dough until soft .
put some flour on the counter top and spread it out . place the dough on top of the flour . put some flour on your hands . knead the dough buy pushing and folding with your hands .

knead the dough until soft .
dust the surface with the flour . take the ball of dough on to the surface . knead the dough with the hands . mix the dough and the flour . knead until the dough becomes soft .

boil the potatoes in water .
put water and potatoes in a pot . place the pot on the stove and turn on the heat . bring the water to a boil and continue cooking .

boil the potatoes in water .
put water into a medium pot and add the 1-inch square , chopped potatoes . turn the heat onto 8 ( near the highest setting ) . boil the potatoes for about 20 minutes .

boil the potatoes in water .
put the cut up potatoes into a pot that is big enough to hold the potatoes and water . add enough water to cover the potatoes by about three finger widths . put the pot onto the stove and turn the burner onto a medium - high setting . allow the water and potatoes to boil until the potatoes become soft .

layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
use a scoop or ladle to scoop sauce into the bottom of the pan . lay the pierogies on the sauce . put more sauce on top of the pierogies .

layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
place a layer of marinara sauce on the bottom of the dish . add in a layer of the pierogies on top of the sauce . add another layer of marinara , to cover the first level of pierogies . put sauce on top of the second layer of pierogies so they are covered .

layer marinara sauce and pierogies .
heat oven to proper temperature . layer marinara sauce and meat . cover meat with marinara . cook until internal temperature is 160 inside .

boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
take a pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . boil the water in the pot . add the pierogies in to the pot . boil the pierogies in the water .

boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
set the pierogies in a pot of water . stir the pierogies in the hot water . when they begin to float , they are finished .

boil the pierogies in a pot of water .
get pot . fill with water . bring water in pot to a boil . place pierogies in water . wait for them to float .

fold the dough over and press the edges together .
using your hands fold to dough over . with a fork press down the edges .

fold the dough over and press the edges together .
fold the dough over . press the edges together all around . using a fork , press the tines along the edges around the half - circle , making fork prints all along the dough , to help keep it closed .

fold the dough over and press the edges together .
make a dough . tear the one hand size of dough from the dough . put the ingredients in the dough . wrap the ingredients with the dough . use the fork to finish the wrapped dough .

mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
get a fork or other mashing tool . mash the potatoes until most of the lumps are gone . be sure to mix in the cheese and butter while you are mashing ,

mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
put the cooked potatoes , butter , and cheese together in a bowl . get a fork and use the underside to smash the food in the bowl . keep smashing until the potatoes , butter , and cheese have no more lumps . mix the mashed potatoes so that the butter and cheese is spread all through the potatoes . eat the potatoes !

mash the potatoes with butter and cheese .
put butter and cheese on the potatoes in the bowl . use a fork to squish everything together until it looks creamy .

cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
cut the fish in a slant . try to cut into skinny pieces .

cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
do n't use the first piece due to it will be oddly shaped and not uniform to the other slices . be careful not the cut yourself and be sure to use a sharp knife to properly cut the meat . slice the fish thinly at a 45 degree angle .

cut the fish at an angle in thin slices .
put fish on a cutting board . hold knife on an angle and cut fish in thin slices .

cut the salmon into thin slices .
we will cut the salmon at a diagonal angle . slices should be cut thin .

cut the salmon into thin slices .
using a sharp knife and being very careful , cut the salmon into thin slices . if you 're nervous about cutting yourself ask an adult to help . if you cut it at an angle you 'll have nice wide pieces !

cut the salmon into thin slices .
put salmon on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut very thin slices of fish .

form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
you want to form the sticky sushi rice into a small football shape . do not crush the rice . then you will place the sliced salmon over the sushi rice that was molded .

form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
do n't break the rice , and lay fish over it . form it , nicely . do n't get it too wet . be gentle . do n't let rice , stick to hands .

form the rice into a ball and drape the fish over it .
get your hand a little wet with water . next , take a small amount of rice and form it into a small log . then put the fish on top of the little log .

take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
on your cutting board you should have your sliced tuna and bowl of cooked and cooled sushi rice . with your right hand , take enough rice from the bowl to fit in the palm of your hand . roll the rice into a ball . with your left hand , pick up a tuna slice and place it over the rice ball . shape the tuna around the rice ball and place on a plate .

take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
take the sticky sushi rice in your hand . form it into a ball by using your hand to squeeze it together . take a slice of tuna and place it over the top of the ball of rice . push it into the rice so it sticks and forms a nice cover to the rice .

take sushi rice form a little ball and drape it with tuna slice .
shape the sushi rice in to a little ball . take a tuna slice . now place the sushi rice in to the tuna . close the tuna slice around the sushi rice . place it on the plate .

remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
now we want to remove our foie gras from the oven . be careful , as the oven is quite hot . remember the pan is heavy and you want to use oven mitts .

remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
use oven mitts to remove the pan carefully from the oven . shut the oven door and use the oven mitts to remove the lid . check the foie gras to see how it looks .

remove the cooked foie gras from the oven .
put oven mitts on hand . open the oven door . carefully pull the baking dish out . place on counter . open the lid of the dish .

sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
take the marinade powder and carefully pour the pan onto a plate . be careful to spread the powder evenly on the plate so it gets to all parts of it .

sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
hold the powder over the plate . slowly shake the powder onto the plate while moving back so it spreads evenly .

sprinkle the marinade powder on a plate .
sprinkle the 21 grams of salt , pepper and the other seasoning on a plate evenly . this will be used to marinate the meat .

cut the foie gras lobes .
using a knife , cute the two lobes apart at the middle . using your fingers , pull out any of the red pieces . if you are having trouble , try using a knife to help you pull the pieces out .

cut the foie gras lobes .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the foie gras lobes on the cutting board . cut the foie gras lobes in to halves . open the lobes and remove the veins . cut it in to small pieces .

cut the foie gras lobes .
using a long fillet knife cut along the midline . expose veins in each lobe . remove one by one .

pour some warm water in a baking tray .
take a baking tray . boil some water till they become warm . take the warm water in a jar . add the warm water in the baking tray . fill up to half of baking tray .

pour some warm water in a baking tray .
fill a container with warm water . carefully pour the water in the baking tray .

pour some warm water in a baking tray .
there are bubbles in the bowl . warm the water in a plastic pitcher . pour warm water into the bowl .

cook in a bain marie .
take your oven mitts and slide out your hot water bowl . place your bain marie on top of the hot water . with your oven mitts slide it back into the oven .

cook in a bain marie .
get a cookie sheet and a large oven proof bowl . fill the bowl about half way with hot water . open the oven door and move the oven rack to the lowest place it can go . place the cookie sheet on the oven rack . now put the bowl of hot water on the cookie sheet . place the covered casserole dish into the hot water . the hot water needs to be have way up the side of the covered casserole dish . close the oven and cook it for 1 1/2 hours .

cook in a bain marie .
fill a glass cooking dish half full with water . place it in the oven . heat the water up . place the pot in the water , with the water half way up the pot . cook for an hour and a half .

wipe the foie gras .
take a paper towel . wipe all the red off the foil gras with the towel . make sure it is clean .

wipe the foie gras .
take a paper towel and wipe the foie gras . clean it and get all the red of it .

wipe the foie gras .
use a paper towel . gently blot all the red of the foie gras .

place the tray in the oven .
take a baking tray . add some boiling water in to the tray . heat the oven . take the tray and place it in the oven . close the oven door .

place the tray in the oven .
pick the tray up off the table . put it back down close to the oven . open the oven door . carefully set the tray onto the pan in the oven . close the oven door .

place the tray in the oven .
carefully lift up the tray being careful not to spill . open the over door . place the tray into the oven .

dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
take the powder in the plate . take the foie gras and dip it in powder . take the deep pan . place the foie gras in the pan . repeat the same with other piece of foie gras .

dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
put the seasoning on a plate . dip the foie gras into the seasoning on the plate and season well . once the foie gras is seasoned put into a pot .

dip the foie gras in the powder and place them in a deep pan .
place seasonings on plate . roll meat in seasonings until covered evenly . put meat into glass bowl .

mix sea salt pepper and spices .
get a shallow pan . in the pan put the sea salt , pepper and the 4-spice powder ( quatre spice ) . mix the spices together .

mix sea salt pepper and spices .
put all the spices on a pan or dish . mix them all together .

mix sea salt pepper and spices .
take sea salt and pour it on the pan . add salt and pepper . mix the spices together on the pan .

drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
fill a large metal spoon with cognac and pour around the edges of the foie gras in the pot . fill the large spoon again with cognac and drizzle it on top of the foie gras . allow the foie gras to marinate .

drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
pour 2 tablespoons of cognac . add the cognac across the top of the foie gras .

drizzle cognac on the marinated foie gras .
get a spoon and poor the cognac into the spoon slowly . slowly pour out the cognac in circles on the foie gras .

place basil leaves in the soup .
pull a few basil leaves off the stem . tear the leaves into several pieces each and drop them into the soup .

place basil leaves in the soup .
take a pot on the stove . cook some soup in the pot . take some basil leaves . add some basil leaves in to the soup . mix the contents of the pot .

place basil leaves in the soup .
tear up the basil leaves into small pieces . put the basil leaves into the soup .

pour the tomato puree into the pot .
pour the tomato pure or tomato paste into the heated broth . stir to combine with a wooden spoon .

pour the tomato puree into the pot .
add in the tomato puree to the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix it in to the pot .

pour the tomato puree into the pot .
pour the tomato puree into the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the puree into the broth .

add the garlic and beans to the pot .
add two whole cloves of garlic to the pot and stir with a wooden spoon . then add the beans to the pot and toss with a wooden spoon .

add the garlic and beans to the pot .
put the garlic into the pot and stir it in . pour in the beans to the bot . use the stirring spoon to continue to stir everything together .

add the garlic and beans to the pot .
pick up the garlic and beans with your hands . drop them in the pot .

pour water into the pot .
hold the water over the pot . carefully pour the cup of water in the pot .

pour water into the pot .
add some water into the pot . continue to cook the mixture on the stove top stirring with a spoon .

pour water into the pot .
add water slowly to the pot about two thirds of a pot . make sure to add slowly .

cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
pour the celery into a pot with oil . add the onions to the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together as it cooks .

cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
add 3 tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil to a hot pan . then add your cut up onions and celery . let it it saute for a few minutes , you do n't want them caramelized just cook till tender .

cook the celery and onions in a pot with oil .
put the celery and onions in a pot . put oil in the pot . stir with a spoon .

add the pasta to the pot .
slowly add the pasta to the boiling pot so no water splashes out . use hand to guide the pasta into the bowl .

add the pasta to the pot .
hold the pasta over the pot . use you hand and scoop the pasta down so it falls in the pot .

add the pasta to the pot .
now we can add in the short pasta . just slowly pour it into the pan , making sure not to spill it .

add black pepper and salt to the soup .
add black pepper to the pan . add salt to the pan . with a wooden spoon mix the mixture .

add black pepper and salt to the soup .
add black pepper into the pot . stir the pepper into the soup . add some salt and mix .

add black pepper and salt to the soup .
turn off the heat under the soup . take a pepper grinder and turn it 3 or 4 times to add pepper . add salt ( not too much and not too little ) . mix the soup with the salt and pepper using a wooden spoon .

add carrots radishes sugar salt to a vinegar to a bowl .
get out a big glass bowl . put the carrots , radishes , sugar , salt and vinegar in the bowl .

add carrots radishes sugar salt to a vinegar to a bowl .
make sure you have all of your ingredients measured ahead of time . combine carrots , radishes , sugar , salt , and vinegar to your main mixing bowl .

add carrots radishes sugar salt to a vinegar to a bowl .
add carrots to the bowl . add radishes to the bowl . add sugar to the bowl . add salt to the bowl . add vinegar to the bowl .

mix fish sauce oil and soy sauce in a bowl .
get a bowl . put some fish sauce in the bowl . put some oil in the bowl . put some soy sauce . mix all these together .

mix fish sauce oil and soy sauce in a bowl .
take a small clean bowl . add one tablespoon of fish sauce in to the bowl . add oil in to the bowl . add one table spoon of soy sauce in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

mix fish sauce oil and soy sauce in a bowl .
add the fish sauce into bowl . add oil into the bowl . also add soy sauce in to the bowl . mix together all the ingredients .

pour the sauce over the bread .
cut the bread loaf in half first . next using a spoon , spoon the dressing and put on the bread .

pour the sauce over the bread .
pick up the sauce with a spoon . pour the sauce on the bread .

pour the sauce over the bread .
cut the bread in to two halves . place the bread on a cutting board . take the sauce in a small bowl . add the sauce with a spoon on the bread . place the sauce bowl aside .

spread mayonnaise on the bread .
take a butter knife and put it in the mayonnaise . put the mayonnaise on the bread from the knife .

spread mayonnaise on the bread .
use a butter knife to scoop out a blob of mayonnaise . put this blob on the inside one of the bread slices ( the soft side ) . now use the knife to spread the mayo in an even layer on the bread .

spread mayonnaise on the bread .
take your knife and dip it into the bowl of mayonnaise . slide the knife over the whole piece of bread .

place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
take a bread on a board . keep 2 - 3 leaves of lettuce on bread . place onion cut in to rounds on top of lettuce . add chicken on to top of onion . place jalapenos and basil on the bread .

place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
spread three big slices of lettuce on the bread , make sure to cover the bread . lay three circle slices of onions on top of the lettuce right next to each other . lay the chicken piece on top of the onions and spread it out a little bit . put six slices of dark green spicy jalapenos spread out on top of the chicken . pick up a little bit of the little basil leafs and sprinkle them across the jalapenos .

place lettuce onions chicken jalapenos basil on top of the bread .
take the green lettuce and place them nicely on the bread . grab a piece of onion and push the little ones out till you have two onion rings . place the onions on top of lettuce . next take the sliced chicken and place it on top of onions . put a couple jalapenos on top of chicken .

add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
take a large glass bowl . cut vegetables like carrot and lettuce in to small pieces . mix the vegetables with a tongs . take the vegetable mixture . add the mixture on top of sandwich .

add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
cut carrot into thin slices . cut lettuce into small pieces . cut onion into round pieces . add all the cut vegetable mixture on top of the mixture . the sandwich is ready to eat .

add vegetable mixture on top of the sandwich .
scoop the vegetables onto the sandwich . spread the vegetables around on the sandwich .

put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
keep a pan on the stove and heat the pan . add some oil in to the pan . cut the tofu in to square shaped pieces . add the tofu in to the pan . cut the onion in to small slices and add it to the pan and fry .

put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
drizzle oil into a preheated pan . place the tofu into the pan . remove the outside of the shrimp by pinching at the head and tail . remove the intestine of the shrimp by slicing open the shrimp from its back and pulling out the small intestine . add the red onion and shrimp to the pan and stir .

put oil on the pan and stir fry the tofu and onion .
put some oil into the hot pan until it coats the bottom . add in some tofu that has been cut into cubes . slice half of a red onion into strips . add the onion strips into the pan and stir with spatula .

add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
take a large pan on a stove . add some oil in to the pan . add the prawns in to the pan . stir the prawns . cook them till they are brown in color .

add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
put the shrimp ( prawns ) in the hot pan . stir them around and let them cook until they change color . they will cook fast ! it may only take about one minute .

add prawns to the pan and cook the prawns .
add prawns into the pan . mix them in the pan . add onions to the pan .

add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
add the rice noodles to the pan and allow them to cook for 1 to 2 minutes . add two tablespoons of fish sauce to the pan . ( work quickly as rice noodles tend to cook very quickly ) . add three tablespoons of sugar to your pan .

add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
take the dry white noodles and put them into the pan you are using . then pour two tablespoons of fish sauce into your tablespoon . then pour your tablespoon of fish sauce into the pan .

add dry noodles to the pan and fish sauce .
take a pan on the stove . take dry noodles in a plate . add dry noodles in to the pan . add 3 table spoons of fish sauce in to the pan . mix noodles and fish sauce .

add sugar diced radish and water .
add 3 tablespoons of sugar to the hot pan . add 1 tablespoon of chopped sweet radish to the pan . add a splash of reserved cooking water to the pan .

add sugar diced radish and water .
add sugar to your preference , 1 tablespoon diced sweet radish , and a little bit of water . stir well .

add sugar diced radish and water .
add 3tbsp of sugar into the wok . then add 1 tbsp of small cut cubes of sweet radish . then add a bit of water and stir .

crack eggs into the pan .
hit the egg lightly against the edge of the frying pan . crack the egg open and empty it into the pan . throw the egg shells away .

crack eggs into the pan .
take two eggs . crack each egg , one by one in the fry pan .

crack eggs into the pan .
take 2 eggs . crack the eggs gently on the counter top and pull apart above the pan so the yolks and whites land in the pan .

mix the ingredients in the pan together .
pick up spatula . mix in a circle motion to combine .

mix the ingredients in the pan together .
mash the eggs around , using the spatula . mix everything in the pan together with the spatula . cut the scallions ( carefully ) with a knife into short sections .

mix the ingredients in the pan together .
once the eggs are in the pan be sure to keep stirring them and break the yolks ( yellow part ) so it scrambles . make sure the eggs are completely cooked . once the eggs are cooked you can mix all of the food in the pan together .

add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
find your spring onions . they will be long and green and look kind of like green beans . carefully cut your spring onions with a cooking knife . put the spring onions into your cooking pan . find your beansprouts . they are white and look kind of like white tentacles . take a big handful of beansprouts and put them together with the spring onions into the cooking pan . mix everything together with your spatula .

add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
put 3 sliced spring onions into the pan . put a big handful of bean sprouts into the pan . cook for just a little while if you want the beans to stay harder . cook for longer if you want the beans to be softer .

add sliced spring onion and handful of beansprout and mix all ingredients together .
add sliced spring onions to the skillet . add a handful of bean sprouts to the skillet . take a big spoon and stir the ingredients in the skillet .

add oil to a wok .
grab mustard oil . add 5 tablespoons of mustard oil to pan .

add oil to a wok .
get a spoon . pour oil into the spoon slowly . add 4 spoons of oil like this .

add oil to a wok .
get a pan . add 5 table spoon . mustard oil . get a parent before add anything . add the rest of recipe & enjoy .

mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .
add curd and onion paste to the bowl . pour in some salt , sugar and chili powder . add some turmeric , garlic paste and red chili paste . mix the ingredients together well with a spoon .

mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .
place a bowl on the table . add in each of the ingredients . mix them together .

mix curd onion paste salt sugar chili powder turmeric garlic paste and chili paste together .
get a small bowl and a spoon . add the curd , onion paste , salt , sugar , red chili powder , turmeric , garlic paste , ginger paste and red chili paste . mix well with a spoon , being careful not to mix so hard the ingredients spill out of the bowl .

fry onion in a pan .
put the onions into the pan with oil . fry them for 1 minute .

fry onion in a pan .
put a big pan on the stove and pour enough oil into it to barely cover the bottom of it . turn on the stove and let it get very hot . put your sliced onions in the pan . stir from time to time and let it cook for 1 minute .

fry onion in a pan .
put oil in your pan . heat your pan . put onions into the pan . stir them around . until they are brown .

add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
put the mixed ingredients in the pan . then add the chicken piece to the pan .

add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
add the mixture and the chicken to the hot pan . stir them with your spoon .

add the mixture and the chicken to the pan .
pour the mix into the pan . use a spoon to get all of it out of the bowl . add the chicken carefully to the pan . wash your hands .

add water to the pan .
add one cup of water to the pan . use your spoon to continue to stir the mixture in the pan .

add water to the pan .
wait until the food is hot and steaming . go to the sink and fill up a measuring cup with one cup of water . slowly pour the water into the pan . wait for the water to start bubbling .

add water to the pan .
measure one cup oil water . pour the water into the pan . use a spoon to stir the water into the pan .

mix the chicken in .
put the chicken into the bowl . using a wooden spoon mix the chicken with the other mixture together .

mix the chicken in .
add your chicken to the bowl . using a wooden spoon or a spatula , mix the chicken with the other ingredients until it looks mixed well .

mix the chicken in .
take the bowl full of chicken and support it on the pot . use a large wooden spoon to gently poor the chicken into the pot . mix the chicken with the wooden spoon evenly .

add the spices to the pan and mix .
put in your chili powder and cumin to the pan . add the other spices to the mix . then stir with your spoon so the spices get mixed in .

add the spices to the pan and mix .
hold the plate with the spices over the pan . carefully dump them in the pan without spilling . use a wooden spoon to mix everything together .

add the spices to the pan and mix .
put all of the spices on a plate . add the chili powder , garam masala , pepper , coriander powder to the pan . use a wooden spoon to stir the spices in the pan .

add the pan ingredients and coriander to the curry .
cook the curry in a pot . add the pan ingredients in to the pot . take some fresh coriander leaves . cut the coriander in to small pieces . add the coriander in to the curry and mix .

add the pan ingredients and coriander to the curry .
carefully hold the other pan of ingredients over the pan . take a wooden spoon and push the ingredients off the pan into in the pot carefully .

add the pan ingredients and coriander to the curry .
with a spoon add the ingredients in the pan to the pot . with your hands put the coriander into the pot .

mix tomatoes in .
dump the chopped tomatoes into your bowl . with your stirring spoon , stir the tomatoes in well . turn down your fire . continue to stir in the tomatoes .

mix tomatoes in .
take a cooking pot on the stove . take some tomatoes on a cutting board . cut the tomatoes in to inch sized pieces . add the tomatoes in to the pot . mix the tomatoes with a spatula .

mix tomatoes in .
cut up fresh tomatoes into big pieces . add to the meat .

add salt to the pan .
hold the salt over the pan . slowly pour some salt in the pan in circles .

add salt to the pan .
open up the salt container . pour some salt from the container into the pan .

add salt to the pan .
add salt into the pan . with a spoon mix it all together .

add mustard to the pan and then the onion .
be careful , the oil will spit at you . take a pinch of mustard and put it in the pan . the oil will bubble up . get your onions ready in a bowl . use a spoon to dump them into the pan with the mustard .

add mustard to the pan and then the onion .
first , you need to put the burner on medium heat and place a pan on top . second , you need to add a small amount of vegetable oil to pan . third , you will need to add a large pinch of the spice mustard to the oil . fourth , you need to chop up an onion into small pieces . fifth , gently add the chopped up onion to the pan .

add mustard to the pan and then the onion .
add the dry mustard with your fingers once the oil in the pan is hot . next grab the plate with the onion and garlic on it . using a wooden spoon , scrape the onion and garlic into the hot pan . saute for awhile .

add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
carefully , hold the plate over the pot and pour the onion , ginger , and garlic into the pot . you will hear the onion , ginger and garlic will start sizzling right away , so quickly start stirring . keep stirring until the onion , ginger and garlic start to turn a little brown .

add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
heat a pan on the stove with a little oil in it . add the sliced onion , ginger and garlic into the hot oil . stir until the vegetables become slightly brown .

add the onion ginger and garlic to the pan .
make sure your pan is hot . carefully add the onions , ginger and garlic to the pan . be sure that it 's all in the pan . get a spoon . slowly stir and cook until the ingredients are slightly brown .

add water to the curry .
your pan ( metal ) with the ingredients will be on the stove , and using a wooden spoon , pour water into the curry mix . you will put about a half a cup of water into the pan . after the water is added , while you begin to mix the water into the ingredients , also turn the stove to hi to start heating the pan . start to mix the ingredients by taking your wooden spoon along the edge of the pan and pull the ingredients towards the middle .

add water to the curry .
take a medium sized pot . cook the curry in the pot . take some water in a jar . add some water in to the pot of curry . mix the curry with a spoon .

add water to the curry .
add a few ounces of water to the pot . turn the flame on high . allow to cook .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top .
use your fingers and pinch up some salt . sprinkle the salt on top . shake some pepper on top like the salt .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top .
put a little bit of salt and pepper on the food on the plate . eat and enjoy .

sprinkle salt and pepper on top .
use your fingers to sprinkle a small dash of salt on top . then put a little bit of pepper from a pepper grinder over everything .

cook the apple slices in the pan .
put the apple slices in a single layer in a hot pan . cook the apples for 8 to 10 minutes .

cook the apple slices in the pan .
place apples in the pan edge - to - edge . cook 8 - 10 minutes .

cook the apple slices in the pan .
set the apple slices into the frying pan . allow the apple slices to cook in the pan . turn over the slices to both sides get cooked .

pour the juice onto the foie gras .
pour the juice onto the foie gras . make sure it is plated correctly .

pour the juice onto the foie gras .
first , we want to add the juice . just take the juice and slowly let it run onto your dish off its plate .

pour the juice onto the foie gras .
hold the plate with the juice on it over the foie gras . carefully pour the juice on the meat .

place the apples and the foie gras on a plate .
put the apples onto a plate . put the foie gras on top of the apples on the plate .

place the apples and the foie gras on a plate .
bring your plate of apples near your pretty plate . use your wooden spoons to place the cooked apple slices in the middle of the plate . now bring the foie gras to your plate . use your wooden spoons to nicely place the foie gras on top of the apple slices .

place the apples and the foie gras on a plate .
take a medium sized plate . place the apples on the plate . take the foie gras on the pan . place the foie gras on top of apples . put the pan aside .

cut the foie gras into slices .
hold the foie gras carefully . take a knife and slowly cut the very end of the meat into a small slice . keep slicing thin lines carefully .

cut the foie gras into slices .
place foie gras on cutting board . get a long knife from the knife block . take knife and make a have inch wide cut . remove carefully as to not break the slice .

cut the foie gras into slices .
place the foie gras on a small cutting board . get a sharpened chef 's knife . cut a slice down one long side of the foie gras . " slicing should be done carefully with the slice about 1/4 thick " " . " cut slices from the remaining foie gras down the same side , same width .

cook the foie gras in the pan .
place the foie gras in the oil . fry on each side for a 2 minutes .

cook the foie gras in the pan .
heat the pan . using a wooden spatula put the foie gras . once cooked remove the pan from the heat .

cook the foie gras in the pan .
use a spatula to set the foie gras into the pan . cook it on both sides until it is hot and brown .

melt the butter in a pan .
once the pan is hot , place the butter in the pan . using a spatula or some other kitchen tool , move the butter around the pan so that it covers the pan as it melts .

melt the butter in a pan .
put butter in pan . spread it around . keep spreading until it has fully melted .

melt the butter in a pan .
scoop some butter into the frying pan . spread the butter around the pan until it melts .

pour oil into a hot pan .
place the pan on the stove and turn on the heat . pour 1 - 2 tablespoons of oil into pan . wait a few seconds for the pan to get hot . use a spoon to give it a little stir . when it is hot enough , the oil should have steam rising up . that is how you will know that the pan is ready .

pour oil into a hot pan .
pour the oil into the pan . wait until the oil heats up .

pour oil into a hot pan .
get oil . pour the oil into a hot pan .

crack an egg into the pan and stir .
gently hit the egg on the edge of the pan until it crack . pour the contents of the egg into the oil in the pan . use a spatula to stir up the egg while it cooks .

crack an egg into the pan and stir .
grab an egg with both hands . with your thumbs on the bottom , holding the egg over the pan , squeeze the egg slightly with both thumbs . make sure the pressure is slight and you 're squeezing as hard with your right and left hands . stir it up .

crack an egg into the pan and stir .
take one egg and tap it lightly on side of pan to crack it . open shell with your thumbs to empty contents into the pan . pull egg to side of pan and spoon out some oil . stir egg until it hardens and cooks .

add pork sprouts onion and green onion to the pan and stir .
heat the pan . cut onion and green onion in to small pieces . add pork and sprouts in to the pan . add cut pieces of onion and green onion . mix all with a spoon .

add pork sprouts onion and green onion to the pan and stir .
pour the pork , sprouts , onion , and green onion into the pan . use a large spoon or spatula to stir the food in the pan .

add pork sprouts onion and green onion to the pan and stir .
dump pork , sprouts and green onion into a hot pan . use a metal spatula in one hand and metal spoon in the other to stir those things together . mix the pork , sprouts and onion back onto themselves using a shoveling motion .

add rice to the pan and stir .
take a measuring cup and weigh the rice . soak the rice for 15 minutes . strain the rice using a strainer . add the strained rice into the pan . stir the rice with other ingredients using a spatula .

add rice to the pan and stir .
place rice in pan . stir .

add rice to the pan and stir .
cook what is in the hot wok . add rice to wok and stir until cooked .

add white pepper to the pan .
while the ingredients are cooked in the pan . add some amount of white pepper into the dish . stir the mixture thoroughly in order to blend all the ingredients together .

add white pepper to the pan .
cook your meat in a hot wok . add a little bit of white pepper to pan . stir the salt into the mixtures as the mixture cooks .

add white pepper to the pan .
shake some white pepper into it . mix the food up more .

add soy sauce to the pan and stir .
take a large pan . cook pork in a pan . take two spoons of soy sauce . add soy sauce with a spoon . mix the soy sauce with other things in the pan .

add soy sauce to the pan and stir .
using a ladle , add soy sauce to hot pan . use a spoon to stir sauce into rice .

add soy sauce to the pan and stir .
get the bottle of soy sauce . measure out how much you need into a measuring cup . pour what you measured in to the pan . stir the mixture .

place the rice onto a serving plate .
fill a round serving spoon with rice using your cooking utensil . gently pat down the rice in the serving spoon . keep the rice in the serving spoon while you put the remaining rice on the serving plate using another utensil . after all of the rice is on the serving plate , carefully turn the filled round serving spoon full of rice over on to the pile of rice in the plate so that you have a nice round mound of rice .

place the rice onto a serving plate .
stir in wok and take out of pan and put it on a plate .

place the rice onto a serving plate .
once the rice is cooked , take a spatula . take the serving plate . put the cooked rice into the serving plate . have it tasty .

add fish sauce to a bowl .
take the fish sauce . add it to the bowl .

add fish sauce to a bowl .
take a table spoon from your silverware drawer . fill it with fish sauce , while holding it over a small bowl . once it is full dump it in the bowl . do this again two more times ( until you have three spoon fulls in the bowl ) .

add fish sauce to a bowl .
measure three tablespoons of fish sauce into a small bowl . it 's ok if it 's a little over as it does n't have to be perfect .

slice chilies and a lime and add the pieces and juice to the bowl .
decide how many chilies you want to add to your dish . once you have that decided , pull off the stems . be careful and do not touch your eyes or face once you have handled the chilies . next , you will slice the chilies carefully . add the chilies to the dish . then you need to cut a lime in half , and squeeze half of it into the dish . now , mix the dish together .

slice chilies and a lime and add the pieces and juice to the bowl .
pull the stems off of the chilies you decide to use . slice them finely and then add the to the fish sauce in the bowl . next , cut a lime in half and squeeze the juice of a half of lime into the bowl .

slice chilies and a lime and add the pieces and juice to the bowl .
take the stem of the chili off . cut the chilies into small pieces , cut the lime and squeeze the juice into the bowl .

peel the shrimp .
the head and outer hard shell covering on the shrimp needs to be removed . leave the tail on the shrimp .

peel the shrimp .
take the shrimp . pull off all the shell that 's covering the shrimp .

peel the shrimp .
you will need to pick out ten small shrimp for this recipe . to begin with the shrimp , first carefully peel off the head and then the outer shell . you will leave only the tail on the shrimp .

chop the garlic onion green onion and chinese broccoli .
peel 2 cloves of garlic and chop them up . take half of a small white sweet onion and slice it into wedges lengthwise . then take 3 or 4 green onions and cut off the bottom and cut them up finely . take one half of a large leaf from a chinese broccoli and slice it into 1 centimeter strips .

chop the garlic onion green onion and chinese broccoli .
peel 2 cloves of garlic and finely chop them into small pieces . cut a small white onion in half . cut one half of the onion into slices . trim and discard the roots off of 3 - 4 green onions , then cut the green onions into tiny pieces . cut one big leaf of chinese broccoli or other leafy green and slice into small strips .

chop the garlic onion green onion and chinese broccoli .
peel two cloves of garlic and coarsely mince them . use half of a small sweet white onion and cu into slices t length wise . take 3 or 4 of your green onions and cut up finely into very small pieces . take your chinese broccoli and cut one leaf in half , and then cut into 1 cm length strips .

heat up oil in a wok .
turn on the stove . put your pan on the stove . add one tablespoon of oil and let it get hot .

heat up oil in a wok .
he on the stove in a stir fry wok or ask mom for a pan that will work . heat the oil in a wok type . you can google that if you like .

heat up oil in a wok .
turn your stove on medium and set your pan down . add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pan . wait for the oil to get nice and hot . stay back , because it will begin to pop and that can hurt !

fry garlic and shrimp in the wok .
make sure the oil is hot before adding ingredients . add the chopped garlic to the oil . stir fry the garlic for 15 seconds . add the shrimp to the pan . cook the shrimp , stir frying continuously for 30 seconds .

fry garlic and shrimp in the wok .
when the oil in the wok is hot , add garlic and stir in the pan for about 15 seconds . after cooking garlic for 15 seconds , add shrimp and stir for about 30 seconds .

fry garlic and shrimp in the wok .
put wok on stove . put oil into wok and turn on stove . add garlic to hot oil . stir fry garlic for 15 seconds . add shrimp and cook by stir frying for 30 seconds .

mix rice and an egg with the shrimp .
add half the bowl of rice to combine flavors . move the rice to half of the skillet to make room for the egg . cracked the egg in the open half and start to mix in with the rice that is in the skillet . mix well until the egg is a yellow color and all cooked . add the rest of the white rice from the bowl .

mix rice and an egg with the shrimp .
add half of the rice to the pot . stir fry it with the shrimp so that the flavors blend in very good . move rice to one side of the wok and add an egg to the cleared side . stir the egg mixture for a few seconds , then stir it into the rice . toss in the rest of the rice , stirring everything together well .

mix rice and an egg with the shrimp .
the shrimp is already in the hot wok . a wok is a skillet with high sides . add one half of the cooked rice and mix quickly with the metal spoon . push the rice and shrimp to one side of the wok and pour the egg into the empty half . stir the egg until it is cooked and add the rest of the rice . stir everything together .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar to the wok .
add half a tablespoon of soy sauce to the pan . add half a tablespoon of oyster sauce to the pan . add a small pinch of sugar . mix all the ingredients well .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar to the wok .
with rice in a hot wok . add 1/2 tablespoon of soy sauce . add 1/2 tablespoon of oyster sauce . add a tiny bit of sugar . stir it all together in the wok .

add soy sauce oyster sauce and sugar to the wok .
with rice and shrimp in the hot wok pan . add 1/2 tablespoon of soy sauce . add 1/2 tablespoon of oyster sauce . add a tiny amount of sugar . mix everything together in pan .

add the onion and broccoli to the wok .
stir rice with shrimp for a little bit . toss in chinese broccoli . toss in white onion . mix together . fry the rice for another 30 seconds .

add the onion and broccoli to the wok .
cut one small onion and add into wok . put one cup chinese broccoli into pan . mix around for 30 seconds constantly .

add the onion and broccoli to the wok .
add the broccoli to the wok . add the sliced onion to the wok . stir fry it for another 30 seconds .

add the green onions to the wok .
get wok hot on stove . add rice , shrimp and other ingredients . stir fry in hot wok . toss in green onions . keep stirring and in a few seconds it is done .

add the green onions to the wok .
toss in the chopped green onions to the stir fried rice . mix up the green onion with the stir fried rice for a few seconds . remove the pot from the heat , it is finished cooking .

add the green onions to the wok .
take the chopped greens onions . put them in the wok pan that 's on the stove .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese .
take out a bowl . put bread crumbs in the bowl . put parmesan cheese in the bowl . take a spoon and mix the crumbs and cheese together . take out a plate and pour the mixture of crumbs and cheese onto your plate .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese .
take a medium sized bowl . take a cup of bread crumbs in a bowl . add the bread crumbs in to the bowl . add a cup of parmesan cheese in to the bowl . mix them with a spoon .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese .
mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese in a bowl with a spoon . transfer the mixture onto a plate . this makes it easier to coat the chicken .

pound the chicken .
get a chicken breast from the store . lay the chicken flat . put the chicken in a plastic bag . e here 's the fun part , use a hammer and lightly hit the bag of chicken . pound the chicken until it is flat .

pound the chicken .
with the metal tool , hit the chicken all over . this makes the chicken tender .

pound the chicken .
place your chicken into a zip lock bag and seal the bag . use a meat tenderizer , looks like a little hammer , and hit the chicken breasts . the chicken will flatten out .

rub salt and pepper onto the chicken .
take chicken breasts on a plate . take salt in a bowl . take pepper powder in a bowl . rub some salt on to the chicken . rub some pepper on to the chicken .

rub salt and pepper onto the chicken .
get the salt and pepper . put some salt on each side of the chicken . put some pepper on each side of the chicken .

rub salt and pepper onto the chicken .
with a pounder tap the chicken . grab your chicken breast with your hand . put salt onto each side of your chicken . put pepper onto each side of your chicken . rub the salt and pepper all over the chicken .

rub flour onto the chicken dip it in egg and coat with breadcrumbs .
rub the white powdery stuff called flour all over the chicken . make sure to get both sides . dunk the chicken in the yellow juice which has been made from eggs that have been mixed together . make sure to put it all the way in and get everything covered in the egg juice . put the wet chicken in the crumbly yellow and white stuff called parmesan cheese . make sure to cover the entire chicken just like you did with the egg juice . make sure to press firmly so that the crumbles do n't fall off . put the food aside for a moment . focus on the oven and find the heating knob . this is what turns the oven on . it will have lots of numbers on it like ' 100 , 200 , 300 ' and even a word that says , ' broil . ' find this knob and turn it to the number ' 450 . ' . grab a frying pan . it might be heavy . it is a large pan that is shaped like a circle and is dark on the inside . it has a handle too . put the chickens on the pan .

rub flour onto the chicken dip it in egg and coat with breadcrumbs .
rub flour onto the chicken . dip the chicken in eggs . push the chicken into the parmesan cheese and bread crumbs .

rub flour onto the chicken dip it in egg and coat with breadcrumbs .
take some flour and rub it on both sides of the chicken . next put your chicken into the bowl of egg and cover it with the egg sauce . then rub both sides of the chicken in your breadcrumb mix . then pre - head your oven to 350 degrees .

fry the chicken in a pan .
add about 1 inch of olive oil in a pan . heat the on a stove top to medium high . add breaded chicken to the oil in a single layer . wait for 1.5 minutes . flip each piece of chicken and cook for 3 minutes total .

fry the chicken in a pan .
take the chicken and roll the chicken in meal to completely cover the outside of the chicken . put olive oil into a frying pan and place on the stove . turn the eye on to medium high . let the oil heat up for a minute or two . place the chicken pieces into the oil and wait about 1 1/2 minutes . take tongs and turn the chicken to the other side and wait 1 1/2 more minutes . you want to get both sides of the chicken brown and crispy .

fry the chicken in a pan .
once the pan is heated , place some olive oil in the pan . fry the chicken in the pan . cook the chicken for three minutes to make it firm on the outside . the chicken will not be cook through . it will still be raw on the inside .

spread sauce over the chicken .
put tomato sauce onto each piece of chicken . use the bottom of the spoon to spread the sauce on the chicken . put shredded cheese on top of sauce .

spread sauce over the chicken .
put chicken in metal pan . spread tomato sauce on chicken . cover the sauce with a little cheese .

spread sauce over the chicken .
place the three cooked pieces of chicken in a large rectangular pan that is silver . a rectangle is like a square , but imagine if you stretched out a square just a bit and made it longer and look like a funny square . find a spoon . dip the spoon into the sauce jar , the one filled with the thick red liquid . spread the sauce on the top of each chicken by using the spoon . make it thick but not too much .

top the chicken with mozzarella cheese .
take chicken pieces on a foil tray . take some tomato sauce and cheese on a bowl . apply some tomato sauce on to the top of chicken pieces . add lots of mozzarella cheese on top of sauce . repeat the same on all the chicken pieces .

top the chicken with mozzarella cheese .
use a spoon to spread pasta sauce on top of the chicken . make sure to cover the entire chicken . add mozzarella cheese with your fingers . make sure to put enough cheese to cover the chicken .

top the chicken with mozzarella cheese .
use a spoon to put tomato sauce on top of chicken . use the back of the spoon to spread the sauce on the chicken . then put mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce .

bake the chicken in the oven .
bake the chicken in the oven . it needs to cook for about 15 minutes .

bake the chicken in the oven .
now you are ready to bake . put it in the oven . bake it for about 15 min or until the chicken breast looks cooked .

bake the chicken in the oven .
place the pan in your preheated oven . bake for about 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked .

chop the meat into pieces .
clean the meat with hot water . cut the meat into small portions . again cut the meat into small pieces .

chop the meat into pieces .
put your meat on a cutting board . with a sharp knife , slice the meat into pieces that are 1 - 2 inches thick . ( while you are cutting the meat , carefully hold it in place with your other hand ) .

chop the meat into pieces .
use a knife to carefully cut the meat . cut the meat into a few medium sized chunks .

add water salt cayenne pepper chili powder and cumin and boil the water .
find a medium pot and fill up halfway with filtered or purified water . find measuring spoons and measure out spices . measure out 1 teaspoon salt , 2 teaspoons chili powder , 1 teaspoon cumin . sprinkle salt chili powder and cumin into the water . also sprinkle a little bit of cayenne pepper into the pot . turn up the burner to high , and bring the water to boil .

add water salt cayenne pepper chili powder and cumin and boil the water .
fill a pan about half full of water . add a tsp of salt and a few shakes of cayenne pepper . add 2 tsp of chili powder and 1 tsp of cumin . turn on the heat and bring the water to a boil .

add water salt cayenne pepper chili powder and cumin and boil the water .
pour in the water halfway up the pot with cumin . shake some salt cayenne pepper chili powder in . heat up the water until it boils .

cook the meat in the water .
before the water starts bubbling up grab the meat with your hands . carefully lower the meat into the water . let the meat cook in the water .

cook the meat in the water .
gently put the meat into the water . add the meat before it boils . when the water starts to boil turn down the heat to a simmer . mix the water as it simmers . scoop out the sludge that rises to the top .

cook the meat in the water .
slowly add the meat into the water before it begins to boil . be sure not to let the meat splash into the pot . bring the water to a boil , so that it is bubbling a lot . turn down the heat so that it does n't boil too vigorously . stir the foam down into the water . when the foam rises again , scrape it off the top of the water . boil the meat long enough to evaporate a lot of the water ( reduce the water ) .

chop the tail end off .
put the fish on a cutting board . the tail end is usually too chewy , so use a sharp knife to chop it off .

chop the tail end off .
with a knife slice off the tail of the fish . throw away the tail .

chop the tail end off .
put salmon on a cutting board . take the salmon and get a sharp nice and cut the tail off , watching your fingers .

cut the fish at an angle .
