begin at the tail end of the fish . line the blade up at an angle . carefully slice the fish into slices as large of small as is wanted .

cut the fish at an angle .
hold your knife at angle ( almost flat on the fish ) . cut the fish that way to make a nice big flat piece and continue .

cut the fish at an angle .
put the fish on the cutting board . start cutting at the tail end . hold the knife at and angle and cut slices that are about a half an inch wide . repeat this cut to make many pieces of nigiri .

slice the fish into smaller pieces .
take a cutting board and a knife . . take a big fish on the board . take the knife and pass horizontally . cut the fish horizontally in to thin slices . repeat the same to cut the whole fish .

slice the fish into smaller pieces .
next , we need to cut our very large pieces of fish into smaller and thinner pieces . get a very sharp , long knife . carefully place one hand on top of the slab of fish , and place the knife about two inches ahead of your hand . slowly move the knife back and forth , slicing through the fish towards your hand . when the knife get close to the hand you have on top of the fish , move that hand back several inches to steady the part of the slab you are about to cut . if you need to , take a step backwards , too . keep moving the knife back and forth slowly , paying careful attention to the thickness of your slices , until you reach the end of the slab .

slice the fish into smaller pieces .
hold the fish from one end . take a knife and carefully slice the fish into smaller pieces from the middle .

cut the fish into thin pieces .
place fish on cutting board . retrieve filet knife from block . slice fish at a downward angle . press lightly against knife .

cut the fish into thin pieces .
place fresh fish on cutting board . grab a knife . carefully angle the blade from heal to the tip in one motion . stand the blade up to cut side down . repeat until fish is all cut .

cut the fish into thin pieces .
use your knife to cut the fish into thin pieces with your knife . cut across in one slice to make it look nice .

grate the peeled potato and soak .
peel the potato and wash . have a pot of cold water ready and grate the potatoes over the pot to soak . also grate some onion in the same pot and let soak .

grate the peeled potato and soak .
use a grater and grate the peeled potatoes . put the potatoes into the bowl in the water .

grate the peeled potato and soak .
hold a grater with one hand . rub the potato on the grater to shave it into the water . let the potatoes soak .

fry the patties in shallow oil .
heat pan of oil on medium - high heat . put the pancake mixture in the pan and use spatula to flatten . let the pancake brown on one side and use a spatula to flip it over .

fry the patties in shallow oil .
make sure there is a good amount of oil in the pan . let the patty cook in the oil . flip the patty with a spatula .

fry the patties in shallow oil .
put 1/4 inch of oil into a pan . turn the heat to medium high . place the patties in the oil . flip over with a spatula when one side become crispy .

add the mixture to the potatoes and mix them well .
shred potatoes with a shredder . place in a bowl . add sauce . using a spatula , mix well . continue mixing until completely coated .

add the mixture to the potatoes and mix them well .
add the dry potatoes to a bowl . to the potatoes , add the egg mixture by dumping into the potatoes . mix together the egg mixture and potatoes with your spatula .

add the mixture to the potatoes and mix them well .
add the egg mixture to the potatoes . use a spatula to mix everything together evenly .

drain the potatoes and squeeze the water out .
squeeze the potatoes in the strainer . drain all of the water from the potatoes into the bowl .

drain the potatoes and squeeze the water out .
grate some potatoes in to small strips . take the grated potatoes on a colander . drain the potatoes . squeeze the water out of the potatoes with hand . keep them aside .

drain the potatoes and squeeze the water out .
chop the potatoes into very small pieces . then make sure all the water is drained . form into small patties . put onto a hot skillet with oil and fry . repeat until all the patties have been cooked .

whisk eggs flour black pepper salt and cayenne powder .
crack two eggs into a bowl . add 1 tablespoon of flour . add black pepper . add a small bit of cayenne pepper . add a pinch of salt and whisk together .

whisk eggs flour black pepper salt and cayenne powder .
crack 2 eggs into a large bowl . add flour , black pepper , a pinch of cayenne and some salt . using a whisk , mix the ingredients until they are very smooth . set the mixture to the side .

whisk eggs flour black pepper salt and cayenne powder .
put two eggs in a bowl . add flour . put in some black pepper , salt and cayenne powder . use a whisk to mix everything together until it is smooth . set aside .

add the beans and dal to boiling water .
let the pot of water come to a boil . remove the lid from the pot . add the beans and salt to the boiling water . turn off the stove , put the lid on the pot and let it soak .

add the beans and dal to boiling water .
pour beans and dal into the pot of boiling water . add salt to the pot . put the lid on the pot . turn off the heat .

add the beans and dal to boiling water .
wait until the water is bubbling very fast . carefully pour the beans and dal in the water .

add red chili powder garam masala and cream to the pan .
hold the seasonings over the pan . throw in the red chili powder and garam masala . stir with a wooden spoon . slowly pour cream in the pan .

add red chili powder garam masala and cream to the pan .
add red chili pepper to the pan . pour in garam masala . add 1/4 cup of green . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together .

add red chili powder garam masala and cream to the pan .
add red chili powder and garam masala to the pan and stir . pour the cream into the pan and stir while cooking .

add tomato puree and cover .
add the tomato puree to the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the puree into the pan . put the lid on the pan .

add tomato puree and cover .
pour the tomato puree in the pan slowly . cover the pan with a lid .

add tomato puree and cover .
put tomato puree in the pan and stir . put the lid on the pan and let it cook .

add onion to the pan .
pour onions into the pan . stir the onions in the mixture .

add onion to the pan .
hold the onions over the pan . carefully pour the onions in . mix everything up with a wooden spoon .

add onion to the pan .
put onions in the hot pan and stir . saute the onions for a short time .

add the beans and lentils to the pan .
open the pressure cooker with the beans . add all of the beans to the pan that is on the stove . use a spoon to get all of the beans out . add a little bit of water , about 1/2 a cup .

add the beans and lentils to the pan .
take beans from pan . add them pan with tomato mixture . then add in broth mixture . using a wooden spoon , stir the mixture over heat . keep stirring until completely heated and serve .

add the beans and lentils to the pan .
pour the pan of beans and lentils into the mixing pan . add water to the pan . use the stirring spoon to stir the pan as it cooks .

add the lentils and cover .
pour the lentil into the pan . put the lid of the pan on top and cover it .

add the lentils and cover .
before adding the lentils wash them well with water . add the lentils to the pot . then put the lid of the pressure cooker on securing it .

add the lentils and cover .
pour the lentils into the pan . put the cover over the pan and cook .

add butter cumin seeds turmeric powder ginger and garlic to a pan .
put butter in a pan . let it melt . add cumin seeds , turmeric powder , and ginger to a pan . mix all together . keep on medium heat and continue to mix .

add butter cumin seeds turmeric powder ginger and garlic to a pan .
take a pan and heat the pan . add some butter in to the pan and melt it . add some cumin seeds in to the pan . add some turmeric powder in to the pan . add some ginger and garlic paste in to the pan .

add butter cumin seeds turmeric powder ginger and garlic to a pan .
add 1 tablespoon of butter to the pan . add cumin seeds and turmeric . add ginger . put in some garlic . use a stirring spoon to mix it around the pan .

add salt and oil to a pot of water .
put the water on to boil . add salt , a couple table spoons full should be enough . add a few drops of olive oil to the salted water . mix it together . cover with lid to boil .

add salt and oil to a pot of water .
add quite a bit of salt to a pot of water that has been put on the heat and is about to boil . add a few drops of olive oil to the water as well .

add salt and oil to a pot of water .
get a spoon and scoop up some salt . pour the salt in the water . carefully pour in some olive oil slowly .

when the bacon is cooked add ham to the pot .
when the bacon looks darker and a little crispy get your ham ready . carefully add the ham to the pot being careful of oil splatter .

when the bacon is cooked add ham to the pot .
after the bacon has cooked , pour the ham into the pot . use the stirring spoon to mix the ham into the pot with the bacon .

when the bacon is cooked add ham to the pot .
the pancetta ( bacon ) must be cooked ( brown and crispy ) . add the ham to the pot and stir lightly .

heat oil in a pot .
take a pot and place it on the stove . turn on the stove . take oil in a jar . add some oil in to the pot . heat the oil in the pot .

heat oil in a pot .
put some olive oil in a big pot . heat the pot on the stove top .

heat oil in a pot .
pour a bit of oil in the pot . turn the heat up on the stove . let the oil heat up in the pot .

add tomato sauce to the pot .
to the meat simmering in the pot , add the tomato sauce . be careful to add it slowly , while stirring , so it does n't spatter up into your face .

add tomato sauce to the pot .
add a can of tomato sauce to the pot that you have your bacon cooking in . be careful , because bacon can spit hot grease , so do n't burn yourself !

add tomato sauce to the pot .
hold the sauce container over the pot . carefully pour the sauce into the pot without spilling .

add bacon to the pot .
chop up the bacon into medium size pieces . add it to the pan and toss it around with a spatula while it is cooking .

add bacon to the pot .
heat a large pot on the stove and put a little oil in the bottom . " chop up some pancetta into 1/2 to 1-inch cubes . " " . " put the pancetta into the pot and begin frying it . stir while frying .

add bacon to the pot .
take the cut up chunks of ham . add to the heated pot .

add the vodka to the pot .
pour the vodka into the pot ( be careful because the pan may flame up ) . use a wooden spoon to stir the vodka in the pot .

add the vodka to the pot .
take a pot on the stove . add the cooking contents in to the pot . take a cup of vodka . add the vodka in to the pot . mix the vodka with the other ingredients in the pot .

add the vodka to the pot .
hold the cup of vodka over the pot . slowly pour the vodka into the pot .

mix the pasta and the sauce together .
boil a pan of water until bubbly . add half a box of the noodles . cook for 10 min or until soft .

mix the pasta and the sauce together .
make sure your pasta is cooked through . drain your pasta carefully . add the pasta back into the pan . add the sauce to your pasta and mix it all together .

mix the pasta and the sauce together .
continue stirring the warm pasta . then add the sauce into the pan . stir together getting the pasta throughout the whole pan so it covers the pasta .

add peas to the sauce .
with your sauce in a large pot on the stove , dump your peas in . stir it up with a large wooden spoon .

add peas to the sauce .
hold the container of peas over the pot . carefully pour the peas into the pot slowly . stir it with a wooden spoon and mix it all together .

add peas to the sauce .
you will have a metal pan on the burner with the sauce simmering and hot . take the measured amount of peas that will add color and body to the sauce , and dump these into the sauce . using a wooden spoon , mix these peas into the sauce so that they are spread out evenly in the sauce . stir the sauce from in a circular pattern several times .

mix hot pepper flakes hot chili paste and soy sauce .
you need 10 tablespoons of hot chili flakes - if you do n't like spicy foods then use 5 tablespoons . add 1 tablespoon of hot chili paste to the flakes . add 5 tablespoons of soy sauce . just add they type you like . mix with a spoon . it should look like a volcano of red .

mix hot pepper flakes hot chili paste and soy sauce .
put ten tablespoons of hot pepper flakes in bowl . ( you can use less if you want ) . add 1 tablespoon of hot chili paste to the hot pepper flakes . add 5 tablespoons of low sodium soy sauce to the paste and pepper mixture . use a spoon to stir until mixed well .

mix hot pepper flakes hot chili paste and soy sauce .
use a measuring spoon to scoop hot pepper flakes into a bowl . use a measuring spoon to scoop the hot chili paste into the bowl . use a measuring spoon to add soy sauce to the bowl . use the back of a spoon to mash and stir everything together in the bowl .

add sake to the mixture and mix it well .
using a spoon , add the 2 tablespoons of sake into the mixture . using the same spoon , mix and blend the liquid with the mixture .

add sake to the mixture and mix it well .
add two tablespoons of sake ( rice wine ) to the mixture . mix well with a spoon .

add sake to the mixture and mix it well .
pour two tablespoons of sake over the mixture . mix the sake into the mixture . mix until the sake is evenly mixed into the mixture .

boil the pork .
take your pieces of pork with your grabbing tool and place them into the boiling hot water . leave them in the water for 5 minutes . then remove them with your grabbing instrument .

boil the pork .
once your water is boiling use a ton to place your pork into the boiling water . leave the pork in the water for 5 minutes .

boil the pork .
place a pot of water on the stove . turn the dial to the highest setting and wait for the water to boil . use a pair of tongs to slowly add the pork to the boiling water . once the pork has been boiling for 5 minutes , drain the water out and rinse the pork with cold water .

add tofu to the boiling water .
pick up your pieces of tofu with you picking up tool . put each piece of tofu into your hot boiling water . leave the tofu in the hot water for five minutes .

add tofu to the boiling water .
heat the pot of water till a rolling boil . use tongs to place the blocks of tofu into the pot . let the tofu boil for five minutes .

add tofu to the boiling water .
boil water . add tofu to boiling water and cook for five minutes .

put the pork in a large bowl and add chili paste .
take a large bowl . add the pork in to the bowl . take about 3 table spoons of chili paste . add the chili paste in to the pork . mix the pork and chili paste .

put the pork in a large bowl and add chili paste .
put your pork in a large bowl . take your tablespoon measure . put 3 scoops of chili paste in the bowl with the pork .

put the pork in a large bowl and add chili paste .
put the pork into a large bowl . add the chili paste from before to the bowl .

now add sesame oil and mix it well .
fill 1/2 measuring cup with oil . pour oil into bowl . mix it all up with your hands .

now add sesame oil and mix it well .
find the measuring spoon for 1/2 a tablespoon . ( if you do n't have this , you 'll need one teaspoon and one 1/2 a teaspoon . ) remember : tablespoon may look like this : tbsp . teaspoon may look like this : tsp . fill the spoon ( or spoons ) with sesame oil by pouring slowly . ( hold the spoon over the bowl in case any spills . ) . dump the oil into your bowl . using your hands , mix everything until all the pork is red with the sauce .

now add sesame oil and mix it well .
add sesame oil . mix it all together with your hands .

add garlic ginger brown sugar and chopped onion and mix it well .
add 1 tablespoon of garlic to the bowl . add half tablespoon of ginger to the bowl . add 4 tablespoons of brown sugar to the bowl . add 1 whole sliced onion to the bowl . using your hands mix all together .

add garlic ginger brown sugar and chopped onion and mix it well .
add 1/2 tablespoon of garlic and ginger in to the bowl . add 4 table spoons of brown sugar in to the bowl . cut an onion in to very small thin slices . add the onions in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

add garlic ginger brown sugar and chopped onion and mix it well .
add 1 tablespoon of garlic to the bowl . add 1/2 a tablespoon of ginger to the bowl . add 4 tablespoons of brown sugar to the bowl . add one onion that has been sliced up . use your hand to mix everything together really well .

add some ground black pepper bamboo salt and chopped green onions and mix it well .
step one you add one teaspoon of ground black pepper . step two you add one teaspoon of bamboo salt . step three cut up a cup of green onions to the size you like . step four add the green onions to the boil . step five mix everything lightly together .

add some ground black pepper bamboo salt and chopped green onions and mix it well .
take a big glass bowl . add a table spoon of black pepper powder in to the bowl . add a teaspoon of bamboo salt in to the bowl . add the cut pieces of green onion in to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

add some ground black pepper bamboo salt and chopped green onions and mix it well .
sprinkle a small amount of pepper onto the food . pour bamboo salt into teaspoon ( tsp ) to measure . sprinkle salt onto food . chop green onions into 1 - 2 inch pieces and add to food . mix with your hands until everything is combined .

cook the mixture .
being careful of the hot pan , cook everything until the vegetables start to feel a bit soft . when it 's cooked , remove the pan from the heat .

cook the mixture .
stir the mixture with a spoon often to prevent burning . cook the food thoroughly .

cook the mixture .
leave your pan over medium heat . use a spoon to stir the mixture every couple of minutes to make sure it cooks evenly on all sides .

garnish the dish with chopped tofu and chopped green onions .
use a knife to slice up the tofu . place the tofu slices around the food along the edges of the plate . use the knife to chop up some green onions . sprinkle the green onions on top of the food in the middle of the plate .

garnish the dish with chopped tofu and chopped green onions .
slice the tofu up into bite size pieces . place the tofu around the edges of the plate . top the dish with fresh chopped green onions .

garnish the dish with chopped tofu and chopped green onions .
after you boil the tofu , take it out of the water . get a knife and cut it into slices that are the size of a bite . put the tofu on the plate . get some green onions and use a knife to chop it into small pieces . add the green onions on top of the dish .

marinate boneless and skinless chicken breast pieces in egg white and cornstarch and keep ready .
skin the chicken breast . marinate with egg white and two tablespoons of cornstarch . make sure the egg white and corn starch completely coats the chicken . the mixture should not be runny .

marinate boneless and skinless chicken breast pieces in egg white and cornstarch and keep ready .
clean the chicken and make it boneless and skinless . extract the egg white into a bowl . add some cornflour into a boiling water and make a solution . mix the egg white and corn starch with chicken and keep it aside for 30 minutes .

marinate boneless and skinless chicken breast pieces in egg white and cornstarch and keep ready .
place thinly sliced chicken breast pieces in a small bowl . put egg whites and cornstarch in the chicken , stir well and let it marinade .

add some vegetable cooking oil to a hot pan add dry hot chili and chopped green onions and stir .
heat a pan on the stove top . pour vegetable cooking oil into the hot pan . add dry hot chili and green onions to the hot pan , and stir . then add ginger and garlic to the hot pan .

add some vegetable cooking oil to a hot pan add dry hot chili and chopped green onions and stir .
add vegetable cooking oil to a pan and heat it . put in the dry hot chili . put in chopped green onions . use a stirring spatula to mix the chili and onions together as they cook .

add some vegetable cooking oil to a hot pan add dry hot chili and chopped green onions and stir .
add vegetable oil to a hot pan . add dry hot chilies . add chopped green onions . stir around in the pan .

stir in the bell pepper pieces and roasted peanuts then add cooked chicken and give a quick stir .
take a pan on the stove . cut the red and green bell peppers in to small pieces . add the peppers and roasted peanuts in the pan and mix . add the chicken pieces in the pan . mix the contents in the pan ,

stir in the bell pepper pieces and roasted peanuts then add cooked chicken and give a quick stir .
next , we can add the bell pepper and roasted peanuts into the pan . give them a quick stir and be careful of the hot pan and oil . now drop your chicken into the pan as well . go ahead and give them another stir with your spatula .

stir in the bell pepper pieces and roasted peanuts then add cooked chicken and give a quick stir .
add the bell peppers and peanuts in the pan . stir with a spatula or spoon , or shake the pan to mix the ingredients . once the pan is hot and frying your ingredients , add the chicken . stir the ingredients briefly .

add some minced ginger and garlic and salt .
put some minced ginger into the pot . add some minced garlic . put in some salt . stir together with a spatula .

add some minced ginger and garlic and salt .
add ginger and garlic to a food processor . process until it 's very small , almost like a paste . add it to the pan with a spoon .

add some minced ginger and garlic and salt .
get a frying pan and start the heat . cut up some scallions . put a table spoon of oil in the frying pan . add the scallions to the frying pan . get a tablespoon of minced garlic and add it next .

add the marinated chicken pieces to it and cook for 15 - 20 seconds or until the bottom browns .
pour the marinated chicken pieces into the pan . cook this chicken like this for 20 seconds until the bottom looks brown .

add the marinated chicken pieces to it and cook for 15 - 20 seconds or until the bottom browns .
add marinated chicken to the pan . cook the chicken for 15 to 20 seconds , or until the bottom of the meat browns .

add the marinated chicken pieces to it and cook for 15 - 20 seconds or until the bottom browns .
pour the chicken in to the pot . cook the chicken for about 15 to 20 seconds until the bottom starts to brown . after 20 seconds begin to stir .

drizzle some sesame oil and serve .
add some sesame oil into the pan . shake the pan and use a wooden spatula to stir . remove from pan and serve .

drizzle some sesame oil and serve .
take a pan on the stove . cook the ingredients in the pan . take some sesame oil in the jar . add sesame oil to the pot . mix the contents of the pan .

drizzle some sesame oil and serve .
shake a little sesame oil into the pan . mix it all up with a spatula .

add some corn starch mixed in water to thicken the sauce and cook stirring .
mix some corn starch with a little bit of water . pour the mixture into the pan .

add some corn starch mixed in water to thicken the sauce and cook stirring .
pour some corn starch into the frying pan . mix everything together with a spatula as it cooks .

add some corn starch mixed in water to thicken the sauce and cook stirring .
take a small bowl . mix some corn starch in ware in the bowl . cook the dish in the pot . add the corn starch paste in to the pot . mix the contents in the pot .

pour in some cooking wine oyster sauce soy sauce give stir and cook in high flame .
pour cooking wine into the pan . pour oyster sauce into the pan . pour soy sauce into the pan . stir the mixture in the pan . cook on high heat .

pour in some cooking wine oyster sauce soy sauce give stir and cook in high flame .
put the wine around the pan . then the oyster sauce . next soy sauces . then give them a big stir with a wooden spoon on high heat .

pour in some cooking wine oyster sauce soy sauce give stir and cook in high flame .
while cooking on high heat . add about a tablespoon of cooking wine . then add about a tablespoon of oyster sauce . then add about a tablespoon of soy sauce . stir the pan well .

pour 2 ounces of chicken stock and stir .
measure 2 ounces of chicken stock with a measuring cup . pour in the chicken stock into the pan carefully . stir with a spatula .

pour 2 ounces of chicken stock and stir .
find a glass measuring cup and measure out 1 or 2 ounces of chicken stock . pour the chicken stock over the pan of cooking meat . stir the pan of meat with a heat proof spatula .

pour 2 ounces of chicken stock and stir .
measure 2 ounces of chicken stock in a measuring cup . add the chicken stock to the pan . stir with a wooden spoon .

as the chicken browns stir gently and cook for about 2 minutes and then set it aside .
stir the chicken in the pan . continue to stir for about 2 minutes . when the pink color starts to change , set the chicken aside .

as the chicken browns stir gently and cook for about 2 minutes and then set it aside .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cook the chicken in the pan till it becomes brown . stir the chicken . cook for 2 more minutes and keep it aside .

as the chicken browns stir gently and cook for about 2 minutes and then set it aside .
stir the chicken gently as it is frying . make sure all the sides of the chicken are no longer pink ( about 2 minutes ) . the chicken will not be browned all the way .

heat a pan pour some vegetable oil and spread it all over the pan .
heat the pan until it is hot . add some vegetable oil and swirl the oil around the pan . when the oil is hot enough , the chicken will not stick to the pan when you put it in .

heat a pan pour some vegetable oil and spread it all over the pan .
heat the frying pan until it is nice and hot . add vegetable oil to the hot pan . tilt the pan to spread the oil on the bottom of the pan .

heat a pan pour some vegetable oil and spread it all over the pan .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan . add some oil in to the pan and heat it . move the pan in a circular direction . spread the oil in the pan .

add sugar salt vinegar oil stock and bacon fat to the bowl .
add one teaspoon of sugar to the bowl . add 2 teaspoons of salt . put in crushed pepper . add 3/4 cup of red wine vinegar , 3/4 cup of vinegar oil , 1/4 cup of chicken stock . add bacon fat to the bowl and mix everything together in the bowl .

add sugar salt vinegar oil stock and bacon fat to the bowl .
add sugar to the bowl . add salt to the bowl . add vinegar and oil stock to the bowl . add bacon fat to the bowl .

add sugar salt vinegar oil stock and bacon fat to the bowl .
use and spoon to add the sugar and salt . pour in the vinegar oil and stock . pour the bacon fat in last .

remove the skin from the potatoes .
put the hot potatoes into a towel . peel the skin off the outside of the potatoes .

remove the skin from the potatoes .
with the potatoes heated , you are now ready to remove the skins . be careful , because they will be very hot . using a towel to protect your hands , peel all the skin off the potatoes .

remove the skin from the potatoes .
steam the potatoes . pick up the freshly steamed potatoes with a towel to protect you hands from being burned . use the sides of the towel to gently rub the sides of the potato until the skin peels away . skin should peel off easily .

coat the meat in the flour eggs and bread crumbs .
put the meat into the flour . make sure to cover both sides with flour . then dip the meat in the egg mix . after it has eggs mix on it , dip both sides into the bread crumbs .

coat the meat in the flour eggs and bread crumbs .
put the meat with your fingers into the bowl of flour . put the meat using your fingers into the bowl of eggs . put the meat using your fingers into the bread crumbs .

coat the meat in the flour eggs and bread crumbs .
take some flour in a bowl . take some egg mixture in a bowl . take some bread crumbs in a bowl . dip the meat in flour , and egg bowl . dip the meat in the bread crumbs .

fry the meat in the oil .
use tongs to grab the meat . slowly lower the meat into the oil . let the meat cook in the oil .

fry the meat in the oil .
use tongs to put the meat into the oil . after a few minutes flip the meat and cook the other side .

fry the meat in the oil .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . add the meat in to the oil . fry the meat in the oil .

melt the lard in the pan .
put the lard into the pan . heat the lard until it reaches a temperature of 300 to 350 degrees . preheat the oven to 200 degrees .

melt the lard in the pan .
place the lard into your skillet . place the skillet on the stove . you need to melt the lard until it 's completely liquid .

melt the lard in the pan .
heat the pan up to 300 to 350 degrees . put oil on the pan . add the lard to the pan and melt it .

cut the potatoes into small pieces and then add them to the bowl .
with a knife slice the potatoes . place the sliced potatoes into the bowl .

cut the potatoes into small pieces and then add them to the bowl .
use a knife and cut your potatoes into small pieces . put them in the bowl and gentle mix everything with a spoon .

cut the potatoes into small pieces and then add them to the bowl .
use a knife to carefully cut the potatoes . cut them into small pieces . add the potatoes to the bowl .

chop up the red onion and add it to the bowl .
use a knife and carefully chop up the red onion . chop the onion into small squares . add the onions to the bowl .

chop up the red onion and add it to the bowl .
use your knife and cutting board to cut the red onion . continue chopping back and forth until the onion pieces are very small , about the size of a pea . use your knife to slowly scrape the chopped onions into the bowl .

chop up the red onion and add it to the bowl .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a red onion . remove the peel of the onion . cut the onion in to small pieces . add the cut onion pieces in to the bowl .

chop up the dill and add it to the bowl .
put the dill on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut dill into small pieces .

chop up the dill and add it to the bowl .
use a knife to cut the dill . shop the dill into small pieces . add the dill to the bowl .

chop up the dill and add it to the bowl .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some dill on the cutting board . cut the dill in to small pieces . take the bowl with the other ingredients . add the dill pieces in to the bowl .

place the potato wedges into a pan of hot oil .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . cut the potatoes in to thick long pieces . fry the potato in the oil .

place the potato wedges into a pan of hot oil .
after heating oil up in your pan . place the potato wedges into the pan one by one . gently or they will break apart . do n't over crowd the pan , fry them until golden brown . remove them with a slotted spoon and repeat with the remaining potato wedges .

place the potato wedges into a pan of hot oil .
put the potato wedges in the pan of oil . set them gently into the pan so they do not break apart .

remove the potatoes from the oil and place on paper towel .
use a spoon to scoop the potatoes from the oil . put the potatoes on paper towels .

remove the potatoes from the oil and place on paper towel .
remove the potatoes with a spoon with wholes in it . place the potatoes on a paper bowl that is on a plate . you can deep fry them in oil until for how dark you want it .

remove the potatoes from the oil and place on paper towel .
use a spoon to scoop the potatoes out of the oil . set the potatoes on paper towels that are on a plate .

add potatoes salt and water to a pot and boil .
drop the potatoes into a pot with your hands . add the salt and water to the pot . heat up the water until it is bubbling fast .

add potatoes salt and water to a pot and boil .
put whole potatoes into a pot . add some salt to the pot . fill the pot with water . put the pot on the stove and bring it to a boil .

add potatoes salt and water to a pot and boil .
put the whole unpeeled potatoes into a large pot . add salt and water to the pot to cover the potatoes . put the pot on the stove , turn the heat up to high and bring to a boil .

dip the fish into the batter and place in the pan of oil .
gently dip the fish into the batter . gently put the fish into the oil do not drop it in .

dip the fish into the batter and place in the pan of oil .
use your hand to dip the fish into the batter . lower the battered fish into the pan of hot oil .

dip the fish into the batter and place in the pan of oil .
dip the fish into the batter . be sure to be both sides of the fish covered in batter . gently place the fish into the pan of oil .

cut the potato into wedges .
find a cutting board . put your potatoes on the cutting board and cut them into slices about 1/3 inch thick . ( note : peeling the potatoes is optional ) . cut the potato slices in half to make them into potato wedges . place the wedges on a plate .

cut the potato into wedges .
take the potatoes . clean the potatoes with hot water . cut the potatoes into thick long pieces .

cut the potato into wedges .
hold the potato firmly . cut one thick slice out of it . turn the slice and slice that into a few more strips .

pour beer into the flour mixture and stir .
pour beer into the flour mixture . use a whisk to stir the mixture .

pour beer into the flour mixture and stir .
take the flour into a glass bowl . add beer into the flour . whisk both the flour and beer to mix together .

pour beer into the flour mixture and stir .
pour your cup of beer into the flour . using a whisk stir the mixture together .

add baking powder and salt to a bowl of flour .
add 1 teaspoon of baking powder into the bowl . put in 1/2 teaspoon of salt . use a whisk to mix the ingredients in the bowl together .

add baking powder and salt to a bowl of flour .
using a spoon add baking powder . using a spoon add salt into the bowl . using a whisk stir it all together .

add baking powder and salt to a bowl of flour .
put one cup of self rising flour in a large bowl . add one teaspoon of baking powder and half a teaspoon of salt to the flour .

place a patty on the bottom bun of the burger .
grab the bottom bun of the burger . place the meat patty in the middle of the bun .

place a patty on the bottom bun of the burger .
grab bottom of the bun . put one hamburger patty on that half .

place a patty on the bottom bun of the burger .
take your hamburger meat out of the pan . put the meat onto the bottom part of the bread bun .

spread mayonnaise on the top bun .
take the buns apart . put them in the toaster . when it comes out the toaster , lay them on the wrapper upside down . spread mayo on the big side . put meat on little bun .

spread mayonnaise on the top bun .
apply mayonnaise on the top bun . be sure to use a spatula to apply the mayonnaise evenly .

spread mayonnaise on the top bun .
take a knife or a spatula --- a spatula is long and flat and shaped like a fish 's fin --- and spread twenty - one grams of mayonnaise onto the top bun of the burger . the top bun is a circular piece of bread that is humped like a short hill . you can measure twenty - one grams of mayonnaise by taking the mayonnaise and putting it on something called a scale . a scale is like someone 's skin . when you press on it , it can feel it . since we have plastic packets of mayonnaise , we can make a guess about how much they press on the scale . put the packet on the scale . do you see the numbers going up ? look at the first two numbers . start with the one on the left . do you see that dot after the first two numbers . do you see the third number after the dot ? ignore that last number for now . tell me what the first two numbers say .

add lettuce to the top bun .
pull off about 2 leaves of the lettuce . rip both pieces up into smaller bite sized pieces . lay the smaller pieces on the bun .

add lettuce to the top bun .
put gloves to the hand . take a bun in the hand . cut lettuce in to small leaves . take the lettuce in a bowl . add the lettuce on top of bun .

add lettuce to the top bun .
put a handful of lettuce on top of the top bun .

place two slices of tomato on the lettuce .
place two slices of tomato on the lettuce . be sure to place the two slices of tomato side by side .

place two slices of tomato on the lettuce .
place a hamburger bun top and bottom face ( inside ) up . place a hamburger on the bottom . place a slice of lettuce on the bottom . place two slices of tomato side by side on the lettuce .

place two slices of tomato on the lettuce .
use 2 slices of tomato . your lettuce should already be on the bun . set the tomato slices next to each other on top the lettuce .

place four slices of pickle on the patty .
get 4 slices of pickle from the bowl . place all 4 pickle slices on the hamburger patty . put the pickles in two rows of two .

place four slices of pickle on the patty .
put four slices pickles side by side of on to of the meat patty . then three dots of ketchup on top of the pickles .

place four slices of pickle on the patty .
take four slices of pickles . place them side by side on the burger . none of them should overlap each other .

add ketchup over the patty .
take a bottle of ketchup . evenly squeeze the ketchup onto the patty , making one long spiral for the outside to the inside of the patty .

add ketchup over the patty .
to add ketchup over the patty . use a squirt bottle and start on the edge of the patty making a circle . continue the circle to the inside of the patty until you have enough ketchup on your whopper .

add ketchup over the patty .
pick up a tube of ketchup . turn the tube of ketchup upside down so that the ketchup will squirt out . squeeze the ketchup bottle to while moving the bottle from the outside of the patty to the inside .

add four slices of onion on the patty .
cut each end off the onion . cut the outer layer off . rinse off the onion and the knife . " slice the onion into rings " " . " " . " place three or four rings on the burger patty , so that every bite will have an onion .

add four slices of onion on the patty .
add about 4 onion rings to the burger . make sure there will be an onion in every bite .

add four slices of onion on the patty .
place four slices of onion on top of the hamburger patty . try to space them out evenly .

place the top bun over the bottom bun .
turn top of burger over . place top of burger on bottom half of burger with both hands . then wrap burger in paper .

place the top bun over the bottom bun .
place all ingredients on bottom bun . put the top bun piece on top of the ingredients .

place the top bun over the bottom bun .
put the top of the bun on the burger . wrap the burger with paper .

wrap the burger in a paper cover .
assemble your burger with the buns , meat , cheese and vegetables . place wrapping paper on the counter . place burger in the center of the wrapping paper . fold the two large flaps over the burger . then tuck the two side flaps under to completely wrap the burger .

wrap the burger in a paper cover .
take your finished hamburger and put it on top of your paper . then take the paper and wrap it around the hamburger so you can it a square .

wrap the burger in a paper cover .
wrap the hamburger up in a paper cover . it should look neat and be covered when you finish .

chop the cabbage .
you are going to add 5 lbs of cabbage . quarter the cabbage first . then cut out the cores . next cut the cabbage to about the size of a dime .

chop the cabbage .
first , cut each head of cabbage into 4 large pieces . next , cut off the center stem of the cabbage . finally , cut each piece of cabbage into thin strips .

chop the cabbage .
cut the cabbage in half . and then cut the cabbage in half again . cut the cabbage corners off . then cut the cabbage into small pieces like a dime . or you can use a food processor to cut the cabbage .

pour salt on the cabbage and mix .
take a a few spoons of salt and pour it on top of the cabbage in the bowl . reach in the bowl and mix the cabbage and salt together so the salt is all over the cabbage .

pour salt on the cabbage and mix .
after chopping the cabbage place it in the bowl . pour three table spoons of salt on the cabbage . mix together with clean hands .

pour salt on the cabbage and mix .
put 1/3 of the sliced cabbage into a large bowl and put 1 tbsp of canning salt over to top of the cabbage . add another 1/3 of the cabbage to the bowl and sprinkle another tablespoon of the canning salt to the top of the cabbage . take the final 1/3 of the cabbage and add it to the bowl , then one more tablespoon of the canning salt to the top . using your hands mix all the cabbage and salt together in the bowl .

press the cabbage into a container .
add the cabbage to a clean container such as a tupperware dish or glass jar . using your hand , press down on the cabbage in the dish . press hard until the juices from the cabbage come to the top of the dish .

press the cabbage into a container .
pour the cabbage into a plastic or glass container or jar . push on top of the cabbage until the water in the cabbage starts to show on top .

press the cabbage into a container .
add cabbage to clean container or jar . press firmly until juices come to the top .

mix salt and water and pour on top of the cabbage .
make a brine water with two cups of cold water and three tablespoons of salt . mix until the salt is dissolved . pour the brine over the cabbage . cover the cabbage with a clean cheesecloth .

mix salt and water and pour on top of the cabbage .
pour 2 cups of cold water into a bowl . measure 3/4 tablespoons of salt and pour into the water . take the saltwater mixture and pour into the bowl of cabbage .

mix salt and water and pour on top of the cabbage .
mix 3/4 tablespoon of salt with 3 cups of cold water . pour this water and salt mixture over your sliced cabbage .

cover the cabbage with cheese cloth and weigh down .
pour some water over the cabbage . take a cheesecloth and put it over the cabbage . put a plate over the cheese cloth . put a can on top of the plate .

cover the cabbage with cheese cloth and weigh down .
put the cabbage container on the counter , at room temperature . get a small plate , a large can of vegetables and a piece of cheesecloth . place the cheesecloth on top of the cabbage . press the cheesecloth down inside the container along all sides . place the small plate and then the can on top of the cheesecloth .

cover the cabbage with cheese cloth and weigh down .
get out your cheese cloth . place it over the cabbage and press down really hard . make sure it covers every part of the cabbage . put something heavy over it and leave it alone for a few weeks .

put some of the vegetables in to the pot and let it come to boil by slightly separating the noodles .
use chopsticks to add the vegetables to the pot . use the chopsticks to press the vegetables into the pot . use the chopsticks to separated the noodles .

put some of the vegetables in to the pot and let it come to boil by slightly separating the noodles .
cut up the bok choy . rinse and wash it with fresh clean water . add it to the pot of hot water . it 's okay if it fills the pot , it will get very small as it cooks . use chopsticks to start separating the noodles in the pot .

put some of the vegetables in to the pot and let it come to boil by slightly separating the noodles .
put the vegetables gently into the pot . use the chopsticks to push them into the water , but not drowning them ! take the chopsticks and reach down into the water grabbing some noodles . mix the noodles around , lifting them up a little , then grabbing another bit of noodles and moving them around . the water should be boiling , so be very careful . keep moving the noodles and vegetables around for a while .

add frozen vegetables into the bowl let it boil for a minute .
make sure that the pot is boiling . find and open the bag of frozen vegetables . add as many of the frozen vegetables as you want into the pot . let the pot boil for another minute .

add frozen vegetables into the bowl let it boil for a minute .
let the pot continue to cook . pour in enough frozen vegetables for 5 servings . allow the vegetables to boil for 1 minute . put in the udon noodles to the pot .

add frozen vegetables into the bowl let it boil for a minute .
let potatoes boil for a few moments to cook through . add your desired amount of vegetables to the boiling water . bring to a boil and let them cook a few moments . give it a quick stir with chopsticks or other utensil . add noodles . do not overcook your noodles .

boil water with can of chicken broth add 2 packs noodles flavor fish balls and boil to cook .
add the can of chicken broth in the pot . tear open 2 packets of noodle flavor in the pot . wait until the broth is bubbling .

boil water with can of chicken broth add 2 packs noodles flavor fish balls and boil to cook .
take a pot on the stove and add some water in the pot . boil the water with can of chicken broth in the pot . add 2 packets of noodles flavor in to the pot . add fish balls in to the pot . boil the contents in the pot .

boil water with can of chicken broth add 2 packs noodles flavor fish balls and boil to cook .
uncover a pot of boiling broth . add a couple of packs of flavoring one at a time . add fish balls in one at a time . make sure to drop them in close to the broth so the water does not splash around .

cut the base and wash the pad choy .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a pad choy on the cutting board . cut the base of it with the knife . separate the leaves from it . place the leaves in the bowl .

cut the base and wash the pad choy .
place pad choy on cutting board . cut bottom off of pad choy . separate into pieces . wash pieces .

cut the base and wash the pad choy .
pre - wash all bok choy . place the bok choy on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut off the base of the bok choy .

add the udon noodles into the boiling water and take some of the soup out of the pot .
now you will add your udon noodles carefully into the soup . if it beings to try and overfill the pot , carefully take out some of the soup . use a ladle to dip some of the soup out into a bowl to discard .

add the udon noodles into the boiling water and take some of the soup out of the pot .
bring water to boil . add udon noodles into the pan . grab a bowl and spoon . use the spoon to scoop out extra soup . place bowl aside .

add the udon noodles into the boiling water and take some of the soup out of the pot .
place the udon noodles into the boiling water pot . use a scoop and remove some of the soup from the pot and put it in a bowl .

open 6 udon noodles .
open 6 packages of udon noodles . take the noodles out of the clear plastic package as well . add a can of chicken brother to some water and heat to boiling .

open 6 udon noodles .
take 6 packages of udon noodles . use scissors to cut open the packages .

open 6 udon noodles .
grab those udon noodles packages and with scissors be careful while cutting them open . udon noodles are like thick spaghetti but packaged differently , you 'll like them . as usual , with most noodles , they have to be cooked in boiling water so soften . take the noodles over to the stove and place them carefully into the hot water and stir . after 15 - 20 minutes , take the heavy hot pot over to sink and pour noodles into the strainer to drain .

add grease to a cooking tray .
grease your 9x12 cooking dish with cooking spray . add 2 cups of milk to the dish .

add grease to a cooking tray .
take a baking tray . take an oil sprinkling bottle . add oil in to the bottle . sprinkle oil on to the tray . cover the entire tray with oil .

add grease to a cooking tray .
take a can of cooking spray and point it at the tray . spray all over the pan evenly .

add milk to a bowl of eggs green onions onion powder and salt .
get a large mixing bowl , a measuring cup , a cutting board , knife , and a whisk . crack open 8 large eggs and add to the bowl , be careful not to get any egg shells in the bowl . measure 2 cups of milk and add to the eggs . using the cutting board and knife , chop up 3 green onions into small pieces . add the onions to the bowl . add 1 teaspoon of onion powder and 1 teaspoons of salt . use the whisk to mix everything up until it 's mixed well .

add milk to a bowl of eggs green onions onion powder and salt .
crack eight large eggs into a bowl and add two cups of milk . add in the three green onions we chopped earlier . add in the teaspoon of onion powder we measured out earlier . add in the teaspoon of salt we measured earlier . you can use less salt if you prefer your food to taste less salty . whisk everything together until it is very well mixed .

add milk to a bowl of eggs green onions onion powder and salt .
take a big glass bowl . break open some eggs and add it to the bowl . add cut pieces of green onion in to the bowl . add onion powder in to the bowl . add some salt in to the bowl and mix everything .

add canadian bacon cut english muffins and more bacon to the tray .
take a large pan . cut the bacon in to small square shaped pieces . cut the english muffins in to the tray on top of bacon . add the bacon on top of muffins . spread on the tray equally .

add canadian bacon cut english muffins and more bacon to the tray .
add canadian bacon pieces and spread them along the bottom evenly . cut english muffins and spread them around . more bacon to the tray on the bread pieces .

add canadian bacon cut english muffins and more bacon to the tray .
cut the canadian bacon into small squares . spread half the bacon around in the bottom of a baking dish . get six english muffins and cut them into small squares . put the english muffin pieces in the dish on top of the bacon . put the other half of the bacon all over the top of the english muffin pieces .

pour the egg mixture over the bacon .
put the bacon onto the bread in the casserole dish . take the bowl of egg custard . pour the egg custard over the bacon . make sure to pour it evenly over all areas . cover the casserole dish with plastic wrap .

pour the egg mixture over the bacon .
place bacon mixture in cooking dish . lift bowl of egg custard above cooking dish . pour the egg custard into the cooking dish without dropping . be sure to pour all of the egg custard mixture into the cooking dish . make sure all the bacon mixture has liquid on it .

pour the egg mixture over the bacon .
pour the egg custard over the bacon in the pan . cover the pan with plastic wrap .

sprinkle paprika into the tray .
using your fingers , sprinkle a teaspoon of paprika across the dish . cover the dish with aluminum foil .

sprinkle paprika into the tray .
you will need a measuring spoon . you will also need paprika . scoop out one teaspoon of paprika into the measuring spoon . use your fingertips to sprinkle the paprika across the top of the food .

sprinkle paprika into the tray .
sprinkle 1 teaspoon of paprika evenly onto the dish . cover the casserole pan with aluminum foil .

make hollandaise sauce in a separate bowl .
during the last few minutes of baking , prepare a .9 oz package of store bought hollandaise sauce mix by reading the directions on the sauce package .

make hollandaise sauce in a separate bowl .
prepare a .9 ounce package of hollandaise sauce mix . use a whisk or blender to mix it .

make hollandaise sauce in a separate bowl .
read the directions on the package . add the liquid and the dry powder together in the pot . mix everything together and let it cook .

drizzle the hollandaise sauce onto the casserole .
cook the casserole in a tray . transfer the casserole in to a plate . take hollandaise sauce in a bowl . start pouring sauce on to the plate . add sufficient amount of sauce on to the casserole .

drizzle the hollandaise sauce onto the casserole .
pour the hollandaise sauce on top of the casserole . serve the finished casserole .

drizzle the hollandaise sauce onto the casserole .
lightly and slowly pour the hollandaise sauce over the casserole . the casserole is the large deep dish that contains your hot food . try this meal with asparagus that has been steamed which means cooked in a steamer with boiling water underneath . try some fresh fruit with this meal as well .

place the bread on top of the bread .
add 3 or 4 slices of cheese to the top of one of the bread slices . pick up the slice of bread without cheese and flip it over on top of the cheese covered bread . be careful not to burn your fingers , as the bread will be very hot . use a spatula to flatten the sandwich and let it finish cooking .

place the bread on top of the bread .
add 3 - 4 slices of cheese to one piece of bread . take the other slice of bread and place it on top . gently press your spatula onto the grilled cheese sandwich .

place the bread on top of the bread .
add 3 to 4 slices of cheese to the bread . set the top half of the bread on top of the cheese . press down the bread with the spatula .

place the bread in the pan .
pick up the bread with your hand . put the bread in the pan side by side .

place the bread in the pan .
put oil on the pan and turn on the stove . wait until pan gets hot . put white bread slices into the pan .

place the bread in the pan .
add two slices of white bread onto the pan . let the face down side cook on the pan .

place cheese on the bread .
the bread should be lightly frying in the pan . add 2 - 3 slices of cheese to one piece of the bread .

place cheese on the bread .
put 3 or 4 slices on the bread . make sure it 's evenly placed on the bread .

place cheese on the bread .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan and add some butter . fry the bread on one side . take 3 - 4 slices of cheese . add 3 - 4 slices of cheese on the bread .

melt butter in a pan .
place stick of butter on cutting board . use knife to cut 1 tbsp of butter from stick . remove paper from butter . place butter in hot pan . tilt pan so that butter is all over bottom of pan .

melt butter in a pan .
cut one teaspoon of butter . add the butter to the hot pan . let the butter melt . spread the butter evenly around the pan .

melt butter in a pan .
cut a square of butter off with a knife . drop the butter in a hot pan . let the butter become liquid .

spread mustard on the bread .
use a knife and scoop out the mustard . use the knife to spread the mustard all over the bread evenly .

spread mustard on the bread .
take a knife and scrape about a spoon of mustard onto the piece of bread . with the knife , spread the mustard into a thin layer on the top of the piece of bread so that it covers the entire piece of bread . do the same thing for each of the slices of bread .

spread mustard on the bread .
add 1 tablespoon of mustard . spread the mustard on top of the spread .

flip the slices of bread over .
let the bread cook in the melted butter for 3 - 4 minutes or until the under side is golden brown . using a spatula turn the bread over ( do n't show kids a video flipping the bread using your hands as they will get burnt for sure ) .

flip the slices of bread over .
use your hands to carefully grab the bread . flip the bread pieces onto the other side .

flip the slices of bread over .
toast the bread in the pan for 3 to 4 minutes . flip the bread over to toast the other side .

soak gram and place water salt and turmeric powder in pressure cooker .
soak the gram . put the water , salt , and turmeric into the pressure cooker .

soak gram and place water salt and turmeric powder in pressure cooker .
take some gram and put it into a bowl and pour a little bit of water on it . let the bowl with the gram sit on the counter for the entire night . the next day , put some water , salt , and some turmeric powder into the pressure cooker .

soak gram and place water salt and turmeric powder in pressure cooker .
take 2 cups of black gram and one cup of chana dal in a bowl . wash the dal and soak the dal overnight . add the dal in to the pressure cooker and add 5 glasses of water . add little turmeric powder and little salt for taste . cook the dal with 3 whistles .

pressure cook the dal and grind .
put the dal in some water . leave the dal in water over night . put the dal in a pressure cooker with 4 to 5 cups of water . turn your oven on and cook the pressure cooker for 18 - 20 minutes .

pressure cook the dal and grind .
soak dal over night . cook dal in pressure cooker . cook 20 to 30 minutes . grind the dal .

pressure cook the dal and grind .
take 2 cups of black gram and 1 cup of chana dal . wash them and cook dal in a pressure cooker . take the cooked dal from the cooker in to a bowl . remove water from dal . grind it in to a paste .

heat ghee in a pan .
put 2 tablespoons of butter in skillet . let the butter melt , then add the ghee , cook for about 5 minutes till it 's hot .

heat ghee in a pan .
put pan on stove and turn it on . put a scoop of ghee in the pan to heat it up .

heat ghee in a pan .
take the measuring spoon that says tbsp . put 2 spoons of the ghee in the pan . heat up the pan .

add asafetida cloves of garlic and ginger and salt .
add 8 little pieces of the garlic . add the ginger and salt .

add asafetida cloves of garlic and ginger and salt .
get a pot or bowl , whatever the recipe calls for . take out the ingredients needed , asafetida , cloves of garlic , ginger , and salt . add each ingredient to the pot .

add asafetida cloves of garlic and ginger and salt .
add the spice asafetida to the pan . add cloves of garlic to the pan . add ginger and salt to the pan .

add chopped green chilies and salt .
cut green chilies into small pieces with a knife . add the green chilies to the pan with garlic .

add chopped green chilies and salt .
put the chopped green chilies in the pan . stir with a spoon until the garlic is a little brown .

add chopped green chilies and salt .
cut the green chilies . cut the garlic into small pieces . prepare your salt . put the garlic into the pan . put the green chilies and salt into the pan .

add chopped onion mix well and saute .
cut one large onion into very small pieces . add these pieces into the pan . using a plastic spoon , mix the contents of the pan . cook until the onion turns soft .

add chopped onion mix well and saute .
grab the bowl you have put your chopped onion in , and the utensil you are using to cook with . add the onion into your pan . cook the onions until they are nice and translucent .

add chopped onion mix well and saute .
add the cut up onions . cook the onions and mix them around .

add chopped tomato mix well and saute .
use a knife to cut one large tomato into small cubes . add the chopped tomato into the pan and stir to mix .

add chopped tomato mix well and saute .
take one large tomato . cut the tomato in to small pieces . take the cut tomato in to a bowl . add the tomato in to the pan . cook till they become soft .

add chopped tomato mix well and saute .
add the chopped tomatoes . continue stirring . the pan should heat back up and sizzle . stir it continuously . this will insure that nothing burns .

add red chili powder a pinch of turmeric powder and garam masala and mix .
add one teaspoon of red chili power in to the pan . add little turmeric powder in to the pan . add half a teaspoon of garam masala powder in to the pan . take a spatula . mix everything in the pan with spatula .

add red chili powder a pinch of turmeric powder and garam masala and mix .
first , just slowly add a teaspoon of chili powder . this will give it a great color . now add just a little bit of turmeric powder . be careful , do n't add to much turmeric powder . now just add 1/2 teaspoon of garam masala . now gently mix all together .

add red chili powder a pinch of turmeric powder and garam masala and mix .
add red chili powder to the pan . add a tiny amount of turmeric powder . add garam masala to the pan . mix everything together with a spoon .

stir in cooked dal and ground paste mix well .
add the cooked dal to the pot . add the ground paste . mix it up !

stir in cooked dal and ground paste mix well .
pour the bowl of cooked dal into the pan . pour the ground paste into the pan . use a spoon to scrape every last bit of the paste into the pan . stir the pan with a plastic spoon .

stir in cooked dal and ground paste mix well .
pour the cooked dal into the pan . put the ground paste into the pan . mix everything together in the pan with a spoon .

cover dal and cook while stirring and add a spoon of ghee .
cover the dal and cook for 10 minutes more . stir dal often . add a spoon of ghee to dal .

cover dal and cook while stirring and add a spoon of ghee .
put the cover on the pan of dal . stir the dal while it is cooking . add a spoonful of ghee .

cover dal and cook while stirring and add a spoon of ghee .
cover and cook the dal for 15 more minutes . keep stirring during the 15 minutes . when the dal covers a spoon nicely it is finished .

heat hopped carrot celery garlic onion in a large pot with oil .
put carrots , celery , garlic and onion into a large pot . coat the pot with olive oil . stir the ingredients as the cook in the pot .

heat hopped carrot celery garlic onion in a large pot with oil .
get the chopping block . cut up the carrots . cut up an onion . cut up a celery . put these vegetables into a pot on the stove .

heat hopped carrot celery garlic onion in a large pot with oil .
take a large pot and add some oil in to the pot . cut the carrots and celery in to inch sized pieces . add the carrots and celery in to the pot . cut the garlic and onion in to small pieces . add the garlic and onion in to the pot and cook .

add herbs spices salt and pepper .
in a large pot , heat up chopped onions , celery , and carrots until they are soft . add in a sprig of rosemary . add salt and pepper to taste . usually about 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon each .

add herbs spices salt and pepper .
carefully add spices herbs and salt to the pot . mix in with wooden spoon .

add herbs spices salt and pepper .
get some herbs as the recipe calls for and the spices / seasoning . put he in the pan along with some salt and pepper along with herbs and spices . stir all together .

add tomato paste to the pot .
pour the crushed tomatoes into the pot with the other ingredients . once most of the tomatoes have been poured into the pot , rinse the can with half a cup of water so that you can get the last bits out of the can .

add tomato paste to the pot .
now we want to take our crushed potatoes and pour them into your pot . go ahead and rinse your can out with water once you have emptied as much as you can into your bowl . make sure you remember to remove your spoon before pouring the tomatoes into your pot .

add tomato paste to the pot .
pour in crushed tomatoes to the pot . use the stirring spoon and mix the ingredients together in the pot .

stir and cook it to simmer .
use a wooden spoon to stir the soup . let the soup simmer for about two hours .

stir and cook it to simmer .
take a pot on the stove . add the ingredients in the pot . stir the contents in the pot . turn the heat to simmer . cook the contents in the pan in simmer .

stir and cook it to simmer .
use a spatula to stir the pot of soup which is on the stove . simmer it in the pot for about 2 hours till it becomes thick like stew . cook it till it becomes thick to a stew like consistency .

add in the kidney beans and butter .
open a can of kidney beans and rinse them off with water . pour the beans in the pot with the rest of the ingredients . take a piece of parmesan cheese rind and set it in the pot while everything cooks . when it 's finished , make sure to take the cheese rind out of the pot .

add in the kidney beans and butter .
take a can of kidney beans and open it carefully . drain the beans using a strainer and rinse them for a couple of minutes . put your rinsed and drained beans into the pot . put your butter into the pot carefully .

add in the kidney beans and butter .
take a pot and add the ingredients in the pot . take a can of red kidney beans . add the red kidney beans in to the pot . take a small block of butter . add the butter in to the pot .

add kale and pasta to the soup and season with salt and parmesan .
use a wooden spoon to scoop the kale into the soup . pour in half the box of pasta into the soup .

add kale and pasta to the soup and season with salt and parmesan .
cut the kale in to small pieces . add the kale in to the pot of soup . add the pasta in to the soup pot . add some salt in to the soup . add some parmesan cheese in to the soup .

add kale and pasta to the soup and season with salt and parmesan .
take your kale and slowly add it into your pot with the soup . now we can add in our noodles , and make sure to mix in the kale with the broth and noodles . season the soup with the salt , and parmesan once you place it in the bowl and are ready to serve it .

add the chicken broth and water to the pot .
gather about ten cups of liquid into a pitcher ( this can be broth and water ) . slowly and carefully pour the liquid into the pot being careful not to splash yourself .

add the chicken broth and water to the pot .
hold the chicken broth and water over the pot . carefully pour in the water and chicken broth .

add the chicken broth and water to the pot .
add a mixture of chicken broth and water . add about 10 cups to the pot .

roll a piece of dough into a ball and dip in flour .
use clean hands to tear a small ball of dough , about half an inch in diameter , from the large part of dough . roll it in your hand to get it spherical . roll it in a small bit of flour , applying a small coat of flour .

roll a piece of dough into a ball and dip in flour .
using your hands take a piece of dough . roll the dough into a ball using your hands . dip the ball of dough into the flour .

roll a piece of dough into a ball and dip in flour .
take a piece of dough off of the end of the dough . roll the dough into a ball . take the ball of dough and dip it into the flour .

roll the dough into a thin oval .
using a roller , press firmly rolling the dough . roll the dough into a shape of an oval .

roll the dough into a thin oval .
take a big ball of dough . divide the dough in to small balls . take a rolling pin and a board . place the small ball of dough on the board . roll the dough in to thin oval .

roll the dough into a thin oval .
make the dough with the flour and water . take the roller and start rolling . roll the dough into a the oval shape . roll it to a thin oval shape .

knead the dough until it is soft .
use your hands to roll the dough . continue kneading the dough until it is soft .

knead the dough until it is soft .
put the dough on a cutting board . knead the dough by pushing and rolling it with your hands until it is soft .

knead the dough until it is soft .
knead the dough on a smooth surface . knead for a minute to make smooth .

add flour oil and salt in a bowl and mix .
take a large mixing bowl . add one cup of flour in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of oil in to the flour . add some salt in to the flour and mix . add water in to the bowl and mix it in to a dough .

add flour oil and salt in a bowl and mix .
now we are going to take the flour and add it to our mixing bowl . next we want to add 2 teaspoons of oil to the flour . take a small spoonful of salt and add it as well . now mix all of the ingredients by hand .

add flour oil and salt in a bowl and mix .
place your good quality whole wheat flour into a bowl . add about 2 tsp of oil to the flour in the bowl . add salt until it tastes good to you . mix all the ingredients together with your hand .

fold the dough in half and roll again .
pinch the middle of the dough together . press the dough together . on cutting board roll out the dough into a circle .

fold the dough in half and roll again .
pinch the dough in the center until it is almost cut in half . then fold one side of the dough over on top of the other side . roll out again until the dough is formed into a circle of the correct size .

fold the dough in half and roll again .
add oil on the dough . then fold it in half . then put it in dry flour . then roll it again . then let your parents handle it in the skillet .

place the roti to a hot pan ad flip .
put your roti one side down onto a pan that is heated with the burner on . leave your roti cooking on one side until you see bubbles start to appear on the side facing up . use a spatula and carefully flip the roti to cook the other side .

place the roti to a hot pan ad flip .
roll the roti in to a thin circle . place the pan on the stove . heat the pan on the stove . place the roti on to the stove and fry it on one side . flip it to the other side and fry it on the other side .

place the roti to a hot pan ad flip .
pick up the roti . carefully place the roti into a heated pan . grab a spatula and watch the roti . wait until you see small bubbles beginning to rise on the roti . slide the spatula underneath the roti and flip it over .

pour water into the bowl while mixing .
pour the water into the bowl . using your hands mix the mixture together . add water again to your bowl .

pour water into the bowl while mixing .
take the flour contents in a mixing bowl . take some water in a cup . slowly add some water in to the flour and mix . add remaining water in to the bowl . mix the flour with the water in to a dough .

pour water into the bowl while mixing .
pick up the container of water in one hand . use your other hand to carefully stir the contents of the bowl . while you stir , slowly pour in a small amount of water . after you pour in a small amount of water , keep stirring the contents of the mixing bowl with your other hand . repeat these steps until all the water is fully mixed into the mixing bowl .

add oil and flour to the dough .
use a spoon to add oil to the dough . use your hand to spread the oil around on the dough . then add a bit of flour over the dough .

add oil and flour to the dough .
take a rolling board and rolling pin . take a ball of dough . roll the dough in to thin oval . add little oil in to the dough . sprinkle some flour on to the dough .

add oil and flour to the dough .
take your dough and lay on a cutting board . take a spoon and do 3 t0 4 drops of oil and spread around . take pinch of flour and sprinkle on dough . fold dough like triangle .

add the prawns to the pan and mix .
take the prawns in a plate . take a pan on the stove . cook the contents of the pan . add the prawns in to the pan . mix the prawns in the pan with other ingredients .

add the prawns to the pan and mix .
once the contents of the pan are cooked , add the prawns . stir the prawns into the contents of the pan with a wooden spoon . cook for about 3 minutes stirring constantly .

add the prawns to the pan and mix .
take the raw prawns and add them to the hot pan with everything else . use a spoon to stir everything all together . let it all cook for about three minutes , and be careful not to breathe in the spicy steam while it cooks .

pour the soup into the bowl with the noodles .
get a ladle to spoon out the soup . pour the soup into the bowl , using the ladle , until the noodles are covered .

pour the soup into the bowl with the noodles .
place noodles in a bowl . pour soup mixture on top of the noodles and fill up the bowl .

pour the soup into the bowl with the noodles .
put the noodles in a bowl . use a ladle to spoon the soup over the noodles in the bowl .

place the noodles in a bowl and cover with boiling water .
open the package of noodles and put them into a soup bowl . carefully pour enough boiling water into the bowl to cover the noodles . use tongs to separated the noodles so they wo n't stick together . let the noodles sit for a minute to warm up .

place the noodles in a bowl and cover with boiling water .
take a medium sized bowl . cut open the pack of noodles . add the noodles in to the bowl . pour some boiling water in to the bowl . mix the noodles and water .

place the noodles in a bowl and cover with boiling water .
cut the noodle package open using kitchen scissors . put the noodles into a bowl . pour boiling water into the noodle bowl to cover the noodles . use tongs to break the noodles apart . let the noodles sit for about 1 minute .

add coconut milk and red bell pepper to the pan and stir .
slowly pour in two cans coconut milk . scrape bell peppers from cutting board into pan with a spoon . stir slowly to combine the milk and peppers together . lower the temperature after it boils . cook at a slow bubble ( simmer ) for 5 minutes with the cover off .

add coconut milk and red bell pepper to the pan and stir .
carefully pour the coconut milk in the pan . add the red bell pepper to the pan . stir everything around with a spatula .

add coconut milk and red bell pepper to the pan and stir .
take a pan on the stove . add 2 cans of coconut milk in to the pan . cut some bell pepper in to long thin pieces . add the bell pepper in to the pan . mix the bell pepper and coconut milk .

pour oil into a hot pan and add chopped onions and laksa sauce .
place a wok on the heat and allow it to heat up . add a little oil to the wok . add the chopped onions to the heated wok . add the laksa sauce to the wok and stir all the ingredients .

pour oil into a hot pan and add chopped onions and laksa sauce .
add some oil into a frying pan . pour the chopped onions into the pan . then pour the laksa sauce in . mix these together while they cook .

pour oil into a hot pan and add chopped onions and laksa sauce .
take a pan and place it on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . cut onion in to small pieces and add it to the pan . add some laksa sauce in to the pan . mix everything in the pan .

chop up bacon .
stack a few slices of bacon on a cutting board . with a sharp knife , cut the bacon crossways into thin strips .

chop up bacon .
lay the bacon so it 's lined up straight on the cutting board . hold one end of the bacon and cut from the other end . cut the bacon into small squares .

chop up bacon .
move the cut up potatoes over . put the bacon on the cutting board . take a sharp knife from a drawer . carefully chop the bacon into small pieces . repeat until all the bacon is cut .

chop an onion and potatoes .
take onions and potatoes and clean it well . cut the onions into small cubes . cut the potatoes into small cubes .

chop an onion and potatoes .
take a cutting board and a knife . take an onion and cut in to small pieces . take a half potato on the cutting board . cut the potatoes in to small pieces . repeat the same with other half of potato .

chop an onion and potatoes .
take out a sharp knife and a cutting board . put the onion on the cutting board . cut the onion into small cubes about the size of a fingernail . put the potato on the cutting board . cut the potato into small cubes about the size of dice .

stir in cream .
take the pot with the cooked ingredients . add some cream in to the pot . mix the cream with the whisk . add the remaining amount of cream in to the pot . mix the cream properly .

stir in cream .
get the cream and pour a little into mixture . then stir and pour a little more in a stir again . stir until you do no see the white of the cream and it is thoroughly mixed .

stir in cream .
stir the ingredients in the put with a whisk . start adding the cream a little add a time so you do n't ruin it . the heat will be a medium high heat and you have to watch the bottom of the pan so it does n't burn . stir the pan frequently .

add pepper and salt to the soup .
take the soup in a bowl . add pepper powder in to the bowl . take some salt in a bowl . add some salt in to the bowl . mix them properly .

add pepper and salt to the soup .
add pepper to the soup and stir it up with a spoon . add a small amount of salt , just for flavor . add potatoes to the soup .

add pepper and salt to the soup .
warm up clam soup . add some salt and pepper maybe a pinch . add your potatoes and cook on med .

add the clams .
pour a can of clams and the clam juice into the pot . use a wire whisk to stir the clams and clam juice into the pot .

add the clams .
pour in one can of clams , including the liquid . stir until the ingredients are mixed . pour in the second can of clams , including the liquid . stir until the ingredients are mixed .

add the clams .
add in canned clams and juice . whisk to combine until smooth .

add wine to the pot .
mix up everything in the pot . hold the wine over the pot . slowly pour the wine into the pot .

add wine to the pot .
continue to stir the pot . while stirring , add a bit of wine to the mixture and stir .

add wine to the pot .
use a wooden spoon to stir the ingredients in the pot . pour some cooking wine into the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the wine into the pot .

cook the bacon in a pan .
add the bacon to your hot pan . take a wooden spoon and mix it while it cooks . be careful as it will splatter hot oil at you .

cook the bacon in a pan .
cut the bacon into small pieces . place the pan on the stove . put the cut pieces of bacon in the pan . cook the bacon in the pan .

cook the bacon in a pan .
place the chopped bacon into the pan using a wooden spoon . using the spoon mix up the bacon in the pan .

add the onions .
take a cooking pot on the stove . add some oil in to the pot . cut the onion in to small pieces . add the onions in to the pot . mix them properly with the spoon .

add the onions .
grab a handful of cut up onions . drop it into the pan with the bacon . mix the onions and bacon in the pan with a wooden spoon or spatula . keep mixing so the bacon grease darkens the onions . this bacon grease will help flavor the onions .

add the onions .
boil the bacon in the oil . cut the onions into small cubes . add the onions into the pan .

add butter to the pot .
put some butter into the pot . use your spoon to stir the butter into the mix . make sure to spread the butter all around the pot .

add butter to the pot .
add a chunk of butter to the ingredients simmering in the pot . stir with a spoon until the butter is melted at least halfway .

add butter to the pot .
now we want to take a cube of butter and add it into the pot . let the butter melt at least halfway , and begin stirring it in with your spoon .

pour the soup into a bread bowl .
put a toasted bread bowl on a serving plate . use a spoon to pour the soup into the toasted bread bowl .

pour the soup into a bread bowl .
use a spoon and pour the soup into the bread bowl . fill the bread bowl to the edge with soup .

pour the soup into a bread bowl .
cook the soup in a pot . take a bread and remove the center portion of bread . make a bowl shape in bread . take the soup with a large spoon . add the soup in to the bread bowl .

add sugar and black pepper .
sprinkle in a little bit of sugar . sprinkle in a little bit of black pepper . stir everything together .

add sugar and black pepper .
