" add a teaspoon of sugar to cooking onions - help to brown or caramelize " " onions " " . " ground black pepper is added next . stir it all together .

add sugar and black pepper .
sprinkle sugar on the onions with a small spoon . the sugar adds good flavor to the onions and helps it to caramelize . add a sprinkle of black pepper from a small cup . stir with a wooden spoon to mix in the sugar and pepper .

add the potatoes .
take the potatoes and poor them slowly into the sauce . use a large wooden spoon to stir the food slowly .

add the potatoes .
cut your potatoes into bite sized pieces . add the potatoes to the pot . stir the mixture with a wooden spoon .

add the potatoes .
pick up your bowl of diced potatoes . gently pour the potatoes into the soup . be careful not to splash . get out a wooden spoon . gently stir the potatoes in the soup .

mix in parsley .
throw in some parsley with your hands . with a wooden spoon mix everything together .

mix in parsley .
chop up some parsley . place the chopped parsley on top of the bubbling food . then stir it in slowly before serving .

mix in parsley .
add fresh chopped parsley to the pot . use a wooden spoon to stir the parsley into the soup .

mix in flour .
add flour to the cooking mixture . use a whisk and mix in the flour to the mixture as it cooks .

mix in flour .
pour the flour into the pot with the other ingredients . using a whisk , mix all of the ingredients together .

mix in flour .
put flour into the pot . use a wire whisk to stir the flour in the pot .

take flour in bowl and pour little water in batches and mixing with hand knead dough until medium soft .
prepare your work area ! take your bowl that has flour in it and get a cup filled with water to have beside you . dig a small hole in the middle of your flour . you will pour your water into this hole . while pouring your water count out loud ' one mississippi ' . put your hands in the bowl and start squishing the flour and water together . this is called kneading . if your dough still feels stiff and looks powdery , add another ' 1 mississippi ' of water . keep adding water and kneading the dough until it feels like play dough .

take flour in bowl and pour little water in batches and mixing with hand knead dough until medium soft .
take your flour in a bowl . add a little bit of water to your bowl of flour . mix the water and flour with your hands slowly . keep mixing the flour and water until soft .

take flour in bowl and pour little water in batches and mixing with hand knead dough until medium soft .
make sure your hands are cleaned and dry . pour small amounts of water into the bowl and with your hands mix the water flour together . keep mixing and adding water until you have a dough . you are kneading the dough with your hands . the dough should be medium in softness . the dough should not be hard and should not be sticky .

sprinkle water on top cover the lid and let it aside for 15 minutes .
get your fingers wet . shake the water from your fingers onto the dough . feel to see if dough is a little soft . sprinkle more water if it is n't soft . cover with a lid for 15 minutes .

sprinkle water on top cover the lid and let it aside for 15 minutes .
sprinkle water with your hands onto the dough . cover the dough with a big round lid . wait 15 minutes .

sprinkle water on top cover the lid and let it aside for 15 minutes .
sprinkle a little bit of water onto the dough ball inside the bowl . cover the bowl with a metal plate that fits inside the bowl , and is large enough to cover the dough ball . keep the dough ball under the lid for 15 minutes .

spread flour on pan and take piece of dough coat with flour roll into round shape using rolling pin .
put some flour onto a plate . dip your fingers in the flour . roll dough into a ball and roll into a circle using a rolling pin . keep dipping dough in flour to stop it from sticking .

spread flour on pan and take piece of dough coat with flour roll into round shape using rolling pin .
fill a bowl almost all the way with flour . take the dough we used earlier and pull apart into smaller pieces . these pieces should each be a small ball that would fit in your palm . grab a plate or cutting board and put a few pinches of flour on it . spread flour around plate with your fingers . take one dough ball and place in bowl of flour . evenly coat ball in flour and then place on plate . use your rolling pin to roll into a flat circle . it should be thin , but a little thicker than paper . place round piece of dough in bowl of flour again and coat .

spread flour on pan and take piece of dough coat with flour roll into round shape using rolling pin .
get a bag of flour and carefully put some of it in a bowl . pull a small piece of dough and make a ball with your hands and dunk it in the flour . press the ball between your palms to make it flat and dunk it again in the flour covering both sides . use a rolling pin to roll it and dunk it into the flour again . using the rolling pin , roll the circular dough sheet even thinner .

cook it on the skillet and cook it on both sides by flipping .
roll the dough in to round chapathi . take a skillet on the stove . cook the chapathi on skillet on both sides . now place the chapathi directly on the flame . flip and cook on the other side .

cook it on the skillet and cook it on both sides by flipping .
when one side is light brown then flip it over using tongs , when the other side is light brown remove from skillet . remove skillet from burner and place directly on flame using tongs . flip constantly until it puffs up like a balloon . remove with tongs and place skillet back on burner . use a rolling pin to roll out another one , place on skillet .

cook it on the skillet and cook it on both sides by flipping .
cook it on a skillet , one side and then the other . then after they have been cooked on the skillet you need to set it over a flame . this will made it puff up and made the inside light rather than dense . put it off to the side once all side have been cooked over the flame .

serve it hot with curry .
for best results serve hot . serve with curry on the side .

serve it hot with curry .
serve the hot chapati with chutney . put the hot chapati on a plate with some chutney on the side .

serve it hot with curry .
take the naan and place it on a serving plate . place the side dish of curry on the plate as well . and enjoy !

slice pieces of ham into thin pieces .
take piece of ham . cut ham into thin pieces .

slice pieces of ham into thin pieces .
hold the ham firmly . take a knife and cut the ham in half . now fold it over and cut small strips all the way down .

slice pieces of ham into thin pieces .
put several pieces of deli sliced ham on a cutting board . using a sharp knife , cut the ham slices in half . stack one half of the ham on top of the other . turn the ham so the cut edge is facing you , and slice it into very thin strips .

place the noodles into a bowl of cold water and mix .
add the noodles into a bowl with cold water . use chopsticks to mix the noodles in the cold water .

place the noodles into a bowl of cold water and mix .
add very cold water to a bowl . put the noodles in the cold water and mix them around until they are cooled . drain the water from the noodles .

place the noodles into a bowl of cold water and mix .
use chopsticks to grab the noodles out of the water . put the noodles in the strainer . put cold water over the noodles with a bowl under the strainer .

chop a cucumber into thin slices .
take a cucumber and place on a cutting . then use a sharp knife . cut the cucumber into long , thin slices . gather the cucumbers together and cut into smaller pieces . repeat until all the cucumber is cut .

chop a cucumber into thin slices .
cut a cucumber in half with a knife . cut off the end of the cucumber and set it aside . use the knife to slice the cucumber into very thin strips .

chop a cucumber into thin slices .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . cut the cucumber in to two halves horizontally . take one half of cucumber . cut thin slices of cucumber vertically . repeat the same with other half of cucumber .

chop a tomato into thin slices .
cut the end off of the tomato and discard it . use a knife and cut the tomato into halves . then slice each half into small slices .

chop a tomato into thin slices .
put the tomato on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the tomato into thin slices .

chop a tomato into thin slices .
taking a knife cut the tomato into thin slices . cut the top off of the tomato and place the cut side down . cut it in half and then take the two halves and cut each of them into thin pieces . you should have very thin wedges at the end .

place the noodles on the plate and add the cucumber ham scrambled egg tomato and sauce .
put the drained noodles on the plate . place the cucumber , ham , sliced scrambled eggs , and tomatoes on the noodles in groups . open the sauce packet . pour the sauce all around the food .

place the noodles on the plate and add the cucumber ham scrambled egg tomato and sauce .
now we are going to take our noodles and plate them . we will then take our cucumber , ham and scrambled eggs and arrange them on the plate . also we can add a few slices of tomato on the plate as well . we can then pour our sauce all over the plate .

place the noodles on the plate and add the cucumber ham scrambled egg tomato and sauce .
place the noodles on a plate in the center . place the cucumber on top of the noodles on one side . next place the other chilled ingredients on top of the noodles . poor the sauce evenly on top of the noodles and other ingredients .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
heat a pot of water until it is boiling . add a package of noodles into the boiling water .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
put a pot of water on the stove and bring to a boil . use kitchen scissors to cut open the package of noodles . use your fingers to separate the noodles and put them in the boiling water .

add the noodles to a pot of boiling water .
let the water bubble up fast . add the noodles in the pot of water .

remove onion rings from the pot .
using a large perforated ladle , scoop out your onion rings . make sure not to splash the oil because it can burn . place the onions on a paper towel to drain the oil .

remove onion rings from the pot .
take a straining spoon out to use . the straining spoon will be large with holes in it to drain the oil . put a paper towel onto a plate near the pot . when the onion rings are a golden brown and crispy , slowly use the straining spoon to take them out of the pot . put the onion rings onto the plate with the paper towel . serve immediately , but be careful , they are hot .

remove onion rings from the pot .
using a spoon remove the rings from the pot . place the rings onto a plate .

place onions into a pot with hot oil .
heat up vegetable oil in a pan until bubbling ( or use a deep fryer ) . carefully place the onion into the hot oil and let fry .

place onions into a pot with hot oil .
cut up a onion in slices . heat oil in large pan . dip onion slices in mix . drop carefully and slowly into hot oil . flip over when one side is brown .

place onions into a pot with hot oil .
make sure the oil is hot . drop the battered onions into the hot oil .

mix ingredients in the bowl using a fork .
get a fork and thoroughly mix the ingredients in the bowl . again using the fork , bring the flour in the middle of the bowl towards the sides so that it creates a “ well ” or a “ dip ” in the middle of the bowl .

mix ingredients in the bowl using a fork .
use a fork to mix the flour together with the other ingredients . make a hole in the middle of the ingredients .

mix ingredients in the bowl using a fork .
take a fork and mix the flour around so everything is combined . with the fork make a big hole in the middle of the mixture .

add a cracked egg and cider to the bowl and whisk together .
crack one egg into the flour mixture . pour cider to the mixture . whisk the egg and cider into the mixture until the ingredients are evenly mixed .

add a cracked egg and cider to the bowl and whisk together .
crack an egg and add it to the bowl . add cider or soda water to the bowl . mix together with a whisk . keep whisking until everything is combined .

add a cracked egg and cider to the bowl and whisk together .
crack an egg and put the yolk into the bowl . be careful not to get any of the shell in the bowl . add cider to the mixture . use your whisk and stir the mix until you have a nice mix that is not to thick and not too runny .

dip onions in batter .
after the batter is stirred , it is ready for the onions to be dipped . take each cut onion and dip it in the batter . roll the onion around so it is covered in the batter .

dip onions in batter .
stir batter to appropriate consistency . take one onion ring and roll it in the batter to cover all the sides . let extra batter drip off onion .

dip onions in batter .
place the cut onion rings into the batter . cover rings with batter . next deep fry rings .

add flour salt pepper curry powder into a bowl .
now we will put our flower into our large mixing bowl . lets start by seasoning the flour with some salt and pepper . now we are going add some color to the flour by adding in some mild curry power . this will give a little heat to the dish , but make the batter colorful .

add flour salt pepper curry powder into a bowl .
pour some plain flour into a large bowl . add some salt and pepper to the flour . then add some curry powder to the flour .

add flour salt pepper curry powder into a bowl .
add a cup of flour to a bowl . add a pinch of salt and a little black pepper . add 1 tablespoon of curry powder .

drain and rinse cannellini beans and set aside .
get the liquid out of the beans with a strainer . pour water over the beans .

drain and rinse cannellini beans and set aside .
first drain the beans in a colander . next rinse the beans to rinse off the salt . then set aside the beans aside .

drain and rinse cannellini beans and set aside .
first , grab the strainer and place it over the sink . pour the beans into the strainer and let them drain . rinse the can out and then let the water wash over the beans . this will remove all the extra salt off the beans . now just set them aside , and we will get back to them later .

saute minced garlic until translucent .
add oil into a big pot . add the minced garlic to the pan once the oil starts to heat up . stir it as it sizzles .

saute minced garlic until translucent .
place the pot on the burner . add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pot . turn the heat about halfway ( for medium heat ) , and let oil get hot . add 2 pieces of cut up garlic to the pot . stir the garlic in the pot until the garlic is clear looking .

saute minced garlic until translucent .
put the garlic into the pot . keep stirring the garlic . do n't let it burn . cook it until the garlic gets a little bit see - through .

add tomatoes salt pepper dried oregano dried basil fresh parsley and fresh basil .
pour two 28 ounce cans of tomatoes into the pot . measure half a teaspoon of salt and add to the pot , repeat with half a teaspoon of black pepper . add a teaspoon of dried oregano , repeat with a teaspoon of dried basil . add two tablespoons of chopped parsley , repeat with two tablespoons of fresh chopped basil .

add tomatoes salt pepper dried oregano dried basil fresh parsley and fresh basil .
put 2 big cans of tomato sauce in the pan . also put salt , paper , dried oregano , dried basil , fresh parsley , and fresh basil into the pan .

add tomatoes salt pepper dried oregano dried basil fresh parsley and fresh basil .
open two 28 ounce cans of crushed tomatoes with a can opener and pour tomatoes into pot on the stove . measure out 1/2 teaspoon of kosher salt or sea salt & 1/2 teaspoon of crushed black pepper and add to pot . measure out 1 teaspoon of dried oregano and 1 teaspoon of dried basil and add it to the pot . chop up small amount of fresh italian parsley and fresh basil with either kitchen scissors or a small knife . measure out 1 teaspoon of dried basil and add it to the pot . measure out 2 tablespoons of chopped italian parsley and 2 tablespoons of fresh chopped basil and add them to the pot .

stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil .
turn the dial on the stove to the medium , or 4 - 5 setting . place mixture on the stove . keep stirring the mixture until bubbles come up .

stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil .
stir over a medium flame until you see bubbles start to form . you then turn down the eye to low . let it sit still for 15 min . you want the seasons to blend together . and add more hot stuff to it if you like .

stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil .
stir the sauce in the pot . once the sauce starts to boil turn the heat down to a low setting . let it on the low temperature and cook for 15 - 20 minutes . add pepper or jalapenos at the end if you wish .

reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 - 20 minutes until seasonings and tomatoes are well blended .
lower the heat to a low setting . put a lid on the pan . let it cook for 15 to 20 minutes .

reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 - 20 minutes until seasonings and tomatoes are well blended .
turn the dial to the lowest setting on the stove . then put the cover on the pot . set the timer for 15 minutes .

reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 - 20 minutes until seasonings and tomatoes are well blended .
cover the pot with a lid . turn the stove dial to low to the sauce is barely boiling . wait 15 minutes .

boil a pot of salted water and cook pasta in it .
keep a pot on the stove . add some water in to the bowl and boil the water for some time . add some salt in to the water . take half pound of pasta and add in to pot of boiling water . boil the pasta till it is cooked .

boil a pot of salted water and cook pasta in it .
heat up the pot until the water is bubbling up evenly . use half a box of pasta that says 16 oz .

boil a pot of salted water and cook pasta in it .
put a pot of water on the stove and put it on high . add salt and stir . when the water boils , at pasta . when the pasta is soft , drain the water out .

add drained pasta and beans to tomatoes and cook additional 10 - 15 minutes on low .
add drained pasta into the sauce inside the pan . add beans into the tomatoes in to the pan . mix together everything until all blends well . once beans and pasta is cooked , it is ready to eat .

add drained pasta and beans to tomatoes and cook additional 10 - 15 minutes on low .
drain the pasta . add a 1/2 lb of pasta to the tomato sauce . next add cooked white kidney beans to the mixture . reduce heat and cook for an additional 10 - 15 minutes .

add drained pasta and beans to tomatoes and cook additional 10 - 15 minutes on low .
put your drained pasta into the pan on the stove . add beans to the pan on the stove . stir around the ingredients in the pan . turn the dial to low on the stove . cook the food for another 10 - 15 minutes .

put the beef in a seal bag and add in the marinate in and massage it with hand .
with your hands put the beef into a sealed bag . put the sauce into the bag with your spoon . squeeze the air out of the bag . mix the bag around . with your hands mix the mixture .

put the beef in a seal bag and add in the marinate in and massage it with hand .
get a ziplock bag . pour the beef in the bag . pour the bowl of marinade in the bag . seal the bag and now squish it around with your hands .

put the beef in a seal bag and add in the marinate in and massage it with hand .
place the beef in a bag with a seal . pour in the marinate to the bag . seal the bag . use your hands massage the meat and marinate and mix it all together evenly .

mix ground star anise white pepper ground coriander cinnamon and cloves .
take 1/2 tsp of star anise powder and white pepper powder . take 1/2 tsp of coriander powder . take 1/2 tsp of cinnamon powder and cloves powder . take a medium sized bowl . add all these in to the bowl and mix .

mix ground star anise white pepper ground coriander cinnamon and cloves .
put 1/2 teaspoon of ground star anise into a bowl . add 1/2 teaspoon of white pepper powder . add 1/2 teaspoon of coriander . add 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon of cloves . mix together in the bowl .

mix ground star anise white pepper ground coriander cinnamon and cloves .
now we will add our mixture into the bowl . remember the mixture is made up of ground star anise , white pepper , and ground coriander . it also has some cinnamon and cloves in it . about half a teaspoon of each of these ingredients . now we can add one tablespoon of fish sauce , one tablespoon of white sugar , and one table spoon of plum sauce .

put the cooked beef in between .
use the spoon to scoop up the beef . place the beef into the bottom of the bread .

put the cooked beef in between .
take a bun . take a knife and cut in the middle of bun . take cooked beef in a plate . take a spoon . add the cooked beef in between the buns .

put the cooked beef in between .
with a spoon scoop the beef out . with a spoon scoop the beef onto the bun .

also spread some hoi sin sauce .
use a spatula to scoop up the hoi sin sauce . spread the hoi sin sauce across the bread .

also spread some hoi sin sauce .
take a bread loaf . take some hoisin sauce in a bowl . cut the bread in the middle . take some hoisin sauce with a spreading spatula . add the sauce in between the bread .

also spread some hoi sin sauce .
use a spatula to scoop up some hoisin sauce . spread the sauce over the bread with the spatula .

add herbs and carrot daikon and hot sauce in between and serve .
add some herbs in between the buns . add carrot pieces in to the bun . add daikon pieces in between the buns . add some hot sauce in between the buns . take the bun on a plate and serve .

add herbs and carrot daikon and hot sauce in between and serve .
pick up the herbs with your hand . line up the sandwich with the herbs . do the same with the carrot and daikon . squirt some hot sauce on it .

add herbs and carrot daikon and hot sauce in between and serve .
add the herds across the sandwich evenly . use pickle carrots to place on the sandwich witch is already prepared . pickle it for at least a day . evenly put it on your sandwich with any type of hot sauce . cut in half when done .

cook the marinated beef in a pan .
on a very hot pan , place the slices of marinated beef one by one using a pair of tongs . cook them on both sides till they are brown and caramelized for 1 - 2 minutes . use the tongs to change sides of the beef slices . do not cook for more than 1 - 2 mins . do n't overcook .

cook the marinated beef in a pan .
place the marinated beef into a hot pan . cook beef for 1 to 2 minutes until brown and caramelized .

cook the marinated beef in a pan .
pour the beef out of the bag into the pan . cook while using tongs to move the beef pieces around . cook until they are more brown .

spread some mayo between two buns .
scoop up some of the mayo . use a knife to spread the mayo on the bottom off the bun .

spread some mayo between two buns .
with a knife put some mayo on the knife . spread the mayo on the buns using the knife .

spread some mayo between two buns .
take some mayonnaise in a small bowl . take a bun on the cutting board . cut the bun in the middle . take a spreading knife . spread some mayonnaise in between the buns .

add vegetable oil green onion lime zest and lime juice .
add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil . add chopped green onion . great in some lemon zest . squeeze in some lime juice into the bowl .

add vegetable oil green onion lime zest and lime juice .
use a spoon to add vegetable oil to the bowl . pour in the green onion lime zest and lime juice .

add vegetable oil green onion lime zest and lime juice .
add 2 tbs . vegetable oil . chop green onion in 1 in pieces . grate with small grater only the skin of a lime . this is the zest of a lime . cut lime in half and squeeze juice out into bowl with other ingredients .

slice the squid into rings .
get a knife and slice the squid into rings . be careful not to break it .

slice the squid into rings .
put squid on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the squid into rings .

slice the squid into rings .
slice the squid into rings with your knife . save the tentacles .

add flour salt cayenne pepper and ground black pepper to a container .
add flour to a container . next add cayenne pepper . finally add ground black pepper . mix all of these together until they are all mixed up together .

add flour salt cayenne pepper and ground black pepper to a container .
add the flour to the container . then add salt to the container . next add cayenne pepper . finally add ground black pepper . mix the ingredients in the container .

add flour salt cayenne pepper and ground black pepper to a container .
slowly pour the flour into a container . slowly add some salt cayenne pepper and ground black pepper . mix everything together with a spoon so it looks even .

add the squid to the container put on the lid and shake so that the squid gets covered .
add the squid to the container with the mixture . then put the lid on the container . shake the container with your hands until all the pieces are coated with the mixture .

add the squid to the container put on the lid and shake so that the squid gets covered .
take the pieces of squid and put them into the container . cover the container tightly with a lid . shake the container with your hands until the squid is coated with the ingredients .

add the squid to the container put on the lid and shake so that the squid gets covered .
hold the squid over the container . use a spoon to push the squid in . close the box with a lid and make sure it 's closed tight . shake the box around a lot so the squid is covered all the way .

place the squid into a sifter and set it on a plate .
put the squid into a sifter . hold the sifter over a large bowl . shake the sifter gently so that the extra flour falls through the small holes of the sifter . pour the squid from the sifter onto a plate .

place the squid into a sifter and set it on a plate .
place the squid into a sifter to shake some of the extra flour off . shake the sifter from side to side to remove extra flour on the squid . once the extra flour is sifted off of the squid , place the squid on a plate .

place the squid into a sifter and set it on a plate .
put the flour through sifter on the bowl . put the squid on a different plate .

add the squid into a pot of hot oil .
put the squid into a pot of oil . fry each portion for a few minutes . once it cooks for a few minutes remove it . then place in the next batch or portion of calamari .

add the squid into a pot of hot oil .
heat oil on stove top . add calamari in small batches .

add the squid into a pot of hot oil .
take your basket and pour the squid into the hot boiling oil . leave it in the hot oil for a couple of minutes .

remove the calamari from the pot and set it on a paper towel .
wait for calamari to finish cooking . use the long handle strainer to reach in and pull the calamari out . please calamari on paper towels .

remove the calamari from the pot and set it on a paper towel .
take the calamari from the pot with a strainer . place it onto a paper towel .

remove the calamari from the pot and set it on a paper towel .
take your scoop and scoop the calamari out of the pot . place the calamari on a paper towel . let the calamari cool on the towel .

crush garlic into a bowl of mayonnaise .
find a garlic press . put small pieces of peeled garlic into the press . fold handle down and squeeze the garlic to come out of little holes . hold over into mayonnaise .

crush garlic into a bowl of mayonnaise .
use a crusher . put the garlic into the crusher . squeeze the crusher . with the knife scrape the garlic off the crusher into the bowl .

crush garlic into a bowl of mayonnaise .
use a garlic press to put the garlic in the bowl of mayonnaise by putting the garlic in the cubby . then close the press and squeeze both handles together to crush the garlic . carefully use a knife to scrape any garlic left on the press into the bowl .

squeeze some lemon juice into the bowl .
cut a lemon in half with a knife . squeeze the lemon rind so the juice goes into a container . pour the freshly squeezed lemon juice into your bowl .

squeeze some lemon juice into the bowl .
squeeze lemon so the juice goes in a cup . pour the juice in the other bowl .

squeeze some lemon juice into the bowl .
cut a lemon in half with a knife . take one of the halves and squeeze it over the bowl so that the juice comes out of the lemon .

stir the bowl until all the ingredients are combined .
use a spoon or spatula to mix . mix everything together so it looks the same .

stir the bowl until all the ingredients are combined .
grab a large spoon . then mix ! keep mixing until everything is combined .

stir the bowl until all the ingredients are combined .
add the ingredients to the bowl . mix the ingredients with a spoon until everything is combined .

make a cut into the shrimp pieces .
use raw shrimp . take a sharp knife and slice the back side of the shrimp . it should be cut 3/4 of the way through . " this is called butterflying " " the shrimp . " " . "

make a cut into the shrimp pieces .
take a sharp knife and place it against the back of the shrimp . press the knife into it until you 're half way through .

make a cut into the shrimp pieces .
use a sharp knife down the back side of the shrimp and cut . the cut should be 3 quarters of the way through the shrimp .

cover the shrimp with the tempura and coconut .
take the shrimp by the tail . dip the shrimp in the sauce a few times so its covered . dip the shrimp into the coconut so it is covered in coconut .

cover the shrimp with the tempura and coconut .
take the tempura in a bowl . take the grated coconut in a bowl . take the shrimp with hand . coat the shrimp with tempura by immersing it in the bowl . now immerse the shrimp in coconut and coat it well .

cover the shrimp with the tempura and coconut .
grab the shrimp by the tail . careful , it might be slippery . drop it slowly into the tempura . the tempura is a thick yellow liquid that looks a little bit like mustard . once the shrimp is covered in the tempura , pick it up and let the extra tempura drip off of it . dip the shrimp into the shredded coconut . the shredded coconut is white and looks slightly like shredded white cheese . make sure you roll the shrimp several times in the coconut until you cover every part of it .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
make sure the pan is preheated . put 1/4 inch of peanut oil in the bottom of the pan . you may need to add more oil as you continue cooking . add the shrimp to the pan . cook for about 2 minutes per side . they should turn out golden brown . you can flip the shrimp by the tails or use a spatula if you prefer .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
put the shrimp in pan of hot peanut oil . let cook on one side for about two minutes , then flip to cook the other side . cook the other side for about 2 minutes until golden brown . take shrimp out of pan and put on serving plate .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
cover the bottom of a pan in oil so that it is a little deep and heat it up . once the oil is hot put your shrimp into the oil . when the shrimp gets golden brown on the bottom , flip them over . allow the shrimp to get golden brown and remove them from the pan . you may need to add oil to cook more shrimp , turn of stove when done .

place the shrimp on paper towel to dry .
take the shrimp out of the pan . place on a paper towel to dry .

place the shrimp on paper towel to dry .
take a paper towel on a plate . take the shrimp . place the shrimp on the paper towel . add shrimp one by one . repeat the same with all the remaining shrimp .

place the shrimp on paper towel to dry .
place down a paper town onto a place . take the shrimp by the tails and put them one by one on the paper towels .

plate the shrimp with a bowl of orange chili sauce .
put the cooked shrimp on a plate . put some orange chili sauce in a little bowl . put the sauce on the plate with the shrimp .

plate the shrimp with a bowl of orange chili sauce .
place shrimp on one side of plate . fill a small cup with orange chili sauce . place cup on one side of plate .

plate the shrimp with a bowl of orange chili sauce .
put a small bowl of orange chili sauce on the plate . put the shrimp on the plate around the bowl . now it 's ready to serve ! dip the shrimp in the chili and enjoy !

cut 3 inch off the skewers .
what you need to get : a ruler , a pen , 6 wooden skewers and a pair of kitchen shears . start at the pointed end of a skewer and measure and mark 3 inches . carefully cut the skewer at that 3 inch mark . use the 3 inch piece you just cut to mark all of the other skewers . carefully cut each remaining skewer into 3 inch pieces .

cut 3 inch off the skewers .
the skewers are too long get some reliable pliers and cut the skewers down to a desired length . set the skewers aside .

cut 3 inch off the skewers .
get a ruler or measuring tape to measure 3 inches if you can not make a close guess with your eyes . you may want to measure from the bottom up and make a mark at the three inch line . carefully cut the skewers with some wire cutters or scissors on the three inch mark . watch your fingers . if you are a child , you will want an adult 's help .

let it soak in water for 30 minutes .
put some water in a medium sized bowl . placed wooden sticks in the bowl . let sticks soak for 30 minutes .

let it soak in water for 30 minutes .
take a medium sized bowl . add some water in to the bowl . take some sticks . place the sticks in the water . let it soak for 30 minutes .

let it soak in water for 30 minutes .
fill a bowl with water . soak the wooden skewers in the water for about 30 minutes .

mix corn flour all purpose flour and sugar together in a large bowl .
take a large bowl . add half cup of corn flour in to the bowl . add half cup of all purpose flour in to the bowl . add 3 table spoons of sugar in to the bowl . mix every thing in the bowl .

mix corn flour all purpose flour and sugar together in a large bowl .
mix corn flour , flour , and sugar into a bowl . stir together .

mix corn flour all purpose flour and sugar together in a large bowl .
take an small clean bowl . find an small tablespoon for pouring ingredients . in a large bowl add 1 1/2 cup bowl . 1/2 cup all purpose flour . finally pour into the bowl 3 tablespoon of sugar .

take 1/2 cup butter milk add to the bowl and mix .
open the container of buttermilk . pour buttermilk into the measuring up until it is even with the 1 - 1/2 cup measurement . pour the buttermilk from the measuring up into the bowl . mix the buttermilk into the batter with a whisk until you ca n't see any more of the buttermilk separate from the batter .

take 1/2 cup butter milk add to the bowl and mix .
measure out 1 and 1/2 cup of buttermilk . pour the buttermilk into the bowl . use a whisk to stir in the milk until the batter is smooth .

take 1/2 cup butter milk add to the bowl and mix .
pour the buttermilk into a measuring cup labeled 1/2 cup and fill it to the top . pour the buttermilk after it has been measured int the bowl . mix with a whisk .

cut hot dogs in halves and coat them with the flour .
line up the hot dogs so that their long edges are touching . line up your knife so that it can cut all of the hot dogs in half at the same time . cut the hot dogs in half .

cut hot dogs in halves and coat them with the flour .
ask an adult to help you if you 're unsure how to cut food ! once you seek help , carefully select a knife using proper knife safety . you are about to cut the hot dogs in half , making them shorter . if you can not use a sharp knife , a butter knife or fork can work since the hot dogs are very soft and easy to cut . you can even break them in half . get you flour ready by putting it in a bowl or on a plate . roll your hot dogs in the flour mixture until covered all over . make sure to get all of the hot dog covered . you are ready for the next step !

cut hot dogs in halves and coat them with the flour .
line the hot dogs next to each other . cut the hot dogs in the middle , all together , with a sharp knife .

coat the dogs with the liquid mixture again .
grab your dogs and roll them into your flour . now you want to use your skewers , which are small pointy sticks . make sure the pointy sides go into the bottom side your dogs . grab your dogs and dip them into the liquid batter . it is kind of a yellow color . make sure the dogs are completely covered . set your dogs inside your batter with the sticks sticking up .

coat the dogs with the liquid mixture again .
cover the hot dogs in flower until they 're completely covered . carefully push the stick into the hot dog . use the stick to hold the hot dog and gently dip into the batter . try to coat the entire hot dog by covering all the sides with the batter .

coat the dogs with the liquid mixture again .
roll the dogs in the powder until they 're covered in it . push the sticks into one end of the dogs . holding the stick , gently dip the dog end into the batter .

fry the dogs in the oil .
make sure the oil is preheated to 350 degrees f. . place the battered hotdogs into the oil . once the batter becomes a golden brown , remove them from the oil . serve afterwards .

fry the dogs in the oil .
use a cooking thermometer to make sure the oil is heated to 350 degrees . gently lower each uncooked corn dog into the heated oil , making sure not to splash the hot oil . use metal tongs to turn the corn dogs as they cook in the oil . remove the corn dogs from the oil with metal tongs when the corn dogs are golden brown .

fry the dogs in the oil .
carefully place the dogs in the oil with your hands . with the tongs , carefully turn them over . when browned on the outside . remove them with the tongs and set on plate .

add chicken broth and soy sauce into a bowl .
use a ladle to spoon the broth into a bowl . add three tablespoons of soy sauce to the bowl .

add chicken broth and soy sauce into a bowl .
scoop out some chicken broth and put it into a bowl . pour 3 teaspoons of soy sauce into the bowl .

add chicken broth and soy sauce into a bowl .
use a large ladle to slowly add the broth to your bowl from your pot . add three table spoons of soy sauce to your broth . you can either use a small ladle to measure the soy sauce or a measuring spoon to measure three table spoons .

add water to the pot and boil for three hours .
now we are going to add in our water . once you have the water in the pot , we will let the pot boil the ingredients for around 3 hours .

add water to the pot and boil for three hours .
take a large pot . place it on the stove . add some water in to the pot . on the stove . boil the water for about 3 hours .

add water to the pot and boil for three hours .
add water to the pot . boil the water and the ingredients for 3 hours .

drop the ramen noodles into boiling water .
pick up the bunch of ramen noodles with your hand . drop the noodles into a strainer . slowly lower the strainer into to boiling water . while cooking use chopsticks to move the noodles around . be careful of the hot steam . cook the noodles for about two minutes .

drop the ramen noodles into boiling water .
put the ramen noodles into a basket . lower the basket into the boiling water .

drop the ramen noodles into boiling water .
put the ramen noodles in a noodle strainer . lower the strainer of noodles into the boiling water .

add oil to a pan over heat .
place a wok on the stove over high heat . add oil to the hot wok to coat the bottom and sides .

add oil to a pan over heat .
now we will pour our oil all around the pan / wok . we are adding in around 6 tablespoons worth .

add oil to a pan over heat .
pour oil into the middle of the pan . make sure the stove heat is on high .

add bonito flakes seaweed and green onion to the pot and boil .
wash the green onion and cut the ends off with a knife . add the broth to a pot . place the pot on the stove . add the seaweed flakes to the mixture . bring the mixture to a boil until done .

add bonito flakes seaweed and green onion to the pot and boil .
put bonito flakes into the pot . add seaweed . put green onions to the pot . stir the pot and boil the ingredients .

add bonito flakes seaweed and green onion to the pot and boil .
take a large pot on the stove . add 2 bonito flakes in to the pot . add 2 seaweed sheets in to the pot . add some green onions in to the pot . boil the contents in the pot .

separate the ramen noodles by hand .
use your hands to massage the noodles . separate the noodles as you toss them .

separate the ramen noodles by hand .
you will need to massage the noodles by hand , separating them . gently separate the strands from each other and fluff the noodles .

separate the ramen noodles by hand .
pick up the ramen noodles and place them back down . pull them and fluff them in order to separate the ramen noodles .

add water to the pan and boil the pork .
add water to the pan with pork in it . boil the pork in the water for 1 hour .

cut the pork into small slices with a knife .
after the pork has boiled for one hour it is ready to be cut up . place the pork on to a cutting board . hold one end of the pork and slowly cut off thin slices with a knife .

cut the pork into small slices with a knife .
make sure the pork has cooked for one . hour . find a long sharp kitchen knife . cut the roll from the ends into thin round slices .

cut the pork into small slices with a knife .
take the boiled pork , be careful , it might be hot ! put the pork on a cutting board . take a big sharp knife . slice the pork carefully about quarter inch thick slices .

roll a piece of pork and tie it closed .
put gloves on so your hands do not touch he raw meat . on the cutting board , roll the meat up long ways . roll until the meat is one circle . once the meat is all rolled up , use a piece of twine to tie the meat . tie the meat by wrapping the twine around the meat , and tying a knot .

roll a piece of pork and tie it closed .
roll the piece of pork on the counter . tie the piece of pork with a string .

roll a piece of pork and tie it closed .
cut the skin off of the pork . roll the piece of pork and use string to tie it .

pour the bacon into the pot . take a pepper grinder and grind pepper into the pot .

add the bacon and pepper to the pot .
after you add the cream and butter , it may be dry . potato cooking water can help the stew not taste as dry . be conservative in the amount of salt . add black pepper . transfer to another pot .

add the bacon and pepper to the pot .

add the cabbage and water to a pan .
add cabbage to the pan . add water to the pan .

toss the green onions into the pot . stir the green onions into the pot with the other ingredients .

hold the bowl of onions over the pot . carefully pour the onions in the pot .

add cream and butter to a pot .
add cream to the pot . add butter to the pot . with a wooden spoon mix together .

add cream and butter to a pot .
from the fridge , get butter and cream also grab the smaller glass measuring cup . find the , one ( 1 ) cup amount on the glass side so you 'll know beforehand where to pour the cream to then go ahead and slowly pour to one cup . go to sauce pan on stove and carefully pour cream into pan . remove packaging from butter and place butter in pan also . using a wooden long handled spoon , stir slowly so cream and butter do n't burn or scald .

add cream and butter to a pot .
pour the cup of cream into the pot . cut a piece of butter with a spoon and put it in the pot .

when everything is in the pot get a masher . use the masher to smash the ingredients in the pot .

slice the pork into thin pieces .
put the pork belly on your cutting board . with your knife , slice your pork belly thinly .

slice the pork into thin pieces .
put the pork on a cutting board . cut the pork thinly . put the pork onto a plate .

slice the pork into thin pieces .
take a knife or a kid safe cutting knife . take the pork piece and lay them the long way . with the knife and a grownup 's help , take the knife and slowly cut pork on the long side . slowly cut pork the long way into long pieces . keep cutting the pork until it is all cut up into long pieces .

chop the garlic thai chili green onion into small pieces and add to a bowl .
cut 2 cloves of garlic into very small pieces . cut thai chili pepper into very small pieces . cut green onion into very small pieces . put cut garlic , pepper and onion in a bowl .

chop the garlic thai chili green onion into small pieces and add to a bowl .
use a sharp knife but keep your fingers out of the way on top of the blade . cut 2 cloves of garlic into small pieces carefully and put them in a bowl . cut one thai chili into small pieces and put them into a bowl . be careful not to touch the chili with your fingers . use the knife to put it in the bowl . cut the green onion into small pieces and add it to the bowl .

chop the garlic thai chili green onion into small pieces and add to a bowl .
get an adult to help you with a knife . do not use a knife without an adult present . if you want to chop without an adult get a metal butter knife or a plastic knife . peel the garlic and cut it . cut 2 of the small parts . cut the chili pepper from thailand with the plastic knife . cut one green onion . add all cut things to a bowl .

add sugar black pepper fish sauce and coconut water to the bowl .
add 1 tablespoon of sugar to the ingredients in the bowl . add a small amount of black pepper , about 1/8 of a teaspoon . add 1 tablespoon of fish sauce . add 2 tablespoons of coconut water . mix together with a spoon .

add sugar black pepper fish sauce and coconut water to the bowl .
to a bowl add one table spoon of sugar , add some black pepper , one tablespoon of fish sauce , and two table spoons of coconut water . mix the dressing well .

add sugar black pepper fish sauce and coconut water to the bowl .
get a large bowl and tablespoon measure . add 1 tablespoon of sugar , 1 tablespoon of fish sauce , 2 tablespoons of coconut water and little bit of pepper into the large bowl . stir with a spoon until everything looks mixed together .

slice the cucumber and jalapeno into thin pieces .
place the cucumber in the center of the cutting board . use the knife to cut the cucumber diagonally into thin slices . move the cucumber slices to the corner of the cutting board . place the jalapeno in the center of the cutting board . use the knife to cut the jalapeno diagonally into thin slices .

slice the cucumber and jalapeno into thin pieces .
slice the cucumber into thin slices with a knife . slice the jalapeno into slices with a knife .

slice the cucumber and jalapeno into thin pieces .
using a sharp knife slice cucumber into thin round slices . do the same with the jalapeno .

add the pork to a pan of hot oil .
turn on a stove top burner to med high . add some oil to a frying pan til it gets hot but not boiling . then add the pork slowly and carefully so the oil does n't splash on you . let it cook for a few minutes , then carefully lift one end of one piece to look at the underside . if it is brown enough , turn turn all piece over and finish cooking .

add the pork to a pan of hot oil .
with adult supervision take pork and add to pot . watch out for oil as it might splash out of pot .

add the pork to a pan of hot oil .
put your pork into a lowering utensil . put the pork into the hot oil .

remove the pork from the pan and place on paper towel .
take the pork out of the pan . place the pork on a paper towel .

remove the pork from the pan and place on paper towel .
take the cooked pork out of the pot with a wire basket . put it on a paper towel . increase the heat to medium or medium high .

remove the pork from the pan and place on paper towel .
remove the pork from the pan and place on a paper towel . this will allow the excess oil to be removed from the pork .

add the pork back into the hot oil .
slowly lower 2 or 3 pieces of meat into the hot oil with a slotted metal spoon . stir the meat with wooden tongs to keep from sticking together . keep adding meat 2 or 3 pieces at a time until all the meat is browned . remember to stir after each time you add meat . work slowly so you do n't splash hot oil and burn yourself .

add the pork back into the hot oil .
with spider ( or web shaped strainer ) scoop up pork . add slowly back into oil .

add the pork back into the hot oil .
place oil in pot . turn on burner . wait until oil is hot . add pork slowly . stir for equal cooking .

cut the bread lengthwise with a knife .
set a cutting board on the counter . get a sharp knife . set the bread on the cutting board . start cutting down the middle of the bread with the knife . go slow so that you do n't cut yourself .

cut the bread lengthwise with a knife .
use a knife with a serrated or non - straight blade . cut the bread from one end to the other on the side , so that it opens in half like a book .

cut the bread lengthwise with a knife .
being careful of the sharp knife , cut the bread down the middle from one end to the other . make sure you use a chopping board so you do n't damage the counter !

remove the pork from the hot oil .
using a spoon that has holes in it , or a strainer , scoop the pork out of the hot oil . make sure the oil has stopped dripping before moving the spoon away from the pot . also , make sure not to touch the oil as it will be very hot !

remove the pork from the hot oil .
use a deep fry skimmer to remove the pork from the pan with oil and pork . place the pork in a plate with paper towel .

remove the pork from the hot oil .
if the pork is brown enough on both sides then take a slotted spoon and carefully lift some out of the oil . let the excess oil drip into the pan for a few seconds , then put on a plate that has several layers of paper towels on it . keep removing the pork until all is out of the oil . turn off the burner . pat pork on top with more paper towels to absorb more grease , then serve .

add the pork to the bowl with the dressing .
add the pork to the bowl of dressing you just made . be sure to mix the pork and dressing together really well .

add the pork to the bowl with the dressing .
put the pork meat into the bowl with the dressing . use a spoon to mix the pork into the dressing .

add the pork to the bowl with the dressing .
place your pork into the bowl with your dressing . use a spoon to mix it together really good .

add mayonnaise maggi sauce cucumber pork pickled radish and carrot jalapeno chicory and cilantro to the bread .
line the bread with mayonnaise and maggi sauce . line the bread with cucumber on one side . add the pork then the pickled radish and carrot . next add the jalapeno , chicory , and cilantro . .

add mayonnaise maggi sauce cucumber pork pickled radish and carrot jalapeno chicory and cilantro to the bread .
add mayonnaise to the bread and spread . add maggi sauce and cucumber slices to the bread . add pork slices and pickled radish in to the bread . add carrot , jalapeno and chicory in to the bread . add cilantro in to the bread .

add mayonnaise maggi sauce cucumber pork pickled radish and carrot jalapeno chicory and cilantro to the bread .
squeeze the mayonnaise across the bun . use a spoon to spread the mayonnaise evenly . squeeze maggi sauce over the bread . only use a small amount . place pork , pickles , radish , carrots , jalapenos , chicory and cilantro on the bread next . the jalapenos is optional , you do n't have to use it .

add sriracha sauce to the sandwich .
squeeze sriracha bottle over sandwich . spread sauce in an even layer .

add sriracha sauce to the sandwich .
point bottle of sriracha sauce down at once end of sandwich . then with a back and forth motion squeeze out desired amount in zig - zags .

add sriracha sauce to the sandwich .
take the bottle of sriracha . squeeze the bottle and squirt sauce onto sandwich . make lines up and down the sandwich .

rinse the dried garbanzo beans thoroughly under running water .
get a colander and pour the garbanzo beans into it . turn on the cold water at the sink . put the colander under the faucet and let the water pour over the beans . gently shake the colander to make sure all the beans get washed . when all the beans have been rinsed , turn off the faucet and gently shake the colander to get any extra water off the beans .

rinse the dried garbanzo beans thoroughly under running water .
place container of beans in sink . turn on water to run into container over beans . move them around with your hand to get them all clean . continue this until they all beans have been rinsed good .

rinse the dried garbanzo beans thoroughly under running water .
get garbanzo beans . turn on cold water . rinse 1 pound of dried garbanzo beans thoroughly . discard and discolored or bad beans . remove anything that is not a bean .

cover the beans with cold water and allow it to soak overnight .
pour beans into clean bowl . pour water into bowl totally covering all the beans . make sure to check on the water a couple of times because the beans will absorb the water . when the water is low , add more to submerge the beans again .

cover the beans with cold water and allow it to soak overnight .
once you have cleaned all of the beans , cover them with cold water . let the beans soak over night in the water . check on them a few times because you will need to add a little water to them . to begin the next day , prep the other ingredients you will need for this dish .

cover the beans with cold water and allow it to soak overnight .
pour the clean beans in a large bowl . pour water into the bowl until the beans are completely covered . the beans will get bigger as they soak so check them several times . add more water so the beans stay covered with water . let the beans stay in the water all night .

cut the onions and potatoes mince 4 cloves of garlic and squeeze 2 tsp of lemon juice .
you are going to cut up the onions into small squares . cut up the potatoes into small cubes . squeeze lemon juice from lemon .

cut the onions and potatoes mince 4 cloves of garlic and squeeze 2 tsp of lemon juice .
get a pot and add water . quarter one onion into 4 pieces . peel and quarter one potato into 4 pieces . cut up 4 cloves of garlic into tiny pieces . squeeze two teaspoons of fresh lemon juice from lemon .

cut the onions and potatoes mince 4 cloves of garlic and squeeze 2 tsp of lemon juice .
cut onion straight down the middle then cut those two pieces in the middle so you will have 4 equal pieces . peel all brown skin off a potato and cut the potato in half . take those 2 half 's and cut in the middle . take 4 cloves of garlic and cut into very small pieces . you should end up with about 12 per garlic glove . cut a lemon in half and take one half and squeeze the lemon to get 2 teaspoons of lemon juice .

rinse and drain the soaked garbanzo beans and add it into the food processor .
put the garbanzo beans in a bowl . rinse the beans with fresh water , and then drain the water you added from them . then you will place the garbanzo beans into the bowl of your food processor .

rinse and drain the soaked garbanzo beans and add it into the food processor .
squeeze lemon over bowl of garbanzo beans . take bowl of garbanzo beans and rinse over water . take rinsed beans and put into the food processor .

rinse and drain the soaked garbanzo beans and add it into the food processor .
put the garbanzo beans in a strainer . rinse the beans in the strainer under running water . gently shake the strainer to remove any water . now put the garbanzo beans into the food processor .

add cut onion and potato into the food processor and grind it until finely chopped .
cut up onion into small pieces . cut potato into large pieces . add onion first . add potato second . add to process & cover it till its chopped all the way .

add cut onion and potato into the food processor and grind it until finely chopped .
put the onion in the food processor . then put the potatoes in too . put the lid on the processor , make sure it 's on tight . turn the food processor on until the onion and potatoes are blended together . they should look like lumpy mashed potatoes .

add cut onion and potato into the food processor and grind it until finely chopped .
get out food processor . put beans into bowl of processor . cut onion into 6 pieces and add to bowl of processor . cut potato into pieces and add to bowl . cover bowl with lid and mix until finely chopped .

pour the bean mixture into a bowl and retain one cup of it in the processor .
take the lid off of the processor and remove the bowl from the machine . pour the bean mixture into a mixing bowl . leave one cup of the bean mixture in the processor .

pour the bean mixture into a bowl and retain one cup of it in the processor .
pour the bean mixture into a bowl . once it 's all in the bowl , take one cup of the bean mixture and put it back into the processor for the next step .

pour the bean mixture into a bowl and retain one cup of it in the processor .
pour the bean mixture into a mixing bowl . make sure you leave about one cup of it in the processor bowl .

add garlic cilantro coriander ground cumin salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper and blend .
add garlic to bowl of processor . add 1/2 cup of cilantro leaves . add 1 teaspoon of coriander and 1 teaspoon of cumin . add 2 teaspoon of salt , 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper , and 1/2 teaspoon of cayenne pepper . mix the mixture in the processor until blended together .

add garlic cilantro coriander ground cumin salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper and blend .
add your garlic to the processor bowl . then add half a cup of cilantro leaves . then you will add 1 tsp of ground coriander and one 1 tsp of ground cumin . 2 tsps of salt , 1/2 tsp of black pepper , and 1/2 tsp of cayenne pepper needs to be added . finally , process all of these ingredients together .

add garlic cilantro coriander ground cumin salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper and blend .
add garlic to processor bowl . add 1/2 cup of cilantro leaves to processor . add 1 teaspoon of ground coriander and 1 teaspoon of ground cumin . add 2 teaspoons of salt , 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper and 1/2 teaspoon of cayenne pepper . mix this mixture in the processor until blended thoroughly .

add the garbanzo bean mixture lemon juice olive oil and flour to the food processor and process .
add the mixed garbanzo beans back until the food processor . add one tablespoon lemon juice . add one tablespoon olive oil then one tablespoon flour . turn the processor back on until you get an oatmeal texture .

add the garbanzo bean mixture lemon juice olive oil and flour to the food processor and process .
blend mixture together . put lemon juice next with olive oil . then flower is added . process till it resembles a meal . eat !

add the garbanzo bean mixture lemon juice olive oil and flour to the food processor and process .
once the mixture is blended , add the bean mixture back to the processor bowl . add the lemon juice . add 1 tbsp olive oil . add 1 tbsp of flour . turn on the processor until the mixture is thick .

transfer the mixture into a bowl and refrigerate it .
once everything is mixed together in the food processor . take lid off of processor . transfer the falafel mix from processor to mixing bowl . cover the mixing bowl . refrigerate the mixture for at least two hours .

transfer the mixture into a bowl and refrigerate it .
put the falafel mixture into a bowl . place bowl with falafel mix into the refrigerator .

transfer the mixture into a bowl and refrigerate it .
place the mixture in a bowl . cover with bowl with clear plastic wrap . place bowl in refrigerator for 2 hours or longer .

add baking soda and stir until well blended .
with mixture in the bowl . add 2 teaspoons of baking soda . with wooden spoon mix together . make sure you mix baking soda in well . get ready to cook the mixture .

add baking soda and stir until well blended .
we need to cook the falafel . add 2 teaspoon of baking soda . mix with the help of a spatula . we can get a very tasty dish from this .

add baking soda and stir until well blended .
add 2 teaspoons of baking soda into the mixture . stir the baking soda well until it is well blended with the mixture .

form the falafel balls and place them on a baking sheet .
wet your hands . scoop the falafel dough with a scoop . roll the falafel dough into a ball with your hands . put the balls onto the pan . make sure the falafel balls are not touching .

form the falafel balls and place them on a baking sheet .
get a bowl of water . dampen your hands . form falafel ball into balls . balls should be 1 1/2 inches around . place on a parchment paper lined baking sheet .

form the falafel balls and place them on a baking sheet .
wet your hands in a bowl . take some of the batter and form it into bite sized balls . place the balls onto a baking sheet . make sure the baking sheet is lined with parchment paper .

heat the oil and fry the falafel balls until golden brown .
poor oil only 1 - 2 inches deep . let oil get hot . put falafels in oil . cook them 4 at a time and turn frequently . eat them up .

heat the oil and fry the falafel balls until golden brown .
pour oil into a pot until it is filled 2 inches deep . heat the oil over medium high heat or to 350 degrees fahrenheit . place the balls into the hot oil . fry them until golden brown , for 5 minutes each batch . turn them as they cook , so the other side can brown too .

heat the oil and fry the falafel balls until golden brown .
turn the burner heat setting to medium high heat to heat oil . read thermometer temperature . oil is ready once it reaches 365 degrees . place 4 - 5 falafels into oil slowly with a spoon . flip them around with your spoon every few seconds . leave in oil 5 minutes and remove with spoon carefully once golden brown .

finely chop the garlic and parsley and grate some parmesan cheese .
use a chopping knife , place garlic down and chop it into small pieces . chop the parsley into small pieces . use a grater and cut the parmesan cheese into small pieces . boil some water in a pot . add all the ingredients together after you boil the noodles and make them soft . drain the water out pot then add other ingredients into the pot .

finely chop the garlic and parsley and grate some parmesan cheese .
cut the garlic carefully using the knife . cut the parsley with the knife into small pieces . take the cheese and place it against the grater and motion up and down to grate the cheese .

finely chop the garlic and parsley and grate some parmesan cheese .
cut one piece garlic and parsley into very small pieces . grate the parmesan cheese using a grater . cook the pasta .

cook the spaghetti in salted water .
get a large pot and fill it half way with water . put pot on a burner and turn the burner on . bring water to a boil . measure the amount of salt that the pasta packet calls for . put the salt into the water and then stand the pasta up in the water .

cook the spaghetti in salted water .
cook the spaghetti in a large pot of water . make sure to add salt to the water . follow the instructions on the packet for the pasta .

cook the spaghetti in salted water .
pour water into a large pot and place it on the stove . turn the stove top dial to the highest setting . when the water begins to boil with a lot of steam and bubbles , add a pinch of salt . slowly place your pasta into the salted boiling water . let the pasta cook for however long it says on the outside of the package .

heat olive oil in a pan and fry pancetta until it turns brown .
while the pasta boils on the stove , pour the olive oil in a large frying pan and turn the heat on medium . put the pancetta in the frying pan , and then put the garlic in the frying pan . cook the pancetta and garlic in the frying pan by stirring until the pancetta begins to turn brown . when the pancetta turns brown , turn the heat under the frying pan to low .

heat olive oil in a pan and fry pancetta until it turns brown .
add olive oil in a pan in a circular motion covering about 1/4 of the bottom of the pan . add the pancetta and garlic in the pan using a spatula to help scrape ingredients out of the container and into the pan . fry the pancetta by turning it over with the spatula until it is brown and crisp looking . lower the heat when cooked .

heat olive oil in a pan and fry pancetta until it turns brown .
heat olive oil in a pan . fry the pancetta in the pan until it turns brown . be sure to stir it .

lightly beat the eggs with cream grated cheese and season it with black pepper .
take a bowl and break open an egg in to the bowl . beat the egg and add cream . add grated cheese in to the bowl . add black pepper in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

lightly beat the eggs with cream grated cheese and season it with black pepper .
put eggs in bowl and use a wire whisk to beat . add cream to eggs and add grated cheese use whisk to beat . add some black pepper to the egg , cream and cheese mixture and mix well .

lightly beat the eggs with cream grated cheese and season it with black pepper .
put the eggs in a bowl with cream and grated cheese . mix with a whisk until its all combined . add black pepper .

drain the spaghetti then mix it with the pancetta egg and cream .
first drain the spaghetti in the strainer . keep 3 tablespoons of the cooking water to the side . add the spaghetti to the pan of pancetta . add egg and cream over the spaghetti . mix well over low heat .

drain the spaghetti then mix it with the pancetta egg and cream .
drain the spaghetti by lifting strainer out of pot . put a few tablespoons of pasta cooking water to the side . put spaghetti in pan with the pancetta . pour the egg and cream mixture over the top of the spaghetti and pancetta . mix well over low heat , add some pasta water if needed .

drain the spaghetti then mix it with the pancetta egg and cream .
drain the cooked spaghetti and set aside a few tablespoons of the cooking water . add spaghetti to the pan with the pancetta in it . pour the egg and cream mixture over the spaghetti and pancetta . mix everything together over love heat in the pan . if need bee add the cooking water . be sure to do this over low heat .

sprinkle parsley and cheese before serving .
divide the pasta into two bowls . sprinkle parsley on pasta . sprinkle on cheese on top .

sprinkle parsley and cheese before serving .
put parsley and parmesan cheese on he spaghetti . serve .

sprinkle parsley and cheese before serving .
have two bowls ready for spaghetti . divide spaghetti into the bowls . with hands use a pinch of parsley on top . along with a pinch of some remaining cheese . placing the parsley and cheese on top for decoration .

as the water boils add choi sum stems and cook before setting aside .
add the stems to the boiling water pan . after 20 seconds add the vegetables to the water . when the color changes to a darker green , remove them from the water .

as the water boils add choi sum stems and cook before setting aside .
put the stems into the boiling water . cook until they are darker green and remove from pan .

as the water boils add choi sum stems and cook before setting aside .
put in the choi sum stems when the water is boiling . allow it to cook . set it aside when it is done cooking .

add the cooked noodles to the sauce mix toss and mix well to incorporate the sauce .
take a pan on the stove . add the sauce mix in the pan . add the noodles in to the sauce . mix the noodles well . coat the noodles with sauce mix properly .

add the cooked noodles to the sauce mix toss and mix well to incorporate the sauce .
take all of the noodles and place them in the sauce pan . stir the noodles around so that the sauce in the pan mixes with the noodles . take the noodles back out of the pan and place them in the bowl .

add the cooked noodles to the sauce mix toss and mix well to incorporate the sauce .
pick up the plate that has the noodles on it . gently add the noodles to the pan on the stove . using a utensil such as spoon , stir the noodled until they 're covered in sauce . lift the noodles carefully , allowing extra sauce to drip back into pan . carefully transfer the noodles from a pan into a bowl .

boil some water in a pot add egg noodles and cook them .
take the noodles into a pot of boiling water . boil the noodles for 2 minutes .

boil some water in a pot add egg noodles and cook them .
put water in a small pot and heat to boiling . add the egg noodles to the boiling water . cook the noodles for two minutes , stirring occasionally .

boil some water in a pot add egg noodles and cook them .
put a pot of water on the stove . turn the heat up on the stove knob until the water is bubbling up fast . add the egg noodles with your hands and cook .

serve with char siew wonton soup and pickled green chilies .
once you have your plate set , you will want to move on to the char siew wonton soup . now set the soup on the side and get ready to add the most important ingredient . pickled green chilies should always go along with the wonton soup .

serve with char siew wonton soup and pickled green chilies .
put some of your sliced char siew next to the noodles . put a small amount of wonton soup into a tiny bowl . put a few pickled green chilies on a very tiny dish .

serve with char siew wonton soup and pickled green chilies .
eating begins with your eyes . make sure your plate is served as attractively as possible to delight your diners . place the main dish in the middle of the plate with the greens to one side and the char siew spread out attractively on the other side of the noodles . place the wonton soup to the left of the plate in a small bowl filled two thirds full . your wonton noodles will not be complete without the wonton soup . in malayasia , when there are wonton noodles , you must have pickled green chili . take a spoon and place a large spoonful into a small white porcelain dish .

transfer the noodles to a plate and place blanched choi sum .
grab the noodles out of the pan with a spatula . place the noodles in a plate with the spatula . grab bok choy with chop sticks and place on the plate .

transfer the noodles to a plate and place blanched choi sum .
take your noodles out of the pan and set them onto your plate . we will then assemble everything . take your vegetables and place the blanched choi sum next to the noodles .

transfer the noodles to a plate and place blanched choi sum .
put your finished noodles onto a plate . add a couple pieces of your green vegetables to the plate .

add some salt and sugar and the prepared garlic oil to the sauce and stir .
add some salt into the pan . add sugar into the pan . squeeze the garlic to get the oil out of it . add all the components to the sauce . mix all the ingredients together .

add some salt and sugar and the prepared garlic oil to the sauce and stir .
add some salt and sugar to the pan . turn the temperature of the stove to low heat . pour the garlic oil into the sauce . use the chopsticks to stir the mixture together in the pan .

add some salt and sugar and the prepared garlic oil to the sauce and stir .
sake in some salt and sugar . turn the heat knob to low . add the garlic oil to the sauce and stir with chopsticks .

add some water to the pan and bring it to boil .
add water to a hot pan . turn the heat up high enough to bring the water to a boil .

add some water to the pan and bring it to boil .
pour some water into a hot pan . let the water come to a boil .

add some water to the pan and bring it to boil .
add water to the pan . turn the heat up until the water boils .

heat oil in a wok and saute chopped garlic .
get a wok or a skillet . place it on the stove and turn the heat to medium high . when the wok is hot , pour the oil in . add the garlic to the oil and stir it around with a wooden spoon . cook for only a minute . remove the garlic and put it in a small bowl .

heat oil in a wok and saute chopped garlic .
pour some oil to the frying pan . spread the oil around . add chopped garlic to the frying pan .

heat oil in a wok and saute chopped garlic .
put oil in a hot wok . add chopped garlic . cook both on the hot pan .

heat another pan and add soy sauce sesame oil kicap manis water and cook .
in a large skillet add dark soy sauce . then add regular soy sauce . keep stirring as you add the ingredients with your chopsticks . add your sesame oil , kicap manis and your one tablespoon of water to make sure the mixture is watery . cook the mixture and slightly turn the pot to distribute the mixture around the pot .

heat another pan and add soy sauce sesame oil kicap manis water and cook .
while the noodles are cooking , heat another pan until it 's nice and hot . put the soy sauce and sesame oil into the pan and add the kicap manis . add a tablespoon of water - this is to stop it from being too thick and gooey ! put a little salt and sugar in as well .

heat another pan and add soy sauce sesame oil kicap manis water and cook .
put a pan on the stove and turn the heat on . pour in the soy sauce sesame oil and water . stir everything with chop sticks .

place the patties in between the buns .
grill the patties on a grill . take a bun and place it on the plate . add some vegetables on top of bun . add the patties on the bun . now place the top bun .

place the patties in between the buns .
with a large metal spatula , remove a burger from the grill . place each burger on top of the vegetables and buns . place each upper bun on top of a meat patty .

place the patties in between the buns .
scoop up the patties with a spatula . set the meat patty on the bottom of the bun . put the top of the bun on top of the patty .

slice the tomatoes spread the sauce on the burger base and place tomato and spinach on top .
put a tomato on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the tomato into slices . use a spatula to spread the sauce on each bun bottom . spread some mustard on the bun top . put a slice of tomato and some spinach on the bun bottom .

slice the tomatoes spread the sauce on the burger base and place tomato and spinach on top .
use a sharp or serrated knife and a cutting board to cut the tomatoes into thin slices , about 1/4 inch thick . use a spatula to spread the special sauce on the inside of each bun top . then , open your mustard and use a knife to spread it on the inside of each bun base . place one tomato slice onto each bun base . place fresh spinach leaves on top of the tomato slices , then you 're ready for the burgers .

slice the tomatoes spread the sauce on the burger base and place tomato and spinach on top .
cut the tomatoes in to thin slices . take the sauce in a bowl . add the sauce on top of burger base . place tomato slice on burger bread . add some spinach on top of tomato slice .

divide the blue cheese into pieces .
cut the blue cheese into pieces with a knife . make sure the pieces are even .

divide the blue cheese into pieces .
lay cheese down horizontally on its side . grab serrated knife from chopping block . make slow downward slicing motion through the horizontal cheese . cut into 8 total pieces .

divide the blue cheese into pieces .
get a large knife . cut up the cheese with the knife into 8 pieces .

add mayonnaise red pepper white wine vinegar and pepper to a food processor and process it .
get a food processor . we will make the sauce in the food processor . put 1 cup mayonnaise in the food processor . add 1/4 cup of chopped roasted red peppers , 1/4 teaspoon white wine vinegar , and 1/8 teaspoon pepper . put the lid on the food processor and turn on the food processor to combine all the ingredients .

add mayonnaise red pepper white wine vinegar and pepper to a food processor and process it .
find a one cup measure and measure out mayonnaise . you can use light mayonnaise . put the mayonnaise into the top of the food processor . find a 1/4 cup measuring cup . measure out 1/4 cup of chopped roasted red peppers . put peppers in food processor . find 1/2 teaspoon measure . measure out 1/2 teaspoon of white wine vinegar . pour into food processor . find a 1/8 teaspoon measure . measure out 1/8 pepper . pour pepper into food processor . start the food processor and mix until ingredients are combined .

add mayonnaise red pepper white wine vinegar and pepper to a food processor and process it .
now to make our sauce , add one cup of mayonnaise to the food processor . next add a quarter cup of red peppers into the processor . now add just a splash of white wine vinegar . next we will put in an 1/8 teaspoon of pepper . once all your ingredients are in , just cover the processor and start blinding it .

add salt black pepper and flavored salt to ground chopped meat and mix .
add ground beef to a bowl . put on gloves to be more clean . add a tablespoon of salt . add a teaspoon of black pepper . add two tablespoons and two teaspoons of worcestershire sauce and mix .

add salt black pepper and flavored salt to ground chopped meat and mix .
now we are going to add a teaspoon of salt into the burger . now we will add in some pepper of the same amount . once these are added in , and our sauce and we can get ready for the next step . mix the meat around with your hands , gloves are suggested . keep doing this until the seasoning are mixed in well .

add salt black pepper and flavored salt to ground chopped meat and mix .
pour in the salt black pepper and flavored salt to the meat . use your hands to mix everything up .

grill the patties .
place the hamburgers on the grill with your tongs . cook them about 4 to 6 minutes per side .

grill the patties .
place the patties on the grill with tongs . line the patties up in rows . let them cook on the grill .

grill the patties .
take the ground beef and form it into burger sized patties with your hands . turn on the grill to warm it up . put the patties on the grill and cook them for 4 - 6 minutes per side . while burgers are cooking , get your special sauce ready .

place the cheese inside the meat .
shape the meat into a burger shape , and add a hole in the middle of the burger . then place in your blue cheese , and gently cover the hole with the meat again . make sure the cheese is in the middle of the meat , and covered completely on top and bottom .

place the cheese inside the meat .
make a pouch or bowl in the middle of the meat with your hands . place the cheese in the middle of this meat bowl .

place the cheese inside the meat .
put gloves on your hands . use your fingers to make a hole in the center of each burger . put a piece of cheese in each hole . use the meat to cover the cheese and press together .

flip the burger patties on the grill and cook .
add the burger patties on the grill . fry the burgers to brown on one side . flip the burgers on the grill . fry the burgers on the other side . repeat the same with the other burgers .

flip the burger patties on the grill and cook .
after cooking for a few minutes , get some tongs . carefully grab the burger on each side and flip . it 's ready when they have black lines and the burger is nice and brown . flip all the burgers and continue to cook for 3 or 4 more minutes .
