flip the burger patties on the grill and cook .
take the spatula and flip over the burger patties . make sure that the patty are charred and do not stick when you try to flip . cook the other side of the patty .

roll the dough into a thin circle .
take your dough and roll it into a small ball . now smash out the ball and roll it flat . put some flour on it , so it does not stick , and use your rolling pin to make a flat thin circle .

roll the dough into a thin circle .
to make this vegetable samosa , you will need to have your dough ready to roll out . make sure you have a clean surface to roll your dough , and have some flour and a rolling pin ready to use . take a small amount of dough , about the size of a golf ball between your palms and roll it til you have a nice ball . place some flour on the clean surface and place your ball of dough onto this floured surface . pat the ball with your hand to flatten it and then turn it over so that both sides of the pressed ball have some flour . you will flatten the ball to about the size of the base of a soda can . take your rolling pin and flatten it out til it is nice and thin , about the thickness of a dime . roll the pin once or twice over the surface and turn the flattened dough over and roll the pin across the surface again . continue until the dough is about the size of the top of a coffee mug and is consistently flat across the dough , about the thickness of a coin .

roll the dough into a thin circle .
roll the dough with the hand . pour some flour onto it . roll it with the help of a roller . roll the flour into a thin circle shape .

pour oil into a hot pan and add onion ginger green chili and carom seeds .
take a pan on the stove . pour some oil on to the pan . cut onion and ginger and green chili in to small pieces . add cut pieces of onion , ginger and green chili in to the pan . add carom seeds in to the pan and mix them .

pour oil into a hot pan and add onion ginger green chili and carom seeds .
with a spoon pour oil into the pan . add onions into the pan . using a spoon spread the onions around the pan . add ginger into the pan . add green chili into the pan .

pour oil into a hot pan and add onion ginger green chili and carom seeds .
once the pan is hot , add three teaspoons of oil . pour the onions in the pan . pour the ginger in the pan . pour the green chili in the pan . sprinkle the carom seeds in the pan .

add cashews and coriander leaves to the pan .
pour in cashews to the cooking pan . add in some coriander . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together .

add cashews and coriander leaves to the pan .
add some cashew nuts or peanuts to the mixture in the pan . ( you can also use peanuts ) . after cashews , add some coriander leaves into the mix . stir mixture together .

add cashews and coriander leaves to the pan .
grab some cashews with your hands and drop them in the pan . grab coriander leaves and drop them in the pan .

place the samosas into a pan of hot oil to fry .
add samosas into the hot oil . flip the samosas in the hot oil . flip until brown .

place the samosas into a pan of hot oil to fry .
very carefully put the samosas in hot oil using a spatula or spoon . if the oil is hot enough it will bubble . be very careful not to touch or splash the oil .

place the samosas into a pan of hot oil to fry .
make sure the oil is hot . flip the samosa with a spatula . put in two at a time . take the samosa out when it is brown and crispy . eat and enjoy .

add turmeric chili powder coriander powder garam masala and salt to the pan and mix .
add 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric . add some chili powder and coriander powder . add 1 teaspoon of garam masala . put in some salt . use a stirring spoon and mix the ingredients together .

add turmeric chili powder coriander powder garam masala and salt to the pan and mix .
place some turmeric and chili powder onto your food . then add some coriander powder , garam masala and salt to it . mix them all together .

add turmeric chili powder coriander powder garam masala and salt to the pan and mix .
take a pan and cook the ingredients in the pan . add a teaspoon of turmeric powder and chili powder in to the pan . add a teaspoon of coriander powder and garam masala powder in to the pan . add some salt in to the pan . mix the contents in the pan .

add potatoes carrots green beans and peas to the pan .
add the cut up pieces of potatoes carrots green beans and peas to the pan one at a time . stir everything with a wooden spoon .

add potatoes carrots green beans and peas to the pan .
pick up the bowl of potatoes and put it in the pan . pick up the bowl of carrots and put it in the pan . stir it up . pick up the bowl of beans and put it in the pan . pick up the bowl of peas and put it in the pan . stir everything together .

add potatoes carrots green beans and peas to the pan .
add potatoes , carrots , green beans , and peas one at a time to the pan . stir together .

add flour salt baking powder and oil to a bowl and mix with water .
in a large bowl start with adding 3/4 cup of flour . then add a pinch of salt and a pinch of baking powder . fill a spoon with oil and add it to the bowl . do this 2 more times . ( 3 spoonfuls total ) . add water as you mix all the ingredients together in the bowl with your fingers . keep adding water and mixing until there is nothing dry left in the bowl and you feel the dough start to stiffen in your hands .

add flour salt baking powder and oil to a bowl and mix with water .
put the flour into the bowl . add salt into the bowl . add baking powder into the bowl . put oil into the bowl . with your hands mix it all together .

add flour salt baking powder and oil to a bowl and mix with water .
pour about 3/4 cup of flour into a large mixing bowl . put in a tiny amount of salt and baking powder . add in a few teaspoons of oil . mix it up with your hand as you add in a little bit of water . continue mixing it up until it is well combined and consistent .

place the filling into the middle of the dough and fold it shut .
use a spoon to scoop the filling and place it onto the dough . place the filling in the center of the dough . fold the dough over . seal the ends of the dough . fold the dough over again and seal all the edges .

place the filling into the middle of the dough and fold it shut .
open the dough up into a circle . using a spoon , scoop a spoonful of masala filling . place the filling on one corner of the dough . picking up the opposite corner of the dough , fold the dough in half over the filling and press the ends down with your fingers to seal the filling in . fold the dough once more with the remaining ends and seal the dough once again .

place the filling into the middle of the dough and fold it shut .
we now want to take the filling and put it in the corner of your dough . now take the dough and fold it over and seal the ends . now we want to turn the dough and fold it again . now just seal the edges once again .

chop 2 garlic cloves grate ginger about 2 tsp and green onions finely .
using a knife chop two garlic cloves and a handful of green onions into very small pieces . using a small cheese grater and grate about two teaspoons worth of ginger .

chop 2 garlic cloves grate ginger about 2 tsp and green onions finely .
cut up 2 garlic cloves with your knife . use a cheese grater and grate 2 tsp ginger . measure the ginger after grating with a teaspoon measurement . cut up lots of thin green onion into small pieces .

chop 2 garlic cloves grate ginger about 2 tsp and green onions finely .
get a knife and a cutting board . chop two gloves of garlic and four green onions into small pieces . get a cheese grater . rub the ginger against the grater to make it into about 2 teaspoons of mush .

cut yu choy into diagonally medium pieces .
take the knife and hold sideways . cut the pieces not too small , not too big .

cut yu choy into diagonally medium pieces .
get a large knife and a cutting board . you may need grown - up to help with the next part . place the yu choy on the cutting board . cut the yu choy in 2 inch pieces at an angle like these lines : / / / / .

cut yu choy into diagonally medium pieces .
take a knife and slant it across the yu choy . cut the yu choy with the knife slanted into pieces . you want the pieces to be about the size of your pointer and middle finger put together .

chop beef slices into cubes .
stack beef on top of one another . cut downwards into squares or cubes .

chop beef slices into cubes .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a long beef slice on the cutting board . cut the thick slice in to two halves horizontally . cut each half in to cube slices vertically . repeat with other half .

chop beef slices into cubes .
get a medium to large sized knife . cut the beef into long strips . stack the strips on top of each other . cut the strips from top to bottom into squares .

cut pork belly into pieces .
take any piece of pork and cut it into small pieces . take your pork and make smaller pieces the size of your thumb .

cut pork belly into pieces .
place pork belly on cutting board . slice pork belly into thick palm - sized slices .

cut pork belly into pieces .
lay the pork belly on a cutting board . take a knife and carefully slice pieces of pork belly off the larger piece . slide the cut off pieces to the side until you have completely cut up all the pork belly .

crack 2 eggs in a bowl .
take your egg and very carefully crack it against the bowl . make sure that you only put the inside of the egg into the bowl and not any part of the hard shell . do this with two eggs .

crack 2 eggs in a bowl .
crack 2 eggs . add them in a bowl .

crack 2 eggs in a bowl .
grab one of the eggs and softly tap one of the sides using a spoon . using the fingernails of your thumbs , open the egg and put it in a bowl . repeat the same process with the second egg .

add 2 tsp of sriracha small pinch of salt and pepper and beat them all .
break two eggs into a measuring cup . add to teaspoons of sriracha sauce . grab some salt between two fingers , add it to the eggs . add pepper until it covers about half of the eggs .

add 2 tsp of sriracha small pinch of salt and pepper and beat them all .
to a glass measuring cup add two eggs and two teaspoons of sriracha sauce . add salt and peppers to the eggs and mix it up with a whisk .

add 2 tsp of sriracha small pinch of salt and pepper and beat them all .
fill a tbsp with sriracha and pour into eggs . pour a small amount of sale into hand and add to mixture . pour a small amount of pepper onto hand and add to mixture . stir everything together .

mix soy sauce chili garlic sauce and chili oil with flakes .
put soy sauce into the bowl . put the chili oil into the bowl . put the garlic sauce into the bowl . take a spoon and mix it all together .

mix soy sauce chili garlic sauce and chili oil with flakes .
add 4 teaspoons soy sauce to bow . add 4 teaspoons of chili garlic to bowl . add 4 teaspoons of chili oil to bowl . this makes it taste spicy . mix everything together .

mix soy sauce chili garlic sauce and chili oil with flakes .
pour soy sauce into a measuring tablespoon and dump into a bowl four times . pour chili garlic sauce into a measuring tablespoon and dump into bowl four times . pour chili oil with flakes into a measuring tablespoon and dump into bowl four times . stir it all together with a spoon .

pour the mixed sauce over the cold rice .
pick up smaller bowl containing sauce mix . pour sauce over rice .

pour the mixed sauce over the cold rice .
take the bowl of mixed sauce . pour the sauce evenly over the cold rice .

pour the mixed sauce over the cold rice .
have a bowl of sauce and a bowl of cold rice . pour the sauce over the rice , using the spatula to help you get it over the rice . use the spatula to scrape any remaining sauce out .

turn on the heat at the highest and keep a pan add 2 tbsp of cooking oil .
turn the stove knob all the way until you ca n't anymore . add two tbsp of cooking oil to the pan .

turn on the heat at the highest and keep a pan add 2 tbsp of cooking oil .
turn the heat to the highest . keep a pan on the stove . heat the pan . take about 2 tablespoon of oil . add oil in to the pan .

turn on the heat at the highest and keep a pan add 2 tbsp of cooking oil .
place the wok onto one stove burner . turn the stove burner onto high . once the wok is hot add 2 tablespoons cooking oik .

add chopped garlic ginger and onions to the heated oil and salt and cook for 40 secs .
take your garlic and green onions and use a large spoon to push them until the hot pan . let them get hot for 30 or 40 seconds until you can really smell them .

add chopped garlic ginger and onions to the heated oil and salt and cook for 40 secs .
heat the oil in a pan . add the chopped garlic , ginger , and onion . then add salt . cook for 30 to 40 seconds .

add chopped garlic ginger and onions to the heated oil and salt and cook for 40 secs .
add all the small pieces of garlic and ginger onion inside of the pan with the oil . let it cook for 30 - 45 seconds , or until you can smell all the garlic and onion .

add all the cut meat to the salted veggies and cook .
add chopped meat to pan with the salted veggies . stir occasionally until fully cooked .

add all the cut meat to the salted veggies and cook .
add the cut veggies in to the pan . add salt in to the veggies . cut the meat in to thin slices . add the meat in to the veggies . cook the meat till it is brown .

add all the cut meat to the salted veggies and cook .
carefully add all of the meat to the vegetables using tongs . stir the meat and vegetables . let the meat cook until it is a little brown on all sides .

when the meat is cooked add the beaten egg and fry .
push the meat aside and pour the egg mixture to the empty side of the pan . make sure you do n't mix the eggs and the meat until the eggs are cooked . cook the eggs until they are fluffy . once the eggs are cooked , mix the meat and eggs together .

when the meat is cooked add the beaten egg and fry .
when the meat has turned completely brown and the shrimp is completely orange and white , push everything in the pan to one side . add the egg mixture that you made to the empty side of the pan . then you need to use the spatula to mix the egg , do not mix it with the other items in the pan until the egg looks solid and scrambled . then you can mix all the ingredients in the pan together .

when the meat is cooked add the beaten egg and fry .
when the meat is cooked , slowly pour in the beaten egg mixture . gently stir the eggs until the egg is fully cooked . then mix the cooked eggs and the cooked meat together gently .

add the rice sauce and choy mix and cook .
add rice , sauce and the yu choi to the pan . use a spoon to stir for about one minute .

add the rice sauce and choy mix and cook .
add the rice , sauce , and yucho to the pan . mix well and cook . continue stirring to prevent burning .

add the rice sauce and choy mix and cook .
take a pan on the stove . add the rice in the pan . add the sauce in to the rice . cut the choy in to small pieces . add the choy in to rice and mix everything .

cover and pot .
take your lid and set it on top of your pan . make sure you get a good seal of the lid on the pan so you can let your food cook evenly .

cover and pot .
put lid on pot . let the pot cook and stir in between .

cover and pot .
put the lid on saucepan to let cook over the burner . stir occasionally and replace lid .

chop up oleander .
place the coriander on to your cutting board . use your knife to chop it finely . make sure to tuck in your fingers and chop carefully .

chop up oleander .
chop the coriander with a knife . coriander has a nice taste and smells good .

chop up oleander .
using a knife carefully shop up the oleander . cut into small pieces .

cover up and cook for 6 to 8 minutes .
cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes . add water if you need to .

cover up and cook for 6 to 8 minutes .
add 500 ml of water on top of the chicken , and then cover the pan . make sure the stove top dial is set to the middle notch , for medium - high heat . let the chicken cook in the spices for at least six minutes . after six minutes , add the amount of garam masala that we measured out at the beginning . nine minutes later , take the lid off the pan .

cover up and cook for 6 to 8 minutes .
cover up the pot . allow the pot to cook for 6 to 8 minutes .

add more garam masala powder .
put in more garam masala powder . garam masala was already added , but this will increase the fragrance of the dish .

add more garam masala powder .
put in more garam masala powder . then mix the pot together .

add more garam masala powder .
with chicken in a pot , add more masala powder for fragrance . add green chili into pot too .

add black cardamom to a large pot .
get a large pot and put onto the stove . next open up 4 to 5 cardamom . put the cardamom into the pot .

add black cardamom to a large pot .
pinch open the black cardamom or they will pop . drop them into the pot .

add black cardamom to a large pot .
open up the black cardamom . drop the black cardamom into a large pot .

add cloves to the pot .
add 1 teaspoon of cumin to the pot . break up 1 garlic clove and sprinkle it into the pot . ( make sure to peel skin off of garlic clove before breaking it up ! ) .

add cloves to the pot .
add 1 teaspoon of cumin to the pot . add some cloves to the pot .

add cloves to the pot .
put large sauce pan on the burner . add one teaspoon of cumin . add some cloves .

saute the onions .
put the onions in the pot , stir and let saute . add some ginger .

saute the onions .
put onions into hot pot . using a spoon stir the onions and other ingredients as they cook .

saute the onions .
take a large pot on the stove . pour some oil in to the pot . take an onion and cut it in to long thin slices . add the onion in to the pan . fry the onions till they are brown .

chop up the tomatoes .
chicken is in the bowl . cut the core out of the tomatoes . add saturated fat to the pot ,

chop up the tomatoes .
take whole tomatoes . carefully take a small knife . cut tomatoes into four equal size pieces .

chop up the tomatoes .
carefully using a knife cut up tomatoes . cut the tomatoes into small squares .

add ginger and garlic paste and saute .
over a heated pan , add ginger and garlic paste . let cook .

add ginger and garlic paste and saute .
add ginger to the pot . add 1 tablespoon of garlic paste . stir the pot while it cooks .

add ginger and garlic paste and saute .
add one table spoon of the ginger and garlic paste and stir it into your chicken curry . saute it or cook it over medium to high heat for about one minute . let it saute until you will smell the aroma .

add the tomatoes into the pot .
pick up the tomatoes which should be cut . put the cut tomatoes into the pot .

add the tomatoes into the pot .
get out a clean cutting board . get a sharp knife , and be very careful with it . carefully cut the tomato into small cubes . put the tomato cubes into the pot . turn on the burner , and then turn the dial to the middle notch for medium heat .

add the tomatoes into the pot .
add the tomatoes to the pot . add the tomatoes before the chicken .

slice up the ginger finely .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a piece of ginger on the cutting board . remove the peel of the ginger . cut the ginger in to thin slices . repeat the same with entire piece of ginger .

slice up the ginger finely .
pour water into pot and turn nob onto high . next grab a knife and start to cut the ginger . cut multiple times until little pieces . grab the greens and start to cut longways . drop the chopped ginger and greens into pot .

slice up the ginger finely .
carefully hold the ginger . cut the ginger into small strips .

chop the green chilies .
slice green chilies down the middle . slice tops off . add to pan .

chop the green chilies .
use your knife to cut the chilies . cut the chilies down the middle . add 3 chilies to the pan .

chop the green chilies .
take the green chilies and put them on the cutting board . hold the chili at one end and slice it down the middle with a sharp knife . do n't touch the inside of the chili or you will get spice on your hands and it could wind up in your eyes . put the sliced chilies into the pot using your knife to pick them up .

add chili powder .
turn on stove , and put mixture on the stove in a saucepan . put in 1 1/2 tablespoons of coriander powder .

add chili powder .
spoon the chili pepper . put spooned pepper in the pan .

add chili powder .
add chili powder to the pot . add pureoader powder to the pot with a spoon .

add masala powder .
while the dish is cooking , add one teaspoon of masala powder . then , using your fingers , add a large pinch of salt .

add masala powder .
add 1 teaspoon of masala while the mix is being cooked . add salt .

add masala powder .
take a small spoon . scoop out masala powder and drop it in carefully .

stir around the food in the pot .
you will want to keep stirring your dish for 3 - 4 minutes after the dry spices have been added . just use your spoon to move the ingredients around in the pan and make sure you get your spices mixed in well .

stir around the food in the pot .
get a spoon or spatula . use the spatula to carefully mix the food around in the pot .

stir around the food in the pot .
after adding dried spices , mix well . continue cooking for 3 - 4 minutes , stirring occasionally .

add the chick to the pot and mix .
hold the chicken bowl over the pot . use a spoon and slowly scoop the chicken into the pot . mix everything with the spoon .

add the chick to the pot and mix .
take a pot and cook it with the other ingredients . take the chicken pieces in the bowl . add the chicken in to the pot . take a large spoon . mix the chicken with the ingredients in the bowl .

add the chick to the pot and mix .
the chicken goes in the pot . keep cooking the chicken without adding water . keep stirring the chicken into the vegetables .

add garlic to a wok of hot oil .
when the oil is ready , carefully dump in the garlic to the hot oil in the wok . make sure you add all the garlic from the container by carefully shaking it .

add garlic to a wok of hot oil .
find your wok . it is a deep and big black pan with a handle . it looks like a deep frying pan . make sure the oil is inside . make sure to carefully check if the oil inside the wok is hot . you can do this by putting a small piece of onion inside the wok . if the oil makes a sizzling sound , then the oil inside the wok is ready . grab the cup of garlic and carefully put all of the garlic into the hot oil .

add garlic to a wok of hot oil .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the oil . cut the garlic in to small pieces . add the garlic in to the oil .

add pork to the wok .
place all the pork pieces into the pan with the oil . using a wooden spoon or plastic / silicon tongues , move the pork around so that all the pork is cooked on all sides .

add pork to the wok .
put the meat in the pan . place the pork in the pot .

add pork to the wok .
add the meat to the wok . use tongs to stir the pork .

add wine to the wok .
measure wine in a small glass bowl . add the measured amount of wine to the wok .

add wine to the wok .
take a small glass of red wine . pour the wine gently and directly into the pan .

add wine to the wok .
while the meat is frying , pour the wine into the wok . stir the wine and meat together .

add a scrambled egg to the wok .
crack an egg into a bowl , put the inside of the egg into the bowl and throw away the egg shell . stir the egg with a fork until it is all yellow and mixed well . pour the scrambled egg into the hot wok and stir with tongs .

add a scrambled egg to the wok .
crack an egg into a separate bowl and throw away the shell . mix the egg up with a fork , so the yellow and the egg white are well mixed ( scrambled ) . pour the scrambled egg into the wok .

add a scrambled egg to the wok .
take a pan . add wok in to the pan . break open an egg and mix it . add the scrambled egg in to the wok . mix with a spatula .

add corn to the wok .
put the corn into a cup or bowl . pour the cup into the wok .

add corn to the wok .
take the small bowl of corn from the counter . put all of the corn in the bowl into the wok .

add corn to the wok .
add the corn to the wok . stir slowly . place wok on simmer . cook until light brownish .

add bamboo to the wok .
add bamboo to hot wok . stir to incorporate into the dish .

add bamboo to the wok .
take the small bowl with the bamboo pieces . shake the pieces of the bamboo onto the pan .

add bamboo to the wok .
open jar of bamboo with an electric can opener . drain the liquid from the bamboo by pouring the contents of the can into a colander or noodle drainer . set the open can aside by placing opened top in the can for safety . chop contents of can of bamboo on a clean cutting board with a sharp knife , and be careful while slicing . place the chopped bamboo in a bowl . pour contents of bamboo bowl into the remainder of wok ingredients .

add the maggi sauce to the wok and stir .
add maggi sauce to the pan with the mixture . stir the maggi sauce into the mixture .

add the maggi sauce to the wok and stir .
pour the maggi sauce from the measuring cup into the pan . you can use soy sauce if you do n't have maggi . shake the pan to combine everything . use a pair of tongs to stir it some more .

add the maggi sauce to the wok and stir .
pick up the cup containing the sauce and put it over the pan . tilt the cup so the sauce pours out of the cup and into the pan . carefully lift the pan off the heat and shake it a few times so that the food moves in the pan but does n't fall out . use the tongs to stir the food in the pan around .

add fish balls to the wok and stir .
get a pair of tongs . carefully add the fish balls to the wok .

add fish balls to the wok and stir .
add fish balls to wok . stir into other ingredients to avoid sticking . food will cook evenly .

add fish balls to the wok and stir .
put fish balls in pan . shake the pan .

add udon noodles to the wok and stir .
pour cooked udon noodles into the wok . stir with tongs until mixed well .

add udon noodles to the wok and stir .
dump the noodles out of the yellow bowl into the hot pan . use the tongs to lift and stir the noodles while they cook . tap tongs on pan when done stirring .

add udon noodles to the wok and stir .
take your bowl of udon noodles and put them into the pan . take your tongs and mix the noodles with everything .

add hoisin sauce to the wok .
pour hoisin sauce in the wok . using tongs , take vegetables from the wok to empty the bottle . mix the hoisin sauce with the ingredients in the wok .

add hoisin sauce to the wok .
put the hoisin sauce in . careful , it might sizzle .

add hoisin sauce to the wok .
put hoisin sauce to your pan of noodles . use your tongs to make sure you get all of the sauce out of the bowl .

add ground black pepper to the wok .
twist the top of the pepper grinder over and over . hold the grinder over the pan and move it around to sprinkle pepper on the food .

add ground black pepper to the wok .
cook meat , veggies and noodles in wok . add desired sauce . finish with sprinkling ground black pepper over the top . turn off burner .

add ground black pepper to the wok .
add pepper to a pepper grinder . hold the pepper grinder over the food . twist the grinder 4 or 5 times . now you can put the pepper away .

add sugar to the wok .
use a very small spoon to scoop some sugar out of your sugar container . sprinkle the spoonful of sugar over the noodles in your wok .

add sugar to the wok .
add 1 teaspoon of sugar . mix until evenly in wok .

add sugar to the wok .
stir the food in the pan . sprinkle sugar over the food .

add the noodles to a plate .
take the pan handle and shake the pan . place the noodles onto the plate until it is all off .

add the noodles to a plate .
take the pan off of the stove . pour the noodles onto a serving plate .

add the noodles to a plate .
get a plate ready on the counter . pick up the pan and move it next to the plate . slide the food out of the pan and onto the plate .

add cardamom seeds to a pan of hot oil and shake .
put a few cardamom seeds into the pan with the hot oil . shake the pan to release the flavors of the seeds .

add cardamom seeds to a pan of hot oil and shake .
the pan consists of hot oil . add the cardamom seeds to a pan . after adding , shake the pan well .

add cardamom seeds to a pan of hot oil and shake .
place a few cardamom seeds into the pan of hot oil . about 7 seeds is plenty . shake the pan a little .

add chili flakes to the pan and shake .
add pumpkin seeds to pan . add chili flakes to pan . shake pan until you hear the flakes popping .

add chili flakes to the pan and shake .
place some oil into a pot . add some seeds and let it get hot for a few minutes . sprinkle in some chili flakes until you hear a sizzling sound .

add chili flakes to the pan and shake .
take a pan on a stove . add some oil in to the pan . take some chili flakes . add the chili flakes in to the hot oil . hold the handle of the pan and shake it for the flakes to get mixed .

add turmeric cumin and coriander powder to the pan and shake .
pour the turmeric , cumin and coriander into the pan . gently lift the pan and slowly stir the oil and spice . keep stirring until the spice is fully mixed .

add turmeric cumin and coriander powder to the pan and shake .
add turmeric , cumin , and coriander powder to the pan . shake the pan to mix everything . use a spoon if it will help .

add turmeric cumin and coriander powder to the pan and shake .
gather the spices turmeric , cumin , and coriander . measure all spices out and place in small bowl . pour measured spices into heated pan on stove and gently shake pan . using a spatula then stir spices till they are blended good .

add garlic ginger paste and onion to the pan and stir .
put the garlic and ginger paste into the pan . put the chopped onion into the pan . use a spoon to mix everything together .

add garlic ginger paste and onion to the pan and stir .
take some ginger and garlic . make the ginger and garlic in to a paste . take an onion and cut them in to small pieces . add ginger garlic paste and onions in to the pan . mix everything with a spatula .

add garlic ginger paste and onion to the pan and stir .
combine finely shopped garlic and ginger together to make a garlic ginger paste . add to the pan . chop red onion into small pieces . add to the pan .

add lamb to the pan and stir .
using a spatula slowly add the chopped lamb to the pan . use the spatula to stir the lamb .

add lamb to the pan and stir .
cook the ingredients in a hot pan . then add lamb to the pan . stir the lamb into the pan and cook while stirring .

add lamb to the pan and stir .
take your bowl of lamb and pour it into the pan . then take your stirring stick and mix the lamb together with the rest of the pan .

add chili powder to the pan and mix .
wait until the chicken is cooked . add the chili powder to the pan . mix together with chicken with a spatula .

add chili powder to the pan and mix .
sprinkle chili powder into the pan . use your wooden spoon to stir it up really good .

add chili powder to the pan and mix .
take a pan on a stove . take a tea spoon of chili powder . add chili powder in to the pan . take a wooden spatula . mix the chili powder with the ingredients in the pan .

add chopped tomato to the pan .
you 're going to cut your tomatoes into small cubes if you do n't have any cut up yet . put your tomato cubes into a small bowl . pour your tomatoes into the hot pan carefully since the steam coming out of pot will be hot .

add chopped tomato to the pan .
chop your tomatoes into small pieces and place in a bowl . pour the tomatoes into the pan . be careful to lower the bowl of tomatoes close to the pan before your pour them in so as not to spatter yourself with hot liquid .

add chopped tomato to the pan .
grab your bowl of chopped tomato . dump it into the pan that is cooking on your stove .

add green chilies and garam masala powder to the pan and stir .
take a pan on the stove . cut the green chilies in to small pieces . add the green chilies in to the pan . add garam masala powder in to the pan . mix everything with the wooden spatula .

add green chilies and garam masala powder to the pan and stir .
using your fingers , add a couple handfuls of green chilies over top of the mixture . you can use as many as your prefer . add a handful of garam masala powder . stir both chilies and powder into your mixture using a wooden spoon . once mixed evenly , remove spoon and place lid on pot .

add green chilies and garam masala powder to the pan and stir .
add green chilies to the pan . add garam masala powder to the pan . stir everything well with a spoon . put the lid on top of the pan .

add coriander leaves to the pan .
you are going to add the green leaves called coriander . mince it in between your hand and add to the cooking pot . make sure you are careful . the pot will be hot and warm . steam will be coming up from the pot . now grab your wooden spoon and stir all ingredients in your pot . set your spoon aside and turn off the stove by twisting the knob .

add coriander leaves to the pan .
add fresh coriander leaves to the pan . stir with a spoon . turn off the heat while you stir in the coriander .

add coriander leaves to the pan .
take a handful of fresh coriander leaves and sprinkle them over the top of the sauce . use a spoon to stir the leaves into the mixture and turn the heat off .

combine rinsed black beans and refried beans heat and mix .
put black beans in bowl . add one can of re fried beans . heat up for one minute and a half in microwave . then mix it up .

combine rinsed black beans and refried beans heat and mix .
put the beans in a strainer and run water through the beans to rinse them . move the beans into a solid bowl . add the refried beans and heat the bowl in the microwave for about 1:30 . mix the beans all together with a spoon .

combine rinsed black beans and refried beans heat and mix .
get you a big bowl . open the black beans and the refried beans ( ask an adult to help can openers can be sharp ) . then pour the black beans in the bowl and turn on the water and wash beans then pour the water out . be sure not to pour out the beans . then use a spoon to take the refried beans from the can and put them in the same bowl and mix it together with the spoon . then put it in the microwave and heat it for 1 minute and 30 seconds . then take spoonfuls and put it on to the shells .

put beans onions chicken and cheese on the tortilla and fold it up .
place your tortilla down on the table . with a spoon take your beans and put them onto the tortilla . take diced onions onto your beans . put chicken onto your onions . put cheese on top of your chicken .

put beans onions chicken and cheese on the tortilla and fold it up .
put beans on flour tortilla using a spoon . next , add onion , chicken and cheese using your fingers . fold the tortilla , bring in each side , fold over and tuck in the sides .

put beans onions chicken and cheese on the tortilla and fold it up .
take the tortilla on a flat surface . add the bean mixture in to the middle of tortilla . add cut pieces of onions in to the tortilla . cut the chicken in to small pieces and add it in to the tortilla . add the cheese on top of chicken and fold the tortilla .

heat butter in a pan and fry the burrito .
heat butter in a pan until melted . place 2 burritos in the pan to cook for a little while . turn the burritos over using tongs . cook until each side of of the burritos are lightly browned .

heat butter in a pan and fry the burrito .
turn on the stove burner to medium heat . put the butter in the pan and let it melt . place your burrito in the melted butter . when the burrito turns brown , flip them over carefully with some tongs . carefully use tongs to remove burrito from pan .

heat butter in a pan and fry the burrito .
put butter in pan a let it melt . put burrito in pan and let brown on one side . use tongs to flip the burrito and brown the other side . take burritos out of pan and put on a plate . keep repeating until all burritos are cooked .

deep fry and flip the fish until golden brown .
take a frying pan on the stove . add some oil in to the frying pan . heat the oil in the pan . add the fish in to the hot oil . fry the fish and flip till they are golden brown .

deep fry and flip the fish until golden brown .
use a spoon to spoon the oil onto the fish in the pan . let the fish cook for about two minutes on one side , then flip over . let the other side cook for two minutes and flip over again . cook for another two minutes .

deep fry and flip the fish until golden brown .
let the fish cook in the bubbling oil . use a spoon to scoop oil over the fish carefully . use a spatula to flip the fish .

add flour salt pepper and fizzy water to a bowl and whisk .
take a medium sized bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . add some fizzy water in to the bowl . whisk everything in the bowl .

add flour salt pepper and fizzy water to a bowl and whisk .
pour in flour salt pepper and fizzy water into a bowl . use a whisk to mix it all up carefully .

add flour salt pepper and fizzy water to a bowl and whisk .
put plain flour into a large bowl . add some salt and pepper to the flour . pour some fizzy water into the flour , use a wire whisk to mix . mix until all of the lumps are gone . add a little bit more flour and whisk again .

cut the white fish into pieces and season both the sides with little salt and freshly ground pepper .
cut white fish into 1 inch cubes . season both sides of fish with some salt and ground pepper .

cut the white fish into pieces and season both the sides with little salt and freshly ground pepper .
season the fish pieces with salt and pepper . turn the fish pieces over and put salt and pepper on the other side .

cut the white fish into pieces and season both the sides with little salt and freshly ground pepper .
put cod on cutting board . cut cod into squares . season cod with salt and black pepper on both sides .

add flour salt and pepper to a bowl and stir .
take a bowl put some flour into it . put a bit of salt and pepper to the flour in the bowl . mix the ingredients in bowl with your fingers or fork .

add flour salt and pepper to a bowl and stir .
put your flour in a bowl . add quite a bit of salt and pepper to the flour . stir the ingredients together using your fingers , until they are mixed well .

add flour salt and pepper to a bowl and stir .
take a small bowl . add some flour in to the bowl . add some pepper powder in to the bowl . add some salt in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl properly .

heat some oil in a pan .
pick up the bottle of sunflower oil and pour some into the pan . make sure the pan is about a quarter full . make sure the stove is on so the oil in the pan gets hot .

heat some oil in a pan .
using a whisk stir the mixture . put some oil into the pan . dip the shrimp into the flour .

heat some oil in a pan .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan . take some oil in a jar . add the oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan .

coat the fish pieces with flour and batter and place in oil .
dip the fish into flour being sure to get it on both sides . then dip the fish into the batter . after it is covered in batter , place the fish into the frying pan .

coat the fish pieces with flour and batter and place in oil .
heat up the skillet with oil in it on the stove top . take a piece of fish and dip it in flour so that both sides of the fish are coated . then take the flour coated fish and dip it in the batter so that both sides are coated in batter as well . then slowly and carefully place the fish in the hot oil to cook . repeat steps with the other pieces of fish .

coat the fish pieces with flour and batter and place in oil .
dip fish pieces into flour , then into the batter . put the battered fish into the hot oil . repeat until all fish pieces are coated .

remove the fish and drain the oil .
use a spoon and scoop out the fish one piece at a time . put the fish on a paper towel .

remove the fish and drain the oil .
get a slotted spoon . spoon out a piece of fish and put it on a plate that has a paper towel on it . spoon out all the fish onto the paper towel and let the oil drain off the fish .

remove the fish and drain the oil .
use a spoon to scoop the fish out of the pan . set onto a paper towel on a plate and drain the oil out .

plate the fish with fries .
remove the fish from the paper towels . set them on the plate in an attractive way next to the fries .

plate the fish with fries .
use your hands to grab the fish and fries . lay the fries on one side and the fish on the other side not touching .

plate the fish with fries .
put the cooked fish and french fries onto a plate . put them on the plate neatly .

add paneer cubes to a pan with hot oil and saute till golden brown .
add paneer cubes to the pain with hot oil . use a spoon to stir the cubes until they are a golden brown . remove from the pan and drain off all the extra oil .

add paneer cubes to a pan with hot oil and saute till golden brown .
grab the bowl with the paneer cubes and gently pour them into the pan with the oil . take your large spoon and stir them around until they look golden brown . carefully remove the paneer cubes with your large spoon and put them back in the bowl .

add paneer cubes to a pan with hot oil and saute till golden brown .
add the paneer cubes to the oil in the pan . stir the paneer cubes until they are golden brown . drain all extra oil from the pan .

add black cumin seeds to the same pan and let it sizzle .
add the black cumin seeds to the hot pan . stir with the spoon and let them sizzle .

add black cumin seeds to the same pan and let it sizzle .
add black cumin seeds to the pan . let the seeds sizzle in the pan and mix them around the pan .

add black cumin seeds to the same pan and let it sizzle .
pour a small amount of oil into a pan on the stove . turn the heat on . use a spoon to add cumin seeds to the pan . use the spoon to stir the cumin seeds in the oil . let the cumin seeds sizzle there for a little while .

now add cinnamon stick whole cloves bay leaf and black cardamom stir it .
to your hot pan , add cinnamon stick , whole cloves , a bay leaf and black cardamom . stir to be sure all the ingredients are heated .

now add cinnamon stick whole cloves bay leaf and black cardamom stir it .
add whole cloves and bay leaves to the hot pan . then add black cardamom . using a plastic spoon , stir the ingredients in the oil .

now add cinnamon stick whole cloves bay leaf and black cardamom stir it .
put the cinnamon stick , whole cloves , bay leaf and black cardamom in the pan . use a spoon to stir the spices .

add sliced onions and saute add turmeric powder and 1 tbsp of garam masala little salt and stir .
hold the container of onions over the pan and slowly pour them into the pan . mix them around with a spatula while they cook . add turmeric powder and 1bsp garam masala and salt . mix everything together with spatula .

add sliced onions and saute add turmeric powder and 1 tbsp of garam masala little salt and stir .
put the sliced onions into the frying pan and stir them with a spatula until they turn a light brown color . be careful not to cook the onions to long . add a small spoons worth of turmeric powder and 1 tablespoon of biryana masala powder with a measuring spoon . continue to mix the onions with your spatula and pour a small amount of salt onto the onions .

add sliced onions and saute add turmeric powder and 1 tbsp of garam masala little salt and stir .
add sliced onions and saute them until browned in oil in the hot pan . use a spoon to stir them . add turmeric powder , 1 tbsp of garam masala , and a little salt . stir everything with the spoon .

add the marinated vegetables into the pan and mix evenly to cover the veggies .
add marinated vegetables to the wok with the grilled onions . mix the vegetables with a spatula . add more salt to the wok . continue to mix the ingredients with the spatula .

add the marinated vegetables into the pan and mix evenly to cover the veggies .
put vegetables in pan with meat . mix with spatula so veggies and meat are mixed . add a little bit of salt . stir . leave on heat until ready .

add the marinated vegetables into the pan and mix evenly to cover the veggies .
add the vegetables into the pan . use your stirring spoon to evenly cook the vegetables . add a pinch or two of salt if needed .

cover it with lid and let it cook until the veggies are the done .
cover up the mixture . cook it on the stove until you feel like it is almost , but not quite done cooking . ( the reason for this is because later it will go into the oven ) .

cover it with lid and let it cook until the veggies are the done .
fill the hot pan with vegetables . cover the pan . cook until vegetables are 3/4 of the way done .

cover it with lid and let it cook until the veggies are the done .
cover the pan with a lid . let the vegetables continue to cook . leave the lid on until the vegetables are about 3/4 of the way finished .

add paneer cashews walnuts tomatoes and little yogurt and mix it evenly .
add cashews , add paneer . add tomatoes , fresh . add some fresh yogurt . mix it evenly and gently .

add paneer cashews walnuts tomatoes and little yogurt and mix it evenly .
take your bowl of paneer and pour it into the pan . add cashews . then add walnuts . add the cut tomatoes to the pan . finally , add a little yogurt and stir the pan so everything is even .

add paneer cashews walnuts tomatoes and little yogurt and mix it evenly .
hold the container of ingredients over the pan . carefully pour in the paneer cashews walnuts tomatoes . scoop out a little yogurt with a spoon and put it in the pan . mix everything with a spatula .

spray cooking oil on the bottom and side of the baking dish .
take some oil in a spray can . take a large baking dish . spray oil on bottom of baking dish . spray oil on one side of baking dish . spray oil on other sides of baking dish .

spray cooking oil on the bottom and side of the baking dish .
grab a baking dish and cooking spray . spray the bottom and sides evenly with cooking spray .

spray cooking oil on the bottom and side of the baking dish .
take a pan that can be put in oven out of the cupboard . get the spray can of oil . press the nozzle on top . make sure that you spray all sides and bottom of pan .

put a layer of rice to the bottom of the dish and sprinkle little garam masala over it .
take a small bowl . put a layer of rice to the bottom of the dish . take some garam masala powder in to a bowl . sprinkle the garam masala powder on the rice . cover the rice with the garam masala .

put a layer of rice to the bottom of the dish and sprinkle little garam masala over it .
pour three large spoonfuls of rice to your glass bowl , covering the bottom of the dish . take a small spoonful of garam masala and sprinkle it over the rice .

put a layer of rice to the bottom of the dish and sprinkle little garam masala over it .
there will be 3 layers of rice . split it into even layers before your start . put the first layer down . then sprinkle a little garam masala . it 's spicy so be careful if you do n't want it too spicy .

put a layer of veggies on top of it and sprinkle fried onions over the veggie layer .
you want to scoop your vegetables out of the pan and place it into your dish . add a layer of vegetables using half of your cooked vegetables . now take some of your fried onions and carefully sprinkle and spread them across your layer of vegetables .

put a layer of veggies on top of it and sprinkle fried onions over the veggie layer .
take your spoon and take vegetables and put them on top . make two layers of vegetables on top . take some fried onions from your bowl and lightly sprinkle them over the top of the vegetables .

put a layer of veggies on top of it and sprinkle fried onions over the veggie layer .
add half of your vegetable mixture into the pot with the rice on the bottom . generously add the vegetables using a big spoon gently to the rice . now sprinkle the fried onions using your fingers . add just a few pinches of the fried onions on top of the vegetables .

repeat the same layers again .
repeat the same layers . press in the layers the same way .

repeat the same layers again .
turn on the oven and set the dial to 400 . wait for the oven to beep to know that it 's ready . evenly spread a thin layer of rice and pat it gently with a spoon or spatula . evenly sprinkle 1 teaspoon of ground masala . evenly spread a layer of veggies , and then a layer of onion . evenly spread a final layer of rice over the top .

repeat the same layers again .
add rice over vegetables . add masala over rice . add vegetable layer over rice . add rice layer over vegetables .

sprinkle saffron oil over it and finally top it with fried onions and cilantro .
drizzle saffron oil over dish . top with friend onions and cilantro .

sprinkle saffron oil over it and finally top it with fried onions and cilantro .
drop oil over it . put white onion on top . put fresh cilantro on top .

sprinkle saffron oil over it and finally top it with fried onions and cilantro .
slowly drizzle or sprinkle the saffron oil across the top of your dish . it does n't have to cover every spot , just spread it around leaving some areas white and untouched . now take your fried onions and spread them around the top of the dish as well . last , you will spread cilantro across the top of your dish also .

cover the dish and put it into a 400deg preheated oven for 40 min .
turn oven on to 400 degrees f and allow to preheat . put pan in preheated over and bake for about 40 minutes . keep an eye on it , so it does n't burn .

cover the dish and put it into a 400deg preheated oven for 40 min .
turn the dial of the oven to 400 and wait until it beeps . put the cover on the dish . put carefully put the dish in the oven .

cover the dish and put it into a 400deg preheated oven for 40 min .
take the lid for your dish and set it on top of your dish . make sure it gets on there straight and has a good seal . now remember , you are going to want to have your oven preheated to 400 degrees and once it is preheated , we will bake our dish for 40 minutes .

mix some chili powder salt turmeric powder and tomato paste on a plate .
mix everything together . roll them in the mixture . ready to cook . cook turmeric .

mix some chili powder salt turmeric powder and tomato paste on a plate .
put a spoonful of tomato paste on the plate . add a spoonful of chili powder to the plate . add a spoonful of salt to the plate . add a spoonful of turmeric powder to the plate . mix all of the ingredients together on the plate .

mix some chili powder salt turmeric powder and tomato paste on a plate .
have the plate in front of you . add a teaspoon of chili powder . then put a little bit of salt , turmeric powder with the chili powder . then add some tomato paste to the plate . mix the dry ingredients with the tomato paste .

coat the halal hotdogs with the mixture on the plate .
roll in mixture . dab on plate . ready to cook .

coat the halal hotdogs with the mixture on the plate .
take hotdogs and mixture on a plate . apply the mixture to the hotdogs by rolling them . coat the hotdogs properly . repeat the same with all of the hotdogs . the coating is done .

coat the halal hotdogs with the mixture on the plate .
roll the hotdogs into the mixture on the plate . coat them all evenly .

put the hotdogs in the pan and let them grill on the pan .
place the pan on the stove . turn the dial so the heat is turned on and wait a few minutes for the pan to become hot . place the hot dogs one at a time into the heated pan . let the hot dogs cook in the hot pan .

put the hotdogs in the pan and let them grill on the pan .
put a fry pan on the stove top . heat the pan to medium - high . place the hotdogs in the hot pan . move them around so they cook evenly . they are done , when all sides are brown .

put the hotdogs in the pan and let them grill on the pan .
take each hot dog of the plate individually . place each one in hot pan . move around the hot dogs to make sure you cook all sides . use spatula to turn them . remove when golden brown .

cut the hotdogs .
remove the hotdogs from the pan . place them onto a plate . cut one of the hotdogs in half lengthwise . cut another hotdog in half diagonally , making logs . cut another hotdog into pieces , cutting it in half horizontally .

cut the hotdogs .
take the hotdogs from the hot skillet . cut each hotdog up . one hot dog will be cut the length of the hot dog . the next one will be cut 6 times at an angle . the 3rd one will be cut 7 times evenly .

cut the hotdogs .
turn off the stove . take one hot dog out of the pan at a time . hold the hot dog horizontally in front of you . using the knife , cut up and down until the hot dog is in several little pieces .

cut tomatoes and place them in a bowl .
use a knife to carefully slice cherry tomatoes in half . cut 3 pints of tomatoes . put them in a bowl .

cut tomatoes and place them in a bowl .
chop up 3 pts of cherry tomatoes with a knife . you can use either grape or cherry tomatoes . slice in half . roast in oven .

cut tomatoes and place them in a bowl .
put tomatoes on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut each tomato in half . after the tomatoes are sliced , then place them in a bowl .

combine bulgur chickpeas tomatoes parsley oil salt lemon in bowl .
take a large glass bowl . add some bulgur chick peas in to the bowl . add cut tomatoes and parsley in to the bowl . add some oil and salt in to the bowl . add lemon juice in to the bowl .

combine bulgur chickpeas tomatoes parsley oil salt lemon in bowl .
hold the plate of vegetables over the bowl . add all the bulgur chickpeas tomatoes . scoop some parsley with your hands . add the oil salt lemon to bowl .

combine bulgur chickpeas tomatoes parsley oil salt lemon in bowl .
use a spoon and scoop the tomatoes , onions and chickpea mixture . then add some parsley into the bowl . add salt and oil . then add some lemon juice to the bowl . use the stirring spoon to mix everything together in the bowl .

transfer the ingredients to a plate .
scoop the food onto a platter with a wooden spoon . taste it to see if there 's enough salt and pepper . add more salt or pepper til it tastes good to you .

transfer the ingredients to a plate .
mix the ingredients in a mixing bowl . take a large plate . take a large wooden spoon . transfer the ingredients in the bowl in to the plate . spread the contents in the plate evenly .

transfer the ingredients to a plate .
using a spoon scoop the ingredients into the plate . smooth out the ingredients onto the plate .

spread the tomatoes on a baking sheet and add oil and salt .
cut cherry tomatoes in half . place on a big baking sheet . drizzle olive oil over the tomatoes . add a big pinch of salt . shake the pan to move the tomatoes all around .

spread the tomatoes on a baking sheet and add oil and salt .
use a rimmed baking sheet . pour your tomatoes onto your baking sheet and give it a shake to spread them out . add about 5 tablespoons oil or more if you like . use your fingers to sprinkle some salt on the tomatoes . give it a good shake to make sure all the flavors come together .

spread the tomatoes on a baking sheet and add oil and salt .
spread the tomatoes on a baking sheet . pour about 5 teaspoons of olive oil all over the tomatoes . sprinkle the tomatoes with some salt . shake the baking sheet back and forth a little bit so the tomatoes get coated in the oil .

slice a red onion .
now take your red onion and cut the two end off of it with your knife . once the ends are removed , cut the onion in half . using the end of the knife , cut out the core of your onion . now we can dice the tomato into large strips of thing slices .

slice a red onion .
use a knife to slice a red onion . cut off the core at the bottom of the onion . roast the onion in the oven for about 15 minutes .

slice a red onion .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take a red onion and cut it in to two halves vertically . remove the peel from each half of onion . take one half of onion and cut it in to thin vertical slices . repeat the same with the other half of onion .

cook the bulgur in a pot of boiling water .
bring a pot of 2 cup of water to boiling on the stove . carefully , add your bulgur to the boiling water . get your pot lid and pot holder . using the pot holder , carefully put the pot lid onto the pot . simmer for 15 minutes .

cook the bulgur in a pot of boiling water .
get the pot to boiling by heating until the water is bubbling a lot . add the bulgur to the pot slowly and cook .

cook the bulgur in a pot of boiling water .
you carefully close the oven by pushing the handle with your hand . pour 2 cups of water into a pot and put the pot onto the stove with the heat turned up to high . once the water is boiling you very carefully pour the bulgur wheat into the water . cover the pot with a lid and boil the bulgur for about 15 minutes .

add bulgur to a separate baking sheet .
take a baking sheet . take a cup of bulgur . add the bulgur in to the baking sheet . gently move the baking sheet with the hand . spread the bulgur on to the baking sheet .

add bulgur to a separate baking sheet .
pour 1 cup of bulgur onto a baking sheet . spread the bulgur around the baking sheet evenly .

add bulgur to a separate baking sheet .
measure one cup of bulgur . pour the measured bulgur on a small metal baking pan . spread bulgur evenly on pan .

roast both baking sheets in the oven .
place the baking sheets into the over . close the over and let the sheets bake .

roast both baking sheets in the oven .
make sure your oven is preheated to the right temperature . get your pot holders . open the oven and put both backing sheets into the oven , one on each rack . be careful not to touch the oven . close the oven and let it roast .

roast both baking sheets in the oven .
place both baking sheets in the oven . roast the tomatoes and bulgur in the oven until it gets a very nice depth .

add the sliced onions to the tomatoes in the oven .
pull the cookie sheet with tomatoes out of the oven . add the sliced onions to the tomatoes on the sheet . stir the onions and tomatoes together . place back in the oven for 15 minutes .

add the sliced onions to the tomatoes in the oven .
take the cut up onion and put them with the little tomatoes on the same tray in the oven . you are going to leave them in the oven for 15 minutes .

add the sliced onions to the tomatoes in the oven .
take the tray of tomatoes from the oven . take an onion and cut the onion in to thin slices . add the onions in to the tray . take the tray and open the door of the oven . place the tray inside the oven .

remove the bulgur from the oven .
open the oven door carefully . using a pot holder or kitchen towel to protect your hand , take the pan of bulgur out of the oven .

remove the bulgur from the oven .
open the oven . holding an oven mitt , carefully remove the hot bulgur from the oven . close the oven door .

remove the bulgur from the oven .
grab a towel and put it over your hand . use the towel to grab the pan out of the oven .

remove tomatoes from the oven .
grab an oven mitten . carefully grab the tray with the tomatoes and onions .

remove tomatoes from the oven .
put on an oven mitt . take the tomatoes and onions out of the oven . set on the table top .

remove tomatoes from the oven .
using a hot pad remove the tomatoes from the oven . make sure they are cooked all the way .

chop parsley .
use a knife to carefully chop the parsley . continue to chop the parsley until it gets diced fairly small .

chop parsley .
put the parsley on a large cutting board . with a large knife , chop the parsley . continue chopping until the parsley is in small pieces , but is not crushed .

chop parsley .
find a large kitchen knife and a large cutting board . pile the parsley onto the cutting board . chop up the parsley into small pieces .

put some olive oil in a pan and brown the ground beef .
take a pan and keep it on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . heat the pan for few seconds . add the ground beef to the pan . cook the beef till it becomes brown .

put some olive oil in a pan and brown the ground beef .
put the pan in the stove . put the olive oil into the pan . add the ground beef into the oil . spread the beef evenly into the pan . cover the pan until the beef becomes brown .

put some olive oil in a pan and brown the ground beef .
pour some olive oil into a pan over high heat . place the ground beef into the pan . stir beef until it 's all completely brown .

drain off the fat and transfer the meat into a bowl .
use a slotted spoon and scoop up a spoonful of meat . hold the spoon over the pan for one second to let it drain , and then put the meat into a bowl .

drain off the fat and transfer the meat into a bowl .
wait for the meat to turn brown . with a large slotted spoon , scoop some meat out of the pan , and let the fat in the spoon drip into the pot . scoop the meat into a large bowl . repeat until all the meat has been scooped into the bowl , and the oil is left in the pan .

drain off the fat and transfer the meat into a bowl .
pick up the meat with a slotted spoon . shake lightly to drain the fat from the meat . put the meat into the bowl .

add the chopped vegetables onions paseo pepper and salt .
chop 1 onion and 1 pepper into small pieces . put in pan and add a little salt . put pan on burner . turn dial to 5 . cook , stirring with a wooden spoon , until onions are soft and see through .

add the chopped vegetables onions paseo pepper and salt .
place cut vegetables in your taco . put onions . paseo pepper . now salt to taste .

add the chopped vegetables onions paseo pepper and salt .
use a wooden spoon to scrape in the chopped onion , and the chopped pasillo pepper . add two pinches of salt to the pan . over the pan , turn the top of your pepper grinder about 10 times . stir the mixture with a wooden spoon . wait until the onions start to look more see - through .

add cumin powder chili powder oregano cayenne pepper mix and cook .
get a bowl . get cumin powder . get chili powder . get oregano . get cayenne pepper put all ingredients into the bowl stir the ingredients with a spoon put the bowl on the stove and turn the stove on .

add cumin powder chili powder oregano cayenne pepper mix and cook .
add 2 table spoon of cumin powder . a table spoon of chili powder . half a spoon of oregano . a small amount of cayenne pepper . stir together nicely and allow it to cook .

add cumin powder chili powder oregano cayenne pepper mix and cook .
add one tablespoon of cumin powder in to the pan . add one tablespoon of chili powder in to the pan . add half tea spoon of oregano in to the pan . add little cayenne pepper in to the pan . mix everything with a spoon .

add tomato paste stir and cook .
put the tomato paste in . mix it with a wooden spoon . let it cook longer but keep mixing it while it cooks more .

add tomato paste stir and cook .
add tomato paste to the pan . stir the mixture and the tomato paste together . let the ingredients heat up and cook in the pan .

add tomato paste stir and cook .
squeeze some tomato paste out of a tube . stir it in and cook for 3 - 4 minutes . stir every once in a while .

add the browned beef to the spice mixture and stir everything together .
the beef will be brown , put it in the pot . take the wooden spoon and mix everything really good .

add the browned beef to the spice mixture and stir everything together .
pour the browned meat into the spice mixture . stir it all together taking care not to spill .

add the browned beef to the spice mixture and stir everything together .
add the browned beef to the mixture in the pan . use your spoon to stir it together .

add ketchup honey and sauce and water stir and simmer .
add ketchup to the meat in the pan . then add a tablespoon of honey . add two tablespoons of salsa . next add some water to the skillet . mix together , cover and simmer for 20 minutes .

add ketchup honey and sauce and water stir and simmer .
add 1/2 cup of ketchup to the hamburger . add 1 tablespoon of honey . add 2 tablespoons of salsa . slowly add 1 and a 1/2 cups of water . stir to mix up the ingredients , turn the heat to low and cover and let cook for 20 minutes .

add ketchup honey and sauce and water stir and simmer .
add ketchup into the mixture . add honey also into the mixture . again add sauce into it . add water also into the mixture . stir all the ingredients to blend well and put the stove in simmer .

open the lid stir and season .
after 20 minutes , take off the lid . stir with the spoon . now take a small taste . add salt and pepper . stir it again with the spoon .

open the lid stir and season .
cook the meat covered for 20 minutes . take the lid off . add a little more salt . then add some more pepper .

open the lid stir and season .
remove the lid . be careful because some hot steam will rise out of the pan . add seasoning and stir .

fill the taco shells and top with sour cream grated cheddar cheese and chopped lettuce .
first get some shells . then fill it with a spoon full of ground beef . put sour cream on top . add just a sprinkle of cheese . put your cut up lettuce on top .

fill the taco shells and top with sour cream grated cheddar cheese and chopped lettuce .
put some meat into the shells . put some sour cream , cheese , and lettuce on top .

fill the taco shells and top with sour cream grated cheddar cheese and chopped lettuce .
first you want to set the taco shells on the plate . you 'll carefully add the meat into the shells . you can then pick any topping you would like . lets try adding some sour cream to each taco shell and then some grated cheddar cheese . last , lets put a little lettuce in the tacos .

add pork and scallions to the wok .
put the roast pork and scallions into the hot wok . use a spatula to mix together for two minutes .

add pork and scallions to the wok .
hold the cutting board over the wok . use the cleaver to scrape the pork into the wok . stir the pork into the rice with a spatula . use the cleaver to scrape the scallions into the wok . stir the scallions into the rice mixture with a spatula .

add pork and scallions to the wok .
use a spatula to scrape the roast pork off the board into the wok . mix a little with the spatula . scrape the scallions into the wok . stir it all together in the wok for 2 minutes .

chop the scallions into small pieces .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take some scallions on the board . cut the scallions in to small pieces . cut the scallions along the length . place the scallions aside .

chop the scallions into small pieces .
get a cutting board . grab scallions . grab a knife . chop into small pieces . put scallions aside .

chop the scallions into small pieces .
use a cleaver to cut the scallions into small pieces . be careful not to cut your fingers ! set the scallions aside .

chop the pork into small pieces .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take the pork on the board . cut the pork in to long strips . take each strip and cut it in to small pieces . repeat the same till the entire pork is cut in to small pieces .

chop the pork into small pieces .
use a knife to cut the pork . chop the pork into small pieces . set the pork pieces aside .

chop the pork into small pieces .
now chop the pork into small pieces , be careful and watch your fingers ! put them aside once you have them chopped into small pieces .

pour peanut oil into the wok .
get a soup spoon out of the drawer . put the spoon into the peanut oil . spoon the peanut oil into the wok . do this three times .

pour peanut oil into the wok .
hold the cup of peanut oil over the wok . use a scoop to scoop some oil out and pour it onto the wok .

pour peanut oil into the wok .
first , put the meat on a cutting board . take a sharp knife and cut the knife into small pieces . the add oil into the wok and add heat . then add the meat mixture into the wok . finally allow to cook and heat .

pour soy sauce on the rice .
pour soy sauce into the rice in the pan . use the spatula to the mix the soy sauce together with the rice .

pour soy sauce on the rice .
stir the rice in the wok with a large metal spatula . pour a few teaspoons of soy sauce onto the rice in the wok . stir the rice with the spatula to mix it in .

pour soy sauce on the rice .
pour some soy sauce onto the rice . mix it into the rice - this will make it more salty .

add the eggs to the rice and stir .
tap eggs to crack and break them into the pan with rice . stir it all together with a spatula .

add the eggs to the rice and stir .
crack two eggs into the rice in the wok . use a spoon to stir the egg into the rice . cook until the egg is well done .

add the eggs to the rice and stir .
gently tap an egg on the side of a pan until its shell cracks . hold the egg over the rice and use your thumbs to carefully pull the eggshells apart . throw the eggshell into the trashcan . do this again with another egg . use the spatula to gently stir the egg into the rice until the egg is fully cooked and all the liquid is gone .

add rice and salt to the wok .
hold the container of rice over the wok . use a spoon to scoop the rice out into the wok . pour some salt on the rice .

add rice and salt to the wok .
add the rice to the wok . using a stirring utensil , spread out the rice evenly in the pot . take salt and shake some out on top of the rice . using the stirring utensil , stir the rice .

add rice and salt to the wok .
put the rice in the pan with the large spoon . next , stir the rice .

sift some flour and baking powder and salt in a large bowl .
put a strainer over a large bowl . add the flour , baking powder and salt to the strainer . gently shake the strainer to strain the dry ingredients into the bowl . this is done so that the ingredients are well mixed together for the batter .

sift some flour and baking powder and salt in a large bowl .
place the sifter on top of a large bowl . pour flour , baking powder , salt and sugar in the sifter . lift the sifter and shake it over the bowl so flour , baking powder , salt and sugar falls into the large bowl .

sift some flour and baking powder and salt in a large bowl .
grab a large bowl and a wire fine mesh noodle strainer . place strainer on top the of the bowl . add the following ingredients to the strainer flour , baking powder , salt and sugar . shake strainer over the bowl so all of the ingredients drop into the bowl . once all of the ingredients have been shaken into the bowl , add milk .

add an egg and some milk and whisk everything quickly .
add an egg to the dry ingredients and butter . then add milk to the ingredients in the bowl . mix the ingredients immediately and quickly so the butter does not have time to solidify .

add an egg and some milk and whisk everything quickly .
crack an egg in a cup and look for shells to take out . take your milk and put it in the cup with your egg . grab a spoon to stir it all together really fast . try not to spill !

add an egg and some milk and whisk everything quickly .
take an egg and then ready to break . add the egg into the flour . then add the milk into the egg and the flour . then mix them together for 5 minutes .

pour small portions of the mixture to a medium heated pan .
find a 1/4 cup measuring cup . put a skillet on a burner on top of the stove , put a tablespoon of margarine in it , and turn the burner on medium heat . let the margarine melt in the pan . fill the 1/4 cup measuring cup with the mixture . gently pour the mixture from the measuring cup into the skillet .

pour small portions of the mixture to a medium heated pan .
grab a 1/4 cup measuring cup . fill it with pancake mixture . slowly poor the mixture into one corner of the skillet and continue doing that 3 times . make sure to leave room to flip . watch until all bubbles are gone then they are ok to flip .

pour small portions of the mixture to a medium heated pan .
make sure the pan is heated on medium heat . take a small measuring cup and fill it with the pancake mix . pour the small mixture into the pan to make mini pancakes .

flip the pancakes over when the bottom is ready .
make sure your oven is on medium to high heat . when you see little air bubbles all over your pancake , use your spatula to flip your pancakes to the other side . this side will go a little quicker .

flip the pancakes over when the bottom is ready .
put heat on medium to medium high heat . put pancake batter in pan . let pancakes cook on this side . flip the pancakes . once flipped , the other side cooks faster .

flip the pancakes over when the bottom is ready .
put your pancake batter into pan . put heat on medium to medium high . cook until you see bubbles form in the batter . flip the batter . second side cooks faster then first side .

spread butter and drizzle syrup on the pancakes .
spread 1 tablespoon of butter on top of the hot pancake . spread it until it is all melted . drizzle a little syrup from the container onto the pancakes .

spread butter and drizzle syrup on the pancakes .
put pancakes onto plate . spread butter on each pancake . put butter on top . grab the maple syrup . pour maple syrup over pancakes .

spread butter and drizzle syrup on the pancakes .
take a little scoop of butter on a fork and start spreading on the first pancake using the wrong end of the fork . repeat on all your pancakes to get good butter coverage . take your syrup bottle and slowly poor onto the top of pancakes . a little goes a long way .

finely chop small head of cabbage and put it in a bowl .
get a cutting board , a large mixing bowl , and a large chopping knife . put the cabbage on the cutting board and chop it up into small pieces , as small as you can get it . put the cabbage in the large mixing bowl .

finely chop small head of cabbage and put it in a bowl .
chop the head of cabbage into small pieces . take the pieces of cabbage and place them in a bowl .

finely chop small head of cabbage and put it in a bowl .
get a small head of cabbage and a knife . chop the cabbage into thin slices , as thin as you can . put the cabbage into a bowl .

grate 2 medium to large carrots .
take a plate . take a grater on the plate . take two carrots and remove the peel . grate a carrot on to the plate . repeat the same with another carrot .

grate 2 medium to large carrots .
grab a grater and a plate . grate 1 large or 2 medium carrot over the plate .

grate 2 medium to large carrots .
put a grater over a plate . carefully hold one end of the carrot to grate . grate two medium carrots completely .

add grated carrots to the cabbage and 1 tbsp of himalayan pink salt .
now take your bowl of shredded carrots and pour them into your bowl of cabbage . take 1 tablespoon of himalayan pink salt and lightly sprinkle it into your mixture of cabbage and carrots . if you only have kosher salt , use 2 tablespoons .

add grated carrots to the cabbage and 1 tbsp of himalayan pink salt .
put grated carrots and one tablespoon of himalayan pink salt to the cabbage . if you use kosher salt , use two tablespoons .

add grated carrots to the cabbage and 1 tbsp of himalayan pink salt .
add grated carrots to the cabbage . next add 1 tablespoon of himalayan pink salt to the cabbage and carrots .

add 1 tsp of fennel or kummel seeds and 1 tbsp of organic coconut sugar .
pour in a tea spoon of fennel in a bowl . pour in a table spoon of organic coconut sugar in the bowl .

add 1 tsp of fennel or kummel seeds and 1 tbsp of organic coconut sugar .
add 1 teaspoon of fennel . add 1 tablespoon of organic sugar .

add 1 tsp of fennel or kummel seeds and 1 tbsp of organic coconut sugar .
get a spoon that says 1 tsp . add 1 spoon of fennel or kummel seeds into the bowl . get a spoon that says 1 tbsp . add one spoon of coconut sugar into the bowl .

massage all the ingredients together and mix .
using your hands , squeeze and mix all of the ingredients together . juices will come out of the ingredients .

massage all the ingredients together and mix .
make sure your hands are clean . put your hands into your ingredients and mix together .

massage all the ingredients together and mix .
wash your hands very well with warm water and soap . reach into the bowl and squeeze the ingredients together . squeeze hard enough so the juices get squeezed out into the bowl . then let the bowl of ingredients sit on the counter for a couple of hours .

transfer the mixture to another bowl press it to the bottom and stick it .
take the bowl and put the mix into a bigger bowl . use your hands to press the mixture together . push it until it sticks together .

transfer the mixture to another bowl press it to the bottom and stick it .
now slowly pour the mixture from your bowl into a larger mixing bowl . you can just slowly pour out your mixture using your hand to help and pieces stuck . then just slowly pack the mixture into the new bowl by using your hand to push down on top of it . this will help make it stick together in the new bowl .

transfer the mixture to another bowl press it to the bottom and stick it .
move the mixture to a new bowl . smush it on the bottom and make it stick .

take a plate and put it on top of the mixture and place something heavy on top .
take a plate and cover the sauerkraut with the plate . put something heavy on top of the plate .

take a plate and put it on top of the mixture and place something heavy on top .
take a plate and cover the ingredients in the bowl . place something , anything that is heavy on top of the plate to hold it down .

take a plate and put it on top of the mixture and place something heavy on top .
grab your smaller plate and slowly set it on top of your mixture in the mixing bowl . it may be easier to flip your plate over . now push down on the plate and find a heavy object to set on top of the plate . several jars in your kitchen may be just the right size and weight for this . a mason jar of water is a great example .

cover it up with cling film and let ferment .
cover your jars with plastic wrap . allow them to sit outside for 1 to 2 days or until sour to taste .

cover it up with cling film and let ferment .
put all ingredients in a large bowl and cover them with plastic wrap ( two layers of plastic wrap will help ) . this will have to sit outside for 24 - 48 hours or until it is sour .

cover it up with cling film and let ferment .
cover everything up with plastic wrap . make sure it is covered with the liquid . let it sit outside for 1 to 2 days .

clean shrimps by peeling off tail and skin and devein the shrimp .
pull the shell of the shrimp off including its legs , tail , and outer shell . make a small cut in the middle of the back of the shrimp using a knife . use your fingers to open the cut wider and pull out the black vein completely out .

clean shrimps by peeling off tail and skin and devein the shrimp .
clean shrimp by peeling the tail and skin off . devein the shrimp by cutting the back and taking out it 's guts .

clean shrimps by peeling off tail and skin and devein the shrimp .
