peel tail and skin off shrimp . devein the shrimp by running your knife along the edge of the shrimp . use your clean fingers to open up the shrimp and pull the shrimp 's digestive tract out , which will look like a long , grayish tube .

boil water and add shiitake mushroom and steep till rehydrated .
heat up the water until it bubbles up . carefully drop the mushrooms in the bubbling water until they get soft .

boil water and add shiitake mushroom and steep till rehydrated .
fill a pot half full of water . heat the water on a burner set to medium - high ( 7 ) . when the water starts to bubble , add the mushrooms . turn the burner down to medium - low ( 4 ) . remove the mushrooms with a slotted spoon when they are soft and puffy .

boil water and add shiitake mushroom and steep till rehydrated .
bring water to a boil . add your shiitake mushrooms to the boiling water . let the mushrooms soak until they are rehydrated .

finely chop green onions .
place the onions on a flat surface so you can cut them . use a sharp knife and cut the onions into very small pieces . make sure there are no chunks of onion when you are finished .

finely chop green onions .
put green onions on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the green onions into very small pieces .

finely chop green onions .
carefully hold the onion . cut the onion slowly and carefully without getting too close to your hand .

take off the skin of shallots and finely mince .
pick up a sharp knife . put a cutting board on the kitchen counter . make a cut in the shallot using the knife . peel the skin off of shallot . cut the shallot in very tiny cubes .

take off the skin of shallots and finely mince .
peel the skin off of the shallots . cut up the shallots into very small pieces so that there are no big chunks .

take off the skin of shallots and finely mince .
cut the ends off the shallots with your knife . take the knife to the skin and slice the skin . with your hands take the skin off the shallots . with a knife cut the shallots lengthwise . again with a knife cut the shallots lengthwise .

drain out the water chestnuts and finely mince them .
drain the water out of your chestnuts . put them on a cutting board . with a large , sharp knife , slice them . once they are sliced , chop them in the other direction . chop them again until they are very small pieces .

drain out the water chestnuts and finely mince them .
take your water chestnuts can and use a can opener to open them . push down on the water chestnuts lid and drain the water out . cut your water chestnuts with a knife lengthwise . cut your water chestnuts with a knife by going up and down with your knife .

drain out the water chestnuts and finely mince them .
after you open a can of water chestnuts , drain the water off of them . get out a cutting board and a sharp knife . chop up the water chestnuts very small and keep cutting it with your knife until it 's in tiny pieces .

grate garlic and ginger drain the water from rehydrated shiitake mushroom and finely chop them .
have an adult grate your garlic for you or show you how . get 1 teaspoon of the ' tiny cut ' or grated garlic , dried out mushrooms , and water . put 2 dried mushrooms in water until they feel like a squishy piece of play dough . use a plastic knife to cut the mushrooms or have an adult cut for you . add the garlic , ginger , and mushrooms to a bowl .

grate garlic and ginger drain the water from rehydrated shiitake mushroom and finely chop them .
grate the ginger in to small pieces . grate the garlic in to small pieces . take a shiitake mushrooms and soak it in water . drain the water and take a knife . cut the mushrooms in to small pieces .

grate garlic and ginger drain the water from rehydrated shiitake mushroom and finely chop them .
get a grater , a cutting board , and chopping knife . grate the garlic and ginger . ( ginger is easier to grate when it is frozen ) . drain the water from the shiitake mushrooms once they are rehydrated . squeeze the water out of the mushrooms . using the chopping knife and cutting board , chop up the shiitake mushrooms into very small pieces .

rinse the shrimp with water and finely chop .
rinse the shrimp off the platter with water . use a knife and carefully cut up the shrimp into small pieces .

rinse the shrimp with water and finely chop .
rinse the shrimp off with water . using a sharp knife , finely chop the shrimp .

rinse the shrimp with water and finely chop .
put the shrimp in a strainer and hold it under the faucet with cold water . drain the shrimp . cut all the pieces of shrimp into tiny pieces .

in a bowl combine ground pork shrimps green onions shallots ginger and garlic shiitake mushrooms and water chestnuts .
take a bowl and add ground pork in it . add shrimps in to the bowl . cut the green onions in to small pieces and add it in to the bowl . add small pieces of shallots , ginger and garlic pieces in to the bowl . add shiitake mushroom pieces and chest nut pieces in to the bowl .

in a bowl combine ground pork shrimps green onions shallots ginger and garlic shiitake mushrooms and water chestnuts .
take a bowl . put the ground pork , shrimp , green onions , shallots , garlic , shiitake mushrooms and water chestnuts .

in a bowl combine ground pork shrimps green onions shallots ginger and garlic shiitake mushrooms and water chestnuts .
add the ground pork into a bowl . cut the shrimp into small pieces and add to the pork . use a kitchen shear or herb scissors to cut small strips of green onions . add to the meats . cut the shallot in half and peel the outer layer off . next , cut the shallot into small cubes . add to the bowl with the other ingredients . peel the ginger by scraping off its outer layer with a spoon . place the garlic on the cutting board . hold the knife in one hand while the knife rests sideways on the garlic . be careful and hit the knife to peel the garlic . chop the garlic and ginger into small pieces . keep chopping until it seems like the pieces are n't getting smaller . slice the shiitake mushrooms into thin strips . now , turn the strips and cut them the opposite way to make small cubes . cut the water chestnuts into the same size pieces .

add shaoxing wine sesame oil soy sauce salt sugar white pepper and an egg and mix .
add water chestnuts , the shaoxing wine , sesame oil , soy sauce , salt , sugar , white pepper and 1 egg . mix it all up with your hands . when it 's all mixed ... .

add shaoxing wine sesame oil soy sauce salt sugar white pepper and an egg and mix .
add shaoxing wine to the bowl . next add sesame oil and soy sauce . then add salt , sugar and white pepper . finally , add an egg to the bowl . using your hands mix all of the ingredients in the bowl together .

add shaoxing wine sesame oil soy sauce salt sugar white pepper and an egg and mix .
in the large bowl add the shaoxing wine . add the sesame oil and soy sauce . add the salt and pepper . add the sugar . crack an egg open and add to the ingredients . mix it all up with your hands .

add cornstarch to the mixture and mix .
add cornstarch into your bowl . mix contents of bowl with your hand .

add cornstarch to the mixture and mix .
use a scoop and put some cornstarch in the mix . use your hands and rub everything together so it blends together .

add cornstarch to the mixture and mix .
take a medium sized bowl . take the mixture in the bowl . take two tablespoons of cornstarch . add corn starch in to the mixture . mix the corn starch and the mixture with the hand .

place a tsp of the filling in the center of the dough and add water to the edge .
make sure you have a teaspoon , not a tablespoon . scoop up one teaspoon of filling . put the filling exactly in the middle of the dough . dip your fingers in water . dab some water on the dough , around the filling .

place a tsp of the filling in the center of the dough and add water to the edge .
put the filling into the dough using a spoon . take water with your fingers and put the water around the edge .

place a tsp of the filling in the center of the dough and add water to the edge .
take a small flat piece of dough . take a filling in a bowl . place the filling in the center of the dough . take some water in a bowl . water the edges of the dough .

fold the pot sticker and pleat the edges .
fold the pot sticker in half and then take with your fingers , make 6 to 8 small folds evenly around the edge . flatten the bottom of the pot sticker with your hand .

fold the pot sticker and pleat the edges .
while your wonton is open on the cooking board , make sure there is n't too much stuffing . then fold in half so that the edges meet . then , press the edges so they seal and begin to carefully pleat . then inspect your wonton to make sure it is secure by tapping the bottom .

fold the pot sticker and pleat the edges .
fold the wrapper of the pot sticker in half . press the edges together while leaving small areas overlapping .

place pot stickers in a pan pour chicken broth and cover .
add pot stickers to hot pan . pour chicken broth into pan until it reaches halfway up the pot stickers . cover the pan with lid . cook for around 3 minutes .

place pot stickers in a pan pour chicken broth and cover .
take your pot stickers and gently set them into the heated pan . now pour chicken broth into the pan , so that it covers half way up the pan or the pot stickers . now take the cover we have on over the pan and let the stickers steam for about 3 minutes .

place pot stickers in a pan pour chicken broth and cover .
place pot stickers evenly over the pan . slowly pour the chicken brother until it 's halfway up the pan . cover with a lid .

take the cover off add oil and fry .
add pot stickers to pan with broth , cover and cook about 3 minutes . remove cover and cook until broth disappears . add oil to pan . cook until golden on one side , flip with tongs and cook again til golden brown on one side .

take the cover off add oil and fry .
take cover off with oven mitt . cover will be hot . how much oil to add .

take the cover off add oil and fry .
slowly pull off the lid . let the pan bubble up and it will fry .

cut up the vegetables into thin strips .
take the veggies and hold them carefully . cut them into thin strips or lines .

cut up the vegetables into thin strips .
take your knife . cut up each vegetable into very thin strips .

cut up the vegetables into thin strips .
take some garlic and carrot . take a cutting board and a knife . cut the garlic in to very thin long strip pieces . cut the carrot in to four halves . cut the each half of carrot in to very thin strips pieces .

cook the spinach in hot water and then place in cold water .
take some ice water in a bowl . cook spinach in a bowl . place the cooked spinach in to the cold water . place them for one min . remove spinach from ice water in to a plate .

cook the spinach in hot water and then place in cold water .
cook the spinach in a pan with hot water . move the spinach with tongs into a bowl of ice water .

cook the spinach in hot water and then place in cold water .
clean the spinach first . put the cleaned spinach in hot water and make it blench for 1 minute . take the spinach and put it in the cold water . it will become little crunchy .

add the garlic to a pan .
take a flat pan and place it on the stove . set the stove dial to the desired temperature . grab a garlic . carefully slice the garlic into tiny pieces with a knife . throw the pieces into the pan .

add the garlic to a pan .
using three fingers , grab a pinch of garlic . sprinkle the garlic into a pan .

add the garlic to a pan .
get a small amount of garlic . put it into the pan .

cook the vegetables in the pan .
cut different types of vegetables into small pieces . put all the vegetables into the pan . add some water in order to cook the vegetables . cover the pan with lid and wait for almost 10 minutes . check whether the vegetables become soft , then its cooked .

cook the vegetables in the pan .
put all the vegetables into the pan . heat them until they are cooked .

cook the vegetables in the pan .
add a bit of oil to the pan . add a little bit of salt to the pan . add vegetables to the pan . stir the vegetables using tongs .

cook the meat in the pan .
put meat into a separate pan . cook the meat until done .

cook the meat in the pan .
be sure to cook the meat and the eggs separately . this prevents cross contamination of your food .

cook the meat in the pan .
clean the meat and make it ready to cook . add oil in a pan . add meat into the oil to cook . cover the pan using lid and allow chicken to cook .

fry an egg in the pan .
take a pan and place it on stove . heat the pan . take an egg and break open the egg . pour the egg on the pan . fry the egg on the pan .

fry an egg in the pan .
break an egg and put it on the pan . let it cook and it will get white instead of clear .

fry an egg in the pan .
heat a separate pan . fry and egg in the hot pan .

put the ingredients in the bowl .
get all of your ingredients together . put them all in the bowl .

put the ingredients in the bowl .
cut the carrot in to thin strips . cut the cucumber in to thin slices . boil the spinach . take a medium sized bowl . add all the ingredients in to the bowl .

put the ingredients in the bowl .
put your ingredients into a bowl using your hands . you can arrange them however you want .

cut carrot and cabbage roughly .
use your knife to cut carrots into thin sticks . use your knife to cut the cabbage into big pieces .

cut carrot and cabbage roughly .
cut carrot into slices . then cut carrot slices into thin sticks . cut cabbage in big sections . turn cabbage . cut again in big sections .

cut carrot and cabbage roughly .
cut carrots into sticks or circles . cut cabbage into big chunks .

take the seeds of a bell pepper and cut it to pieces .
scoop the seeds of the pepper out . cut the seeds into small pieces .

take the seeds of a bell pepper and cut it to pieces .
using a spoon , push out the white center piece holding all the seed inside of the pepper out . using a knife , slice the pepper into strips .

take the seeds of a bell pepper and cut it to pieces .
use a knife to cut the bell pepper in half . tear out the seeds and white inner part of the pepper , and set them aside . use the knife to slice the rest of the pepper into thin slices .

chop a white onion to pieces .
put an onion on a cutting board . peel off all of the outer papery skin . ask an adult to help with using the knife . cut the ends off of the onion and put them in the trash . chop the onion into small pieces .

chop a white onion to pieces .
chop the white onion thinly . be sure to use a knife when slicing the onion .

chop a white onion to pieces .
take a peeled onion and place it on a chopping board . carefully take a sharp knife and cut the onion into small slices .

heat some oil in a pan .
put the pan on top of the stove , and turn the burner to medium . then , add the vegetable oil . turn the pan in different sides so the oil runs and covers most of the surface .

heat some oil in a pan .
take a pan and keep it on stove . take some oil in a bowl . add oil in to the pan . on the stove . heat the oil on the pan .

heat some oil in a pan .
carefully place the pan on the stove . turn the stove top dial to medium . add vegetable oil to the pan .

cook the meat in it .
slice the meat into thin strips , we like to use pork but you can use chicken or beef as well . warm up a spoon of butter into a pan . add the meat to the butter and cook until slightly brown .

cook the meat in it .
carefully cut the meat into thin slices , about 2 inches in length by 1/4 inch wide . pour 1s tablespoon of oil in non - stick skillet and heat until slightly smoking . add meat strips , using tongs , and keep turning them until brown .

cook the meat in it .
heat oil in a pan . next add meat to the hot pan . cook the meat until done .

add the chopped vegetables .
put your onions into your pan . put your carrots into your pan . put your peppers into the pan . with your tongs mix the vegetable together . put cabbage into the pan .

add the chopped vegetables .
first cook your meat in a skillet . next add your hard vegetables , like pepper and carrot , to the skillet . use tongs to move the meat and vegetables around the skillet . next add your soft vegetables like cabbage to the skillet .

add the chopped vegetables .
" after the meat is fully cooked in the pan , add your chopped vegetables . be careful , the oil may cause the water in the vegetables to spit " " and steam . use tongs and wear an apron to protect from the spitting oil . " " . " cook the vegetables in the pan with the meat . stir the vegetables around the pan so they will be cooked all the way through without burning .

add the boiled udon noodles .
cook vegetables until they are soft . once the vegetables begin to soften add in your udon noddles . continue to cook , stirring constantly .

add the boiled udon noodles .
wash your hands and kitchen counter . find all ingredients and chop necessary vegetables . heat the fryer with a small amount of oil . ( make sure adult is supervising ) . add vegetables slowly in the hot fryer ! ( be careful ) . when the vegetables are a little bit soft , add the udon noodles until hot , remove from heat ! enjoy !

add the boiled udon noodles .
when the vegetables are just soft , add the udon noodles . stir carefully with tongues .

cook everything well and season with bonito flakes and ginger to serve .
mix everything together . place it on a plate by using tongs . you can if you want to put bonito flakes on top of your dish . you can also put ginger on top of your dish .

cook everything well and season with bonito flakes and ginger to serve .
stir the noodles and vegetables in the pan to finish cooking them . get a serving plate and serving tongs . take a serving from the pan and place it in the middle of the plate . get a spoonful of bonito flakes and place them on top of the plated serving . get a small of clump of pickled ginger and place it on top of the plated serving .

cook everything well and season with bonito flakes and ginger to serve .
use tongs to remove the noodles from the pan and place on a serving plate . top the noodles with bonito flakes and pickled ginger .

remove the shrimp from the pan .
use a scoop to remove the shrimp from the pan . place the shrimp onto a plate .

remove the shrimp from the pan .
use a spatula to lift the fried shrimp out of the oil . put the fried shrimp on a plate .

remove the shrimp from the pan .
using a slotted spoon to scoop . scoop up the shrimp and let the oil drain out .

add flour eggs baking soda salt and pepper to the bowl and stir .
pour in flour into a large bowl . then add 2 eggs to the bowl . add baking soda , salt and pepper . use a whisk to stir the mixture together .

add flour eggs baking soda salt and pepper to the bowl and stir .
add flour , eggs , baking soda , salt and pepper to the bowl . use your whisk to stir them up good .

add flour eggs baking soda salt and pepper to the bowl and stir .
now take out your flour and add it into the bowl . next we will add the eggs . the next step is to add the baking powder , salt , and black pepper . now stir all of the ingredients together with a whisk .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
pour oil into a pan , put pan on stove , turn stove on , heat oil until oil has bubbles . put shrimp into hot oil , let shrimp sit in oil for 3 minutes . turn the shrimp over with a spatula . let shrimp fry another 3 minutes . take shrimp out of the oil .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
take the shrimp and place it into the hot oil . fry 4 pieces of shrimp at a time .

place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil .
mix flour , baking soda , salt , black pepper . add ice cold water to the mixture . immerse shrimp in the mixture . remove shrimp and dip into the bread crumb , make sure shrimp is completely covered . fry in oil that is already on medium heat .

add cold water to the bowl and stir .
add ice cold water to the bowl and stir with a large whisk . once the water in mixed in , add more ice cold water and continue to mix with the whisk . ice cold water is used to make a crisp batter . continue to add ice cold water and mix until the batter is smooth and as thin as you want it . if you want spicy tempura batter , you may add chili powder .

add cold water to the bowl and stir .
add some cold water to the bowl . use the whisk to stir the bowl mixing all of the ingredients . add more water as needed as you stir .

add cold water to the bowl and stir .
hold a cup of cold water over the bowl . pour the water in slowly . stir everything with a whisk .

cover the shrimp in the batter and breadcrumbs .
dip the shrimp into the batter so it is coated completely . take the covered shrimp and dip it in the breadcrumbs until it is fully coated .

cover the shrimp in the batter and breadcrumbs .
hold the shrimp by the tail . dip the shrimp in the batter first . dip the shrimp in the breadcrumbs after .

cover the shrimp in the batter and breadcrumbs .
place a bowl with the batter and a bowl with bread crumbs on the work counter . place the shrimp on the counter near the bowls . dip the first shrimp completely in the batter . place the dipped shrimp in the crumbs and coat it completely . repeat with the remaining shrimp .

cut the salmon fish meat into thin slices .
cut the large piece of salmon in half . next cut the salmon into thin slices .

cut the salmon fish meat into thin slices .
take your knife . cut the salmon into thin slices with the knife .

cut the salmon fish meat into thin slices .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a salmon piece on the board . cut the salmon in to rectangle shaped piece . cut the salmon in to very small thin slices . repeat the same till the entire salmon is cut in to thin slices .

stuff the sushi rice inside the meat slice and place them on a baking sheet in a row .
cut the meat in to a thick slice . take the sushi rice . place the rice in the meat slice and stuff it . close the meat slice and stick the sides . repeat the same with 4 other meats and place them in a row on a baking sheet .

stuff the sushi rice inside the meat slice and place them on a baking sheet in a row .
first stuff the rice in the fish slice so that it is under it . place the rice and fish in a row onto a baking sheet .

stuff the sushi rice inside the meat slice and place them on a baking sheet in a row .
put the sushi rice inside of the salmon . put the slices onto a baking sheet in straight rows .

using blow torch cook outer layer of the meat .
ignite the blow torch . keep torch 4 -6 inches from meat . gently fan the flame across the meat evenly .

using blow torch cook outer layer of the meat .
place the salmon onto a heat proof dish such as a baking sheet . turn your blow torch on . carefully move the flame from the torch around the top of the salmon until it starts to brown slightly .

using blow torch cook outer layer of the meat .
with your parent 's supervision , find a cooking torch . lay out the meat . carefully turn on the cooking torch , facing away from you . turn the torch to the meat . cook the outside layer of the meat until no longer raw .

brush some soy sauce on top and plate them .
grab a brush . dip the brush into the soy sauce . paint the salmon until it 's covered with the sauce . once they 're covered . place them on a plate to serve .

brush some soy sauce on top and plate them .
put the soy sauce in a small bowl . get a pastry brush and dip it into the soy sauce . brush the tops of the fish with the soy sauce . make sure each piece has been brushed . pick them up and put them on a serving plate .

brush some soy sauce on top and plate them .
after cooking , use a brush to add soy sauce to each piece . put each piece carefully on a plate with your hand .

garnish the salmon with a little sushi rice fish roe and thick soy sauce .
take the salmon on a plate . with the help of chop sticks , add sushi rice on top of salmon . add fish roe on sushi . take some thick soy sauce in a bottle . add soy sauce on to the salmon .

garnish the salmon with a little sushi rice fish roe and thick soy sauce .
put sushi rice on top of the fish . put fish roe on top of the salmon . dribble soy sauce on the salmon .

garnish the salmon with a little sushi rice fish roe and thick soy sauce .
take a tiny bit of the sticky rice and place it in the center of each piece of salmon . add one fish egg to the top of the rice . then squeeze the thick soy sauce in a zig zap pattern over the whole plate .

set it aside on a plate lined with a paper towel .
line a serving plate with a paper towel . use tongs to take the bacon out of the pan . put the bacon on the paper towel lined plate to drain .

set it aside on a plate lined with a paper towel .
fry the meat in the pan . fry on both sides till they are golden brown . take a plate and line it up with paper towel . remove the meat from the pan . place it aside on the paper towel .

set it aside on a plate lined with a paper towel .
place a plate down with a clean paper towel on top . grab a pair of tongs . use the tongs to pick up the bacon . gently shake the extra grease from the bacon . move over to paper towel lined plate .

spread a generous layer of mayonnaise over the second piece of toast .
use a butter knife to get some mayonnaise on it . spread the mayonnaise around the bread .

spread a generous layer of mayonnaise over the second piece of toast .
set the second piece of toast on a plate . take a knife and apply a layer of mayo to the toast .

spread a generous layer of mayonnaise over the second piece of toast .
take a butter knife and scoop up lots of mayo with it . spread the mayo evenly over the bread covering it nicely .

slice it in half and serve .
place the top of the bread on the sandwich . use your knife to cut the sandwich in two pieces . place the sandwich on a tray and serve it .

slice it in half and serve .
place the top half of the bread on top of the sandwich . slice the sandwich in half with knife . ready to serve .

slice it in half and serve .
prepare the sandwich . take the sandwich on a plate . take a knife . cut the sandwich in to two halves . transfer it to serving plate .

place the bacon on 1 piece of toast followed by the tomato and iceberg lettuce .
take 2 pieces of white bread and lightly toast them . take 2 pieces of cooked bacon and lay it on one piece of bread . then , take 2 tomato slices and place it on top of the bacon . take 2 pieces of iceberg lettuce and place it on top of the tomato .

place the bacon on 1 piece of toast followed by the tomato and iceberg lettuce .
toast your favorite kind of bread . on one piece of bread place bacon strips to cover the piece . on top of the bacon strips , add sliced tomatoes . add pieces of your favorite lettuce on top of the tomato slices .

place the bacon on 1 piece of toast followed by the tomato and iceberg lettuce .
take one piece of toast on a plate . add some pieces of fried bacon on to the bread . cut the tomato and iceberg lettuce in to thin slices . add thin slices of tomato on to the bacon . add some leaves of iceberg lettuce on top of tomatoes .

fry the bacon in a preheated pan over medium high heat .
put the bacon into the pan using tongs . flip the bacon over using the tongs .

fry the bacon in a preheated pan over medium high heat .
turn the stove up to medium or halfway up on the knob . let the pan get hot for a bit . use tongs to grab and place the bacon in the hot pan .

fry the bacon in a preheated pan over medium high heat .
put a pan on the stove top and preheat the pan . add some bacon to the preheated pan . fry the bacon for about 4 - 5 minutes until it is crispy . use tongs to flip the bacon over and cook the other side .

season the diced beef pieces with salt and pepper .
sprinkle salt and pepper on both sides of the meat pieces . you will want to put salt and pepper on both sides of the meat .

season the diced beef pieces with salt and pepper .
take your salt and pepper and put it all around the cut up pieces of meat . make sure to spread it all around so it gets on all the meat .

season the diced beef pieces with salt and pepper .
salt the beef first . then add pepper to the beef .

put the seasoned meat in a zip lock bag with flour and shake .
place 1/3 cup of flower to a ziplock bag . put a handful of the meat into the bag with the flour and shake them around so they get coated in flower .

put the seasoned meat in a zip lock bag with flour and shake .
add 1/3 a cup of flower to bag . add chopped meat into bag with flour . close and shake bag to cover all the meat in flour .

put the seasoned meat in a zip lock bag with flour and shake .
place several cubes of beef into a bag of a third of a cup of flour . shake it around . cook well .

cook some bacon in a pot once they brown take them out and put them into a bowl .
put some bacon into a pan . once they become a brown color take them out of the pan into a bowl .

cook some bacon in a pot once they brown take them out and put them into a bowl .
put a pot on the stove . turn it on medium . add some bacon to the pan . let it cook down until there is some bacon oil in the bottom . take the bacon out of the pot and then add the meat to the bacon grease . let the meat cook until it turns brown on all sides . stir it around to get all the sides brown . use a spoon to get the meat out but leave the juice in the bottom of the pot . get the brandy and add a little bit to the bottom of the pot .

cook some bacon in a pot once they brown take them out and put them into a bowl .
place a pot on the stove and turn the heat to medium . keep a large bowl nearby . wait for the pot to get fully heated then add the bacon . once the bacon changes from red to fully brown on all sides use a large spoon to carefully move the bacon to the bowl .

pour a mug of brandy to the pot and deglaze the pot later add some butter and olive oil .
lift the pitcher of brandy and slowly pour into the pan . use wooden spoon to scrape the bottom of the pan to loosen . add butter and olive oil to the pan and keep stirring with wooden spoon .

pour a mug of brandy to the pot and deglaze the pot later add some butter and olive oil .
slowly pour a mug of brandy into the pan . stir the brandy around the pan try scrapping up the bits from the bottom . after your done stirring up the bits and brandy add butter and olive oil . slowly mix all the ingredient 's in the pot . now add the vegetables into the mixture .

pour a mug of brandy to the pot and deglaze the pot later add some butter and olive oil .
get an adult to help you with this step . slowly pour the measuring cup of brandy to the pot , stirring the whole time with a wooden spoon . the alcohol in the brandy will produce a strong smelling steam . you will want an adult to do this part . make sure to scrape the brown bits from the bottom of the pan and keep mixing for a few more minutes . it should start turning into a creamy looking sauce . add some butter and olive oil to loosen up the rest of the brown bits and pieces while stirring . make sure to add the oil and butter slowly and carefully .

add some diced carrots leeks onions and garlic to it and cook until they become soft .
cut up carrots , leeks , onion and garlic . add to hot pot . stir every few minutes with a wooden spoon until the veggies are soft .

add some diced carrots leeks onions and garlic to it and cook until they become soft .
pick up the plate containing the carrots , leeks , onions , and garlic . move it above the pot . tilt the plate down and with your hand , push the carrots , leeks , onions , and garlic off the plate and into the pot . mix the contents of the pot with a wooden spoon until all the vegetables are soft .

add some diced carrots leeks onions and garlic to it and cook until they become soft .
add cut up carrots , leeks , onion and garlic to the pot . cook until the vegetables are soft .

add some tomato paste seasoned beef meat the cooked bacon and beef stock .
put the bacon back in the pot . add a number of different herbs and spices . ground cloves is one of the spices used .

add some tomato paste seasoned beef meat the cooked bacon and beef stock .
after the sauce is done , add the veggies and cook them for a few minutes . add the tomato paste to the vegetable mixture . cook the mixture long enough to where all the vegetables are very soft . after the vegetables are cooked down to where they are soft , add the meat and the bacon back into the pot , mix all together . you will need an adult to help add the wine . add beef stock , mix together and cook on the stove for 20 minutes . after 20 minutes . put on oven mitts and put the lid on the pot and place whole pot in the oven . cook in the oven for an hour .

add some tomato paste seasoned beef meat the cooked bacon and beef stock .
put the bacon into the pot again . add some tomato paste . add the meat . pour in some beef broth .

add cloves bay leaves thyme parsley and wine to it and cook .
put your ground cloves , bay leaves , thyme , and parsley to your pot of meat and vegetables . pour in a bottle of wine and your beef stock on top . put on the lip to your pot . let sit and cook .

add cloves bay leaves thyme parsley and wine to it and cook .
take the cloves and put them in the pot with the stew . take the bay leaves and put them in the pot with the stew . take the thyme and parsley and put them in the pot with the stew . pour wine from the bottle into a measuring cup and then pour the wine from the measuring cup into the stew . heat up the mixture on the stove and stir with the wooden spoon .

add cloves bay leaves thyme parsley and wine to it and cook .
first add ground cloves , and bay leaves to the pot . next add a lot of thyme and a lot of parsley . then add a bottle of wine to the pot . cook on low heat .

add some fried onions and mushrooms and mix .
add fried onions and mushrooms to pot . mix everything together .

add some fried onions and mushrooms and mix .
add fried onions . add mushrooms . mix mushrooms and fried onions together .

add some fried onions and mushrooms and mix .
fry onions in the oil . cut the mushrooms in to small pieces . fry the mushrooms in the oil . add the fried onions and mushrooms in to the pot . mix them with the contents in the pot .

add cream of chicken soup margarine and colby cheese and mix the ingredients .
get a baking pan and large wooden spoon . open a can of cream of chicken soup and put it in the baking pan . melt 1/4 cup of butter or margarine in a small bowl . ( a 1/4 cup butter is equal to half a stick of butter ) . add the melted butter to the baking pan . add 2 cups of grated colby cheese .

add cream of chicken soup margarine and colby cheese and mix the ingredients .
add 1 can of cream of chicken soup to the bottom of the pan . add 1/2 of melted margarine . add 2 cups of chopped colby cheese . use a spatula and mix the ingredients together .

add cream of chicken soup margarine and colby cheese and mix the ingredients .
add one can of cream of chicken . add half stick of melted margarine or butter . add two cups of grated colby cheese .

add diced onion salt and black pepper and mix .
chop half an onion . add half a teaspoon of salt . add half a teaspoon of ground pepper . mix until its all mixed up .

add diced onion salt and black pepper and mix .
use and small spoon that says tsp . add spoons of the diced onion salt and black pepper . mix everything up .

add diced onion salt and black pepper and mix .
cut an onion in half with a knife . cut one of the halves of onion into slices , then cutting the onion slices into little pieces . add the cut up onion to the mixture . take a teaspoon measuring spoon and fill to the rim with salt . add salt to mixture . take a half teaspoon measuring spoon and fill to the rim with pepper . add pepper to mixture . take a big spoon and stir the mixture for a minute or two , mixing everything up .

add shredded hash brown and mix the ingredients .
put shredded hash brown into the pan . use your hands to mix the hash browns with the sauce .

add shredded hash brown and mix the ingredients .
thaw out 26 oz of frozen hash browns . pour into casserole dish . mix well with clean hands .

add shredded hash brown and mix the ingredients .
add two pounds of thawed hash browns to your mixture . open a second bag of hash browns and measure if there are not two pounds in one bag . take your hands or a stirring spoon and mix the hash browns with the sauce until the hash browns are covered in sauce .

put the hash brown mixture in the oven .
grab the pan with the has browns . put it in the oven .

put the hash brown mixture in the oven .
carefully place the casserole in a pre - heated oven . it may be easier for you to put it in and take it out if you put the casserole dish on a cookie sheet first . set the timer for the time it will take the casserole to bake . when the timer rings , using oven mitts or potholders on both hands , carefully remove the casserole from the oven and turn the oven off . do n't touch the casserole as it will be very , very hot !

put the hash brown mixture in the oven .
put the hash brown mixture into the oven . after it comes out of the oven , the hash brown mixture should look golden .

crush some garlic into small pieces .
get out a knife or chopper tool . use the knife or chopper and cut the garlic into little pieces .

crush some garlic into small pieces .
put the garlic on a chopping bored . chop the garlic into tiny pieces with a knife or a food chopper .

crush some garlic into small pieces .
take 3 - 4 cloves of garlic . remove the skin of the garlic . crush the cleaned garlic using a chopper or a knife .

cut soft tofu into small cubes .
get your knife . cut up the tofu into small cubes .

cut soft tofu into small cubes .
place tofu on cutting board . cut it into big slices . rotate the knife and cut it into a checker board . then cut along the side of the block of tofu so it 's in cubes .

cut soft tofu into small cubes .
take some soft tofu . use a sharp knife to first cut the block of tofu into long stripes . think about how a tic tack toe board is lined up . make the long lines first . then cut the short lines . the final step would be to then cut those sections once in the middle .

heat some oil in a pan .
place a wok on your stove top . pour 2 tablespoons of oil into the wok , lift the wok and turn it to get the oil to spread around the wok .

heat some oil in a pan .
pour some oil in the pan . heat up the pan .

heat some oil in a pan .
pour the oil into the pan . turn on the stove top burner on and heat the oil . spread the oil around the bottom of the pan .

add the minced garlic and some chili paste .
take a pan and add some oil and heat it . cut the garlic in to very small pieces . add the garlic in to the pan . fry the garlic for a minute . add a tablespoon of chili bean sauce in to the pan .

add the minced garlic and some chili paste .
add some finely chopped garlic to the oiled pan . add some chili paste to the frying garlic . mix the ingredients well .

add the minced garlic and some chili paste .
cut up the garlic into tiny pieces and add to the hot oil . fill one tablespoon just to the top of the spoon with chili paste . add the chili paste to the hot oil .

add some minced pork and stir fry .
fry the onions with a little bit of oil and soy sauce . take the pork out of the bag . add the pork to the pan where the sauce is . use a spoon or spatula to stir the pork . turn the stove off when the pork does n't look pink anymore .

add some minced pork and stir fry .
pour the minced pork into the hot pan . use a spatula to stir the pork and try to break it into pieces while it cooks .

add some minced pork and stir fry .
make sure that your pan is nice and hot and the oil is bubbling a little . add the pork and stir carefully with a plastic spoon . keep stirring until the meat starts to turn brown .

add the cut tofu in and add some water and stir .
take your tofu and add it all to the pan with the meat . use a spoon to gently mix the tofu and meat together . measure out 1 cup of water with a measuring cup . add the water to the tofu and meat . gently stir the water , tofu , and meat together .

add the cut tofu in and add some water and stir .
once the meat is just about brown all the way through , add your tofu that has been cut into cubes . use a kitchen spoon to stir the mixture . measure 1 cup of water and add to the pan as well and stir again .

add the cut tofu in and add some water and stir .
take the tofu on a cutting board . cut the tofu in to cube pieces . add the tofu to the cooking pan . add some water in to the cooking pan and mix . keep the lid and cook .

season with some salt green leek and sesame oil .
to thicken the sauce add the thickener ( cornstarch and water ) . stir the mixture to get it all mixed . add small pieces of onions which are just like onions . add some drops of sesame oil .

season with some salt green leek and sesame oil .
with your meat cooking add a little pinch of salt . add some green onions . add some sesame oil . then stir all together .

season with some salt green leek and sesame oil .
sprinkle salt on the food . add green leaks to the food . add sesame oil to the food .

make round burger patties with ground beef using rolling pin and baking paper .
put the baking paper over the top of the beef . use a rolling pin to roll the beef . use your hands to round the edges of the burger patty into the shape you want .

make round burger patties with ground beef using rolling pin and baking paper .
put a piece of parchment paper over the meat . take the rolling pin and gently roll it over to make it round . remove the paper and make it smooth with your finger tips . keep doing this until you have all of the burger patties you want to make .

make round burger patties with ground beef using rolling pin and baking paper .
take a hand full of hamburger meat and roll it in your hands until you get a ball . put a piece of wax paper , parchment paper , or plastic wrap put it on a counter , put the hamburger ball on top of the paper or plastic . take another sheet of the paper or plastic and put it on top of the meat . take your rolling pin and roll it over the meat ball until it is squished flat but do n't squish it to thin . take off the top paper and push the sides of the meat until you have a round circle of meat . place the meat you rolled out somewhere safe and clean and do what you just did again and again until you have as many as you want to make .

grill the patties .
take the uncooked patties and place them on the grill . grill the meat for 3 minutes . after 3 minutes , turn it over and grill the other side .

grill the patties .
lay the meat pieces flat on the grill . space them out a little . flip them and look for the black lines .

grill the patties .
slowly lay your patties onto the grill . just lower them on with your hands . be careful thought , as you do n't want to burn your hands . let the patties cook on each side for about 3 minutes on each side . you 'll want to flip them after 3 minutes as you will get nice char marks on them from the grills surface .

place the patty pickles tomato ketchup and onions on the bun .
place the hot patty onto the end of the bun . add pickles . add ketchup . a few sliced onion rings .

place the patty pickles tomato ketchup and onions on the bun .
use your spatula to gently place the meat patty to the bun . now you can add the thinly sliced pickles . then you can add some tomato ketchup . now you can place the rings of onions on top . the onions are sliced into rings and you can separate the rings and add it just like that .

place the patty pickles tomato ketchup and onions on the bun .
place the beef patty onto the bun . add some pickles to the patty . add ketchup over the pickles . then add two chopped onion rings .

add mayo lettuce and tomato on the bun and put the buns together .
add a spoon of mayonnaise into the bun . add a small amount of lettuce on top of the , mayo . cut small thin pieces of tomato on the bun . then place one piece of bun on top of the other bun .

add mayo lettuce and tomato on the bun and put the buns together .
use a spoon and scoop mayo on the bun . spread the mayo around the bun with the spoon . lay the lettuce and tomato on the bun neatly .

add mayo lettuce and tomato on the bun and put the buns together .
grab bun . get a tablespoon of mayo . spread mayo on bun . ad lettuce and tomato . put it all together .

shred cabbage finely .
hold the cabbage safely . take a knife and cut thin strips from the short end of the cabbage . keep cutting until the cabbage is in tiny shreds .

shred cabbage finely .
put napa cabbage on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the cabbage into fine strips .

shred cabbage finely .
take a knife from the knife block . cut the cabbage in half lengthwise . using the knife make small ribbon - like cuts starting from the top of the cabbage working down to the base .

drain the soaked shiitake mushroom discard the thick stem and chop the cap .
buy dried chinese mushrooms or shiitake mushrooms . rehydrate the mushrooms by soaking them in water . cut off the tough stem . throw away the tough stem . cut the top , called a cap , into thin slices .

drain the soaked shiitake mushroom discard the thick stem and chop the cap .
now we are going to want to drain the shiitake mushrooms . take them out of the broth and let the juices fall back into the bowl . go ahead and give them a squeeze . now grab your knife and cut off the tough stem and then chop up the head / cap of the mushroom .

drain the soaked shiitake mushroom discard the thick stem and chop the cap .
take the shiitake mushrooms with the liquid in the bowl . squeeze the liquid from the mushrooms . take the mushrooms on a cutting board . remove the thick stem of the mushrooms . cut the cap of the mushrooms in to small pieces .

mix cool water with cornstarch in a bowl .
take a small mixing bowl . add some cold water in to the bowl . take a table spoon of corn starch in a bowl . add the cornstarch in the water . mix the water and corn starch .

mix cool water with cornstarch in a bowl .
to coat the rolls you will need to make a cornstarch glaze . you will need cool water . either refrigerate 1/2 cup water for 30 minutes or add ice to water to cool it then measure 1/2 cup of water . measure out 2/3 cup of cornstarch into a small bowl . place your cooled water into a larger bowl . using a whisk to stir , slowly add the cornstarch to the water . keep stirring the entire time so that there are no lumps . the mixture is ready all the cornstarch is added to the water in a smooth mixture .

mix cool water with cornstarch in a bowl .
fill a small bowl with cool water . slowly add cornstarch to the cool water . using a fork mix the cool water and cornstarch together . this will form a sort of glue .

deep fry the egg rolls in a pan with hot oil until golden brown .
slide in the egg rolls make sure they do not splash the oil everywhere . once the egg rolls sides are brown they are ready .

deep fry the egg rolls in a pan with hot oil until golden brown .
slide the egg rolls carefully into the frying pan . wait until the outside is golden brown . use the tongs to take the egg rolls out when cooked .

deep fry the egg rolls in a pan with hot oil until golden brown .
slide the egg rolls into the hot oil very carefully . fry them until they are browned on the outside . take them out with your tongs .

wrap up the filling .
put the wrapper on a cutting board . put about one tablespoon of filling on the wrapper . fold and roll the wrapper around the filling . use the corn starch mixture to apply to the edge of the wrapper and seal .

wrap up the filling .
place the mixture onto the wrap . roll up the wrap halfway . fold in both sides of the wrap . put liquid on the edges of the wrap to help it stick together .

wrap up the filling .
now we want to lay down the wrapper and turn it so it is a diamond shape . then take a teaspoon full of fillings and place it in your wrapper . now roll the wrapper halfway and then fold the edges inward . now roll it to just about the end . once there you can put some corn starch on the edges and seal the wrap .

add all the vegetables except the bean sprouts and stir fry .
carefully put all of the vegetables except the bean sprouts into the wok , the sprouts will be added later . stir the vegetables cooking in the wok often using tongs .

add all the vegetables except the bean sprouts and stir fry .
add vegetables into the frying pan . do not add the bean sprouts yet . stir the vegetable into the pan .

add all the vegetables except the bean sprouts and stir fry .
put all of the vegetables into the hot pan , except the bean sprouts . use tongs to toss the vegetables in the pan .

cut bamboo shoots to similar shape and size of carrots .
take a cutting board and a knife . add the thin strips of carrot in to a glass bowl . take some bamboo shoots . cut the bamboo shoots in to thin long strips . the carrot and bamboo in to similar pieces .

cut bamboo shoots to similar shape and size of carrots .
pour out the bamboo shoots . use a knife to carefully slice the shoots .

cut bamboo shoots to similar shape and size of carrots .
buy canned bamboo shoots which can be found in the asian aisle . drain the canned bamboo shoots . cut the bamboo shoots into thin strips about two inches long .

cut the carrots to julienne .
you will need to julienne the carrots . this means it needs to be cut into about a matchstick size . you can do this several ways , buying them pre - cut , you can use a knife and cut them by hand or you can buy a utensil that will julienne the carrot for you . there are also some food processors that will cut this way too .

cut the carrots to julienne .
use a knife to carefully chop the carrots . cut both ends off of the carrots and discard . cut into thin slices .

cut the carrots to julienne .
grab your carrots and put on a cutting board . cut the ends off of the carrots . next julienne the carrots which is nice thin slices . use a knife to cut into match stick like carrots . using a oxo julienne tool , anchor carrot with fork and pull tool away from fork will make nice thin slices .

add bean sprouts to the same bowl with rest of the vegetables .
grab the bean sprouts with your hand . throw in the bean sprouts to the same bowl of vegetables .

add bean sprouts to the same bowl with rest of the vegetables .
pinch off the bean sprout tails and discard them . add the bean sprouts to the bowl with the mixture .

add bean sprouts to the same bowl with rest of the vegetables .
use a sharp knife to cut the mushrooms . put the bean sprouts into the bowl .

heat up a wok pan with little oil add ginger garlic paste green onion on low heat .
heat up the frying pan . add oil to the pan . spread the oil around so it covers the pan . set to low heat . add ginger , garlic paste and green onions and stir together in the pan .

heat up a wok pan with little oil add ginger garlic paste green onion on low heat .
heat up a wok . add oil to the wok and let the oil get hot . add the chopped ginger , garlic paste and green onion to the wok , cooking them on low heat so they do n't burn . stir while cooking .

heat up a wok pan with little oil add ginger garlic paste green onion on low heat .
take a wok pan and heat the pan . add little oil in to the pan . add some ginger garlic paste in to the pan . add some cut green onion in the pan . cook them on a low heat .

put the rolls on a baking plate and cover it with a plastic wrap and freeze them .
pick up the rolls . put the rolls on the sheet with spaces in between them . rip off a piece of plastic wrap to cover the entire tray . press down the plastic wrap around all edges . pick them up and put them in the freezer .

put the rolls on a baking plate and cover it with a plastic wrap and freeze them .
place the rolls flat on a baking sheet . cover the sheet with plastic wrap .

put the rolls on a baking plate and cover it with a plastic wrap and freeze them .
grab a baking sheet . put the rolls inside the baking sheet . grab some plastic wrap . put the plastic wrap over the baking sheet . fold the plastic wrap down on the baking sheet .

add the bean sprouts season with soya sauce and transfer everything on a baking sheet and spread them .
put the bean sprouts into the pan and season with soy sauce . use tongs to mix . use the tongs to remove the vegetables from the pan and put on a baking sheet . spread the vegetables on the baking sheet and let cool . you can also prop up the baking sheet to drain extra oil .

add the bean sprouts season with soya sauce and transfer everything on a baking sheet and spread them .
take a pan on the stove . cook the vegetables in the pan . add bean sprouts in to the pan . add some soya sauce on to the pan . transfer everything on to the baking sheet and spread .

add the bean sprouts season with soya sauce and transfer everything on a baking sheet and spread them .
add in bean sprouts to the stir fry pan . add soy sauce . use the tongs to move the stir fry from the pan to the baking sheet . lift up the baking sheet at an angle so any unwanted liquid drains out .

place the wings into the pot of hot oil and cook until fried .
place the wings into the hot oil , but not all at once . a rack at the bottom of the oil pan keeps the chicken off the bottom of the pot . do small batches at a time , so you do n't lower the cooking temperature of the oil . do the drumettes separately from the wingettes , because the cooking time is a little different for each . continue until all the wings are cooked .

place the wings into the pot of hot oil and cook until fried .
set the wings a few at a time . gently set the wings into the pot . separate the wings by type of wing because they have different cooking times .

place the wings into the pot of hot oil and cook until fried .
now we are going to place the wings into the pot . the oil is very hot , so do n't touch it with your hands . we will try and fit all our drumettes in at once and let them fry . then we will fry our wingettes . total we will fry about 4 lbs of wings and they will cook for about 15 - 20 minutes in total .

dry the chicken with paper towel .
take a paper towel . using the paper towel and gently dab the extra moisture from the chicken wings . be sure that the chicken wings have been dried off .

dry the chicken with paper towel .
you will need a paper towel for the next part . take the paper towel and gently push on each of the chicken wings on both sides to dry them . you do n't have to pick up the wings . just do it while they are on the plan .

dry the chicken with paper towel .
fold up a paper towel . use the paper towel to pat all the chicken pieces dry .

when the sauce starts to simmer gradually stir in the butter .
wait for the water in the pot to begin to simmer . add 4 tablespoons of butter and whisk so it combines with the hot sauce .

when the sauce starts to simmer gradually stir in the butter .
wait until the sauce begins to bubble a little bit . drop in the butter into the sauce . use a whisk and mix everything with the whisk .

when the sauce starts to simmer gradually stir in the butter .
bring the sauce to a bare simmer - that means as soon as you see bubbles forming , we 're ready for the next step . from the fridge , grab the unsalted butter we measured out at the beginning . it should still be cold . add the butter into the sauce one slice at a time , and whisk it until it has melted completely . if you want a milder sauce , use twice as much butter . when all of the butter has been melted and stirred in , turn off the heat and let the sauce cool before we start putting it on the chicken wings .

add the wings and sauce to a bowl and shake the bowl to coat the wings .
add wings to a bowl . add sauce to a bowl . shake the bowl in order to evenly coat the wings .

add the wings and sauce to a bowl and shake the bowl to coat the wings .
get a big bowl and add the cooked chicken wings inside the bowl . pour the sauce in the bowl . shake and swirl / turn the bowl around to get the wings covered in the sauce .

add the wings and sauce to a bowl and shake the bowl to coat the wings .
take the tongs and use them to move the wings into a bowl . put the sauce into the bowl with the wins . shake the bowl . evenly spread the sauce over all the wings .

separate and cut the chicken wing at the two joints .
take the chicken wings in a plate . take a cutting board and a knife . now take one chicken wing piece , locate one joint and cut near the joint . separate the joint from the wing .

separate and cut the chicken wing at the two joints .
pull the chicken at the joint and it will pop . cut in between the bend . cut the other bend .

separate and cut the chicken wing at the two joints .
get a long kitchen knife . with the knife cut the skin over the two joints on the wing . bend the wing at the two joints to break the joints . use the knife to cut between the two joints . the wing will now be in three pieces . take the tiniest piece of each cut wing and put them in a bag and freeze them for later use .

add red sauce to a sauce pan and heat to a simmer .
get a small pan . add 1 cup of red sauce to the pan . turn the heat to medium low and heat the sauce until it bubbles just a little bit .

add red sauce to a sauce pan and heat to a simmer .
take a small sauce pan on to the stove . heat the sauce pan on a simmer . take a cup of red sauce to the sauce pan . add the red sauce in to the pan . heat the sauce in the pan .

add red sauce to a sauce pan and heat to a simmer .
pour one cup of the red sauce into a small pot called a saucepan . heat the pot on the stove so that the sauce bubbles just a little bit , which is called a simmer .

cook bacon in a pot with oil and pepper .
put chopped bacon into the pot . add a small amount of oil to the pot . sprinkle black pepper onto the bacon . use a wooden spoon to stir the bacon in the pot . cook the bacon until it starts to get crispy .

cook bacon in a pot with oil and pepper .
add pepper to the cured bacon or pork product . cook till done but not crisp .

cook bacon in a pot with oil and pepper .
put bacon into a pan . put oil on top of the bacon . put pepper on top of the bacon . use a spoon and mix together .

mix eggs black pepper and cheese together .
put 2 eggs , some black pepper , and fresh grated parmesan cheese into a small bowl . stir everything together and set the bowl aside . our bacon should already cooked .

mix eggs black pepper and cheese together .
crack two eggs into a bowl . add a little black pepper . put the cheese in the bowl as well . using a fork , mix it to break the egg yolks ( the yellow bits in the middle ! ) . add the rest of the cheese and mix it all together until it 's really thoroughly mixed up .

mix eggs black pepper and cheese together .
in a small bowl place two eggs , black pepper , and fresh parmesan cheese . whisk the ingredients well .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
while the pasta is boiling in the hot water , take your dipping spoon and take some of the hot water . add the hot pasta water to the pasta sauce mix you are making .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
get 6 ounces of pasta and put it in a pan of boiling hot water . let the pasta cook .

cook the pasta in boiling water .
wait until the water is hot and bubbling . put pasta in water to cook .

add water from the pasta to the pan with bacon .
take 2 ladles full of the water that the pasta is boiling in . add the ladles of water to the pan the bacon is in . gently mix the bacon and water in the pan .

add water from the pasta to the pan with bacon .
using a large ladle or measuring cup get about a cup of pasta water . add pasta water to pot .

add water from the pasta to the pan with bacon .
use a ladle to scoop a cup of water from the pasta , and add it to the pan with bacon . make sure that the heat is as low as it goes .

add the pasta to the pan .
cook small pieces of bacon in a pot . add black pepper . add cooked spaghetti .

add the pasta to the pan .
drain all the water from the pasta . add all the pasta to the pan with the bacon . mix the pasta gently so the sauce gets on all the pasta .

add the pasta to the pan .
take cooked spaghetti and add to pot . stir spaghetti with sauce in pan .

mix in the egg mixture .
mix . pour egg mix in bowl . keep stirring until creamy .

mix in the egg mixture .
get a wooden spoon . with the pasta in a bowl , move the pasta around in a circular motion . slowly pour the egg cheese mixture , while you stir the pasta in a circular motion with the wooden spoon . keep moving the pasta until the pasta becomes creamy .

mix in the egg mixture .
stir hot pasta mixture . once mixed add in the egg and cheese mixture . stir together the pasta and egg mixture . will form a creamy rich sauce for the pasta . make sure to keep stirring .

mix in cheese .
sprinkle your cheese on top of the noodles , use a spoon to stir it together . once it 's mixed in you 're ready to eat .

mix in cheese .
add half the cheese to your noodles . stir . add other half then stir again .

mix in cheese .
turn off your heat . put your cheese into your pan . take your spoon and mix your cheese in your noodles .

pour some boiling water over the black fungus mushrooms .
boil water in a teapot . carefully pour the boiled water over the mushrooms until they are covered .

pour some boiling water over the black fungus mushrooms .
pour water in a pot or kettle . place on stove and turn on , wait to boil . while waiting for water to boil , pour mushroom in a bowl . when water boils , pour the boiled water in the bowl . be sure hot water covers mushroom completely .

pour some boiling water over the black fungus mushrooms .
place dish with black fungus mushrooms on open area of counter . take tea kettle or small pot of boiling water off stove top . carefully pour boiling water onto the mushrooms . pour enough water into mushrooms dish so that they float .

cut the chicken breast into thin slices and shred them into small pieces .
use a knife to cut the chicken into thin slices . hold a slice with a fork and use another fork to tear the slice into small pieces . repeat with the remaining slices .

cut the chicken breast into thin slices and shred them into small pieces .
take a cutting board and a knife . take the chicken breast on the cutting board . cut the chicken breast in to thin slices by passing the knife horizontally . take each slice of chicken breast and cut it in to small pieces . repeat the same with all the slices .

cut the chicken breast into thin slices and shred them into small pieces .
take your 2 chicken breasts and place them on a cutting board . take your sharp knife and carefully slice the chicken breast into slices by pressing your hand on top of the chicken and sliding the knife underneath . then , cut the chicken at an angle until the chicken is in thin strips .

add soy sauce corn starch and sesame oil and mix .
add 3 tablespoons soy sauce to the chicken , mix by hand . add 3 table spoons corn starch to the chicken , mix by hand . add 1 teaspoon sesame oil and mix by hand . let marinade .

add soy sauce corn starch and sesame oil and mix .
add three tablespoons of soy to the chicken . afterward mix in three tablespoons of corn starch and add a drizzle toasted sesame oil .

add soy sauce corn starch and sesame oil and mix .
add the soy sauce to the bowl of chicken slices . mix in corn starch as well . add the sesame oil and mix it again . make sure you wash your hands after touching raw chicken - it can make you very sick if you do n't !

cut the mushroom into little thin strips .
stack mushrooms onto of one another . pinch them below where you will begin cutting . use back and forth motions with the knife to cut into strips .

cut the mushroom into little thin strips .
use a knife to carefully slice the mushrooms into thin strips . cut all of the mushrooms .

cut the mushroom into little thin strips .
take a small section of your mushrooms and stack them on top of each other . next , very carefully cut them into thin strips . do the same thing with the rest of the mushrooms in small sections .

chop the tofu into small strips .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a big brick of tofu . pass the knife vertically and cut the tofu . cut the tofu in to small strips . cut the entire tofu block .

chop the tofu into small strips .
place a cutting board and cheese knife on counter . place the block of tofu on the cutting board , wide side down . cut four strips of tofu keeping your fingers away from the knife blade . stack all four slices up . cut through all of the slices to make small strips of all the sliced tofu .

chop the tofu into small strips .
chop the tofu carefully with a knife into even slices . then turn the slices onto the side and chop them again . place them into the bowl afterward .

slice the bamboo shoots into strips .
drain an 8 oz can of bamboo shoots . cut the shoots into small strips .

slice the bamboo shoots into strips .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some bamboo shoots in a bowl . now cut the bamboo shoot in to thin strips . repeat the same with other bamboo shoots . take them in a bowl .

slice the bamboo shoots into strips .
open 8 oz . can of bamboo shoots . drain liquid from can using lid to keep pieces in can . empty bamboo shoots onto a cutting board . using a knife , slice all of bamboo shoots into small strips .

boil the chicken stock and add the chicken mushroom tofu and the bamboo shoots .
cook the chicken stock until it is boiling ( bubbles coming to the top ) . once it is boiling , carefully add in the chicken , mushrooms , tofu , and bamboo shoots . keep cooking until the chicken cooks .

boil the chicken stock and add the chicken mushroom tofu and the bamboo shoots .
put the chicken stock in a pan . wait until the stock is bubbling really fast . add the chicken mushroom tofu and the bamboo shoots .

boil the chicken stock and add the chicken mushroom tofu and the bamboo shoots .
get eight or nine cups of chicken stock . put all the cups of chicken stock into the cooking pot and turn the heat knob on the stove until the stove has a nice flame . wait until the chicken stock starts boiling . next , add four ingredients . chicken , mushroom , bamboo shoots , and tofu . cook everything together until the chicken is nice and soft . you must then test it with a fork or a knife and see if it is soft .

add soy sauce rice vinegar sugar and white pepper .
once the chicken is cooked add 1/4 cup of soy sauce to the pan . add 1/4 cup rice vinegar . add 3 teaspoons of sugar . mix together . taste the soup to see if it needs salt . add 2 teaspoons of salt if it needs the salt .

add soy sauce rice vinegar sugar and white pepper .
place 1/4 cup of soy sauce into a small bowl . place 1/4 cup of rice vinegar into a small bowl . place 2 teaspoons of salt and 3 teaspoons of sugar in a small bowl . place the amount of white pepper instructed by the recipe inside of a bowl . place all the ingredients in each bowl into the soup , one by one .

add soy sauce rice vinegar sugar and white pepper .
add soy sauce . add vinegar . add sugar . add white pepper as needed .

add corn starch .
open the corn starch . fill up a measuring cup to 1 and a half with cold water . put some corn starch into the water . mix it all together . pour the corn starch water into the soup .

add corn starch .
put 2 tablespoons of cornstarch in 1/2 cup of water . stir the cornstarch until it is mixed completely with the water . pour the cornstarch mixture into the soup , while stirring .

add corn starch .
add 2 tablespoons of corn starch . add 1/2 cup of cold water .

add eggs and stir .
stand over the pot and slowly pour your egg into the hot soup . use a fork or spoon to slowly stir the egg as you pour .

add eggs and stir .
slowly pour the egg into the soup . use a fork to stir egg into soup .

add eggs and stir .
place a small mixing bowl on the counter . crack your eggs into the bowl . with a fork , beat the eggs until all yellow . when your soup comes to a gentle boil , slowly pour eggs into pan while stirring gently .

add the chopped scallions .
take the pot on the stove . take a bunch of scallions . cut the scallions in to very small pieces . put the scallions in a small bowl . now add the scallions in to the pot .

add the chopped scallions .
put the chopped scallions ( green onions ) into the pot . be careful placing scallions into the hot liquid .

add the chopped scallions .
take the bowl of scallions . add the scallions to the soup .

sprinkle the lamb with pepper salt worcestershire sauce garlic and cinnamon .
put cracked black pepper onto the lamb in a bowl . next put 1 1/2 teaspoons of salt . then add a little bit of worcestershire sauce and garlic into the bowl . finally add cinnamon to the bowl . mix all ingredients into the lamb .

sprinkle the lamb with pepper salt worcestershire sauce garlic and cinnamon .
sprinkle pepper over the lamb . add 1 1/2 teaspoons of sea salt . a small dash of worcestershire sauce . add garlic and cinnamon . mix together with a spoon , put in refrigerator for an hour .

sprinkle the lamb with pepper salt worcestershire sauce garlic and cinnamon .
use pepper grinder and twist the cap around 10 times into bowl of lamb chunks . add a teaspoon and a half of salt . add a dash ( a few drops ) of worcestershire sauce . then add your chopped garlic and measured amount of cinnamon .

stack pieces of lamb lemon green pepper onion and tomato on the skewer .
pick up a bamboo skewer . add lamb to the skewer followed by the lemon . next add green pepper and onion to the skewer . then add a tomato to the skewer . repeat steps until skewer is full .

stack pieces of lamb lemon green pepper onion and tomato on the skewer .
place plates with cubed lamb , onion , lemon , green pepper and tomato together . place a stack of wood skewers on the same counter as the plates . skewer a chunk of lamb on the first skewer and then add a lemon chunk . add chunks of green pepper , onion , tomato , lamb , lemon and lamb . repeat skewering the ingredients in that order on separate skewers .

stack pieces of lamb lemon green pepper onion and tomato on the skewer .
grab a wooden stick . stab your lamb , lemon , green pepper , onion and tomato onto the stick in that order .

place the shish kebabs on the grill and drizzle olive oil on top .
preheat the grill to medium . then place all 6 shish kebabs on the grill . cook them for 4 minutes per side . drizzle olive oil on the shish kebabs .

place the shish kebabs on the grill and drizzle olive oil on top .
preheat the grill to medium . place the shish kebabs on the grill . cook for about 4 minutes for each side . drizzle some olive oil on top .

place the shish kebabs on the grill and drizzle olive oil on top .
preheat the grill to medium . put the shish kebabs on the grill . drizzle some olive oil over the top of each kebab . grill for about 4 minutes per side .

add sesame oil egg yolk salt black pepper paprika all purpose flour and corn starch to a bowl .
grab a big bowl to mix all of your ingredients in . first add your sesame oil . then add your egg yolk . salt , black pepper , and paprika are all to be added next . then add all purpose flour . finally , add your corn starch to a bowl .

add sesame oil egg yolk salt black pepper paprika all purpose flour and corn starch to a bowl .
add sesame and olive oil to a bowl . add egg yolk in the oil . add salt and chili into the oil and egg yolk . add black pepper and all purpose flour into it . last we need to add corn starch to the bowl .

add sesame oil egg yolk salt black pepper paprika all purpose flour and corn starch to a bowl .
add sesame oil . add egg . add salt and black pepper . add paprika . add flour and corn starch .

add pieces of chicken to the bowl and mix .
get a mixing bowl , add the wet and dry seasonings together . add the cut chicken into the bowl . mix the chicken and seasonings together with your hands . when mixed , let the chicken sit in the bowl for 15 minutes . after 15 minutes , we will fry the chicken .

add pieces of chicken to the bowl and mix .
cut chicken in to strips . add strips of chicken to flour mixture .

add pieces of chicken to the bowl and mix .
add the pieces of chicken to the bowl . use your hand to mix the chicken within the ingredients you already have in your bowl . after mixing well , let it sit for fifteen minutes .

add olive oil to a heated pan add the chicken to the pan and stir .
start by placing oil into pan and heat the oil . add chicken to the oil and cook the chicken thoroughly . mix the chicken with the oil .

add olive oil to a heated pan add the chicken to the pan and stir .
turn on a burner on top of the stove to medium . put a large skillet on the burner and pour enough olive oil in it to coat the bottom of the skillet . let the olive oil get hot then put the chicken in a single layer in the skillet . use a spatula or spoon to stir the chicken while it is cooking .

add olive oil to a heated pan add the chicken to the pan and stir .
accompanied by an adult , take a frying pan and start the gas or electric burner to medium . add olive oil . once it is hot add the chicken . slowly cook it on medium until the chicken is white . there should be no pink in your chicken and it is done .

pour the chicken into a bowl .
take the pot of cooked chicken carefully . pour the chicken into a bowl and set aside .

pour the chicken into a bowl .
lift the pan off of the stove . pour the chicken into a empty bowl next to the stove .

pour the chicken into a bowl .
pick up the hot pan with the chicken in it . use a spatula to help move the chicken from the pan into a bowl .

pour chicken stock oyster sauce sesame oil and olive oil to a pan .
use same skillet you used before . pour chicken stock into a hot pan . then at the same time , add the oyster sauce , sesame oil and olive oil into the pan .

pour chicken stock oyster sauce sesame oil and olive oil to a pan .
use the same skillet you were already using . pour chicken stock , oyster sauce , sesame oil , and olive oil to your pan . these do not have to be in any specific order .

pour chicken stock oyster sauce sesame oil and olive oil to a pan .
put the skillet that you used earlier onto the stove with the heat on . put your hand over the skillet without touching it to see if it feels warm to your hand . one at a time pour the oyster sauce , sesame and olive oil into the hot skillet .

add soy sauce fish sauce hoisin sauce ginger - garlic paste sriracha chili sauce and barbecue sauce to the pan .
heat oil . add soy sauce . add rest of stuff . cook it forever .

add soy sauce fish sauce hoisin sauce ginger - garlic paste sriracha chili sauce and barbecue sauce to the pan .
add soy sauce to the hot pan . then add fish sauce and hoisin sauce to the pan with the soy sauce . next add the ginger - garlic paste to the pan . then add the sriracha chili sauce and barbecue sauce to the pan .

add soy sauce fish sauce hoisin sauce ginger - garlic paste sriracha chili sauce and barbecue sauce to the pan .
slowly pour all of the sauces and paste into the pan . the pan is hot , so be careful not to splash .

add rice vinegar and lemon juice to the pan and stir .
add rice vinegar into the sauce . add the lemon juice into the sauce . stir the sauce until it is well mixed and boiling .

add rice vinegar and lemon juice to the pan and stir .
add the rice vinegar which is white in color . add lemon juice also to the sauce . stir the sauce and cook it . then mix everything together with the help of a spatula . cook the sauce for 5 minutes until it becomes tasty .

add rice vinegar and lemon juice to the pan and stir .
add a cap full of rice vinegar to the sauce . add some lemon juice to the pan . stir all the ingredients in and cook it until it starts to boil . cook and stir for 5 minutes .

add the chicken to the pan and mix .
pour the cut up chicken into the hot sauce in the pan . using a spoon carefully mix the chicken and sauce together .

add the chicken to the pan and mix .
when the sauce is simmering , bring the bowl of chicken over to the pan and dump it in . using a spatula , stir and flip the chicken into the sauce so that the sauce covers the chicken .

add the chicken to the pan and mix .
get a pan and make your sauce . sauce should be hot and thick . grab cooked chicken . add chicken to sauce . mix sauce and chicken together .

add chopped celery and half an onion into the pan and mix .
cut one stalk of celery into small pieces . cut one half onion into small pieces . mix it together into the mix to make sure it 's all covered in sauce .

add chopped celery and half an onion into the pan and mix .
chop up one stalk of celery . add chopped celery to pan . chop up half of an onion . add the chopped onion to the pan . mix up the ingredients well .

add chopped celery and half an onion into the pan and mix .
first cut celery into small pieces . add the celery in to the mix . cut the onion into big thin slices . add this also into the mix and stir it .

cut a green onion into two inch wide pieces finely chop garlic and thinly slice ginger .
place two trimmed green onions onto the cutting board . cut the green onion into two inch long pieces . place three cloves of garlic on the cutting board . mash and then chop cloves into small pieces . place two small pieces of ginger onto board and slice into small slivers .

cut a green onion into two inch wide pieces finely chop garlic and thinly slice ginger .
get some green onion . cut them into two inch wide pieces . get some garlic and finely chop it up to small pieces . with a ginger slice it to thin pieces .

cut a green onion into two inch wide pieces finely chop garlic and thinly slice ginger .
take a cutting board and a knife . take some green onions on the board . cut the green onions in to inch wide pieces . take some cloves of garlic and cut them in to small pieces . take a piece of ginger and cut them in to thin slices .

place the chicken into a pot of hot oil .
set the heat to medium high 350 - 400 degrees . then use tongs to put the chicken into the pot of oil . continue to cook until the chicken is golden brown .

place the chicken into a pot of hot oil .
when the oil is very hot ( 375 - 400 degrees ) put the chicken in the pan . be careful - hot oil can spit which can be painful ! when the chicken is golden brown you can take it out .

place the chicken into a pot of hot oil .
dip the chicken in the watered flour . pour the oil in the bowl . boil the oil . put the chicken in the boiling oil . fry it until golden brown .

crack an egg into a bowl of diced chicken and mix .
tap an egg to crack it and open it into the bowl of chicken . mix everything together with chopsticks .

crack an egg into a bowl of diced chicken and mix .
crack one egg into the bowl of chicken pieces . use chopsticks to mix the egg and chicken together .

crack an egg into a bowl of diced chicken and mix .
add cut up diced chicken to a bowl . tap an egg on a corner to crack it and empty the egg into your bowl of chicken . mix it up well so the egg is incorporated into the chicken coating every piece .

add chicken stock sugar vinegar hoisin sauce sesame oil cornstarch and mix .
