add 1/4 cup of chicken stock into a bowl . put 2 tablespoons of sugar and 2 tablespoons of vinegar . add 2 tablespoon of hoisin sauce . put in 1 tablespoon of cornstarch . use a fork to mix all of the ingredients in a bowl .

add chicken stock sugar vinegar hoisin sauce sesame oil cornstarch and mix .
take a mixing bowl . add 1/4 th cup of chicken stock in to the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of sugar and vinegar in the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of hoisin sauce and sesame oil in to the bowl . add 1 tablespoon of corn starch and mix .

add chicken stock sugar vinegar hoisin sauce sesame oil cornstarch and mix .
get a mixing bowl . using a measuring cup add 1/4 cup of chicken stock to the bowl . next using a measuring spoon add 2 tablespoons of sugar , 2 tablespoons of vinegar , 1 tablespoon of hoisin sauce , 1 tablespoon of sesame oil , 1 tablespoon of dark soy sauce and one teaspoon of corn starch . using a whisk or a fork mix until all the ingredients are blended and all the sugar has dissolved .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
add the sauce to the middle of the wok . using a stirring utensil , stir the sauce and other ingredients together until the sauce begins to boil .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
pour the sauce into the frying pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the sauce in while it cooks .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
pour the bowl with your sauce into the wok . use a spatula or spoon to stir the sauce around . let it start to bubble .

add the chicken to the wok and stir .
very carefully put the chicken into the wok . stir the ingredients in the wok with a large wooden cooking spatula . keep stirring and make sure each piece of chicken gets coated with sauce .

add the chicken to the wok and stir .
pour the chicken into the hot wok . use a spoon to stir the chicken in the wok . turn up the heat and add sesame seeds if desired .

add the chicken to the wok and stir .
take the breaded chicken and add to the vegetable mix . stir constantly to cover the chicken with the sauce and vegetables until thoroughly hot and blended . add sesame seeds for flavor at the end if you wish .

add oil into a hot wok and add the green onion garlic and ginger .
let the wok heat up on high heat on the stove . add 2 tablespoons ( tbs ) of oil . cut green onions , garlic and ginger . add it all to the oil and pan .

add oil into a hot wok and add the green onion garlic and ginger .
set the heat on high . add the oil to the hot wok . add the green onion , garlic , and ginger . push them off your chopping board with a spoon or spatula .

add oil into a hot wok and add the green onion garlic and ginger .
while the wok is cooking and should be hot put in oil . then add in the chopped up green opinions and the ginger .

cover the chicken in flour .
take a plate . add some flour in to the plate . take the chicken with the skewer sticks . toss the chicken in the flour . repeat the same with all the pieces of chicken .

cover the chicken in flour .
place the chicken piece in the flour by grabbing it with the chopsticks . use the chopsticks to flip the chicken around and cover it with flour .

cover the chicken in flour .
after you have cut your chicken into small pieces , pick up one piece at a time with chopsticks . using the chopsticks , toss each piece of chicken on the plate of flour . make sure to toss the chicken until it is well coated . when you 're done , the entire surface of each piece of chicken should have flour on it . if tossing the chicken is too difficult with chopsticks , you can use tongs or a fork for now .

add sesame seeds to the wok and stir .
now we are going to want to add in sesame seed to our dish . take the sesame seed and add as much as you desire . we suggest using one tablespoon to the wok . then take your spatula and start mixing your dish around in the wok .

add sesame seeds to the wok and stir .
take some sesame seeds in a small bowl . cook the ingredients in the pan . add the sesame seeds in to the pan . take a big spatula . mix the sesame seeds with the contents in the pan .

add sesame seeds to the wok and stir .
pour the sesame seeds in the wok . stir everything up with a wooden spoon .

remove the chicken from the pot and place onto a plate .
get paper towels and place on top of plate . hold plate near pot in one hand . in opposite hand hold large slotted spoon . scoop spoon under chicken , then lift to drain . then dump chicken onto plate from spoon .

remove the chicken from the pot and place onto a plate .
use a spoon with holes in it to scoop the chicken out of the pot . place the chicken on a plate with a paper towel on it .

remove the chicken from the pot and place onto a plate .
use a spoon scoop out the chicken . place the chicken onto a plate with a paper towel on top of it . let the paper towel absorb the extra grease .

slice and toast the bread in the pan .
use a knife to carefully slice the bread . cut it into slices about 1 centimeter thick . put the bread on the grill to toast it .

slice and toast the bread in the pan .
cut the bread at the end into small slices carefully . put the bread slices in the pan lined up .

slice and toast the bread in the pan .
slice the bread with a knife . make the slices about a centimeter thick . put the bread slices in the hot pan . heat the pan to a high heat .

season with some sea salt cracked pepper and dried oregano add some extra virgin olive oil around the pan .
okay now we will season our dish with sea salt and cracked pepper . next will be some dried oregano on top of everything . lastly lets put a fair amount of extra virgin olive oil into our pan .

season with some sea salt cracked pepper and dried oregano add some extra virgin olive oil around the pan .
add some sea salt to the pan . put in some cracked pepper . add some extra virgin olive oil . pour some dried oregano over the top .

season with some sea salt cracked pepper and dried oregano add some extra virgin olive oil around the pan .
put the onions in the pan with your hands evenly . next using fingers sprinkle sea salt on the top of the onions and tomatoes . then add some cracked pepper . also add some dried oregano with your fingers . then pour a good amount of extra virgin olive oil to coat the vegetables .

squash about 7 - 8 cloves of garlic and distribute it around the onions and tomatoes .
squash 7 or 8 cloves of garlic with your hands . sprinkle it over the onions and tomatoes evenly .

squash about 7 - 8 cloves of garlic and distribute it around the onions and tomatoes .
crush 7 or 8 cloves of garlic . put the garlic around evenly in the pan .

squash about 7 - 8 cloves of garlic and distribute it around the onions and tomatoes .
take some cloves of garlic . remove the peel of the garlic . squash about 7 - 8 cloves of garlic . take the garlic from the board . add the garlic into the tray in between onions and tomatoes .

slice 2 kilos of tomatoes in half and place it flesh side up on a baking tray .
2 kilos equal to 4 1/2 lbs , let your mom know how many tomatoes you need for this recipe . wash tomatoes well because there have been many hands touching them to get them to your home . get a sharp knife , be careful now and with the stem side up , slice down the middle of each tomatoes . set the cut side up of each half tomato into an oblong cake pan . continue cutting the rest of tomatoes the sane way and place every one into the pan .

slice 2 kilos of tomatoes in half and place it flesh side up on a baking tray .
use a knife and cutting board to cut 2 kilos , or about 10 tomatoes in half . place the cut tomatoes in a baking pan with the cut , flesh side facing up .

slice 2 kilos of tomatoes in half and place it flesh side up on a baking tray .
put tomatoes on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut each tomato in half . place the tomatoes with the cut side up into a baking pan .

cook it in the oven .
now , we will want to place it in the oven for 50 minutes , maybe up to an hour . be careful when putting the pan in the oven , or you may burn yourself .

cook it in the oven .
chop up some tomato , onions , garlic . add olive oil . place in a pan and roast for about 2 hours . place a pot on the stove and add water . slice some italian bread and add to the pot . now pour the roasted tomato mix into the pot . mash everything together in the pot . soup is ready .

cook it in the oven .
turn your oven on at 200 degrees . when the oven is preheated , put the dish in the oven . let it cook for 50 min to 1 hour , until the tomatoes and garlic are soft .

add some chopped basil leaves into it .
use a knife to careful cut the basil leaves up . add the basil leaves to the pot .

add some chopped basil leaves into it .
on a cutting board cut up some bail leaves with a knife . take your chopped up basil leaves and add to your pot .

add some chopped basil leaves into it .
pour broth into a pot over medium heat . put about a half of a bunch of basil on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut the basil into large pieces . add the cut basil leaves and stems to the pot of broth .

blend the soup and add olive oil .
warm tomato soup in pot on top of stove . take a hand blender . put hand blender in the soup and pulse until it is blended . ladle soup into a bowl . add a little basil and olive oil to the top .

blend the soup and add olive oil .
use a blender and blend the soup . add some bail to the top of the soup . add some olive oil .

blend the soup and add olive oil .
use your immersion blender to place into the soup , and turn it on as to blend the soup into a more smooth soup . remove the immersion blender , and scoop the soup into a bowl with a large spoon or ladle . add a single basil leaf and lightly drizzle a bit of olive oil on top of the soup by plugging the olive oil bottle top with your finger as to not let too much come out on the top of the soup .

pour all the ingredients into a soup pot pour the stock into the pot and put it on medium heat .
take a pot on the stove and heat the pot . take a baking pan with all the ingredients . take the pan and transfer all the ingredients in to the pot . add a can of stock in to the pot . mix the contents of the pot .

pour all the ingredients into a soup pot pour the stock into the pot and put it on medium heat .
put all of the ingredients into a large soup pot . pour the stock into the pot and cook over medium heat .

pour all the ingredients into a soup pot pour the stock into the pot and put it on medium heat .
pour the contents of the pan into the pot . add the stock into the pot . turn the temperature to medium heat .

cut two spanish onions into quarter pieces and scatter them on the tomatoes .
use a knife to cut two spanish onions . take the onions and spread them out in the pan over the tomatoes .

cut two spanish onions into quarter pieces and scatter them on the tomatoes .
take two onions on the cutting board . cut the onions in to four quarters . take a baking tray . add some tomatoes on the tray . add the onions on the tomatoes in the tray .

cut two spanish onions into quarter pieces and scatter them on the tomatoes .
using a knife , cut two spanish onions in half . cut each half piece into half again . set the large onion pieces on top of the tomatoes inside the pan . spread the large onion chunks around evenly .

season the sauce with a splash of red wine vinegar .
while the bread is on the grill , stir the sauce . to the soup , add a small splash of red wine vinegar and stir . keep an eye on the bread so it does n't burn .

season the sauce with a splash of red wine vinegar .
check to see if the soup has been cooking for about ten minutes . get red wine vinegar bottle . add about 6 - 7 shakes of the vinegar into the soup pot .

season the sauce with a splash of red wine vinegar .
add some red wine vinegar to the soup pot . keep an eye on the bread pan to make sure it does n't burn .

tear half ciabatta bread pieces into the pot and stir .
take half of the bread and tear pieces of it into the soup . be careful so it does not burn so stir from time to time .

tear half ciabatta bread pieces into the pot and stir .
with a knife cut the ciabatta bread in half . with your hands break the bread into pieces . put the pieces of bread into the pot . using a spoon stir it all together .

tear half ciabatta bread pieces into the pot and stir .
use a knife to cut the ciabatta bread into two halves . take one half of the bread and tear pieces off . toss the torn pieces into the pot . mix the bread into the pot with a stirring spoon .

pop all the garlic flesh out and discard the skin .
take the garlic out of the skin . throw away the skin .

pop all the garlic flesh out and discard the skin .
using your fingers , gently squeeze the garlic on the edge over the pan . the garlic should just pop out easily into the pan . you can throw away the garlic skin .

pop all the garlic flesh out and discard the skin .
squeeze the garlic flesh out of the skins . spread the garlic insides around the pan . toss out the old skins .

add the noodles and stir .
fry the vegetables for one minute . add in the noodles . the noodles will be stiff . stir until the noodles become soft and are cooked through .

add the noodles and stir .
stir the noodles with a wooden spoon . make sure to always stir so they do not burn . if you are cooking for a lot of people boil the noodles for a minute to soften them up .

add the noodles and stir .
add noodles into the frying pan . use a stirring spoon to mix the noodles in with the vegetables . cook for 1 minute .

cook the egg in the wok .
put the egg in the pan . turn on the heat to cook the egg . mix up the egg with a spoon as it is cooking .

cook the egg in the wok .
add the egg to the pan . use a spoon to scramble the egg as it cooks .

cook the egg in the wok .
place the frying pan on the stove . add the oil into the stove . add the egg into the pan . cook the egg .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
add the sauce to the food mixture in the pan . think about how much sauce you will want , and add that to the mixture . stir together to make sure you have added enough sauce .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
use a wooden spoon to stir the noodles . add the sauce to the noodles and stir .

add the sauce to the wok and stir .
pour in the sauce into the pan . use a stirring spoon to mix in the sauce with the rest of the pan .

add the carrots green onion and chicken to the wok .
add carrots to the frying pan . put in some green onions . add the chicken . use the stirring spoon to mix the vegetables around while they cook .

add the carrots green onion and chicken to the wok .
add an egg to the pan . add your vegetables . use a spoon to mix the veggies and eggs around a little bit , but make sure you do n't mix the veggies and egg together yet .

add the carrots green onion and chicken to the wok .
have pre - mixed sliced carrots , green onions and chopped chicken ready . confirm that the wok on the burner has enough oil . add the carrots , onions and chicken to the wok . get a wooden spoon and stir the mixture in the wok .

add ginger and garlic to the wok and stir .
use a spoon and put the ginger and garlic in the wok . stir everything with a wooden spoon .

add ginger and garlic to the wok and stir .
take a pan and place it on the stove . cook the ingredients in the pan . add some ginger in to the pan . add some garlic pieces in to the pan . mix the contents of the pan with the spatula .

add ginger and garlic to the wok and stir .
add some ginger to the pan . put in some garlic . use a spoon to stir the ingredients around as they cook .

heat oil in the wok .
pour the oil into the frying pan . heat the oil in the pan . add an egg to the pan .

heat oil in the wok .
put oil in a hot wok . allow the oil to get hot .

heat oil in the wok .
put the pan on the stove , and turn the stove on to medium - high heat . double check that the dial for the burner is set to the middle notch . the middle notch is medium - high heat . let the pan heat up for about 2 minutes . set your timer so that you do n't let it heat for too long . while the pan is heating up , measure out the right amount of cooking oil . after two minutes , pour the oil into the middle of the pan .

mix apple cider vinegar and sugar together .
carefully pour the apple cider vinegar and sugar in the bowl . use a spoon to mix it up very well .

mix apple cider vinegar and sugar together .
put apple cider vinegar and sugar in a bowl . put in the microwave for a few seconds . take bowl out of microwave and use a spoon to mix the sugar into the vinegar .

mix apple cider vinegar and sugar together .
add 3 tablespoons of apple cider vinegar to a small bowl . then add 2 tablespoons of sugar . microwave for a few seconds to help dissolve the sugar . then stir well until the sugar is dissolved .

mix in tamarind paste .
add 2 teaspoons of tamarind paste to the bowl . use a spoon to mix the paste into the bowl .

mix in tamarind paste .
take a small glass bowl . add some water in to the bowl . add some tamarind paste in to the bowl . take a spoon . mix the paste and water with a spoon .

mix in tamarind paste .
use a spoon to scoop in some tamarind paste . use the spoon to mix everything up really good .

mix in fish sauce chili sauce chili flake and sriracha sauce .
add 1 teaspoon of fish sauce . put in 1 tablespoon of hot chili sauce . add some chili flakes . put in some sriracha sauce . add some tamarind and mix together the ingredients with a spoon .

mix in fish sauce chili sauce chili flake and sriracha sauce .
take oil and add in fish sauce . then mix in sriracha . add in chili flakes . mix together . then add in tamarind .

mix in fish sauce chili sauce chili flake and sriracha sauce .
to the bowl , add in 1 tsp . of fish sauce . pour in about 1 tablespoon of the thai hot chili sauce . you can also add hot chili flake if you like your sauce more spicy . add in sriracha sauce and some tamarind sauce . mix well .

then start cutting along till the other end holding the strips .
take a cutting board and a knife .. . take the meat on the cutting knife . place the knife in a slant angle . place the knife on one side of meat . pass the knife horizontally to the other side .

then start cutting along till the other end holding the strips .
use a knife to carefully cut along the bottom of the fish . hold the top end in place as you slice .

then start cutting along till the other end holding the strips .
hold the fish on one end . start cutting along the fish diagonally in thin strips with a knife .

spread out the pieces .
lay the fish out in rows with your hands . spread them out a little bit .

spread out the pieces .
after cutting the fish separate it into pieces . place the pieces side by side on a serving platter . garnish the fish with daikon radish slices .

spread out the pieces .
take the pieces of salmon . use your hands to spread the pieces apart .

carefully cut the salmon flesh into long strips without cutting the outer skin of the fish .
use the knife to cut long strips into the salmon . do not cut all the way through to the outer skin .

carefully cut the salmon flesh into long strips without cutting the outer skin of the fish .
use a knife to carefully cut the salmon . cut the salmon into long strips . be careful not to cut the outer skin on the bottom of the fish .

carefully cut the salmon flesh into long strips without cutting the outer skin of the fish .
cut the fish on a cutting board using one stroke . do not cute through the skin on the bottom of the fish so it will stay together for the next step .

make a cut in the center and take along till the one end of the meat holding the strips .
use a knife to cut the fish . cut along the bottom not slicing all the way through the skin .

make a cut in the center and take along till the one end of the meat holding the strips .
cut into the middle of the salmon at a 45 degree in the dark part of the meat . once you have cut down , do n't cut through the skin but instead cut along the skin to remove the meat from the skin . this is a lot easier if you use a well sharpened knife and hold the meat firmly .

make a cut in the center and take along till the one end of the meat holding the strips .
you may need help from an adult for this part . get a cutting board and a sharp knife . you will be removing the skin from the salmon . put the piece of salmon on the cutting board with the pink side up . put the knife in the middle of the salmon and angle the blade like this : / . slowly cut down until you almost touch the skin then turn the knife blade so it is flat against the cutting board , firmly hold the other side of the salmon and cut across the bottom of the salmon piece . repeat it for the next side of the salmon piece .

boil the peas in a pot of water .
pour the peas to the boiling water . continue to oil until they are soft .

boil the peas in a pot of water .
fill a pot with water and turn the heat on the stove up . wait until the peas are bubbling and they are boiling .

boil the peas in a pot of water .
heat a pot of water over high heat until boiling . add the peas to the water and cook until they are soft . carefully taste a pea every few minutes to see how cooked they are .

coat the fish in flour and batter .
take your fish to your plate of flour . turn it around a few times to each side to make sure it is coated . now you can dunk it into your batter . let the excess batter drip off .

coat the fish in flour and batter .
spread out enough flour on a plate so that it covers the entire plate . put the piece of fish on top of the flour and flip it to the other side many times so that the entire piece of fish is covered in flour . dunk the flour covered fish in the separate bowl of batter . make sure the flour covered fish is completely covered in the batter .

coat the fish in flour and batter .
take the fish with your hands and place it in the batter until covered . take the fish with your hands and place it in the batter until covered .

fry the chips in the oil .
at the same temperature add the chips to the pot . continue to cook the chips until they are golden brown and crispy .

fry the chips in the oil .
lower the chips carefully in the oil slowly with a spoon . let them cook in the oil .

fry the chips in the oil .
take a pot and place it on the stove . add some oil in to the pot and heat the oil . cut the potatoes in to long strips . add the potatoes in to the hot oil . fry the potato chips .

add vinegar and salt on top .
add vinegar on the top of the fish . put a sprinkle of salt over the top of the fish .

add vinegar and salt on top .
drizzle some vinegar on top of the fish and potatoes . then sprinkle a little bit of salt on the fish and potatoes .

add vinegar and salt on top .
first , add just a little vinegar to the fish . just splash the vinegar onto the fish . then add a sprinkle of salt .

chop up the shallot and garlic .
use a knife to carefully chop up the shallot into small sections . slice the garlic with the knife .

chop up the shallot and garlic .
get a sharp knife and cutting board out . peel outer layer of shallot . cut the shallot into small , tiny pieces . cut the garlic into tiny pieces .

chop up the shallot and garlic .
now we want to take our knife and dice up the shallot . just take it and make really thin and small pieces . now lets do the same thing with the garlic . be careful , the knife is very sharp .

peel and cut up the potato .
hold the potato and peel it carefully with a peeler . hold the potato carefully and get a knife . angle the knife and cut the potato into small discs long ways .

peel and cut up the potato .
take a potato . peel the skin off . then use a knife and cut into thick slices . add the potatoes to water . boils and get ready to mash .

peel and cut up the potato .
with a peeler go up and down your potato until they have no skin . with a knife cut your potatoes lengthwise . with your knife cut them again .

add butter shallots and garlic to a pan .
take a pan on the stove and heat the pan . add some butter in to the pan . cut the shallots and garlic in to small pieces . add the shallots in to the pan . add the garlic in to the pan .

add butter shallots and garlic to a pan .
put the butter in the pan and let it melt . add garlic to the pan . add shallots to the pan . stir with a wooden spoon until cooked .

add butter shallots and garlic to a pan .
peel the garlic cloves . use a kitchen knife to slice the garlic cloves into very thin slices . put butter into pan , put the shallots in the butter . when the shallots get soft , add the garlic to the pan and cook for 2 minutes . stir the garlic while it 's cooking .

blend the onions and peas .
add the peas and onions into a blender . put the lid on the blender . pulse for about 30 seconds .

blend the onions and peas .
add the cooked peas and onions to a blender . put the lid on the blender . make sure the blender is plugged in and turned on . pulse the mixture for 30 seconds , or until everything is smooth .

blend the onions and peas .
pour the mixture of onions of peas into a blender . put the lid on the top and make sure it is all the way down , so nothing leaks . push the pulse button slowly again and again for 30 seconds to blend .

fry the potatoes in oil .
carefully add the potatoes into the hot oil . cook for 5 - 6 minutes keeping an eye on their color .

fry the potatoes in oil .
take a pot on the stove . add some oil in to the pot . heat the oil in the pot . cut the potatoes in to long strips . add the potatoes in to the oil and fry them .

fry the potatoes in oil .
place the potatoes in the hot oil . cook the potatoes in the oil for 5 to 6 minutes .

add in some of the cooking water to the blender with the peas . now add in some salt , pepper , and lemon juice and begin blending .

pour some water in the cup . sprinkle in some salt and pepper with your hands . squeeze a lemon over the cup so the juice falls in .

mix in water salt pepper and lemon juice .
add some water to the mixture . add some salt . add some black pepper to the blender . squeeze in some lemon juice . blend everything together .

mix water beer yeast and flour .
pour cold water in the bowl . pour beer in the bowl . pour the yeast in the bowl . slowly pour the flour in .

use your fingers to dip the fish into the batter . once the oil has reached 350 degrees add the fish to the oil . cook fish in the oil for six to seven minutes . use a large spatula to remove the fish from the pan and drain on paper towel .

take the fish with your hand . slowly lower the fish into the oil without touching the oil .

put mayonnaise into a bowl . add lemon juice . use a whisk to mix together the lemon juice and mayonnaise .

spread the cooked rice on the sheet of nori shiny side down .
put the nori down with the shiny side down . spread the rice evenly with your fingers until the nori is covered .

add sriracha sauce to the bowl .
cut the tuna into small cubes with a large kitchen knife . put the tuna into a mixing bowl . add the sriracha sauce to the tuna .

now we are going to add a small amount of sriracha sauce . not to much though , or the dish may end up being extra spicy . just as much as you think your guests and you will enjoy .

grab the bottle of sriracha sauce and pull up the top to open it . drizzle some sauce across the top of the tune . mix the sauce into the tuna .

roll the bamboo sheet over the nori while adding pressure .
using the bamboo sheet fold the sushi over . using the bamboo sheet roll the sushi over completely .

roll the bamboo sheet over the nori while adding pressure .
grab the bottom edge of the mat and roll forward . keep pressure on the mat until it is rolled over once .

roll the bamboo sheet over the nori while adding pressure .
roll the bamboo sheet over the nori . push down in order to have pressure on the nori .

heat the pot on a stove until the water boils .
now we want to turn on the heat and set the pan on the burner . the heat will eventually start boiling the water for us after a few minutes .

cut the roll in even slices .
place the roll on a cutting board . using a sharp knife , cut the roll in even slices .

cut the tuna into small pieces carefully . add the tuna to a bowl .

take tuna and chop it with a knife into very small pieces . add it to a bowl . mix in 1 teaspoon of sesame oil . then chop scallions with a knife into small pieces . mix all together and get ready to serve .

chop vegetables .
chop the garlic into very small piece . peel the skin from the ginger and use a grater to grate the ginger . chop the spring onions and carrots very thinly .

chop vegetables .
cut up vegetables in thin small pieces . cut up garlic into small pieces with a knife . cut off the skin around the garlic . use a greater to grate the ginger , by rubbing back and forth .

chop vegetables .
take a knife . go up and down with your knife on your vegetables . with ginger first take off the skin with the knife . use a grater for your ginger rub the ginger against your grater .

add oil to the wok .
take a bottle of cooking oil . measure a tablespoon of the oil in a measuring spoon . add the tablespoon of oil to your cooking pan .

add oil to the wok .
open a bottle of sunflower oil . pour a small amount of the oil into the wok or big pan .

add oil to the wok .
get your sunflower oil . put a little bit in the wok .

cook the chicken in the wok .
make sure the wok is hot . pour the chicken into the wok . cook the chicken until the chicken is nice and firm .

cook the chicken in the wok .
take your bowl of chicken and place it near the wok . heat the wok to high by turning the control knob to the maximum temperature . add the chicken to the heated wok . cook until the chicken is firm and brown in color and cooked through .

cook the chicken in the wok .
a wok is a big round bowl shaped pot . the wok needs to be hot before adding the chicken . mix the chicken around until the chicken is firm and cooked .

transfer the chicken to a plate .
have a plate ready on the counter . pick up the pan with the cooked chicken . bring the pan close to the plate and slide the chicken out of the pan and onto the plate .

transfer the chicken to a plate .
chicken is in pan . it needs to be on a plate . it is cooked now . move chicken to plate . be careful !

transfer the chicken to a plate .
take your pan of chicken . with your spoon put the chicken onto a plate .

add oil to the wok .
place a wok or deep frying pan on the stove . pour a little oil into the pan .

add oil to the wok .
take the bottle of sunflower oil . add just a small amount of oil to the wok ( about the size of a quarter ) .

add oil to the wok .
take some quantity of oil . add the oil to the wok .

add vegetables to the wok and stir together .
take a pan on the stove . cut the garlic and ginger in to small pieces . add the ginger and garlic in to pan and stir . cut the carrot and spring onions and potatoes in to thin strips . add the vegetables in to the pan and stir .

add vegetables to the wok and stir together .
cut garlic into thin slices and put them into the pan . when the garlic smells like it has started to cook add the thinly slices vegetables . mix bean sprouts and vegetables together in the pan .

add vegetables to the wok and stir together .
put your veggies into your pan . use a spoon to mix your veggies together .

add oil and sauce to the wok .
with a spoon , add one tea spoon of sesame seed oil . with the same spoon , add 2 table spoons of oyster sauce . using the same spoon , add 1 teaspoon of soy sauce into the pan .

add oil and sauce to the wok .
add the oil and sauce to the pan . stir .

add oil and sauce to the wok .
add a teaspoon of sesame seed oil to pan . add a tablespoon of oyster sauce . add a teaspoon of dark soy sauce .

add chicken noodles and seasoning to the wok and stir together .
once the vegetables are tender add chicken to the wok . add the noodles ( rice or wheat noodles is fine ) . make sure they are precooked . add about a tablespoon of curry powder to the pan . stir well but do n't overcook the noodles . turn off the heat immediately .

add chicken noodles and seasoning to the wok and stir together .
place the chicken into the heated wok on the stove . add the cooked noodles to the wok . pour the seasoning into the wok . stir them all together in the wok .

add chicken noodles and seasoning to the wok and stir together .
use large spoon or spatula to scoop chicken into the wok . use tongs to place noodles in the wok . sprinkle seasoning over the noodles and chicken . be sure to use a utensil with a long handle and mix the noodles chicken and seasoning together . make sure ingredients are mixed together well and be careful not to burn self on the hot wok .

transfer everything onto a platter and garnish .
now all you have to do is slowly pour your noodles from the your pan onto your main serving tray . do this by slowly tipping pan towards your tray and letting the noodles slide off the pan and onto the tray . you can use your spoon to help the noodles out of the pan if they get stuck . be sure to keep the pan away from your skin , as it is very hot . now all you have to do is sprinkle the garnish on top of the noodles and you are ready to serve your dish .

transfer everything onto a platter and garnish .
turn off the heat . use a wooden spatula to remove noodles from pan and onto serving plate . put some spring onions on top of noodles . serve .

transfer everything onto a platter and garnish .
cook everything in a skillet . take it out of the skillet and put it in a large bowl . sprinkle the top with onions .

taste the stir fry .
get a fork out of the drawer and swirl the noodles like spaghetti and get some chicken and vegetables on the fork and taste it all together .

taste the stir fry .
use a fork to get a little bit of each ingredient in one bite . taste your creation and see how delicious it is .

taste the stir fry .
put the stir fry on the plate . next grab a fork and taste the stir fry .

grab some carrots green onion cilantro and throw it on top . cut some fresh water cress and put it on top .

add carrots green onion cilantro and water cress on top .
cut some carrots into long slivers or shreds ( shreds of carrots ) . cut some green onions and cilantro for seasoning . add all those to your bowl by sprinkling all over dish . put some pieces of water cress ( looks like lettuce ) just the leaves on top of dish .

add mushrooms and oil to a pan .
pour mushrooms in a pan . add some oil into the pan .

add mushrooms and oil to a pan .
take a pan on the stove . cut the mushrooms in to thin slices . add the mushrooms in to the pan . take some oil in a can . add the oil in to the pan .

add mushrooms and oil to a pan .
now we are going to add in the mushrooms . once they are all inside the pan , we want to add in our cooking oil . you will see the mushrooms suck up all of the oil .

add ginger garlic and green onion to the pan .
hold the cut up ginger garlic and green onion over the pan . push the cut up pieces in with a wooden spoon .

add ginger garlic and green onion to the pan .
pour in the ginger . add garlic . add green onion . mix the ingredients together with a stirring spoon .

add ginger garlic and green onion to the pan .
cut up some mushroom and place in frying pan , allow to steam , add bell pepper and onions . add olive oil or another cooking oil to it . pre heat oven . make dressing by combining gluten free soy sauce and other sauces and raw sugar . pour the dressing and the noodle in the pan and mix .

mix soy sauce oyster sauce sugar ponzu miso and sake .
pour a small amount of soy sauce into a bowl . add a little oyster sauce . add a pinch of brown sugar . add a table spoon of miso paste . add a little bit of sake ( a few splashes ) , mix everything together with a spoon or whisk .

mix soy sauce oyster sauce sugar ponzu miso and sake .
add soy sauce , oyster sauce , sugar , ponzu , miso , and sake . stir everything together . use your whisk to stir .

mix soy sauce oyster sauce sugar ponzu miso and sake .
get a big bowl . carefully spoon in a little soy sauce and oyster sauce . pour in the sugar ponzu miso and sake .

fry bacon on a pan with hot oil .
heat up a pan on the stove to high heat . put a little bit of oil on the pan . place the bacon strips onto the pan not touching each other . flip the bacon over in the pan to cook evenly . when lightly browned on each side , use a tong to take out the bacon and place it on a paper towel .

fry bacon on a pan with hot oil .
put a pan on the stove with a little bit of oil and heat the pan . the pan should be on a high heat . put the bacon in the pan to lightly fry it . take bacon out of the pan and drain on paper towels .

fry bacon on a pan with hot oil .
heat your pan on a high heat with a very small amount of oil in it . if the heat is n't high enough , the bacon will be boiled , rather than fried crispy . only a small amount of oil is needed because the fat in the bacon will render out and help to cook it . lightly fry the bacon , then put it on strips of paper towel to absorb the excess oil .

place poached eggs on top of the bacon .
remove egg from poaching water with slotted spoon . drain one egg , or two or three eggs with slotted spoon . prepare bacon and english muffin . carefully slide egg or eggs onto top of bacon . add sauce .

place poached eggs on top of the bacon .
take the eggs and poach it . take the bacons into the plate . place the poached eggs on the bacon .

place poached eggs on top of the bacon .
take the poached eggs and carefully put them on the bacon . do n't stack them but put them side by side .

drizzle hollandaise sauce over the eggs .
carefully pour hollandaise sauce onto the eggs . be careful not to pour too much sauce onto them .

drizzle hollandaise sauce over the eggs .
cook eggs as you like . add eggs to a plate . add a liberal amount of hollandaise sauce to the top .

drizzle hollandaise sauce over the eggs .
now we will add the hollandaise sauce on the eggs . we will put a small amount on the eggs , but not to small . it will be to rich if we add to much . just slowly drizzle the sauce over the eggs .

place a toasted english muffin on a plate and spread butter on it .
put a toasted english muffin on a plate . use a knife to spread butter on the english muffin .

place a toasted english muffin on a plate and spread butter on it .
take a plate . take an english muffin . toast the muffin . place the muffin in the plate . spread some butter on the muffin .

place a toasted english muffin on a plate and spread butter on it .
toast an english muffin in the toaster . put the english muffin on a plate . take a knife and get some butter on it and paint it over the muffin all over .

garnish with parsley and pepper .
grab the cut up parsley with your fingers . sprinkle it on top . sprinkle it around evenly . sprinkle some pepper on top .

garnish with parsley and pepper .
add chopped up parsley over the top of the eggs . add a little bit of pepper to the top .

garnish with parsley and pepper .
get a cutting board out . get a knife out that can be used to cut parsley . put the parsley on the chopping board . use the knife to chop up the parsley into small bits . spread the chopped up parsley over the eggs .

poach eggs in a large pot of hot water .
using a whisk the boiled water . place the egg into the water .

poach eggs in a large pot of hot water .
heat up a large pot of hot water . put the eggs into the pot . put in the eggs one at a time .

poach eggs in a large pot of hot water .
bring water to boil in remove from heat , stir water . crack egg into a small bowl . put egg into the hot water , return to heat .

remove bacon from pan .
use tongs . slowly and carefully use the tongs to pick up one piece of bacon at a time . remove the bacon using the tongs and place on paper towel .

remove bacon from pan .
once the bacon is done and browned time to take it out . grab your tongs and a plate . put plate on the counter . use the tongs to slowly and carefully grab the bacon one and put on the plate . turn stove off .

remove bacon from pan .
use your grabbing utensil and pick up the bacon . take the bacon out of the pan and set it on a paper towel .

place cooked bacon on top of english muffin .
set the cooked bacon on top of the english muffin . make two layers of bacon across each other .

place cooked bacon on top of english muffin .
you can put some hollandaise sauce on the english muffin if you 'd like first . then , layer four strips of bacon onto the english muffin .

place cooked bacon on top of english muffin .
once the bacon is cooked , put it on top of the english muffin .

combine flour salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper garlic powder and onion powder .
take flour and slat into a bowl . add black pepper and cayenne pepper into the bowl . also add garlic powder and onion powder into the bowl . mix altogether so that everything blend evenly everywhere .

combine flour salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper garlic powder and onion powder .
add one cup of flour into a bowl . add to your flower one tablespoon of salt and a teaspoon of ground black pepper . then add a quarter teaspoon of cayenne pepper and a half a tablespoon of garlic powder . then add tablespoon of onion powder and a teaspoon of dried mixed herbs .

combine flour salt ground black pepper cayenne pepper garlic powder and onion powder .
mix 1 cup of flour , 1 tablespoon of salt , 1 teaspoon of black pepper . then add 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper , half of tablespoon of garlic powder . then add 1 tablespoon of onion powder . use a spoon to mix well .

add dried herbs and the instant mashed potato powder .
add a teaspoon of dried herbs to the bowl . add half a cup of mashed potato powder to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl together with a spoon .

add dried herbs and the instant mashed potato powder .
add a tablespoon of dried mixed herbs that are in a spice container . add a half of a cup of instant potato powder . mix it all together with a fork .

add dried herbs and the instant mashed potato powder .
add dried herbs into a small bowl . add instant potato mashed powder into the bowl . the instant potato mashed powder is used to make it super crunch . mix together with the help of a spoon .

coat the chicken in the egg and then the mixed powder .
take the chicken pieces on a plate . take egg in a bowl . take mixed powder in a bowl . now dip the chicken in egg wash . now dip the chicken in mixed powder .

coat the chicken in the egg and then the mixed powder .
dip the chicken in the eggs . then dip the chicken in the flour . set the floured chicken on a plate .

coat the chicken in the egg and then the mixed powder .
use your hands to dip chicken into the beaten egg . then dip chicken into flour and put on a plate . repeat this with all of the pieces of chicken .

fry the coated chicken in deep oil .
heat canola in pan until it reaches 180 degrees c. or 350 degrees f. . use tongs to add chicken to heated canola oil . cook chicken for 20 minutes on one side , then cook the other side for 20 minutes . repeat until all pieces of chicken are cooked .

fry the coated chicken in deep oil .
place a wok of canola oil onto your stove , make sure there is enough oil to be able submerge the chicken . turn your stove on and heat the oil until it reaches 350 fahrenheit , you can use a thermometer to check the temperature . use tongs to add your coated chicken to the hot oil .

fry the coated chicken in deep oil .
preheat the canola oil to 350 degree f. . place the battered chicken into the oil and fry it .

fry chopped onions garlic and salt .
put chopped onions , garlic , and salt into some oil in a pot that is hot . stir them with a spoon .

fry chopped onions garlic and salt .
cut onions into small pieces . cut garlic into small pieces . add the onions , garlic , salt and a small amount of oil into a frying pan . turn the burner on to medium high heat , and occasionally stir with wooden spoon .

fry chopped onions garlic and salt .
in a heated pan put chopped onions , garlic , and salt . let them all cook in pan till they brown a bit and stir .

add chopped apples and cook .
add chopped apples to the pan . stir the ingredients in the pan .

add chopped apples and cook .
cut onions with a knife into strips . cut apples with a knife into strips . put a pan on the stove and turn the knob until you have a medium sized fire . add a small amount of oil to the pan and add your onions . add your apples and stir with a wooden spoon until they become soft .

add chopped apples and cook .
cut some ginger into long skinny strips and add it to the pan .

add bagoong and red chilies .

add bagoong and red chilies .
first you will add the bagoong into your mixture and let it cook with the food . after a few moments , take your wooden spoon and mix the bagoong into the dish . now you will want to put in your red chilies and slowly mix them in as well . be careful though , the pan is hot !

add spinach and stir .
carefully add spinach to the pot . stir the pot with a wooden spoon . the spinach will get mushy and soft . all done !

add spinach and stir .
take your spinach and carefully put it into your pot . just use your hand to add it , but make sure not to burn your hand in the broth or on the pan . now just take a spoon and mix the spinach into the pan . stir it in well and let it cook .

whisk mayonnaise lemon juice and pepper and combine with the fruits and nuts .
with a knife chop the walnuts into small pieces . take some mayo out with a spoon and place it into a bowl . squeeze a lemon with your hand into the bowl . add pepper into the bowl . take a whisk and stir the mixture .

whisk mayonnaise lemon juice and pepper and combine with the fruits and nuts .
get a whisk . mix everything together with the whisk . throw the fruits and nuts in the bowl .

whisk mayonnaise lemon juice and pepper and combine with the fruits and nuts .
put walnuts on a cutting board and chop them with a knife . put mayonnaise into a bowl . squeeze lemon just into the mayonnaise . add black pepper , salt to the mayonnaise and whisk with a wire whisk . add fruits and nuts and mix well with a spoon .

chop celery apple red grapes and roasted walnuts .
get a cutting board , knife , and medium size mixing bowl . carefully cut the celery into 1/4 inch pieces . put in bowl . cut the apple in half , remove the apple core . chop the apple into square pieces about the size of dice . put in the bowl with celery . cut the grapes in half and add to the bowl . carefully chop up the walnuts or use walnuts that are already chopped up . add to the bowl .

chop celery apple red grapes and roasted walnuts .
lay celery horizontally on a cutting board , and cut small , very thin slices using a chef 's knife . place whole apple on a cutting board . using a chef 's knife cut the apply in half , cut out the core and throw away , cut rest of apple into very small cubes . place stem with grapes on a cutting board . pick each grape off of the stem . one grape at a time , use a chef 's knife to cut each grape in half . gather up all of the walnuts into a small , flat pile on a cutting board . using a chef 's knife , gently rock the blade back and forth over the pile to chop up the walnuts .

chop celery apple red grapes and roasted walnuts .
place your celery stalk on your cutting board and chop them fairly thinly . then cut your apple in half and then cut the halves into small cubes . now take half a cup of the grapes off of the vine and place them onto your cutting board . cut each grape into halves . now take your half of a cup of toasted walnuts and place them on the cutting board and rock your knife to give them a good coarse chop .

place the salad on lettuce .
place a large piece of lettuce on a plate . scoop the salad into the large bed of lettuce . serve the salad .

place the salad on lettuce .
take a large plate . place some big lettuce leaves on the plate . take the salad in the bowl . place the salad on the lettuce leaves . take the plate aside .

place the salad on lettuce .
add some chicken cut up into little pieces to the salad if you want . rip off a big piece of lettuce from a lettuce head and put it on a plate . take a spoon and transfer the salad onto the piece of lettuce .

chop onion and garlic .
use a knife to cut up onions into small squares . use a knife to cut up garlic into small squares . use the knife to gently cut up the onions and garlic into even smaller squares . continue to cut up the onions and garlic into very tiny pieces .

chop onion and garlic .
cut onion and garlic into small pieces . hi .

chop onion and garlic .
cut onion into small pieces and place in container . using a large bladed chefs knife , smash 4 cloves of garlic by carefully putting the flat side of the blade on top of the garlic and hitting with a fist . cut each clove finely and continue to chop until it is in very tiny pieces . add to the onions .

beat eggs and crush crackers .
tap the egg lightly on a firm and clean surface and with your thumbs open the crack and pull apart the egg shell to drop the insides into a bowl . the yolk should be yellow and whites are clear . there should be no red or other odd colors inside of the eggs . throw away the egg shells and sniff the eggs to make sure there is n't a rotten smell . whisk the eggs well until they are completely smooth and combined . crunch the saltine crackers inside of the package and be sure to crush them as finely as possible .

beat eggs and crush crackers .
take a medium sized bowl . break open 2 eggs in to the bowl . mix the eggs with the hand mixer . take the pack of crackers . crush the crackers with hand .

beat eggs and crush crackers .
crack eggs into a bowl , beat eggs with a wire whisk . break crackers into small pieces .

add ground beef tomato sauce a1 sauce soy sauce ketchup onion and garlic to a bowl .
put cold meat into bowl . put half can of a1 sauce into bowl . put a little bit of soy sauce into bowl . put a little bit of ketchup in bowl . add onion and garlic .

add ground beef tomato sauce a1 sauce soy sauce ketchup onion and garlic to a bowl .
put one pound of ground beef in a large bowl . carefully open a can of tomatoes and add half a can of tomato sauce to the meat . add 2 tablespoons of a1 sauce , using measuring spoons . add one teaspoon of soy sauce add one teaspoon of worcestershire sauce add 3 tablespoons of ketchup . cut up carefully half an onion and 2 garlic cloves into small cubes and add them in the bowl .

add ground beef tomato sauce a1 sauce soy sauce ketchup onion and garlic to a bowl .
take a can opener and open the tomato sauce . put the can of tomato sauce into the bowl using a spoon . put some a1 sauce into the bowl . put some soy sauce into the bowl . put some ketchup into the bowl .

add eggs the crackers salt and pepper mix .
add the cracked eggs to the bowl . add the crushed crackers to the bowl . sprinkle a little bit of salt , pepper , and garlic salt to the bowl . use your hands to gently mix the ingredients in the bowl until all ingredients are mixed and you can shape the mix into a loaf .

add eggs the crackers salt and pepper mix .
add your whisked eggs to the bowl . add in your crushed crackers . sprinkle a little bit of salt and pepper into the bowl . mix all of this together with your hands until it just gets combined .

add eggs the crackers salt and pepper mix .
carefully crack the eggs and put in a small bowl , mix them up with a fork . add the eggs to the meat . add the crushed crackers . add a teaspoon of garlic powder , some salt and pepper to taste . using your hands , mix all the ingredients together until the crackers are mixed in well . shape it into a meatloaf shape which can be an oval shape or rectangle shape .

put the mixture in a pan and shape .
pick up mixture . put mixture in pan . press on mixture until it is flat and fills pan .

put the mixture in a pan and shape .
take the mixture in a big bowl . take a loaf pan . take the mixture with the hand . transfer the mixture in to loaf pan . spread the mixture with the hand .

put the mixture in a pan and shape .
shape the mixture a bit while in the bowl . next put mixture into pan . then shape it to the pan .

mix mashed potato chopped garlic onions salt janes and pepper .
put the mashed potatoes in a bowl . add the chopped garlic , onions , seasoning salt and pepper . make sure your hands are super clean ! mix it so the spices are mixed throughout the potatoes !

mix mashed potato chopped garlic onions salt janes and pepper .
first you want to add the chopped garlic and onions into into the bowl with your potatoes . make sure the potatoes are very cold . then add a few shakes of lawrey salt into your mix . next you are going to want to add a few shakes of janes mixed up salt and then a some salt and pepper . now quickly mix the ingredients together and start forming your patties for the pancakes .

mix mashed potato chopped garlic onions salt janes and pepper .
add your chopped garlic and onions , some lawrys salt , janes seasoning , onion pepper , salt and pepper to the bowl of cold leftover mashed potatoes . use your hand to quickly mix all of those ingredients together .

heat oil and fry the patties .
pour enough olive oil in a small pan to cover the entire bottom space . turn on the stove top burner to medium heat . put a very small cube of potato into the olive oil and once it sizzles it 's hot enough for your potato pancakes . remove small cubed potato from your oil with a spoon . lay your pancake in the oil and when all sides are sizzling , use a spatula to carefully flip the pancake over .

heat oil and fry the patties .
put extra virgin olive oil in pan . turn heat to medium . place a piece of raw potato in oil to test that it is oil hot enough . press potato pancakes to flatten . put potato pancake in hot oil and cook until browned .

heat oil and fry the patties .
pour olive oil into a small skillet , just enough to coat the bottom . turn on the stove burner to a medium setting , and place a small piece of the dough into the oil ; once the piece of dough begins to sizzle , the oil is hot enough to begin frying the patties . place one of the patties into the pan , being careful not to splatter the hot oil , and fry it for a couple of minutes until it is golden brown . very carefully flip the patty over and brown the other side . place the cooked patty on a plate , and cook the rest of the patties the same way as the first until they are all cooked .

pour tomato sauce on the meatloaf .
open the can of tomato sauce . pour it onto the top of the meatloaf , make sure it gets all over the top . you can use a spoon to spread the tomato sauce if you need to .

pour tomato sauce on the meatloaf .
pour the can of tomato sauce right over the top of the meatloaf in your pan . put the pan back in the oven so it can cook for 15 more minutes .

pour tomato sauce on the meatloaf .
spread the tomato sauce on top of the meatloaf . put on an oven mitt . put the meatloaf back into the oven and cook for 15 minutes .

add sugar to the cabbage .
put cabbage and scallions in a large bowl . add 2 to 3 teaspoons of sugar in the bowl with the cabbage and scallions .

add sugar to the cabbage .
measure out 2 - 3 teaspoon sugar of sugar . add the sugar on top of the cabbage .

add sugar to the cabbage .
add 2 to 3 teaspoons of sugar to the cabbage bowl . mix the ingredients together in the bowl .

add the green onion and garlic to the cabbage .
add the green onions to the mixing bowl . put the garlic to the bowl with the cabbage and green onions .

add the green onion and garlic to the cabbage .
take a big sized mixing bowl . add the cabbage pieces in to the bowl . cut the green onions and garlic in to small pieces . add the green onions and garlic in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

add the green onion and garlic to the cabbage .
your cutting board has 5 green chopped onions and 3 chopped garlic pieces on it . a medium size bowl contains the cabbage . scrape all of the chopped onions and garlic from the board into the bowl . while scrapping , mix well the onions and garlic .

mix salt with the cabbage .
once the cabbage is all shredded , you can start mixing in salt . double check that you are using either sea salt or kosher salt . if you use regular salt , it will cause the cabbage mixture to become gummy while it is in the fridge later . sprinkle a bit of salt onto the cabbage , and then use your hands to mix it in . repeat this a few times , making sure to mix the cabbage very well after you have sprinkled salt on it .

mix salt with the cabbage .
put some salt on top of your cabbage . with your hands mix the salt and cabbage together .

mix salt with the cabbage .
pinch some salt with your fingers . sprinkle the salt on the cabbage . mix the cabbage up with your hands .

rinse the cabbage .
when the chopped up cabbage has 1 to 2 cups of liquid in the bowl it needs to be rinsed . put the bowl of cabbage in the sink and fill it with water . mix the cabbage and water together . get a colander or sieve and dump the cabbage in the colander . let the cabbage drain well .

rinse the cabbage .
grab the cabbage with the tongs and tip the bowl on it 's side . drain the water out of the bowl . put water in the bow . with tongs mix the cabbage around . with your hands put your hand over the cabbage and rinse out the water .

rinse the cabbage .
take a mixing bowl . add the cut pieces of cabbage in to the bowl . add some water in to the cabbage and wash the cabbage . remove the water from the bowl . repeat the same one more time .

add red pepper and mix .
add red pepper seasoning to the bowl of ingredients . using a spoon , mix thoroughly . taste the mixture and choose to add more red pepper or leave as is , adjusting to your liking .

add red pepper and mix .
take a mixing bowl . add the salad contents in to the bowl . add some red pepper in to the bowl . take a mixing tongs . mix the pepper and other contents in the bowl .

add red pepper and mix .
pour in the red pepper carefully into the bowl . use tongs to mix everything together .

chop up the green onion and garlic .
now take your knife and chop the ends off of the green onions . once the ends are removed , go ahead and chop up the rest of the onion , being sure to keep your fingers clear . chop both the onion and the cracked garlic up into fine pieces . remember , just use the edge of your knife to slowly crack open the garlic and then the sharp part to dice it finely .

chop up the green onion and garlic .
take a cutting board and a sharp knife . take some green onions . cut the green onions in to small pieces . take some garlic cloves and remove the peel of the garlic . cut the garlic in to small pieces .

chop up the green onion and garlic .
chop 5 green onions carefully with a knife . crush 3 pieces of garlic . slice the garlic with the knife .

insert all the marinated veggies and chicken to the soaked skewing sticks .
put the marinated vegetables and chicken pieces on the wooden skewers . put the skewered vegetables into a baking pan . use a spoon to put some of the sauce on the shish kebabs .

insert all the marinated veggies and chicken to the soaked skewing sticks .
soak squires in water . place marinated veggies and meat onto soaked skewers . lay full skewers out . brush kebabs with sauce .

insert all the marinated veggies and chicken to the soaked skewing sticks .
using skewers place a tomato onto the skewer . place a mushroom onto the skewer . place a red pepper onto the skewer . place chicken onto the skewer . place a cucumber onto the skewer .

transfer some liquid into another bowl to marinate the chicken and let the chicken and veggies marinate for an hour .
place the vegetables in a bowl with the ingredients to marinate them . take a smaller bowl and pour some of the ingredients for the marinate into the smaller bowl . take your chopped up chicken and add it to the small bowl to marinate . make sure to coat all of the chicken . now place the 2 bowls into the fridge to marinate for 30 mins - 1 hour .

transfer some liquid into another bowl to marinate the chicken and let the chicken and veggies marinate for an hour .
get out a small bowl . pour some liquid out of the vegetable bowl into the smaller bowl . put the raw pieces of chicken into the small bowl ( with the liquid ) to marinate ( soak up the liquid ) . let the chicken soak for an hour in the small bowl ; and the veggies soak in the large bowl for an hour , separately .

transfer some liquid into another bowl to marinate the chicken and let the chicken and veggies marinate for an hour .
put the veggies in the bowl with the marinade . mix the veggies with the marinade . drain the extra liquid from the veggies . put the cut up raw chicken into the extra liquid . put the chicken into the fridge for .

add bell peppers mushrooms cherry tomato zucchini and red onion to a bowl and mix .
put sliced red peppers into the bowl . then add mushrooms and cherry tomatoes . put in zucchini . finally add chopped red onions . use your hands to mix the bowl together .

add bell peppers mushrooms cherry tomato zucchini and red onion to a bowl and mix .
pick up the plate and pour the all of the vegetables into the bowl , being careful not to spill the bowl . use your hands to mix together all of the ingredients . make sure the veggies are completely covered in the oil mix ( marinade ) . cover the veggies . find a space in your fridge for the bowl , and then put the bowl in the fridge .

add herb packets water vinegar and olive oil to a bowl and mix well .
open the herb packets by tearing the top off . dump the packets in the bowl . add water vinegar and olive oil to the bowl . mix everything with a spoon .

add herb packets water vinegar and olive oil to a bowl and mix well .
take a medium sized bowl . add 2 packets of herb packets in to the bowl . add a cup of water in to the bowl . add some vinegar in to the bowl . add little olive oil in to the bowl and mix .

add herb packets water vinegar and olive oil to a bowl and mix well .
pour in 2 packets of herbs . add 1 cup of water to the bowl . pour in some vinegar . add olive oil . mix all of the ingredients together with a stirring spoon .

pour the leftover marinated sauce on it while its cooking .
hold the bowl of sauce over the grill . take a spoon and scoop the sauce up . slowly pour the sauce over the kebabs with the spoon .

pour the leftover marinated sauce on it while its cooking .
use a spoon to pour juice over the shish kebabs on the grill . let the shish kebabs grill for about 20 to 25 minutes .

pour the leftover marinated sauce on it while its cooking .
cook the shish kebabs until they are almost done . take the leftover marinade and pour it over the tops of the kebabs for extra moisture and flavor .

place the skewers on the grill and turn them every 5 min to cook evenly .
place the skewers onto the grill with your hands . put all the skewers on the grill close together . turn over the skewers with your hands .

place the skewers on the grill and turn them every 5 min to cook evenly .
hold the ends of the stick and put the sticks on the grill . turn the sticks over every 5 minutes to a new side that has n't been on the grill lines .

place the skewers on the grill and turn them every 5 min to cook evenly .
heat the grill . take the prepared skewers in a plate . place the skewers on to the grill . cook the skewers on one side . turn them every 5 min till they are cooked on all sides .

pick the ends off the verdalago .
hold the long stems of the verdalago in your hand . bunch them all together . pluck the leaves off . once you ' ve removed all the leaves , remove the stems . wash the leaves very well with cold water .

pick the ends off the verdalago .
to wash the verdalago , pull the leafy parts off of the stem . put the leafy parts in a bowl and run them under water . hold onto the leafy parts while you dump the water out . repeat rinsing the leaves and draining the water from the bowl two or three times until there is no more sand in the bottom of the bowl .

pick the ends off the verdalago .
prep . taste . appears . display . presentation .

combine lemon juice sumac garlic salt and oil in a bowl .
pour the lemon juice into a bowl . add sumac . place garlic into a press and squeeze it into the bowl . sprinkle in salt and add oil as well . whisk it all together .

combine lemon juice sumac garlic salt and oil in a bowl .
pour lemon juice into a bowl . pour sumac ( the red powder ) on top of the lemon juice . open garlic press and put garlic inside the jaws . squeeze down hard . scrape the garlic that comes out into the bowl . sprinkles / pour a spoon of salt into the bowl . stir everything in the bowl until the mixture becomes uniform ( one single color ) .

combine lemon juice sumac garlic salt and oil in a bowl .
take juice from 2 lemons in to a bowl . add 1 tablespoon of sumac in to the bowl . add finely cut garlic or garlic salt in to the bowl . add 1 teaspoon of salt . add 4 tablespoons of oil in to the bowl .

chop lettuce and place it in a bowl .
grab lettuce out of the fridge . grab a knife that it used to cut vegetables . cut the lettuce into bite - sized pieces . place the cut lettuce into the bowl . keep the root end out .

chop lettuce and place it in a bowl .
take a bunch of lettuce . take a clean chopping board . place the lettuce on the chopping board . cut the lettuce in to smaller pieces with a knife carefully . place the lettuce in to the bowl .

chop lettuce and place it in a bowl .
place the lettuce on its side . with the lettuce flat on the table , grab it with your left hand . using a sharp knife , begin to cut the lettuce . make sure the cuts are around the same size . be careful to always practice safe knife skills and keep your left hand out of the way .

add verdalago pepper cucumbers tomatoes herbs and onions to the lettuce in the bowl .
add lettuce , two bunches of verdalago , cut up peppers , and cucumbers to the bowl . cut up one tomato into squares and add to the bowl . cut up the parsley and add to the bowl . add two tablespoons of mint to the bowl . cut up and add three tablespoons of green onion .

add verdalago pepper cucumbers tomatoes herbs and onions to the lettuce in the bowl .
add the lettuce to the bowl . add the peppers to the bowl . add the cucumbers to the bowl . add tomatoes and onions to the bowl . add the herbs to the bowl .

add verdalago pepper cucumbers tomatoes herbs and onions to the lettuce in the bowl .
take lettuce in to a bowl . add 2 bunches of verdalago in to the bowl . add 1 red and 1 green bell pepper,1 cup of cucumber and 3 small tomatoes in to the bowl . add half bunch of small cut parsley , and 2 tablespoons of small cut fresh mint in to the bowl . add 3 cut green onions finally in to the bowl .

pour the dressing over the salad and mix .
pick up the dressing you already made . pour it over your salad slowly . grab your spoon . stir the dressing into the salad . mix it all up !

pour the dressing over the salad and mix .
take out the salad dressing . pour some dressing on top of the salad . stir the dressing into the salad with a fork or spoon .

pour the dressing over the salad and mix .
cut the carrot and the vegetables into small cubes . cut all the leaves and put it in a big bowl . mix together all the vegetables and leaves . add the vegetable broth into the bowl of vegetables . then mix everything with a spoon .

add the fried pita to the salad and mix .
have an adult or be really careful heating up a skillet with some oil to put pita bread in . with a fork or pair of tongs make sure it 's golden toasted / fried on both sides , remove from pan to a napkin or paper towel covered plate to cool off . after the pita is cooled enough break fried pita it into pieces or strips . take plate of pita pieces to salad bowl , and add a little bit at a time , stir mixing into salad , then add more repeat stirring . presto your all done !

add the fried pita to the salad and mix .
put the fried pita on the salad . stir the mix until the pita is mixed in well with the salad .

add the fried pita to the salad and mix .
take bowl of pre - made salad . take fried pita and add in small pieces to pre - made salad .

pour some oil into a hot pan .
today we are making a shepherds pie . first slowly pour some oil into your hot pan on the stove . let the oil heat up and then pick the pan up by its handle and swirl the oil around inside . be careful , the pan is hot . use a glove if your pan does not have an insulated handle .

pour some oil into a hot pan .
pour oil on the pan . pick up the pan and move it around letting the oil get all over the pan .

pour some oil into a hot pan .
carefully pour oil into the hot pan . pour just enough to barely cover the bottom of the pan . grab the pan by the handle and tilt it side to side , watch the oil coat the bottom of the pan evenly .

add chopped onions and carrots to the pan .
add the chopped carrots and onions to the hot pan . stir them together .

add chopped onions and carrots to the pan .
take a spoon and brush your chopped onions into the pan . then add 1/2 cup of cut carrots to the pan .

add chopped onions and carrots to the pan .
put a pan onto the stove and let it heat up . cut up half a cup of carrots and half a cup of onions . add the carrots and onions into the pan on the stove .

add salt to the pan and mix .
heat a stainless steel pan over medium high heat with a little oil or butter . after you have chopped your vegetables into very small pieces , add them to the pan . stir with a large spoon to keep vegetables from sticking or burning . sprinkle a little salt over the vegetables , and keep stirring .

add salt to the pan and mix .
grab some salt with your fingers . sprinkle it into the pan . mix the vegetables with your spoon .

add salt to the pan and mix .
add salt to the pan sprinkle it evenly around . mix together everything .

add butter and garlic to the pan and mix .
put a pan on the stove . turn the heat on and wait for the pan to heat up . add veggies and cook them for a few minutes . time to add your butter and garlic . carefully put the butter and garlic in the pan . you can put them in all at the same time . give it a good stir with a long spoon so the butter can melt all the way .

add butter and garlic to the pan and mix .
carefully drop the butter in the pan . slowly add the garlic in the pan and mix it around with a spatula .

add butter and garlic to the pan and mix .
add 2 tbsp of butter and 2 cloves of garlic to the pan . stir everything with your spoon .

add lamb to the pan and break it up .
hold the bowl of lamb over the pan . use the spatula to scoop it out of the bowl and into the pan . break the lamb apart by poking it with the spatula .

add lamb to the pan and break it up .
take your 2 pounds of lab and place it into your pan . begin breaking up the chunk of lamb in the pan with your cooking spoon . make sure to keep your hands clear of the hot pan and stove top .

add lamb to the pan and break it up .
add two pounds of ground lamb to the hot pan with the other ingredients . using a large spoon , break up the meat as it cooks .

add salt black pepper and italian seasoning to the meat .
use your fingers to grab some salt black pepper and seasoning . sprinkle these into the pan all around slowly .

add salt black pepper and italian seasoning to the meat .
add salt , black pepper , and 1 tbsp italian seasoning to the meat in the hot pan . stir everything with your spoon . cook the meat until it is brown .

add salt black pepper and italian seasoning to the meat .
add some salt to the mix mixture . next add black pepper to your mix . add 1 tablespoon italian seasoning .

add flour to the pan and mix .
slowly pour int two tablespoons of flour into your pan . use your spoon to get it all out of the bowl . now just mix your flour in with your meat , and stir it well .

add flour to the pan and mix .
use a measuring spoon to obtain two tablespoons of flour . pour the two tablespoons of flour into the pan . use a spatula to mix the flour into the meat in the pan .

add flour to the pan and mix .
add two tablespoons of flour to the meat in the pan . use a large spoon to mix the flour in . the flour will help thicken the broth .

add lamb broth to the pan .
add 2 cups of lamb broth to the pan . stir slightly and cook slowly .

add lamb broth to the pan .
pour two cups of lamb broth or stock over your cooked meat and vegetables . let it cook for several minutes so that the broth soaks into the meat and vegetables .

add lamb broth to the pan .
use a measuring cup to get 2 cups of lamb broth . slowly add the stock to the pan . mix it around with a spoon and let it cook .

add frozen peas to the pan and stir .
add your pre - measured half a cup of frozen peas using your spatula to make sure they 're all into your pan . use the spoon to mix it well until they 're all mixed in . make sure you 're preheating the oven to 350 degrees so it 's ready for you .

add frozen peas to the pan and stir .
turn on oven and set the dial to 350 degrees . add half a cup of frozen peas into the mixture as it is cooking on the stove . stir the peas up evenly with a big spoon or spatula .

add frozen peas to the pan and stir .
measure out 1/2 cup of frozen peas . pour the peas into the pan and stir with a large mixing spoon . turn on the oven to 350 degrees , it will make a beeping sound when it reaches 350 degrees .

pour the meat into an oven safe container .
take food out of pan . put half in an oven safe container .

pour the meat into an oven safe container .
use a big spoon or ladle and scoop the meat into a pan . slowly fill the pan .

pour the meat into an oven safe container .
use a spoon and scoop the meat into a pan . fill the pan halfway to the top .

add mashed potatoes to the container and level over the meat .
take a spoon and scoop the mashed potatoes and put them on the meat . take five or six spoon fulls , enough to cover the meat . then use your spoon and spread the mashed potatoes out flat on top of the meat .

add mashed potatoes to the container and level over the meat .
using a spoon , take your mashed potatoes and add them into your baking dish . now you will want to keep adding mashed potatoes until they are able to be spread out evenly over all of the meat . make sure they are level and even all the way across . just keep using your spoon to spread it out , but leave a little space at the top of your dish . now make a few ridges across the potatoes to help them cook more evenly . just drag a fork across the surface of them to do this .

add mashed potatoes to the container and level over the meat .
add mashed potatoes to the container with your spoon . use your spoon to smooth them down everywhere . leave a little room at the top of the container . use a fork to make ridges in your potatoes .

transfer macaroni to a pan and then add butter and mix well .
use your spoon to help pour the macaroni from the colander into the pan . pour the butter over the macaroni . stir it up so the butter is all mixed in .

transfer macaroni to a pan and then add butter and mix well .
pick up bowl of macaroni noodles . use a spoon to push noodles from the bowl to the pan . make sure you get all noodles out of the bowl and into the pan . pick up bowl of melted butter and dump all over noodles in the pan . use a big spoon to mix noodles and butter together .

transfer macaroni to a pan and then add butter and mix well .
drain the water from the macaroni and take it in a bowl . add the macaroni in to the pan . melt some butter . add the melted butter in to the pan of macaroni . mix the butter and macaroni .

incorporate evaporated milk and mix it .
take the cup of milk and hold it over the pan . slowly pour it into the pan . take a spoon and mix everything up .

incorporate evaporated milk and mix it .
take the evaporated milk in the measuring cup . pour it over the noodles evenly . then stir it around gently to mix with the noodles .

incorporate evaporated milk and mix it .
with a spoon mix the noodles around . add the bowl of evaporated milk . with a spoon mix the noodle mixture around .

add water salt and oil to pan to boil and add macaroni .
take a large pot on the stove . add some water in to the pot . add one teaspoon of salt in to the water . add 1 tablespoon of oil in to the pot and boil the water . add macaroni in to the pot and boil for seven minutes .

add water salt and oil to pan to boil and add macaroni .
fill a large pot with water and place it on the stove . add to the water : 1 teaspoon of salt and 1 tablespoon of oil . turn on the stove and bring your water to a boil ( water is boiling when it starts bubbling at the top ) . add your macaroni to the boiling water .

add water salt and oil to pan to boil and add macaroni .
fill a large pot with water . put 1 teaspoon of salt and 1 tablespoon of oil in the water . bring the water to a boil and add the macaroni . use a wooden spoon to stir the macaroni .

after cooking mix well to incorporate cheese and then bake .
grab the pan with an oven mitt . use a spoon and mix up the pan while holding it with the mitt .

after cooking mix well to incorporate cheese and then bake .
transfer the tray in to the oven and cook for 15 minutes . now open the door of the oven . mix the contents of the tray . mix the cheese in to the other ingredients . bake for another 20 to 25 minutes .

after cooking mix well to incorporate cheese and then bake .
use a spoon to stir to make sure cheese is mixed well . let bake for an extra 20 to 25 minutes .

incorporate salt and pepper mix it and add beaten eggs and stir .
add the salt and pepper to the mixture . mix everything up with a spoon . add the eggs and stir everything again .

incorporate salt and pepper mix it and add beaten eggs and stir .
once the noodles are in the pan , pour in the salt and the pepper . using a large spoon , stir the noodles until the salt and pepper are mixed in . pour the eggs over the noodles . using the large spoon , mix the noodles again until the eggs are mixed in .

incorporate salt and pepper mix it and add beaten eggs and stir .
get some salt and pepper . add them to your mac and cheese . then add eggs that have been broken into bowl and beaten or stirred up . stir all together .

add the six cheeses and mix well .
use your hands to scoops up all the cheese over the top of the pan of noodles . mix us everything with a large metal spoon . smooth out all the ingredients in the pan with the back of the spoon .

add the six cheeses and mix well .
put the six different types of cheese in the pan with the macaroni . use a spoon to mix all of the cheeses into the macaroni .

add the six cheeses and mix well .
have your macaroni in a backing pan . have your six cheeses cubed on a cutting board . using your hands , put the six cheeses into the baking dish with the macaroni noodles . using a metal spoon , mix well .

place the pan in the oven and cook for 15 minutes .
switch on the oven and set the temperature accordingly . once the beep sound comes , open it . transfer the pan and close the oven . cook the mixture for the 15 minutes .

place the pan in the oven and cook for 15 minutes .
preheat the oven . put the pan in the preheated oven . bake for 15 minutes . use a spoon to stir to mix up the cheeses .

place the pan in the oven and cook for 15 minutes .
