open up your oven , and set your pan inside it on the middle rack . make sure the oven is preheated ! now let your pan bake for 15 minutes . after 15 minutes , carefully remove if oven mitt and stir in the cheeses .

stir while cooking pasta and drain .
add pasta into the boiling water . mix all the ingredients together . stir with the help of a spatula . stir until the pasta gets cooked . after pasta is cooked drain the water .

stir while cooking pasta and drain .
cook for 7 minutes . remove pot from the heat . drain the contents of pot into a colander in the sink .

stir while cooking pasta and drain .
allow to cook for 7 minutes stirring occasionally . remove from heat and drain .

insert the skewer into the hot dogs .
place the hot dogs on a paper towel to dry them out . put the skewer into the center of each hot dog .

insert the skewer into the hot dogs .
collect a sheet pan and place two connected sheets of paper towel into the pan . remove wieners from fridge and take off cellophane packaging from cold wieners . with very long toothpicks called skewers , insert the sharp end into the center of one end of the wieners and push it slowly forward being careful not to poke skewer out of wiener . do the entire package of cold wieners the same way as first one . then line them up on the paper toweled pan to rest . call an adult to show you the next step .

insert the skewer into the hot dogs .
carefully hold the hot dog . stick the pointy end of the stick through the middle of the hot dog .

combine flour sugar polenta baking powder egg and milk .
take a mixing bowl . pour the flour sugar polenta baking powder egg and milk in the mixing bowl . mix it all together with a spatula .

combine flour sugar polenta baking powder egg and milk .
grab a mixing bowl . add flour , sugar , polenta or cornmeal , salt , and baking powder to the mixing bowl . stir together to until it is combined smoothly . add your beaten ( egg were the yoke is broken and mixed ) egg and half of your milk . stir the mixture until the batter is smooth .

combine flour sugar polenta baking powder egg and milk .
in a large mixing bowl , combine the flour , sugar , baking powder , and polenta . mix dry ingredients then make a dip in the middle . put eggs and large cup of milk into dip and stir . add smaller amount of milk then stir again . mix until smooth .

heat oil in a pan .
" put some vegetable oil in a pan and turn the dial on the stove to high " " " " . " wait until the oil becomes hot .

heat oil in a pan .
place the pan on the stove . put the oil in the pan . turn the stove on and heat the oil to 350 degrees .

heat oil in a pan .
take large pan . place the pan on the stove and heat it . add oil in to the pan . raise the temperature to 350 degree fahrenheit . heat the oil in the pan .

pour the batter over the hot dog .
carefully pour the batter into the cup . make sure it covers the hot dog . use a spoon to cover the end of the hot dog .

pour the batter over the hot dog .
mix the batter and then put it in the refrigerator to chill it . put a hot dog on a stick in a glass . pour the batter into the glass to coat the hot dog .

pour the batter over the hot dog .
put the hotdog in a tall drinking glass . pour the batter over the hotdog . use a spoon to make sure the batter fully coats the hotdog .

deep fry the corn dog in oil .
heat oil till it comes to a boil . coat the hotdog in the mixture . roll it around in the oil . cook till golden brown . place hotdog on paper towel to drain off .

deep fry the corn dog in oil .
make sure the hot dog is completely coated in the batter . set the corn dog gently into the hot oil . roll it around , making sure all sides are cooked and brown . remove the corn dog from the hot oil with tongs .

deep fry the corn dog in oil .
put hot dogs on skewers , coat in corn bread batter . carefully put corn dog into hot oil . cook for 3 - 4 minutes until golden brown . remove from oil with tongs and set on paper towel .

pour the dressing on the salad and mix it all .
use a teaspoon to scoop out two spoonfuls of dressing and place into the salad . use your tongs to mix the dressing with the vegetables until they are all evenly coated with the dressing .

pour the dressing on the salad and mix it all .
use a spoon to scoop up about 2 spoons of dressing . pour the dressing into the salad . use a spoon and fork to mix everything together .

pour the dressing on the salad and mix it all .
use a spoon to put a few scoops of dressing into the salad . using tongs mix the salad ingredients up . evenly mix everything up around the salad .

mix greek yogurt and light mayonnaise .
take a small mixing bowl . take some greek yogurt in to the bowl . add some mayonnaise in to the bowl . take a mixing spoon . mix the yogurt and mayonnaise with the spoon .

mix greek yogurt and light mayonnaise .
scoop greek yogurt into a measuring cup . add some light mayonnaise . use a spoon to mix them together in the cup .

mix greek yogurt and light mayonnaise .
you have about three quarters of a cup of greek yogurt in a glass measuring cup . using a spoon , add about a third cup of mayonnaise to the yogurt in the measuring cup . stir with the spoon to combine the yogurt and the mayonnaise in the measuring cup . prepare to add a tablespoon of a dark liquid to the measuring cup .

heat the skillet on medium heat and toast some walnuts .
take walnuts from a package . arrange them on a skillet . add heat to a skillet . toss them around on a skillet . continue until they become lightly toasted .

heat the skillet on medium heat and toast some walnuts .
place a skillet on a burner and set heat to medium . add about a half cup of walnuts to the skillet . keep the walnuts moving by stirring with a wooden spoon . toast the walnuts until you begin to smell them toasting .

heat the skillet on medium heat and toast some walnuts .
turn the heat on the stove to medium . drop walnuts in the skillet with your hands .

add some agave nectar and cracked black pepper and mix it all .
use a spoon to add agave nectar . mix it up with a spoon . crush in some black pepper . mix everything again with the spoon .

add some agave nectar and cracked black pepper and mix it all .
pour in 1 teaspoon of agave nectar . add black pepper to the measuring cup . use a spoon to mix everything together well .

add some agave nectar and cracked black pepper and mix it all .
in a bowl or measuring cup add some agave nectar ( it 's like honey ) . then put in some cracked black pepper . last mix it all with a spoon .

cut the red seedless grapes into halves chop some celery and dice some apples .
cut the grapes in half one by one . make sure to use a cutting board . then cut the celery into small pieces . cut some apples into small pieces and add with the other ingredients .

cut the red seedless grapes into halves chop some celery and dice some apples .
put the red seedless grapes on a cutting mat . use a sharp knife to cut the grapes in half and put them in the salad bowl . put the celery on the cutting board and use a knife to cut into small pieces . put the apples on the cutting board and cut into small squares .

cut the red seedless grapes into halves chop some celery and dice some apples .
use a knife to cut the seedless grapes in half . toss the grapes into the salad bowl . use the knife to cut up celery . dice up some apples .

squeeze lemon on top of it to prevent browning .
take a medium glass plate . take the cut pieces of apples in a plate . cut the lemon in to two halves . squeeze the lemon in to the plate . lemon prevents the browning of apples .

squeeze lemon on top of it to prevent browning .
take a lemon wedge . squeeze the lemon wedge onto the salad to prevent it from turning brown .

squeeze lemon on top of it to prevent browning .
take a half of lemon and squeeze it using your hand into the bowl . with a spoon mix it all together .

chop some dried cranberries .
place ounces cups of dried cranberries on a clean cutting board . get a sharpened chefs knife . gather the cranberries in one place on the board . chop the cranberries into small pieces . keep cranberries in a small grouping while chopping .

chop some dried cranberries .
use a knife to carefully chop up some dried cranberries . add the cranberries to the top of the salad .

chop some dried cranberries .
chop some dried cranberries carefully . chop into small pieces .

cut the chicken into small pieces and add it and the roasted walnuts to a bowl .
put chicken on cutting board . cut chicken into bite sized pieces . move the chicken into the bowl . next , add the chopped roasted walnuts to the same bowl .

cut the chicken into small pieces and add it and the roasted walnuts to a bowl .
take the chicken on the cutting board . cut the chicken in to small pieces . take some roasted walnuts . add the roasted walnuts in to the bowl . add the chicken pieces in to the walnuts .

cut the chicken into small pieces and add it and the roasted walnuts to a bowl .
use a knife to carefully cut the chicken into small pieces . scoop the chicken into the salad bowl . add walnuts into the bowl .

chop the toasted walnuts .
put the toasted walnuts on a cutting mat . use a knife to chop the toasted walnuts .

chop the toasted walnuts .
take your roasted walnuts and put on cutting board . use a knife and chop them up breaking them apart .

chop the toasted walnuts .
remove the walnuts from the heat . place on the counter . chop the walnuts .

heat some oil in a pan .
take a pan and place it on the stove . add some oil in to the pan . turn on the stove . heat the oil in the pan . add the cut ingredients in to the pan .

heat some oil in a pan .
you put a pan on stove along with oil . you have sliced up some onions , beans and herbs . heat oil . out into hot oil . stir with spoon .

heat some oil in a pan .
start with a large metal pan and get an adult to help you . put the pan on the stove . turn the gas flame on until it kisses the bottom of your pan or if your stove is electric turn the number to 5 . measure 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil . put the oil in your pan and never leave it burning without someone in the room !

take the snails out to serve .
use potholders to remove lid of pot . pour out snails into a serving dish . use toothpick to poke inside snail shell to get it out in order to eat .

take the snails out to serve .
remove the snails from the pot . take a toothpick and put the snail on the toothpick .

take the snails out to serve .
open the lid of the pot . scoop out the snails onto a plate to serve .

add some garlic paste and chopped leeks and cover to cook .
use a spoon to scoop out some garlic paste . add the garlic paste to the pot . grab some leeks and throw them in by hand .

add some garlic paste and chopped leeks and cover to cook .
use a spoon to add some garlic paste . chop leeks carefully with a knife . put the chopped leeks into the pot . put the cover on top of the pot and cook .

add some garlic paste and chopped leeks and cover to cook .
cook the contents of the pot . take the garlic paste in a jar . add some garlic paste in to the pot .. . cut the leeks in to small pieces and add it to the pot . cover the pot with the lid and cook .

add in some chopped onion and other vegetables .
add the chopped onions and vegetables to the pot . get a teaspoon . fill the teaspoon with salt . add the teaspoon of salt to the mixture in the pot . stir the mixture in the pot with a cooking spoon .

add in some chopped onion and other vegetables .
add chopped onions into the pan . put salt into the bowl using a spoon .

add in some chopped onion and other vegetables .
add chopped onions into the pot with warm oil . add the other vegetables into the pot . put in a small amount of salt . mix together with a stirring spoon .

add in some washed snails .
pour the strainer of snails into the pot . use a large spoon to stir the snails in the pot .

add in some washed snails .
pour in the bowl of washed snails into the pot . stir the snails into the mixture .

add in some washed snails .
take a large pot on the stove . cook the contents of the pot . take some snails in a bowl . wash the snails in the bowl . add the snails in to the pot .

add some water and cook for a while .
pour some water into the pot containing the snails . use a spoon to move the snails around in the water .

add some water and cook for a while .
take a large pot on the stove . cook the contents of the pot . take some water in a jar . add some water in to the pot . mix and cook the contents for some time .

add some water and cook for a while .
add some water to the pot . let it cook for a while , and while it cooks , occasionally stir it with a spoon .

place the bratwurst in a pan .
turn up the heat on the stove . add the bratwurst to the pan . use tongs to move one bratwurst at a time from plate to pan .

place the bratwurst in a pan .
using metal tongs , move your bratwurst into a clean pan . make sure they are all in the same pan , and are not laying on top of one another .

place the bratwurst in a pan .
using a pair of tongs , place all of the bratwurst into a pan , one at a time . x .

add beer salt and onion to the pan .
add 2 bottles of beer to the pan of sausage . add enough so that the sausages are covered . add 1 teaspoon of sea salt . add one onion to the pan , chopped up .

add beer salt and onion to the pan .
take two beer bottles and pour into your 1 lb sausage container . add one teaspoon of sea salt . add one small yellow onion cut up into small pieces . let simmer .

add beer salt and onion to the pan .
add two bottle of beers in to the bowl . add salt in to the bowl . cut the yellow onions into small thin slices . add the cut onions into the sausages .

add onion garlic salt thyme and potatoes to a bowl .
add 10 large whole cloves into the bowl . then add one large onion that is sliced into the bowl . add a teaspoon of salt to the bowl next . then add about 10 pieces of fresh thyme . lastly , add 4 cut up potatoes to the bowl .

add onion garlic salt thyme and potatoes to a bowl .
add 10 cloves of garlic to the bowl . add one large red onion , sliced , to the bowl . add a teaspoon of salt to the bowl . add 10 sprigs of thyme to the bowl . add 4 potatoes to the bowl , cut into small cubes .

add onion garlic salt thyme and potatoes to a bowl .
want to put in 10 cloves of garlic in the bowl . slice one big onion and put in the bowl . one teaspoon of salt sprinkle on top . put in 10 pieces of thyme in bowl . put in 4 potatoes cut up into bowl .

add pepper oil sausage and onion to the bowl .
take a pepper grinder and add some pepper . grind the pepper into powder . add the pepper into the bowl . add 2 tablespoons of olive oil . add the onions also in the bowl of sausages .

add pepper oil sausage and onion to the bowl .
add pepper into the bowl . pour some oil into the bowl . add sausage to the bowl . add onion to the bowl .

add pepper oil sausage and onion to the bowl .
measure one teaspoon of pepper and sprinkle in bowl . measure 2 - 3 tablespoons of olive oil and add to bowl . using tongs , add sausages one at a time to the bowl with the pepper and oil . using a strainer , add the onions to the bowl .

cook the bratwurst in an oven .
turn on the oven to 350 degrees , so that it may preheat . once it beeps , you know it is ready . put on your oven mitts , grab the pan , then place the pan in the oven . after you shut the oven door , set a timer for 30 minutes . when the timer goes off , use your oven mitts once again to remove it . make sure you turn the oven off once you are done .

cook the bratwurst in an oven .
toss mixture into big dish . cut down on whatever you do n't like . put in over . for around and hour but check on it . roast at the end if possible .

cook the bratwurst in an oven .
remove all the ingredients into a big bowl . switch on the oven . wait until the light turns off . cook for almost 60 minutes .

place two cheese slices on one patty .
keep stirring the onions to make sure they are cooked . place two slices of cheese on one of the patties while it is still cooking . this will help the cheese melt well .

place two cheese slices on one patty .
use your hands and grab 2 cheese slices . place the cheese slices on one patty .

place two cheese slices on one patty .
place two slices of cheese on one patty . let the cheese melt as it cooks .

spread mayonnaise and add lettuce 5 pickles and 2 slices of onions on the top bun .
use a knife to spread mayo on the buns . lay some lettuce on the mayo . now add 5 pickles and 2 slices of onions on the top bun .

spread mayonnaise and add lettuce 5 pickles and 2 slices of onions on the top bun .
use a knife to spread mayonnaise across the bun . add lettuce to the bun . put on 5 pickles . add 2 tomato slices to the bun .

spread mayonnaise and add lettuce 5 pickles and 2 slices of onions on the top bun .
spread about a tablespoon of mayonnaise on the top of the bun . then add a couple 1 - 2 pieces of lettuce . add about 5 pickles on top of lettuce . then add two slices of tomato . you should have a piece of each ingredient in every bite .

simultaneously add some oil and grill onions along with the patties .
add some oil to the grill . add some chopped onions onto the grill . use a spatula to turn the onions on the grill .

simultaneously add some oil and grill onions along with the patties .
grill the patties on the grill . add some oil in the grill . cut the onion in to small pieces . add the onions in to the grill . fry the onions in the pan .

simultaneously add some oil and grill onions along with the patties .
pour a bit of oil in the pan . use your hands to put some onions on the oil . let them cook together .

place the grilled patties on bottom burger and place the top bun .
put the finished patties on the bottom bun . hold the top bun and vegetables and flip it onto the patty .

place the grilled patties on bottom burger and place the top bun .
place the grilled patty on top of the cheese on the bottom bun . put the top bun on top of the patty to complete the burger .

place the grilled patties on bottom burger and place the top bun .
place both patties on the bottom bun . put the top bun and vegetables on top of the meat , being sure to hold the vegetables in place so they do n't fall .

put the grilled onions on top of the ketchup and mustard sauce .
use a spoon to scoop the onions out onto the sauce . lay the onions evenly over the bun .

put the grilled onions on top of the ketchup and mustard sauce .
use a spoon to scoop up grilled onions . add the onions on the bun on top of the ketchup and mustard .

put the grilled onions on top of the ketchup and mustard sauce .
add ketchup and mustard to the bun . use a spoon to scoop some of the grilled onions on top .

remove onions from the grill pan .
scoop out the onions using a spatula . take the onions out of the pan .

remove onions from the grill pan .
scoop up all of the onions . take the onions off of the grill .

remove onions from the grill pan .
place the onions onto the spatula . place the onions onto a plate .

place the other patty on the cheese slices and remove them from the grill pan .
place hamburger patty on skillet . then add cheese to first burger . allow cheese to melt . then place on bun . add other desired toppings and serve .

place the other patty on the cheese slices and remove them from the grill pan .
get a large , stiff spatula . put the spatula under the plain beef patty and lift it up . place the plain patty on top of the patty with cheese on it , so they form a stack . put the spatula under the bottom meat patty and lift both of them , being careful not to cause the top patty to fall off .

place the other patty on the cheese slices and remove them from the grill pan .
use the spatula to pick up the beef patty . place the patty on top of the cheese slices . scoop up the patties and remove from the grill .

wrap the burger in an aluminum foil .
push down on the top of the burger . place the aluminum foil sides over the top of the burger . wrap the rest of the foil around the rest of the burger .

wrap the burger in an aluminum foil .
set burger on a large piece of aluminum foil , in the center . start with one corner and fold it in . do the opposite corner and repeat the process for the other two . bunch up the wrapping to make it seal .

wrap the burger in an aluminum foil .
place the burger in the center of a piece of aluminum foil . bring the corners up to the top center of the bun . press the foil together at the top and squeeze the sides so the burger does n't come unwrapped .

grill the patties .
take a pan on the stove . heat the pan . take some patties . fry the patties on the pan . fry on both sides of the patties .

grill the patties .
put the meat patties on a grill . allow them to cook .

grill the patties .
take the patties and set them on the grill . wait for the bottom side to turn brown .

place the patties on a parchment paper and stack them smash it using a burger hammer .
take a parchment paper . place a patty on the parchment paper . place another parchment paper . place another patty on the parchment paper . press the burgers with the burger hammer .

place the patties on a parchment paper and stack them smash it using a burger hammer .
set the meat patties onto wax paper . stack the paper on top of the other burger and set the meat patty on top . use a smasher to mash down the burger patties to make them flat .

place the patties on a parchment paper and stack them smash it using a burger hammer .
get some squares of parchment paper and lay out 2 of them . place one piece of parchment on your work surface and set one of the balls of meat on it . put another parchment square on the ball of meat and stack the second ball on top of it . add more parchment paper to the top of the upper ball . " using a burger hammer , smash the balls of meat with good force until they are flattened to about 3/4 thick . " " . "

put three rings of ketchup and two rings of mustard on the bottom bun .
now we will put ketchup and mustard on the bottom bun . three rings of ketchup will be used and only two rings of mustard .

put three rings of ketchup and two rings of mustard on the bottom bun .
squirt the bottle in circle shapes and put 3 circles on the bun . put 3 rings ketchup and 2 rings mustard on this way .

put three rings of ketchup and two rings of mustard on the bottom bun .
add three rings of ketchup to the top of the bottom bun . then add two rings of mustard on top of the ketchup .

place the sesame seed buns on the grill pan .
put the sesame seed buns into the pan to toast . use a spatula to flip the burgers once the are browned on one side . use the spatula to remove the buns from the pan when they are toasted .

place the sesame seed buns on the grill pan .
put the sesame seed buns onto the grill . place the inside of the bun face down on the grill .

place the sesame seed buns on the grill pan .
pick the sesame seed buns up with your hands . lay the buns inside side down on the grill pan .

add soy sauce sugar rice wine chopped white onion honey and fish sauce in a blender .
add soy sauce , sugar , rice , wine , chopped white onion , honey , and fish sauce to the blender . blend .

add soy sauce sugar rice wine chopped white onion honey and fish sauce in a blender .
get a blender an set it on the counter . add 1 cup of soy sauce to the blender . add 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 cup rice wine to the blender . get a chopping board and a large knife . peel a medium size white onion and cut in half . cut up 1 half of the onion into small pieces . add the chopped onion to the blender . add 1/2 cup of honey to the blender . add 2 tablespoons of fish sauce to the blender .

add soy sauce sugar rice wine chopped white onion honey and fish sauce in a blender .
put soy sauce sugar and white wine into a blender . add the chopped white onion and honey . add the fish sauce .

add minced ginger korean chili paste and fresh asian pear dices to the blender too .
add 2 tablespoons of small cubes of ginger , 1 tablespoon of korean chili paste to the blender . cut 2 asian pears into small cubes and add them to the blender .

add minced ginger korean chili paste and fresh asian pear dices to the blender too .
put all of the following into a blender , 2 tablespoons of smashed & chopped ginger . then add 1 tablespoon of korean chili paste , then add fresh chopped asian pear .

add minced ginger korean chili paste and fresh asian pear dices to the blender too .
slice ginger into a circular shape , like a penny ( you 'll need about 4 - 5 ) . place something flat on the ginger and push hard to crush it . then scoop it up and add it to the blender . add 1 tablespoon of chili paste to the blender . cut pieces of pear small and add them to the blender .

blend everything in the blender to form a sauce .
take a blender . put all the ingredients into a blender . switch it on the blender . gradually increase the speed . blend everything to form a sauce .

blend everything in the blender to form a sauce .
start the blender at a lower setting . slowly increase the speed to mix all of the ingredients .

blend everything in the blender to form a sauce .
use a blender to mix everything up . make sure the lid is on and hold your hand over the top . start the blender on the lowest speed . that way there is not a big mess . after about 20 seconds push the higher speed button .

marinate the ribs well with the prepared sauce in a bucket overnight .
take your beef short ribs use a knife and lightly rub the knife on the top of the ribs . take the ribs and put them into a bucket . take your marinate you have and pour it over the ribs . cover the ribs in your bucket . put the bucket of ribs in your fridge .

marinate the ribs well with the prepared sauce in a bucket overnight .
take knife and scrape each piece of meat . put ribs in bucket . pour sauce on the bucket . then put the lid on the bucket . put bucket in frig .

marinate the ribs well with the prepared sauce in a bucket overnight .
take about 3 pounds of beef ribs . cut the ribs in to long thin pieces . take a long bucket and add the ribs in to the bucket . add the sauce in to the bucket . soak the ribs overnight in the bucket .

grill the marinated ribs well and serve with chopped leeks and red onions .
after your ribs are marinated , shake them over the sink to get rid of any extra juice or marinade . place the ribs on a preheated grill . be careful , the grill is very hot . you need to place them on an area of the grill where the coals are not right under the meat . this will keep the marinade and drippings from the meat from dripping into the hot coals and catching fire . that can be dangerous and can also burn your meat . " if the coals need to be moved , ask an adult or a responsible person to assist you . you 'll need to use tongs to move the coals away from your cooking area . this is called indirect heat " " " " . " after the ribs are cooked ( this wo n't take long ) remove the ribs with tongs , making sure to keep your face away from the grill in case juices drip and flare up fire . put the ribs on a plate . add chopped red onions and chopped leeks to the platter . if you can not find leeks , chives or green onion can be used . enjoy !

grill the marinated ribs well and serve with chopped leeks and red onions .
place the meat on the grill . wait until the top of the meat turns dark brown . using a tong flip each of the meats to the other side . wait a few minutes and flip the meat again . after meat is cooked place the meat on a plate .

grill the marinated ribs well and serve with chopped leeks and red onions .
shake off the marinade that may be in excess on your ribs . place your marinated ribs onto the grill . do not place over the coals , place on the side of the grill where the coals are absent . keep an eye on your meat as to make sure it does n't burn . be sure to flip the ribs onto the other side . you should see grill marks on your ribs and the ribs should not be pink . you can now place the ribs onto the direct heat to caramelize the marinade on the ribs . be careful of flare ups from the fire . serve the ribs with jasmine rice , chopped leeks , and red onions .

add oil to a hot pan .
get the oil ready to add to heated pan . add about a 1/4 inch of oil to pan .

add oil to a hot pan .
take a pan and keep it on the stove . heat the pan . take the oil in a jar . add some oil on to the hot pan . coat the pan with oil properly .

add oil to a hot pan .
put skillet on the grill . next put just less then a 1/4 inch of oil in skillet .

add the potatoes to the pan .
slowly put the potatoes in the pan . spread them out on the pan .

add the potatoes to the pan .
get the plate of potatoes . put the potatoes in the pan .

add the potatoes to the pan .
heat the pan on the grill . next put the potatoes in the pan and cook until crispy .

add a piece of pork in a ziplock bag and pound it .
place the meat inside of the ziplock bag . taking the hammer . beat the meat as hard as possible . feel the meat to see if its thin . if thin then you ready for the next step .

add a piece of pork in a ziplock bag and pound it .
add a piece of pork to a ziplock bag . seal the bag . hit the meat with the mallet until it 's flattened .

add a piece of pork in a ziplock bag and pound it .
take out a ziplock bag . take out pork . put the pork in the bag . get a mallet out and hit the bag hard many times so the pork thins out .

add salt and pepper to the pork .
add salt to the pork . add pepper to the pork .

add salt and pepper to the pork .
take the pork slices on a plate . add salt on to the pork slices . take a pepper grinder . add some pepper in to the pepper grinder . add the pepper on to the pork .

add salt and pepper to the pork .
put salt onto the pork . next put pepper on to the pork .

coat the pork in flour egg and breadcrumbs .
coat the pork in flour , flouring both sides of the meat . shake the extra flour off . dip the pork into the egg mixture . put the pork into the breadcrumbs , coating both sides . press down onto the meat while it 's in the breadcrumbs to make sure they stick .

coat the pork in flour egg and breadcrumbs .
place one piece of pork into the bowl of flower . turn the pork over to coat the other side with flower , lift the pork and gently shake off extra flour . place the pork into the egg mixture , turn the pork and coat the other side of the pork . remove the pork from the egg and place it into the bowl of bread crumbs . grab the crumbs and place them on top of the pork , make a fist and pat the breadcrumbs onto the pork to get them to stick really good .

coat the pork in flour egg and breadcrumbs .
cut the pork in to strip size pieces . take the flour in a bowl , take bread crumbs in a bowl . break the eggs and take it in a bowl . take the pork and dip it in flour on both sides and then dip it in eggs . now dip the pork in bread crumbs and coat it properly .

add bacon to the hot pan .
get the bowl of bacon . sprinkle it into the pan .

add bacon to the hot pan .
slowly add the bacon into the pan with the other ingredients . make sure you are careful as the pan is hot !

add bacon to the hot pan .
wait until the pan is hot . put bacon on top .

add onions to the hot pan .
cut onion . put 1/2 of the cut onion into pan .

add onions to the hot pan .
food is heating on the stove . add the sliced onions to the pan .

add onions to the hot pan .
pick up your bowl of sliced onions . with a spoon carefully scoop half of the onions into the hot pan . be careful not to touch the hot pan with your hands . set the bowl with the rest of the onions to the side for later .

place the pork onto a hot pan of oil .
when the pan is hot the oil will bubble . put the meat on the pan .

place the pork onto a hot pan of oil .
gently slide the piece of pork in to the hot oil using a pair of tong . you want to see the oil bubbling on the sides of the pork .

place the pork onto a hot pan of oil .
take your pork chop . put it into the pan of hot oil .

add flour sugar oil and yeast to a bowl .
using measuring cups , add 2 1/2 cups all purpose flour into a bowl . add 1 teaspoon sugar to the bowl . add 1 to 2 teaspoons oil to the bowl . add a packet of yeast to the bowl .

add flour sugar oil and yeast to a bowl .
use a measuring cup to measure our 2 and 1/2 cups all purpose flour and place the flour into a large mixing bowl . measure out 1 teaspoon of granulated sugar and place it into the mixing bowl . empty contents of 1 yeast packet into mixing bowl . measure out 1 teaspoon of oil and add it to the mixing bowl .

add flour sugar oil and yeast to a bowl .
use a measuring cup to add two and a half cups all purpose flour to large metal bowl . then , use a measuring cup to add one teaspoon of sugar to bowl . use another measuring cup to add one to two teaspoons of oil . rip open a package of yeast and put the whole package into the bowl .

add salt plain yogurt and water and mix to form a dough .
add some salt . add some plain yogurt that is n't cold or hot . start mixing . while mixing , pour in some water that is n't cold or hot .

add salt plain yogurt and water and mix to form a dough .
take dough in a bowl . add one teaspoon of salt to the dough . add 1/4 th cup of yogurt which is at room temperature . add some water to the dough . mix in to a soft dough .

add salt plain yogurt and water and mix to form a dough .
add a palm full of salt to the mix . add the yogurt . using a stand mixer with the hook attachment , mix the ingredients . once they form a ball that sticks to the hook as it spins , it 's done !

take the dough in a separate bowl and let it aside for 30 - 40 minutes in a warm place .
take out the dough and put it in a new bowl . leave the bowl in a warm place for 30 to 40 minutes and it will get bigger .

take the dough in a separate bowl and let it aside for 30 - 40 minutes in a warm place .
take the dough out and place it into a separate bowl . let it rise for 30 - 40 minutes . make sure the bowl stays in a warm place while the dough is rising .

take the dough in a separate bowl and let it aside for 30 - 40 minutes in a warm place .
add the dough in to the mixer . add some water and mix the dough . take a large bowl . take the dough out of the mixing jar and keep it in the bowl . set the bowl aside for 30 - 40 minutes in a warm place .

grease the dough dip it in flour and roll it into a round shape .
put a little bit of cooking oil onto your hands and rub them together . pick up a handful of dough and roll it into a ball with your hands . dip the ball into a bowl of flour . put the ball on a flat surface . use the rolling pin to roll the ball into a flat circle .

grease the dough dip it in flour and roll it into a round shape .
put oil on your hands . rub the flour with your hands and make them into a round shape .

grease the dough dip it in flour and roll it into a round shape .
take out the dough you need . use butter or butter spray and coat the dough so its slimy . put flour into a bowl . dip the dough into the bowl with flour . use your hands and roll the dough into a ball .

heat a pan and cook the naan on medium heat for 2 - 3 minutes with covered lid .
set the burner to the medium heat setting and put the pan on the burner . when the pan is hot , place the naan dough on the pan . cover the griddle with a lid . it will work best if the lid is made of glass so you can see the naan while it is cooking . cook for 2 - 3 minutes .

heat a pan and cook the naan on medium heat for 2 - 3 minutes with covered lid .
put a pan on the stove . turn the dial on the burner you are using to medium . when the pan is hot , put the naan in it . cover the pan with a lid . cook for 2 - 3 minutes and take out the naan .

heat a pan and cook the naan on medium heat for 2 - 3 minutes with covered lid .
turn on a burner on the stove on medium heat so that it gets hot . put a pan on the hot burner . place naan on the pan . cover the naan with a lid . heat for 2 - 3 minutes .

flip it over the flame to let it puff and flip it until it 's done .
switch on the stove with low flame . flip the naan over the flame with no burning . flip it over again until it puffs up properly . again flip until it cooks well .

flip it over the flame to let it puff and flip it until it 's done .
flip the bread over the flame . keep flipping it until it is cooked on both sides .

flip it over the flame to let it puff and flip it until it 's done .
put the naan on the flame . once one side is done flip the naan over to cook the other side . keep flipping until it puffs up and is done .

spread butter over the naan and sprinkle some kasuri methi .
pull the naan from the heat . spread butter on top of the naan . then put some kasuri methi onto the naan .

spread butter over the naan and sprinkle some kasuri methi .
you will need butter and a butter knife . use the butter knife to spread butter on the naan . you can also sprinkle a small amount of kasuri methi for extra flavor . your naan is ready to enjoy .

spread butter over the naan and sprinkle some kasuri methi .
take the naan from the stove in to a plate . take soft butter with a spoon . add butter on top of naan . add kasuri methi on top of butter . eat butter naan .

add carrots onions bell peppers and cabbage to the pot and stir .
add onion to the pot . add carrots to the pot . add bell pepper to the pot . add cabbage to the pot . turn the dial on the stove to medium and stir .

add carrots onions bell peppers and cabbage to the pot and stir .
first , add your onions to the pot . then you will add your carrots into the pot . after carrots , add your green peppers to the pot . finally , add cabbage to your pot . all of the vegetables cook at the same time . do not overcook .

add carrots onions bell peppers and cabbage to the pot and stir .
add chopped onion into the pot of hot oil . add chopped carrots next . add chopped bell pepper next . add thin chopped cabbage next . stir all the ingredients together over medium heat .

add a pinch of salt and vinegar and stir .
add a pinch of salt to the pot . add a pinch of vinegar into the pot . stir in the mixture well .

add a pinch of salt and vinegar and stir .
add one teaspoon salt to mixture . add one teaspoon vinegar to mixture . stir those two into mixture together .

add a pinch of salt and vinegar and stir .
put a pot on stove . heat pot with vegetables . add just a little bit of salt . add a small amount of vinegar . stir to mix everything together in the pot .

add noodles and vegetable broth and stir .
add one cup noodles to mix . add one cup of vegetable broth to the mix . stir completely to make sure all the noodles are covered .

add noodles and vegetable broth and stir .
put a pot on the stove and turn on . add vegetables to hot pot . add noodles to pot with vegetables . add 1 cup of vegetable stock . stir to mix all together .

add noodles and vegetable broth and stir .
add the bowl of uncooked noodles to the pot . add the 1 cup of vegetable stock / broth . stir the soup mixture well .

add minced garlic and ginger soy sauce hot sauce sweet and sour sauce and stir .
measure minced garlic and ginger and pour into pot . add a poor of soy sauce . add one tablespoon hot sauce . add one quarter cup sweet and sour sauce . mix all together .

add minced garlic and ginger soy sauce hot sauce sweet and sour sauce and stir .
add minced garlic and ginger into your pan . then you will add about 1 tbsp of soy sauce . use 1/2 tsp of hot sauce . use as much sweet and sour sauce as you want , around a couple of tbsps .

add minced garlic and ginger soy sauce hot sauce sweet and sour sauce and stir .
while accompanied by an adult , turn on burner with your pot of water brought to a boil then add minced garlic and ginger . 1 tablespoon ( tbsp ) of soy sauce . 1/2 tbsp hot sauce . 2 tbsp sweet and sour . sesame seed oil .

add sesame seed oil and cover .
add a tablespoon of sesame seed oil to the pan . mix the oil into the mixture . cover the pan with a lid . let it boil for a little bit .

add sesame seed oil and cover .
with pot on stove . heat on high . add sesame oil for flavor . put lid on pot . bring to rapid boil .

add sesame seed oil and cover .
now you will add some sesame seed oil to the pan and cover it with a lid . this will give the dish a nice flavor . now you will bring the pan to a hard boil .

when the soup boils add arrow root powder and stir .
wait for a nice brown color and for your soup to bubble slightly . add one tablespoon arrowroot powder . quickly stir in powder to mix . you will notice the broth will be getting thick .

when the soup boils add arrow root powder and stir .
wait for the soup to boil ; it will be very bubbly . add arrow root powder . stir the pot with the spoon .

when the soup boils add arrow root powder and stir .
now that the soup is boiling , add arrowroot powder . stir the arrowroot powder and mix well to thicken up the soup .

add tofu to the soup .
stir soup . cut tofu into small pieces . add tofu to soup . put lid on pot . cook soup since adding in the tofu .

add tofu to the soup .
stir the soup and grab the bowl with the tofu in it . add tofu to the soup and let it cook a little bit .

add tofu to the soup .
remove the tofu from it 's packaging . cut the tofu into small bites . pour cut the tofu into the pan of soup .

ladle soup into the bowl and top with green onion .
chop onion before hand . let it cook for certain amount of time . stir often . put into bowl . add onion .

ladle soup into the bowl and top with green onion .
use a ladle to put soup into a bowl from the pot . add chopped green onion to the top of the soup in the bowl .

ladle soup into the bowl and top with green onion .
using your ladle , scoop soup into your small bowl from the pan . then , using your fingers add a little chopped green onion .

mix 2 tbsp of chili garlic sauce with the hoisin and keep it aside .
take a small bowl . add some hoisin in to the bowl . take some chili garlic sauce in a small bowl . add the sauce in to the hoisin . mix them properly with a spoon .

mix 2 tbsp of chili garlic sauce with the hoisin and keep it aside .
put 2 tablespoons of chili garlic sauce into a small bowl . add 2 tablespoons of hoisin . use a spoon to mix the sauces together .

mix 2 tbsp of chili garlic sauce with the hoisin and keep it aside .
add 2 tablespoons of chili garlic sauce to the hoisin . mix the chili garlic sauce and the hoisin together . set the mixture in a bowl off to the side .

take the shrimp and cut it into two halves .
put the shrimp down on the board . carefully take a knife and cut the shrimp in half down the middle . cut 1 pound of tiger shrimp .

take the shrimp and cut it into two halves .
pick up the shrimp . put the shrimp on the cutting board . grab a sharp knife . hold the shrimp with your free hand . cut each shrimp in half .

take the shrimp and cut it into two halves .
put the shrimp onto the cutting board . use a sharp knife to cut each shrimp in half .

place the shrimp lettuce cucumber coriander sauce carrots red pepper and crab meat on the rice paper .
take a rice paper on the cutting board . add some pieces of shrimp and lettuce on to the rice paper . add some pieces of cucumber and some dipping sauce on to the paper . add cut pieces of carrots and red pepper on to the rice paper . add crab meat on top of rice paper .

place the shrimp lettuce cucumber coriander sauce carrots red pepper and crab meat on the rice paper .
first flatter out the rice paper . then the first thing you put is shrimp , add them in a line in the middle of the circle . then add the lettuce cucumber coriander sauce carrots red pepper and crab meat keep everything in a line in the middle .

place the shrimp lettuce cucumber coriander sauce carrots red pepper and crab meat on the rice paper .
put the rice paper flat on the cutting board . put four shrimp in the middle of the rice paper . put 2 tablespoons of arugula , a mint leaf , a stick of cucumber , a little coriander , some carrots , one teaspoon of red pepper confetti , and 1/2 teaspoon of crab on the shrimp .

repeat the process for all the other rolls and serve .
dip the rice dough sheets into water using your fingers . add all the ingredients to the rolls . wrap the rolls . repeat the process until you have quite a few done .

repeat the process for all the other rolls and serve .
you will have one roll completed . repeat this and make several more rolls . line them up on a plate .

repeat the process for all the other rolls and serve .
repeat each of the previous steps in order . gather all rolls on a platter . serve .

add rice noodles on top and roll it without breaking and fold the spring roll .
add about two tablespoons of rice noodles using your fingers to the top . first fold the top down . now fold the sides in carefully and gently not to break the spring roll . now fold it over again and roll it until it 's a tight package .

add rice noodles on top and roll it without breaking and fold the spring roll .
add about 2 tablespoons of rice noodles on top . start rolling the sheet from one side . roll it to the other side direction covering the filling . roll the sides of the sheet . roll the other side of the sheet and fold the roll .

add rice noodles on top and roll it without breaking and fold the spring roll .
take 2 tablespoons of noodles and put them on top . roll the wrap carefully trying not to break it . fold the edges of the spring roll .

soften the rice paper by soaking it in warm water for 30 minutes .
use between 12 and 16 rice papers . use a big container that can hold warm water . put the rice paper in the warm water for about 30 seconds . when the rice paper is soft , take it out and set it on the cooking board .

soften the rice paper by soaking it in warm water for 30 minutes .
fill a container , large enough to hold the rice paper , full of warm water . take a piece of rice paper and slide it under the water . leave it there for 30 minutes .

soften the rice paper by soaking it in warm water for 30 minutes .
get a wide , flat pan and fill it with warm water . soak the rice paper for about thirty seconds , until it begins to soften . remove the rice paper , placing it on a clean , wooden board .

boil some water in a pot .
add 1 quart of vegetable oil to a large pot . have a thermometer in the liquid . heat the oil up .

boil some water in a pot .
get a large container of vegetable oil . pour 1 quart of vegetable oil ( 4 cups ) into a deep pot .

boil some water in a pot .
get a large pot and place it on the stove . do not turn on heat just yet . pour 1 quart of vegetable oil in the pot . turn on the stove and heat the oil to the correct temperature . be very careful when cooking with hot oil . it can be very dangerous if not used safely !

mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
hold the small bowls over the big bowl while pouring . pour in the bowls of cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .

mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
mix the 1 c cornmeal , 1 c flour , 1/4 tsp salt , 1/8 tsp pepper , 1/4 c sugar , and 4 tsp 0f baking powder in the bowl . mix them up with a spoon .

mix cornmeal flour salt pepper sugar and baking powder .
add 1 cup of yellow corn meal to a bowl . then add 1 cup of flour . add 1/4 teaspoon of salt . add 1/8 of black pepper , add 1/4 cup of sugar . add four teaspoons of baking powder .

stir in eggs and milk .
add 1 egg and 1 cup of milk . mix it all up . put the batter into the refrigerator for a little while before dipping the frankfurters .

stir in eggs and milk .
stir in one egg . add one cup of milk and stir in . refrigerate the batter .

stir in eggs and milk .
get one bowl of flour , 1 wooden spoon , 1 egg , and 1 cup of milk . break your egg and remove broken shells if you see any . put the egg and the milk into the bowl with the flour . stir for 2 minutes with a wooden spoon . put the bowl of batter in the refrigerator and wait for an hour .

insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
hold the frankfurters in your hand . carefully push the wooden stick pointy end first through the middle of the frankfurters so the meat is right on the stick .

insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
while your batter is cooling down , slowly insert the wooden skewers into the frankfurters . just hold the beef frankfurter by the middle and slowly push your wooden skewer into them , but not to fast or you may stab your hand .

insert wooden skewers into frankfurters .
take hotdogs out of the package and put on a cutting board . pick up one hot dog and push wooded stick into one end of the hotdog . repeat until all of the hotdogs are on a stick .

roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
put the finished batter into a tall jar . roll the hot dogs into the batter covering them all around .

roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
hold the frankfurters by a stick . one by one put them in the jar and spin them around with the stick getting the batter all over it . do this with each frankfurter .

roll frankfurters in batter until well coated .
fill a tall mason jar with the batter . holding the skewer , dip the frankfurter into the batter . roll the frankfurter until it is completely coated with batter .

fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
lower the corn dogs into the hot oil . cook until light brown , about 3 or 4 minutes . take the corn dogs out of the oil and lay on paper towel .

fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
check oil is at correct heated degree . slowly lower coated corn dogs into oil . let cook two or three min . until lightly brown for a soft crust . darker crust for crusty crust .

fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time until they are ready .
while holding the stick end of the corn dog , dip the corn dog into the oil until all the corn dog is covered with oil . set the timer for 4 minutes . hold the corn dog in the oil until the timer dings . should be lightly brown . remove the corn dog from the oil and place on a paper towel so the oil is soaked in the towel . do the same thing for the next corn dog .

cut the chicken .
get two thawed boneless , skinless chicken breast . carefully use a knife to trim off the excess skin and fat from the edges . cut the chicken breast in half . put them aside . proceed to the next chicken breast and repeat the same steps .

cut the chicken .
use a sharp knife to cut off any gristly or fatty parts ( anything white instead of pink ) . lay the breast out longways . cut it into half along the short part , not longways .

cut the chicken .
cut off pieces of fat from chicken using a sharp knife . cut chicken breasts in half width wise .

pound the chicken .
take 2 feet of baking paper and fold it in half . place your chicken portions in the middle of the paper , in between the folded paper . there should be baking paper at the top and bottom of the chicken . using a bowl or rolling pin , smash the chicken , until it become 1/2 inch thin .

pound the chicken .
cover chicken with paper . use cup to hit chicken and flatten it .

pound the chicken .
cover the chicken with wax paper . hit the chicken several times with anything heavy .

whisk the eggs .
get a small bowl . get two small eggs . crack the eggs into the bowl . if you get shells in the bowl make sure you take them out . get a fork and stir the eggs together in the bowl .

whisk the eggs .
crack to large eggs into a bowl . whisk the eggs together with a fork .

whisk the eggs .
take two eggs and crack them against the side of the bowl . pour the insides into the bowl . make sure that none of the hard egg outside shell gets in the bowl . take a fork and mix them around until they are all mixed together and the same yellow color .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
use a fork to mix eggs in the bowl . put 1 and a half cups of bread crumbs in another bowl . add one quarter cup of grated parmesan cheese to bread crumbs .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
in a medium bowl add 1.5 cups of italian breadcrumbs . add a quarter cup of grated parmesan cheese . gently mix together with your hand .

mix bread crumbs and parmesan cheese together .
put 1 and 1/2 cups of italian style bread crumbs . next add a 1/4 cup of parmesan cheese . mix the bread crumb and parmesan together .

mix flour salt and pepper together .
add a half cup of white flour to a medium sized bowl . add a teaspoon of salt . add a half a teaspoon of black pepper from your pepper grinder . mix together . use with the other ingredients to bread the chicken .

mix flour salt and pepper together .
you will need three bowls , a small spoon frying pan and a long spoon for frying . ingredients : 1 tea spoon of salt , 1/2 cup flour , 1 tea spoon black pepper , 2 large eggs half a cup bread crumbs , three pieces of chicken breast cooking oil , spaghetti water and cheese . procedure : beat eggs in a separate bowl , put bread crumbs in a separate bowl . in a larger bowl mix flour , salt and black pepper together . take your chicken breast and deep into the into the mixture of flour pepper and salt and into the bread crumbs , and finally into the beaten eggs . after this deep your chicken breast into a preheated oil in the pan . for two minutes before putting it into the oven . boil your spaghetti in a separate pan . serve while hot with cheese .

mix flour salt and pepper together .
take a small bowl . take half a cup of flour . add half teaspoon of pepper powder in to the bowl . add teaspoon of salt in to the bowl . mix everything with the spoon .

coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
take one piece of chicken and press it in the front then turn chicken over and press the back in the bowl with white flour . take chicken out of flour and dip it good in eggs so it covers it all good and gooey . take chicken outta eggs and drop it into smashed bread crumbs so it 's covered all over . take smothered chicken piece and put it on a clean plate then do the same thing in same order with the other pieces of chicken . call your mom or an adult to help with how to bake it & that 's it ! you rock !

coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
take bread crumbs and flour in two separate bowls . take egg mixture in a bowl . coat the chicken in the flour mixture . then dip the chicken in to egg mixture . now coat the chicken with bread crumbs .

coat the chicken in the flour mixture the egg mixture and then the bread crumbs .
coat the chicken in the flour mixture . then put it in the egg mixture . shake off the extra egg . put the chicken into the bread crumbs . push it into the bread crumbs .

add oil to a pan .
heat skillet on medium heat . pour in about 3 ounces of oil . oil should be enough to cover bottom of pan . about on fourth inch deep . once oil is heated , place chicken in pan to start frying .

add oil to a pan .
preheat the skillet over medium high heat . pour 1/4 inch of extra virgin olive oil into the bottom of the pan . allow the oil to come up to temperature .

add oil to a pan .
place the skillet on your stove with the dial turned to medium . pour in extra virgin olive oil until there is about 1/4 of an inch in the bottom of your pan .

fry the chicken in the pan .
carefully add chicken pieces to the hot oil being careful not to splash the oil . do n't put too many pieces in the pan at once . fry the chicken pieces for 2 minutes on one side . carefully turn the chicken pieces over and cook another 2 minutes . put the chicken on some paper towel on a plate to drain it . cook the rest of the chicken in the same way .

fry the chicken in the pan .
lower the chicken into the pan slowly . do not put a lot of chicken in the pan at once . set a timer to 2 minutes . after 2 minutes , turn the chicken in the pan onto it 's other side . after 2 minutes remove the chicken .

fry the chicken in the pan .
start frying the chicken pieces once the oil is hot enough by placing your chicken gently in the oil and remember not to put too many pieces at once . you need to cook them for two minutes until the breading is a nice golden brown , but it 's ok if the chicken is not completely cooked through since you will be baking them . you can use a fork to flip them on the other side and cook for about 2 more minutes . once they 're golden on both sides you can transfer them to plate .

place the chicken in a baking dish .
place the fried chicken in the bottom of a glass baking dish . try to make sure they are n't laying on top of each other .

place the chicken in a baking dish .
take the pieces of chicken . put the chicken in a glass dish . make sure they are not on top of each other / overlapping .

place the chicken in a baking dish .
use your hands to put the chicken into the tray . make sure none of them are on top of each other . then take the marinara sauce and use a ladle to put it on top of the chicken .

add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
add sauce to each piece of chicken in the dish . put the sauce on top of the chicken . add cheese on top of the sauce for each chicken . turn the dial on oven to 350 to preheat . " put chicken in oven and take out when it is golden brown . turn dial to off " " to turn off the oven " " . "

add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
first add 1/2 cup of marinara to the top of each chicken parmesan . then put a hand full of mozzarella cheese . then sprinkle a little parmesan cheese to the chicken .

add marinara sauce and cheese on top of the chicken .
take a ladle . put half a cup of pasta sauce in the ladle and to add it to each piece of chicken . use your hands to put mozzarella cheese on each piece of chicken . use your hands to put parmesan cheese on the pieces of chicken . bake the chicken in an oven at 350 degrees .

bake the chicken in an oven .
place chicken , tomato and cheese dish into the oven . cook the chicken until it is golden brown on top . remove the chicken dish from the oven using an oven mitt . turn off the oven .

bake the chicken in an oven .
use hot pads and put them into the oven . when they are done use the hot pads with both hands to get your dish out .

bake the chicken in an oven .
wear your oven mitts and place the casserole dish of chicken in the oven . when the chicken is done , turn the oven off , put on your oven mitts again and carefully open the oven . make sure your face is not too close to the oven door , the very hot air will escape when you open the oven . safety first ! carefully take the casserole dish of chicken out of the oven , making sure your arms and face are far enough away from any hot surfaces . close the oven and enjoy your chicken !

flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
wet the board with a wet towel so that the rice wo n't stick to it . flip the ingredients over so that the rice i said facing down and touching the board . add some avocado slices to the top , making sure to try to keep it in centered in a line down the middle . add some cucumber slices right next to the avocado slices on the middle as well .

flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
take a wet towel and rub the wooden cutting board to make it a little wet . spread rice over a sheet of nori and make sure to cover the entire piece of nori . place the rice and nori , rice side down on the wet cutting board . cut some avocados and cucumbers into thin slices . place the avocado and cucumber slices on top of the rice .

flip it over and put some cucumber and avocado on top .
use a wet towel and rub it on the cutting board . put the rice face down on the board . add avocado slices to the top of the seaweed . then place some sliced cucumber on top .

season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
take your bowl of finally chopped tuna meat and add with a spoon some chili sauce . then take the bottle of chili pepper oil and drizzle over the tuna .

season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
find a one teaspoon measuring spoon . measure out one teaspoon of vietnamese chili sauce . pour sauce over the cut up tuna meat . measure out one teaspoon of sriracha sauce , pour this on tuna . pour out a tiny bit of sesame chili oil onto tuna , about one teaspoonful .

season the tuna meat with some chili sauce and chili oil .
use a spoon to put one teaspoon of vietnamese sauce in the tuna . put one teaspoon of sriracha sauce in the tuna . put some sesame chili oil into the tuna .

roll it up sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
grab each corner long ways . fold it over the filling in the middle and roll it . sprinkle more sesame seeds on top . wrap it up with plastic wrap .

roll it up sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
take the edge of the seaweed and roll the sushi . press firmly while rolling but not so hard that the roll breaks . place a plastic wrapper over the top of the roll .

roll it up sprinkle some more sesame seeds and cover with a plastic wrapper .
to roll it , grab the edge with your thumb and fingers . push the inside and roll the edge up . make sure the edge is tucked and roll it before you reach the other edge . after you roll it up , cover it with plastic wrap so it will not stick to the bamboo .

sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
shake some sesame seeds on top of the rice . you can also use black sesame seeds if you 'd like .

sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
hold the sesame seed shaker over the rice . shake the seeds while moving back and forth so they cover the rice evenly .

sprinkle some sesame seeds on top .
add rice onto seaweed and lightly to flatten . add sesame seeds of your choice on top of rice .

prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
set the seaweed wrapper on a cutting board . prepare to add ingredients to the seaweed wrapper .

prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
take your seaweed and place it on your cutting board . add water with your hands to the top of the seaweed .

prepare a piece of sushi seaweed wrapper .
place a sheet of seaweed on a cutting board . dip your fingers in the bowl of water .

spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
place your toasted seaweed onto your cutting board . place your handful pressed rice to your seaweed starting at the top . dip your fingers into water if your fingers become sticky . now tap with your fingers to push the rice down to cover the whole seaweed in a thin layer . work from the top of the seaweed spreading it down to the opposite edge .

spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
place the seaweed called nori on the cutting board . get the rice and spread it on top of the seaweed . gently press on the rice evenly . wet your fingers to make it easy to flatten the rice . make sure the rice is completely covering the seaweed before rolling .

spread some sushi rice on the wrapper .
set a piece of seaweed on a cutting board . place the cooked rice on the seaweed . spread the rice out evenly onto the seaweed .

mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
use a fork to mix the seasoning into the tuna . if you want it a little higher add extra chili sauce . use the fork to put the tuna mixture onto the seaweed .

mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
mix the seasoning into the tuna very well , using a spoon or fork . place the tuna in a thin strip onto the sushi base .

mix the seasoning well and put the tuna on top of the sushi base .
take a fork and mix the bowl of seasoning all around . scoop up the tuna and put it on the seaweed wrap .

use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
take a bamboo mat and put it over the roll . squeeze the roll with the mat and push down on it .

use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
set a bamboo mat on top of the plastic around the rolled sushi . squeeze the mat around the sushi pushing the sushi together .

use a bamboo mat to press it firmly .
cover with bamboo mat . push in each end . push in the middle .

chop the long rod to small rolls .
dip the blade of the knife in water . slice the sushi in the middle . cut the sushi into 8 equal pieces .

chop the long rod to small rolls .
dip the tip of your knife in water and tilt it on its handle so the water coats the blade . now slice the sushi in half . now cut that half in half again . cut that half again through the middle . keep slicing the sushi until you have eight equal pieces and place them nicely on its side so you can see the inside of the sushi .

chop the long rod to small rolls .
dip your knife in some water , so the blade is wet . place the long roll on a cutting board . use a sharp knife to slice the roll into 8 equal size pieces .

place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
take the ground beef and smooth it out . flatten the beef on the foil .

place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
open hamburger package and put the meat onto the foil . using your hands , press down on the meat until you have a flat , thin circle of meat . wash your hands after you are done touching the meat .

place the ground beef on the foil and flatten out .
take your raw ground beef and place it on the flattened out foil . now you want to the beef and flatten it out until it is smooth . do n't press so hard the meat sticks to the foil though . a rolling pin can also be used , if the right amount of pressure is applied .

cut the beef into square patties .
take a flat piece of beef . take a knife and start cutting . cut the edges . move the edges away from the main piece . cut squares of thin beef .

cut the beef into square patties .
flatten the meat out so it 's spread apart . carefully cut the meat into square shapes . use the knife to push the meat away from the rest .

cut the beef into square patties .
after you have rolled out the beef onto sheets of tin foil , find a sharp knife . at the edge of your rolled beef , gently used the knife to cut a thin rectangle strip . be careful not to cut through the tin foil . use your knife to scoot the rectangle strip over so that you have room to cut another strip . when all of your rolled out beef has been cut into rectangular strips , turn the foil and cut it again , this time making your strips into squares .

toast the buns .
put the buns in a tin pan . put the pan under the broiler for about 30 second to one minute .

toast the buns .
put the bun under the broiler . leave for 30 seconds to 1 minute until they are lightly toasted .

toast the buns .
now take your buns and we will toast them ! all you need to do is place them in their dish and put them underneath your broiler for 30 seconds to a minute .

fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
take a pan and heat the pan . add some oil in to the pan and heat the oil . cut the burger patties in to square shaped pieces . place the patty on the pan and cook on one side . flip it to the other side and cook .

fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
place burger in pan . flip burger after 4 to 5 min . take burger off pan .

fry the burger patties and flip when browned .
place a pan on the stove . add oil to the pan . turn on the heat on the stove so the oil can get hot . carefully , with a spatula , pick up the burger patties and slide them onto the pan . make sure to watch out for oil spitting at you when it makes contact with the moisture in the burger . cook for a few minutes until the bottoms are browned but not to the point they are black ! when the patties are the right color of brown , flip them carefully with the spatula . once again , be aware about the oil spitting . once the other side is browned and the juices run clear out of the meat ( not red ) the burger is ready .

top the patties with cheese .
the meat will be hot and sizzling . carefully place a cheese on each meat piece .

top the patties with cheese .
after the patties look cooked / browned . put the slices of cheese on top . let melt .

top the patties with cheese .
cut a square of sliced cheese a little bit larger than the square hamburger patties . using tongs place the cheese on top of the hamburgers after they have turned brown in the frying pan . it is important not to get your hands to close to the hot frying pan . after the cheese is melted onto the hamburger which takes about 1 - 2 minutes place the hamburger on a bun .

place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
get the plate with the patties ready . place the top buns on each patty .

place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
find bun not plate . put this bun on burger .

place the patty on a bun and top with a bun .
place the top of the burger bun on top of the melted cheese ! now your sandwich is ready to enjoy !

press the dough down and roll out .
use your fingers to press on the dough . make a circle with a dough . take a rolling pin and flatten the dough .

press the dough down and roll out .
sprinkle a little flour to the top of the dough . press gently with your fingertips from the inside out in a circular motion to flatten the dough a little . flip it over and keep doing this until you have a flat , circular piece of dough . use a wine bottle ( or a rolling pin if you have one ) to roll the dough by rolling it back and forth over the dough . turn the dough sideways and roll again to make a nice circle .

press the dough down and roll out .
add some flour on the board . take a ball of dough on the board . press the dough with hand . roll the dough using a glass bottle . roll the dough in to thin circle .

sprinkle salt and pepper onto the pizza .
grab some salt and pepper with your hand . sprinkle the salt and pepper on top .

sprinkle salt and pepper onto the pizza .
sprinkle salt over the top of the pizza . add pepper over the top of the pizza .

sprinkle salt and pepper onto the pizza .
take the prepared pizza on the board . add some salt on the pizza . crush some pepper in to powder . add the pepper powder on to the pizza . spread the salt and pepper evenly .

cook the pizza in the oven .
take pizza dough and roll it out . cut mozzarella cheese into slices . add basil to the pizza . place on a pizza stone . put in the oven and cook until brown .

cook the pizza in the oven .
heat the oven to 475 degrees . put the pizza into the over . cook for 8 to 11 minutes .

cook the pizza in the oven .
place the pizza in the oven using a pan . cook the pizza in the oven . take the pizza out of the oven using the pan .

spread the sauce onto the dough .
use a scoop to scoop sauce in the middle of the dough . use the scoop to make circles with the sauce to spread it out .

spread the sauce onto the dough .
use a spoon to scoop the sauce onto the dough . spread the sauce evenly around the dough .

spread the sauce onto the dough .
roll the dough on the board . take the thick roll of dough . take the sauce on the bowl . take a big spreading spoon . spread the sauce on to the dough .

place basil onto the pizza .
take the pizza on the board . take some basil leaves . identify the spaces in between cheese . place the basil leaf in between the cheese . cover the entire spaces in between the cheese .

place basil onto the pizza .
break the basil leafs up with your hands . sprinkle the leaves on the pizza evenly .

place basil onto the pizza .
get fresh basil leaves . place them on top of the pizza evenly .

place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
pick up the mozzarella cheese your hands . place the cheese in a circle around the pizza .

place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
take your slices of cheese and place them in a ring around the outside of the pizza , about 1/2 an inch apart . use less cheese if you like less cheese though . then take three pieces of the cheese and space them evenly in the center of the dough .

place mozzarella cheese onto the pizza .
roll out pizza dough on a pizza pan . pour sauce on the dough and spread around . slice mozzarella cheese into pieces with a knife . then place the mozzarella cheese around the dough . finally get ready to place in an oven .

remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
take a pan on the stove . add some oil in the pan . heat the oil in the pan . fry the calamari in the oil . remove the fried calamari from the pan and place them on the paper .

remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
use tongs and carefully remove the fried calamari from the oil . put the fried calamari on some paper towels to drain the oil off . leave the heat on high but wait 1 minute before you add more calamari to fry so the oil can heat up again .

remove the fried calamari and place them on a paper .
take the fried calamari out of pan using a fork or something else not your fingers . place cooked calamari on a plate that 's covered in paper for them to dry .

repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
place pan with prepared tentacles , a bowl with flour coating and a plate on the counter . put the first tentacle in the flour . completely dust the tentacle with flour coating . place the coated tentacle on the plate . repeat for all other tentacles .

repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
put the tentacles in the flour with your hands . mix it in the flour with your hands so they are covered . grab it and pull it back out and put it aside .

repeat the same procedure for the tentacles also coat them with flour and keep aside .
take the tentacles and also coat them completely with flour . do this one at a time and then set them aside on a plate .

cut calamari into thick rings .
place a calamari onto the cutting board . " with a sharp knife , cut the calamari , beginning at the wide end , in 1/4 strips . " " . " the cut calamari will be in a ring shape . do not cut or chop the tentacles .

cut calamari into thick rings .
hold the other end of the calamari . use a knife to cut finger sized lines which will make rings out of the calamari .

cut calamari into thick rings .
take a cutting board and a knife . take a calamari on the board . cut the calamari in to thick rings . place the rings on the cutting board . cut the entire calamari in to rings .

drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
now make sure your calamari stays wet ! drop the calamari into your bowl of flour and toss them around . keep doing this until each piece is completely covered in flour .

drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
take the cut calamari in a plate . take the flour mixture in a bowl . add the calamari pieces in to the flour bowl . mix the flour well . coat the calamari with the flour mixture .

drop the cut calamari in the flour and mix well to coat the calamari as much as possible .
grab the calamari with your hands and drop it in the flour . use your hands to roll the calamari around covering them with flour .

take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
add a lot of flour to a bowl . add the calamari rings to the bowl . move them around and coat them well . grab a few at a time and shake them off . set them on a plate for 5 minutes before you fry them .

take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
take the calamari out of the flour pan . put the calamari on a plate . wait 5 minutes before putting them in the pot .

take the coated calamari out of the flour and put them on a plate .
now we want to take the calamari out of the pan and let them sit . let them sit for about 5 minutes so the flour will stick well to the calamari .

add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
take a medium sized bowl and add some flour in to the bowl . add little salt in to the flour . add some garlic salt in to the flour . add black pepper powder in to the bowl . mix everything in the bowl .

add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
add salt , garlic powder , seasoning , and black pepper to the flour in the bowl . use your spoon to mix everything together good .

add salt and garlic powder seasoning black pepper powder to the flour and mix well .
put the seasoning and the black pepper in the flour . use a spoon to mix the seasonings into the flour .

put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
grab a piece of coated calamari with tongs . slowly lower the piece into the oil carefully . continue to add pieces like this and cook .

put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
take a pan on the stove . pour some oil in to the pan . heat the oil in the pan . put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil . fry them in the hot oil .

put the coated calamari and tentacles in to the hot oil and fry .
pick up the calamari with tongs and set it into the pan of oil . stir the calamari and let it fry .

heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
pour 2 cups of oil in a pan . turn the heat on the stove up . heat the oil .

heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
put two cups of oil in a pan . heat the oil up at 360 degrees .

heat 2 cups of oil in a pan .
put the pan of oil on the stove and heat to 180 celsius or 360 fahrenheit . use high heat when heating the oil .

plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
set the fried calamari around the edges of a plate . put lettuce leaves in between the sections of the fried calamari . put the tabasco sauce in the center of the plate . add some lemon slices . serve the calamari .

plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
line up the fried calamari on a plate . place lettuce leaves between each pile of calamari . put the bowl of sauce in the middle .

plate the fried calamari with tabasco sauce lemon slices and lettuce leaves and serve .
take a big plate . take a small bowl . add some tabasco sauce in the bowl and place in center of plate . add the fried calamari on the plate . add the lettuce leaves on the plate . add some lemon slice in the plate .

heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
clean the garlic and herbs properly . put oil in a pot . add garlic in to the oil once oil is hot . add herbs into the pot with oil and garlic . mix altogether and cook it .

heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
put a small pot on the stove and turn the heat to medium . put oil in the pot , enough to cover the bottom of the pot with about a half inch . place two cloves of garlic on a cutting board and use the side of a knife to smash the cloves . place the smashed garlic cloves into the pot of oil , allow to cook for about two minutes . add whatever herbs you would like , turn off the heat , put a cover on the pot and wait for 5 minutes .

heat up oil garlic and herbs in a pot .
place small pot on the burner . add about 1/4 cup of oil . turn heat about halfway ( for medium heat ) . when oil is hot place unpeeled garlic in the pot and cook for 2 minutes . add the herbs to the pot , turn off the heat , cover the pot , and let it sit for about 5 minutes .

cut up the tomatoes .
take the stem out of the tomato . next cut up the tomatoes into 1 inch pieces .

cut up the tomatoes .
take a tomato and place it on the counter . cut up the tomato for the sauce with a sharp nice .

cut up the tomatoes .
wash the tomatoes . remove the stems by pulling them out or using a knife . cut the tomatoes into quarters ( four equal pieces ) on a cutting board , using a knife . chop the quarters into three chunks each .
