mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
cut tomatoes with a knife . put garlic and basil into the food processor and press the on button . keep the food processor on until the garlic and basil are in tiny pieces . add the cut tomatoes to the garlic and basil in the food processor . put food processor on the pulse setting until they 're in small pieces . remove the food processor .

mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
cut tomatoes in to small pieces . keep basil and garlic in a food processor and on it . grind them in to small pieces . add the cut tomatoes in to food processor . grind them also .

mix garlic basil and tomatoes in a food processor .
put in garlic and basil into food processor and push ' pulse ' until the pieces are small . put tomatoes into the mixture and push ' pulse ' for just a little bit until the tomatoes are cut up .

stir in tomato paste .
add tomato paste . then add sugar to tomato paste . next add the salt and pepper to the mixture . stir all ingredients together until mixed together well .

stir in tomato paste .
use the can opener to open the can of tomato paste . use a measuring spoon to measure out as much as you need . stir it into the sauce .

stir in tomato paste .
take sauce from food processor . mix together with spatula in a bowl .

slice the mozzarella .
using a sharp knife . slice the mozzarella into round thin pieces about 1/4 inch thick .

slice the mozzarella .
ask a parent for help with this activity . cut the cheese into thin coin shapes .

slice the mozzarella .
with a sharp knife slice mozzarella . make sure the slices are about the same thickness .

stretch out the dough into a circle .
now , time to stretch out the dough . begin by flattening the dough ball . try to work it into a circle shape . spread your fingers apart and work the dough to the right shape .

stretch out the dough into a circle .
flatten pizza and place over a tray that 's covered in flour . press down on the dough until it resembles a circle . spinning the flat dough on the tray and stretch it gradually with your fingers . lift an edge of the dough and let it slowly fall toward the tray . rotate it like you 're turning a steering wheel until it looks like a pizza crust .

stretch out the dough into a circle .
flatten the dough ball with your hands . stretch the dough in a circular shape . stretch it a little bit at a time .

brush oil on the dough .
your pizza dough needs to be flattened with your hands into a circle . get a pastry brush from your kitchen drawer or use a spoon for oil . dip brush in oil and cover the dough like you are painting . cover the entire surface of your pizza . have and adult help you grate parmesan cheese with a grater to cover the surface ; you can also use cheese from a bag .

brush oil on the dough .
take bowl of herb oil and dip brush in . apply herb oil over dough by brushing gently . make sure to put a layer over whole circle of dough .

brush oil on the dough .
get a cooking brush . get cooking oil . using the brush , brush the oil onto the dough .

add parmesan and tomato sauce .
roll out the pizza dough . put parmesan cheese directly on top of the dough . then add the tomato sauce and spread it over the dough .

add parmesan and tomato sauce .
take pizza base on the plate . take some block of parmesan cheese . grade the parmesan cheese on top of pizza base . take tomato sauce to the middle of pizza base . spread the tomato sauce to cover the entire pizza base .

add parmesan and tomato sauce .
use the grater with the parmesan and spread evenly over the crust . spread the tomato sauce evenly around the entire crust all the way close to the edges . sprinkle the shredded mozzarella around all over the tomato sauce .

add mozzarella cheese on top .
add mozzarella cheese over the pizza . make sure to evenly distribute the cheese so that it covers all of the sauce .

add mozzarella cheese on top .
place the pizza on a pan or a circle pizza pan . bake .

add mozzarella cheese on top .
put sauce on pizza . next add mozzarella cheese on top .

bake the pizza in the oven .
place the pizza into the oven . bake at 550 degrees fahrenheit for 8 minutes .

bake the pizza in the oven .
turn the oven on to 500 degrees . wait until the oven beeps . place your pizza on a pizza pan . put oven mitts on and put the pizza in the oven , bake for 8 minutes .

bake the pizza in the oven .
turn the oven on to the desired temperature . wait for the oven to beep that its ready . put the pizza in the oven for the desired time . take the pizza out when the time is up .

top with basil leaves .
place some raw basil leaves on top of the hot pizza . use enough that everyone will have a least one leaf on each slice .

top with basil leaves .
get some fresh basil leaves . put the fresh basil leaves on top of the pizza .

top with basil leaves .
use an oven mitt to remove the pizza from the oven and place it on a cutting board . take several leaves of basil and place on top of the pizza .

chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
take 1 onion on a chopping board . take the peel out of onion and cut it into 2 halves . take one half and carefully cut in to small pieces vertically . carefully turn the slices and cut horizontally in to small pieces . repeat the same with other half .

chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
chop an onion in half . slice the onion into strips . turn the onion on the cutting board and cut a checkerboard pattern into it . remember to always practice safe knife use . gather all the chopped onion together .

chop onions equivalent to the quantity of beef meat .
gather a cutting board , knife , and lots of onions . using your knife and cutting board dice onions into small cubes .

heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
take a deep pan and add some oil . heat the oil in the pan for sometime . cut the onions in to small pieces .. . now add the cut onions in to the hot oil . fry the onions till they are brown .

heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
pour some oil into a pan . heat it until it 's hot - around 45 seconds . add the chopped onions all at once . be careful not to splash the oil as you add it . fry the onions until they turn brown .

heat some oil in a deep pan and add chopped onions and fry till they turn brown .
pour some oil into a pan . put the pan on the stove . turn the heat on to medium and get the oil hot . cut an onion into tiny pieces . put onion in hot oil and cook until it starts to turn brown .

clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
use the side of the knife to smash the garlic . be careful of the sharp edge ! peel off the outside part and throw it away .

clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
take out cutting board and wide knife . pick apart the pieces of garlic cloves . lay knife over garlic cloves . push down on the knife resting on the cloves . cut the smashed cloves into small pieces .

clean and chop 1 whole garlic .
press the side of your knife against a clove of garlic . place your hand on the flat part of the blade . stabilize the blade by holding on tight to the handle with your right hand . press the garlic under the knife until you hear a pop and remove the skin . chop and repeat until every clove in the head has been minced .

stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
place cut onions into a heated pan . stir onions in heated pan until brown .

stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
stir the onions as they cook . be sure to continue stirring them . be patient because it may take a long time . as the onions begin to brown , keep a close eye on them : you do n't want them to burn . once they are completely brown , you 're done !

stir and let onions fry till they are completely brown .
get a pot and some onions . chop the onions into small pieces and put it in the pot . put the fire level on medium . stir the onions every 3 - 5 minutes until completely brown . turn off stove and put pot to the side .

once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
the onions should start to look brown . once they look brown , add garlic to the pan . stir them up so they mix with the browned onions . make sure you only cook them for a short time . because they can become bitter .

once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
add oil in a big pan . then add onions in to the oil . stir the onion until it is golden brown . add garlic into the onions in the pan . and finally stir it well .

once the onions are done add garlic and stir .
chop up garlic cloves . when the onions are done , put in garlic coves . stir every 3 - 5 minutes until finished .

add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
you cut the meat into small pieces . pour cut - up meat into heated pan . stir until the meat is brown .

add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
add the diced meat to the pot . take a wooden spoon . move the beef around so that everything mixes . keep moving the meat around in the pan . until it is dark and roasted .

add the diced beef meat to it and roast it .
add the small cubes of meat to the pot . let the meat heat up and cook .

add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
add the following spices to pan — pepper , cumin , salt , paprika , red pepper powder . stir everything together well . cook in oven .

add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
add a pinch of pepper , cumin , salt , and red pepper powder to the cooking meat . add a small spoonful of paprika to the cooking meat and other spices . stir until spices are not lumped together .

add pepper cumin salt paprika red pepper powder stir everything and roast .
add the cumin . add the salt . add the paprika . add the red pepper powder . stir it all together and let it simmer .

add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
measure one cup of tomato puree . add to pot . stir . cook while continuing to stir .

add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
measure a cup of tomato puree into another container . pout measured tomato puree into pot with cooked meat .

add a cup of tomato puree and cook stirring .
the meat should be simmering now . while it 's hot , add the tomato puree . it should sizzle but do n't let that worry you . give it a good stir . cook the tomatoes .

pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
take a kettle of boiling water . add the hot water to the boiling pot . be careful not to spill any hot liquid out of the pot . this should make the stew much thinner . cook it until the meat becomes soft .

pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
take a kettle and add some water in to it . boil the water in the kettle till it whistles . carefully pour the boiled water in to the cooking bowl . mix the water in to the bowl of cooking meat . cook for sometime until the meat becomes soft .

pour some warm water to it and cook until the meat becomes soft .
put some warm water in a cup . pour the water into the pot . stir the pot gently . let the meat cook until the sauce becomes thick . stir again gently .

melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
take out another small pan and place it on stove . put butter into pan and cook until melted . add 3 tsp flour to the butter and mix with a spoon . the mixture will be finished when it begins to turn brown .

melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
put some butter in a pan . let the butter melt until it 's liquid . pour 3 tsp of flour into the butter and stir it very well . make sure you keep stirring it so that it combines with the butter . it 's done when it looks like a light - brown play - doh .

melt some better in another small pan and add 3 tsp of flour to it and mix and roast until it browns .
heat up lots of butter in frying pan on stove . add flour to butter . stir until clumpy . make butter dark . remove pan .

add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
add the roasted flour to the pot of stew . it will start to make the stew thick over time . stir it up so that it mixes well . let it cook for 10 minutes more . you 'll notice that the flour has made the stew thicker .

add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
add flour to pan with meat mixture . mix well . continue cooking for 10 more minutes . turn off oven . serve .

add the roasted flour to the cooking meat mixture and mix well and cook for 10 minutes more .
put flour in the pot where the meat is and stir with your spoon let cook in the pot . stir the flour and meat with your spoon . when it is bubbly on th stove it will be done . but make sure there is no lumps in the pot from the flour . take off stove put in your plate and enjoy .

finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
place herbs on a cutting board . using a sharp knife , slice across all the herbs . then slice the opposite direction , like a checker board . repeat until the herbs are finely chopped . add to the goulash .

finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
take a chopping board . take the marjoram . cut the marjoram in to small pieces with a knife . carefully take to cut marjoram . add it to goulash .

finely chop marjoram and add it to the goulash .
put the marjoram on the cutting board . put it in a little pile . cut it with the knife until it is in very small pieces ( you can go over it again and again with the knife if you need to ) . pick up the small pieces of marjoram and sprinkle into the pot of goulash . stir the goulash to make sure the marjoram is mixed in .

plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
with a knife , slice 4 pieces of bread , put those pieces on one side of the plate . with a spoon , scoop up some goulash , and pour it on the other side of the plate , away from the bread . with a knife , chop up some onions not too big , but not too small . pick some onion , not all of it and gently place it on top of the goulash . enjoy !

plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
put a few pieces of bread on a plate . pour the goulash on to plate . add some chopped onions on top . serve .

plate some bread pour the goulash garnish with some chopped onions and serve .
grab 3 slices of bread . place the bread slices on a plate . on same plate , pour the goulash garnish using a cooking spoon . cut onions in small slices and place on top of the garnish . serve the plate when done .
